40001001	Buno nibwo obwibulanwa bwa Yesu Kristo, omwichuhulu wa Daudi, omwichuhulu wa Yibbulaimu.
40001002	Yibbulaimu, yebula Yisaka, Yisaka nae yebula Yakobbo, Yakobbo nae yebula Yuda nende ba mwaanang'ina.
40001003	Yuda yebula Pereesi nende Seera mu Tamari, ng'inaabwe. Pereesi yebula Hesirooni, Hesirooni nae yebula Raamu;
40001004	Raamu nae yebula Aminadabbu, Aminadabbu nae yebula Nahasoni, Nasoni nae yebula Salumooni;
40001005	Salumooni nae yebula Bbowaasi mu Rahabbu, Bbowaasi nae yesi yebula Obbedi mu Luusi, Obbedi nae yebula Yese;
40001006	Yese nae yebula Daudi owali Omutuki. Daudi nae yebula Solomooni mu muhasi wali owa Uriya;
40001007	Solomooni nae yebula Rekobbowamu, Rekobbowamu nae yebula Abbija, Abbija nae niyeebula Asa;
40001008	Asa nae yebula Yekosofati, Yekosofati nae yebula Yolaamu. Yolaamu nae yebula Usiya;
40001009	Usiya nae yebula Yosamu, Yosamu nae yebula Ahasi, Ahasi nae yebula Hesekia;
40001010	Hesekia nae yebula Manaase, Manaase nae yebula Amosi, Amosi nae yebula Yosia,
40001011	Yosia nae yebula Yekonia nende ba mwaanang'ina; mani Abayisirayiri beemao bayirwa mu buboye e Bbabbilooni.
40001012	Nibamalire ohuyirwa e Bbabbilooni, Yekonia yebula Salatieli, nae yebula Serubbabbeeri,
40001013	Serubbabbeeri nae yebula Abbiudi, Abbiudi nae yebula Eliakimu, Eliakimu nae yebula Asori;
40001014	Asori nae yebula Sadooki, Sadooki nae yebula Akimu, Akimu nae yebula Eliudi;
40001015	Eliudi yebula Eliisa, Eliisa nae yebula Mataani, Mataani nae yebula Yakobbo;
40001016	Yakobbo nae yebula Yosefu owali wamwe Maria owebula Yesu olaangwa Kristo.
40001017	Mani enjibulo chiri ehumi nende chine ohutula hu Yibbulaimu ohwoola hu Daudi. Ohutula hu Daudi ohwoola hu huyirwa e Bbabbilooni chosi chali enjibulo ehumi nende chine. Handi ohutula hu huyirwa e Bbabbilooni ohwoola hu hwibulwa hwa Kristo chosi chali enjibulo ehumi nende chine.
40001018	Ohwibulwa hwa Yesu Kristo hwali huti: Yosefu niyali nafukiirisaanie ohudeehisania nende Maria ng'ina Yesu, nibasisiiri ohubaaho alala, Maria yeyakaana nga ali asito ohwema hu maani ka Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
40001019	Nae koti Yosefu wamwe yali omuundu omulungifu siyadaha ohuwaambya Maria esoni mu bandu mani yahengao mu mwooyo kwae ohumuleha mungiso.
40001020	Nae niyali nasibaasa atyo, malaika w'Omwaami yeecha yaamubonehera musilooto yaamuboolera ati, “Yosefu mwaana wa Daudi, otatya ohubukula Maria yaba omuhasi wao. Olwohuba enda eyo si y'omusaacha haba daawe. Yayinyoola hulwa obunyala bwa Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
40001021	Achia ohwibula omwaana musyaani. Wahamulaange oti Yesu, olwohuba niye ochia ohununula abandu bae ohubatusa mu bibi byaabwe byoosi.”
40001022	Bino byoosi byeholeha ohwoseresa emboosi cha Nasae chiyalomalomera mu munabbi ati:
40001023	“Omuhaana muyere osisiiri ohubaaho nende omusaacha yahanyoole amabaanga yebula omwaana musyaani owahalaangwe ‘Manueli’ ” amahulundu mbwe, (Nasae ali naafwe.)
40001024	Yosefu niyasimuha mundoolo, yahola koti lu malaika w'Omwaami yali amukerakiire. Yosefu yamala yabukula Maria yamuyira yaaba omuhasi wae;
40001025	nae haba siyabaaho nae koti omusaacha nende omuhasi ohwoola lu Maria yebula omwaana wae oyo, mani bamulaanga Yesu.
40002001	Yesu niyamala ohwibulirwa mu Bbeteleheemu sya Buyudaaya mu ndaalo ch'Omutuki Herode, abasomi bandi, abeeka muno ebidiira hu ning'ining'ini batula Ebukwe beecha boola mu Yerusaalemu nibatebaanga bati,
40002002	“Omwaana wibuulwe ohuba omutuki w'Abayudaaya ali yena? Hubweene ening'ining'i yae niyitulire Ebukwe, sakira hwiichire ohumwiinamira.”
40002003	Omutuki Herode niyawulira atyo, yeyendeherera muno alala nende abandu bomu Yerusaalemu bosi.
40002004	Herode yeecha yabuusa alala abalaamisi bahuluundu boosi, alala nende abekesa b'amalako boosi, mani yabateeba ati, “Mbwe Kristo achia ohwibulirwa yena?”
40002005	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Mu siko sya Bbeteleheemu mu Buyudaaya. Olwohuba nilwo lu nabbi yandiika ati:
40002006	‘Ewe Bbeteleheemu oli mu syaalo sya Yuda, sineewe ohiramo obudiidi mu biko bihunuufu muno mu syaalo sya Yuda daawe; mani sakira mwewe nimwo omucha ohutula omwemeresi ochia ohufuka Yisirayiri, abandu bange.’ ”
40002007	Mani Herode yeecha yalaanga abakeni abo mungiso yemeeda ohubeteebaho ebiha byeene bi ning'ining'i yali niyibaboneheeremo.
40002008	Yamala yabatuma e Bbeteleheemu nababoolera ati, “Muche muteeberese bulai ebidiira hu mwaana oyo, mwiche munjekese, mani syesi njie mwiinamire.”
40002009	Mani nibawulira batyo bachiririra nende olukeendo lwaabwe olwo; mani nibali nibakeenda, beecha handi babona ening'ining'i yira yibali babweene Ebukwe; mani yabemirira ohwoola luyoola yedungeeresa abundu yi mwaana oyo yali.
40002010	Nibabona batyo basangaala behoya muno!
40002011	Nibengira mu nyumba eyo mani babona omwaana nende ng'ina Maria, basigama bamwiinamira. Bemao baaboolola emikaangi chaabwe bamubeeresa ebiyaanwa by'esaabbu, obubbaani nende amafuta kesing'aari siingi.
40002012	Nasae yeecha yabalabulira musilooto obutakaluhira eyiri Herode ohutusaho badiire engira yindi eyibakalusa ewaabwe.
40002013	Mani nibamala ohuwao, Malaika wa Nasae yeecha yabonehera Yosefu musilooto yaamuboolera ati, “Siingira obukule omwaana nende ng'ina mwiruhire e Misiri, mube eyo ohwoola omweene lundahababoolere endaalo ch'ohukoboleramo: Olwohuba manyire endi Herode yeecha ohukiiya omwaana oyo nadaha ohumwiita.”
40002014	Yosefu yabukula omwaana nende ng'ina beruhira e Misiri musiro syeene esyo,
40002015	yibamala baamenya ohwoola lu Herode yafwa. Kano kali katyo, hu mboosi ya Nasae yiyalomalomera mu nabbi yolerere yiti, “Ndahalaange omwaana wange ohutula mu Misiri.”
40002016	Herode niyafumbula ati abasaacha bakesi abo bali bamuheengere amakesi k'ohumweyibaho, yanyoolera muno, yatusa elako ly'ohwiita abaana basyani boosi mu Bbeteleheemu alala nende ebyaalo byoosi bisibirane nasyo, ohuchaakira hu myaka chibiri n'ohwiiha aasi, nga alonderera hu biha bi basaacha bakesi bala bali baboneremo ening'ining'i.
40002017	Mani nilwo lu mboosi chi nabbi Yeremiya yalomaloma lucholererera abweene chiti,
40002018	“Ekono lyawuliiriha mu Raama, ohulira hwesasaakisi liingi, Lakeeri nacherenjesa namasika hulw'abaana bae, nibihaya ohumulemia omwooyo olwohuba abaana bae boosi bali bamuweereho.”
40002019	Herode niyamala ohufwa, malaika wa Nasae yabonehera Yosefu musilooto e Misiri,
40002020	yaamuboolera ati, “Siingira obukule omwaana nende ng'ina mukobole mu syaalo sya Yisirayiri olwohuba abo abali nibakiiya ohwiita omwaana bamalire ohufwa.”
40002021	Yosefu yasingira yabukula omwaana nende ng'ina bakobola mu syaalo sya Yisirayiri.
40002022	Nae Yosefu niyawulira ati Akelausi niye owakaluha hu sisaala sya Herode simwaana ohuba omutuki wa Buyudaaya, yecha yaatya muno ohukaluhayo. Nae Nasae yeecha yaamukerakira musilooto, mani yeseenda yacha embeka che Galilaaya,
40002023	nae niyoola eyo, yamenya mu siko silaangwa siti, Nasareti. Awo nilwo lu bi banabbi balomaloma byolerera biti, “Yahalaangwe Omunasareti.”
40003001	Mundaalo echo, Yowaana Omubatiisi yeecha yachaaka ohuyalira musiparara sye Buyudaaya naboola ati;
40003002	“Mwefunake, olwohuba Obwaami bwo Mukulu buli aambi.”
40003003	Wuno niye yi nabbi Yisaaya yalomalomaho ati; “Ekono lihuumulira musiparara liti, Mutereese engira ya Nasae, mukololose emihoosi chae.”
40003004	Ebifwaalo bya Yowaana byalichingi eby'obwooya bw'engamia nende oluhoba lw'eseero mu sibuno. Ebyohulya byae byalichingi esike nende obuuhi bw'omusiino.
40003005	Abandu beyihaanga yiyalichingi nibatula Yerusaalemu, Buyudaaya nende mu bituundu byohumwaalo kwa Yorudaani.
40003006	Bechanga nibefunaka ebibi byaabwe nababatiisira mu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani.
40003007	Nae Yowaana niyabona Abafalisaayo bangi nende Abasadukaayo bosi nibeyiihe ohwiicha yali mbwe ababatiise, yabateeba ati, “Eng'we abaana b'endemo, wiina obabereese amakesi kano akohweyonia etima lya Nasae eliri aambi ohwiicha?”
40003008	Mani muhoyeere muhole ebiholwa byeekesa biti mumalire ohwefunakira elalira ebibi byeeng'we.
40003009	Handi mutaba nimubaasa busa muti munyala ohunyoola obweyikamo nimuboola muti muli abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, Nasae anyala ohubukula amakina kano yakaholamo abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu.
40003010	Kata buti embaachi yimalire ohutekehwa: ohutemera emisaala hu misi bweene, nabuli musaala kwoosi okutachia ohwaama ebyaamo bilai kucha ohutemwa kusukunwe mu muliro.
40003011	“Ese mbabatiisa mu maachi ohweekesa mbwe mu malire ohwefunaka ebibi by'eng'we; nae yiriyo oyo owunoondaho ochia ohubabatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu alala nende omuliro. Oyo ahirira elalira ese oluyaali, mani sihoyera kata budiidi ohumukiingira ebiraato byae.”
40003012	Ali nende oluderu mu mahono kae. Achia ohusereechera elalira emere yoosi. Achia ohuteera emere ndayi mu syaaki, nae omuhuchi kwoosi achia ohukubuusa, amale akusambe mu muliro kutasima.
40003013	Mu biha byeene ebyo, Yesu yatula e Galilaaya yacha hu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani eyiri Yowaana amubatiise.
40003014	Yowaana yakesaho ohuhaya naboola ati, “Niiwe ohoyere ohumbatiisa nae handi niiwe owiichire yindi?”
40003015	Nae Yesu yamala yaamukaluhamo ati, “Ewe leha bibe bityo busa. Olwohuba nilwo lwefwe huba fwembi hucha ohwoseresa abweene ohudaha hwa Nasae.”
40003016	Yesu niyamala ohubatiiswa ati, yatula mu maachi. Esiha syeene esyo ekulu lyekuha yabona Mwooyo Mwolerefu nafwaana nende eguugu, yeha yamweemaho.
40003017	Handi esiha syeene esyo, ekono lyawuliirihana nilitula Mukulu niliboola liti; “Wuno niye Omwaana omukoosi wange, owusangaasa muno.”
40004001	Olwoola, Mwooyo Mwolerefu yemirira Yesu yamuyira musiparara Sitaani ohumuhemerayo.
40004002	Yesu niyamala endaalo amahumi kane natalia, enjala yachaaka ohumuluma muno.
40004003	Sitaani yeecha yaali yaamuboolera ati, “Nikali mbwe niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae, kaluhania amakina kano kehole ebyohulya olye.”
40004004	Yesu nae yamukaluhamo ati, “Syandiikwa siti, omuundu haba saanyala hubaao hulw'ebyohulya byong'ene nae hulwa buli mboosi yitula eyiri Nasae.”
40004005	Handi Sitaani yemawo yayira Yesu mu siko syolerefu yamwemesa akulu hu nyumba ya Nasae
40004006	yaamuboolera ati, “Nikali mbwe niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae, yakuha okwe aasi, olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Nasae alihutumira bamalaika bae beeche bahubukaanire, bahudiire mu mahono kaabwe ohaye ohwegumulaho hu makina.’ ”
40004007	Yesu nae yamukaluhamo ati, “Otahemaanga Nasae Omwaami wao.”
40004008	Handi Sitaani yeecha yayira Yesu hu lugulu luleeyi muno yaamweekesa obwaami bwo husyaalo bwoosi nende oluyaali lwabwo. Sitaani yaboolera Yesu ati;
40004009	“Njia ohuhubeeresa obwaami buno bwoosi, nosigama wanyinamira.”
40004010	Awo bulaanu Yesu yamukaluhamo ati, “Ewe Sitaani, nduleho che era! Ohuba syandiikwa siti yinamiraanga Nasae Omwaami wao, handi niye yooba ohalaabanireenge yeng'ene.”
40004011	Awo bulaanu Sitaani yemawo yaatula hu Yesu, ni bamalaika beemao beecha baabeeresa Yesu obuhoonyi buyali nadaha.
40004012	Yesu niyawulira ati bamalire ohuboya Yowaana, yasingira yacha e Galilaaya;
40004013	Yecha yaatula e Nasareti yacha yaamenya e Kaperanaumu esiko siri hugenya ly'enyaanja ye Galilaaya musyaalo sye Sebbulooni nende Nafutaali.
40004014	Sino syaholehana hu mboosi ya Nasae yi nabbi Yisaaya yalomaloma yolerere mbwe,
40004015	“esyaalo sye Sebbulooni nende esyaalo sye Nafutaali, ebiri hungira yilangwa Eyohunyaanja ey'engereha y'omwaalo kwa Yorudaani, e Galilaaya esyaalo sy'Abateende.
40004016	Abo abakenderanga mu siirima leero babweene obulafu bungi. Nae abo abamenyaanga musyaalo sy'esirima sy'ohufwa obulafu bubahosere.”
40004017	Ohutula mu biha ebyo, Yesu yachaaka ohuyaala naboola ati, “Mwefunake ebibi byeeng'we olwohuba Obwaami bwo Mukulu buli aambi.”
40004018	Olwoola, Yesu niyali nakeenda husikobero sy'enyaanja ye Galilaaya, yabona Simooni olaangwa Peetero, nende Andereya mwaanang'ina nibali ohuteka eng'eni munyaanja nende enjero olwohuba bali abanaabi. Yesu niyaboolaho yababoolera ati,
40004019	“Mwiiche munoonde. Njia ohubahola mube abanaaba abandu.”
40004020	Bosi, esiha syeene esyo baleha awo enjero chaabwe bamuloonda.
40004021	Yesu niyemeedayo ohukeenda, handi yeecha yabona abasyaani bandi babiri abomunda ndala, Yakobbo nende Yowaana abaana ba Sebbedaayo. Bali bali nende saabwe Sebbedaayo nibehaale mulyaato nibongaanga enjero chiabwe, ni Yesu abalaanga bosi.
40004022	Abweene awo, bosi baleha elyaato lyaabwe nende saabwe, baloonda Yesu.
40004023	Yesu yemawo yakenda mu Galilaaya mwoosi nayaala Emboosi Ndai ech'Obwaami bwa Nasae mu mayumba ak'Abayudaaya ak'ohusabiraangamo akalangwanga kati 'Sinagoogi' naonia endwaae choosi alala nende obuchuuni bwa buli embya bwoosi.
40004024	Efuma yae yasasaana yaaswania esyaalo syoosi esya Siiria. Byakera abandu bamuleteraanga abalwae babuli mbya, abali nende obuchuuni obutaali nasilala obwali nibubachuuna, abemisambwa, abendulume, nende abadataala; bano boosi-boosi Yesu yabawonianga.
40004025	Ebidiyiha bya abandu bangi ohutula e Galilaaya, e Dekapooli, e Yerusaalemu, e Buyudaaya nende ohutula mungoongo che engereha w'omwaalo kwa Yorudaani, byoosi byamulondaanga.
40005001	Yesu niyabona ebidiyiha by'abandu, yeecha yaniina hu sigulu, yehala aasi. Abeki bamala basuda yiyali,
40005002	yachaaka ohubeekesa naboola ati:
40005003	“Bali nende ehabi abaati mu mwooyo, olwohuba Obwaami bwo Mukulu bwaabwe:
40005004	“Bali nende ehabi abesibeera, olwohuba bacha ohulemeswa emyooyo:
40005005	“Bali nende ehabi abaloonga, olwohuba bahayire esyaalo:
40005006	“Bali nende ehabi abalumwa enjala nende obuluwo bwo huhola bi Nasae adaha, olwohuba bacha ohwikutira elalira:
40005007	“Bali nende ehabi abesisa, olwohuba bahakwiirwe esisa:
40005008	“Bali nende ehabi ab'emyooyo milai, olwohuba bahabone Nasae:
40005009	“Bali nende ehabi abaleeta emireembe, olwohuba bahalaangwe abaana ba Nasae.
40005010	“Bali nende ehabi abasandisibwa hulwa bi Nasae adaha, olwohuba Obwaami bwo Mukulu bwaabwe.
40005011	“Muli nende ehabi nibabanyeka handi nibabasaandia nibabalomalomaho emboosi mbi, nibababachira hulwaange.
40005012	Mwehoye, musangaale olwohuba omukabo kw'eng'we Mukulu muhoongo muno: olwo nilwo nasilala lubasaandia banabbi bahale.
40005013	“Niing'we omuunyu kw'esyaalo. Nae omuunyu nikuwaamo echamu lyaakwo, kunyala kutye kwakaluswamo echamu elyo? Kuba sikusisiiri nende obuhoonyi, ohutusaho kusukunwa erwaanyi busa abandu bakusenakire.
40005014	“Niing'we obulafu bw'esyaalo. Esiko syombaahwa hu lugulu sisinyala hukiswa daawe.
40005015	Abulao omuundu owaambia etaara handi yamala yaalifunihaho esimweero; ohutusaho, alitengeha hu siteeni syalyo hu linyale ohuhosera bulai abandu boosi abali mu nyumba eyo.
40005016	Mani eng'we mwesi mulehe obulafu bweeng'we bwaaduhire abandu hu banyale ohubona ebilai bi muhola beemeo bafumie Nasae Seeng'we oli Mukulu.
40005017	“Mutakaala muti ndeecha ohumalao Amalako ka Musa, kata enjekesa ya banabbi. Sindeecha ohubimalao, nae ndeecha ohubyoseresa koti lubihoyeere.
40005018	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi: Ekulu nende esyaalo ni bisisiiriwo, abulao kata esicha ohutusibwa hu Malako kano ohwoola koosi lu kahosereswe abweene.
40005019	Sakira omuundu yeesi ofunaka elako lihiramo obudiidi hu Malako kano, handi yekesa abandu bandi bosi ohulifunaka, niye olilaangwa omuleemefu mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu. Nae omuundu yeesi owoseresa handi yekesa abandu bandi bosi ohwoseresa Amalako kano, yahalaangwe omuhunuufu mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu.
40005020	Sakira ese mbaboolera endi, ohutusaho obulaboota bweeng'we nibutahiraho obw'Abaandiiki ba Amalako nende obw'Abafalisaayo, haba simwahengire mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu.
40005021	“Mwawulira muti hale baboolera ba kuuka yeng'we bati, ‘Otetaanga,’ handi bati, omwiiti yeesi yahaheengerwe omusango ohumuhira.
40005022	Nae ese mbaboolera endi, buli muundu yeesi odiirira owaasye etima, yahaheengerwe omusango mu siina ohumuhira. Nae omuundu onyeka owaasye ati, ow'esibboli, oba onyeka owaasye ati Raca, yahayaaswe mu siina sy'oluyia. Nae oyo yeesi onyeka owaasye ati, “Omusiru wuno!” Yahasukunwe mu muliro kutasima .
40005023	Sakira nooba noyira esiyaanwa syao hu alutaari niwichulisa oti owaasyo ali nende obusoolo naawe;
40005024	leha esiyaanwa syao esyo hu alutaari awo, mberi ochie otereese emboosi nende owaasyo oyo, hw'omale wiche owaanire Nasae esiyaanwa syao.
40005025	Omuundu naaba nende esifune syoosi syahufwaambya, kesaho mufukiirisanie nasisiiri ohuhwoosa mu siina. Olwohuba, nimwahooleyo aba achia ohuhusukuna mu mahono ka baheengi bemisaango, nabo baba bacha ohuhudiisa Abasirikari be jiela bahuboye.
40005026	Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, ochia ohuba omwo, ohwoola luwahatuungire elalira ehela yakamayo.
40005027	“Mwawuliraanga lubaboolera abahale bati, ‘Mutayiranaanga,’
40005028	Nae ese mbaboolera endi; buli muundu wewunja omuhasi yeesi yekomba mu mwooyo ohuba nae, oyo aba amalire ohuyirana nae.
40005029	Sakira niwichuhana emoni yao y'omuhono muluungi yaakera wakwa mu sibi, yichomolemo oyisukune! Olwohuba silayi ohufwiirwa esituundu silala sy'ohumubiri kwao, ohuhira omubiri kwao kwoosi ohusukunwa mu muliro kutasima.
40005030	Handi niwichuhana omuhono kwao muluungi kwakera wakwa mu sibi, kutemeho okusukune. Olwohuba silayi ohufwiirwa esituundu silala sy'ohumubiri kwao, ohuhira omubiri kwao kwoosi ohuchia mu muliro kutasima.
40005031	“Handi hale baboolaanga bati, ‘Oyo yeesi odaha ohwirusa omuhasi wae, amubereseenge ebbarwa y'ohwiruswa mubwandiike.’
40005032	Nae ese mbaboolera endi, oyo owirusa omuhasi wae hu lw'esisobyo syoosi, ohumalaho esy'obuyirani aba amukwisire mu sibi sy'obuyirani, handi oyo odeehya omuhasi mwiruse, yesi aba akwiire mu sibi sy'obuyirani.
40005033	“Handi mwawulira koti lusyaboolwa hale siti, ‘Otechubaanga ebyobubacha, nae yoseresanga syooba niwechubire mu moni cha Nasae.’
40005034	Nae ese mbaboolera endi, Otechubaangaho daawe; otechubiraangaho ekulu, olwohuba nilyo obwihalo bwa Nasae;
40005035	Kata otechubiraangaho esyaalo, olwohuba nisyo syawulusiraho amakulu kae. Handi otechubiraangaho Yerusaalemu, olwohuba nisyo esiko sy'Omutuki Muhunuufu.
40005036	Kata handi otechubiringaho omutwe kwao, olwohuba ewe haba sonyala hukaluuhania kata olwooya lw'efwiiri lyao lwa rachaari lwaba olwa rateeng'i, kata olwa rateeng'i lwaba olwa rachaari.
40005037	Muleheenge busa emboosi cheeng'we chimufukiirire, chibecheenge busa, ‘Eee.’ Nae chimukaanire chibecheenge busa, ‘Haba.’ Olwohuba emboosi chiindi chiba nichemedaho, chiba chitula hu Sitaani.
40005038	“Mwawulira koti lusyaboolwa hale siti, ‘Emoni yitungwa emoni, eliino nalyo lyatuungwa eliino.’
40005039	Nae ese mbaboolera endi, Otatungaanga omuundu, ohuholere esibi, nende esibi siindi. Omuundu nahupaama hu tama ly'omuhono muluungi, muchusireenge ely'omuhono mukaada lyosi;
40005040	omuundu nahuyiriimba nahufwaambia esaati lyao, leha ayire nende ekooti lyao lyosi;
40005041	omuundu nahuyiika ohumugooba kilomiita ndala, ewe mugoobe kilomiita chibiri.
40005042	Omuundu nahusaba esiindu syoosi, mubereseenge busa. Handi oyo odaha ohuhweyola esiindu syoosi, muberese busa.
40005043	“Mwawulira koti lubabooleraanga abahale bati, ‘Dahanaanga nende oyo ohudaha, nae osyuule omusuku wao.’
40005044	Naange mbaboolera endi, mudahaneenge nende abasuku beeng'we, handi musabireenge ehabi ndayi ababaholera bubi,
40005045	humwemeo mube abaana ba Nasae Seeng'we oli Mukulu. Olwohuba yaadusira omubasu kwae abandu babi nende abalayi nasilala. Handi akwisira efula yae ababi nende abalayi nasilala.
40005046	Nimudahana nende abo ababadaha bong'ene, mukabo siina kumuba muli nakwo ohutula eyiri Nasae? Olwohuba, kata abatoosa b'omusolo bosi nilwo lubaholaanga batyo.
40005047	Handi nimuhesania busa nende bamudahana nabo bong'ene, muba mukabuhana mutye nende a bandu bandi? Olwohuba kata Abateende bosi nilwo lubaholaanga batyo.
40005048	Sakira eng'we mube abolerefu koti lu Nasae Seeng'we oli Mukulu ali Omwolerefu.
40006001	“Nimuholaanga esiindu silai, mweliindeenge obuteniinia mu moni wa bandu, nimweekesa ebilai bimuba nimuholere. Olwohuba nimuhola mutyo, haba simuba mucha ohunyoola omukabo kwoosi ohutula eyiri Seeng'we oli Mukulu.
40006002	“Mani noberesaanga omuundu muwati esiindu syoosi, otefumianga muno eyiri bandu nobaboolera byooba nooholere, koti lu Bebachirisi baholaanga mu Sinagoogi, nibeyemeresa hu ngira nibadaha abandu bababone hu babafumie. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abo bamala ohunyoola omukabo kwaabwe kwoosi.
40006003	Nae eng'we nimuhonyaanga omuwati esiindu syoosi, omwiicha wao mweene, atamanyaangaho syooba nooholere,
40006004	hu bulaanu, obuhoonyi bwao obwo, bunyale ohudoong'a obwo musyaama. Mani hu Nasae wao, obona ebiholebwa musyaama, omweene niye olihubeeresa omukabo kwao.
40006005	“Mani nooba niwekongooya eyiri Nasae, otafwananaanga nende Abebachirisi! Abo nibo abaheera ohweyemeeresa mu Sinagoogi nibekongooya, abandu bababone. Handi kata bacha nibeyemeresa hungira hu buli muundu oba naabita, abone ati nibo abamanya ohwekongooya. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abo bamala ohunyoola omukabo kwaabwe kwoosi.
40006006	Nae ewe nooba niwekongooya, yingiraanga weyikalira mu nyumba yao, hwomale wekongooye Nasae Lataao otabonehana. Mani, Nasae Lataao oyo, obona ebyehola musyaama, niye oba achia ohuhubeeresa omukabo kwao.
40006007	“Mani nooba niwekongooya, otehoonyeraanga emboosi nyiingi muno koti lu Bebachirisi baholaanga; olwohuba babaasa bati, Nasae nilwo lwaba achia ohubawulira ohweema hu hwekongooya hwaabwe huleei ohwo.
40006008	Sakira eng'we nang'we, mutafwaanana nabo, olwohuba Seeng'we oli Mukulu amanyire bimudaha kata nimusisiiri ohumusaba.
40006009	Mani yino niyo embya yimuhoyeere ohwekongooyeramo: Seefwe oli Mukulu; eliita lyao lifumisibwe.
40006010	Obwaami bwao bwiiche; byodaha biholebwe musyaalo, koti lu biholwa Mukulu.
40006011	Tuberese olwaleero, ebyohulya byeefwe byabuli ludaalo;
40006012	Tuleheremo ebibi byeefwe, koti lu huleheramo abo abatuholera obubi.
40006013	Otatuyira muhuhemwa, nae tuwonie mu bubi.”
40006014	Olwohuba, nimuleheramo ababahola bubi, nilwo lu Seeng'we oli Mukulu yesi achia ohubaleheramo.
40006015	Nae nimutaleheraangamo abo ababahola bubi, Seeng'we oli Mukulu yesi haba saachia hubaleheramo ebibi byeeng'we.
40006016	“Nae nimuba nimusiiba, mutabiyiirisaanga koti Abebachirisi lubahola. Bahuunia obweeni bwaabwe hu bandu bamanye bati bali ohusiiba. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi mungeri eyo, bamala ohufuna omukabo kwaabwe kwoosi.
40006017	Nae eng'we nimuba nimusiiba, mwebaheenge amafuta mu mutwe, handi mwetereseenge mu bweeni mwosi,
40006018	abandu bahaye ohumanya bati muli ohusiiba; mani Nasae weng'we obona ebyehola musyaama niye ochia ohubabeeresa omukabo kweeng'we.
40006019	“Mutabiiha obuyiinda bweeng'we mu syaalo muno, yi masiriri nende emberebeende binyaasa binyala ohunyaasa, handi nende abanyaka banyala ohwingirira babiiba.
40006020	Nae, obuyiinda bweeng'we, mu bubiihe Mukulu yi masiriri nende emberebeende, bitanyala hunyaasa, kata nende abanyaka yibatahanyala ohwingira beeba.
40006021	Olwohuba, yi buyiinda bwao yibuba, niyo yosi yi mwooyo kwao kuba.
40006022	“Emoni niyo etaara lyo mubiri. Sakira emoni yao niyiba enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba mu bulafu.
40006023	Nae emoni yao niyitaali enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba mu sirima. Mani obulafu bw'omubiri kwao, nibwehola esiirima, esiirima esyo ngasiba sinaabe esibitiirifu!
40006024	“Abulao omuundu onyala ohuhalaabanira abakali babiri. Aba achia ohuheera mulala nae asyule owundi, oba awulire mulala nae alekerese owundi. Haba sonyala ohuhalaabanira Nasae handi esiha syeene esyo wahalaabanira obuyiinda.”
40006025	“Sakira mbaboolera sino endi, mutelalihiriraanga hu by'ohulya oba eby'ohung'wa, kata bimweenya mu bulamu bweeng'we oba engeri y'ohwefwaalamo. Obulamu bw'omuundu nende ebyohulya, oba omubiri kw'omuundu nende ebyohwefwaala, siina esihira esiindi?
40006026	Mubonereho hu mayoni, haba sikataaka kata kakesa kabuunga mu byaki, ohutusaho Nasae Seeng'we, niye okaliisa kanyala obubaao! Nae eng'we, simuhirira elalira amayoni?
40006027	Nae naanu hw'eng'we onyala ohwemeedaho obuyindifu hooho, hulw'ohwelalihira hwae ohwo?
40006028	Lwasiina mwelalihira muno hu ngeri y'ohwefwaalamo? Mubonereho hu bimuli by'omusiino: Sibyenabira ngubo.
40006029	Nae mbaboolera endi, kata Solomooni mu buyiinda bwae bwoosi siyanyala ohwefwaala yaanyirira bilai yaboneha koti ebimuli bino.
40006030	Mani nimubona muti eyo niyo engeri yi Nasae afwaliramo ebimuli bibaao busa olwaleero, ni buhya byooma, bisambwa mu muliro, mubaasa muti Nasae oyo saanyala hubafwaasa ohuhiraho ebimuli, eng'we ab'efukiirira ndiidi?
40006031	Sakira mulehe ohwelalihira ni mubaasa muti; ‘Hunaalye siina?’ Oba ‘Hunang'we siina?’ Oba muti, ‘Hunefwaale siina?’
40006032	Olwohuba, ebyo nibyo ebiindu bi bakafwiiri babaasaho buli siha, nae eng'we, Seeng'we oli Mukulu amanyire ati bino byoosi mubidaha.
40006033	Nae mutaangire ohukoonya Obwaami bwa Nasae alala nende obwolerefu bwae; mani ebiindu bino byoosi muba mwahabiduhane.
40006034	“Sakira mulehe ohwelalihira ebinaakweo muchuli; olwohuba, buli ludaalo luli nende ebidinyu byalwo ebilumala.
40007001	“Mutahengeraanga abaasyeng'we omusango, hu mwesi muhaye ohuheengerwa omusango,
40007002	olwohuba engeri yimuhengeramo abaasyeng'we omusango, niyo nasilala yimwahahengerwemo. Handi esikero simukereramo abaasyeng'we, nisyo simwahakererwemo.
40007003	Lwasiina ewe olingirisa esikoha siri mu moni y'owaasyo, nae ewe omweene sobaasa hu sichihi siri mu moni yao?
40007004	Onyala otye ohuboolera owaasyo oti: ‘Leha hutusemo esikoha sihuli mu moni’ naawe omweene osisiiri nende esichihi mu moni yao?
40007005	Omwebachirisi ewe, taangira mberi otuse esichihi esiri mu moni yao, huweemeo obone bilai, onyale ohutusa esikoha siri mu moni y'owaasyo.
40007006	“Otaberesaanga embwa ebiindu byolerefu, handi otasukuniraanga embiichi ebiindu byao byobuhala, olwohuba chiba chinabisenakire mu makulu, mani cheecha chahwechuuhira chahuluma.
40007007	“Nodaha esiindu, saba; nodaha ohubukaana, koonya; handi nodaha ohwikulirwao, hong'oonda;
40007008	olwohuba buli osaba, aberesebwa; okoonya, abukaana; handi ohong'oonda hu lwiiki, yekulirwao.
40007009	Nae naanu hweeng'we, onyala ohuberesa omwaana wae ekina namusabire omugaati,
40007010	oba, yaamubeeresa enjuha namusabire eng'eni?
40007011	Eng'we abataali boolerefu mumanyire ohuberesa abaana beeng'we ebiindu bilai, nae Nasae Seeng'we oli Mukulu siyahahirireo muno ohuberesa ebiindu bilai abo ababa nibamusabire?
40007012	Mani, muholereenge abaasyeng'we koti lumwahadahire babaholere. Ako niko amahulundu ka malako ka Musa nende enjekesa ya banabbi.
40007013	“Mwingirire mu siruwa sidiiyu, olwohuba esiruwa sitakalafu nende engira nyaangu, yiyira abandu mu husihirira, mani abasingiriramo nibo abaangi.
40007014	Nae esiruwa siingisa mu bulamu butaakama, sidiiyu nisyo nende engira yolayo, ndinyu niyo ohubitaho, handi abandu badiidi muno abayibona.
40007015	“Mweliinde muhaye ohubachibwa nende abanabbi bataali badyeri; olwohuba, beecha ohwiicha yimuli nibeotere ni bafwaana koti amakoondi hu Mukulu nae mu bwadyeeri bweene, mu myooyo chaabwe, bali busa amanani.
40007016	Mwahabamanyire hu biholwa byaabwe. Omusaala kw'oryang'i kunyala ohwaamaho emisabbiibu? Kose, enduli wachinoka hu nyalwete-kwaachi?
40007017	Olwohuba omusaala mulai kutulaho ebyaamo bilai, nae omusaala mubi kwosi kutulaho ebyaamo bibi.
40007018	Omusaala mulai sikunyala kwaamaho ebyaamo bibi, handi omusaala mubi kwosi sikwaamaho ebyaamo bilai.
40007019	Omusaala kwoosi okutaamaho ebyaamo bilai kutemwa, kwasukunwa mu muliro.
40007020	Mani, mucha ohumanyaanga abanabbi bobubacha, ohwema hu biholwa byaabwe.
40007021	“Sisiri siti buli muundu wunaanga ati; ‘Omwaami, Omwaami,’ niye owahengire mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu; ohutusaho oyo ohola bi Laata oli Mukulu byadaha.
40007022	Hu ludaalo olwo abandu bangi baheeche nibaboola bati, ‘Omwaami, Omwaami, hwatuumbulaanga eliita lyao koti ba wamwaanda bao; handi hwerusaanga Amasitaani mangi muno ni hwehoonyera eliita lyao; handi mu liita lyao hwaholaanga ebyaamayia biingi ebitaali nasilala?’
40007023	Naange ndahabakoboolemo endi, ‘Simbamanyireho! Mbweere eyi, eng'we abaholi b'ebibi!’
40007024	“Mani sakira omuundu yeesi owulira emboosi change chino, handi yaachiholeraho, achia ohufwaana koti omuundu mukesi owombaha enyumba yae hu musiingi mwomiifu.
40007025	Efula yayiyomboohaho, emihula chayehubbaho, omuyaka kwamaani kwayiwuchaho, nae enyumba eyo, haba siyakwa olwohuba yali yombahwa hu musiingi kw'olwaanda.
40007026	Nae omuundu owulira emboosi change chino, yahaya ohuchiholeraho, afwana koti omwombahi musiru owombaha enyumba yae hu musiingi kw'olusenye.
40007027	Efula yayiyomboohaho, emihula chayehubbaho, omuyaka kwamaani kwayiwuchaho, mani yeecha yaakwa, yanyonyoboha.”
40007028	Mani Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma atyo, abandu bawuka muno engeri yiyekeseramo eyo.
40007029	Olwohuba engeri yiyekeseramo eyo, yali yikabuhana muno nende enjekesa y'Abandiiki ba Malako, olwohuba Yesu yekesa koti omuundu w'obunyala.
40008001	Olwoola, Yesu niyamala ohwiha ohutula hu lugulu, esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo muno syeecha syamuloonda.
40008002	Abweene awo, omusaacha wali alwaala esikuhu yeecha yi Yesu yali, yaasigama mu moni wae, yaamala yaamuboolera ati; “Omwaami, nooba nodaha, onyala wamonia!”
40008003	Yesu yakolola omuhono kwae, yamudiiraho, naboola ati; “Ndaha, mani wona.” Esiha syeene esyo, esikuhu syamwaamuluhaho.
40008004	Yesu niyamala atyo yemawo yamuhuutira naboola ati, sino, otasibooleraho omuundu yeesi ohutusaho cha weyekese eyiri omulaamisi, ahwehalirise; omale owaane esiyaanwa syekesa abandu siti owonere koti lu Musa yalagira mu malako.
40008005	Olwoola, Yesu niyengira e Kaperanaumu omusikaari muhunuufu owe Roomu yeecha yabukanana nae, yaamusaba obuhoonyi ati;
40008006	“Omwaami, ndi nende omuhalabani wange engo omulwae muno, saanyala kata nende ohukeenda hulwobuchuuni bungi.”
40008007	Yesu yamukobolamo ati; “Njicha ohwiicha muwonie.”
40008008	Nae omusikaari oyo yaamuboolera ati; “A-a, Omwaami ebyo haba, ese sihoyerwa ewe kata ohwiicha ohwingira mu nyumba yange, ohumalaho, lomaloma busa emboosi yong'ene ni omuhalabani wange awona.
40008009	Olwohuba syesi ndiho nende abaatuka, handi syesi ndi nende Abasirikari baanduka. Nindagira mulala endi, ‘Cha,’ ni achia busa; handi nindagira owundi endi, ‘Yicha,’ niyeecha busa; handi nindagira omupakasi wange endi; ‘Hola sino,’ nasihola busa.”
40008010	Yesu niyawulira atyo yawuka muno, yaboolera abali nibamuloondaho ati; “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, sisiiri ohubonaho efukiirira koti yino hu muundu yeesi mu Yisirayiri.
40008011	Ndaha mumanye muti abandu bangi bacha ohutula ebukwe nende emumbo baliire alala Obwaami bwo Mukulu nende Yibbulaimu, Yisaka nende Yakobbo.
40008012	Nae abo abahatangire ohuba mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu bacha ohusukunwa erwaanyi mu sirima, yibahalirire nibesia ameeno.”
40008013	Mani Yesu yemawo yaboolera omusikaari oyo ati, “Koti lwooli nende efukiirira otyo, kaluha engo byodaha ebyo bicha ohuhuholerwa.” Nae esiha syeene esyo omuhosi w'omusikaari oyo yaonerao.
40008014	Yesu yacha ewa Peetero yakaana masalang'ene Peetero niyeyaliise olwohuba yali nalwaala omusuuja.
40008015	Nae Yesu niyamudiira hu muhono, omusuuja kwamuleha yachaaka ohubahalaabanira.
40008016	Obwiire nibweera, bamuleetera abandu bangi abaliho emisaambwa. Yesu yaberusaho emisaambwa echo nga yehoonyera busa emboosi yong'ene, mani yawonia abalwaye boosi.
40008017	Yahola atyo ohwoseresa si munabbi Yisaaya yaboola ati, “Yatutusaho amadehere keefwe, handi yakiinga endwaae cheefwe.”
40008018	Olwoola, Yesu niyabona esidiyiha sy'abandu simwebodohaanie, yahada abeeki bae bambuhe engereha w'enyaanja.
40008019	Nae Omweekesi wa Malako wundi yeecha yali yamuboolera ati; “Omweekesa, njia ohuhulondaanga buli yochiira.”
40008020	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati; “Amabbwe kali nende ameena kakamenyamo, handi amayoni kosi kaaba nende ebiswi byako, nae Omwaana w'Omuundu saali nende kata yageeng'a omutwe.”
40008021	Mulala hu beeki bae yaamuboolera ati; “Omwaami, leha mberi njie siihe Laata.”
40008022	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati; “Ewe noonde. Leha abafu basiihe abafu basyaabwe.”
40008023	Yesu yengira mu lyaato yasyaabala alala nende abeeki bae.
40008024	Abweene awo, esifuusye syamaani syeecha syeyisa enyaanja, amafwinda kasiingira kahubba elyaato lyadaha ohwibira. Nae Yesu yali niyeyaliise endoolo.
40008025	Abeki nibabona batyo, bacha yali, bamusimusa ni bamuboolera bati, “Omwaami; Tuwonie! Hufwa!”
40008026	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina mutya?” Nga muli nende efukiirira ndiidi! Yesu yasingira yahabuhira esifuusye nende enyaanja, mani byoosi byamala byayenjerera chi!
40008027	Mani buli muundu yawuka, beteeba bati; “Nae wuno muundu w'engeri siina, kata esifuusye nende enyaanja byosi bimuwulira!”
40008028	Mani Yesu niyoola hu sikobero sy'e Gadaraneese, abandu babiri abaliho emisaambwa, beecha babukaanana nae nibatulira mu ng'uungu chibasihaangamo abandu. Ab'emisaambwa abo bali abaalaba muno, mani abulao omuundu wadahaanga ohubitira yibali.
40008029	Nibamubona, bachaaka ohwayulira akulu bati, “ Mwaana wa Nasae, otukoonyaho siina? Wichire ano ohutuboneresa ebiha nibitoola?”
40008030	Awo waliwo omukaanda muhoongo okw'embiichi nikwaaya.
40008031	Mani emisaambwa chasaba Yesu chiti; “Nodaha ohutwirusa, mani tusiindihe mu mbiichi chino.”
40008032	Mani Yesu yaboola ati; “Muche.” Mani chacha cheengira mu mukaanda kw'embiichi okwo. Omukaanda okwo kwoosi kwewulula embiro kwehubba mu nyaanja, kwebira kwaafwa.
40008033	Abaayi b'embiichi echo nibabona batyo, beeruha bacha mu siko baboolera abandu byoosi ebyali byeholere hu bandu bemisaambwa.
40008034	Sino syakera abandu bo mu siko esyo beecha ohubonana nende Yesu, bamwekongooya atule mu situundu syaabwe esyo.
40009001	Yesu niyamala ohwingira mu lyaato, yaasyaabala yakaluhayo mu siko sy'ewaabwe syeene.
40009002	Niyoola busa ati, bamuleetera omusaacha wali niyadataala niyeyaliise hubutalihe bwae. Nae Yesu niyabona efukiirira yaabwe, yabolera owali yadataala oyo ati; “mwaana wange, guma omwooyo, ebibi byao bihuleherwemo.”
40009003	Nae Abandiiki ba Amalako beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Omuundu wuno ali ohufwoola Nasae!”
40009004	Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe, yaboola ati; “Lwasiina muli nende ebibaaso bibi mu myooyo cheeng'we?”
40009005	Esiri ena esyaangu, ohuboola oti, “Ebibi byao bihuleherwemo,” kose ohuboola oti, “Siingira okeende?”
40009006	Nae humunyale ohumanya muti Omwaana w'Omuundu ali nende obunyala husyaalo obw'ohuleheramo ebibi, yeecha yaboolera omusaacha wadataala ati; “Siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao ochie engo!”
40009007	Mani yaasingira yacha engo.
40009008	Nae esidiyiha sya bandu esyali awo, nisyabona sityo, syatya, mani syakinia Nasae, owaberesa abandu obunyala buli butyo.
40009009	Yesu niyali atula eyo, yeecha yabona omusaacha olaangwa Matayo niyehaale abundu yibatoosera omusolo, yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.” Matayo yasingira yaamuloonda.
40009010	Handi Yesu niyali anyoola esyengoloobe, abatoosa b'emisolo bangi nende abaholi be bibi, beecha beehala balya nae esyengoloobe alala nende abaloondi bae.
40009011	Nae Abafalisaayo nibabona sino, baboolera abaloondi bae bati; “Lwasiina omweekesa weng'we alya nende abatoosa b'emisolo alala nende abaholi be bibi?”
40009012	Nae niyawulira esyo, yaboola ati, “abandu balamu sinibo abadaha omulerwa, nae abalwaye nibo abamudaha.”
40009013	Muche mani mweeke amahulundu kasino, “Ndaha esisa, nae haba siindaha esabo ly'ebisolo bisambwa.' Olwohuba sindeecha ohulaanga abolerefu, nae abaholi be bibi.”
40009014	Olwoola, abaloondi ba Yowaana beecha eyiri Yesu nibaboola bati; “Hu siina efwe nende Abafalisaayo husiiba, nae abaloondi bao haba sibasiiba?”
40009015	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “ Abalaange bo hu sidyaalo sy'obugole, banyala batye ohwelalihira omugole mweene nasisiiri nabo? Nae endaalo chahoole chi mugole yahabatusibweho, mani awo nilwo bosi lubahasiibe.
40009016	Handi abulao omuundu wahanaba esiraka siyaaha hu ngubo ngofu, olwohuba esiraka esyo siba sinehuuna sitanduhe situle hu ngubo, mani esitanduhe syehole esitabaafu ohuhirahoo.
40009017	Handi, efwiini njiaha sibayita musikiingiro syeseero sikofu. Nisiba sityo, esikiingiro sikofu esyo siba sichia ohwaadiha, mani efwiini yiidihe, handi esikiingiro syosi sitanduhe. Nae, efwiini njiaha yihoyeere bayite mu sikiingiro sy'eseero siyaaha, hu byombi binyale ohulindana.”
40009018	Yesu niyali nasilomaloma nabo, omutuki wundi yeecha yaasigama mu moni wa Yesu, namuboolera ati; “Omuhaana wange yahafwa busa esiha sino, nae yicha omwiiseho omuhono kwao, mani yeecha ohulamuha.”
40009019	Mani Yesu yasingira yaamuloondaho alala nende abeeki bae.
40009020	Nae bone, omuhasi wali alwaalire obulwaae bw'ohudaachirira ohumala emyaaka ehumi-na-chibiri yamutulira emukoongo, yadiira hu kemo ly'engubo yae;
40009021	Olwohuba yaboola mu mwooyo kwae ati, “Ninyala kata ohudiiraho busa hu ngubo yae, njia ohuwona.”
40009022	Yesu niyahubba amahemo yamubona mani namuboolera ati; “mwaana wange, guma omwooyo! Efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.” Mani ebiha byeene ebyo ni omuhasi oyo aona.
40009023	Nae mani Yesu niyoola mu nyumba y'omutuki, yabona aboobbi bamalere nende esidiyiha sy'abandu nisiyobere,
40009024	yaboola ati, “Mbwere eyi! Olwohuba omuhaana wuno saafwiire, nae ali ohukona.” Nabo bamucheha busa.
40009025	Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu nisyamala ohutula erwaanyi, Yesu yengira mu nyumba, mani yamudiira omuhono, mani omuhaana wali afwiire yasingira.
40009026	Emboosi eyo yasasaana mu situundu sy'esyaalo esyo syoosi.
40009027	Nae Yesu niyali atula nawaao, abaofu babiri bamuloondaho nibahuumulira akulu bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi, Tukwiire esisa!”
40009028	Nae niyengira mu nyumba, abaofu babiri beecha yali, mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mufukiirira muti nyala ohubaonia?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Eee, Omwaami!”
40009029	Mani Yesu yeecha yadiira hu moni chaabwe naboola ati, “Ohweema hu fukiirira yeng'we, hasibaholerwe sityo.”
40009030	Mani emoni chaabwe chalimbula chachaaka ohubona. Mani Yesu yabahuutira ati, “Mutabooleraho omuundu yeesi.”
40009031	Nabo nibatula ao bachaaka ohulaangirira ebidiira hu Yesu mu situundu sy'esyaalo esyo syoosi.
40009032	Abo nibali nibawaao bati, bone, bamuleetera omuundu wakwa esiru oliho omusaambwa.
40009033	Nae niyamala ohwirusa omusaambwa okwo, owakwa esiru oyo yalomaloma, mani esidiyiha sy'abandu syawuka, nisiboola siti; “Esiindu sifwaana siti, sisibechaanga hoo mu Yisirayiri.”
40009034	Nae Abafalisaayo nabo baboola bati; “Wuno yerusa emisaambwa olwamaani k'omwaami w'emisaambwa.”
40009035	Yesu yacha nakeenda mu biko nende mu ngoongo choosi, niyeekesa mu Sinagoogi cha Abayudaaya handi nalangirira Emboosi Ndai y'Obwaami bwa Nasae, handi nawonia endwaae nende amadehere bitaali nasilala.
40009036	Nae niyabona esidiyiha sy'abandu, yabakwiira esisa, olwohuba bali abelalihirifu handi nibataali nende obuhoonyi koti amakoondi kataali nende omwaayi.
40009037	Mani Yesu yaboolera abaloondi bae ati, “Ekesa liingi, nae abakesa nibo abadiidi.
40009038	Sakira musabe Omwaami mweene kesa, atume abahalabani mu kesa lyae.”
40010001	Yesu yalaanga abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri mani yababeresa amaani kohwiirusa emyooyo mibi, nende ohuwonia obuchuuni bwoosi alala nende endwaae choosi.
40010002	Ameeta k'Abatume ehumi-na-babiri niko kano: Owamberi niye, Simooni olaangwa Peetero, nende Andereya mwaanang'ina; Yakobbo omwaana wa Sebbedaayo, nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina;
40010003	Filipo nende Batulumaayo; Tomasi nende Matayo omutoosa w'emisolo; Yakobbo omwaana wa Alufaayo, nende Tadeo;
40010004	Simooni Omukanani, nende Yuda Yisikarioti, owamuhoba.
40010005	Bano nibo ehumi-na-babiri ba Yesu yatuma nabahuutira ati; “Mutachichaanga mu byaalo bya Abateende, handi mutengiraanga mu biko by'Abasamaria.
40010006	Ohumalaho muche eyiri amakoondi kakota k'enyumba ya Yisirayiri.
40010007	Nae nimuchia, muyaale nimuboola muti: ‘Obwaami bwo Mukulu buli aambi.’
40010008	Muwonie abalwaye, musiingise abafu, mulabye ab'amakere, mwiruse emisaambwa. Mbao mufunire amaani buhaya, mani muberese buhaya.
40010009	Mutakiinga esaabbu, kata efeesa, kata omugasa mu sibiro cheeng'we,
40010010	mutakiinga esawo y'ohusuma mu lukeendo lweng'we, kata engubo chibiri kata ebiraato, kata omudiiro; olwohuba omuhalaabani ahoyera omukabo kwae.
40010011	Nae mu buli siko oba olukoongo lumuchaamo, muteberese omuundu mulai olimo, mani mumenye nae ohwoola lumwahaweeo.
40010012	Nimwiingira mu nyumba, muhesaanga.
40010013	Enyuumba eyo niyihoyerwa, muleheenge ehabi cheeng'we chiyibeeho; nae niyitahoyerwa, mulehe ehabi cheeng'we chibakaluhire.
40010014	Nae omuundu yeesi natabakaanira, kata yahaya ohutekeeresa emboosi cheeng'we, nimuba nimutula mu nyumba omwo, kata mu siko esyo, muhuhumule olufu lwo hu makulu keeng'we.
40010015	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, hu ludaalo lw'ohuheengerwa omusango, byahachire bubi esiko esyo ohuhiraho esyaalo sya Sodomu nende Gomora.
40010016	“Mani mubone! Mbao mbatuma koti amakoondi akati-kaati mu arara; mani mube abakesikesi koti enjuha handi abaloonga koti eguugu.
40010017	Mweliinde abandu, olwohuba bacha ohubadiira, babayire mu siina syohuheengeramo emisango, handi bacha ohubahuyira mu Sinagoogi chaabwe,
40010018	bacha ohubahweesa babayire eyiri abatuki nende abaami baabwe hu lwaange, mani muberese obujulisi bwaange mu moni chaabwe nende echa Abateende.
40010019	Nibabayira mu siina sibaheengeramo emisango, mutelalihiriraanga muti hunaboole hutye, kata muti hunaboole siina. Olwohuba mucha ohubereswa esyohulomaloma.
40010020	Olwohuba emboosi chimucha ohulomaloma haba si cheeng'we, nae chicha ohutula eyiri Mwooyo wa Seeng'we ochia ohubalomalomeramo.
40010021	Mwaanang'ina muundu mweene niye owahatuleho oluhobo lw'ohumwiita; handi simwaana muundu yesi yahatuleho oluhobo lw'ohwiita abaana bae; kata abaana bosi bahahayuhe hu beebusi baabwe, ohwahatuleho ohubeeta.
40010022	Buli muundu yahabasyuule hu lwaange. Nae owahesimiirise ohwoola hunjakamo, niye owahaone.
40010023	Nibabakiiya ohubahuya mu siko silala, mwiruhe muche mu siindi. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, Omwaana w'Omuundu yaheeche nimutaswaania emirimo cheeng'we mu biko bya Yisirayiri byoosi.
40010024	“Abulao omweeki ohira omweekesa wae oluyaali; handi abulao omuhalaabani ohira omuhongo wae oluyaali.
40010025	Omweeki mulai ahoyere afwanane nende omweekesa wae, handi omuhalaabani mulai yesi ahoyere afwanane nende omuhongo wae. Nae lu balaangira Omweenengo bati Bbelesebbuli, bahaake ena ohunyeka abomudaala lyae!
40010026	“Mani mutabatichaanga. Awumao esiindu sikiswa esitahabonehe, handi awumawo esyaama syoosi esitahatumbulwe syamanyihana.
40010027	Bimbaboolera mu ngiso, mubituumbule mu bulafu. Handi bimuwulira mu syama mubituumbule biwuliirihanire mu bulafu.
40010028	Handi mutatichaanga abo abeeta omubiri nae sibanyala hwiita omwooyo; ohumalaho mutye oyo onyala ohunyaasa omwooyo nende omubiri, yaabisukuna mu muliro kutasima.
40010029	Obubbiichu bubiri sibukulwa ehela ndala yong'ene? Nae, lala hwaako sirinyala lyaakwa aasi Seeng'we nataamanyire.
40010030	Kata efwiiri lyohumitwe cheeng'we lyosi lyamala ohubalwa.
40010031	Sakira mutaba nende obuti, olwohuba eng'we muli abobuhonyi bungi muno ohuhira obubbiichu.
40010032	“Buli muundu owufukiirira mu lwichuule lwa bandu ati ali omuloondi wange, syesi njia ohumufukiirira endi wange mu moni wa Lata oli Mukulu.
40010033	Nae owundekaana mu moni wa baandu, syesi njia ohumwekaana mu moni wa Lata oli Mukulu.
40010034	“Mutabaasa muti ndeecha ohuleeta esangaalo hu syaalo; sindeecha ohuleeta esangaalo ohutusaho ndeecha ohuleeta obulekani.
40010035	Ndeecha ohukabuhania omwaana musyaani nende simwaana, handi omwaana muhaana nende ng'ina, muhomusyani nende masalang'ene;
40010036	nae abasuku b'omuundu bahabe abomu nyumba yae yene.
40010037	Oyo odaha simwaana kata ng'ina ohuhira ese, haba sahoyera ohuba omuloondi wange; handi oyo yesi odaha abaana bae ohuhira ese, sahoyera ohuba omuloondi wange;
40010038	Nae oyo yeesi otakiinga omusalabba kwae mani yanonda, sahoyera ohuba omuloondi wange.
40010039	Omuundu yeesi okesaho ohuwonia obulamu bwae hu lwae omweene, achia ohubufwiirwa; nae oyo owaayo obulamu bwae hu lwaange, achia ohubuduuhana.
40010040	“Oyo obakaanira aba yanjakaanire; handi oyo yeesi owunjakaanira haba saba yanjakaanire syeng'ene, nae aba yakaanire oyo owanduma.
40010041	Oyo yeesi owakaanira omunabbi wa Nasae hu lwohuba ali omunabbi, achia ohufuna omukabo kw'omunabbi wa Nasae, handi oyo owakaanira omuundu mwolerefu olwohuba ali omwolerefu achia ohufuna omukabo kw'omuundu mwolerefu.
40010042	Handi, oyo obeeresa mulala hu baana baere bano amaachi manyifu k'ohung'wa, olwohuba baloondi bange, mbaboolera endi saachia hufwiirwa omukabo kwae.”
40011001	Nae Yesu niyamala ohuhuutira abaloondi bae ehumi-na-babiri, yatula awo yacha ohweekesa nende ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai mu biko byaabwe.
40011002	Nae Yowaana niyawuliirira mu mboye ebiindu bi Kristo yali naahola, yeecha yaatuma abaloondi bae ohuchia eyiri Yesu
40011003	bamuteebe bati, “Niiwe oyo yibaboola bati waheeche, kose hukoonye owundi?”
40011004	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “ Muche muboolere Yowaana bi muwulira, nende bi mubona;
40011005	abawofu, babona; handi abalema, bakeenda; abageenge, baamulwaho; abadiimbe, bawulira; handi abafu, balamuha; handi abamanani bosi bayaalirwa Emboosi Ndai.
40011006	Mani oyo ali nende ehabi otandekana-kana.”
40011007	Mani abaloondi ba Yowaana nibasiingira ohuwaao, Yesu yachaaka ohulomaloma nende abandu ebidiira hu Yowaana naboola ati: “Eng'we mwacha musiparara ohubona siina syeene? Ekada li muyaka kuwucha nilidengaana?
40011008	Nae lwasiina mwacha erwaanyi? Ohubona omuundu owefwaalire engubo chitoonya? Bone abo abefwala echitoonya chityo, baba mu madooho k'abatuki.
40011009	Nae bulaanu eng'we mwacha ohubona siina? Ohubona omunabbi? Eee, mbaboolera endi, nae oyo niye ohiraho omunabbi.
40011010	Olwohuba, oyo niye yibandiikaho bati: ‘Boneho, mbawo nduma wamwaanda wange mu moni wao, ochia ohuhutereesera engira mu moni wao.’
40011011	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, mu bandu beebulwa boosi, saabechaangao ohira Yowaana Omubatiisi; Kata katyo, oyo ohiramo obudiidi mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu, amuhira oluyaali.
40011012	Ohutula mu ndaalo cha Yowaana Omubatiisi, ohwoola bulaanu, Obwaami bwo Mukulu bubeere bulwaanisibwa, handi abandu b'obwaalaba bakesereho muno ohubwiingiramo nende esirifu.
40011013	Olwohuba, abanabbi boosi, nende amalako ka Musa koosi, kalomaloma hu Bwaami bwo Mukulu ohwolera elalira hu Yowaana Omubatiisi;
40011014	nae nimuba abetekefu ohusifukiirira, oyo niye Elija owali w'ohwiicha.
40011015	Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.
40011016	Nae abandu b'endaalo chino ndabakeranie nende siina? Bali koti abaana bayere abehaale mu siito nibalaanga abasyaabwe bati,
40011017	‘Hwabobbera elere lisangasa, nae mwahaya ohuhina; handi hwabeembera olweembo lw'amasika, nae mwahaya ohulira.’
40011018	Olwohuba Yowaana yeecha natalia haandi natang'wa, nae baboola bati, ‘Wuno aliho omusaambwa.’
40011019	Nae Omwaana w'Omuundu niyeecha naalya handi nang'wa, nae baboola bati, ‘Boneho, ow'okuliira handi omumeesi wuno, omwiicha w'abatoosa b'emisolo nende abaholi b'ebibi!’ Nae amakesi ka Nasae, obwadyeeri bwaako bubonehera mu biholwa bikatulamo.”
40011020	Yesu yeecha yachaaka ohwoolobya ebyaalo biyali naaholeremo eby'amayia biingi; olwohuba byali ni byahaya ohwefunaka mu bibi byaabyo, naboola ati,
40011021	“Chihwakaanire, ewe Korasiini! Kata ewe Bbetisaida wesi chihwakaanire! Olwohuba eby'amayia ebyo biba byeholera mu Tiro nende Sidoni, abandu babyo baba beefunaka hale, nibefwaala amagunia, alala nende ohwebaha ekohe.
40011022	Nae mbaboolera endi hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho emisango nilwahoole, Tiro nende Sidoni byahaleherwemo ohuhira eng'we!
40011023	Nae ewe Kaperanaumu, waheniinie ohwoola hu kulu? Ochia ohwiiswa aasi ohwoola emakoombe. Olwohuba eby'amayia ebyo biba byeholera mu Sodomu, siba ni sisisiiriwo ohwoola buti.
40011024	Nae mbaboolera endi, hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho emisango, esinyaaso sya Sodomu syahabeeho esidiidi ohuhira esyao.”
40011025	Esiha esyo, Yesu yalomaloma naboola ati, “Ewe Bbaabba, Omwaami w'Ekulu nende esyaalo, hwebasa muno olwohuba wakisa ebiindu bino abakesi nende abasomi, nae wabibwihulira abaloonga.
40011026	Eee, Bbaabba, sino nisyo esy'oluyaali luhongo siwadaha siholehane.
40011027	Bbaabba yamala ohumberesa ebiindu byoosi handi abulao omuundu omanyire Omwaana ohutusaho Simwaana, handi abulao omuundu omanyire Simwaana ohutusaho Omwaana alala nende oyo yi mwaana ahengao ohumubwihulira.
40011028	Mwiiche yindi, eng'we mweesi abahalaabana handi mwasidoyerwa, nae ese njia ohubawuluusa.
40011029	Mwedwihe ekoombo lyaange, handi munjekereho, olwohuba ese ndi omudiira-kaala handi omuloonga mu mwooyo; mani mwahanyoole yimuwuluusira emyooyo cheeng'we.
40011030	Olwohuba ekoombo lyaange, lyaangu, handi omukaangi kwaange, simusito.”
40012001	Olwoola Yesu yeecha yabitira mu ndalo y'eng'ano hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato; enjala yali yiluma abaloondi bae, mani bachaaka ohwaakula emitwe ch'engaano, baachiwuula mani baalya.
40012002	Nae Abafalisaayo nibabona batyo, baboolera Yesu bati, “Bone, abeeki bao bali ohuhola esitafukiirirwa ohuholwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
40012003	Yesu yababoolera ati, “ Musisiiri ohusomaho bi Daudi yahola enjala niyimuluma nende bayali nabo:
40012004	koti lu beengira mu nyumba ya Nasae baalya hu migaati cho hu alutaari echali chitafukiirirwa ohuliibwa nende omuundu yeesi ohutusaho abalaamisi ba Nasae bong'ene?
40012005	Nae oba eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho hu malako ka Musa kaboola koti lu buli lwa Sabbaato, omulaamisi womu nyumba ya Nasae koti lwafunakaanga elako lya Sabbaato, nae aaba koti otafunaakeho elako?
40012006	Mbaboolera endi, abweene ano aliwo esihuluundu esihiraho enyumba ya Nasae.
40012007	Eng'we muba mwamanya amahulundu k'emboosi chino, ‘Ese nyenya esisa, ataali ebiyaanwa by'esolo chisaambwa,’ haba simwahahengeere omusango abo ababa nibataaholereho esibi syoosi.
40012008	Olwohuba omwaana w'Omuundu niye Omwaami wa Sabbaato yosi.”
40012009	Yesu niyatula awo, yacha yengira mu Sinagoogi, yabukaanamo omusaacha w'omuhono kwaafwa.
40012010	Abandu bandi beecha bamuteeba bati; “Sifukiirirwa ohuwonia omuundu hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?” Bamuleetera omusaacha oyo hu beemeo banyale ohumufunaho emboosi y'ohumufunaana.
40012011	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Naanu hweeng'we mweesi, yi koondi lyae niliba nilikwiire mu liina, otanyala ohulihweesa yaalitusamo hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?
40012012	Nae siba sitye, hu muundu wuno ohirira elalira eyale ekoondi omugaso! Mani sakira omuundu naaba naahola esiindu silayi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, haba saba afunaka amalako.”
40012013	Abweene awo, Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuundu wo muhono kwaafwa ati, “Kolola omuhono kwao.” Mani omuundu oyo lu yakololosa omuhono kwae, kwawonerao kwaba koti okwaasye.
40012014	Abafalisaayo nabo bachaaka ohukoonya engira y'ohumwiita.
40012015	Mani Yesu niyafumbula esyo, yeecha yaatula awo. Mani esidiiyiha sya bandu syamala syamulondaho, yeecha yawonia abalwaye boosi abaliwo,
40012016	mani yamala yabahuutira ati, batabooleraho abandu bandi ebimudiraho.
40012017	Yaboola atyo, hu mboosi chi nabbi Yisaaya yaboola choolerera chiti:
40012018	“Eng'we boneho, omuhalaabani wange yimwene ndedoolera; Omukoosi wange, handi yi mwooyo kwaange kusangaalira muno; Ndahamuteeho Mwooyo Mwolerefu wange hw'ache alaangirire obwolerefu, mu syaalo syoosi.
40012019	Oyo haba saachia ohuyingana, alala nende ohuhabuuhana; kata abulao owahawulire ekono lyae hu ngira.
40012020	Oyo haba saacha ohufunaka kata ekada lyahooha, oba kata yaasimia olutaambi lulooleerere, yahedinyirise ohwoola lu bwadyeeri bwahechule mu syaalo,
40012021	handi ni mu liita lyae nimwo mu Abateende balisuubira.”
40012022	Olwoola abandu bandi baleetera Yesu omuundu omuwofu handi otanyala ohulomaloma olwohuba yaliho omusaambwa. Yesu yeecha yawonia omuundu oyo, yachaaka ohulomaloma alala nende ohubona.
40012023	Abandu bawuka muno baboola bati, “Wuno haba saanyala ohuba naali niye omwichuhulu wa Daudi?”
40012024	Nae Abafalisaayo nibawulira sino, bakobolamo bati, “Omuundu oyo yerusa emisaambwa olwohuba ali nende amaani ka Bbelesebbuli, omwaami w'emisaambwa choosi.”
40012025	Yesu nae koti luyali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe, yababoolera ati, “Obwaami bwoosi nibwekabuhaniamo obweene bwachaaka ohulwaanakana, haba sibuyiindira.
40012026	Sakira sitaani nachaaka ohwirusa sitaani waasye mu bwaami bw'emisaambwa cheene echo, esyo siba syekesa siti sitaani mweene amalire ohwekabuhaniamo, mani hu lw'esyo, obwaami bwae buba bunayindire butye?
40012027	Mani nikali mbwe ese njirusa emisaambwa hulwa amaani ka Bbelesebbuli, nae abaloondi beeng'we bakiirusa hu lw'amaani ka naanu? Sakira abandu beeng'we beene nibo abacha ohubaheengera omusango kubahire!
40012028	Nae nikali mbwe njirusa emisaambwa hu lwa maani ka Mwooyo Mwolerefu, mani eng'we muhoyeere mumanye muti, Obwaami bwa Nasae bwamala ohuboolamo.
40012029	Abulao omuundu onyala ohuhalaka enyumba y'omuundu w'amaani maangi, yoola yengira yaamunyakaho ebiindu byae byoosi ohutusaho natangira yamuboya, hu yaanyala ohumunyakaho ebiindu byomu nyumba yae.
40012030	Omuundu otaholera alala naange, aba ali ohunwaania, handi mu bwadyeeri bweene, omuundu otahoonyana naange ohubuusa alala, aba ali ohusalaania busa.
40012031	Sakira mbaboolera endi, abandu babi bacha ohuleherwamo alala nende enomanoma yaabwe yifwoola Nasae, nae omuundu yeesi olomaloma bubi hu Mwooyo Mwolerefu, saachia huleherwamo bulaanu buti handi kata nende mu ndaalo chiicha choosi.
40012032	Omuundu yeesi olomaloma bubi hu mwaana w'Omuundu, achia ohuleherwamo, nae omuundu olomaloma bubi hu Mwooyo Mwolerefu, saachia huleherwamo, bulaanu kata nende mu biha biicha.
40012033	“Omusaala mulai kwaamaho ebyaamo bilai; Nae omusaala mubi kwosi kwaamaho ebyaamo bibi. Olwohuba, obulayi bw'omusaala bumanyihira hu byaamo byaakwo.
40012034	Abaana b'enjuha eng'we, munyala mutye ohulomaloma emboosi ndayi, nimuli nende emyooyo mibi kityo? Olwohuba, omuundu alomaloma ebiba nibitula mu mwooyo kwae.
40012035	Omuundu mulai atusa hu biindu bilai biba nibyechula mu mwooyo kwae; handi omuundu mubi yesi yaatusa hu biindu bibi, ebiba nibyechula mu mwooyo kwae.
40012036	Ese mbaboolera endi, hu ludaalo lw'ohuheengeraho emisango, buli muundu yeesi achia ohwelomalomaho hu lwa buli mboosi mbi yoosi yiyalomaloma.
40012037	Olwohuba emboosi chao nicho echirihutusaho omusango kose chahuboyaho omusango.”
40012038	Olwoola, Abekesa ba malako bandi, alala nende Abafalisaayo, beecha balomalomera akulu nibaboola bati; “Omweekesa, efwe hudaha ohole esyaamayia huboneho.”
40012039	Yesu niyawulira atyo, yabakobolamo ati; “Abandu b'oluse lubi koti eng'we, nibo abasaba esilolero syamayia mberi hubamale bafukiirire. Mani abulao esilolero sibachia ohubabeeresa, ohumalaho esya nabbi Yona syong'ene.
40012040	Koti lu Yona yamala endaalo chidatu nende ebiro bidatu mu nda y'eng'eni, nilwo lwosi lu mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohumala endaalo chidatu nende ebiro bidatu nasisiiri emakoombe.
40012041	Oludaalo lw'ohuheengeraho omusango, abandu ba Ninefe baheeme mu siina nang'we mani babahengere omusango ohubahira, olwohuba nibawulira enjekesa ya Yona, beecha beefunaka ebibi byaabwe, nae ano mbano aliwo omuundu ohirira elalira Yona oluyaali!
40012042	Oludaalo lw'ohuheengeraho omusango, omutuki muhasi wa Sheba, yesi yaheeme mu siina nende eng'we, yabahengera omusango ohubahira, olwohuba omweene oyo yakenda ohutula mu syaalo sy'eyale muno ohuchia ohuwuliraho hu makesi ka Solomooni, nae ano aliwo omuundu ohirira elalira Solomooni oluyaali!
40012043	“Omusambwa mubi nikutula mu muundu, kukendaana musiparara nikukoonya abundu w'ohuwuluuhira, mani kwahaya ohunyoola.
40012044	Bulaanu nikuba nikuhairwe ohunyoola, kwiicha kweboolera kuti, ‘Ese hangaluhe busa mu nyumba yange yinduliremo yira.’ Mani nikukaluhayo, kunyoola enyumba eyo yiri ebihaya, handi niyitereeserwe niyiboneha bulai.
40012045	Mani, kwiicha haandi kwaatulao, kwacha kwaleeta emisambwa chaasye chiindi, chitaanu-na-chibiri, echikuhiraho obubi, cheecha cheengira mu nyumba eyo chamenyamo. Mani mu humaliiriha, omuundu oyo, aba mu bulamu bubi muno ohuhiraho bu yalimo hale. Nasilala nilwo lu byahehole hu bandu b'oluse lubi luno.”
40012046	Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga nende abandu abo, nae boneho ng'ina nende ba mwaanang'ina beecha boola yali. Ni boola awo, beema erwaanyi, baatuma emboosi eyiri Yesu nibadaha ohulomalomaho nae.
40012047	
40012048	Yesu niyawulira atyo, yakobolamo ati, “Maama niye naanu? Nae ba mwaanama nibo banaanu?”
40012049	Yesu nakolola omuhono kwae nasyomesa hu beeki bae naboola ati, “Bone, maama nende ba mwaanama mbano.”
40012050	Olwohuba omuundu yeesi ohola bi Bbaabba wo Mukulu byadaha, oyo niye mwaanama, mboocho yange nende maama.
40013001	Hu ludaalo olwo, Yesu niyatula mu nyumba yacha hu sikobero sy'enyaanja, yehala aasi.
40013002	Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo syeecha syamwebodohania, mani yengira mu lyaato yehalamo; nae esidiyiha esyo syoosi syadoong'a hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja.
40013003	Mani Yesu yachaaka ohubaboolera ebiindu biingi niyehoonyera engaado ati; “Olwoola, omulimi yacha ohuwaanya emwo yae.
40013004	Mani niyali awaanya, emwo yindi yakwa hu ngira, nae amayoni keecha kayiboocha.
40013005	Emwo yindi yakwa hu bikina-kina ataali eloba liingi, mani yanguya ohumera, nae koti luyitaba niyayira emisi aasi muno,
40013006	omubasu nikwatula, kwayimamula; nae handi koti yitaali nende emisi mireyi, yaalala.
40013007	Emwo yindi yakwa mu mawa, nae amawa keecha kafumita ebyali bimerere.
40013008	Emwo yindi yakwa mu loba layi, mani yaama ebyaamo: eyiindi ebyaamo emia ndala, eyiindi amahumi kasasaba, eyiindi amahumi kadatu.
40013009	Oyo oli nende amatwi, leha awulire!”
40013010	Abweene awo, abeeki ba Yesu beecha yali bamuteeba bati, “ Siina esikera nolomaloma nende abandu mu ngaado?”
40013011	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati: “Eng'we neng'we ababeresebwa ehabi y'ohumanya ebyaama bidiira hu Bwaami bwo Mukulu, nae abo haba sibaberesebwa.
40013012	Olwohuba buli muundu oli nende esiindu, achia ohwongerwaho ebiindi, mani abe nende ebiingi bihiraho; nae owumaho nasyo achia ohutusibwaho kata nende byali nabyo.
40013013	Sino nisyo esikera ndalomaloma nabo mu ngaado, olwohuba batingaala nae haba sibabona, batekeeresa nae haba sibawulira, kata sibamanya nohumanya.
40013014	Sakira emboosi y'omunabbi Yisaaya yolerera abweene niyibalomalomaho yiti: ‘Mubwadyeeri bweene mwahawulire nae simwahamanye amahulundu keene, handi mwahewuunje, nae mwahaya ohubona.
40013015	Olwohuba omwooyo kw'abandu bano muwangalafu, handi amatwi kaabwe sikawulira, handi bamala ohuliimbia emoni chaabwe, olwohuba bahabeere babona nende emoni chaabwe, bawulira nende amatwi kaabwe, handi bamanya amahulundu k'emboosi nende emyooyo chaabwe, mani bakaluha yindi ohubaonia.’
40013016	Nae emoni cheeng'we chiri nende ehabi olwohuba chibona, handi amatwi keeng'we kosi k'ehabi olwohuba kawulira.
40013017	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abanabbi bangi nende abandu boolerefu bangi bekoomba ohubona bimubona, nae haba sibabibona, ohuwulira bimuwulira, nae haba sibabiwulira.
40013018	“Bulaanu muwulire amahulundu k'olukaado lw'omuwaanyi.
40013019	Omuundu yeesi nawulira emboosi yidiira hu Bwaami bwo Mukulu mani yahaya ohumanya amahulundu kayo, Sitaani yeecha yaanyuula esyali syataakwa mu mwooyo kwae; eyo niyo emwo yakwa hu ngira.
40013020	Nae emwo yakwa hu bikina-kina, oyo niye omuundu owulira emboosi ya Nasae mani yayifukiirira bwaangu nende esangaalo;
40013021	nae koti emboosi luyiteengira muno mu mwooyo kwae, yesimiirisaho budiidi, nae esidinyu syoosi kata esando yoosi niyicha hu lw'emboosi ya Nasae, abitulaho yabileha bwaangu busa.
40013022	Nae emwo yakwa mu mawa, oyo niye owulira emboosi ya Nasae, nae hu lw'ohwelalihira hw'obulamu bw'esyaalo nende obwekoombi bw'emyaandu, bifwinyirira emboosi eyo yahaya ohwaamaho ebyaamo.
40013023	Nae emwo yakwa mu loba layi, oyo niye owulira emboosi ya Nasae, handi yaamanya amahulundu kaayo, mani yamala yaama ebyaamo, mani yaduhana echiindi emia ndala, echiindi amahumi kasasaba, echiindi amahumi kadatu.”
40013024	Yesu handi yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati; “Obwaami bwo Mukulu bunyala ohufwaananisibwa nende omuundu wundi wa waanya mu ndalo yae emwo ndayi y'eng'aano.
40013025	Nae abandu nibali nibeyaliise, omusuku wae yeecha yawaanya ebae mu ngaano eyo, mani naamala niyeweerao.
40013026	Nae ebirime ebyo nibyahula byoola ohumuliha, ebae lyosi lyeecha lyaboneha.
40013027	Mani abahosi bae beecha bamuboolera bati; ‘Omwaami, siwataaka emwo ndayi yong'ene mu ndalo yao? Nae ebae nalyo litulire yena?’
40013028	Nae yabakobolamo ati; ‘Omusuku niye oholere sino.’ Nae abahosi bamuboolera bati; ‘Mani odaha huchie hwiyemo ebae elyo?’
40013029	Nae yabakaluhamo ati; ‘Haba bbe; olwohuba nimunaba nimwiiyamo ebae, eng'aano yosi yicha ohwiyihiraho.
40013030	Mulehe byombi bihulire alala ohwoola ekesa; mani mu biha by'ekesa njia ohuboolera abakesa endi: mutaangire mubuuse alala ebae, mani muliboye mu mikaanda lisaambwe, nae mubuuse eng'aano muyiteere mu syaaki syaange.’ ”
40013031	Yesu handi yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati, “Obwaami bwo Mukulu bukeraanisibwa hu lumwo lw'omutuumba, lu muundu yabukula yataaka mu ndalo yae;
40013032	luno nilwo oluhiramo obudidi mu bumwo bwoosi, nae nilumala lwahula, lukaliya lwahira emisaala choosi obuhoongo, lwehola omusaala, ku mayoni keecha koombaha mu masaga kakwo ebiyu.”
40013033	Yesu yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati, “Obwaami bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende amamera omuhasi kayabukula mani yakandira alala nende ebikero bidatu by'obusye, mani yabuleha awo ohwoola lu bwoosi bufwiimba.”
40013034	Yesu yaboolera abandu ebiindu bino byoosi mu ngaado. Siyababooleraho esiindu syoosi natehonyeere engaado.
40013035	Byaba bityo hu mboosi yi munabbi yalomaloma yolerere yiti; “Njia ohwehoonyera engaado ninomanoma nabo; Njia ohubatuumbulira ebyali nibyeekisa ohutula esyaalo nisiloongwa.”
40013036	Olwoola, Yesu yasingira yatula eyiri esidiyiha sy'abandu, mani yengira mu nyumba. Abaloondi bae beecha yali, bamuboolera bati; “Tweekese amahulundu k'olukaado lw'ebae lyomu ndalo.”
40013037	Yesu yakobolamo ati; “Omuundu waanya emwo ndayi, niye Omwaana w'Omuundu;
40013038	endalo niyo esyaalo sino; nae emwo ndayi, niyo abaana bomu Bwaami bwa Nasae; ebae nilyo abaana ba Sitaani;
40013039	nae omusuku owaanya ebaye, niye Sitaani mweene; ekesa, nilyo oludaalo lw'enjakamo, nae abakesa, nibo bamalaika.
40013040	Mani koti lu bae balibuusa, mani balisaamba mu muliro, nilwo lubicha ohuba hu ludaalo lw'enjakamo.
40013041	Omwaana w'Omuundu yahatume bamalaika bae, mani bahabuuse abo abakera abandu nibahola ebibi, alala nende abaholi be bibi boosi, babatuse mu Bwaami bwae,
40013042	mani babasukune mu muliro kutasima; eyo yibahalirire nibesia ameeno.
40013043	Nae abolerefu bacha ohumesa-mesana koti elyuuba mu Bwaami bwa Saabwe. Oyo oli nende amatwi, leha awulire.
40013044	“Obwaami bwo Mukulu buli koti omwaandu kwakiswa mu mukuunda, omuundu nakweduuyaho, amala yaakubwihaho, yaakukisa mberi; omuundu oyo, mu sangaalo liingi, achia yaakusa ebiindu byaali nabyo byoosi, mani yamala yaakula omukunda okwo.
40013045	“Handi, Obwaami bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende omuchurusi wundi okoonya amapaali malai muno,
40013046	mani naamala yanyoola ekina ly'ebbeyi hongo muno, akobolayo mani yaacha yaakusa ebiindu byae byoosi byaali nabyo, mani yamala yaacha yaakula ekina elyo.
40013047	“Handi Obwaami bwo Mukulu bufwaana nende olweero lu bafuuba mu nyaanja, mani lwaacha lwadiisa eng'eni cha buli ngeri;
40013048	nilwichula, abanaabi baluhwesa ba lwosa husikobero, beecha beehala aasi, mani bachaaka ohukabulamo eng'eeni; endayi baachita mu bisero, nae embi, baachisukuna.
40013049	Nilwo lu byahabe hu ludaalo lw'enjakamo. Bamalaika baheeche mani bakabulemo abandu babi, babatuse mu balayi,
40013050	mani babasukune mu muliro kutasima; eyo niyo yibahalirire nibeesia ameeno.
40013051	“Yesu yateeba abandu ati, ‘Mani mumanyire amahulundu k'ebiindu bino byoosi?’ Bamukobolamo bati, ‘Eee.’
40013052	“Mani yababoolera ati, ‘Sakira omweekesa w'Amalako yeesi, owamala ohwekeswa ebidiira hu Bwaami bwo Mukulu afwanana nende omwenengo odaya mu syaaki syae emere njiaha nende ehale.’ ”
40013053	Mani Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma engaado chino, yatula awo,
40013054	yakaluha mu siko sye waabwe syeene yachaaka ohubeekesera mu Sinagoogi chaabwe, nae abo boosi abawulira enjekesa yae bawuka muno, beteeba bati, “Nae wuno yafuna ena amakesi kano nende amaani k'ohuhola eby'amayia bino?
40013055	Wuno siniye omwaana w'omubaachi? Ng'ina siniye olaangwa Maria? Handi ba mwaanang'ina sinibo Yakobbo, Yosefu, Simooni nende Yuda?
40013056	Nae ba mboochong'ene boosi sibali ano ninaafwe? Nae wuno bino byoosi yabitusa yena?”
40013057	Mani beecha bamuhayira elalira. Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omunabbi yeesi, afuna oluyaali abundu woosi, ohutusaho mu siko syaabwe syeene nende mungo waabwe bweene.”
40013058	Mani Yesu siyaholayo eby'amayia biingi, olwohuba bali nibauma efukiirira.
40014001	Mu siha esyo Herode omutuki, yeecha yawulira efuma ya Yesu;
40014002	mani yaboolera abahalaabani bae ati; “Wuno niye Yowaana Omubatiisi osyuhiire ohutula mu bafu, sakira amaani kano kali ohumuholeramo.”
40014003	Olwohuba, Herode niye owali yadiira Yowaana, yamusukuna mu mboyero. Yahola atyo ohweema hu mboosi cha Herodia omuhasi wa Filipo mwaanang'ina;
40014004	olwohuba Yowaana yali yaamuboolera ati, “Haba sisifukiirirwa ewe ohubukula omuhasi oyo.”
40014005	Kata Herode yadaha ohwiita Yowaana, nae yatya abandu, olwohuba bali nibamanyire bati Yowaana yali omunabbi.
40014006	Nae hu ludaalo lw'ohwichulisiraho amebulwa ka Herode nilwoola, omwaana wa Herodia muhaana, yahina bulai muno mu moni wa abakeni, mani sino syasangaasa Herode muno,
40014007	mani yasuubisa omuhaana oyo niyechuba ohumuberesa esiindu syoosi syaba nasabire.
40014008	Nae omuhaana oyo yeecha yaholera hu makesi ka ng'ina yaamubeeresa yaboola ati, “Mberese omutwe kwa Yowaana Omubatiisi hu lusaani bulaanu buti.”
40014009	Nae sino syeecha syamala omutuki amaani, nae ohwema hu hwechuba hwae hu bakeni bae bali bawuliire, yatya mani yeecha yatusa omunwa ati, baberese omuhaana oyo syaadahire;
40014010	mani yaatuma bache mu mboyero baheenge hu Yowaana omutwe,
40014011	mani baleeta omutwe kwa Yowaana hu lusaani, mani bakubeeresa omuhaana oyo, nae yakuleetera ng'ina.
40014012	Nae abeeki ba Yowaana beecha baabukula omubiri kwae, baacha baakusiiha, mani baacha baaboolera Yesu.
40014013	Bulaanu Yesu niyawulira sino, yatula awo, yaasyaabala mu lyaato yacha yeng'ene mu sifwo sibulamo abandu. Nae abandu nibawulira batyo, bamuloondaho namakulu ohutula mu biko byaabwe.
40014014	Niyatula mu lyaato, yabona esidiyiha sy'abandu esihongo muno, mani syamudiisa esisa, yawonia abalwaye baabwe.
40014015	Nae obwire nibweera, abeeki bae beecha yali bamuboolera bati, “Obwiire mbuno bwiirire, handi huli mu syaalo sibulamo abandu; seebula abandu bache mu ngoongo beekulire ebyohulya.”
40014016	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Abandu bano haba sibahoyeere ohutula ano; eng'we mubaberese esy'ohulya.”
40014017	Nabo ba muboolera bati, “Efwe huli busa nende emigaati chitaanu chong'ene alala nende eng'eni chibiri.”
40014018	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mubindeetere ano.”
40014019	Mani Yesu yamala yaalagira abandu ohwihala aasi hu bunyaasi; mani nabukula emigaati chitaanu nende eng'eni chibiri, yatingaala akulu Mukulu, yebasa Nasae, mani yadonyola emigaati echo yachibeeresa abeeki, nae abeeki beecha baachibeeresa abandu.
40014020	Mani abandu boosi balya beekuta. Mani abeeki ba Yesu babuusa ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho beechusa ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri.
40014021	Nae abalya bali abasaacha aambi elifu chitaanu, notaabalire abahasi nende abaana.
40014022	Abweene awo, Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ohwingira mu lyaato basyabale ba mutaangirire ohwaambuha bachie engereha w'enyaanja, omweene yadoong'a naseebula esidiyiha sy'abandu
40014023	Nae niyamala ohubaseebula, yaniina yeng'ene hu lugulu ohwekongooya. Mani obwire nibwerima, yali adoong'ere yeng'ene,
40014024	nae esiha esyo elyaato lyali lyolobereere ebusiba, amafwinda ka amaani nga kalihubba; olwohuba omuyaka kwali kuwucha nikubatulira mu moni.
40014025	Aambi w'esaa ehumi mu maherebeende, Yesu yeecha yibali nakendera hu maachi.
40014026	Nae abeeki bae nibamubona nakendera hu maachi, batya muno, baboola bati, “Sino ngandi sihyeno nisyo!” Mani batya bobba wuwi.
40014027	Nae abweene awo, Yesu yalomaloma nabo naboola ati, “Mugume emyooyo, nise; mutatya daawe.”
40014028	Nae Peetero yamukobolamo ati, “Omwaami, nooli niiwe, mboole njiche yooli syesi ningendera hu maachi.”
40014029	Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Ngandi keenda busa niwiicha.” Mani Peetero yatula mu lyaato, yachaaka ohukeenda hu maachi naachia eyiri Yesu;
40014030	nae Peetero niyabona omuyaka nikuwucha, yatya, yachaaka ohusihama, mani yahuumula ati, “Omwaami, monie!”
40014031	Abweene awo, Yesu yakolola omuhono, mani yamudiira, namuboolera ati, “Ewe, omusaacha w'efukiirira ndiidi, hu siina okana-kaane?”
40014032	Nae olwamala ohwingira mu lyaato bati, ni omuyaka kwaakama.
40014033	Mani abo abali mu lyaato, beenamira Yesu nibaboola bati, “Mu bwadyeeri bweene, oli Omwaana wa Nasae.”
40014034	Nae nibamala ohwaambuha enyaanja boola engereha bakobera e Genesareeti.
40014035	Nae abandu b'eyo, nibamanya bati niye Yesu, bacha baboolera abandu bomu situundu esyo syoosi, baleete eyiri Yesu abalwaye baabwe boosi,
40014036	mani bamusaba bati afukirire abalwaye badiireho busa hu kemo lye ngubo yae; mani abo boosi abalidiiraho, baaonera elalira.
40015001	Olwoola, Abafalisaayo nende Abekesa ba malako batula Yerusaalemu beecha eyiri Yesu bamuteeba bati,
40015002	“Lwasiina abeeki bao balekeeresa esaambo cha bakuuka beefwe? Olwohuba sibesaaba amahono kaabwe nibacha ohulya.”
40015003	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Nae lwasiina eng'we mulekeresa amalako ka Nasae olwohuba mudaha ohuloonda esaambo cha bakuuka beeng'we?
40015004	Olwohuba Nasae yaboola ati, ‘Beresaanga lataao nende maao oluyaali,' handi, 'Omuundu onyeka simwaana kata ng'ina, ahoyera ohwiitwa.’
40015005	Nae eng'we muboola muti, ‘Omuundu yeesi naboolera simwaana kata ng'ina ati, omukabo kundahahubereese mbao kubereese Nasae, bulaanu oyo saba ahoyera ohuberesa simwaana oluyaali.’
40015006	Mani sakira mulehaanga ohuloonda emboosi ya Nasae, hulwohudaha ohuloonda emisiro cheeng'we.
40015007	Eng'we Abebachirisi! Omunabbi Yisaaya yahola bilai ohubalomalomaho naboola ati,
40015008	‘Abandu bano bambeeresa oluyaali nende eminwa chong'ene, nae emyooyo chaabwe chiri eyale naange;
40015009	ohwiinama hubaanyinamiramo, hubulamo obuhoonyi, olwohuba amalako kabeekesa ka abandu busa.’ ”
40015010	Olwoola, Yesu yalaanga abandu beecha yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Muwulire mani mu manye;
40015011	esiingira mu hanwa w'omuundu, sinisyo esimunyaasa, nae esitula mu munwa kwae, nisyo esimunyaasa.”
40015012	Mani abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera bati, “Omanyire oti byoboolere ebyo, bichunire Abafalisaayo?”
40015013	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Buli simera syoosi si Lata oli Mukulu atataaka, sichia ohwiiywa.
40015014	Eng'we mubalehe busa; abo nibo abemirisi baofula. Nae omuwofu niyemirira omuwofu waasye, bombi bacha ohukwa mu buko.”
40015015	Nae Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Tutumbulire amahulundu k'olukaado olwo.”
40015016	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Eng'we mwesi musisiiri ohumanya amahulundu ka bino?
40015017	Simubona muti buli siingira mu hanwa w'omuundu, sichia busa munda mani syamala syasukunwa esibakala?
40015018	Nae esitula mu munwa kw'omuundu, siba situla mu mwooyo kwae, mani nisyo esinyaasa omuundu.
40015019	Olwohuba mu mwooyo nimwo omutula ebibaaso bibi, obwiiti, obuyirani, obucheke, obwiibi, obwayirisi, nende ohunyaasa ameta ka bandi.
40015020	Bino nibyo ebinyasa omuundu; nae ohulya notesaabire amahono, sinisyo esinyaasa omuundu.”
40015021	Handi Yesu yatula awo mani yacha mu situundu siri aambi nende ebiko bye Tiro nende Sidoni.
40015022	Abweene awo, omuhasi Mukanani wundi otula mu situundu esyo, yeecha eyiri Yesu yaamulirira ati, “Omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa; omuhaana wange mulwaye muno, aliho omusaambwa.”
40015023	Nae Yesu haba siyamukobolamo kata emboosi ndala. Nae abeeki bae beecha bamusaba nibaboola bati, “Museebule aweo, olwohuba ali ohutuloonda niyeririkania.”
40015024	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ndatumwa eyiri amakoondi kakota k'enyumba ya Yisirayiri kong'ene.”
40015025	Nae omuhasi oyo, yeecha yaasigama mu makulu ka Yesu naboola ati, “Omwaami, hoonye.”
40015026	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Sisihoyerwa ohubukula ebyohulya by'abaana wamala wabisukunira embwa.”
40015027	Omuhasi oyo nae yakobolamo ati, “Omwaami esyo syadyeeri, nae kata embwa chosi chirichaanga ebidonye-donye bilakaha ohutula hu mesa y'omutuki wacho.”
40015028	Mani Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Muhasi we, efukiirira yao hoongo! Leha sihuholerwe koti lwodaha.” Mani esiha syeene esyo ni omuhaana wae awona.
40015029	Yesu yatula awo yabitira hu ndulo we nyaanja ye Galilaaya. Mani yeecha yaniina hu lugulu, yehala aasi.
40015030	Nae esidiyiha sihoongo syeecha yaali, nibamuleetera abalema, abebokoya emibiri, abawofu, abakwa esiru nende abandi batyo, mani baabata mu makulu kae, mani yabawonia,
40015031	mani abandu bawuka muno nibabona abandu bali bakwa esiru nibalomaloma, abebokoya emibiri, nibaonere; abalema, nibakeenda; handi abawofu, nibabona; mani bafumya Nasae wa Yisirayiri.
40015032	Yesu yalaanga abeeki bae beecha yali, mani yaboola ati, “Abandu bano bakera esisa nisindiira muno, olwohuba babeere naange endaalo chidatu enaamba, nae bawuma esyohulya syoosi-syoosi; nae siindaha ohubaseebula nibasisiiri ohulya, olwohuba oluuchu lunyala lwabadiira lwabakwiisa hu ngira nibakaluhayo.”
40015033	Nae abeeki bamuboolera bati, “Nae mu siparara muno, hunaatuse ena emigaati chinyala ohwikusa abandu bano boosi?”
40015034	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Muli nende emigaati chiinga?” Baboola bati, “Chitaanu-na-chibiri nende otung'eeni tudiidi tuyeranu.”
40015035	Nae Yesu yaboolera esidiyiha ohwihala aasi,
40015036	yaabukula emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri echo, nende otung'eni otwo, nae niyamala ohwebasa, yabimekulamo, mani yabibeeresa abeeki, nae abeeki baabiberesa abandu.
40015037	Mani boosi baalya beekuta; nae abeeki ba Yesu babuusa ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho, beechusa ebimweero bitaanu-na-bibiri.
40015038	Abandu balya bali abasaacha elifu chine notaabalire abahasi nende abaana.
40015039	Mani Yesu niyamala ohubaseebula, yeecha yengira elyaato yasyaabala yacha mu situundu silaangwa Magadani.
40016001	Mani Abafalisaayo nende Abasadukaayo beecha eyiri Yesu, nae ohumuhema, bamusaba abekese esilolero ohutula Mukulu.
40016002	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Elyuuba nilicha ohukwa, muboola muti, ‘esyaalo sichia ohuba esiyenjeefu, olwohuba amaleesi kaba kahaanye’.
40016003	Handi mu mabweeri-bweeri, muboola muti, ‘Oludaalo lunaba olw'omuyaka, olwohuba amaleesi kaba kahaanye handi kaamaliyisa.’ Mu manyire ohukeraania engeri yi syaalo sichia ohubaamo ni mutingaala busa hu maleesi, nae simunyala ohukeraania obulolero bw'ebiha bino.
40016004	Nasitalomwa, oluse lubi handi olucheke nilwo olukonyeresa ahalolero, nae siyiriwo ahalolero haachia ohubabereswa, ohutusaho ahalolero ha Yona.” Mani Yesu yabaleha yaasingira yawaao.
40016005	Nae Abeki ba Yesu nibaambuha enyaanja boola engereha, bali beebiriire ohukinga omugaati kwoosi.
40016006	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweeme buheke, handi mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo nende Abasadukaayo.”
40016007	Bachaaka ohweteebanaho nibaboola bati, “Aboola atyo olwohuba sihukiingire omugaati kwoosi.”
40016008	Nae Yesu yamanya mu mwooyo kwae bi bali babaasa, yabateeba ati, “Eng'we ab'efukiirira ndiidi, lwasiina mweteebanaho obutaba nende omugaati?
40016009	Eng'we mwesi, musisiiri ohumanya? Simwichulisa emigaati chitaanu echekusa abandu elifu chitaanu? Nae ebimweero biinga bimwabuusa?
40016010	Oba, emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri echekusa abandu elifu chine? Nae ebimweero biinga bimwabuusa?
40016011	Mubeere mutye mwahaya ohumanya muti, simbeere nomaloma ebidiira hu mugaati? Mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo nende ak'Abasadukaayo.”
40016012	Awo, abeeki beecha bamanya bati, Yesu siyali naababoolera ohweliinda amamera k'emigaati, nae yali alomaloma hu njekesa y'Abafalisaayo nende ey'Abasadukaayo.
40016013	Bulaanu, Yesu niyeecha mu situundu silaangwa Kaisarea sya Filipi yateeba abeeki bae ati, “Abandu baboola bati, Omwaana w'Omuundu niye wiina?”
40016014	Nae baboola bati, “Abandi baboola bati, Yowaana Omubatiisi, abandi bati, Elija, handi abandi bati, Yeremiya, oba mulala hu banabbi.”
40016015	Nae yabateeba ati, “Nae eng'we muboola muti ese nise wiina?”
40016016	Simooni Peetero yakobolamo ati, “Niiwe Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae mulamu.”
40016017	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Simooni mwaana wa Yona, oli nende ehabi! Olwohuba obwadyeeri buno, sobunyoolere ohutula hu muundu busa, nae Lata oli Mukulu niye ohubwihuliireo.
40016018	Mani huboolera endi, niiwe Peetero, handi hu lwaanda luno, nihwo hunja ohwombaha omukanda kwa abandu bafukiiriramo, mani kata ohufwa sihuchia ohukuyiingira.
40016019	Njia ohuhubeeresa obufunguwo bw'Obwaami bwo Mukulu, mani buli siindu sy'ofuundiha hu syaalo, sichia ohufuundihwa Mukulu, handi buli sy'otumbulula hu syaalo, sichia ohutuumbululwa Mukulu.”
40016020	Mani Yesu yamala yahuutira abeeki bae obutabooleraho omuundu yeesi bati niye Kristo.
40016021	Ohutula esiha esyo, Yesu yachaaka ohweekesa abeeki bae ati, ahoyere ohuchia e Yerusaalemu, mani Abemeresi ba bandu, nende Abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende Abekesa ba malako, bamusaandye muno handi bamwiite, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu asyuhe.
40016022	Nae Peetero yamusudya endulo yachaaka ohumuyiingania naboola ati, “Omwaami! Nasae atakanya esyo syahweholehaho.”
40016023	Yesu yakaluhaana yaboolera Peetero ati, “Mbweere-eyi, Sitaani! Leha ohundehiinga mu moni, olwohuba embaasa yao eyo, si ya Nasae, nae y'abandu busa.”
40016024	Mani Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Omuundu yeesi odaha ohunoonda, omweene yetuseyo akiinge omusalabba kwae, mani yanonde.
40016025	Olwohuba omuundu yesi odaha ohuwonia obulamu bwae, achia ohubukosa; nae oyo okosa obulamu bwae hu lwaange achia ohubunyoola.
40016026	Ngaanga siina yi muundu anyoola, naalya esyaalo syoosi nae akosa obulamu bwae bweene? Oba, siina syeene si muundu anyala ohwofwong'aniamo obulamu bwae?
40016027	Olwohuba, Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohwiicha nende bamalaika bae mu luyaali lwa Simwaana, mani achia ohukaba buli muundu omukabo, ohweema hu biholwa byae.
40016028	Nae mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, baliwo abandi beemere ano, abatacha hufwa nibasisiiri ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu niyeecha mu Bwaami bwae.”
40017001	Mani lunyuma lw'endaalo chisaasaba, Yesu yabukula Peetero nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina, yacha nabo hu lugulu luleeyi, baaba eyo bong'ene.
40017002	Mani Yesu yeecha yakaluhanisibwa efwaani yae mu moni waabwe, obweeni bwae bwamesamesana koti elyuuba, handi engubo chae chalafuya chamilamilana.
40017003	Mani abweene awo, Musa nende Elija beecha baababonehera nibali ohulomaloma nae.
40017004	Mani Peetero yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, silayi huli ano; nodaha, njia ohwombaha ebikaali bidatu ano, silala esyao, handi esiindi esya Musa, handi esiindi esy'Elija.”
40017005	Niyali nasilomaloma, esireesi sing'enaang'ena syeecha syabebodoohania, handi ekono lyatula mu sireesi niriboola liti, “Wuno niye Omwaana wange mukoosi, ohira ohusangaasa; mumuwulire.”
40017006	Nae abeeki nibawulira sino, obuti bwa badiira behubba aasi mafumaame.
40017007	Nae Yesu yeecha yabadiiraho naboola ati, “Musiingire, mutatya.”
40017008	Nae nibatingaala akulu, awumawo omuundu wundi yibabona, ohutusaho Yesu yeng'ene.
40017009	Nibali nibeeha ohutula hu lugulu, Yesu yabahuutira ati, “Mutabooleraho omuundu yeesi bimubweene, ohwoola lu mwaana w'Omuundu yahasyuuhe mu bafu.”
40017010	Nae abeeki beecha bamuteeba bati, “Lwasiina Abekesa ba malako baboola bati, Elija wohukobola mberi?”
40017011	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Elija wohwicha, handi ali nende ohutereesa buli siindu syoosi;
40017012	nae mbaboolera endi, Elija yamala ohwiicha, ohutusaho abandu haba sibamumanya, mani bamala bamusaandya koti lubadaha. Mani mu ngeri nasilala niyo yi mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohusaandisibwa mu mahono kaabwe.”
40017013	Awo, abeeki beecha bamanya bati yali ali ohulomaloma hu Yowaana Omubatiisi.
40017014	Mani niboola eyiri esidiyiha sy'abandu, omusaacha wundi yeecha eyiri Yesu, yaasigama mu moni wae,
40017015	mani yaboola ati, “Omwaami, kwiira omwaana wange esisa, olwohuba afwa endulume, handi achunisibwa muno; olundi yimukwiisa mu muliro, handi olundi mu maachi.
40017016	Mani ndamuleeta eyiri abeeki bao, nae sibanyala ohumuwonia.”
