40017017	Mani Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Poo, eng'we oluse lubi luwuma efukiirira, ndahabe nang'we ohwoola liina? Ndahabesimiriise ohwoola liina? Mumundeetere ano.”
40017018	Yesu yamala yahabuhira omusambwa, mani omusambwa kwamutulamo, mani ohutula esiha esyo, omusyaani oyo yawona.
40017019	Nae abeeki beecha eyiri Yesu mu ngiso nibaboola bati, “Lwasiina, efwe sihunyalire ohwirusa omusambwa okwo?”
40017020	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Olwohuba muli nende efukiirira ndiidi. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, muba muli nende efukiirira yaakana koti olumwo lw'omutuumba, mwahaboolere olugulu luno muti, ‘Tula ano ochie era,’ mani lwaatulao; handi abulao esiindu syoosi esiba sichia ohubahaya.”
40017022	Mani abeeki nibali nibebusiire mu Galilaaya, Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono ka bandu,
40017023	mani bacha ohumwiita, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu achia ohusyuuha.” Sino syabahalaka omwooyo muno.
40017024	Nae niboola e Kaperanaumu, abasolosi b'omusolo kw'Enyuumba ya Nasae, beecha eyiri Peetero bamuteeba bati, “Mani omweekesa w'eng'we, yobbanga omusolo?”
40017025	Peetero yakobolamo ati, “Eee.” Mani Peetero naakaluuhe engo, Yesu yataangira ohulomaloma nae, naboola ati, “Simooni, naawe obaasa otye? Abatuki be syaalo, basolosaanga emisolo ohutula hu bandu siina? Hu beene syaalo, kose hu bandu bandi?”
40017026	Mani Peetero niyakaluhamo ati, “Hu bandu bandi.” Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Mbao hane abeene syaalo balehuule.
40017027	Nae obutanyoolesa abandu bano, cha mu nyaanja oteke elobo. Mani obukule eng'eni yonatangira ohudiisa, nae nonaasamya omunwa kwayo, ochia ohunyoolamo eseende; chibukule ochie otooye omusolo kwaange nende okwao.”
40018001	Abweene awo, abeeki beecha eyiri Yesu bamuteeba bati, “Wiina ohira abaasye boosi oluyaali mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu?”
40018002	Mani Yesu yeecha yalaanga omwaana muyere yamwemesa akati-kaati waabwe,
40018003	yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, haba simuchia ohwingira mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu ohutusaho nimwekaluhaanie mwaba koti abaana bayere.
40018004	Omuundu muloonga koti omwaana wuno, niye ohira abaasye oluyaali mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu.
40018005	Handi oyo yeesi owakaanira omwaana muyere koti wuno mu liita lyaange, aba yanjakaanire.
40018006	“Nae omuundu yeesi oleetera mulala hu bayere bafukiiriramo bano yahola esibi, ahoyera ohuboywa mu kosi okukina kuhoongo, yaasukunwa ebusiba w'enyaanja yebira.
40018007	Esyaalo syahabone endaalo muno, olwohuba mulimo ebihemo bikera abandu bahola ebibi! Ebihemo koti ebyo, bicha obubao endaalo choosi, nae chakaanire oyo oleeta ebihemo ebyo!
40018008	“Nae omuhono kwao nikukera wahola esibi, kata ohukulu hwao nihukera wahola esibi, temaho osukune; silayi wingire mu Bulamu notaali nende omuhono kata ohukulu, ohuhira ohudong'a nende amahono koombi oba amakulu koombi, nae osukunwa mu muliro kutasima.
40018009	Nae emoni yao niyikera waahola esibi, yichomolemo oyisukune; silayi wingire mu Bulamu bwo Mukulu nende emoni ndala, ohuhira ohuba nende emoni choombi, nae osukunwa mu muliro kutasima.
40018010	“Mubone muti haba simulekeresa kata mulala hu bayere bano; mbaboolera endi Mukulu, bamalaika baabwe bali buli siha mu moni wa Lata oli Mukulu.
40018011	
40018012	Nae mubaasa mutye? Omuundu naaba nende amakoondi emia ndala, nae ekoondi lala hwaako likota, saaleha aao amakoondi amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende kataanu-na-kane, hundulo wo lugulu, nae yacha yakoonya lala elyo eliba ni likotere?
40018013	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, nalinyoola, aba achia ohulisangaalira muno, ohuhira kala amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende kataanu-na-kane akatakotaho.
40018014	Nilwo nasilala lu Lata oli Mukulu yesi lwatadaha kata mulala hu bayere bano akote.
40018015	“Mani mwaanamaao nahuholera bubi, cha yali omuboolere esibi syae, nae hola otyo nimuli mwembi mweng'ene. Nawulira ebyao, awo oba omalire ohumwekobasaho.
40018016	Nae naahaya ohuhuwulira, bukula omuundu mulala oba babiri muche nabo yaali, olwohuba emboosi yisiirwa niyiriho abaloli babiri oba badatu.
40018017	Nae naahaya ohuwulira abo bosi, yekesa abafukiriri basyeeng'we; nae handi naahaya ohuwulira kata echa abafukiriri basyeeng'we bosi, mani mumubukule koti omutende oba omutoosa w'omusolo.
40018018	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli simuchia ohuboya hu syaalo, sichia ohuboywa Mukulu, handi buli simunaboolola hu syaalo, sichia ohuboololwa Mukulu.
40018019	Handi mbaboolera endi, babiri hw'eng'we hu syaalo, nimufukiirisania hu siindu syoosi simusaba, Lata oli Mukulu achia ohubaholera esyeene esyo.
40018020	Olwohuba, yi bandu babiri kata badatu yibaba nibahung'aanire mu liita lyaange, awo mba ndiwo akati waabwe.”
40018021	Nae Peetero yeecha eyiri Yesu yamuteeba ati, “Omwaami, mwaanama niyaholera esibi, muleheramo amahabi kanga? Amahabi kataanu-na-kabiri?”
40018022	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Haba bbe! Si mahabi kataanu-na-kabiri, nae amahabi amahumi kataanu-na-kabiri basamo chitaanu-na-chibiri,
40018023	“Sakira Obwaami bwo Mukulu, bufwaanana nende omutuki wenya ohuteeba abahalaabani bae ebidiira hu mwaandu kwae, kubali nakwo.
40018024	Niyali yahachaaka ohubala, bamuleetera mulala hu bali nende ekobi lyae lya etalanta elifu ehumi;
40018025	nae omuundu oyo, siyali nende engeri yoosi eyohutungamo ekobi elyo, mani omwenengo wae yatusa omunwa ati, akuswemo alala nende omuhasi wae, nende abaana bae, alala nende obuyiinda bwae bwoosi, atunge ekobi elyo.
40018026	Mani omuhalaabani oyo, yakwa hu mahumbo kae, namwekongooya ati, ‘Omwaami, ndesimiiriseho, njia ohutunga ekobi elyo lyoosi.’
40018027	Omweenengo oyo, yamukwiira esisa, yaamuleheramo ekobi elyo lyoosi, yaamuleha yawaao.
40018028	Nae mani omuhalaabani oyo, niyali akobolayo, yabukanana nende mulala hu bahalaabani basye owaba nende ekobi lyae lya edinaari emia ndala chong'ene; ya mwebbakiraho, yamukwa mu mamiro yaamumika naboola ati, ‘Nduunge ekobi lyaange.’
40018029	Mani omuhalaabani waasye, yakwa aasi, ya mwekongooya ati, ‘Ndesimiiriseho, njia ohuhutuunga.’
40018030	Nae yahaya ohumutekeeresa, yacha ya musukuna mu mboyero, ohwoola luyahatuunge ekobi elyo.
40018031	Nae, abahalaabani basye nibabona batyo, omwooyo kwabachuna muno, bacha baboolera omwenengo waabwe buli siindu syali syeholehe.
40018032	Omweenengo oyo yeecha yalaanga omuhalaabani oyo yaamuboolera ati, ‘Ewe omuhalabani mubi! Ese ndahuleheramo ekobi lyakiire awo lyoosi liwaba nalyo olwohuba wandekongooya;
40018033	nae ewe, haba siwahakwiriire omuhalabani waasyo esisa, koti lundahukwiira?’
40018034	Mani etima lyadiira omwenengo oyo muno, yeecha yaasukuna omuhosi oyo mu mahono kabejiela ohwoola luyahatuunge ekobi lyae lyoosi.
40018035	Olwo nilwo lu Lata oli Mukulu lwacha ohuholera buli muundu hweeng'we, nimutaleheramo abasy'eng'we nende omwooyo kweeng'we kwoosi.”
40019001	Nae Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma emboosi echo, yatula e Galilaaya yaacha mu situundu sye Buyudaaya, engereha w'omwaalo kwa Yorudaani;
40019002	mani esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syamulondaho, yamala yabawonisirya ebweene eyo.
40019003	Nae Abafalisaayo beecha yali bamuhema nibamuteeba bati, “Mani elako lifukiirira omuundu ohwirusa omuhasi wae hulwa esifune syoosi?”
40019004	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho muti ohutula mu huchaaka, Nasae yaloonga omusaacha nende omuhasi,
40019005	mani yaboola ati, ‘Hulw'esifune sino, omusaacha achia ohulehaanga simwaana nende ng'ina, yeyambanie nende omuhasi wae, mani bombi behole omubiri mulala’?
40019006	Mani bulaanu sibasisiiri babiri, nae omubiri mulala. Sakira esyo si Nasae yawambania alala, omuundu yeesi atasikabuhanianga.”
40019007	Nae Abafalisaayo bamuteeba bati, “ Lwasiina Musa yatusa elako ati, omusaacha aberesenge omuhasi ebbarwa y'ohulobana, hwaamale amwirusire elalira?”
40019008	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Musa yabafukiirira ohwirusa abahasi beeng'we, ohweema hu lw'obwaangalafu bw'emyooyo cheeng'we, nae sisyaba sityo ohutula mu huchaaka.
40019009	Handi mbaboolera endi, oyo yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, ataali hu lw'obucheke,” mani yadehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke,
40019010	Abeki bae beecha baboola bati, “Ebiindu nibiba bityo akati-kaati w'omusaacha nende omuhasi wae, mani mbawo obutadeehya biba bihira.”
40019011	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Abandu boosi sibanyala bafukiirira enjekesa yino, ohumalaho abo ba Nasae aba yekulirewo.
40019012	Olwohuba, biriwo ebiindu bitaali nasilala ebikera omuundu yahaya ohudeehya. Abandu bandi sibanyala hudeehya olwohuba beebulwa batyo; abandi baladwa busa, mani sibanyala hudeehya; nae abandi sibanyala hudeehya olwohuba befwiirisa obulamu bw'ohudeehya, olw'ohuhalaabanira Obwaami bwo Mukulu. Mulehe oyo onyala ohufukiirira, afukiirire.”
40019013	Mani beecha baleeta abaana bayere eyiri Yesu abateeho emihono handi abasabire. Nae abeeki bae beecha boolobya abandu;
40019014	nae Yesu yababoola ati, “Mulehe abaana beeche yindi, handi mu tabakayira; olwohuba abafwana koti bano, nibo abeene Bwaami bwo Mukulu.”
40019015	Yesu yabeesaho amahono, mani yamala yawaawo.
40019016	Abweene awo, omusyaani wundi yeecha eyiri Yesu namuteeba ati, “Omweekesa, silayi siina sihoyeere ohuhola, hu fune Obulamu Butaakama?”
40019017	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Lwasiina wundeeba hu biindu bilai? Aliwo omuundu mulala yeng'ene omulai. Nae nooba nodaha ohwingira mu Bulamu, linda Amalako ka Nasae.”
40019018	Yateeba Yesu ati, “Malako siina?” Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Otetaanga; Otayiranaanga; Otebaanga; Otabachaanga;
40019019	beresaanga latao nende mao oluyaali; handi, dahaanga owaasyo koti omweene luwedaha.”
40019020	Omusyaani oyo yaboolera Yesu ati, “Amalako kano koosi, ngalondaanga ohutula mu buyere bwaange; nae siina handi siimba mochoha?”
40019021	Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Nodaha ohuba omuundu mwolerefu, cha okusemo ebiindu byooli nabyo, mani eseende chitulamo ochikabire abamanani, mani oba ochia ohufuna obuyiinda Mukulu; mani omale wiche wunonde.”
40019022	Nae omusyaani oyo niyawulira atyo, yatula awo yawaawo niyewunamiire muno, olwohuba yali nende obuyiinda bungi muno.
40019023	Mani Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, sichia ohudinyira muno omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu.
40019024	Handi mbaboolera endi, syanguyira engamia ohubita mu moni yesindaani, ohuhira omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
40019025	Nae abeeki bae nibawulira sino, bawuka muno baboola bati, “Mani wiina onyala ohuwona?”
40019026	Yesu yabatingaala tiiri mu moni, yamala yabakobolamo ati, “Sino sisinyaliha eyiri abandu, nae eyiri Nasae, buli siindu sinyaliha.”
40019027	Abweene awo, Peetero yakobolamo naboola ati, “Bone, efwe hwaleha ebiindu byoosi mani hwa huloonda. Ni siina sihwahanyoole?”
40019028	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi mu syaalo siyaaha, Omwaana w'Omuundu niyahehale hu sisaala syae sy'oluyaali, eng'we abanondaho mwesi mucha ohwihala hu bisaala by'obutuki, ehumi-na-bibiri, muheengere omusango enjia ehumi-na-chibiri cha Yisirayiri.
40019029	Mani buli muundu yeesi owaleha enyumba kata bamwaanang'ina, kata bambochong'ene, kata latang'ene, kata ng'ina, kata abaana, kata eloba, hu lw'eliita lyaange, achia ohunyoola amahabi emia ndala eyeebyo, alala nende Obulamu Butaakama.
40019030	Nae abangi bataangiramo bacha ohuba abahenerehayo, nae abahenerehayo bacha ohuba abatangiramo.
40020001	“Obulamu bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende omwenengo, owawuuna echuli ohukoonya abandu bamuholera mu ndalo yae y'emisabbiibu.
40020002	Niyamala ohuwuliirisania nabo omuheemba kw'edinaari ndala hu ludaalo, yabatuma mu ndalo bache bamuholere.
40020003	Handi niyacha erwaanyi esaa chidatu che chuli, yabona abandu bandi nibeemere busa mu siito;
40020004	mani yababoolera ati, 'Eng'we mwesi muche mu ndalo yange, njia ohubabeeresa omuheemba okubahoyera.' Mani bosi beemao bacha.
40020005	Handi niyali nakeenda erwaanyi esaa chisaasaba, nende esaa chitaanu-na-chine, yahola esiindu nasilala.
40020006	Handi aambi w'esawa ehumi-na-ndala, yatula yacha yabukaana abandu bandi bosi nibeemere busa; mani yababoolera ati, ‘Lwasiina, eng'we mweema busa ano oludaalo olulaamba nimutaholaho esiindu syoosi?’
40020007	Bamukobolamo bati, ‘Olwohuba awumao omuundu yeesi otubeereseho omulimo.’ Nae yababoolera ati, ‘Mani mwesi muche mu ndalo yange.’
40020008	Mani engoloobe niyoola, omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu yaboolera omuhubbirisa w'abahosi bae ati, ‘Laanga abahosi boosi, obakabe omuheemba kwaabwe; ohuchaakira hu bamaliirihe, omaliriihe nende abatangire.’
40020009	Mani abachaaka ohuhola aambi w'esaa ehumi-na-ndala nibeecha, buli muundu yafuna edinaari ndala-ndala.
40020010	Nae abatangira ohuhola nibeecha, babaasa bati bacha ohufuna echihiraho awo; mani bosi bafuna edinaari ndala-ndala busa.
40020011	Nae nibabukula omuheemba kwaabwe okwo bekanyiisa muno eyiri omwenengo,
40020012	nibaboola bati, ‘Boneho, abamaliriihe bano, baholere esaa ndala yong'ene, nae ewe obakabire nasilala nende efwe, abafunihane nende omulimo kw'oludaalo lwoosi mu mubasu kwakiire awo.’
40020013	Nae yakobola mu mulala hw'abo ati, ‘ Omwiicha, siindi hubahola esibi daawe; haba sihufukiirisaanie naawe ohuholera edinaari ndala?
40020014	Bukula ebyao mani oweeo; ese omweene heengereo ohuberesa omaliriiheyo wuno omuheemba kwaakana nende kuhubereese.
40020015	Ese mbula obunyala bw'ohwehunyera ebiindu byaange koti lumba nindaha? Kose oli ohumbalana hulw'obukabi bwaange?’
40020016	Mani abahenerehayo bacha ohuba abatangira, nae abatangira bacha ohuba abahenerehayo.”
40020017	Mani Yesu niyali naachia e Yerusaalemu, yayira abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri endulo, mani nibali hu lukeendo, yababoolera ati,
40020018	“Mbao hucha e Yerusaalemu; mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono ka bahuluundu ba Babalaamisi nende Abekesa ba Amalako, mani bamuheengere omusango kw'ohufwa,
40020019	handi bamale bamudiise Abateende, bamudulire alala nende ohumuhuya ehoba, mani bamale bamuhomerere hu musalabba, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu achia ohusyuuha.”
40020020	Abweene awo, ng'ina baana ba Sebbedaayo yeecha eyiri Yesu naali nende abaana bae babiri, mani yaasigama, mu moni wae ohumusaba esiindu silala syong'ene.
40020021	Yesu yamuteeba ati, “Odaha siina?” Yamukobolamo ati, “Wechube oti, abaana bange bano bacha ohwihala, mulala hu muhono kwao muluungi, nae owundi hu muhono omukooda mu Bwaami bwao.”
40020022	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mbao okoterwe syosaba. Munyala ohung'wa hu sikoombe si njia ohung'wa?” Nae ba mukobolamo bati, “Hunyala.”
40020023	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mucha ohung'wa hu sikoombe syaange, nae eby'ohwihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi oba hu mukooda, mbula obunyala bubeeresa, nae bwabo ba Lata yatekehera.”
40020024	Mani abeeki ehumi bala nibawulira esyo, etima lyabadiira muno hulwa abasyaani b'enda ndala abo.
40020025	Nae Yesu yabalaanga ohwiicha yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Mumanyire muti abatuki babandu bali mu syaalo muno baheera ohuhalaabanirwa busa, handi abo ababa nende obunyala, batukira busa obwaalaba.
40020026	Nae mw'eng'we haba sisihoyeere ohuba sityo; ohumalaho,
40020027	buli odaha ohuba omwemeresi, ahoyere abe omuhalaabani w'abaasye;
40020028	koti lu Mwaana w'Omuundu ateecha ohuhalaabanirwa nae ohuhalaabanira abandu, nende ohuwaayo obulamu bwae koti omutuulu kw'ohununula abangi.”
40020029	Mani nibali nibatula mu Yeriko, esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu syeecha syamuloonda.
40020030	Nae bone, abawofu babiri bali nibehaale hu ndulo w'engira, nibawulira bati Yesu niye owali niyeecha ohubita, bachaaka ohwekongooya mu kono ly'akulu bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi! Tukwiireho esisa!”
40020031	Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syabahabuhira, nisiibaboolera ohuwuleera; nae abaofu bano bameeda busa ohwekongooyera akulu muno nibaboola bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi, Tukwiireho esisa!”
40020032	Mani Yesu yeecha yeema, mani yabalaanga, nababoolera ati, “Eng'we mudaha mbaholere siina syeene?”
40020033	Mani bamukobolamo nibamuboola bati, “Omwaami, efwe hudaha otulimbuse emoni fwesi huboneho!”
40020034	Mani Yesu yeecha yabakwiira esisa, mani yabadiira hu moni chaabwe; mani abweene awo, abasaacha abo beecha bachaakiraniramo ohubona, mani baasingira baloonda Yesu.
40021001	Nae Yesu nende abeeki bae nibali aambi ohwingira mu siko sye Yerusaalemu, boola e Bbetifaage aambi nende olugulu lwa Olibeti. Mani Yesu yatuma abeeki babiri,
40021002	nababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko esibali mu moni, mani mucha ohwakaanayo epunda yibaboyere niyiri nende omwaana kwayo. Muchiboolole, mani muchindeetere.
40021003	Nae omuundu wundi nababoolera esiindu syoosi, mumuboolera muti, ‘Omwaami niye ochidaha,’ mani achia ohuchibalehera.”
40021004	Sino syeholeha ohwoseresa abweene bi omunabbi yalomaloma naboola ati;
40021005	“Muboolere omuhaana wa Siyooni muti, boneho, omutuki wao mbawo yeecha yooli, Muloonga muno, handi yehaale hu punda, Hu mwaana kw'epunda, epunda ndoto.”
40021006	Mani, abeeki abo bacha bahola koti lu Yesu yabatuma;
40021007	baleeta epunda eyo, nende omwaana kwayo, bachaalaho engubo chaabwe, mani Yesu yehalaho.
40021008	Esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo nasyo syaala engubo chaabwe hu ngira, nae abandi bawakula amasaga k'emisaala nibakaala hu ngira.
40021009	Esidiyiha sy'abandu esyali simwimisiremo, nende esyali simuloondaho, byachaaka ohuhuumula biti, “Hosaana! Omwaana wa Daudi! Wehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami! Hosaana akulu mu kulu eyo!”
40021010	Mani Yesu niyengira mu Yerusaalemu abandu bomu siko omwo boosi basanguluha, edooho lyoosi lyaduma buduma, nibateeba bati, “Wuno ni wiina?”
40021011	Esidiyiha nasyo syakobolamo siti, “Wuno niye Yesu Omunabbi ohutula e Nasareti mu Galilaaya.”
40021012	Yesu yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yachaaka ohwiruhaniamo abali bakuliramo nende abali bakusiramo ebiindu, yafumamya emeesa cha abafunjisa eseende nende ebisaala by'abakusa amaburuku.
40021013	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yinalangangwa enyumba ya amalaamo.’ Nae eng'we mu yikaluhanie ohuba eng'ungu ya abanyaka.”
40021014	Mani abaofu nende abalema bamala beecha yali mu nyumba omwo, yabawonia.
40021015	Nae abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, nende Abekesa ba Malako, nibabona ebyaamayia bi Yesu yali aholere, alala nende abaana bali bahuumulira mu nyumba ya malaamo omwo bati, “Hosaana! Omwaana wa Daudi!” etima lyeecha lyabadiira muno.
40021016	Mani beecha bateeba Yesu bati, “Oli ohuwulira bi baana bano baboola?” Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Eee. Nae eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho esyandiiko siboola siti, ‘Ni mu minwa chabayere nende abaana badoto banuuna, nimwo omutula efuma ya Nasae ndayi mubwichufu’?”
40021017	Yesu yamala yabaleha awo, yaatula mu siko esyo yacha e Bbetani yi yeyalisa.
40021018	Echuli ni buhyere, Yesu yakobola mu siko esyo, yawulira enjala ni yimuluma.
40021019	Ni yabona omusaala kw'enduli hundulo w'engira, yaasuda yoola mu sisina, nae yahaya ohunyoolaho esyaamo syoosi, ohumalaho amasaafu kong'ene nikadidya. Mani yaboolera omusaala okwo ati, “Solyaamaho ebyaamo byoosi, ehabi liindi!” Mani omusaala okwo, kwomerao.
40021020	Abeki nibabona sino, bawuka muno bateeba bati, “Lwasiina, omusaala kw'enduli kwoomere bwaangu kutyo?”
40021021	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, nimuba nende efukiirira, handi mwahaya ohuba nende ohukana-kana, muba mucha ohunyala ohuhola si ese holere hu musaala kw'enduli, nae kata nimuboolera olugulu luno muti, ‘Siingira ano mani wesukune mu nyaanja,’ nibiba busa koti lumuba muboolere.
40021022	Handi nimuba nende efukiirira, muba mucha ohunyoola byoosi-byoosi bimuba nimusabire.”
40021023	Yesu yengira mu nyumba y'amalaamo, nae niyaba niyeekesa, abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, alala nende abahuluundu ba Abayudaaya beecha yali bamuteeba bati, “Bunyala siina bwoli nabwo ohuhola ebiindu bino? Nae wiina owahuberesa obunyala obwo?”
40021024	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Syesi njicha ohubatebaho esiindu silala, nae ni musifunyamo, syesi njia ohubaboolera yindatusa obunyala buhola ebiindu bino.
40021025	Obunyala bwa Yowaana bwohubatiisa abandu, bwatula yena? Bwatula eyiri Nasae, kose eyiri abandu?” Nae abeene-na-beene bachaaka ohuteebana bati, “Huboole hutye? Nihuboola huti, ‘Bwatula eyiri Nasae,’ aba achia ohututeeba ati, ‘Nae hu siina simwamufukiirira?’
40021026	Nae ni huboola huti, ‘Bwatula mu bandu’ hutya bi bandu banyala ohutuhola, olwohuba abandu boosi bomiisa bati, Yowaana yaba omunabbi wadyeeri.”
40021027	Mani nibamukobolamo bati, “Hukoterwe.” Nae yesi yababoolera ati, “Syeesi siinjia hubaboolera yindatusa obunyala bwohuhola ebiindu bino.
40021028	“Bulaanu nang'we mubaasa mutye? Omuundu wundi yaba nende abaana bae basyani babiri; yacha yaboolera omusyaani muhuluundu ati, ‘Mwaana wange, cha olime mu ndalo yange olwaleero.’
40021029	Nae yamukobolamo ati, ‘Siinjia hucha.’ Nae lunyuma, yeecha yebaasa, mani yamala yacha.
40021030	Lunyuma, Saabwe yacha eyiri omwaana wundi, yamuboolera yesi ache ahole nasilala atyo. Oyo nae, yamukobolamo ati, ‘Omwaami njia ohuchia,’ nae yamala yahaya ohuchia.
40021031	Bulaanu hu babiri abo, wiina owahola si Saabwe yenya?” Bamukobolamo bati, “Omwaana muhuluundu.” Yesu yababoolera ati, mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, Abasolosa b'omusolo nende abahasi bacheke, bacha ohubataangirira ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
40021032	Olwohuba, Yowaana yeecha yimuli ohubeekesa engira y'obwadyeeri, nae mwahaya ohumufukiirira; nae abatoosa bomusolo nende abahasi bacheke bamufukiirira. Handi kata ni mwabona mutyo, simwefunaka mwamufukiirira.
40021033	Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutekeerese olukaado lundi. Yaliwo omwenengo wundi owataaka endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yayisitiraho olukaka ohuyebodoohania, yayabamo esiina syohuhunyiramo efwiini, yamala yombaha omunara. Mani yaapangisa endaalo eyo abalimi bandi, nae omweene amala asamula mu syaalo sy'eyale.
40021034	Endaalo chohunoka efwiini nichoola, yatuma abahalabani bae eyiri abalimi abo bamubeerese omukabo kwae.
40021035	Nae abalimi nabo, bakwa hu bahalabani bae abo bahuya mulala, beeta owundi, handi balasa owundi amakina.
40021036	Nae handi, omweene ndalo oyo yeecha yatuma abahalabani bandi bangi ohuhiraho abatangira, nae abalimi babahola nasilala batyo.
40021037	Lunyuma lwa byoosi, yeecha yatuma Omwaana wae mweene naboola ati, ‘Luno leero bacha ohutya Omwaana wange bamube oluyaali.’
40021038	Nae nibabona Omwaana wae, bafukiirisania abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omusiha wae; leha mani humwiite, mani huyire omwaandu kwae.’
40021039	Mani beecha ba mukwaaho, ba musukuna erwaanyi w'endaalo y'efwiini, bamala ba mwiita.
40021040	Bulaanu, omweene ndalo niyahakobole, yahaholere abalimi abo siina?”
40021041	Bamuboolera bati, “Syadyeeri, achia ohwiita bubi abalimi babi abo, amale apangise abalimi bandi endaalo yae, abacha ohumuberesa omukabo kwae kw'efwiini, ebiha by'ohufuna nibyoolere.”
40021042	Yesu yabateeba ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho ebyandiiko byolerefu muti; ‘Omusiruunga ku bombahi balekeeresa nikwo okweholere omuhuluundu mu muse; kuno mulimo kw'Omwaami nikwo; handi kutubonehera bulai muno!’
40021043	Sakira mbaboolera endi, bacha ohubang'uula obwaami bwa Nasae babubeerese abandu bandi, abaama ebyaamo bilai.”
40021044	
40021045	Abahuluundu ba Balaamisi, nende Abafalisaayo lubawulira engaado Yesu chiyakaada echo, bamanya busa bati nibo bayali alomalomaho.
40021046	Nae nibakesaho ohumudiira, beecha batya esidiyiha syali syafukiirira siti, Yesu yali omunabbi wa Nasae.
40022001	Yesu handi yalomaloma nabo mu ngaado naboola ati,
40022002	“Obwaami bwo Mukulu bufwaanana nende omutuki watekehera omwaana wae musyaani esidyaalo sy'obweeya.
40022003	Yatuma abahalabani bae bache baboolere abakeni balaange beeche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, nae bahaya ohwiicha.
40022004	Handi yeecha yatuma abahalabani bandi naboola ati, ‘Muboolere abakeni balaange abo muti, Mbao malire ohutekeha buli siindu syoosi esidahibwa hu sidyaalo. Njitire elawu change alala nende emoosi nginu, mwiche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya.’
40022005	Nae, abakeni balaange abo sibadeebayo haba, buli otula yechiira busa mu mirimo chae; mulala yacha mu ndalo yae, owundi yacha mu huchurusa,
40022006	nae abadong'ereyo nabo bakwa hu bahalabani bae, baabatoocha, bamala baabeeta.
40022007	Omutuki oyo yanyoolera muno; mani yatuma abasirikari bae ohuchia ohwiita abatemo abo, alala nende ohusaamba esiko syaabwe.
40022008	Mani yaboolera abahalabani bae, ati, ‘Mbao malire ohutekeha esidyaalo sy'obweeya, nae koti abakeni balaangwa hu sidyaalo lubeekese bati sibahoyera ohusibaaho,
40022009	mani muche mu masang'angira, mulaange abandu boosi bamubonayo, beeche hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya.’
40022010	Mani abahalabani abo bacha hu ngira, babuusa abandu boosi babanyolayo, ababi nende abalayi nasilala; mani esibaanja syamala syechula abakeni ddu.
40022011	“Nae omutuki niyengira mu sibaanja ohubona abakeni, yabona omuundu wundi otefwaalire engubo cho hu sidyaalo.
40022012	Mani yaamuteeba ati, ‘Wasyaange, wingire otye muno notaali nende engubo cho hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya?’ Nae omuundu oyo yateng'eng'ala, yabulera busa.
40022013	Omutuki oyo yemawo yaboolera abahalabani bae ati, ‘Mumuboye amahono nende amakulu, mani mumusukune erwaanyi mu sirima. Eyo niyo yanalirira niyeesia ameeno.’
40022014	Yesu yemawo yaamaliirisa ati, 'Abalaangwa bangi, nae abadolwamo badiidi.'”
40022015	Olwoola, Abafalisaayo bacha behoba ohuteka Yesu bamudiire munomanoma yae.
40022016	Mani batuma abeeki baabwe alala nende abaloondi ba Herode bandi bache eyiri Yesu, nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti oli omuundu w'obwadyeeri. Wekesaanga engira ya Nasae mu bwadyeeri bweene, notadeeba hu bibaandu babaasa, olwohuba sodebaanga oluyaali lw'abandu daawe.
40022017	Bulaanu tuboolere ebibaaso byao? Siba esilai mu malako keefwe, ohutooya omusolo kwa Kaisaali, kose haba?”
40022018	Yesu nae yali amanyire hale esichiririrwa syaabwe sibi esyo, mani yababoolera ati, “Abebachirisi eng'we, lwasiina mu ndeka omuteego?
40022019	Mani munjekeseho ebbeesa li mutoyeraanga omusolo.” Bamuleetera ebbeesa ly'emwaamwa,
40022020	mani yabateeba ati, “Huno, huliho esifwaanani sya naanu, nende eliita lya naanu?”
40022021	Bamukobolamo bati, “Bya Kaisaali.” Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mukalusire Kaisaali, ebya Kaisaali, nae Nasae, ebya Nasae.”
40022022	Nae nibawulira batyo, bawuka muno, bamuleha mani bawaao.
40022023	Ludaalo lweene olwo, Abasadukaayo batafukiirira mu husyuha hw'abafwa, beecha eyiri Yesu,
40022024	bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, Musa yaboola ati, ‘Omuundu naafwa, nataalehereho omwaana, mwaanang'ina akerama omuhasi mufwiire oyo, yamala yebulira mwaanang'ina wafwa, abaana.’
40022025	Olwoola, yaliwo abasyaani bataanu-na-babiri ab'enyumba ndala. Omuhulundu waabwe, yeecha yadeehya omuhasi wae mani yafwa natebuuleho nae omwaana. Koti luyali nataalehereho omwaana, yalehera mwaanang'ina omuhasi wae oyo.
40022026	Sino syosi syeholeha handi hu mwaanang'ina wohubiri, handi hu wohudatu, ohwolera elalira hu wo hutaanu-na-habiri.
40022027	Lunyuma, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
40022028	Bulaanu, hu ludaalo lusembayo lu bafwa balisyuhiraho, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba omuhasi naanu? olwohuba boosi bali bamudehyaho?”
40022029	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Awo mudoondobaane muno! Olwohuba mukoterwe kata ebyandiiko byolerefu, alala nende amaani ka Nasae.
40022030	Olwohuba mu husyuha hw'abafu, muwumamo ohudeehya kata ohudeeha, nae abandu bacha ohuba koti bamalaika Mukulu.
40022031	Nae, ebidiira hu husyuha mu bafu, eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho bi Nasae yababoola naalomaloma ati,
40022032	‘Neese Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka handi Nasae wa Yakobbo’? Amahulundu keene mbwe, siindi Nasae wa abafu, nae ndi Nasae wa abalamu.”
40022033	Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu nisyawulira sityo, syawuka muno enjekesa yae.
40022034	Nae Abafalisaayo nibawulira bati Yesu amalire ohuteng'eng'asa Abasadukaayo, bebuusa alala,
40022035	mani mulala hu Bafalisaayo owali omweekesa w'amalako yachooma Yesu nende esiteebo sy'esiteki ati,
40022036	“Omweekesa, lako siina elihira amalako kandi koosi obuhuluundu?”
40022037	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Dahaanga Nasae Omwaami wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amakesi kao koosi.
40022038	Lino nilyo elako ly'amberi handi elihira akandi koosi obuhuluundu.
40022039	Handi ely'ohubiri elifwaanana nalyo, nilyo, dahaanga owaasyo, koti luwedaha omweene.
40022040	Amalako ka Musa koosi, nende enjekesa y'abanabbi yoosi, yeema hu Malako kabiri kano.”
40022041	Bulaanu Abafalisaayo nibali be busire alala, Yesu yabateeba esiteebo naboola ati,
40022042	“Mubaasa mutye hu Kristo? Mwaana wa naanu?” Bamukobolamo bati, “Mwaana wa Daudi.”
40022043	Yesu yabateeba ati, “Lwasiina Daudi niyemereerwe nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yamulaanga ati, Omwaami, naboola ati,
40022044	‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi ohwoola lundahahole abasuku bao babe esiteeni sy'ohulaambisaho amakulu kao’?
40022045	Mani Daudi niyamulaanga ati, Omwaami, sinyaliha sitye handi Kristo ohuba omwaana wa Daudi?”
40022046	Nae abulao omuundu wundi, kata mulala owanyala ohukobola mu Yesu, handi ohutula ludaalo olwo, abulao omuundu waba nende amaani ak'ohumuteebaho esiteebo siindi.
40023001	Olwoola, Yesu yaboolera esidiyiha sy'abandu, alala nende abeeki bae ati,
40023002	“Abeekesa b'amalako nende Abafalisaayo, nibo abali mu sifwo sya Musa sy'ohweekesa amalako,
40023003	sakira muhoyeere ohuhola alala nende ohuwulira byoosi-byoosi bi bababoolera, nae mutaholaanga koti lu bahola, olwohuba sibahola bibeekesa.
40023004	Baboya emikuku misito kitanyaliha bakidwiiha hu mabeka k'abandu bandi, nae abeene sibakesaho kata ohugeeng'a olwala lw'omuhono kwaabwe hu mukuku musito okwo ohubahoonya.
40023005	Buli siindu sibahola, bachiiririraanga mbwe abandu bababone. Mani muboneho koti lubabambaliya emisiingiri ch'ebyandiiko byolerefu, bacheboya mu bweeni, nende hu maambala; handi bahola amakemo kamaganduula kaabwe kaba amaleeyi, handi amatakalafu.
40023006	Badaha muno obwihalo bw'oluyaali nibali hu sidyaalo, kata mu Sinagoogi;
40023007	handi badaha ohubereswa oluyaali luhoongo mu siito, nende abandu ohubafumia bati, Abekesa! Abekesa!
40023008	Nae eng'we simuhoyeerwe ohulaangwa muti, ‘Omweekesa,’ olwohuba muli nende omweekesa mulala yeng'ene, niye Kristo, nae eng'we mweesi muli abebulaane.
40023009	Handi mu talangaanga omuundu yeesi hu syaalo huno muti, ‘Lata’ olwohuba muli nende Seeng'we mulala yeng'ene, oli Mukulu.
40023010	Handi batabalangaanga bati, ‘Abaami’ olwohuba muli nende Omwaami mulala yeng'ene, niye Kristo.
40023011	Omuundu ohiramo oluyaali mw'eng'we, ahoyere ohuba omuhalabani w'eng'we.
40023012	Omuundu yeesi, oweniinia omweene, achia ohwiiswa aasi, nae omuundu yeesi oweyisa aasi, achia ohuniiniswa.
40023013	“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abafalisaayo alala nende Abandiiki b'Amalako, abebachirisi eng'we! Olwohuba mwikalira abandu omulyaango kucha mu Bwaami bwo Mukulu, nae eng'we beene simwingiramo daawe, handi haba simufukiirira abo abadaha ohwingiramo beengira.
40023014	Chibanyolere eng'we, Abeekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo, abebachirisi eng'we! Mung'uula abahasi bafwiire enyumba chaabwe, ni mumala mwekaadirisa nende ohulaama hu leeyi muno! Sakira muchia ohufuna esinyaaso shiramo obuhoongo.
40023015	Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo, abebachirisi eng'we! Mukendaana hu syaalo, ni mwambuhana enyaanja, ohwoola lu muchuusa kata omuundu mulala busa, yengira mu diini yeng'we; mani ni mwahamala ohumuchuusa, mukera omuundu oyo yehola omubi w'ohuchia mu muliro kutasima, amahabi kabiri ohuhiraho eng'we beene!
40023016	“Chibakaanire eng'we, abemeresi baofu! Mweekesa muti, ‘Omuundu niyechubira enyumba ya Nasae, ohwechuba ohwo sihuhola siindu syoosi, nae niyechubira esaabbu y'omunyuumba ya Nasae, ohwechuba ohwo humudiiraho.’
40023017	Abasiru batabona eng'we! Siina esihira esiindi oluyaali, esaabbu, kose enyumba ya Nasae, eyikera esaabbu eyo yaba enjolerefu?
40023018	Handi mweekesa muti, ‘Omuundu yeesi niyechubira alutaari, ohwechuba ohwo sihuhola siindu syoosi; nae niyechubira ebiyaanwa biri hu alutaari, ohwechuba ohwo humudiiraho.’
40023019	Eng'we nga mwaofulira elalira! Siina esihira esiindi oluyaali, esiyaanwa kose alutaari, eyikera esiyaanwa esyo syaaba esyolerefu?
40023020	Sakira omuundu niyechubira alutaari, aaba yechubiire alutaari nende buli siindu syoosi esiyiriho;
40023021	handi omuundu niyechubira enyumba ya Nasae, aba yechubiire enyumba ya Nasae, nende Nasae yesi oyirimo;
40023022	handi mani omuundu wechubira ekulu, oyo aba yechubiire esisaala sy'obutuki sya Nasae nende Nasae mweene osihalaho.
40023023	“Nae chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; eng'we abebachirisi! Olwohuba mubeeresa Nasae silala sy'ehumi esy'ebiindu bidiidi-diidi koti ebitunguru, ebisaari alala nende ebiindu biindi biwunya esiing'aari, nae simudeebayo hu biindu bihoongo bi Malako keekesa koti, ohuba nende obwadyeeri, esisa, nende efukiirira; muhoyeere ohwoseresa ebiindu bino ataali ohulekeresa ebiindi ebyo.
40023024	Eng'we abemirisi batabona, mu diinya amaachi muhaye ohung'wa obuduhulu bwoosi, nae eno muli koti abandu bamira obukala ebiindu bihoongo!
40023025	“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Eng'we aboosa hu Mukulu w'ebikoombe nende ow'esaani, nae mu kati wabyo, mwechula eby'obwiibi nende okuliira.
40023026	Abafalisaayo batabona eng'we! Mutaangire mberi mwoose mukati w'esikoombe nende ow'esaani, hu bulaanu erwaanyi yosi yimale yibe endafu.
40023027	“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Mbao mufwaana nende ebiriindwa ebibahirwe eraangi ya rachaari, ebiboneha bulai bweene hu Mukulu, nae mu kati mwichulemo amakumba ak'abafwa, nende engakaayi chaahwo.
40023028	Nasilala, mwesi mucha ohufwaana abolerefu hu Mukulu, nae mu myooyo cheeng'we bweene, mwichulemo obwebachirisi nende obubi.
40023029	“Chibakaanire eng'we, Abekesa b'Amalako nende Abafalisaayo; abebachirisi eng'we! Olwohuba neng'we abombaha ebiriindwa bya banabbi, handi mutereesa bilai byeene ebiriindwa by'abolerefu,
40023030	nimuboola muti, ‘Huba nihwaliwo mu ndaalo cha bakuuka beefwe, haba sihwahabeere silala nabo muhwiidisa amabaanga k'abanabbi.’
40023031	Mbao hane eng'we beene mwetumbulaanga muti muli abechuhulu baabo abeeta abanabbi.
40023032	Sakira bulaanu eng'we muchiiririre busa nende ohuhola bi bakuuka beeng'we bi bachaakisa hale.
40023033	Eng'we enjuha, handi abaana be ndemo! Munaone mutye ohuheengerwa omusango okw'ohuchia mu muliro kutasima?
40023034	Sakira njia ohubatumira abanabbi, nende abandu bakesi muno, nende abekesa b'amalako, abandi hwaabo mucha ohubeeta nimubahomerera hu musalabba, handi abandi mucha ohubanaala ehoba mu Sinagoogi cheeng'we, nimubayiima ohubasaandia ohutula mu siko silala ohwoola mu siindi.
40023035	Awo niwo mani, amabaanga k'abolerefu boosi akediswa hu syaalo, kahabeemeho ohutulira elalira hu mabaanga ka Abbeli ohwoola hu mabaanga ka Sakariya omwaana wa Bbarakia, yimweteera akati-kaati w'esifwo syolerefu nende alutaari.
40023036	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, esinyaaso sino syoosi sichia ohwiicha hu luse luno!
40023037	“Aaa bae! Eng'we aba Yerusaalemu, abeeta abanabbi, handi abahuya amakina abandu babatumiirwe! Ndahakesaho amahabi maangi muno ohubabuusa alala mbabwiihe koti lu ngoho yibwiha obumwiinyu bwayo mu mbaya chayo, nae mwahaya ohufukiirira.
40023038	Boneho enyumba ya Nasae eyo koti luyicha ohwebwaabwa, yidong'e koti ekuunda!
40023039	Mani mbaboolera endi, haba simuchia ohumbonaho handi, ohwoola lu mwahaboole muti, ‘Akiniswe oyo owiicha mu liita ly' Omwaami.’ ”
40024001	Yesu niyali awao natula mu nyumba y'amalaamo, abeeki bae beecha bamwekesa koti lu nyumba ya Nasae eyo yombahwa bulai.
40024002	Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Eng'we mubona ebiindu bino byoosi koti lubiri? Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, libulao ekina licha ohudong'a hu liindi nilitaagumuulwe.”
40024003	Yesu niyali niyehaale hu lugulu lwa Olibeti, abeeki bae beecha yali mu bweekisi, bamusaba nibaboola bati, “Tuboolereho ludaalo lweene lu biindu bino byahakwiireo, handi halolero siina ahalyekesa ohwiicha hwao nende enjakamo y'esyaalo?”
40024004	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mweliinde omuundu yeesi ahaye ohubabachirisa abakose.
40024005	Olwohuba, abandu bangi baheeche mu liita lyaange nibaboola bati, ‘Niise Kristo,’ mani bacha ohukosa abandu bangi.
40024006	Handi mwahawulire ebiita by'aambi nende eby'eyale, nae mutesinduha daawe, olwohuba bino nibyo ebiindu bihoyeere obubao, nae enjakamo y'esyaalo nayo yisisiiri ohwoola.
40024007	Olwohuba, esyaalo silala syahaseete esiindi, handi obutuki bwosi bwahaseete obutuki bundi. Handi wahakweeo enjala nende ohutengereha hw'esyaalo mu bituundu biingi.
40024008	Bino byoosi nihwo ohuchaaka busa hw'ohusaanda, koti obuchuuni butaangira omwaana naali aambi ohwibulwa.
40024009	“Mani bacha ohubasandia, babeete nende ohubeeta; Handi enjia choosi chicha ohubasyuula hu lw'eliita lyaange.
40024010	Mani abandu bangi bacha ohulehuulira efukiirira, mani balye mu basyaabwe olukwe, mani bamale basyulane abeene-na-beene.
40024011	Nae abanabbi b'obubacha bangi bacha ohwiicha babache abangi, bamale babakose.
40024012	Mani, koti lu huhola ebibi hwemeedere, awo nilwo lu hudahana hwaabandu baangi hucha ohuchalaala.
40024013	Nae, omuundu wahagumire ebidinyu ebyo ohwoola hu njakamo, niye owahaone.
40024014	Handi Emboosi Ndayi y'Obwaami bwa Nasae buno, yicha ohwekeswa mu syaalo syoosi. Sino sibe esyohuboneraho eyiri abandu boosi, hu njakamo y'esyaalo yimale yoole.
40024015	“Mani nimubonaanga amatichasi ka amasira omunabbi Danieri kayalomalomaho hale niketengeehe mu sifwo sy'olerefu, (omuundu osoma emboosi chino, yekute amahulundu kacho),
40024016	mani abandu bali mu Buyudaaya beeruhire mu ngulu.
40024017	Nae omuundu wahabe hu sirama sy'enyumba, haba siyahehe aasi ohubukula ebiri mu nyumba yae.
40024018	Handi omuundu wahabe mundalo, haba siyahakobole engo ohweenda engubo chae.
40024019	Chahakaane muno abahasi baliba asito, mu ndaalo echo, alala nende abahasi baliba nende abaana badoto basinuuna!
40024020	Nae eng'we mwekongooye busa ebiha by'ohwiruhiramo hw'eng'we, bihaye obubao mu ndaalo ch'emboo y'omunyiti, kata hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato!
40024021	Olwohuba ebiha ebyo husaanda hw'amakana hucha obubao ohutabechaangao ohutula esyaalo ni siloongwa ohwoola bulaanu buti, handi sihwahabeeo ehabi liindi daawe.
40024022	Handi endaalo echo chiba nichitahendeeswaho, abulao omuundu yeesi owahaonere daawe. Nae hu lw'obulayi bw'abandu badoole ba Nasae, endaalo echo chahendeswaho.
40024023	Mani omuundu yeesi nababoolera ati, ‘Mubone Kristo, nguno!’ Kata ati, ‘Ngula’ - mutasifukiriraanga.
40024024	Olwohuba wahabeeo abelaanga Kristo bataali badyeri, nende abelanga abanabbi bataali badyeri; bacha ohwoola baholeenge eby'amayia biingi by'ohubachirisa abandu, nga bachiririra nisinyaliha ohukosa kata abadoole ba Nasae.
40024025	Mani mweliinde, mbawo malire ohubaboolera bino oludaalo olwo nilutoola.
40024026	Sakira, nibababoolera bati, ‘Boneho ngula ali mu sichiimi sira,’ mutachichaangayo; handi ni baboola bati, ‘Boneho ngula ali mu bigoro by'omukati w'enyumba, mutasifukiriraanga.’
40024027	Olwohuba koti lu lumesu lw'efula lumesuha ohutula ebukwe ohwoola emumbo, nilwo nasilala lu hwiicha hw'Omwaana w'Omuundu hucha ohuba.
40024028	Olwohuba, yi siindu syoosi sifwiira, awo niwo yi eswi chebuusira alala.
40024029	“ ‘Ohusaanda hw'endaalo echo nihwahawe huti; elyuuba licha ohwirima, handi omwoosi sikwahaduhe. Ening'ining'i chahabulunguhe ohutula Mukulu, handi amaani ko Mukulu kacha ohudengaana.’
40024030	Awo niwo ahalolero h'omwaana w'Omuundu hacha ohubonehera Mukulu, handi enjia choosi echohusyaalo chicha ohulira handi chicha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu nakobolera hu maleesi byo Mukulu naali nende amaani alala nende oluyaali luhoongo muno.
40024031	Mani achia ohutuma ba malaika bae ohuubba olwiika nende ekono hoongo, mani babuuse alala abadoole bae ohutula mu mbeka ch'esyaalo choosi, ohutula hu mbeka ndala y'ekulu ohwoola hu yindi.
40024032	“Bulaanu mweekere hu musaala kw'omusabbibbu. Esaga ly'akwo nilitusa amasaafu madoto liti, eng'we mu manya busa muti, endaalo ch'omubasu chiri aambi.
40024033	Sakira eng'we mwesi nimubona ebiindu bino byoosi, mucha ohumanya muti, ali aambi ohwoola, ali hu siruwa bweene.
40024034	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno siluchia huwaao ebiindu bino byoosi nibiteholeha.
40024035	Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwaao, nae emboosi change haba sichahaweeo daawe.
40024036	“Nae oludaalo lweene olwo, kata ebiha byeene, abulao omuundu omanyire, kata bamalaika bo Mukulu, kata Omwaana ohutusaho Latang'ene yeng'ene niye omanyire.
40024037	Koti lubyali mu ndaalo cha Nowa, handi nilwo nasilala lu bicha ohuba hu ludaalo lu mwaana w'Omuundu yahechereho.
40024038	Olwohuba, oludaalo lwa maachi k'ofwomboole, nilusiiri ohwoola, abandi bali nibalya, nibang'wa, abasaacha nibadeehya, abahasi nibadeeha, ohwoola hu ludaalo lu Nowa yengirira mu lyaato,
40024039	nae haba sibanyala ohumanya ohwoola lu maachi k'ofwomboole keecha kaabamira, nasilala nilwo lusyahabe hu ludaalo lu mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohwichiraho.
40024040	Ebiha ebyo, abasaacha babiri bahabe mu ndalo, mulala bahamubukule, nae owaasye bamuleha.
40024041	Abahasi babiri bahabe nibasia hu lukina, bahabukuleho mulala nae owundi adoong'e.
40024042	Sakira mube abetekefu, olwohuba mukoterwe oludaalo lu Mwaami yahechereho.
40024043	Nae sino musimanye muti, omwenengo aba niyamanya ebiha by'esiro bi mwiibi yecheramo, aba yahetekehe, mani yahaya ohukanya omwiibi yafunaka enyumba yae.
40024044	Sakira eng'we mwesi mube abetekefu, olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohwiicha mu biha bimutamubaasiramo.
40024045	“Nae muundu siina oba omuhalabani mukesi-kesi handi omwesikwa, yi mweneengo wae ataawo ohuliinda edaala lyae? Oyo niye omuundu obeeresa abandu bomungo omwo eby'ohulya mu biha bihoyera.
40024046	Omuhalabani oyo, aba ali owehabi, yi mweneengo wae naaba naakobola, amwakaana naahola emirimo chae echo.
40024047	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omwenengo wae achia ohumuhola aliinde emyaandu chae choosi.
40024048	Nae niwichuhira omuhalabani yaba omubi, omweene yachaaka ohuboola mu mwooyo kwae ati, omwenengo wae ahiindire ohukobola,
40024049	mani yachaaka ohuhuya abahalabani basye, handi yachaaka ohulya nende ohung'wa alala nende abameesi,
40024050	omwenengo wae aba achia ohukaluha hu ludaalo lw'atabasirisiramo nende mu biha by'atamanyire.
40024051	Mani omwenengo oyo achia ohumusaandia, amale amube esinyaaso alala nende abebachirisi, eyo niyo yibacha ohulirira alala n'ohwesya ameeno.
40025001	“Sakira Obwaami bwo Mukulu bulifwaananisibwa nende abahaana ehumi, abakiinga amataara kaabwe, bacha ohubukaanira omweeya musaacha.
40025002	Bataanu, baba abasiru, nae bataanu baba abakesi.
40025003	Abahaana bataanu basiru bakiinga amataara kaabwe, nae sibakiinga amafuta daawe.
40025004	Nae abahaana bataanu bakesi, bakiinga echupa cha amafuta alala nende amataara kaabwe.
40025005	Nae, koti lu mweya yahiinda ohwoola, boosi beecha bakuunuha, endoolo chamala chabayira.
40025006	Mani musiro akati, esihu syechiira nibaboola bati, ‘Bone, omweeya nguno yolere! Mutule mumubukanire!’
40025007	Abweene awo, abahaana abo boosi basiingira mani bawambia amataara kaabwe.
40025008	Nae abahaana basiru beecha baboolera abakesi bati, ‘Eng'we mutubeeho hu mafuta keeng'we, mbano amatara keefwe kadaha ohusiima.’
40025009	Nae abahaana bakesi bakobolamo bati, ‘Wichuhira amafuta kahuli nako kahaya ohutumala, efwe naang'we. Silayi muche eyiri abakusa, abeene mwekulire.’
40025010	Nae nibali bachiire ohukula amafuta, omweeya musaacha yeecha yoola, mani abali nibamalire ohwetekeha, beengira nae musidyaalo sy'obweeya; bamala bekalawo omulyaango.
40025011	Nae lunyuma abahaana bandi bala beecha bakobola mani baboola bati, ‘Omwaami twiikulireo.’
40025012	Nae yakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, haba simbamanyire.’
40025013	Sakira eng'we mwetekehe, olwohuba simumanyire oludaalo kata nende ebiha.
40025014	“Obwaami bwo Mukulu buchia ohufwaananisibwa nende omwenengo wundi owali achia olukeendo eyale, mani yalaanga abahalaabani bae, yabalehera obuyiinda bwae babuliinde;
40025015	yabeeresa omuundu mulala etalanta chitaanu, owundi etalanta chibiri, nae handi omuundu wundi etalanta ndala ohweema hu maani ka buli muundu. Nae omwenengo oyo naamala achia hulukeendo lwae.
40025016	Omuundu yibaba etalanta chitaanu, yacha bwaangu yachurusiramo, mani yeecha yanyoola etalanta chitaanu chiindi.
40025017	Omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chibiri, yesi yeecha yafuna etalanta chibiri chiindi,
40025018	nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta ndala yacha yayaba eliina muloba yaasiihamo obuyiinda bw'omwenengo wae.
40025019	Mani lunyuma, ebiha bileeyi nibibitireo, omwenengo w'abahosi abo yakobola, yachaaka ohubaliirira emyaandu chae chiyali nabaleheere.
40025020	Mani omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chitaanu yeecha yatusayo etalanta chitaanu chiindi naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, wamberesa etalanta chitaanu, mbano ndanyola chitaanu chiindi.’
40025021	Omweenengo wae yakobolamo naboola ati, ‘Webale muno, omuhalaabani mulai handi omwesikwa; weekese obwesikwa bwao mu biindu bidiidi, njia ohuhubeeresa ebiindi bihira hoo; yingira mu sangaalo ly'Omwaami wao.’
40025022	Nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta chibiri naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, wamberesa etalanta chibiri, mbano funire chibiri chiindi.’
40025023	Omweenengo wae yamukobolamo naboola ati, ‘Webale muno, omuhalaabani mulai handi omwesikwa; weekese obwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi, njia ohuhubeeresa ebiindi bihira hoo; yingira, mu sangaalo ly'Omwaami wao.’
40025024	Nae omuundu yibaberesa etalanta ndala yesi naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, manyire endi oli omuundu mwomeranu. Okesa yotataakire esiindu syoosi, handi wabuusa yotabakaale.
40025025	Sakira obuti bwandiira ndaacha ndaabiiha etalanta yao muloba. Mani bukula ebyao, mbano hukalusiire.’
40025026	Nae omwenengo wae yamukobolamo ati, ‘Ewe omuhalaabani mubi handi omukata, hane wamanya oti ngesa yitataakire, handi mbuusa yitabakaale?
40025027	Lwasiina siwabukula eseende change wachibiiha yibabiihanga eseende, mani nimba ningoboole, sindahaduhaane ebiindu byaange nibyemeedereho?
40025028	Mani nibiri bityo, mumutuseho etalanta eyo, muberese oyo oli nende etalanta ehumi.
40025029	Olwohuba omuundu yeesi oli nabyo, achia ohumedwaho ebiindi, mani abe nende ebihiraho byadaha. Nae omuundu otaali nende esiindu syoosi-syoosi, kata syali nasyo bacha ohumutusaho.'
40025030	Mani omuhalaabani owuma obuhoonyi oyo, mumusukune erwaanyi mu sirima siingi; yibacha ohulirira nibeesia ameeno.’
40025031	“Mani Omwaana W'omuundu nalikobola mu luyaali lwae, alala nende bamalaika bae boosi, achia ohwihala hu sisaala syae sy'oluyaali sy'obutuki.
40025032	Enjia choosi chaheeche chebuusira mu moni wae, mani achia ohukabulamo abandu amahabi kabiri, koti lu omwaayi lwakabula amakoondi nende embusi.
40025033	Achia ohuta amakoondi hu muhono kwae muluungi, nae embusi hu muhono mukooda.
40025034	Mani omutuki oyo achia ohuboolera abo abali hu muhono kwae muluungi ati, ‘Eng'we ba Lata yabeeresa ehabi, mwiche mubukaane obwaami bubabatekehera ohutula ohuloongwa hw'esyaalo;
40025035	olwohuba ndali numwa enjala, mwaamba eby'ohulya; ndali numwa obuluwo, mwaamba esy'ohung'wa; ndali omukeni mweng'we, mwambukanira;
40025036	ndali mbula esy'ohwefwaala, mwafwaasa; ndali omulwaae, mweecha mwambona; ndali mu mboye, mweecha mwaangeniya.’
40025037	Nae abolerefu abo bamukobolamo bati, ‘Omwaami, liina luhwahubona enjala niyihuluma, hwahuliisa, kose nolumwa obuluwo, hwahubeeresa esyohung'wa?
40025038	Handi liina luhwahubona nolwaala, kose nowuma esyohwefwaala hwahufwaasa?
40025039	Handi liina luhwahubona nolwaala, kose nooli mu mboye hwahukeniya?’
40025040	Nae Omutuki oyo achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, lumwahola esyo eyiri oyo ohiramo obudiidi hu bandu bange, mwaholera ese.’
40025041	Mani achia ohuboolera abo abali hu muhono kwae mukooda ati, ‘Mbweere eyi, eng'we abalaamwa! Mwingire mu muliro kutasima okwatekeherwa Sitaani nende bamalaika bae;
40025042	olwohuba enjala yali yinuma, mwahaya ohumberesa esy'ohulya, obuluwo bwali buunuma, mwahaya ohumberesa esy'ohung'wa,
40025043	ndali omukeni, mwahaya ohunjakaanira; ndali mbula esy'ohwefwaala, mwahaya ohufwaasa; ndali omulwaae, handi ndali mu mboye, mwahaya ohungeniya.’
40025044	Mani abo bosi bacha ohukobolamo bati, ‘Omwaami, liina luhwahubona enjala niyihuluma, kose obuluwo nibuhuluma, kose nooli omukeni, kose nowuma esy'ohwefwaala kose nolwaala kose nooli mu mboye, mani hwahaya ohuhuhoonya?’
40025045	Nae achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, koti lumutahola esyo eyiri mulala ohiramo obudiidi hu bandu bange bano, haba simwasiholera.’
40025046	Mani bacha ohutula awo, beengire musinyaaso esitaakama, nae aboolerefu bahache mu Bulamu butaakama.”
40026001	Olwoola, Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma ebiindu bino byoosi, yabolera abeeki bae ati,
40026002	“Mumanyire muti endaalo chibiri nichiwa, esidyaalo sya Paasaka sichia ohwoola, mani Omwaana W'omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu bacha ohumuhomerera hu musalabba.”
40026003	Mani Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abemirisi ba bandu beecha bahung'anira mu lwaanyi lwa Omulaamisi muhuluundu olaangwa Kayaafa,
40026004	mani bahola olukwe lwohudiira Yesu bamwiite mu ngiso.
40026005	Nae beecha baboola bati, “Hutahola sino hu ludaalo luhuluundu, olwohuba abandu banyala ohukwaamo eesisi”
40026006	Yesu niyali e Bbetani mu nyumba ya Simooni, owali yalwaalaho obulwaae bwa makere,
40026007	omuhasi wundi yeecha eyiri Yesu naali nende echupa ya mafuta kesing'aari handi ak'ebbeyi y'akulu, mani yakamuchuha hu mutwe. Yesu yali niyehaale naalya.
40026008	Nae abeeki bae nibabona batyo, haba sibawulira bulai, baboola bati, “Ohunyaasa amafuta mutyo hwaasi?
40026009	Olwohuba amafuta kano bahakakusiremo ebbeyi yaakulu muno, mani eseende chitulamo baachikabira abamanani.”
40026010	Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire bino yababoolera ati, “Omuhasi wuno mumufwambya siina? Olwohuba yaholeere esiindu silayi muno.
40026011	Buli siha muli nende abamanani, nae simuchia ohuba naange ebiha byoosi.
40026012	Olwohuba omuhasi wuno yanjuhireho amafuta kano natekeha omubiri kwaange ohuchia ohusiihwa.
40026013	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli abundu woosi, mu syaalo syoosi, yibaneekesenge Emboosi Endayi yino, esiindu siyaholeere sino, bacha ohusilomalomaangaho ohumwichulisa.”
40026014	Olwoola, mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri, olaangwa Yuda Yisikarioti yacha eyiri Abalaamisi bahuluundu,
40026015	mani yabateeba ati, “Munamberesa siina ni mbadiisa Yesu?” Nae bamubalira eseende chefeesa ebituundu amahumi kadatu bamubeeresa.
40026016	Ohutula ebiha ebyo, Yuda yachaaka ohukiiya engira yaanyala ohuliira mu Yesu olukwe.
40026017	Bulaanu, hu ludaalo lutaangira lw'esidyaalo sy'emigaati chobusye obutaali bubbaahe, abeeki ba Yesu beecha yali bamuteeba bati, “Odaha huhutekehere ena owohuliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka?”
40026018	Nae yababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko, ow'omuundu wundi mu muboolere muti, ‘Omweekesa aboola ati, ebiha byaange mbawo byoolere; njia ohuliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange mu nyumba yao.’ ”
40026019	Mani abeeki bahola koti lu Yesu yababoolera, bacha batekeha esidyaalo sya Paasaka.
40026020	Nibwoola engoloobe, Yesu yehala alala nende abeeki ehumi-na-babiri, bachaaka ohulya.
40026021	Mani nibali balya, Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi mulala hw'eng'we achia ohudyaamo olukwe.”
40026022	Abeki bawuka muno, bachaaka ohumuteeba syamulala-mulala bati, “Omwaami, oli ohuboola ese, kose?”
40026023	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Oyo otoonga naange mu saani ndala niye ochia ohundyaamo olukwe.
40026024	Mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohufwa koti lu byandiiko byolerefu bimuboolaho, nae chakaanire oyo ochia ohulya mu mwaana w'Omuundu olukwe! Byahahirire omuundu oyo obuteebulwa!”
40026025	Abweene awo Yuda omuhobi yalomalomera akulu ati, “Omweekesa, oli ohuboola ese, kose?” Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mbao omweene oboolere.”
40026026	Bulaanu nibali basiilya, Yesu yabukula omugaati, yaakusabira ehabi, yaakumekula-mekula mani yaakuberesa abeeki bae naboola ati, “Mubukule mulye, kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange.”
40026027	Handi yabukula esikoombe, mani niyamala ohwebasa, yasiberesa abeeki bae naboola ati, “Mubukule, mung'we husino mweesi;
40026028	olwohuba kano niko amabaanga kange aka elakano akacha ohwidiha hulwa bandu bangi ohuleherwamo ebibi.
40026029	Mbaboolera endi siinjia hung'wa handi hu syaamo sy'efwiini ohwoola hu ludaalo lundahang'weereho efwiini njiaha alala nang'we mu Obwaami bwa Lata.”
40026030	Mani nibamala ohweemba olweembo lw'ohufumia Nasae, batula bacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti.
40026031	Abweene awo, Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweesi mucha ohwiruha mundehe syeng'ene esiro sya leero, olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Njia ohuhubba omwaayi, mani amakoondi k'omusidwooli kasalaane.’
40026032	Nae nimalire ohusyuuha, njia ohubataangiriramo ohuchia e Galilaaya.”
40026033	Peetero yalomalomera alafu namuboolera ati, “Kata nende abandi boosi bahulehe, ese haba siinjia huhuleha daawe.”
40026034	Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, esiro sy'olwaleero sino, engoho niyisisiiri ohuholyooha, onaba wundekaanire amahabi kadatu.”
40026035	Peetero nae yamuboolera ati, “Kata nihuli ohufwa naawe, haba siinjia ohuhwekaana.” Mani nilwo nasilala lu beeki bandi bosi baboola.
40026036	Mani Yesu yamala yacha nende abeeki bae mu sifwo silaangwa siti, Getesemaane, yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Eng'we mudong'e ano, njieho aala ndekongooye.”
40026037	Niyamala atyo, yabukula Peetero nende abaana ba Sebbedaayo babiri yacha nabo. Engisa yeecha yamudiira muno, yaba nende ohwelalihira hungi.
40026038	Mani yababoolera ati, “Engisa enyiingi yindi hu mwooyo, kata yinyala ohunjita-bwiita. Eng'we mudong'e ano mani muliinde ni naange.”
40026039	Mani niyasudaho budiidi mu moni ati, yenama, yageng'a aasi obweeni yekongooya naboola ati, “Lata, nisinyaliha, esikoombe syohusaandisibwa sino sihaye ohunjolaho; nae sitaba koti lu ese ndaha, ohutusaho sibe koti lu ewe odaha.”
40026040	Nae yakaluha eyiri abeeki bae yabanyoola nibakona mani yaboolera Peetero ati, “Simunyala ohumokaho naange kata esaa ndala yong'ene?
40026041	Muliinde, mani mwekongooye hu muhaye ohukwa muhuhemwa. Omwooyo kweenya nae omubiri nikwo omukata.”
40026042	Handi ehabi lyohubiri yasingira yacha ohwekongooya naboola ati, “Lata, esikoombe sino, nisitachia ohundulaho nitasing'weere, leha syodaha siholebwe.”
40026043	Yakobola handi yanyoola nibakona olwohuba emoni chaabwe chali chisidoye, chichuule endoolo.
40026044	Mani yeecha yabaleha awo, handi yacha ohwekongooya ehabi lyohudatu naboola emboosi nasilala echo.
40026045	Yakobola eyiri abeeki bae mani yaboola ati, “Eng'we musikonere nimwewuluhira busa? Bone! Ebiha mbano byahoola eby'ohuliiramo Omwaana W'omuundu olukwe, bamudiise mu mahono kaababi.
40026046	Musiingire huweeo; omuhobi nguno amalire ohwoola.”
40026047	Yali asilomalomaanga atyo, Yuda, mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri niyoola. Yaba ali nende esidiyiha sy'abandu nibakiingire engaanga nende endabuhi nibatula eyiri Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abemirisi b'Abayudaaya.
40026048	Bulaanu omuhobi oyo yali amalire ohuwuliirisania nende esidiyiha esyo ohubabeeresa ahalolero mbwe, “Oyo yindaakwe musirifu niye yimwenya, mumukweho mumudire.”
40026049	Yuda niyoola yachooma Yesu naboola ati, “Omweekesa, emireembe kibe naawe!” Mani yamukwa musirifu.
40026050	Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Wasyaange, siina esihuleteere?” Mani beecha bakwa hu Yesu bamudiira.
40026051	Nae bone, mulala hu abo abali nende Yesu, yachoolayo olugaanga yaatemaho ohutwi hw'omuhalabani w'Omulaamisi muhuluundu.
40026052	Nae Yesu yaamuboolera ati, “Kalusa olugaanga lwao musilaalo syalwo, olwohuba abo boosi abehonyera olugaanga, balifwa olugaanga.
40026053	Mubaasa muti sinyala ohwekongooya Laata yamberesa obuhoonyi, ni abweene awo atuma eye lya bamalaika emikaanda kihira ehumi-na-kibiri?
40026054	Nae nibyahabeere bityo, ebyandiiko byolerefu ebiboola biti, bino bihoyeere ohuholebwa, byaholereere bitye?”
40026055	Esiha esyo, Yesu yalomaloma nende esidiyiha esyo naboola ati, “Mwiichire nende engaanga alala nende endabuhi ohundiira, koti abechera omwiibi? Buli ludaalo mbechaanga ninjekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae nae husiina simundiraanga.
40026056	Nae bino byoosi biholebwe hu bi banabbi bandiika byolerere abweene.” Mani abeeki boosi beecha beeruha baleha Yesu yeng'ene.
40026057	Abo abali badiirire Yesu beecha bamuyira ewa Kayaafa omulaamisi muhuluundu, yi beekesa bamalako nende abemirisi babandu bali bebusiire.
40026058	Nae Peetero yamulondaho enyuma ohwoola mulwaanyi lw'omulaamisi muhuluundu oyo. Yengira mulwaanyi yehala aasi nende abaliindi nadaha ohubona koti lu buli siindu sinaabe.
40026059	Bulaanu Omulaamisi Muhuluundu nende ab'esiina boosi bakesaho ohukonyeresa obuloli bw'obubacha obudiira hu Yesu obunyala ohukera bamwiita;
40026060	nae haba sibanyoolaho esiindu syoosi. Kata katyo mbwe abandu bangi bakesaho ohulomaloma ebyobubacha hu Yesu. Lunyuma abandu babiri bamala beema,
40026061	baboola bati, “Omuundu wuno yaboola ati, ‘Nyala ohulikula enyumba ya Nasae yino, handi ndayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu.’ ”
40026062	Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yasingira yateeba Yesu ati, “Obulaho nende esyohukobolamo kata silala? Siina syeene si bano bahufwaambya?”
40026063	Yesu nae yabuleera-buwuleera. Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yakobolamo naboola ati, “Mu liita lya Nasae Mulamu, ndaha wechube: Tuboolere nooli Kristo Omwaana wa Nasae.”
40026064	Yesu nae Yamuboolera ati, “Niiwe oboolere otyo. Nae mbaboolera endi, ohutula olwaleero, mucha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu niyehaale hu muhono muluungi kwoyo oli n'obunyala bwoosi, handi niyeechera hu maleesi ko Mukulu.”
40026065	Mani Omuhulundu w'Abalaamisi, yataandula engubo chae naboola ati, “Ngandi enomanoma yino y'ohufwoola Nasae. Husiina handi hukoonya obuloli bundi? Mbao abeene mwewuliirire emboosi chae embi echo.
40026066	Nae eng'we muheengao mutye?” Bakobolamo bati, “Ahoyera ohufwa.”
40026067	Mani abweene awo bachaaka ohumufuuchaho amate mu moni alala nende ohumuhuya; nae abandi bamupaama nibaboola bati,
40026068	“Ewe Kristo, tutumbulire, Wiina mweene ohuhuyire?”
40026069	Esiha esyo, Peetero yali yehaale erwaanyi mu lwaanyi, nae omuhaana mulala hu bahalaabani b'Omulaamisi Muhuluundu yeecha yali yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wesi obeere nende Yesu Omugalilaaya.”
40026070	Nae Peetero yekaana muno mu moni wa bandu boosi ati, “Ese ngoterwe byooli ohuboola ebyo.”
40026071	Niyamala yasingira yaachia musiruwa. Omuhaana wundi yamubona awo, yaboolera abali beemere awo ati “Omusaacha wuno yesi abere nende Yesu Omunasareeti.”
40026072	Peetero handi yekaana niyechuba ati, “Omuundu oyo, ese haba simumanyire.”
40026073	Ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, abali nibeemere awo, beecha eyiri Peetero bamuboolera bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, ewe oli mulala hu bandu bae, olwohuba engeri yolomalomeramo yihubuula.”
40026074	Handi Peetero yachaaka ohwekaana niyechuba ati, “Omusaacha oyo ese mukoterwe.” Abweene awo, edaaywa niyiholyooha.
40026075	Mani Peetero yechulisa bi Yesu yaboola ati, “Edaaywa niyisisiiri ohuholyooha, onaabe wundekaanire amahabi kadatu.” Mani yaatula erwaanyi yaalira muno.
40027001	Nibwahya mumaherebeende, abahuluundu ba Balaamisi boosi, nende Abemeresi babandu beehala bawuliirisania engira y'ohwiita Yesu;
40027002	mani bamuboya bacha bamudiisa Pilaato owali Gafana.
40027003	Nae Yuda omuhobi, niyabona ati bamalire ohuheengera Yesu omusango kw'ohufwa, yefunaka mani yakobosera abahuluundu b'Abalaamisi nende Abemirisi ba bandu, eseende ch'efeesa, ebituundu amahumi kadatu, naboola ati,
40027004	“Holere esibi muhulya olukwe amabaanga kataaliho omusango.” Nabo baboola bati, “Ebyo nibyo siina hw'efwe? Ebyo byao omweene.”
40027005	Mani Yuda nasukuna aasi ebituundu by'efeesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yawaawo yacha yemika.
40027006	Nae abahuluundu b'Abalaamisi, babukula ebituundu by'efeesa, baboola bati, “Sisihoyerwa ohuta eseende chino musibiihiro olwohuba seende ch'amabaanga nicho.”
40027007	Beecha bawuliirisania, mani baachikulamo eloba hu muloongi w'endamu, elyohusihangamo Abateende.
40027008	Sakira eloba elyo balilaanga eloba ly'amabaanga nolwaleero.
40027009	Mani, bi munabbi Yeremiya yaboola byolerera biti, “Mani babukula ebituundu by'efeesa amahumi kadatu, obukusi bu baana Bayisirayiri bandi bamutaaho,
40027010	mani bachehonyera ohukula eloba ly'omuloongi w'endamu koti Nasae luyandagira.”
40027011	Abweene awo, Yesu yeema mu moni wa Gafana; nae Gafana yaamuteeba ati, “Niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Omweene niiwe owahaboola otyo.”
40027012	Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abemeresi babandu nibali bamwaayirisa, siyabakobolamo esiindu syoosi.
40027013	Mani Pilaato yamuboolera ati, “Ewe haba sowulira koti bahwayirisa mu biindu biingi bino?”
40027014	Nae Yesu siyakobolamo emboosi yoosi kata hu musango mulala; sino syawukia Gafana muno.
40027015	Hu buli sidyaalo sya Paasaka, yali esaambo ya Gafana ohubalehuliraanga omuboye mulala, yi bandu baba nibasabire.
40027016	Mani mu biha ebyo, bali n'omuboye w'esaambo mbi muno olaangwa Bbarabba.
40027017	Mani nibaba nibebuusire, Pilaato yabateeba ati, “Mudaha mbalehuulire wiina mweene? Bbarabba, kose Yesu olaangwa Kristo?”
40027018	Olwohuba yali amanyire ati embaliha yaabwe niyo eyakera bamudiisa Yesu.
40027019	Handi Pilaato niyali yehaale hu sisala sy'ohuheengeraho emisango, omuhasi wae yeecha yaamutumira emboosi ati, “Otaholaho esiindu syoosi hu muundu otaliho obubi oyo, olwohuba mbeere nende obunyaahani bungi nimulootaho musiro sy'olwaleero.”
40027020	Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abemeresi ba bandu bawooya esidiyiha sy'abandu basabe Pilaato abalehulire Bbarabba, nae Yesu anyaasibwe.
40027021	Gafana yababoolera ati, “Wiina mweene hu bano bombi yimudaha mbalehuulire?” Mani bakobolamo bati, “Bbarabba.”
40027022	Pilaato yabateeba ati, “Nae Yesu olaangwa Kristo, muhole endye?” Boosi baboola bati, “Leha ahomererwe.”
40027023	Nae Pilaato nabateeba ati, “Aholere sibi siina?” Nae bemeeda ohuwaasira akulu ni baboola bati, “Leha ahomererwe.”
40027024	Mani Pilaato niyabona ati sibimuhoonya ohuchiiririra nende ebiteebo, olwohuba abandu bali bemeeda busa ohusasakala, yabukula amaachi, yesaaba amahono, abandu boosi ni babona naboola ati, “Mbulaho omusango kwoosi hu Makulu k'omuundu wuno; abeene mubone esy'ohuhola.”
40027025	Nae abandu boosi bakobolamo bati, “Leha amabaanga kae kabe hw'efwe nende hu baana beefwe!”
40027026	Mani Pilaato yamala yabalehulira Bbarabba. Nae nibamala ohunaala Yesu ehoba, yabadiisa Yesu bache bahomerere.
40027027	Mani Abasirikari ba Gafana bayira Yesu mu dooho lya Pilaato elilaangibwa 'Praetorium' mani eye lyoosi lyeecha lyamwebodohania.
40027028	Mani bamufwaalula engubo chae, bamufwaasa ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi.
40027029	Mani nibasiinga engata y'amawa nibamufwaasa hu mutwe koti esitweetwe, mani nibamudiisa omukwajo mu muhono kwae muluungi. Mani nibasigama mu moni wae, nibamuhoomolera nibaboola bati “Yindira, ewe omutuki w'Abayudaaya!”
40027030	Mani bamufuchaho amate, handi baabukula ekada bamuhuya hu mutwe.
40027031	Nibamala ohumuhoomolera batyo, beecha bamufwaalulamo ekaanju, bamufwaasa engubo chae cheene, mani bamutusa erwaanyi bache bamuhomerere.
40027032	Nibali nibatula erwaanyi, babukaanana nende omusaacha otula e Sireeni olaangwa Simooni. Mani beecha bamuyiika ohwedwiiha omusalabba kwa Yesu.
40027033	Nae niboola abundu alaangwa ati, Gologoosa (amahulundu kasyo mbwe, Esifwo sy'ebiyaanga),
40027034	baabeeresa Yesu efwiini yibasasiremo ekaha; nae niyayihombaho, yahaya ohuying'wa.
40027035	Nae nibamala ohumuhomerera, bakabana engubo chae nibachubbira eha;
40027036	mani beecha beehala awo ohumuliinda.
40027037	Nae akulu w'omutwe kwae nibataao omusango kumufwambya nikusoma kuti, “Wuno niye Yesu, Omutuki w'Abayudaaya.”
40027038	Abweene awo baba bahomererewo abeebi babiri alala nende Yesu, mulala hu muhono muluungi nae owundi hu muhono mukooda.
40027039	Mani abandu bali nibabitiraangao bayuuya busa emitwe
40027040	nibaboola bati, “Ewe owali onyala ohulikula enyumba ya Nasae handi wayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu, wewonie omweene! Nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, bulaanu yiha otule hu musalabba.”
40027041	Mungeri nasilala eyo niyo yi Balaamisi bahuluundu, nende Abekesa bamalako alala nende Abemeresi babandu, bamuhoomolera, nibaboola bati,
40027042	“Oyo yawonia abandi, nae omweene haba saanyala hweonia. Oyo niye Omutuki w'Abayisirayiri; leha yeehe hu Musalabba mani huhumufukiiriremo.
40027043	Yesika mu Nasae, leha bulaanu Nasae amuwonie naaba namudaha; olwohuba yaboola ati, ‘Nise Omwaana wa Nasae.’ ”
40027044	Handi abeebi baba bahomereerwe alala nae bosi bamuhoomolera mu ngeri nasilala eyo.
40027045	Bulaanu ohutula esaa chisaasaba, esirima syadiira esyaalo syoosi ohwoola esaa chitaanu-na-chine.
40027046	Mani aambi w'esaa chitaanu-na-chine, Yesu yalira nende ekono ly'akulu ati, “Eli, Eli, lema sabach-thani?” Amahulundu keene mbwe, “Nasae wange, Nasae wange, lwasiina wunjwang'ire?”
40027047	Nae abandi hu bandu bali beemere awo nibawulira esyo, baboola bati, “Omuundu wuno nga mbawo ali ohulaanga Elija.”
40027048	Mulala hu bandu abo, yeruha bwaangu yabukula esyaangu, yaasiiniha mu fwiini yahaliha, yaasita hu kada, mani yaamubeeresa ang'we.
40027049	Nae abandi baboola bati, “Muliinde huboneho Elija naneeche yamuwonia.”
40027050	Nae Yesu yalira handi mu kono ly'akulu, mani yakwisa omwooyo.
40027051	Nae bone, engubo yomu nyumba ya Nasae, yataanduhamo akati, ohutula akulu ohwolera elalira aasi; mani esyaalo syeecha syateengereha, enyaanda chaadihana;
40027052	ebiriindwa byosi byekuha, handi emibiri ch'abandu ba Nasae bangi abali bafwa balamuha,
40027053	nae nibatula mu ng'ani Yesu naamalire ohusyuuha mu bafu, bacha mu siko syolerefu, mani babonehera abandu bandi.
40027054	Nae omusirikaari muhunuufu alala nende abo bayali nabo nibaliindire Yesu, nibabona ohutengereha hw'esyaalo, nende ebyo byoosi ebyeholeha, beecha batya muno baboola bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, wuno abere Omwaana wa Nasae!”
40027055	Awo wosi waliwo abahasi bangi, nibeemere nibewunjiraanga eyale. Bano nibo abali baloondere hu Yesu ohutula e Galilaaya nibamuhalaabaniraanga;
40027056	mwabo mwalimo Maria otula e Magadala, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo nende Yosefu, nende ng'ina baana ba Sebbedaayo.
40027057	Mani obwire nibweera, omusaacha muyiinda otula Arimaseya olaangwa Yosefu yeecha yoola; wuno yesi yali omweeki wa Yesu.
40027058	yacha eyiri Pilaato yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu. Mani Pilaato yalagira ati, bamubeerese omubiri kwa Yesu.
40027059	Yosefu yabukula omubiri, yaakuboya mu suuka lafu,
40027060	yamala yaakuta mu ng'ani yae njiaha, yibali babaachire mu lwaanda; mani yaasindikisa okukina kuhoongo yakwikalira hu ng'ani, yamala yawaawo.
40027061	Maria we Magadala, nende Maria wundi, bali baliwo nibehaale aasi nibewunjire esiriindwa.
40027062	Nibuhyere, oludaalo luloonda Olw'ohwetekehera, Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abafalisaayo bebuusira eyiri Pilaato,
40027063	mani baboola bati, “Omwaami, efwe hwichulisa koti omubacha oyo yaboola nasisiiri omulamu ati, ‘Oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, njia ohusyuuha handi.’
40027064	Sakira lagira baliinde esiriindwa bulai ohwoola hu ludaalo lwohudatu, ataali awo, abeeki bae banyala ohuchia bamwiibamo, mani bamala baboolera abandu bati, ‘ Asyuhiire mu bafu,’ mani obubacha busemberehayo bucha ohuba obubi muno ohuhiraho obwataangira.”
40027065	Pilaato yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muli nende Abasirikaari baliinde; muche mubone muti esiriindwa basiriinda bulai muno koti lu munyala.”
40027066	Mani bacha baaomera bulai ekina lyali hu siriindwa, bataao omusirikaari, babona bati buli siindu siri bulai bweene.
40028001	Bulaanu, oludaalo lwa Sabbaato niluweere, mumaherebeende kahyesa oludaalo lutaangira mu juma, Maria w'e Magadala nende Maria wundi, bacha ohubona esiriindwa.
40028002	Abweene awo, esyaalo syateengereha muno, olwohuba malaika wa Nasae yeha ohutula Mukulu, mani yeecha yaasindikisa ekina, yaalitusa hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa yaliihalaho.
40028003	Efwaani yae yali koti olumesu, handi engubo chae chali endafu koti amakina k'efula.
40028004	abaliindi nibamubona, batya muno, bateengereha, mani baba koti abafwiire.
40028005	Nae malaika yaboolera abahasi abo ati, “Mutatya daawe; olwohuba manyire endi muli ohukoonya Yesu yibahomerera.
40028006	Haba saali ano; amalire ohusyuuha koti luyaboola. Mwiiche mubone yi yali yeyaliise.
40028007	Mani muche bwaangu muboolere abeeki bae muti, amalire ohusyuuha mu bafu, ngula abatangiriremo ohuchia e Galilaaya; eyo niyo yimucha ohumubonera. Mbao malire ohubaboolera.”
40028008	Mani batula maangu muno hu siriindwa obuti nibubadiirire alala nende esangaalo, beeruha bacha baboolera abeeki bae.
40028009	Nae bone, Yesu yeecha yabukanana nabo mani yaboola ati, “Ehabi chibe nang'we!” Mani basuda yali bamudiira hu makulu, bamala bamwiinamira.
40028010	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mutatya daawe; muche muboolere abaloondi bange bache e Galilaaya, mani eyo niyo yibacha ohumbonera.”
40028011	Mani abahasi abo nibali basichichaanga, bone, Abasirikaari bandi hu bali baliindire esiriindwa, bacha mu siko, baboolera Abalaamisi bahuluundu buli siindu syoosi esyali syeholehe.
40028012	Nae Abalaamisi bahuluundu abo nibamala ohwebuusa alala nende Abemirisi ba bandu, beecha bafukiirisania ohuberesa Abasirikaari abo eseende nyiingi muno,
40028013	mani nibaboolera bati, “Muboolere abandu muti, ‘Abeki bae beechere esiro beeba omubiri kwae efwe nihukona.’
40028014	Nae Gafana nawulira bino, efwe hucha ohumwomiisa, mani hubone huti eng'we simukwa mu budinyu bwoosi.”
40028015	Abaliindi abo babukula eseende echo, bahola koti lu bababoola; mani ebyo nibyo bi Bayudaaya basiloonderera nolwaleero.
40028016	Abeki ehumi-na-mulala bacha e Galilaaya hu lugulu lu Yesu yali atekehe ohubukananirayo nabo.
40028017	Mani nibamubona, bakwa aasi bamwiinamira; nae abandi bali basisiiri nende ohukana-kana.
40028018	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Bamalire ohumberesa obunyala bwoosi Mukulu nende hu syaalo.
40028019	Sakira muche muhole abandu b'ebyaalo byoosi babe abeeki bange; mubabatiise mu liita lya Seefwe, nende ery'Omwaana, nende ery'Omwooyo Mwolerefu.
40028020	Mubeekese ohuloonda amalako koosi kandababeeresa, handi mumanye muti, ndi nang'we endaalo choosi ohwoola hu njakamo y'esyaalo.”
41001001	Ohuchaaka hw'Emboosi Ndai cha Yesu Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae.
41001002	Koti lu Yisaaya yandiika ati: “Bone, mbao nduma wamwaanda wange ahutangirire mu moni wao ahutereesere engira.
41001003	Ekono lyoyo ohumulira, musiparara niliboola liti: Mutereesere Omwaami engira; Mukolole emihoosi chae”
41001004	Awo niwo yi Yowaana Omubatiisi yabonehera musiparara, nayaala ohubatiisibwa hwohwefunaka hu bandu banyale ohuleherwamo ebibi byaabwe. Yowaana yabatisaanga abandu nabekesa ati, “Mwefunake, mubatisibwe Nasae abaleheremo ebibi byeeng'we.”
41001005	Mani abandu bangi batula mu syalo syoosi esyo mu Buyudaaya nende mu siko sye Yerusaalemu syoosi, baacha eyiri Yowaana, beyolobya ebibi byaabwe, mani yababatiisa mu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani.
41001006	Yowaana yefwalaanga engubo cho bwooya bw'engamia, handi yeboyaanga oluhoba lw'eseero mu sibuno, nae ebyohulya byae byalichingi esike nende obuuhi bw'omusiino.
41001007	Yowaana yayalaanga naboola ati, “Enyuma wange yiriyo owunoondaho, oyo niye owuhirira elalira oluyaali, yitahoyera ohwiinama aasi ndaaboolola eesya ch'ebiraato byae.
41001008	Ese mbabatiisa nende amaachi; nae oyo achia ohubabatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.”
41001009	Olwoola, Yesu yatula e Nasareti mu syaalo sy'e Galilaaya, yacha hu mwaalo kwa Yorudaani eyiri Yowaana amubatiise.
41001010	Nae Yesu niyatula mu maachi busa ati, yabona Ekulu nilikuuhe, mani Mwooyo yamwihaho nafwaanana koti eguugu;
41001011	mani ekono lyatula Mukulu niliboola liti, “Niiwe Omwaana wange muheerwa muno; niiwe ohira ohusangaasa.”
41001012	Abweene awo ni Mwooyo amwimirira yamuyira musiparara.
41001013	Mani yaaba musiparara eyo ohumala endaalo amahumi kane, Sitaani naali ohumuhema. Yamenyanga nende esolo ndeende; nae bamalaika ba Nasae nibamuhalaabanira.
41001014	Bulaanu, nibamalire ohudiira Yowaana, Yesu yeecha mu Galilaaya yachaaka ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai cha Nasae,
41001015	naboola ati, “Ebiha byoolere, handi Obwaami bwa Nasae buli aambi; mwefunake, mufukiirire Emboosi Ndai.”
41001016	Yesu niyali nakeenda hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Galilaaya, yabona Simooni nende Andereya mwaanag'ina nibali ohusukuna enjero munyaanja; olwohuba bali abanaabi.
41001017	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Munoonde, njia ohubahola mube abanaabi b'abandu.”
41001018	Mani abweene awo, baleha enjero chaabwe bamuloonda.
41001019	Handi niyemeedaho mu moni budiidi, yabona Yakobbo nende Yowaana abana ba Sebbedaayo, nibali mu lyaato lyaabwe nibonga enjero.
41001020	Mani abweene awo Yesu yabalaanga; baleha Sebbedaayo saabwe mu lyaato alala nende abahalaabani bapangise, baloonda Yesu.
41001021	Yesu alala nende abeeki bae bacha mu Kaperanaumu; nae olwa Sabbaato nilwoola, yacha yengira mu Sinagoogi yachaakaniramo ohweekesa.
41001022	Nae abandu, besinduha muno enjekesa yae, olwohuba siyali koti eya abekesa ba Malako; nae yekesa koti omuundu oli nende obunyala.
41001023	Nae abweene awo, omusaacha waliho omwooyo mubi yengira mu Sinagoogi mani yayula naboola ati,
41001024	“Ewe Yesu we Nasareti, onaatuhole otye? Wichire ohutusihirisa? Huhumanyire, niiwe Omwolerefu mweene wa Nasae.”
41001025	Nae Yesu yakuhabuhira naboola ati, “Nyita chi, handi omutulemo bwaangu!”
41001026	Nae omwooyo mubi okwo kweecha kwasusucha omusaacha oyo muno, kwayulira mu kono ly'akulu, kwamala kwamutulamo.
41001027	Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno, bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene nibaboola bati, “Sino siina? Yino njekesa njiaha! Wuno ali nende obunyala, alagira busa emyooyo mibi, nikimuwulira.”
41001028	Mani abweene awo, efuma ya Yesu niyisasaana mu syalo syoosi esye Galilaaya.
41001029	Abweene awo ni Yesu atula mu Sinagoogi naachia nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana beengira mu nyumba ya Simooni nende Andereya.
41001030	Bulaanu, masalang'ene Simooni yali akonere mu buliri nalwaala omusuuja, mani Yesu niyengira mu nyumba busa ati, bamuboolera ebidiira hu muhasi oyo.
41001031	Yesu yeecha, yamudiira omuhono, yamusingisa. Omusuuja kwamutulaho, mani yatulaniramo ohubahalaabanira koti lusihoyeere.
41001032	Engoloobe yene eyo, elyuuba nilyahakwa, bachaaka ohumuleetera abalwae babuli ngeri kata nende abo abaliho emisaambwa.
41001033	Mani abandu b'esiko esyo syoosi beecha bebuusira alala mu mulyaango kw'enyumba eyo.
41001034	Yesu yaonia abalwae babuli ngeri, handi yerusa emisaambwa emiingi. Siyakanyaanga emisaambwa echo ohulomaloma esiindu syoosi, olwohuba chali chamumanya.
41001035	Nae nibwahya, ebukwe niyisisiiri ohuheba, Yesu yasingira yaatula mu nyumba omwo, yacha mu sifwo sitaalimo abandu, mani yaba eyo yeng'ene niyekongooya.
41001036	Nae Simooni nende abaasye batula erwaanyi, bachaaka ohumukoonya,
41001037	mani nibamwakaana, bamuboolera bati, “Buli muundu yeesi ali ohuhukoonya busa.”
41001038	Nae yababoolera ati, “Mulehe huchie mu biko bitusibiraane, nyale ohuyaaliramo mwosi; olwohuba esyo nisyo esyandeeta.”
41001039	Mani yacha mu Galilaaya mwoosi, nayaalira mu Sinagoogi chaabwe handi niyerusa mu bandu emisaambwa.
41001040	Olwoola, omusaacha wali nalwaala obulwaae bw'amakere yeecha eyiri Yesu ohumwekongooya; yaasigama aasi yamuboolera ati, “Niweenya, onyala ohuumonia.”
41001041	Esisa siingi muno syadiira Yesu, mani yaakolola omuhono kwae yadiira hu musaacha oyo, namuboolera ati, “Ese nyenya, wona.”
41001042	Mani ebiha byeene ebyo, obulwaae bw'amakere bwamwamuhaho, yawona.
41001043	Nae Yesu yamuhuutira muno, yamala yamuseebula yawaawo bwaangu,
41001044	handi yamuboolera ati, “Bona oti sobooleraho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi; nae cha weyekese eyiri omulaamisi, omale owaane esiyaanwa si Musa yalagira esyeekesa siti owonere obulwaae bw'amakere, sino sibe esilolero eyiri abandu.”
41001045	Nae omusaacha oyo yatula yachaaka busa ohusasania efuma eyo buli abundu. Sino syakayira Yesu ohwingira mu siko syoosi alafu, nae yabechaanga erwaanyi mu ngoongo; mani eyo niyo yi bandu bechaanga yali nibatula mu buli situundu.
41002001	Oluunyuma lw'endaalo endiidi, Yesu yakobola e Kaperanaumu mani efuma yae yawulirihana yiti akaluhe ewaabwe.
41002002	Abandu bangi bebuusa beechula ohwolera elalira hu mulyaango, wabulao esifwo sidoong'ere syoosi. Nae Yesu yali abayaalira Emboosi Ndai ya Nasae.
41002003	Awo niwo yi basaacha bane boolera nibakiingire hu butalihe omusaacha wadataala, nibamuleetera.
41002004	Nae nibabona bati sibanyala hwoola eyiri Yesu olw'esidiyiha sihoongo, baniina hu sirama sy'enyumba, basiikulamo esidomo, mani baabisiramo omulwaae oyo, yoola ali Yesu.
41002005	Nae Yesu niyabona efukiirira yaabwe, yaboolera omulwaae oyo ati, “mwaana wange, ebibi byao bihuleherwemo.”
41002006	Nae abekesa ba malako bandi abali nibehaale awo nibawulira batyo, bachaaka ohweteeba abeene-na-beene mu myooyo chaabwe bati,
41002007	“Lwasiina omusaacha wuno alomaloma ati? Huno hufwola Nasae! Nasae yeng'ene niye onyala ohuleheramo ebibi!”
41002008	Nae abweene awo, Yesu niyamanya mu mwooyo kwae ati abo bali ohweteebana abeene-na-beene, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muli ohweteeba mu myooyo cheeng'we mutyo?
41002009	Siina syeene esihira obwangu, ohuboolera omudataafu oti, ‘Ebibi byao bihuleherwemo,’ kose, ohuboola oti, ‘Siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao, okeende’?
41002010	Nae ohubeekesa ati, Omwaana w'Omuundu ali nende obunyala hu syalo obwohuleheramo ebibi,” yaboolera omudataafu oyo ati,
41002011	“Huboolera endi, siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao, ochie engo!”
41002012	Mani yasingira, yabukula bwaangu obutalihe bwae, yalaala yawaawo abandu boosi nibamubona. Mani boosi-boosi bawuka muno, bafumya Nasae nibaboola bati, “Sihubonaangaho esiindu sifwaana siti!”
41002013	Yesu yatula awo handi yacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja. Niyali eyo, esidiyiha sy'abandu syoosi handi syeecha syamwebuusaho mani yachaaka ohubeekesa.
41002014	Handi niyali nakeenda, yeecha yabona omutoosa w'omusolo, olaangwa Leefi, omusyaani wa Alufaayo, niyehaale mu nyumba yisoloserwamo omusolo, mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.” Mani yasingira yaamuloonda.
41002015	Nae Yesu niyali naalya mu nyumba ya Leefi, abatoosa b'omusolo bangi nende abaholi b'ebibi beecha beehala balya nae alala nende abeeki bae; olwohuba abatoosa b'omusolo alala nende abaholi b'ebibi abali nibamuloondere bali abangi muno.
41002016	Nae abekesa ba malako aba, Abafalisaayo, nibabona bati Yesu ali ohulya nende abaholi b'ebibi alala nende abatoosa b'omusolo, beecha baboolera abeeki bae bati, “Lwasiina oyo alya nende abatoosa b'omusolo alala nende abaholi b'ebibi?”
41002017	Nae Yesu niyawulira esyo, yababoolera ati, “Abalamu haba sinibo abeenya omulesi, ohutusaho abalwae; Ese haba sindeecha ohulaanga abolerefu, nae ndeecha ohulaanga abaholi b'ebibi.”
41002018	Olwoola, abeeki ba Yowaana alala nende Abafalisaayo nibali nibasiiba, abandu bandi beecha eyiri Yesu bamuteeba bati, “Lwasiina abeeki ba Yowaana nende abeeki b'Abafalisaayo basiiba, nae abeeki bao haba sibasiiba?”
41002019	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mani sinyaliha abakeni bo hubugole ohuhaya ohulya, omweene bugole nasisiiri nabo? Ngandi haba! Omweene bugole nasisiiri nabo, haba sibanyala husiiba.
41002020	Nae ebiha byahoole, omugole abatusibweho, awo nilwo lubahasiibe.
41002021	Abulao omuundu yeesi onaba esiraka siyaaha hu ngubo ngofu; olwohuba naahola atyo, esiraka siyaaha siba sichia ohwehuuna sitaandule engubo ngofu eyo, mani obutanduhe buhongoye buhireho obwaliwo.
41002022	Handi abulao omuundu yeesi ochuha efwiini njiaha musikiingiro sy'eseero sikofu; olwohuba naahola atyo, efwiini yiba yicha ohwaata eseero eryo; mani efwiini yinyasihe alala nende eseero lyeene; nae efwiini njiaha yihoyera eseero yaaha.”
41002023	Yesu niyali nakeenda naabitira mu mikuunda ch'emere hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato lundi, abeeki bae bachaaka ohuwakula emitwe ch'emere.
41002024	Nae Abafalisaayo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Bonaho, lwasiina abo bali ohuhola esiindu sitafukiirirwa ohuholwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
41002025	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we musisiiri ohusomaho si Daudi yahola, nahayiswe handi enjala niyimuluma, alala nende abo bayali nabo:
41002026	koti luyacha yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, Abbiatari naali omulaamisi muhuluundu, mani yaalya emigaati chali chibereswe Nasae, echitafukiirirwa ohuliibwa nende omuundu yeesi ohutusaho abalaamisi bong'ene, handi yabukula yakabaaho abo bayali nabo?”
41002027	Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “Sabbaato yateebwao hulw'omuundu, nae omuundu haba saaliwo hulwa Sabbaato;
41002028	Mani sakira, Omwaana w'Omuundu ali Omwaami wa Sabbaato yosi.”
41003001	Yesu handi niyengira mu Sinagoogi, yakaanamo omusaacha wali nende omuhono kwafwa.
