41003002	Nae abandu bandi bachaaka ohumwehaliirisa babone nanamuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato nibakiiya ohumudiisa omusango mbwe muholi w'ebiindu bitadahibwa.
41003003	Nae Yesu yaboolera omusaacha w'omuhono kwafwa ati, “Yicha ano.”
41003004	Mani Yesu yateeba abandu abo ati, “Sihoyera ohuhola esiindu silayi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose esibi, ohuwonia obulamu, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose ohwiita?” Nae boosi bawuleera busa.
41003005	Nae Yesu yeecha yaanyoolera mani yabatingaala nende etima, olwohuba emyooyo chaabwe chali emyomeranu, mani yeecha yaboolera omusaacha oyo ati, “Kolola omuhono kwao okwo.” Mani omusaacha oyo yemao yaakukolola, kweecha kwawtonerao elalira.
41003006	Nae Abafalisaayo nibabona batyo, basiingira batula erwaanyi, mani batulaniramo ohuwuliirisania nende abandu b'omukanda kwa Herode, koti lubanyala ohumusihirisa.
41003007	Yesu alala nende abeeki bae beemao bewiira bacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja. Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo ohutula e Galilaaya syabaloondaho, alala nende abandi ohutula mu Buyudaaya,
41003008	e Yerusaalemu, Yidumea nende ohutula eyale ohubita engereha wa Yorudaani, nende ohutula aambi wa Tiro nende Sidoni. Handi esidiyiha siindi sihoongo syeecha ohweema hu fuma y'ebiindu bi Yesu yali naahola.
41003009	Mani Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae bamutekehere elyaato esidiyiha siteecha syamufwiinyirira.
41003010	olwohuba yali amalire ohuwonia abandu bangi, nae abandu bali nende endwaae chitaali nasilala bali nibasyeyindikania nibadaha bati bamudiireho busa.
41003011	Mani buli lu myooyo mibi chamubonaanga, chakwichanga aasi mu makulu kae nichirira chiti, “Niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae.”
41003012	Nae Yesu yakihutiraanga muno chitakera yamanyihana bwaangu.
41003013	Abweene awo, Yesu yacha hu lugulu, mani yalaanga abo bayali nadaha; mani beecha yali.
41003014	Mani yalobolamo ehumi-na-babiri, babecheenge nae, handi banyale ohutumwa nibacha ohuyaala,
41003015	handi nende ohuba nende obunyala obw'ohwirusa emisaambwa:
41003016	Simooni oyo yiyalanga Peetero;
41003017	Yakobbo omusyaani wa Sebbedaayo nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina Yakobbo, oyo yiyalanga Bbowanarigesi, esyeekesa siti, abana b'ohwaduluhana ng'ekulu;
41003018	Andereya, Filipo, Batulumaayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobbo omusyaani wa Alufaayo, Tadeo, Simooni Omukanani,
41003019	nende Yuda Yisikarioti, owamulyaamo olukwe.
41003020	Mani Yesu yeecha yakobola engo. Nae handi esidiyiha sihoongo syeecha syebuusira yaali, mani syabakayira kata ohulya.
41003021	Nae abanaluya bae nibawulira batyo, basiingira bacha ohumudiira, olwohuba abandu bandi bali baboola bati, “Abiyire omutwe.”
41003022	Nae abekesa ba malako abatula e Yerusaalemu beecha baboola bati, “Nguyo aliho omusaambwa kulaangwa, Bbelesebbuli, handi yerusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelesebbuli omuhulundu w'emisaambwa.”
41003023	Mani Yesu yamala yabalaanga beeche yali, mani nachaaka ohubakaadira engaado ati, “Sitaani anyala atye ohwirusa Sitaani waasye?
41003024	Mani obutuki nibukabuhanamo bwachaaka ohulwaanakana obweene-no-bweene, obutuki obwo haba sibunyala bwayindira.
41003025	Handi enyumba yoosi niyikabuhanamo mani yachaaka ohulwaanakana eyeene-ne-yeene, enyumba eyo haba siyinyala huyiindira.
41003026	Nae nikali mbwe Sitaani bulaanu niye ochaakire ohwelwaania omweene, mbawo mani edaala lyae likabuhanemo, mani haba silinyala ohuyiindira, mbawo lyoolere ohusihirira.
41003027	Nae abulao omuundu onyala yahalaka yengira mu nyumba y'omuundu w'amaani, yayaaya ebiindu byae, natataangire ohumuboya, hu yaanyala ohuyaaya enyumba yae bulai.
41003028	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abandu bacha ohuleherwamo ebibi byaabwe byoosi, alala nende ebyo byoosi bibalomaloma ebifwoola Nasae;
41003029	nae oyo yeesi olomaloma ebifwoola Mwooyo Mwolerefu, haba saachia huleherwamo olwohuba aba aholere esibi sitawa”
41003030	olwohuba abandu bali baboolere bati, “Yesu aliho omusambwa.”
41003031	Mani ng'ina Yesu nende bamwaanang'ina bamala beecha. Nae nibali nibasyeemere erwaanyi, batumira Yesu emboosi, nibamulaanga bati yeeche yibali.
41003032	Nae, esidiyiha sy'abandu syali sihaale nisimwebodohanie, syaboolera Yesu siti, “Mao nende ba mwaanamao bali erwaanyi, bahukoonya.”
41003033	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mama nende bamwaanaama nibo abali yena?”
41003034	Mani yatingaala hu bandu bali nibehaale nibamwebodohaanie, naboola ati, “Ba maama nende ba mwaanama mbano bali ano!
41003035	Oyo yeesi ohola bi Nasae adaha, niye oba mwaanama, nende mboocho, nende maama.”
41004001	Yesu yacha hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Galilaaya handi yachaaka ohweekesa. Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo muno syeecha syamwebodohania, handi yengira yehala mu lyaato, nae esidiyiha esyo syadoong'a nisihaale aasi hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja.
41004002	Mani Yesu yabeekesa ebiindu biingi muno niyehoonyera engaado. Nae niyaba nabekesa, yababoolera ati,
41004003	“Mutekeerese bulai! Omuundu wundi yatula yacha ohuwaanya emwo.
41004004	Niyali awaanya, emwo yindi yakwa hu ngira, mani amayoni keecha kayiboocha.
41004005	Emwo yindi yakwa hu bikina-kina, ataali eloba liingi, mani bwaangu-bwaangu yamera, olwohuba siyali yisiihirwe aasi muno.
41004006	Nae omubasu nikwafwa, emwo eyo yeecha yaakonga, mani yooma olwohuba yali siyayira emisi aasi muno.
41004007	Emwo yindi yakwa mu mawa, mani amawa kayifwinyirira, mani yahaya ohwaamaho esiindu syoosi.
41004008	Emwo yindi yakwa mu loba layi, mani yaama ebyaamo. Yahula, yakaliya, mani yaama ebyaamo, aandi amahumi kadatu, aandi amahumi kasasaba, handi aandi emia ndala.”
41004009	Mani Yesu yaboola ati, “Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
41004010	Nae Yesu niyali atulire eyiri esidiyiha, abandu bali nibadong'ere nae alala nende ehumi-na-babiri, beecha bamuteeba ebidiira hu ngaado.
41004011	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we neng'we ababeereswa ehabi y'ohumanya esyaama sy'Obwaami bwa Nasae, nae abandu b'erwaanyi, buli siindu siri busa mu ngaado;
41004012	mani bacha ohwewunja bulai bweene nae bahaye ohubona; handi bawulire bulai bweene, nae bahaye ohumanya amahulundu keene; olwohuba banyala ohwefunaka mani baleherwamo.”
41004013	Mani yemawo yabateeba ati, “Eng'we mwesi simumanyire amahulundu k'olukaado luno? Nae mucha ohumanya mutye amahulundu k'engaado chiindi choosi?
41004014	Omuwaanyi niye owaanya emboosi ya Nasae.
41004015	Abandu bawulira emboosi ya Nasae, nae bwaangu-bwaangu Sitaani niyeecha abamalamo emboosi yiba niyingiire mu myooyo chaabwe, abo nibo abafwana nende emwo yakwa hu ngira.
41004016	Abandu bawulira emboosi ya Nasae, mani bwaangu-bwaangu bayidiira nende esangaalo, nibo abo abafwana nende emwo yakwa hu bikina-kina.
41004017	Bano, sibaba bali nende emisi mireei, mani besimiirisaho hu lw'esiha sidiidi, nae ohusaanda oba ohunyaasibwa nihwoola hu lw'emboosi ya Nasae, bwaangu-bwaangu baebwaaba.
41004018	Nae abandi nibo abawaanywa mu mawa. Abo nibo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae,
41004019	nae ohwelalihirira hw'obulamu bw'omusyaalo muno, nende ohwekoomba hw'obuyiinda bw'omusyaalo, alala nende obwekoombi bw'ebiindu biindi, biingira mu myooyo chaabwe mani byafwinyirira emboosi ya Nasae, mani yahaya ohwaamaho esiindu syoosi.
41004020	Nae abandi bafwaana koti emwo yawaanywa hu loba layi, abo nibo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae, bayifukiirira mani baama ebyaamo, aandi amahumi kadatu, aandi amahumi kasaba, handi aandi emia ndala.”
41004021	Mani Yesu yemeeda ohuboola ati, “Mani etaara liretwanga mu nyumba ohufuunihwa mu simweero, oba ohuteebwa mu lwalo w'esitaanda, kose hu siteeni syalyo?
41004022	Olwohuba abulao esiindu syoosi esyakiswa, esitacha ohukisulwa syamanyihana, handi abulao esiindu syoosi esyabwihwa esitalibwihulwa syabonehana alafu.
41004023	Oyo yeesi oli nende amatwi kawulira leha awulire.”
41004024	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mwehaliiriseenge ebyo bimuwulira. Esikero syoberesa owaasyo, nisyo syosi siwahafune, handi nende ohwongerwaho ebihira awo obuungi.
41004025	Olwohuba, oyo oli nabyo achia ohwongerwa; nae oyo otaali nabyo, kata ebidiidi byali nabyo bacha ohubimumalaho.”
41004026	Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae bufwaanana koti omuundu yahawaanya emwo mu ndalo yae.
41004027	Mani yakobola engo, esiro nisyoola niyekonera, obwire nibuhya, niyesingirira, nae emwo eyo yimera yahula, omweene natamanyireho engeri yiyimeramo handi yahula.
41004028	Eloba lyeene nilyo elikera emwo yaamera handi yahula ohwoola luyiyangala.
41004029	Nae ebyaamo nibyaangala, omuundu oyo atulaniramo bwaangu yachaaka ohukesa olwohuba ekesa liba lyoolere.”
41004030	Handi Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae hunabukeraanie hu siindu siina, oba hunabukaadire lukaado siina?
41004031	Bufwaana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba, olwohuba ebiha by'ohulutaaka mu loba, nilwo oluhiramo obudiidi hu syalo;
41004032	nae nilumalire ohutaakibwa, lumera lwahula, lwehola okusaala kuhiramo emisaala chiindi choosi, mani kwataaho amasaga mahoongo muno, yi mayoni kabburuha kanyala ohwombaha ebiswi, mu siiniha syakwo.”
41004033	Yesu, yehonyera engaado nyiingi echifwaana chityo ohubayaalira emboosi ya Nasae. Yabekesaanga atyo hubanyale ohumanya bulai.
41004034	Haba siyalomalomaanga nabo esiindu syoosi natehonyere olukaado, nae niyabechaanga yeng'ene nende abeeki bae, yabatumbuliraanga alafu buli siindu syoosi.
41004035	Mani hu ludaalo lweene olwo engoloobe, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mulehe husyaabale enyaanja huchie engereha.”
41004036	Mani beemao baleha esidiyiha sy'abandu awo, beengira elyaato li yali yehaalemo, bamala bawaao. Amaato kandi kosi kali awo.
41004037	Nibali nibasyaabala nibawao, omuyaka kw'amaani kweene kwasyuuha, mani amafwinda keeyiha kachaaka ohuubba hu lyaato libalimo ohwoola lu lyaato lyali aambi ohwichula.
41004038	Nae Yesu yali ali mu numa naakona hu mabasi. Beecha bamusimusa nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, huli ohusihirira naawe haba sodeeba?”
41004039	Mani Yesu yemao yaasingira, yahabuhira omuyaka, handi yaboolera enyaanja ati, “Yenjeera! Okwalaale!” Mani omuyaka kweecha kwaakama, enyaanja yanyita chi!
41004040	Yesu yeecha yabateeba ati, “Lwasiina mutya? Haba simuli nende efukiirira?”
41004041	Mani bamala beechula obuti, bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene bati, “Wuno nae muundu siina yi muyaka nende amafwinda byosi biwulira?”
41005001	Yesu alala nende abeeki bae beecha boola engereha w'enyaanja ye Galilaaya mu syalo sye Geraasa.
41005002	Mani Yesu niyatula busa ati mu lyaato, yaakanana nende omusaacha oliho omwooyo mubi, otula mung'uungu chibasihaangamo abandu.
41005003	Omusaacha wuno yamenyaanga mu ng'ani chomung'ungu, handi yabulao omuundu yeesi owanyalaanga ohumuboya kata nende eminyororo;
41005004	olwohuba yali naboywaangaho nende epiingo alala nende eminyororo nae eminyororo yachidonya-donyaangamo busa, nae epiingo nacho yachihalaka-halakangamo busa; handi abulao omuundu yeesi owali nende amaani k'ohumuyiingira.
41005005	Esiro nende esideete, yali nang'abanaanga busa mu ng'ani chomung'ungu, nende hu ngulu niyehumusa-huumusa, handi niyenyubululira amakina.
41005006	Mani niyabonera Yesu eyale, yeruha bwaangu yeecha yali yaamwiinamira;
41005007	handi naalira nende ekono hoongo naboola ati, “Yesu Omwaana wa Nasae ow'Akulu Muno, onaahole otye? Hulirire mu liita lya Nasae endi, otasaandia haba!”
41005008	Omusaacha wuno yaboola atyo olwohuba Yesu yali amuboolere ati, “Mwooyo mubi ewe, tula mu musaacha oyo!”
41005009	Nae Yesu yamuteeba ati, “Eliita lyao nilyo naanu?” Nae oyo yakobolamu ati, “Eliita lyaange nilyo Legion; olwohuba huli bangi.”
41005010	Mani omusaacha oyo yachiiririra ohwekweeda Yesu nende esinani ataberusa ohutula mu syalo esyo.
41005011	Bulaanu aambi awo waliwo omukanda muhoongo kw'embiichi nikuli ohwayaanga hu ndulo w'esigulu;
41005012	mani emyooyo mibi echo chekweeda Yesu nichiboola chiti, “Tutume huchie ena mbiichi echo, otufukiirire huchiingiremo.”
41005013	Yesu yemawo yafukiirira emyooyo mibi echo, chatula mu musaacha oyo, mani chacha cheengira mu mbiichi. Omukaanda kw'embiichi okwo kwoosi, kwali kwoola aambi w'elifu chibiri enaamba, mani choosi chatimuha embiro chehirira hundulo w'esilugulu, chaweera mu nyaanja chasihama choosi.
41005014	Abaayi b'embiichi beecha bosi beeruha basalaana, bacha mu siko sihoongo alala nende mu ngoongo chikabuhane basasaania emboosi echo. Mani abandu beeyiha ohuchia ohubona esyali nisiholehaane.
41005015	Nae niboola eyiri Yesu, babona omusaacha wali niyechulaho emyooyo mibi niyehaale awo. Yali niyefwaalire engubo bulai handi elalu nilimuweereho, mani abandu abo boosi baatya muno.
41005016	Mani abandu bali nibabweene ebikwireo, beecha bachaaka ohukaniayira abandi ebyali bikwiire hu musaacha waliho emyooyo mibi oyo, nende ebyakwa hu mbiichi.
41005017	Abweene awo abandu beecha bekweeda Yesu atule mu syalo syaabwe.
41005018	Nae Yesu niyali niyengira mu lyaato, omusaacha waliho emyooyo mibi yekweda Yesu ati amufukiirire ache nae.
41005019	Nae Yesu yaahaya, yamuboolera ati, “Kaluha engo eyiri abandu bao, obaboolere ebiindu by'amaani bi Nasae ahuholeere, handi koti lw'ahukwiriire esisa.”
41005020	Mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yaatula awo yacha yachaaka ohuyaala mu biko ehumi (Muluyonaani bati, Dekapooli) ebiindu byoosi bi Yesu yali amuholeere, mani abandu boosi bawuka muno.
41005021	Yesu yemawo handi yasyaabala mu lyaato yacha engereha w'enyaanja. Nae niyoola eyo, handi esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu syeecha syamwebodohania.
41005022	Abweene awo, mulala hu bemirisi bomu Sinagoogi, olaangwa ati Yayiro yeecha eyiri Yesu. Niyoola yabona Yesu, yamukwa mu makulu,
41005023	yamwekweeda nende esibeera, naboola ati, “Omwaana wange muhaana muyere mulwaye muno, ali aambi nende ohufwa. Mani yicha omuteeho amahono kao, anyale ohuwona, abe omulamu.”
41005024	Mani Yesu yeecha yacha nende Yayiro. Handi esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo syeecha syamulondaho mani syamwebungihaho.
41005025	Musidiiyiha omwo mwalimo omuhasi wali nalwaala esihulukuto nisimumalireho emyaaka ehumi-na-chibiri.
41005026	Yali asandire muno mu mahono kaabalesi bangi, nanyaasire buli mwaandu kuyali nakwo, nae haba saona daawe, ohutusaho obulwae bwemeeda busa.
41005027	Omuhasi wuno yali yawulira efuma ya Yesu, mani yeyindikania mu sidiyiiha yoola enyuma wa Yesu, mani yadiira hu ngubo yae.
41005028	Yahola atyo olwohuba omweene yali yeboolere mu mwooyo kwae ati, “Nindiiraho busa kata hu ngubo chae, mba njia ohuwona.”
41005029	Mani niyamudiiraho busa ati, ni esihulukuto syakamirao; mani omuhasi yamala yewulira mu mubiri kwae ati bwadyeeri, obulwae bwae obwo bumalire ohuwona.
41005030	Nae Yesu niyamanya ati, aliwo amaani akamutuliremo, abweene awo yakaluhaana emukoongo mu sidiyiiha yateeba ati, “Naanu odiirire hu ngubo yange?”
41005031	Nae abeeki bae bamuboolera bati, “Oli ohubona koti esidiyiha siri ohuhuyindikania, handi oteeba oti, ‘Wiina owundiirireho?’ ”
41005032	Nae Yesu yemeeda ohwewunja abone omuundu omudiirireho.
41005033	Nae omuhasi oyo, koti luyali amanyire esyali simweholeheho, yeecha natiire handi nateengereha mani yaakwa aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, mani yamuboolera obwadyeeri bwoosi.
41005034	Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Muhana-ng'ene, efukiirira yao yihuwonisye; mani wao nende ehabi handi obulwaae bwao obwo buwonere elalira.”
41005035	Nae Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, abandu bandi ohutula ewa Yayiro boola bamuboolera bati, “Omuhaana wao amalire ohufwa. Lwasiina osaandia Omweekesa handi?”
41005036	Nae Yesu yahaya ohubideebaho bibali baboolere, Yesu yemao yaboolera omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi ati, “Otatya, fukiirira busa.”
41005037	Mani Yesu siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohumuloondaho ohutusaho, Peetero nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana mwaanang'ina Yakobbo.
41005038	Nae niboola mu daala ly'omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi, Yesu yabona abandu nibadoobanire, handi abalisi niboobba wuwi alala nende ohuchereenjesera akulu muno.
41005039	Mani Yesu niyamala ohwingira mu nyumba, yaboolera abandu ati, “Lwasiina mudobaana alala nende ohulira? Omwaana wuno haba saafwiire, nae ali ohukona busa.”
41005040	Nae abandu abo bamucheha busa. Nae yeecha yabatusa boosi erwaanyi, mani yabukula simwaana mwaana nende ng'ina alala nende bayali ali nabo, mani beengira bacha yi mwaana yali.
41005041	Yesu niyoola, yadiira omuhono kw'omwaana oyo, yamusingisa naboola ati, “Talitha cumi” amahulundu mbwe, “mwaana muhaana ewe, huboolera endi, siingira weeme.”
41005042	Nae abweene awo ni omuhaana oyo asingira yeema, achaaka ohukeenda (olwohuba yali yosa emyaaka ehumi-na-chibiri), mani abweene awo, abandu bawuka muno hulw'ebyo byoosi ebyali byeholehe.
41005043	Nae Yesu yabahutira muno ati omuundu yeesi atamanyaho sino, mani yababoolera ohuberesaho omuhaana oyo esy'ohulya.
41006001	Yesu yemao yaatula awo yacha mu syaalo syewaabwe syeene mani abeeki bae bamuloondaho.
41006002	Nae oludaalo lwa Sabbaato nilwoola, yacha mu Sinagoogi yachaaka ohweekesa. Mani abandu bangi bali omwo nibawulira biyeekesa, besinduha muno baboola bati, “Nae omusaacha wuno yatusa ena bino byoosi? Makesi siina kano kabamubeeresa? Anyala atye ohuhola ebiwukisa bino!
41006003	Wuno haba siniye omubaachi busa, omwaana wa Maria, handi mwaanang'ina Yakobbo nende Yosefu, nende Yuda nende Simooni, handi bambochong'ene sibamenya busa naafwe?” Mani beemao bamwekaana.
41006004	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omunabbi yeesi saahaywa ohubeereswa oluyaali ohutusaho mu siko sy'ewaabwe syeene, handi mu bandu bae beene, handi mu b'enyumba yae yene.”
41006005	Mani Yesu siyanyala huholerayo ebyaamayia byoosi, ohutusaho yesa amahono hu balwaaye badiidi busa mani yabawonia.
41006006	Mani Yesu yeecha yesinduha muno hulw'efukiirira ndiidi yibali nayo. Mani Yesu yabita niyeekesa mu ngoongo.
41006007	Mani yalaanga abeeki ehumi-na-babiri beeche yali, mani yaamala yabatuma bache babiri-babiri, mani yababeeresa obunyala bw'ohwirusa emyooyo mibi.
41006008	Yabahuutira batakiingaho esiindu syoosi mu lukeendo lwaabwe ohutusaho endabuhi; batakiinga omugaati kwoosi, kata omufuuko, kata eseende yoosi mu sibiro chaabwe;
41006009	nae befwaale ebiraato by'akaala, nae batefwaala amakanju kabiri.
41006010	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nimwiingiraanga mu nyumba yoosi, mubecheenge omwo ohwoola lu mwahaweereo.
41006011	Nae nimwolaanga abundu yibatababukaanira mani bahaya ohubawulira, nimuba nimutula mu syaalo esyo, muteng'ulaanga olufu luli hu makulu keeng'we lube esilolero sibakabuhania nabo.”
41006012	Mani abeeki abo bacha bayaala bati abandu bahoyeere ohwefunaka.
41006013	Mani beecha berusa hu bandu emisaambwa miingi muno, mani baabaha abalwaye bangi amafuta, mani baabawonia.
41006014	Omutuki Herode, yeecha yasiwulira; olwohuba eliita lya Yesu lyali lifuma muno. Abandu bandi baboola bati, “Wuno niye Yowaana Omubatiisi owasyuhiiswe ohutula mu bafu; mani sakira obunyala buno bwoosi buli ohumuholeramo.”
41006015	Nae abandu bandi nabo baboola bati, “Wuno niye Elija.” Handi abandi baboola bati, “Wuno niye omunabbi, oli busa koti mulala hu banabbi bahale.”
41006016	Nae Herode niyawulira sino yaboola ati, “Yowaana, yindahengaho omutwe, niye wuno ohusyuhiiswe.”
41006017	Olwohuba Herode yali yatuma handi niyadiira Yowaana, mani nibamuboyera mu mboyero olwohuba Herodia, owali omuhasi wa Filipo mwaanang'ina, yi Herode yali yadeehya.
41006018	Olwohuba Yowaana yali yaboolera Herode ati, “Haba sisihoyerwa ewe ohuyira omuhasi wa mwaanamaao.”
41006019	Mani Herodia yali yadiirira Yowaana ehiinda, nakiiyanga ohumwiita. Nae yali saanyala ohusihola,
41006020	olwohuba Herode yali yatya muno Yowaana namanyire bulai bweene ati, Yowaana yali omusaacha omulungifu mweene handi omwolerefu, mani yaamulinda bulai bweene. Mani niyawulira Yowaana nayaala, yateenga muno; kata niyasangaalira bi Yowaana yayalaanga.
41006021	Nae ehabi yeecha yadiira Herodia, hu ludaalo lw'esichuliso sy'ohwibulwa hwa Herode. Herode yali aholere esidyalo sihoongo muno, niyehaase abaami bahuluundu nende abahuluundu baabasirikaari, alala nende abandu bahunuufu mu Galilaaya.
41006022	Nae omuhaana wa Herodia niyeecha yahina, yasangaasa muno Herode alala nende abakeni bae; mani omutuki oyo yemao yaboolera omuhaana oyo ati, “Saba esiindu syoosi siwekoomba, mani njia ohuhusibeeresa.”
41006023	Mani yeecha yechuba naboolera omuhaana oyo ati, “Buli siindu syoosi syochia ohusaba, njia ohuhubeeresa, kata sibe esituundu sy'obwaami bwaange.”
41006024	Mani omuhaana oyo yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, yaacha yaboolera ng'ina ati, “Sabe siindu siina?” Nae ng'ina yamuboolera ati, “Saba omutwe kwa Yowaana Omubatiisi.”
41006025	Mani abweene awo, omuhaana oyo yeruha bwaangu yakaluha eyiri omutuki oyo mani yamuboolera ati, “Ndaha wumberese bulaanu buno omutwe kwa Yowaana Omubatiisi hu lusaani.”
41006026	Mani omutuki oyo yeecha yelalihirira muno; nae niyabaasa hu sichubo syae alala nende hu bakeni bae, siyadaha ohuhalaka biyali aboolere omuhaana oyo.
41006027	Mani abweene awo, omutuki oyo yeecha yaatuma mulala hu basirikari baliindi, yamuhuutira ohuleeta omutwe kwa Yowaana. Mani omusirikari oyo yaacha yaatemaho omutwe kwa Yowaana naali mu mboyero,
41006028	mani yaleeta omutwe okwo hu lusaani, mani yaakudiisa omuhaana oyo; omuhaana oyo nae yacha yaakudiisa ng'ina.
41006029	Mani abeeki ba Yowaana nibawulira sino, beecha baabukula omubiri kwae, mani bakusiiha mu ng'ani.
41006030	Olwoola, Abatume beemao bakobola eyiri Yesu, mani bamukaniayira ebiindu byoosi bi bali nibaholere handi nibekeese.
41006031	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mutuleyo muche yi bandu bataali mube eyo mweng'ene, mani muwuluuheho budiidi.” Olwohuba abandu bangi bali bemeeda ohwiicha handi abandi nibawaao, nibihaire Abatume ohufuna kata obweyaango bw'ohulya.
41006032	Mani beecha beengira mu lyaato, baasyabala bacha mu sifwo sibulamo abandu, baba eyo bong'ene.
41006033	Bulaanu, abandu bangi beecha bababona, baabamanyirisa, mani beruhaho nibatula mu biko byoosi, mani beecha baabatangira ohwoolayo.
41006034	Mani Yesu niyoola busa ati hu sikobero, yabona esidiyiha sihoongo nisimalire ohwebuusa, mani yeecha yabakwira esisa, olwohuba bali bali koti amakoondi kabulaho omwaayi; mani yachaaka ohubeekesa ebiindu biingi muno.
41006035	Mani obwire nibweera, abeeki bae beecha yali baboola bati, “Esifwo sino sibulamo abandu, handi mbawo obwire buli ohwiira;
41006036	Seebula abandu bano beenyohe, bache mu ngoongo nende mu byaalo by'aambi ano, banyale ohwekulira esy'ohulya.”
41006037	Yesu nae yabakobolamo ati, “Eng'we mubaberese esy'ohulya.” Nae abeeki bae nabo bamuboolera bati, “Efwe huchie hukule emigaati ch'edinaari emia chibiri hubabeeresa balye?”
41006038	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nang'we muliho nende emigaati chiinga? Muche mubaliire.” Mani nibamala ohubaliira, beecha bamuboolera bati, “Chiri emigaati chitaanu nende eng'eni chibiri.”
41006039	Mani Yesu yemawo yaboolera abandu boosi ohwihala aasi hu bunyaasi bw'omuboka mu mikaanda.
41006040	Mani abandu beecha beehala aasi, mu mikaanda ch'abandu emia ndala-ndala, handi abandi mu mikaanda cha amahumi kataanu-kataanu.
41006041	Mani Yesu yabukula emigaati chitaanu echo nende eng'eni chibiri echo, yatingaala akulu Mukulu, yabibeeresa ehabi, yamekula-mekula emigaati echio, yamala yachidiisa abeeki bache bachiberese abandu; handi yamala yaakabira abandu boosi eng'eni chibiri echo.
41006042	Mani abandu abo boosi balya beekuta.
41006043	Beemao babuusa alala ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho eby'emigaati nende eby'eng'eni.
41006044	Mani abalya ebyohulya ebyo bali abasaacha elifu chitaanu enaamba.
41006045	Abweene awo Yesu yaboola abeeki bae beengire mu lyaato bamutangirire ohusyaabala bakwe engereha w'enyaanja, mu Bbetisaida, omweene naasisebulaanga esidiyiha sy'abandu esyo.
41006046	Mani Yesu niyamala ohubetusaho boosi, yemao yacha yaniina hu lugulu ohwekongooya Nasae.
41006047	Nae obwire nibweera, elyaato ly'abeeki bae lyali limalire ohwoloberera ebusiba w'enyaanja, nae omweene nadong'ere yeng'ene engereha hu lukoongo.
41006048	Yesu yemawo yabona ati abeeki bae abo bali bali ohunyahana muno ohufuka elyaato ohusuda, olwohuba omuyaka kwali nikuwucha nikutulira yibali nibachoomere. Nae nichali aambi w'esaa chine chesiro, Yesu yabonehana nakeenda hu maachi, niyeecha yibali. Yali adaha abitireho busa aambi nabo,
41006049	nae nibabona naali ohukeenda hu maachi babaasa bati syali esihyeeno, mani bobba wuwi;
41006050	olwohuba boosi bali bamubweene, mani nibakwiiremo oluteengo. Nae abweene awo, Yesu yalomaloma nabo naboola ati, “Mugume omwooyo, olwohubani neese mweene; mutatya.”
41006051	Yesu yemao yengira mu lyaato mubali mani omuyaka kwaakama. Mani abeeki beecha bawuka muno,
41006052	olwohuba sibali nibamanyire esy'amaya sy'emigaati chira, olwohuba emyooyo chaabwe chali chahahanyala.
41006053	Mani nibali nibamalire ohusyaabala engereha, beecha boola hu lukoongo lwe Genesareeti, mani baboya elyaato lyaabwe awo.
41006054	Nae nibatula busa bati mu lyaato, abandu bamanyirisa Yesu bwaangu,
41006055	mani beeruha basasaanira mu ngoongo chisibiraane awo choosi, bachaaka ohuletaanga abalwaye hubutalihe bwaabwe, buli abundu woosi yibabechaanga bawuliire bati awo niyo yi Yesu yali.
41006056	Mani buli abundu woosi yi Yesu yechaanga, kata mu ngoongo, ebiko bihuluundu, oba esyaalo, handi abandu baalisaanga abalwaye mu bifwo by'ebiito, mani nibamusabaanga bati badiirengeho busa kata hu kemo lye ngubo yae; nasitalomwa buli oyo yeesi owayidiirangaho, yawonerangao.
41007001	Nae bulaanu, Abafalisaayo beecha bebuusira ali Yesu, alala nende abekesa ba malako bandi abali nibatulire e Yerusaalemu,
41007002	beecha babona bati, abeeki ba Yesu bandi balichaanga nibatesabire amahono, esyeekesa siti, haba sibesabaanga amahono koti lusihoyeere.
41007003	(Olwohuba Abafalisaayo, nende Abayudaaya boosi, sibalya nibatesaabire amahono kaabwe nibalondakirira nende omuduunga kwali kwa bakuuka yaabwe;
41007004	nae handi nibakaluha ango nibatula mu siito, sibalya ohwoola lu balabya emibiri chaabwe; handi aliwo emiduunga chiindi emiingi muno chibahoyerwanga ohwoseresa koti, okw'ohwoosa ebikoombe nende esyoongo alala nende ebiindu byehonyerwa byoosi ebyaholwa musibya sy'omugasa. )
41007005	Handi Abafalisaayo alala nende abandiiki ba malako beemao bateeba Yesu nibaboola bati, “Lwasiina abeeki bao haba sibalondakana nende emiduunga cha bakuuka yeefwe, nae balya busa nende amahono kefutire?”
41007006	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Bwadyeeri omunabbi Yisaaya yadeeka yalomaloma hw'eng'we abebachirisi koti lusyandiikwa siti, ‘Abandu bano banjisamo oluyaali nende emboosi chong'ene, nae emyooyo chaabwe chiri eyale naange;
41007007	ohunyinamira hwaabwe hubulamo amahulundu.’ ‘beekesa koti amalako ebiindu bi bandu bataao busa.’
41007008	Eng'we muleha Elako lya Nasae, nimwomiirira hu miduunga cha bandu busa.”
41007009	Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muli nende amakesi muno akohufuna engira ndayi y'ohuta ebuleka Elako lya Nasae, hu mweemeo munyale ohwoseresa emiduunga cheeng'we!
41007010	Olwohuba Musa yaboola ati, ‘Yisaanga oluyaali mu latao nende mao’; handi ati, ‘Oyo yeesi olomaloma bubi hu simwaana kata ng'ina, mubwadyeri bweene ahoyera ohufwa’;
41007011	nang'we muboola muti omuundu naboolera simwaana kata ng'ina ati, ‘Esyo simbeere njia ohuhubeeresa bulaanu siri Korubbani,’ esyo nisyo esiyaanwa sibereeswe Nasae
41007012	awo bulaanu simuba mumukanya ohuholeraho simwaana kata ng'ina, esiindu syoosi,
41007013	awo niyo yimunyasira elalira emboosi ya Nasae nimwehoonyera emiduunga cheeng'we echo chimuchiiririra nimweekesa abana beeng'we. Handi muhola ebiindu biingi biindi koti ebyo bityo.”
41007014	Yesu handi yalaanga abandu beecha yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mweesi mutekeerese bulai bimboola bino, handi mumanye muti:
41007015	abulao esiindu syoosi esiingira mu muundu nisitula erwaanyi esinyala syamunyaasa; ohutusaho ebyo ebitula mu muundu nibyo ebimunyaasa.”
41007016	
41007017	Nae abandu nibaba nibamalire ohuwaao, Yesu yeecha yengira mu nyumba, mani abeeki bae bamuteeba amahulundu k'olukaado olwo.
41007018	Nae yababoolera ati, “Hane mbao mwesi musisiiri ohumanya. Haba simubona muti buli siindu syoosi esiingira mu muundu ohutula erwaanyi sisinyala humunyaasa,
41007019	olwohuba ni siingira, haba sisichia mu mwooyo, nae sichia munda yae mani syabitamo busa?”
41007020	Mani yaboola ati, “Esiindu situla mu muundu nisyo esimunyaasa.
41007021	Olwohuba, ebiindu bitula mu muundu, biba bitula mu mwooyo kwae, omwo nimwo omutula ebibaaso bibi, obuyirani, obwiibi, obutemo, obucheke,
41007022	obwekoombi bubi, obusuku, obubacha, obuseresi bubi, ehiinda, obumoonyi, esuunga, esibboli.
41007023	Ebibi bino byoosi, bitula mu muundu, mani nibyo ebimunyaasa.”
41007024	Mani niyamala atyo, yasingira yawao naachia mu syalo sya Tiro nende Sidoni. Mani yeecha yengira mu nyumba, natakanya omuundu yeesi asimanye; kata katyo, siyanyala ohwekisa.
41007025	Nae abweene awo, ni omuhasi wundi yi mwaana wae muhaana yaliho omusambwa, yeecha yawulira ati Yesu aliwo, mani yeecha yaakwa aasi mu makulu kae.
41007026	Nae bulaanu omuhasi oyo yali Omuyonaani, omwibulanwa wa Foenisia ohutula Siiria. Mani yaasaba Yesu yeeruse omusambwa okwo hu mwaana wae oyo.
41007027	Mani Yesu yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Leha mberi bataangire ohuliisa abaana, olwohuba sisilai ohubukula ebyohulya by'abaana wabisukunira embwa.”
41007028	Nae omuhasi oyo yamukobolamo ati, “Eee, Omuhulundu; kata katyo, embwa chiri aasi w'emeesa chosi chirichaangaho kata hu budonye-donye bw'ebyohulya bi baana balya balehaho.”
41007029	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ohweema hu nomaloma yino, onyala wewerawo; omusaambwa kumalire ohutula hu mwaana wao oyo.”
41007030	Mani omuhasi oyo yawaawo yakobola engo, yanyoola omwaana wae oyo niyeyaliise hu sitaanda, omusambwa nikumalire ohumutulamo.
41007031	Yesu niyakobola ohutula mu syalo sya Tiro, yabitira hu ngira ya Sidoni, ey'omusyaalo sy'ebiko ehumi (Dekapooli), naachia hu nyaanja ye Galilaaya.
41007032	Mani handi beecha bamuleetera omusaacha wundi owali omudiimbe handi nga haba saanyala hulomaloma; mani basaba Yesu amwiseho omuhono kwae.
41007033	Nae Yesu yeecha yaamuyira endulo yi bandu bataali, yaata enjala chae mu matwi k'omusaacha oyo, handi yafuucha amate, yaamala yaamudiira hu lulimi;
41007034	niyamala atyo yatingaala Mukulu, yeesa omwooyo mani yamuboolera ati, “Efufata,” esyeekesa mbwe, “Yikuha.”
41007035	Mani amatwi kae keemao keekuha, olulimi lwae lwaboololoha, mani yaanyala ohulomaloma bulai bweene.
41007036	Yesu yemao yabahutira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi; nae koti luyachiiririra ohubahuutira, nilwo lwosi lu bandu bachiririra ohusilomaloma nende obwomiifu bwoosi.
41007037	Mani abandu beecha besinduha ohubitiirira, nibaboola bati, “Wuno mbano aholere ebiindu byoosi bulai bweene; akera kata abadiimbe bosi bawulira handi abakwa esiru bosi balomaloma.”
41008001	Mu ndaalo echo, esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo muno handi nisyeecha syebuusira eyiri Yesu, mani bahaywa esyohulya syoosi, Yesu yalaanga abeeki bae, yababoolera ati,
41008002	“Esidiyiha sy'abandu sino sindiisa esisa muno, olwohuba syahaba ano naange endaalo chidatu enaamba, mani babula esyohulya syoosi;
41008003	nae nimbaseebula bakobole engo waabwe nende enjala, bacha ohukwa hu ngira; handi abandi hu bandu bano batula eyale muno.”
41008004	Nae abeeki bae bamukobolamo bati, “Wiina onyala ohuliisa abandu bangi bano emigaati mu syalo sy'esiparara sino?”
41008005	Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Nae eng'we muli nende emigaati chiinga?” Baboola bati, “Chitaanu-na-chibiri.”
41008006	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola esidiyiha esyo ohwihala aasi hu loba; mani yeecha yabukula emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri echo, mani niyamala ohuchibeeresa ehabi, yachidonya-donya, yachibeeresa abeeki bae bachikabule abandu abo; mani bosi bamala bahola batyo.
41008007	Abeki abo bali nende otung'eni tudiidi twosi, mani Yesu niyamala ohutubeeresa ehabi, yaboola ati otung'eeni tuno twosi batukabule abandu.
41008008	Mani beecha baalya, beekutira elalira; mani babuusa ebidonye-donye ebyadoong'aho, byechula ebimweero bitaanu-na-bibiri.
41008009	Abandu balya bali aambi elifu chine enaamba.
41008010	Yesu yemao yaseebula abandu abo bawaao; mani abweene awo, yeecha yengira mu lyaato alala nende abeeki bae, mani bamala bacha mu situundu esilaangwa siti, Dalumanuuta.
41008011	Olwoola, Abafalisaayo bandi beecha eyiri Yesu mani bachaaka ohuyingana nae, nibamuhema abaholere esilolero esy'amayia ohutula Mukulu.
41008012	Yesu yeecha yesa omwooyo lukali muno, naboola ati, “Lwasiina olwiibulo luno lukonyeresa busa esilolero? Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao esilolero sichia ohubereswa olwiibulo luno.”
41008013	Yesu yemao yabatulaho yawaao, yengira mu lyaato yasyaabala yacha engereha.
41008014	Bulaanu abeeki bae bali nibebiriire ohwiicha nende emigaati; nae bali badong'ere nende omugaati mulala kwong'ene mu lyaato
41008015	Yesu yemawo yabakerakira naboola ati, “Mumanyaanga, mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo nende aka Herode.”
41008016	Abeki beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Hubula omugaati kwoosi.”
41008017	Nae olwohuba Yesu yali amalire ohusimanya, yemawo yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muli ohwekaniayaanga muti mubula omugaati kwoosi? Eng'we mutoola ohubona hwosi kata ohumanya hwosi? Emyooyo cheeng'we chomerana?
41008018	Mwaba nende emoni, mwahaya ohubona? Handi mwaba nende amatwi, mwahaya ohuwulira? Handi kata simunyala ohwichulisaho?
41008019	Oludaalo lu ndadonya-donyeraho emigaati chitaanu ohuliisa abandu babita elifu chitaanu, eng'we mwabuusa ebimweero biinga ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Ehumi-na-bibiri.”
41008020	“Nae emigaati chitaanu-na-chibiri ohuliisa abandu ababita elifu chine, mwabuusa ebimweero biinga ebichuule ebidonye-donye byadoong'aho?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Bitaanu-na-bibiri.”
41008021	Nae Yesu yemawo yababoolera ati, “Kata katyo, ohumanyaho hwosi, musisiiri ohumanya?”
41008022	Beemao boola e Bbetisaida. Niboola eyo, abandu bandi beecha baleeta eyiri Yesu omusaacha muwofu, bamwekongooya bati amudiireho busa.
41008023	Yesu yeecha yadiira omuhono kw'omusaacha muwofu oyo, yamutusa erwaanyi w'olukoongo olwo; yaamufucha hu moni, handi yamwisaho amahono kae, mani yaamuteeba ati, “Oli ohubonaho esiindu syoosi-syoosi?”
41008024	Omusaacha oyo yeecha yatingaala akulu mani yaamala yaboola ati, “Ndi ohubona abandu; nae bafwaana koti emisaala chikeenda.”
41008025	Yesu yeecha handi yaata amahono kae hu moni ch'omusaacha oyo; mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yahang'aasa emoni chae, mani chawonera elalira, yaanyala ohubona buli siindu bulai bweene.
41008026	Yesu yemao yaseebula omusaacha oyo akobole engo wae, namuboolera ati, “Otachiaho kata wengira mu lukoongo olwo.”
41008027	Yesu yemao yaasingira yawaao nende abeeki bae, bacha mu ngoongo echiri mu Kaisarea Filipi; nae nibali hu lukeendo olwo, Yesu yeecha yateeba abeeki bae ati, “Abandu baboola bati nise naanu?”
41008028	Nae abeeki bae bamuboolera bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi; abandi bati, Elija; handi abandi bati, mulala hu banabbi.”
41008029	Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Nae eng'we muboola muti nise naanu?” Peetero yamukobolamo ati, “Ewe niiwe Kristo.”
41008030	Mani Yesu yabahutira ati bataboolera omuundu yeesi ebimudiiraho.
41008031	Yesu mani yachaaka ohubeekesa ati Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyere ohusaanda muno, handi asyulwe nende abahuluundu b'enjia, abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abekesi b'amalako, handi yeetibwe, handi oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, asyuhe.
41008032	Yesu yalomaloma bino mubwahaahu. Nae Peetero yamubukula yamuyira endulo mani yachaaka ohumwalabira.
41008033	Nae Yesu niyakaluhaana mani yabona abeeki bae, yaalabira Peetero, naboola ati, “Ewe Sitaani, mbweere eyi! Olwohuba haba sooli huluwaande lwa Nasae, nae oli hu lwaande lw'abandu.”
41008034	Yesu yemao yalaanga esidiyiha sy'abandu alala nende abeeki bae beeche yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi odaha ohunoonda, leha yesyule omweene, mani akinge omusalabba kwae, yanonde.
41008035	Olwohuba oyo yeesi odaha ohuwonia obulamu bwae omweene, achia ohubukosa; nae oyo okosa obulamu bwae hu lwaange nende hulw'Emboosi Ndai, aba achia ohubuwonia.
41008036	Olwohuba omuundu afunamo siina, ohunyoola esyaalo syoosi, nae afwiirwe obulamu bwae?
41008037	Olwohuba, siindu siina syeene si muundu anyala ohukulasaniamo obulamu bwae?
41008038	Olwohuba, oyo yeesi odiirwa esoni hu lwaange nende hu lw'emboosi change, mu luse luholi lw'ebibi handi olutamanyire Nasae luno, oyo niye yi mwaana w'Omuundu yesi achia ohudiirirwa esoni, niyahabe niyeecha mu luyaali luhoongo lwa Simwaana alala nende bamalaika boolerefu.”
41009001	Yesu yemawo yababoolera ati, “Mubwadyeeri mbaboolera endi, aliwo abandu bandi hu beemere ano, abacha ohubona obwaami bwa Nasae nibwiichire nende obunyala, nibatoola ohufwa.”
41009002	Mani oluunyuma lw'endaalo chisaasaba, Yesu yeecha yabukula Peetero nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana, yaabayira hu lugulu luleeyi bong'ene; mani yakaluhanisibwa mu moni chaabwe,
41009003	mani ebyefwalo byae byang'enang'ena, nende obwa dibbo bumilamilana muno, ohuhira esilabya syoosi esiri hu syalo huno syahanyala ohulabya.
41009004	Mani abweene awo waboneherao Elija alala nende Musa; nibali ohulomaloma nende Yesu.
41009005	Mani Peetero yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, silayi muno efwe ohuba ano; leha efwe hwombahe ebikaali bidatu, silala esyao, silala esya Musa, handi silala esya Elija.”
41009006	Olwohuba Peetero yali awungire, ahayiswe nende esy'ohuboola, olwohuba bali batiire muno.
41009007	Mani esireesi syeecha syaabafuuniha, mani ekono lyeecha lyatulira musireesi niliboola liti, “Wuno niye Omwaana wange muheerwa; mumuwulire.”
41009008	Mani abweene awo nibachaaka ohwewunja bulai, haba sibabonaho omuundu wundi yeesi naali nabo ohutusaho Yesu yeng'ene.
41009009	Mani nibali mbwe hubehirira aasi w'olugulu, Yesu yeecha yabahutira obutabooleraho omuundu yeesi ebyo bibali nibabweene, ohwoola lu mwaana w'Omuundu niliba naamalire ohusyuuha ohutula mu bafu.
41009010	Mani beecha babiiha esiindu esyo mu mwooyo chaabwe, nibetebaanga abeene ohumanya emboosi echo mbwe ohusyuuha ohutula mu bafu bicheekesa.
41009011	Nae bamuteeba bati, “Lwasiina, abekesa b'amalako baboola bati Elija niye ohoyeere ohutangira ohwiicha?”
41009012	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Elija niye otaangira ohwiicha atekehe ebiindu byoosi bibe koti lubihoyeere ohuba; nae ebyandiikibwa bidiira hu mwaana w'Omuundu byeekesa siina, biti mbwe ahoyere ohusaanda muno handi ayiribwe koti omusyuule?
41009013	Nae ese mbaboolera endi Elija yamala ohwiicha, mani bamala ohumuhola syoosi sibadaha, koti busa lubyamulomalomaho mubyandiiko byolerefu.”
41009014	Mani nibeecha boola eyiri abeeki, babona esidiyiha sihoongo muno nisibebodohaanie, mani abekesa b'amalako nibali ohuyingana nabo.
41009015	Mani abweene awo abeeki nibabona Yesu, besinduha muno, mani beeruha nibacha yali, bamala bamuheesa.
41009016	Nae Yesu yabateeba ati, “Siina syeene simuli ohuyinganaanga nabo?”
41009017	Nae mulala hu bandu bali mu sidiyiiha yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, ndeetere omwaana wange yooli, olwohuba aliho omusaambwa mubbungafu;
41009018	mani buli lukumuninaanga, kumubbanga aasi; mani abira efiro muhanwa niyeesia ameeno mani amala abbangalala. Mani sabire abeeki bao ohukwiirusa nae sibanyalire.”
41009019	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ee, eng'we oluse lutamanyire Nasae, njia ohuba nang'we ohwoola liina? Njia ohubesimiirisa ohwoola liina? Mumundeetere ano.”
41009020	Mani beecha baleeta omusyaani oyo eyiri Yesu; nae omusaambwa okwo nikwabona Yesu, abweene awo kwaniina omusyaani oyo, mani kwamusuchaa-sucha, mani yaakwa aasi, yekalangasa, nabira efiro muhanwa.
41009021	Mani Yesu yateeba simwaana mwaana oyo ati, “Yahaba ati ohumala mbaka siina?” Nae yaboola ati, “Ohutula mu budoto bwae.
41009022	Mani buli siha kumusukunaanga mu muliro nende mu maachi, kuti kumusihirise; nae nonyala wahola esiindu syoosi, tukwiire esisa mani otuhoonye.”
41009023	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mbwe nonyala! Ebiindu byoosi binyaliha eyiri oyo ofukiirira.”
41009024	Abweene awo, simwaana mwaana oyo yayula naboola ati, “Ese fukiirira; ewe ndehere hu lw'obutaba nende efukiirira hwange ohwo!”
41009025	Nae Yesu niyabona ati esidiyiha syali sichaakire ohwiruha nisyebuusa alala, yahabuhira omusaambwa okwo naboola ati, “Ewe omusaambwa mudiimbe handi okwakwa esiru, hulagira endi, tula mu mwaana oyo, handi otamukaluhaangamo ehabi liindi.”
41009026	Mani nikwamala ohwayula nende ohumususuucha bubi muno, kwamutulamo, mani omusyaani oyo yaba koti omulaambo kwaafwa hale; mani abandu bahira obuungi baboola bati, “Amalire ohufwa.”
41009027	Nae Yesu yeecha yaamusingisa namudiirire omuhono, mani yaasingira yeema.
41009028	Mani Yesu niyali naamalire ohwingira mu nyumba, abeeki bae beecha bamuteeba nibali bong'ene bati, “Lwasiina efwe sihunyalire ohwirusa omusambwa okwo?”
41009029	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Omusambwa kufwaana koti kuno, sikunyala ohwiruswa nende esiindu syoosi ohutusaho ohusaba hwong'ene.”
41009030	Yesu nende abeeki bae beecha batula awo, bahalakania mu Galilaaya. Yesu siyakanyaho omuundu yeesi amanyeho atyo;
41009031	olwohuba yali niyeekesaanga abeeki bae nababoolera ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu bandi, bache bamwiite; mani naamalire ohwiitwa, oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
41009032	Nae abeeki bae sibanyala ohumanya enomanoma eyo, mani baatya ohumuteeba.
41009033	Mani boosi beecha boola e Kaperanaumu; mani Yesu niyali amalire ohwingira mu nyumba, yabateeba ati, “Mubeere nimuteebanaanga siina hu ngira?”
41009034	Nae abeeki boosi bawuleera busa chi; olwohuba nibali bali hu ngira bali nibateebanaanga abeene-na-beene oyo owali nabahiramo oluyaali.
41009035	Yesu yamala yehala aasi mani yalaanga ehumi-na-babiri abo; mani yababoolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi naaba achia ohuba omwimirisi, ahoyere ohuba owenyuma ohira mu boosi, handi ohuba omuhalaabani wa boosi.”
41009036	Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula omwaana muyere, yamwemesa akati waabwe; mani yamwakata mu mahono kae, yababoolera ati,
41009037	“Oyo yeesi owakaanira omwaana ofwaana koti wuno mu liita lyaange aba yanjakaanire; nae handi oyo owunjakaanira, aba siyakaanire ese, nae aba yakaanire oyo owanduma.”
41009038	Nae Yowaana yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, hubweene omuundu wundi niyerusa emisaambwa mu liita lyao, mani hwamukayira olwohuba saali mulala hweefwe.”
41009039	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutamukayira; olwohuba awumao onyala ohuhola omulimo kwamaani mu liita lyaange, handi abweene awo yanomanomaho bubi.
41009040	Olwohuba oyo atatuyirimba, aba ali alala naafwe.
41009041	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli obabeeresa amaachi k'ohung'wa olwohuba muli abandu ba Kristo, haba saachia hufwiirwa omukabo kwae.
41009042	“Oyo okera mulala hu baere bano abafukiriramo yaakwa mu sibi, syahahirire yaboywa okukina kuhoongo mu kosi mani yaasukunwa mu nyaanja.
41009043	Nae omuhono kwao nikukera wakwa mu sibi, kutemeho; olwohuba ohwingira mu bulamu butawa nooli omulema, bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nende amahono koombi, mu muliro kutasima.
41009044	
41009045	Nae ohukulu hwao nihukera wakwa mu sibi huteemeho, olwohuba ohwingira mu bulamu butawa nooli omulema bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nooli nende amakulu koombi.
41009046	
41009047	Nae emoni yao niyikera wakwa mu sibi, yichomolemo; olwohuba ohwingira mu bwaami bwa Nasae nooli nende emoni ndala bihira ohuchia mu muliro kutasima nende emoni choombi,
41009048	yi nyeende chayo chitafwa, handi yi muliro kwayo kutasima.
41009049	Olwohuba buli muundu achia oluungibwa n'omuliro.
41009050	Omuunyu mulai nikwo; nae omuunyu nikuwaamo echamu lyaakwo, kunyala kutye ohukaluswamo echamu elyo? Mubecheengemo echamu, handi abeene-na-beene mubecheenge emireembe.”
41010001	Yesu yeecha yaatula awo, yacha mu syalo sya Buyudaaya mani yaambuha omwaalo kwa Yorudaani, handi esidiyiha syeecha syamwebodohaniaho; nae koti luyali yanala ohuhola, yachaaka ohubeekesa handi.
41010002	Nae Abafalisaayo beecha yali, bamuteeba nibamuhema bati, “Sifukiirirwa omusaacha ohwirusa omuhasi wae?”
41010003	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Musa yabalagira siina syeene?”
41010004	Nabo baboola bati, “Musa yafukiirira omusaacha ohwandiika ebbarwa y'ohwirusa omuhasi, mani yamwemaliraho elalira.”
41010005	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Musa yabaandiikira atyo ohweema hu buwangalafu bw'emyooyo cheeng'we.
41010006	Nae ohutula hu huloongwa hw'esyaalo, ‘Nasae yahola bombi, omusaacha nende omuhasi.’
41010007	‘Mani hulw'esifune sino, omusaacha achia ohulehaanga simwaana nende ng'ina mani amale yaambanisibwe nende omuhasi wae,
41010008	mani bombi beehole omubiri mulala. Bulaanu sibaba basisiiri babiri, nae bali omubiri mulala.’
41010009	Sakira, esyo si Nasae yamala ohuwambaania alala, omuundu yeesi atasikabuhanianga.”
41010010	Nae nibali mu nyumba, abeeki bae handi bamuteeba ebidiira hu siindu sino.
41010011	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Oyo yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, mani yamala yadeehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke;
41010012	handi omuhasi yesi naaloba wamwe, yamala yadeehera omusaacha wundi, aba ahola obucheke.”
41010013	Abandu bandi bali nibaletaanga abana eyiri Yesu abadiireho nende amahono kae, nae abeeki bae baabakayira n'obwaalaba.
41010014	Nae Yesu niyabona atyo, yanyoolera, mani yababoolera ati, “Mulehe abaana beeche yindi, mutabakayira; olwohuba abali koti bano nibo abeene Bwaami bwa Nasae.
41010015	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, oyo yeesi otakaanira Obwaami bwa Nasae koti omwaana muyere, haba saachia hubwingiramo daawe.”
41010016	Mani Yesu yeecha yabaakata yamala yababeresa ehabi, nabesaho amahono.
41010017	Mani Yesu niyali hwatula ohuchaaka olukeendo lwae ati, omusaacha wundi yeecha yali niyeruha mani yaasigama mu moni wae yaamuteeba ati, “Omweekesa mulai ewe, siina syeene sihoyeere ohuhola hunyemeo nduuhane obulamu butaakama?”
41010018	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Lwasiina wunaanga omulai? Abulao omulai, ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene.
41010019	Ngandi omanyire amalako kano: ‘Otetaanga, Otayiranaanga, Otebaanga, Otabachiraanga owaasyo, Otakaadirisaanga, Yisaanga oluyaali mu lataao nende mao.’ ”
41010020	Nae omusaacha oyo yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, ako koosi, ndakooseresa ohutula mu buyere bwaange.”
41010021	Mani Yesu niyamwewunja, yamusiima, mani yamuboolera ati, “Obulwaho esiindu silala siti; cha okuse byooli nabyo, omale obikabire abamanani, mani ochia ohunyoola obuyiinda Mukulu; mani wiche, wunonde.”
41010022	Nae omusaacha oyo niyawulira atyo, yawaamo amaani, mani yawao niyelalihiriire muno; olwohuba yali ali nende ebyobuyiinda biingi muno.
41010023	Mani Yesu yeecha yatingaala abeeki bae, mani yamala yababoolera ati, “Nga bicha ohudinyira muno abali nende obuyiinda bungi ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!”
41010024	Mani abeeki bae beecha bawuka muno emboosi eyo. Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera handi ati, “Baana bange, nga sidinyu muno ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
41010025	Syanguyira muno engamia ohubita mu liina ly'esindaani, ohuhira omuundu muyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
41010026	Handi beecha bemeeda ohwesiinduha muno, mani baboolera Yesu bati, “Mani naanu onyala ohuwonesebwa?”
41010027	Yesu yabatingaala, mani yaboola ati, “Eyiri abandu sisinyaliha, nae sibiri bityo eyiri Nasae; olwohuba ebiindu byoosi binyaliha eyiri Nasae.”
41010028	Nae Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Eng'we, ngandi efwe hwaleha ebiindu byoosi mani hwahuloonda.”
41010029	Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, abulao omuundu yeesi owaleha enyumba kata bamwaanang'ina kata bambochong'ene kata ng'ina kata simwaana kata abana kata amaloba, hulwaange nende hulw'Emboosi Ndai,
41010030	otachia ohubukaana amayumba nende bamwaanang'ina nende bambochong'ene nende bang'ina nende abana nende amaloba amahabi emia mu bulamu buno, alala nende ohusaandisibwa, nae mu bulamu bwiicha, achia ohunyoola obulamu butaakama.
41010031	Nae abangi abatangiramo bulaanu, bacha ohuheneerehayo, nae abahenerehayo bacha ohutangiramo.”
41010032	Mani Yesu nende abeeki bae bali nibali hu ngira nibakeenda nibacha e Yerusaalemu, nae Yesu yali naabataangisiiremo; mani beecha besinduha muno, nende abo abali nibabaloondaho beecha batya muno. Handi Yesu yeecha yakabula abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri yabasudya endulo, mani yachaaka ohubaboolera ebyo ebyali nibicha ohumweholaho ati,
41010033	“Boneho, mbawo hucha e Yerusaalemu; mani Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki ba malako, mani bacha ohumuheengera omusango okw'ohufwa, handi bamudiise Abateende;
41010034	mani bachaaka ohumuhoomolera, nende ohumufuchaho amate, nende ohunaala ehoba, nende ohumwiita; nae oluunyuma lw'endaalo chidatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
41010035	Mani awo, Yakobbo nende Yowaana, abasyaani ba Sebbedaayo, beecha mu moni wa Yesu, mani bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, efwe hudaha ofukiirire ohutuholera esyo syoosi sihuchia ohuhusaba.”
41010036	Mani Yesu yabateeba ati, “Siina syeene simudaha ese mbaholere?”
41010037	Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Tufukiirire hwihale, mulala humuhono kwao muluungi, nae owundi hu mukooda, mu bwaami bwao.”
41010038	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we haba simumanyire simuli ohusaba. Munyala ohung'wa esikoombe siinjia ohung'wa, oba ohubatiisibwa?”
41010039	Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Eee hunyala.” Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Esikoombe siinjia ohung'wa mucha ohusing'wa; handi nende ohubatiisibwa hunja ohubatiisibwa, mwesi mucha ohubatiisibwa nahwo;
41010040	nae ohwihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi, kata hu mukooda, haba sibunyala bwaange ohubakaba, nae hwaabo bahwamala ohutekeherwa.”
41010041	Nae ehumi badong'ereo nibawulira batyo, banyolerera muno Yakobbo nende Yowaana.
41010042	Yesu yemawo yalaanga boosi beecha bebuusira yali, mani yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mumanyire muti abandu bahoyeere ohutuka Abateende baabehaho nende obunyala bungi muno, handi abemeresi baabwe bahunuufu babatukira amaani maangi.
41010043	Nae haba sisichia ohuba sityo mweng'we daawe; nae oyo ochia ohuba omuhunuufu mweng'we, ahoyeere ohuba omuhalaabani weng'we,
41010044	nae handi oyo ochia ohuba omwemeresi mweng'we ahoyeere ohuba omuhalaabani wa boosi.
41010045	Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu yesi haba siyeecha ohuhalaabanirwa, nae yeecha ohuhalaabanira abandu, handi nende ohuwaayo omulamu bwae bube obwohununula abandu abangi.”
41010046	Beemao beecha boola mu Yeriko; mani handi koti lu Yesu yali hwatula busa ati mu Yeriko alala nende abeeki bae nende esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu, bakaana Bbarutimaayo owali omuwofu musabirisi, omwaana wa Timaayo, niyehaale hundulo w'engira.
41010047	Nae niyawulira ati hane Yesu owe Nasareti niye owali niyeecha, yachaaka ohulirira akulu naboola ati, “Yesu, Omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
41010048	Nae abandu bandi beecha bamwaalabira nibamuboolera bati awuleere; nae Bbarutimaayo yemeeda busa ohulirira akulu muno ati, “Ewe Omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
41010049	Yesu yeecha yeema mani yaboola ati, “Mumulaange.” Mani nibalaanga omusaacha muwofu oyo nibamuboolera bati, “Sangaala; siingira, ali ohuhulaanga.”
41010050	Mani niyawulira atyo, yaanyula era engubo yae, yaluuluha yeema, yeecha eyiri Yesu.
41010051	Nae Yesu yemao yaamuteeba ati, “Siina syeene syodaha huholere?” Nae omusaacha muwofu oyo yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, leha nyale ohubona.”
41010052	Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wediirire olukeendo lwao wewerewo; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.” Mani awo-naawo, omusaacha oyo yachaakirawo ohubona mani yatulaniramo ohuloonda Yesu.
41011001	Nae nibali niboola mu Yerusaalemu, aambi nende Bbetifaage nende Bbetani, beecha boola hu Lugulu lwa Olibeti, mani Yesu yaatuma babiri hu beeki bae,
41011002	nababoolera ati, “Muche mu lukoongo lubali mu moni, nae nimunalwiingiramo muti, mucha ohunyoola omwaana kw'epunda nikuboyerwe, okutehalwaangaho; mukuboolole mani mukuleete.
41011003	Nae omuundu yeesi nababoolera ati, ‘Muli ohuhola siina sino?’ muboole muti, ‘Omwaami niye okudaha, achia ohukukalusa bwaangu.’ ”
41011004	Mani beecha bawaao, banyoola omwaana kw'epunda nibakuboyere amulyango w'enyumba hu ndulo w'engira ndakalafu; mani bamala bakuboolola.
41011005	Nae abo abali nibeemere aambi awo bababoolera bati, “Eng'we muhola siina esyo? Lwasiina muli ohuboolola omwaana kw'epunda okwo?”
41011006	Nae abeeki abo baabakaluhamo koti Yesu yali ababoolere; mani baabaleha bawaao.
41011007	Abeki abo beecha baleetera Yesu omwaana kw'epunda okwo, bakwaalaho engubo chaabwe; mani Yesu yamala yaakwihalaho.
41011008	Mani abandu bangi beemao baala engubo chaabwe hu ngira, nae abandi baakula amasaga k'emisaala akaliho amasaafu maangi mani bakaala hu ngira.
41011009	Mani abo abali nibatangiiremo nende abo abali nibaloondaho bachaaka ohuhuumula nibaboola bati, “Hosaana! Ali nende ehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami!
41011010	Buli nende ehabi obutuki bwa seefwe Daudi obuli ohwiicha! Hosaana akulu muno!”
41011011	Yesu yamala yengira mu Yerusaalemu, mani yacha mu nyumba ya Nasae; nae niyamala ohutingaala yaaswania buli siindu; nae koti obwire bwali bwiirire, yatula yacha e Bbetani alala nende abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri.
41011012	Nibwahya, hu ludaalo luloondaho, nibeecha ohutula e Bbetani, Yesu enjala yaamuluma.
41011013	Nae niyabona omusaala kw'enduli eyale nikudidiisye amasaafu, yaasuda aambi ohubona nanyala ohunyoolaho esyaamo syoosi. Nae niyakwoolaho, haba siyanyoolaho esiindu syoosi ohutusaho amasaafu busa, olwohuba sisyali siha sy'emituli ohwaama.
41011014	Mani Yesu yaakuboolera ati, “Omuundu yeesi ahoya yahaya ohuhulyaaho esyaamo syoosi handi.” Mani abeeki bae nabo bawulira sino.
41011015	Mani beecha boola e Yerusaalemu. Nae niyengira mu nyumba ya amalaamo, yachaaka ohwirusamo abo abali nibakusira alala nende abo abali nibakulira mu nyumba ya amalaamo. Mani yafumamya emeesa ch'abafunjisi b'eseende nende ebisaala by'abo abali nibakusa amaburuku;
41011016	mani haba siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohubisira esiindu syoosi mu nyumba ya Nasae.
41011017	Mani Yesu yekesa nababoolera ati, “Haba sisyandiikwa mubyandiiko byolerefu siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yahalaangwe enyumba y'ohwekongooyeramo eyiri abandu boosi?’ Nae engwe muyiholere obwekiso bw'abanyaka.”
41011018	Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abaandiiki b'amalako nibawulira batyo, bachaaka ohukiiya engira y'ohumunyaasiramo; nae beecha bamutya olwohuba esidiyiha sy'abandu syali siwukaho busa enjekesa yae.
41011019	Nae engoloobe niyoola, abo beecha batula mu siko esyo.
41011020	Nae nibali nibabitao echuli, babona omutuli okwo nikwomere ohwolera elalira hu misi.
41011021	Mani Peetero yeecha yechulisa, naboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, bonaho! Omutuli kuwabwabire kumalire ohwooma.”
41011022	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mufukiirire mu Nasae.
41011023	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi oboolera olugulu luno ati, ‘Wekiinge wesukune mu nyaanja,’ mani yahaya ohukana-kana mu mwooyo kwae, nae yafukiirira ati esyo syaaba alomaloma sichia ohwehola, siba sichia ohumweholehera sityo.
41011024	Sakira mbaboolera endi, buli syoosi syooba nosaba muhwekongooya, fukiirira oti omalire ohusinyoola esyo, handi siba sichia ohuba esyeeng'we.
41011025	Nae nimweema ohwekongooya, muleheremo abaasyeng'we babaliho emboosi, olwo nilwo lu Seeng'we oli Mukulu yesi achia ohubaleheramo ebibi byeeng'we.”
41011026	
41011027	Mani handi beecha boola mu Yerusaalemu. Nae niyali akeenda mu nyumba ya amalaamo, abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abaandiiki b'amalako, beecha yiyali,
41011028	bamuboolera bati, “Otusa ena obunyala bw'ohuhola ebiindu bino, kose wiina owahuba obunyala bw'ohuhola bino?”
41011029	Yesu yababoolera ati, “Njia ohubateeba esiteebo silala syong'ene; nimungaluhamo, syesi mba njia ohubaboolera yindusa obunyala bw'ohuhola bino.
41011030	Ohubatiisa hwa Yowaana, hwatula Mukulu, kose mu bandu? Mungaluhemo.”
41011031	Mani baboolana abeene-na-beene bati, “Nihuboola huti, ‘hwatula Mukulu,’ achia ohutuboolera ati, ‘Lwasiina simwamufukiirira?’
41011032	Kose huboole huti, ‘Hwatula mu bandu?’ ” bali batiire abandu, olwohuba abandu boosi, bali bamanyire bati, Yowaana yali omunabbi mweene.
41011033	Mani bakaluha mu Yesu bati, “Efwe hukoterwe.” Nae Yesu ababoolera ati, “Syesi haba siinjia ohubaboolera yindusa obunyala bw'ohuhola ebiindu bino.”
41012001	Mani Yesu yeecha yachaaka ohulomaloma nabo mu ngaado ati, “Omusaacha wundi yalima endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yamala yombaha olukaka yayibodoohania, handi yayaba eliina ly'esihunyiro sy'emisabbiibu, handi yamala yombaha omunara okw'ohuliindiramo endalo eyo, mani yamala yayibeeresa abahalaabani nae omweene amala yasamula musyaalo siindi.
41012002	Esiha nisyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wae mulala eyiri abahalaabani abo, ache aduhaneho ebyaamo biindi eby'emisabbiibu.
41012003	Nae abahalaabani abo, beecha bamudiira baamala bamuhuya, baamala baamukalusa yatulire mahono mahaya.
41012004	Omweene ndalo handi yeecha yatumira abahalaabani abo omuhalaabani wae wundi, nae abahalaabani abo beecha bamunyaala omutwe bamala bamuhola ebyesoni.
41012005	Handi yeecha yabatumira omuhalaabani wundi nae yibecha beeta; alala nende abandi abangi batyo, nibabahuya handi abandi nibabeeta.
41012006	Handi omweene ndalo oyo yali adoong'isye omuhalaabani wundi mulala; oyo niye owali omwaana muheerwa; niye yiyeecha yaamaliirihayo ohutuma yibali, naboola ati, ‘Bacha ohwisa oluyaali mu mwaana wange.’
41012007	Nae abahalaabani abo beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omukerami; mwiche, mulehe humwiite, mani endaalo y'emisabbiibu yibe eyeefwe.’
41012008	Mani beecha bamubukula bamwiita, mani bamusukuna erwaanyi w'endalo y'emisabbiibu.
41012009	Omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu eyo achia ohuhola siina? Achia ohwiicha amale asihiriise abahalaabani abo, amale abukule endaalo y'emisabbiibu eyo ayiberese abandu bandi.
41012010	Haba simwasomaho ebyandiiko byolerefu bino biti, ‘Ekina lyeene lira li bombahi bahaya nilyo elyeholere omutwe okw'esoonda;
41012011	yino yali ehola y'Omwaami, handi ndayi muno mu moni cheefwe’?”
41012012	Mani beecha baakesaho ohumudiira, nae baatya esidiyiha esyo, olwohuba bali basifumbule bati Yesu yali akaadire olukaado olwo olubadiiraho; mani beecha bamuleha mani bawao.
41012013	Handi beecha bamutumira Abafalisaayo bandi nende Abaherode bandi ohumuteka mu nomaloma yae yeene.
41012014	Mani beecha yali bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti ewe oli ow'obwadyeeri, handi haba siwekweeda omuundu yeesi; olwohuba ewe haba sootya oluyaali lwesifwo sy'abandu, nae mu bwadyeeri bweene weekesaanga engira ya Nasae yene. Mani sihoyera ohutooya emisolo eyiri Kaisaali, kose haba?
41012015	Efwe huhoyeere ohukitunga, kose, efwe sihuhoyeere?” Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire ohwebachirisa hwaabwe, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina muhema mutyo? Mundetere etoongolo, mani mulehe nditingaale”
41012016	Mani beecha bamuleetera lala. Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Sino sifwaanani nende obwandiike buno bya naanu?” Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
41012017	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mukalusireenge Kaisaali ebiindu biba nibiri ebya Kaisaali, nae mukalusireenge Nasae ebiindu biba nibiri ebya Nasae.” Mani beecha baatya muno Yesu.
41012018	Handi Abasadukaayo bosi beecha yali, abo ababoolaanga bati, ohusyuuha hubulao; mani bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati,
41012019	“Omweekesa, Musa yali yatwandiikira ati, mwaanang'ina muundu naafwa mani yaaleha omuhasi, nae haba saalehere omwaana, omuundu oyo ahoyera yabukula omuhasi oyo, yebulira mwaanang'ina abaana.
41012020	Olwoola, yaliwo abasyaani bebulanwa bataanu-na-babiri; Omuhulundu w'abwe yeecha yadeehya omuhasi, mani niyeecha yafwa, haba siyaleha omwaana kata mulala;
41012021	mani owohubiri yeecha yabukula omuhasi oyo, handi yesi yeecha yafwa nataalehereho omwaana kata mulala; handi owohudatu yesi yeecha yafwa atyo;
41012022	mani bataanu-na-babiri abo haba siyalehaho omwaana kata mulala. Muhumaliirihira elalira, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
41012023	Mani muhusyuhira, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba muha naanu? Olwohuba abasaacha bataanu-na-babiri abo boosi bali bamuyira koti omuhasi waabwe.”
41012024	Yesu nae yababoolera ati, “Sino sinisyo esikeraanga nimudondobana, olwohuba mbwe haba simumanyire ebyandiiko byolerefu kata nende obunyala bwa Nasae?
41012025	Olwohuba abo nibahasyuuhe mu bafu, haba sibahabe nibali abohudehya, kata abohudeeha, nae bacha ohuba koti Malaika bo Mukulu.
41012026	Nae esya abafu ohusyuuhisibwa, haba simwasomaho mu sitabo sya Musa, mulukano ludiira hu sichaha, koti lu Nasae yamuboolera ati, ‘Ndi Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka, handi Nasae wa Yakobbo’?
41012027	Haba saali Nasae wa abafu, nae ali owa abalamu; mwadondobana muno.”
41012028	Mani mulala hu abaandiiki ba malako yeecha yibali yawulira nibali ohuyingana abeene-na-beene, mani niyabona ati Yesu ali ohubakaluhamo bulai bweene, yeecha yaamuteeba ati, “Lako siina elihiramo koosi obuhunuufu?”
41012029	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Elitaangira lyeene liri liti, ‘Wulira Ewe Yisirayiri: Omwaami Nasae weefwe, Omwaami ali mulala yeng'ene;
41012030	mani ohoyere ohudaha Omwaami Nasae wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, handi nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amakesi kao koosi, nende amaani kao koosi.’
41012031	Elilondaho nilyo lino, ‘Dahaanga owaasyo koti luwedaha omweene.’ Haba siriruwo elako liindi elihira kano koosi.”
41012032	Mani omwandiiki wa malako yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “ Omweekesa, oli abweene; oboolere obwadyeeri oti ali mulala yeng'ene, handi abulao owundi ohutusaho oyo;
41012033	handi nende ohumudaha nende omwooyo kwoosi, handi nende ohumanya hwoosi, handi nende amaani koosi, handi ohudaha owaasyo koti lu wedaha omweene, bihira muno ebisaambe bilaamba byoosi alala nende ebiyaanwa.”
41012034	Nae Yesu niyabona ati akaluhemo nende amakesi, yamuboolera ati, “Ewe haba sooli eyale muno ohutula hu bwaami bwa Nasae.” Mani ohula hwolwo, abulao omuundu yeesi owateemaho ohumuteeba esiteebo siindi syoosi.
41012035	Mani Yesu niyali niyeekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, yaboola ati, “Abaandiiki ba malako bahaboola batye bati Kristo ali omwaana wa Daudi?
41012036	Nae Daudi mweene naniinirwe nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yesaara ati, ‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi, ohwoola lundirita abasuku bao aasi w'amakulu kao.’
41012037	Daudi mweene omulaanga ati, Omwaami; mani yahaba atye omwaana wae?” Mani esidiyiha sihoongo syeecha syamuwulira nende esangaalo.
41012038	Mani muhwekesa hwae handi yaboola ati, “Mweliinde abaandiiki ba malako, abaheera ohukendaanira mu maganjuula kaabwe maleeyi, nende ohubona bati bahesibwa bulai mu biito
41012039	handi nende obubereswa ebisaala bilai mu Sinagoogi alala nende ebifwo byoluyaali hubidyaalo,
41012040	handi abo abayaaya amayumba k'abafwire handi muhwebachirisa abaleyia amalaamo kaaba amaleeyi muno. Abo bacha ohunyoola ohuboneresebwa huhiramo obuhoongo.”
41012041	Mani yamala yehala natingaalire esibiihiro sy'eseende, niyewunja ebikaanda by'abandu nibita eseende chaabyo musibiihiro esyo. Abandu banyali bangi batechaangamo eseende enyiingi muno.
41012042	Mani omuhasi mufwiire mukofu muno yesi yeecha, mani yataamo obuhela bubiri obwomugasa obwaakana nende etoongolo lala.
41012043	Yesu yeecha yalaanga abeeki bae beeche yaali, mani yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omuhasi mufwiire mumanani wuno, ateremo eseende nyiingi echihira echa abo boosi abasoloseere mu sibiihiro sino.
41012044	Olwohuba abo boosi basolosenge hw'ebyo ebidoong'ere hu biindu bibali nabyo; nae wuno ohutula hubumanani bwae, asolose syoosi siyali ali ninasyo, mubulamu bwae bwoosi.”
41013001	Mani niyali hwatula busa ati mu nyumba ya amalaamo, mulala hu beeki bae yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omweekesa, bonaho esiroonyo sy'amakina nende esiroonyo sy'ebyombahe!”
41013002	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ewe mani oli ohubona ebyombahe bihunuufu bino? Sibichia hudoong'a ekina lala nirihaale hu liindi, elitahasukuunwe aasi.”
41013003	Nae Yesu niyali niyehaale hu lugulu olulaangwa luti Olibeti niyewunjire enyumba ya amalaamo, Peetero nende Yakobbo alala nende Yowaana nende Andereya beecha bamuteeba mungiso bati,
41013004	“Tuboolereho, lu bino bicha ohwehola, handi halolero siina ahacha ohubaao lu bino byoosi bicha ohubeerao?”
41013005	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mweliinde omuundu yeesi atanyala ohubahyaamya.
41013006	Abandu abangi bacha ohwichaanga mu liita lyaange, nibaboola bati, ‘Ese neese oyo mweene!’ mani bacha ohukosa abandu bangi.
41013007	Handi nimuwuliraanga efuma ya maye alala nende embaha yidiira hu maye eyitaali eyadyeeri, mutasanguluhaanga; olwohuba bino bihoyeere ohukwaao, nae enjakamo yiba niyisisiiri ohwoola.
41013008	Olwohuba ebyaalo bicha ohusiingisa eye hu byaalo biindi, handi obwaami bwosi hu bwaami bundi; ohutungereha hw'esyaalo hucha ohubaao mu bifwo bitaali nasilala, enjala yosi yicha ohukwaao; nae bino byoosi bicha ohuba busa enjaako y'obuchuuni bw'engasi chohwibula.
41013009	“Nae mweliinde abeene; olwohuba bacha ohubayira mweeme mu biina; handi bahabahuyire mu mayumba ka amalaamo k'Abayudaaya; handi mwaheeme mu moni wa ba Gafana nende echa abatuki hu lwaange, ohuberesa obuloli mu moni waabwe.
41013010	Nae Emboosi Ndai yiri n'ohuyaalwa mu syalo syoosi.
41013011	Nae nibabaletaanga ohuyaaswa handi nibabadisaanga mu mahono kaabwe, muteyendehereraanga nimweteeba muti hunaboole siina; nae muboole busa bimuba muli nabyo ebiha ebyo, olwohuba haba sineeng'we abacha ohulomalomaanga, ohutusaho Mwooyo Mwolerefu oli mweng'we niye achia ohulomalomaanga.
41013012	Handi mwaanang'ina muundu mweene niye ochia ohumuwaayo bamwiite;
41013013	handi abandu boosi bacha ohuhusyuula hu lw'eliita lyaange. Nae oyo owesimiirisa ohwoola hu njakamo niye ochia ohuwonisibwa.
41013014	“Nae nobonaanga esiindu sibi muno nisyolere yisitahoyeere ohuba, (leha omusomi amanye amahulundu), mani mulehe abo abali mu Buyudaaya beeruhire mu ngulu;
41013015	oyo oli hu sirama sy'enyumba ateeha aasi, kata atengiraho mu nyumba yae, yatusamo esiindu syoosi;
41013016	handi oyo oli mu ndalo atakaluhaanga mungo ohubukula ebyefwalo byae.
41013017	Nae chibakaanire abo abali asito nende abo abahabe nibanuunia mu ndaalo echo!
41013018	Mwekongooye ebyo bitabao mu ndaalo ch'efula.
41013019	Olwohuba mu ndaalo echo, mucha ohubaamo ebinyaaso bitabechaangao hooho ohutula muhuchaaka hw'esyaalo si Nasae yaloonga ohwoola buti, handi haba sibyahabeeo handi endaalo choosi.
41013020	Nae Nasae aba nataduduyaho endaalo, awumawo omuundu yeesi owahaonere; nae hu lw'abo ba Nasae yadoola, yaduduya endaalo echo.
41013021	Nae, omuundu yeesi nahuboolera ati, ‘Bone, nga Kristo nguno ano!’ kose ati, ‘Bone, ngula ali ala!’ Otasifukiiriraanga.
41013022	Olwohuba ba Kristo bobubacha nende ba nabbi bobubacha bacha ohwiicha beekese abyohuboneraho nende ebiwukisa, ohukosa abadoole ba Nasae nisiba nisinyaliha.
41013023	Nae mweliinde; olwohuba mbaboleere ebiindu bino byoosi nibisisiiri ohwoola.
41013024	“Nae mu ndaalo echo, ebinyaaso ebyo nibiweere, eryuuba licha ohwirima, handi omwoosi kwosi haba sikuchia ohwaaduha,
41013025	handi eng'ining'ini chicha ohukwa nichitula akulu, handi amaani ko Mukulu kacha ohudengaanisibwa.
41013026	Mani bacha ohubona Omwaana w'Omuundu niyeechera mu maleesi nende amaani alala nende oluyaali.
41013027	Mani achia ohutuma ba Malaika, mani bache bahung'aanie alala abadoole bae ohutula hu mbeka chine ch'esyaalo, ohutula hu njakamo y'esyaalo, ohwoola hu njakamo y'ekulu.
41013028	“Leha mubonere hu mutuli: nimubona nikutusa amasaafu madoto kuti, nimumanya muti, endaalo ch'esiminyu chiri aambi ohwoola.
41013029	Mani sakira, nimubona ebiindu bino nibyeholeha, mumanye muti ali aambi, ali busa husiruwa bweene.
41013030	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno haba siluchia huwaao, ebiindu bino nibiteholeha.
41013031	Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwaao, nae mboosi change haba sichicha huwaao.
41013032	“Nae oludaalo lweene olwo, kata ebiha byeene, awumao omuundu yeesi omanyire, kata ba Malaika bo Mukulu, kata Omwaana, nae ohutusaho Bbaabba yeng'ene.
41013033	Mweliinde, mube ameeso; olwohuba haba simumanyire lu biha byahoolere.
41013034	Siri koti omuundu ochia hu lukeendo lw'eyale, naaba natula mu ngo, aberesa abahalaabani bae obunyala, buli otula nende omulimo kwae, mani yaboolera omuliindi w'ohusiruwa abe ameeso.
41013035	Sakira mweliinde--olwohuba haba simumanyire lu mweneengo achia ohwichira, kose engoloobe, kose mu siro akati-kaati, kose mu mabweeri-bweeri, kose mu chuli-chuli.
41013036	Ataali awo, anyala ohwiicha mabbwooga, mani yabakaana nibasiikona.
41013037	Mani bimbaboolera eng'we, mbiboolera abandu boosi endi: Mube, ameeso.”
41014001	Bulaanu chali chidong'ere endaalo chibiri ohwoola hu Paasaka nende esidyalo sy'emigaati kitaalimo amamera. Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki ba malako bachaaka ohukoonya engira y'ohumudiira mungiso bamale bamwiite;
41014002	olwohuba bali baboolere bati, “Sisilai ohumudiirira hu sidyaalo, olwohuba abandu banyala ohukwaamo esisi.”
41014003	Nae niyali ali e Bbetani mu nyumba ya Simooni owali yalwaalaho obulwaae bw'amakere, niyehaale naali ohulya, omuhasi wundi yeecha nende echupa ya mafuta k'esiing'aari siingi, ak'obukusi bwa akulu muno, mani yekula echupa ya amafuta eyo, yamala yakachuha hu mutwe kwa Yesu.
41014004	Nae baliwo abandu bandi ababoolana abeene-na-beene bati, “Lwasiina anyaasa amafuta ako atyo?
41014005	Olwohuba amafuta kano kanyala ohukuswamo edinaari chihira emia chidatu mani eseende echo baachibeeresa abamanani.” Mani beecha baasoolania omuhasi oyo muno.
41014006	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mulehe omuhasi oyo abe; Siina syeene simumufwaambya? Yaholeere esiindu silayi muno.
41014007	Olwohuba buli siha syoosi muli nende abamanani, mani munyala ohubaholera ebilai buli siha simudahiramo; nae simuchia ohuba naange esiha syoosi.
41014008	Omuhasi oyo yaholeere syabeere anyala; abahiire elalira omubiri kwaange amafuta ohukutekehera ohusiihwa.
41014009	Nae mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli abundu woosi yi Mboosi Ndai yahayaalirwe mu syalo syoosi, esiindu siyaholeere sino, bacha ohusilomalomaho nibamwichulisa.”
41014010	Mani abweene awo, mulala hu beeki ehumi nende babiri olaangwa ati, Yuda Yiskarioti, yacha eyiri abalaamisi bahuluundu, nakoonya engeri y'ohuliiramo Yesu olukwe.
41014011	Nae nibawulira batyo, beecha basangaala muno mani balaka ohumuba eseende. Mani yachaaka ohukoonya engeri y'ohumulyaamo olukwe.
41014012	Oludaalo lutaangira olw'esidyalo sy'emigaati kitaalimo amamera, oludaalo lubeteraangaho ekoondi ly'esidyaalo sya Paasaka, abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera bati, “Odaha huchie huhutekehere ena yonaliira esidyaalo sya Paasaka?”
41014013	Mani yeecha yaatuma abeeki bae babiri nababoolera ati, “Muche mu siko, mani mucha ohubukaanana nende omusaacha okiingire esyoongo ya maachi; mani mumuloonde,
41014014	mani muboolere omweene nyumba yiyengiramo muti, ‘Omweekesa aboola ati, esiseenge siwundekeheere ohuliiramo esidyalo sya Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange, siri yena?’
41014015	Mani achia ohubeekesa esiseenge syaakulu sihoongo esitekeheebwe bulai; omwo nimwo mumuba mututekehere.”
41014016	Mani abeeki abo batulaniramo bacha mu siko, mani banyoola buli siindu koti lu yali nababoolera; mani bachaaka ohutekeha esidyaalo sya Paasaka.
41014017	Mani obwire nibweera, Yesu yeecha nende abeeki bae ehumi nende babiri.
41014018	Nae nibali hu meesa nibalya, Yesu yababoola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, mulala hw'eng'we, oyo oli ohulya naange, achia ohudyaamo olukwe.”
41014019	Mani bachaaka ohwelalihirira, bachaaka ohumuteeba sya mulala-mulala bati, “Niye ese, kose?”
41014020	Nae yababoolera ati, “Niye mulala hu ehumi nende babiri, oyo oli ohutoonga naange mu sikae silala.
41014021	Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu awao koti lu syandiikwa, nae chakaanire oyo olya mu mwaana w'Omuundu olukwe! Syahahirire omuundu oyo obuteebulwa.”
41014022	Nae nibali nibalya, Yesu yabukula omugaati, yakusabira ehabi, mani yaakudonyolamo, mani yababeeresa, naboola ati, “Mubukule; kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange.”
41014023	Handi yabukula esikoombe, nae niyamala ohwebasa, yasiberesa abeeki bae, mani boosi baasing'waaho.
41014024	Mani yababoolera ati, “Kano niko amabaanga kange ake elakano, akediswa hulw'abandu bangi.
41014025	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, sinja ohung'waaho handi hu syaamo sy'emisabbiibu ohwoola hu ludaalo lundahasing'weereho buyaaha mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
41014026	Nae nibamala ohweemba olweembo, batula bacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti.
41014027	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweesi mucha ohundulaho; olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Ndahahuye omwaayi, mani amakoondi kahasalaane.’
41014028	Nae nindahamale ohusyuuha, ndahabataangirire ohuchia e Galilaaya.”
41014029	Nae Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Kata boosi bahulehe, ese haba sinja ohuhuleha.”
41014030	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, mu siro sy'olwaleero syeene sino, edaaywa niyisisiiri ohuholyoohera habiri, onaba omalire ohundekaana amahabi kadatu.”
41014031	Nae Peetero yakobolamo nende esimyeni ati, “Kata nende nihuli ohufwa, ndafwa naawe, haba sinja ohuhwekaana.” Mani boosi baboola nasilala batyo.
41014032	Mani beecha bacha abundu alaangwa ati, Getesemaane; Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mwihale ano, ese hole nindekongooya.”
41014033	Mani yeecha yabukula Peetero nende Yakobbo, nende Yowaana yacha nabo, mani engisa nyiingi yamudiira yachaaka ohwelalihirira muno.
41014034	Yesu yeecha handi yababoolera ati, “Ndi nende esibeera esiingi muno, esinyala kata ohunjita-bwiita; mudong'e ano mani mube ameeso.”
41014035	Mani niyamala atyo, yasudaho mu moni budiidi, yakwa aasi yekongooya naboola ati, siba nisinyaliha, esiha sy'ohusaanda sino syahambitireho.
41014036	Mani yamala yaboola ati, “Abba, Lata, Ewe niiwe omunyala w'ebiindu byoosi; nduseho esikoombe sino; nae sitaba koti lu ese ndaha, nae hasibe koti lu ewe mweene odaha.”
41014037	Mani yeecha handi yabakaana nibakona, mani yaboolera Peetero ati, “Simooni, wesi oli ohukona? Sonyalaho ohuba ameeso kata esaa ndala?
41014038	Mube ameeso mani mwekongooye muhaye ohukwa muhuhemwa; omwooyo kweene kudaha, nae omubiri nikwo omukata.”
41014039	Handi Yesu yeecha yaatula awo yacha ohwekongooya, naalomaloma emboosi nasilala echo.
41014040	Yesu handi yeecha yakobola yabanyoola nibakona, olwohuba emoni chaabwe chali chichuule muno endoolo; mani bakotwa esyohumukobolamo.
41014041	Yesu handi yeecha yakobola ehabi lyohudatu, mani yababoolera ati, “Musikona busa nimuwuluha? Esyo simalire; esiha syahoola; Omwaana w'Omuundu alibwemo olukwe, adiiswe mu mahono kaabaholi be bibi.
41014042	Musiingire, mani huweo; bone, ochia ohudyaamo olukwe nguno yolere.”
41014043	Mani abweene awo, Yesu niyali asilomaloma, mulala hu beeki ehumi nende babiri olaangwa ati Yuda, yeecha nende esidiyiha sy'abandu nibali nende engaanga nende ebiruga, nibatula eyiri abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandiiki ba malako alala nende abahuluundu ba ebiha.
41014044	Nae omuhobi oyo yali amalire ohubabeeresa esilolero, naboola ati, “Oyo yinja ohukwa mu sirifu niye oyo busa; mani mu mudiire, mumwomiise bilai mani mumuyire.”
41014045	Mani omuhobi oyo niyeecha, yachooma tiiri eyiri Yesu, yaboola ati, “Omwaami!” Mani yaamukwa mu sirifu yaamuheesa.
41014046	Mani beecha bamukwaaho bamudiira.
41014047	Nae mulala hu bandu bali beemere aambi awo yasobolayo olugaanga lwae, mani yatemaho ohutwi hu muhalaabani w'omulaamisi muhuluundu.
41014048	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mwiichire nende engaanga alala nende ebiruga ohundiira koti abechera omunyaka?
41014049	Buli ludaalo ndabereenge naang'we ninjekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae, nae mwahaya ohudiira. Nae lehe ebyandiikibwa byolerefu byolerere.”
41014050	Mani boosi bamuleha, beeruha.
41014051	Mani omusyaani muraaga yaloonda hu Yesu natefwaalire esiindu syoosi hu mubiri ohutusaho niyeboyere efuungo yong'ene; mani beecha bamukwaaho,
41014052	nae yeecha yabechimulaho, yabalehera efuungo eyo, yeruha nawawo syekenye.
41014053	Mani beecha bayira Yesu eyiri omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene; mani abalaamisi bandi bahuluundu nende abahuluundu b'ebiha alala nende abandiiki ba malako beecha boosi bebuusa.
41014054	Nae Peetero owali alondeere eyale hu Yesu, ohwolera elalira mu lwanyi lw'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene; yali yehaale nende abaliindi, niyoota omuliro.
41014055	Bulaanu abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende ab'esiina boosi bateeberesa esifune syeene sinyala syakera beeta Yesu; nae bahaya kata ohusinyoola.
41014056	Olwohuba abandu bangi beecha batusa obufune bwobubacha hu Yesu, nae ebifune byaabwe ebyo byahaya ohufwaanana.
41014057	Handi abandu bandi basiingira batusa obufune bw'obubacha nibaboola bati,
41014058	“Hwawulira wuno naboola ati, ‘Njia ohugemula enyumba ya Nasae yino eyombahwa nende amahono, nae mu ndaalo chidatu, njia ohwombaha eyiindi, eyitombahwa nende amahono.’ ”
41014059	Kata katyo, abulao obufune bwaabwe obwanyala ohufwaanana.
41014060	Mani omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yasingira yeema akati-kaati waabwe, yateeba Yesu ati, “Obulaho esiindu syoosi syonyala wakaluhamo? Sifune siina syeene si bano bali ohuhufunaana?”
41014061	Nae Yesu yawuleera busa yahaya ohukaluhamo esiindu syoosi. Handi omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Niiwe Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae w'Ehabi?”
41014062	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Nise; handi wahabone Omwaana w'Omuundu niyehaale hu muhono muluungi okwa Nasae wobunyala bwoosi, handi niyeechera hu maleesi komu Kulu.”
41014063	Nae omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha yataandula engubo chae, naboola ati, “Lwasiina handi husikoonyeresa obufune bundi?
41014064	Mbao mwewuliirire enomanoma yae eyifwoola Nasae eyo. Nang'we muheengao mutye?” Mani boosi beecha bamuheengera omusango bati ahoyeere ohufwa.
41014065	Mani abandi bachaaka ohumufuchaho amate, bamuboya mu moni, mani bamupaama, nibaboola bati, “Mani tuumbulaho!” Mani Abasirikaari bamudiira bachaaka ohumuhuya ebifuusi.
41014066	Nae Peetero niyali nasisiiri mulwaanyi aasi, mulala hu bahalaabani bahaana b'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene yeecha;
41014067	mani yabona Peetero niyoota omuliro, yamwehaliirisa, mani yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wesi obeere nende Yesu Omunasareeti.”
41014068	Nae Peetero yekaana, naboola ati, “Ese siwumao siimanyire kata ngoterwe syoliho.” Mani yasingira yaatula erwaanyi yeema husiruwa.
41014069	Handi omuhalaabani muhaana yeecha yamubona mani yaboolera abandu bali nibeemere awo ati, “Omusaacha wuno niye mulala hu bandu abo.”
41014070	Peetero handi yekaana. Nae ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, abandu bali nibeemere awo, handi bosi baboolera Peetero bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, ewe oli mulala hu bandu abo busa; olwohuba oli Omugalilaaya.”
41014071	Mani Peetero yachaaka ohwebwaaba alala nende ohwechuba ati, “Ese siimanyire omusaacha wuno yimuli ohulomalomaho.”
41014072	Abweene awo, ni edaaywa yiholyooha ehabi lyohubiri. Mani Peetero niyechulisa koti Yesu yali amuboolere ati, “Edaaywa niyitaholyoohera habiri, onaba wundekaanire hadatu.” Mani yatunduha yaalira muno.
41015001	Mani nibwahya buti, abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abahuluundu b'ebiha nende abandiiki ba malako, nende ab'esiina boosi beehasa oluhiiho lw'ohweteebanaho; mani beecha baboya Yesu, bamutusa awo bamuyira ohumudiisa Pilaato.
41015002	Nae Pilaato yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mbao niiwe oboolere otyo.”
41015003	Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu beecha bamufunaana ebiindu ebiingi muno.
41015004	Pilaato handi yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe obulaho esiindu syoosi esy'ohukobolamo? Bonaho obuungi bw'emisaango chibahufunaana.”
41015005	Nae Yesu haba siyakobolamo esiindu syoosi, sino syakera Pilaato yawuka muno.
41015006	Bulaanu hubuli sidyaalo sya Paasaka, Pilaato yali yanala ohulehuuliraanga abandu omuboye yeesi yibaba nibamusabire.
41015007	Nae hu bataana abali mu mboye, abali bahola omusango okw'obutemo muhusasakala, mwalimo omusaacha wundi olaangwa, Bbarabba.
41015008	Mani esidiyiha syeecha eyiri Pilaato ohumusaba abaholere koti luyali yanala ohubaholeraanga.
41015009	Nae Pilaato yeecha yabateeba ati, “Mudaha mbalehuulire Omutuki w'Abayudaaya?”
41015010	Olwohuba Pilaato yali amanyire ati, ehali-hali ly'abalaamisi bahuluundu nilyo elyakera bamudiisa Yesu.
41015011	Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu, beecha badondobania esidiyiha sy'abandu sisabe Pilaato amale kabalehulira Bbarabba busa.
41015012	Nae Pilaato handi yeecha yabateeba ati, “Nae ndaahole endye omusaacha wuno yimulaanga muti Omutuki w'Abayudaaya?”
41015013	Nae abandu boosi bahuumulira akulu bati, “Mumuhomerere.”
41015014	Nae Pilaato yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina, sibi siina syaholere?” Nae bemeeda busa ohuhuumula nibaboola bati, “Mumuhomerere.”
41015015	Nae ohudaha ohubasangaasa, Pilaato yabalehulira Bbarabba; nae nibamala ohutoocha Yesu, Pilaato yeecha yabadiisa Yesu bache bamuhomerere.
41015016	Mani abasirikaari beecha bayira Yesu mu lubiri (olulaangwa luti Praetorium); mani beecha balaanga omukanda kw'Abasirikaari kwoosi ohwebuusa alala.
41015017	Mani beecha bamufwaasa ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi, basiinga engata ya amawa, bamufwaasa hu mutwe koti esitweetwe.
