41015018	Mani bachaaka ohumuheesa nibaboola bati, “Yoga, Omutuki w'Abayudaaya!”
41015019	Mani bamuhuya hu mutwe nende ekada, bamufuchaho amate, mani basigama nibamwiinamira.
41015020	Nae nibamala ohumuhoomolera, bamufwaalulamo ekaanju ly'omudoba kwa ranjaayi, mani bamufwaasa engubo cheene. Mani bamuyira erwaanyi ohumuhomerera.
41015021	Mani babukaanana nende omusaacha wali nakeenda busa owali atula mu lukoongo lundi, olaangwa Simooni ow'Esireeni, simwaana Alekisaanda nende Rufusi, mani bamuyiika ohukinga omusalabba kwa Yesu.
41015022	Mani bamuleeta bamwoosa abundu yibalaanga bati, Gologoosa (Amahulundu kasyo mbwe, Esifwo sy'ebiyaanga).
41015023	Mani beecha bamubeeresa efwiini yibasasiremo ekaha; nae yahaya ohuying'wa.
41015024	Mani bamala bamuhomerera, bamala bakabana engubo chae, nibachubbiraho eha, ohumanya sibuli muundu ayira.
41015025	Mani nibamuhomerera hu musalabba esaa y'ohudatu.
41015026	Nae esyandiiko sy'esifune simufwaambya syasoma siti, “Omutuki wa Abayudaaya.”
41015027	Nae abweene awo wosi bahomererawo abeebi babiri alala nende Yesu, mulala hu muhono kwae muluungi, owundi hu muhono kwae mukooda.
41015029	Nae abandu bali nibabitao, bawuka busa, bayuuya emitwe nibaboola bati, “Mbao! Ewe owahalikule enyumba ya Nasae handi wayombahira mu ndaalo chidatu,
41015030	wewonie omweene, handi yiha aasi ohutula hu musalabba!”
41015031	Nilwo nasilala lu Balaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abandiiki ba malako lu bamuhoomolera nibaboola bati, “Yawonia abandi; nae omweene haba saanyala ohwewonia.
41015032	Leha Kristo, Omutuki w'Abayisirayiri, bulaanu yeehe hu musalabba hubone huhufukiirire.” Kata abo abali bahomereerwe nae bosi bamuhoomolera.
41015033	Nae esaa y'ohusaasaba niyoola, esirima syadiira hu syalo syoosi ohwoola esaa y'ohutaanu-na-hane.
41015034	Nae hu saa y'ohutaanu-na-hane, Yesu yalira nende ekono ly'akulu ati, “Eli, Eli, lama sabach-thani?” amahulundu mbwe, “Nasae wange, Nasae wange, lwasiina wunjwang'ire?”
41015035	Nae abandu bandi abali beemere awo, nibawulira batyo, baboola bati, “Bone, mbawo alaanga Elija.”
41015036	Mani mulala yeruha yabukula esyaangu yasiiniha mu fwini yahaliha, yaasita hu kada, mani yaamubeeresa ohung'wa naboola ati, “Muliindeho, lehe hubone Elija naneeche yamwanula hu musalabba.”
41015037	Nae Yesu yahuumula mu kono ly'akulu naalira mani yakwisa omwooyo.
41015038	Nae engubo y'omunyumba ya Nasae yataanduha akati, ohutula akulu ohwoola aasi.
41015039	Nae omusirikaari muhunuufu, owali yeemere namutingaalire, niyabona ati akwisire omwooyo atyo, yaboola ati, “Mubwadyeeri, wuno abeere Omwaana wa Nasae! ”
41015040	Abahasi bandi bosi bali awo nibabonera eyale, mwabo nimwo omwali, Maria Magadaleena, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo muyere nende Yosesi, nende Saalome,
41015041	abali abaloondi bae handi abamuhalabaniraanga nasisiiri e Galilaaya; handi nende abahasi bandi bangi bosi abecha nae e Yerusaalemu.
41015042	Nae obwire nibweera, koti lwali oludaalo lw'Ohwetekeheramo, luno nilwo oludaalo lutaangirira Sabbaato,
41015043	Yosefu owe Arimaseya, yi bandu bali nibaberesa oluyaali mu siina, handi yesi owali naliindiriire Obwaami bwa Nasae, yenyiira mani yacha eyiri Pilaato yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu.
41015044	Nae Pilaato yesinduha muno ohuwulira ati, Yesu amalire ohufwa, mani yalaanga omuhulundu wa basirikaari yamuteeba nibuli obwadyeeri mbwe Yesu amalire ohufwa.
41015045	Nae omuhulundu wa basirikaari niyaboolera Pilaato ati, Yesu amalire ohufwa, yafukiirira Yosefu ohuyira omubiri kwa Yesu.
41015046	Mani Yosefu yakula esuuka lafu, yawanula omubiri kwa Yesu, yaakuboya mu suuka lafu elyo, mani yaakuta mu ng'ani yibali babaachire mu lwaanda; mani yaasindikisa okukina kuhoongo, yaakwikalira hu ng'ani.
41015047	Maria Magadaleena nende Maria ng'ina Yosesi babona bulai yibasiiha Yesu.
41016001	Bulaanu oludaalo lwa Sabbaato nilwawa, Maria Magadaleena, nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo alala nende Saalome, baleeta amafuta k'esiing'aari, nibadaha ohubaha omubiri kwa Yesu.
41016002	Nae hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, echuli elyuuba hulitula liti, abahasi bano bawuuna ohuchia hu siriindwa.
41016003	Bali nibateebana abeene-na-beene bati, “Wina onatutusireho ekina hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa?”
41016004	Nae niboola hu siriindwa, batingaala akulu babona okukina nikumalire ohusiindikiswa kwatula hu siriindwa--kwali okukina kuhoongo muno.
41016005	Nae nibengira ng'ani bati, babona omusyaani muraaga owefwaalire ekaanju lya rachaari niyehaale hu muhono muluungi, mani beecha besinduha muno.
41016006	Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutesiinduha haba; manyire endi muli ohukoonya Yesu owe Nasareeti owahomererwa hu musalabba. Asyuhiire, haba saali ano; mubone abundu yibamwalisa.
41016007	Mani muche muboolere abeeki bae nende Peetero muti, abatangiriremo ohuchia e Galilaaya; eyo niyo yimucha ohumubonera, koti luyababoolera.”
41016008	Mani batula erwaanyi, beeruha nibatula hu ng'ani; olwohuba obuti alala nende ohutengereha byali bibadiirire muno; mani haba sibabooleraho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi, olwohuba bali batiire muno.
41016009	Nae niyasyuuha, oludaalo lutaangira mu juma, yataangira ohubonehera Maria Magadaleena, yiyali yerusamo emisaambwa chitaanu-na-chibiri.
41016010	Mani Maria Magadaleena wuno yacha yaboolera abaloondi bae abali nibalira handi nibesisiha muno.
41016011	Nae nibawulira bati, Yesu mulamu, handi omuhasi wuno amalire ohumubonaho, haba sibasifukiirira.
41016012	Lunyuma, Yesu yabonehera abeeki bae babiri mu ngeri yindi nibali nibakeenda nibacha mulukoongo lundi.
41016013	Mani bano bakaluhayo baboolera abadong'ereyo, nae bahaya ohufukiirira ebyaabwe.
41016014	Muhumaliiriha, Yesu yabonehera abeeki bae ehumi-na-mulala nibali humeesa nibalya; yaboolobya muno olwobutafukiirira bwaabwe alala nende ohuba n'emyooyo myomeranu, olwohuba bali bahayire ohufukiirira eby'abo abali nibamubweene naamalire ohusyuuha.
41016015	Mani yababoolera ati, “Muche mu syalo syoosi, mani muyaale Emboosi Ndai, eyiri ebiloonge byoosi.
41016016	Oyo ofukiirira, handi yabatiisibwa, achia ohuwonisibwa; nae oyo otafukiirira, omusango kucha ohumuhira.
41016017	Mani buno nibwo obulolero bucha ohuba nende abo abafukiiririra: muliita lyaange, bacha ohwirusa emisaambwa; bacha ohulomaloma enimi njiaha;
41016018	bacha ohudiira enjuha mu mahono kaabwe, handi nibang'wa obutwa bw'amaani, sibuchia ohubahola bubi; bacha ohwisa amahono kaabwe hu balwaaye, mani baone.”
41016019	Nae Omwaami Yesu, niyamala ohulomaloma nabo, yayirwa Mukulu, mani yehala hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae.
41016020	Nae abeeki bae, bacha mani bayaala Emboosi Ndai buli abundu, nae Omwaami yaba naaholera alala nabo, nga yomiisa emboosi chaabwe nende obulolero busiira emboosi echo. Amiina.
42001001	Koti lu baandu baangi bamalire ohutekeha bulai mu bwandiike ebiindu bituholehemo,
42001002	handi koti abo abatangira ohweboneraho abeene, handi bahalabanira emboosi eyo batudiisa,
42001003	ese syesi nimalire bulaanu ohwehaliirisa bulai ebiindu bino, sibweene endi silayi ohuhwandiikira ewe ow'oluyaali Tefiro, nitekeehe bilai ebiindu koti byalondehana,
42001004	hu weesi onyale ohumanya obwadyeeri bweene bw'ebiindu bi bahweekesa.
42001005	Mundaalo chi Herode yali naali omutuki wa Buyudaaya, waliwo omulaamisi olaangwa Sakariya, owali ow'oluyia lw'abalaamisi lwa Abbija; handi omuhasi wae olaangwa Elisabeeti, yali ow'oluyia lwa Arooni.
42001006	Mani bombi bali abalungifu mu moni wa Nasae, nibalondakirira amalako koosi nende ebidahibwa by'Omwaami byoosi ataali ohudondobanaho kata.
42001007	Nae sibaliho nende omwaana haba, olwohuba Elisabeeti yali omukuumba, handi bombi bali bahulire mu myaka.
42001008	Olwoola, Sakariya niyali ali ohuhola omulimo kw'obulaamisi mu moni wa Nasae, olwohuba oluyia lwae nilwo olwali olw'ohuhalaabanira Nasae mu biha ebyo,
42001009	ohweema hu ndekeha yaabwe y'obulaamisi, eha yamukwaho ache aniohese obubbaani mu nyumba ya Nasae.
42001010	Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu syoosi syali nisyekongooyera erwaanyi mu biha byohuniohesa obubbaani.
42001011	Mani awo niwo yi malaika w'Omwaami yeecha yaamubonehera niyeemere hu lwaande lw'omuhono muluungi kw'alutaari y'ohunioheseraho obubbaani.
42001012	Nae Sakariya niyamubona, eholo yamubba muno mani obuti bwamudiira.
42001013	Nae malaika yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Sakariya, otatya, olwohuba ohwekongooya hwao huwuliirwe, mani omuhasi wao Elisabeeti, achia ohuhwibulira omwaana musyaani, mani wahamulaange eliita oti Yowaana.
42001014	Mani ochia ohuba nende esangaalo nende omwehoyo, mani abandu bangi bahehoye olw'ohwibulwa hwae;
42001015	olwohuba yahabe omuhunuufu muno mu moni w'Omwaami, mani siyahang'weeho efwiini yoosi kata esy'ohung'wa simeesa syoosi, mani achia ohwichusibwa Mwooyo Mwolerefu, ohutulira busa elalira munda ya ng'ina.
42001016	Achia ohuchuusa abaana ba Yisirayiri bangi abakaluse eyiri Nasae Omwaami waabwe,
42001017	handi achia ohumutaangirira mu mwooyo nende amaani ka Elija, achuuse emyooyo cha basimwaana bandu chikaluhe hu baana baabwe, nende ba nandawulira bakaluhe hu makesi k'abalungifu; achia ohuhola abandu betekehere Omwaami waabwe.”
42001018	Nae Sakariya yaboolera malaika oyo ati, “Sino, ese ndahasimanye endye? Olwohuba bulaanu ese ndi omusaacha mukofu, handi omuhasi wange yesi ahulire mu myaka.”
42001019	Nae malaika yamukobolamo ati, “Niise Gabulieri, oweemere mu moni wa Nasae; mani ndumirwe ohulomaloma yooli, handi ohuhuleetera emboosi ndayi chino.
42001020	Mani bone, ochia ohuwuleera handi bihuhaye ohulomaloma, ohwolera elalira hu ludaalo lu biindu bino byaholerere, olwohuba sofukiriire emboosi change, echicha ohwolerera mu biha byaacho.”
42001021	Nae abandu bali baliindiriire erwaanyi, beecha bawuka olwohuba Sakariya yali ahiindire muno mu nyumba ya Nasae.
42001022	Mani niyatula erwaanyi, haba siyanyala ohulomalomaho nabo, mani bamanya busa bati, yali aboneheerwe mu nyumba ya Nasae; mani yeecha yabaholera busa obulolero, mani omweene yadoong'a natalomaloma.
42001023	Mani ebiha byae eby'ohuhalaabanira Nasae nibyawa, yakobolayo engo.
42001024	Endaalo chino nichawa, omuhasi wae Elisabeeti yeecha yafuna amabaanga, mani olw'embaka ye myoosi chitaanu yekisa abandu, naboola ati,
42001025	“Omwaami mweene niye owumbaasireho yaholera sino mu ndaalo chino, yandusaho esoni mu moni ch'abandu.”
42001026	Mu mwoosi kw'ohusaasaba, Nasae yatuma malaika Gabulieri ohuchia mu siko sye Galilaaya esilaangwa siti Nasareti,
42001027	eyiri omuhaana otaamanyireho eby'abasaacha, owali afukiirisaanie ohudeehisania nende omusaacha olaangwa ati Yosefu, ow'omunyumba ya Daudi. Eliita ly'omuhaana otaamanyireho eby'abasaacha oyo lyali Maria.
42001028	Malaika oyo yeecha yaali mani naboola ati, “Yoga, Ewe owabereswa ehabi, Omwaami ali naawe!”
42001029	Nae enomanoma eyo yamusindusa muno, yachaaka ohubaasa mu mwooyo kwae amahulundu k'eheesa yino.
42001030	Nae malaika yamuboolera ati, “Maria, otatya, olwohuba Nasae ahubeere ehabi.
42001031	Mani bona, ochia ohufuna amabaanga, wiibule omwaana musyaani, mani wahamulaange eliita oti Yesu.
42001032	Achia ohuba omuhunuufu, handi yahalaangwe Omwaana woyo oli Akulu Muno; handi Omwaami Nasae achia ohumubeeresa esisaala sy'obutuki sya Daudi kukaang'ene,
42001033	handi achia ohutuka enyumba ya Yakobbo, emyaaka choosi; mani obutuki bwae sibuchia huwaao.”
42001034	Nae Maria yaboolera malaika ati, “Sino sichia ohunyalihana sitye, olwohuba ese siimanyire eby'abasaacha?”
42001035	Nae malaika yamuboolera ati, “Mwooyo Mwolerefu achia ohuhwiihaho, handi amaani kooyo oli Akulu Muno kacha ohuhubwiiha; mani sakira omwaana ochia ohwibulwa achia ohulaangwa omwolerefu, Omwaana wa Nasae.
42001036	Mani bona, omuhasi woluya lwao Elisabeeti, mu myaka chae chobukofu, yesi yaamalire ohunyoola amabaanga k'omwaana musyaani; mani kuno nikwo omwoosi kwae kw'ohusaasaba naali asito, oyo yibalangaanga omukuumba.
42001037	Olwohuba, sibulao esiindu syoosi esitanyaliha eyiri Nasae.”
42001038	Mani Maria yeecha yaboola ati, “Ese mbano, ndi omuhalaabani w'Omwaami; leha sindeholeheho koti lw'oboola.” Mani malaika yeecha yaamuleha.
42001039	Mu ndaalo echo, Maria yasingira yacha bwaangu mu syaalo sy'engulu, mu siko sya Buyudaaya,
42001040	mani yengira mu nyumba ya Sakariya, yaheesa Elisabeeti.
42001041	Nae Elisabeeti niyawulira busa ati ohuheesa hwa Maria, omwaana yachaaka ohutumakala munda; mani Elisabeeti yamala yechuswa Mwooyo Mwolerefu
42001042	mani yaalomalomera mu kono lyaakulu naboola ati, “Oli nende ehabi mu bahasi boosi, handi esiri munda yao siri nende ehabi!
42001043	Sino sinjolereho sitye, ng'ina Mwaami wange ohwiicha yindi?
42001044	Olwohuba bonaho, ohuheesa hwao nihuungwiire mu matwi busa huti, ni omwaana adumakala munda yange olwesangaalo.
42001045	Handi w'ehabi oyo owafukiirira ati, ebyo ebyamuboolerwa ohutula eyiri Omwaami byaholerere.”
42001046	Nae Maria yaboola ati, “Omwooyo kwaange kufumia muno Omwaami,
42001047	handi omwooyo kwaange kwehoyera mu Nasae Omuwonia wange,
42001048	olwohuba abweene obuloonga bw'omuhalaabani wae. Olwohuba boneho, ohutula buti, enjibulo choosi chicha ohunangaanga ow'ehabi;
42001049	olwohuba oyo ow'Obunyala bwoosi, yaholeere eby'amaani, handi eliita lyae lyolerefu.
42001050	Handi esisa syae siri hu bamutya ohutula hu lwiibulo lulala ohwoola hu lundi.
42001051	Yekeese amaani mu biindu bi mahono kae kahola, asakuulire ebibaaso by'omumyooyo chaabehusa abeene,
42001052	yeesere aasi abahunuufu ohutula hu bisaala byaabwe by'obutuki, handi yaniinia akulu abaloonga;
42001053	yekuuse abalumwa enjala nende ebiindu bilai, nae abanyali abatusireyo bihaya.
42001054	Ahonyere Yisirayiri omuhalaabani wae, niyechuliise esisa syae,
42001055	koti luyaboolera bakuuka yeefwe, Yibbulaimu nende abechulu bae endaalo choosi-choosi.”
42001056	Mani Maria yamenya nende Elisabeeti ohumala aambi w'emyoosi chidatu, mani yamala yaakobola engo wae.
42001057	Bulaanu, ebiha bya Elisabeeti ohwetusaho nibyoola, yebula omwaana musyaani.
42001058	Nae abanaluya bae alala nende abo abasibirana nae nibawulira bati Nasae akwiriire Elisabeeti esisa siingi sityo, beecha basangaalira alala nae.
42001059	Nae oludaalo lwa chitanu-na-chidatu nilwoola, beecha ohuheba omwaana oyo; mani bali badaha ohumukuliha eliita lya simwaana bati Sakariya,
42001060	nae ng'ina yaboola ati, “Haba daawe; achia ohulaangwa Yowaana.”
42001061	Nae bamuboolera bati, “Mu luya lwao, muwumamo omuundu yeesi olaangwa ati, Yowaana.”
42001062	Mani baholera simwaana obulolero nibadaha ohumanya koti luyahamulaangire.
42001063	Nae yabasaba ekina ly'ohwandiikaho, mani yandiika ati, “Eliita lyae nilyo Yowaana.” Mani abandu boosi bawukaho busa.
42001064	Mani abweene awo, ni omunwa kwa Sakariya kwikuha, ni olulimi lwae luboololoha, mani nachaaka ohulomaloma, naakinia Nasae.
42001065	Mani obuti bweecha bwadiira abandu bamenya aambi nae boosi. Mani abandu beecha balomaloma hu biindu bino byoosi mu syaalo sy'engulu sye Buyudaaya syoosi;
42001066	mani abo boosi ababiwulira, babibiiha mu myooyo chaabwe nibaboola bati, “Nae omwaana wuno yahabe siina?” Olwohuba omuhono kwa Nasae kwali nae.
42001067	Mani Sakariya simwaana Yowaana yeecha yechula Mwooyo Mwolerefu, mani yatumbula ebidiira hu mwaana oyo naboola ati,
42001068	“Nasae Omwaami wa Yisirayiri akinisibwe, olwohuba akeniye abandu bae handi yabanunula,
42001069	mani atusingisiire olwiika lw'obuwonia mu nyumba ya Daudi omuhalaabani wae,
42001070	koti lu yalomaloma hale mu minwa cha banabbi bae boolerefu,
42001071	ati, achia ohutuwonia atutuse mu basuku beefwe, handi atutuse mu mahono k'abandu batusyuula boosi;
42001072	atwekese esisa siyalaka ba kuuka yeefwe, handi niyechulisa Embuliirisania yae enjolerefu,
42001073	esichubo siyechuba eyiri Yibbulaimu seefwe,
42001074	ohutubeeresa ati efwe, nihununuulwe ohutula mu mihono chaabasuku beefwe, hunyale ohumuhalaabanira ataali ohutya hwoosi,
42001075	mu bwolerefu nende obuluungifu mu moni wae mu bulamu bwefwe bwoosi.
42001076	Nae ewe, mwaana ewe, ochia ohulaangwa omunabbi w'oyo oli Akulu Muno; olwohuba ochia ohutangiriramo Omwaami, ohumutekehera engira chae,
42001077	ohuberesa abandu bae amakesi k'obuwonia, muhuleherwamo hw'ebibi byaabwe.
42001078	Nae ohubitira mu sisa siingi sya Nasae weefwe, oludaalo nilutwichiire ohutula akulu,
42001079	ohuberesa obulafu abandu abo abehala mu siirima nende mu siiniha sy'ohufwa, ohulungiha amakulu keefwe mu ngira y'emireembe.”
42001080	Mani omwaana yahula, handi yaaba omwomiifu mu mwooyo, mani yamenya mu siparara ohwoola hu ludaalo lu yeyekesera alafu eyiri abandu ba Yisirayiri.
42002001	Mundaalo echo, Kaisaali Agusito yatusa elako ati abandu boosi mu bwaami bwae bahoyeere ohubalibwa.
42002002	Huno nihwo ohwali ohubalibwa hutangira Kwirino naali Gafana wa Siiria.
42002003	Mani buli muundu yeesi yacha ohubalibwa, mu siko syae.
42002004	Mani Yosefu yesi yatula mu Galilaaya, mu siko sye Nasareti, yacha e Buyudaaya, mu siko sya Daudi, esilaangwa siti Bbeteleheemu, olwohuba yali ow'enyumba handi ow'olwiibulo lwa Daudi,
42002005	ohuchia ohubalibwa nende Maria, yiyali afukiirisaanie nae ohudeehisania. Maria oyo yali ali asito.
42002006	Nae nibali eyo, ebiha byae by'ohwetusaho byoola.
42002007	Mani yebula omwaana wae musyaani omwikula-nda, yamubwiha mu bikubo, mani yamwalisa mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo, olwohuba sibanyoola obweyaango mu nyumba chaabakeni.
42002008	Nae mu syaalo esyo, mwalimo abaayi nibali mu syaayiro, nibaliindire ebyaayo byaabwe esiro.
42002009	Mani malaika wa Nasae yeecha yababonehera, mani oluyaali lwa Nasae lweechula lwaaduha nilubebodohaanie, mani beecha besinduha muno.
42002010	Nae malaika yababoolera ati, “Mutaba nohutya; olwohuba bone, mbaleetera emboosi ndayi ch'esangaalo liingi, ericha ohuba hu bandu boosi;
42002011	olwohuba olwaleero luno, mu siko sya Daudi, Omuwonia abebuliirwe, niye Kristo Omwaami.
42002012	Mani hano niho ahanaba ahalolero heeng'we: mucha ohwakaana omwaana mudoto yibabwihire mu bikubo, handi niyeyaliise mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo.”
42002013	Nae bwaangu-bwaangu, malaika oyo alala nende bamalaika bandi bangi abo Mukulu baboneha nibafumia Nasae nibaboola bati,
42002014	“Oluyaali lube eyiri Nasae akulu Mukulu, nae emireembe kibe hu syaalo mu bandu abahola ebiindu bisangaasa Nasae!”
42002015	Nae Bamalayika nibatulao bawao bacha Mukulu, abaayi beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Mulehe huchie e Bbeteleheemu, hubone esiindu sino esiholehaane, si Nasae atwekeese.”
42002016	Mani badindikirira ohuchia, bakaana Maria nende Yosefu, alala nende omwaana mudoto oyo, niyeyaliise mu bwaato bu byaayo biriiramo.
42002017	Mani nibabona omwaana oyo, batumbula ebyo ebyali bibabooleerwe ebidiira hu mwaana wuno;
42002018	Mani abo boosi ababiwulira, bawuka muno ebyo bi baayi bali nibababoolere.
42002019	Nae Maria yabiiha ebiindu bino byoosi, nabibasaangaho muno mu mwooyo kwae.
42002020	Mani abaayi bakobolayo ewaabwe, nibakinia handi nibaberesa Nasae oluyaali, hulweebyo byoosi bibali nibawuliire handi nibabweene, olwohuba byali busa koti lubyali nibibaboolerwe.
42002021	Nae oluunyuma lw'endaalo chitanu-na-chidatu, omwaana niyali amalire ohuhebwa, yabeereswa eliita mbwe Yesu, eliita li malaika yaamubeeresa natayerwa munda.
42002022	Nae ebiha nibyoola eby'ohulabisibwamo babe abolerefu, koti elako lya Musa lyali, Yosefu nende Maria baleeta Yesu e Yerusaalemu ohumudiisa Nasae
42002023	(koti lu syandiikwa mu lako lya Nasae siti, “Buli mwaana musyaani yeesi, owikula enda ya ng'ina achia ohulangaangwa omwolerefu wa Nasae” )
42002024	handi bacha ohutusaanga esiyaanwa esihoyerwa koti lu lako lya Nasae liboola liti, “Amaguugu kabiri, oba amaburuku madoto kabiri.”
42002025	Bulaanu, mu Yerusaalemu, mwalimo omusaacha olaangwa mbwe Simioni, owali omulungifu handi owaheera Nasae muno, owali nalindaanga ohulemeswa omwooyo hwa abandu ba Yisirayiri, handi nga Mwooyo Mwolerefu amuliho.
42002026	Handi yali yamala ohwekeswa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu ati, haba saachia hufwa nataabona Kristo wa Nasae.
42002027	Mani niyali niyemiriirwe nende Mwooyo, yeecha mu nyumba ya Nasae; mani abebusi ba Yesu nibali hubamwiingisa bati mu nyumba ya Nasae, bamuholere koti lu lako liboola,
42002028	Simioni yeecha yaakiinga Yesu mu mahono, mani yebasa Nasae naboola ati,
42002029	“Omwaami, bulaanu onyala ohuleha omuhalaabani wao yawaawo mu mireembe, koti lu mboosi yao yiboola;
42002030	olwohuba emoni change chimalire ohubonaho obuwonia bwao
42002031	bu ewe mweene watekehera mu moni w'abandu boosi,
42002032	obulafu bubonera Abateende, handi obw'oluyaali eyiri abandu bao Yisirayiri.”
42002033	Mani simwaana nende ng'ina bawuka muno ebiindu byali bimulomalomwaho;
42002034	handi Simioni yabasabira omukisa mani yaboolera Maria ng'ina ati, “Bona, omwaana wuno ateerweo hulw'ohukwa nende ohusiingira hw'abandu bangi mu Yisirayiri, handi nende ohuba esilolero siyinganisibwa
42002035	(handi olugaanga lucha ohuhufumita lubite mu mwooyo kwao kwosi), hu bibaaso by'emyooyo miingi binyale ohubonehana alafu.”
42002036	Handi waliwo nabbi muhasi, Ana, omuhaana wa Fanueli, ow'oluyia lw'Asheri; yali omukofu naali nende emyaaka miingi muno. Ohutula nawamo omubiri ati, yamenya nende wamwe wamutusamo omubiri oyo emyaaka chitanu-na-chibiri,
42002037	mani yadoong'a koti omuhasi mufwiirwe olw'embaka y'emyaaka amahumi kataanu-na-kadatu-na-kine. Haba siyalehaho enyumba ya Nasae, nae yabechaanga busa omwo nalaama, handi nasiiba alala nende ohwekongooya Nasae esiro nende esideete.
42002038	Nae niyolerao ebiha byeene ebyo, yebasa Nasae, handi yaboolera abo boosi abali baliindiriire ohuwonisibwa hwa Yerusaalemu, ebidiira hu mwaana oyo.
42002039	Nae nibamala ohuhola ebyo byoosi, bi lako lya Nasae liboola, bakobolayo mu Galilaaya, mu siko syaabwe syeene sye Nasareti.
42002040	Mani omwaana oyo yahula, handi yaba ow'amaani, niyechula amakesi; handi ehabi ya Nasae yamuliho.
42002041	Bulaanu abebusi bae bachichaanga e Yerusaalemu buli mwaaka hu sidyaalo sya Paasaka.
42002042	Mani Yesu niyoosa emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri ech'obuhuluundu, beecha bacha e Yerusaalemu, koti lubali nibaholaanga;
42002043	Nae esidyaalo nisyawa, nibali nibakobolayo engo, omuraaga wuno Yesu yadoong'a enyuma mu Yerusaalemu. Nae sino, abebusi bae haba sibasimanya,
42002044	nae koti lubali babaasa bati ali mu basye babakeenda nabo, bakeenda oludaalo olulaamba nibatamubona, mani bachaaka ohumukoonya mu beeho bwaabwe nende mu bandu babamanyire;
42002045	nae nibatamuduuhana, bakaluha e Yerusaalemu nibamukoonya.
42002046	Endaalo chidatu nichabitao, bamuduhana naali mu nyumba ya Nasae, niyehaale mu beekesa, nabatekeresaanga handi nabateebaanga ebiteebo;
42002047	mani abo boosi abawulira by'aboola, bawuka muno amakesi kae nende engaluhamo yae.
42002048	Nae abebusi bae nibamubona, bawuka muno; mani ng'ina yamuboolera ati, “mwaana wange, lwasina otuholere otyo? Bone, ese nende lataao koti lu huhukoonyere nihwaabaaba.”
42002049	Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Bibeere bitye ohungoonya? Mubeere mukoterwe muti hoyeere ohuba mu nyumba ya Lata?”
42002050	Mani byabahaya ohumanya biyeemaho ohubaboolera ebyo.
42002051	Mani Yesu yasingira yawaawo nabo bakobola e Nasareti, mani yaba omuwulisi yibali; nae ng'ina yabiiha ebiindu bino byoosi mu mwooyo kwae.
42002052	Mani Yesu yemeeda ohuhula, handi amakesi kae kemeeda, handi yemeeda ohuheerwa nende abandu alala nende Nasae.
42003001	Mu mwaaka kw'ehumi nende chitaanu kw'obwaami bwa Tibberio Kaisaali, Pootio Pilaato naali Gafana wa Buyudaaya, nae Herode naali omutuki we situundu sya Galilaaya, nae Filipo mwaanang'ina naali omutuki we situundu sye Yiturea nende Turakoniiti; Lisania yali niye omutuki wa Abbilene,
42003002	Anasi nende Kayaafa nibali abalaamisi bahuluundu, emboosi ya Nasae yechera Yowaana omwaana wa Sakariya naali musiparara.
42003003	Mani Yowaana yacha mu situundu sya Yorudaani syoosi, nayaala ohubatiisa hwohweyolobya hulw'ohuleherwamo ebibi.
42003004	Koti lu syandiikwa mu sitabo sya cha Yisaaya omunabbi siti, “Ekono ly'omuundu wundi ohumulira musiparara niliboola liti: Mutereese engira y'Omwaami, mukolole emyaanda chae.
42003005	Buli hoondo yicha ohwichuswa, handi buli lugulu nende esigulu bicha ohukwalaaswa, nende ebyo ebyekodakoda bicha ohukololwa, nende engira ch'ebiguruguunya chicha ohunyiriswa;
42003006	handi buli muundu yeesi achia ohubona obuwonia bwa Nasae.”
42003007	Mani sakira yaboolera abandu bangi abali nibeetusireyo ababatiise ati, “Eng'we abana b'endemo! Ni wiina obalabule ohwiruha ohwewonia egiili yicha?
42003008	Mani mwaame ebyaamo bihoyera ohweyolobya, handi mutachaaka ohweboolera abeene-na-beene muti, ‘Efwe huli abana ba Yibbulaimu’; olwohuba mbaboolera endi, Nasae ali nende obunyala bwohubukula amakina kano yakaholamo abana ba Yibbulaimu.
42003009	Kata bulaanu buti, embaachi yiteerwe hu musi bweene wa buli musaala; mani buli musaala okutaama ebyaamo bilai kucha ohutemerwa aasi, mani kusukunwe mu muliro.”
42003010	Nae ebidiyiha byeecha byamuteeba biti, “Mani hunaahole siina syeene?”
42003011	Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Oli nende amakooti kabiri, leha abereseho oyo otaliho nalyo; handi oyo oli nende ebyohulya, leha yesi ahole nasilala atyo.”
42003012	Abatoosa b'omusolo bosi beecha ohubatiisibwa, mani bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, efwe hunaahole siina syeene?”
42003013	Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutatosaanga ebihira bimuhoyeere.”
42003014	Abasirikaari bosi bamuteeba bati, “Nae efwe naafwe, hunaahole siina syeene?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Mutayayaanga omuundu yeesi nimwehoonyera amaani oba nimumubachira busa, handi omuheemba kweeng'we kubamaleenge.”
42003015	Koti lu bandu bali busa nibaliindirira, handi nga boosi bali ohwetebaanga mu myooyo chaabwe ebidiira hu Yowaana, bati awundi yahaba naali niye Kristo,
42003016	nae Yowaana yabakobolamo boosi ati, “Ese mbabatiisa nende amaachi; nae oyo owuhira oluyaali ali ohwiicha, yi ese tahoyera ohuboolola esya ch'ebiraato byae; oyo niye ochia ohubabatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu handi nende omuliro.
42003017	Olubibo lwae lumuli mu muhono, ohubisa eng'aano yoosi eyiri hu lwanyi lwae lw'ohubbakiraho, handi nende ohuteera eng'aano mu syaaki syae, nae omuhuchi, achia ohukusaamba nende omuliro kutasimiswa.”
42003018	Awo mani, nachiiririra ohubachooma, nayaalira abandu Emboosi Ndai.
42003019	Nae Herode owali omutuki w'esituundu esyo, yiyali yamala ohuchooma hulwa Herodia, owali omuhasi wa mwaanang'ina handi hulw'ebibi biingi biindi biyali naaholaanga,
42003020	yameeda sino hw'ebyo byoosi, mani yekalira Yowaana mu mboye.
42003021	Bulaanu, abandu boosi nibali nibabatiisibwe, handi nende Yesu yesi niyali naamalire ohubatiisibwa, mani naali ohwekongoyaanga, Ekulu lyekulwa,
42003022	mani Mwooyo Mwolerefu yamwihaho mu ngeri y'omubiri nafwaanana koti eguugu, handi ekono lyatula Mukulu niliboola liti, “Niiwe Omwaana wange muheerwa; niiwe yi sangaliire.”
42003023	Yesu hwachaaka obuhalaabani bwae, yali aambi ow'emyaaka amahumi kadatu ech'obuhuluundu, yali omwaana (koti lusyayiribwa ohuba) wa Yosefu, omusyaani wa Heeli,
42003024	omusyaani wa Masati, omusyaani wa Leefi, omusyaani wa Meleki, omusyaani wa Yanai, omusyaani wa Yosefu,
42003025	omusyaani wa Mataasia, omusyaani wa Amosi, omusyaani wa Nahumu, omusyaani wa Esili, omusyaani wa Nagai,
42003026	omusyaani wa Maasi, omusyaani wa Mataasia, omusyaani wa Semeini, omusyaani wa Yoseki, omusyaani wa Yoda,
42003027	omusyaani wa Yowanani, omusyaani wa Reesa, omusyaani wa Serubbabbeeri, omusyaani wa Salatieli, omusyaani wa Neeri,
42003028	omusyaani wa Meleki, omusyaani wa Adi, omusyaani wa Kosamu, omusyaani wa Elimadamu, omusyaani wa Eri,
42003029	omusyaani wa Yoswa, omusyaani wa Eliesa, omusyaani wa Yorimi, omusyaani wa Masati, omusyaani wa Leefi,
42003030	omusyaani wa Simioni, omusyaani wa Yuda, omusyaani wa Yosefu, omusyaani wa Yonamu, omusyaani wa Eliakimu,
42003031	omusyaani wa Meleeya, omusyaani wa Meena, omusyaani wa Mataasa, omusyaani wa Nasani, omusyaani wa Daudi,
42003032	omusyaani wa Yese, omusyaani wa Obbedi, omusyaani wa Bbowaasi, omusyaani wa Saala, omusyaani wa Nahasoni,
42003033	omusyaani wa Aminadabbu, omusyaani wa Adimini, omusyaani wa Arini, omusyaani wa Hesirooni, omusyaani wa Pereesi, omusyaani wa Yuda,
42003034	omusyaani wa Yakobbo, omusyaani wa Yisaka, omusyaani wa Yibbulaimu, omusyaani wa Teera, omusyaani wa Nahori,
42003035	omusyaani wa Serugo, omusyaani wa Reewu, omusyaani wa Pelegi, omusyaani wa Ebberi, omusyaani wa Seela,
42003036	omusyaani wa Kainaani, omusyaani wa Arifakusadi, omusyaani wa Seemu, omusyaani wa Nowa, omusyaani wa Lameeka,
42003037	omusyaani wa Mesusela, omusyaani wa Enoka, omusyaani wa Jareedi, omusyaani wa Mahalaleeli, omusyaani wa Kainaani,
42003038	omusyaani wa Enosi, omusyaani wa Seesi, omusyaani wa Adamu, owa Nasae.
42004001	Mani Yesu, niyali yechuule Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yakobola natula e Yorudaani, mani yemirirwa nende Mwooyo oyo
42004002	hulwa embaka y'endaalo amahumi kane naali mu siparara, nahemwa nende Sitaani. Mu mbaka eyo yoosi, haba siyalyaaho esiindu syoosi; mani embaka eyo niyawa, enjala yachaaka ohumuluma.
42004003	Sitaani yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Nooba nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, lagira ekina lino lyehole omugaati.”
42004004	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Omuundu saaba mulamu hulw'ebyohulya byong'ene.’ ”
42004005	Handi Sitaani yeecha yaamuyira akulu, mani yamweekesa obwaami bwoosi obw'ohusyaalo mu siha silala,
42004006	mani yamuboolera ati, “Ese njia ohuhubeeresa obunyala buno bwoosi, alala nende oluyaali lwaabwo; olwohuba bwamala ohumbereswa, mani mbubeeresa oyo yeesi yimba nindaha.
42004007	Mani ewe niwunyinamira, buno bwoosi bucha ohuba obwao busa.”
42004008	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Ohoyeere ohwiinamiraanga Nasae, Omwaami wao, handi oyo yeng'ene niye yonahalabaniranga.’ ”
42004009	Handi Sitaani yeecha yayira Yesu e Yerusaalemu, mani yamudungeeresa hu sifwo sihira obuleeyi hu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yamuboolera ati, “Nooba nooli Omwaana wa Nasae, yakuha otule ano okwe aasi;
42004010	olwohuba syandiikwa siti, ‘Achia ohutuma bamalaika bae bahwakaanire mani bahuliinde,’
42004011	handi ‘Bacha ohuhukiingira akulu hu mahono kaabwe, ohaye ohuhuya ohukulu hwao hu kina.’ ”
42004012	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Siboolwaanga siti, ‘Otahemaanga Nasae Omwaami wao.’ ”
42004013	Mani Sitaani niyali amalireyo buli sihemo, yamutulaho yaalinda esiha siindi syoole.
42004014	Mani Yesu yeecha yakaluha e Galilaaya nasisiiriho amaani ka Mwooyo, mani efuma yae yasasaana yaswaania esyaalo esyo syoosi.
42004015	Mani yeecha yekesa mu Sinagoogi chaabwe, mani buli muundu yeesi yaamukinia.
42004016	Yesu yeecha yoola e Nasareti, yiyali yahusirwa; mani yeecha yacha mu Sinagoogi, koti lu yali yanala ohuholaanga, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato. Mani yeecha yaasingira ohusoma;
42004017	nae bone beecha bamubeeresa esitabo sya nabbi Yisaaya. Yabwihula esitabo esyo, mani yakaana yisyandiikwa siti,
42004018	“Mwooyo w'Omwaami yandiho, olwohuba amalire ohumbahaho amafuta ohuyaalira abamanani, Emboosi Ndai Yanduma ohulaangirira eyiri abadiirwa endi bacha ohulehuulwa, handi abawofu endi bacha ohulimbula babone, nende abehalwaho ohulehwa babe nende emireembe,
42004019	ohulaangirira endi omwaaka kwafukiirirwa ohuba okw'Omwaami kwolere.”
42004020	Mani Yabwihawo esitabo esyo, yeecha yaasikalusira omuliindi oyo, mani yehala aasi; mani emoni ch'abandu boosi abali mu Sinagoogi, chamuweeraho.
42004021	Mani yeecha yachaaka ohubaboolera ati, “Olwaleero, ebyandiiko byolerefu bino, byolereere koti lumuwuliire mutyo.”
42004022	Mani boosi bamulomalomaho bulai muno, handi bawuka muno obulayi bw'emboosi chatulaanga mu munwa kwae; mani baboola bati, “Wuno haba siniye omwaana wa Yosefu?”
42004023	Nae yababoolera ati, “Mucha ohunduumbulira ataali ohukana-kana olukaado luno mbwe, ‘Ewe omulesi, wewonie omweene; ebyo bihwawulira huti waholera e Kaperanaumu, biholere ano wosi, mu syaalo syao syeene.’ ”
42004024	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao nabbi yeesi ofukiirirwaanga mu syaalo syae syeene.
42004025	Nae mubwadyeri mbaboolera endi, mu ndaalo cha Elija, ekulu nilyeekalwa ohumala embaka y'emyaaka chidatu nende emyoosi chisaasaba emilaamba, handi esiminyu sihoongo muno nisyalya esyaalo syoosi, baliwo abahasi bafwiire abangi muno mu Yisirayiri,
42004026	nae Elija siyatumwa eyiri abo boosi ohutusaho eyiri omuhasi mufwiire owe Sarefaati, mu syaalo sye Sidoni.
42004027	Handi mu biha bya nabbi Erisa, waliwo abageenge abangi mu syaalo sya Yisirayiri syoosi; nae abulao kata mulala hwaabo owawonisibwa, ohutusaho Namani Omusiria yeng'ene.”
42004028	Nae nibawulira sino, abo boosi abali mu Sinagoogi, etima liingi muno lyeecha lyabadiira.
42004029	Mani baasiingiriramo, bamusiindikirisa bamusukuna erwaanyi w'esiko sihoongo esyo, mani bamuniinia hu sigulu si siko sihoongo syaabwe esyo syombahwaho, nibadaha ohumusiindiha aasi akwiire omutwe.
42004030	Nae omweene yeyindikania yabitira mu sidiyiiha esyo yeweerawo.
42004031	Mani Yesu yeecha yehirira yaacha e Kaperanaumu, mu siko sye Galilaaya. Handi niyali nabekesa hu lwa Sabbaato;
42004032	abandu bawuka muno enjekesa yae eyo, olwohuba emboosi yae yali yiri nende obunyala.
42004033	Nae mu Sinagoogi omwo, mwalimo omuundu wundi owali nende omwooyo kw'omusaambwa mubi; mani yeecha yaalirira mu kono ly'akulu ati,
42004034	“Eee, Onaatuhole otye, ewe Yesu we Nasareti? Wichire ohutusihirisa? Ese humanyire, niiwe Omwolerefu mweene wa Nasae.”
42004035	Nae Yesu yakuhabuhira naboola ati, “Buleera chi, mani omale omutulemo!” Mani omusambwa okwo nikwamala ohumubba aasi akati-kaati wa baandu, kwamutulamo, nikutaamuholereho obubi bwoosi.
42004036	Mani abandu boosi bawuka babolanira abene-na-beene bati, “Yino mboosi siina? Olwohuba yehoonyera busa obunyala nende amaani, nalagira-bulagira emisaambwa, mani nichibatulaho-butula.”
42004037	Mani efuma yae yeecha yasasaana mu bifwo byoosi-byoosi eby'esyaalo sisibiraane awo.
42004038	Mani Yesu yeecha yasingira yaatula mu Sinagoogi, yacha yengira mu nyumba ya Simooni. Bulaanu, masaalang'ene Simooni yali omulwae w'omusuuja, mani basaba Yesu amuhoonye.
42004039	Mani Yesu yeecha yeema ayali, yahabuhira omusuuja okwo, kwamuleha; mani abweene awo, yasingira yabahalaabanira.
42004040	Bulaanu, elyuuba nilyali nilikwa, abo boosi abali nende abalwaye balwaala obulwaae butaali nasilala beecha baabaleeta yaali; mani Yesu yesa amahono kae hu buli mulwae, mani yabawonia boosi.
42004041	Mani emisaambwa chosi chatula mu bandu bangi nichirira chiti, “Niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae!” Nae yakihabuhiraanga, natachikanya ohulomaloma, olwohuba chali chamanya chiti niye Kristo.
42004042	Nae nibwahya, Yesu yasingira yacha mu sifwo sitaalimo abandu. Nae abandu beecha bamukoonya ohwoola lubamwolaho, bamuhayiraho nibatadaha abatuleho;
42004043	Nae yababoolera ati, “Ese hoyeere ohuchia ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai ch'Obwaami bwa Nasae mu biko biindi byosi; olwohuba sino nisyo esyakera ndatumwa ohwiicha.”
42004044	Mani yacha yayaalira mu Sinagoogi chikabuhane mu Buyudaaya.
42005001	Olwoola, Yesu niyali yeemere hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Genesareeti, abandu bangi beecha nibasindihana boole yali bawulire emboosi ya Nasae.
42005002	Mani Yesu yeecha yabona amaato kabiri nikali hu lwaasi; nae abanaabi bali nibakatuliremo, nibali ohwosaanga enjero chaabwe.
42005003	Yesu yengira mu lyaato lala, elya Simooni, yaamusaba asudyeho elyaato budiidi mu maachi ohutula hu lwaasi. Mani yeecha yachaaka ohweekesa abandu niyehaale mu lyaato omwo.
42005004	Nae niyali niyakaame ohulomaloma, yaboolera Simooni ati, “Sudya elyaato ebusiba mani wiise enjero chao odiise eng'eni.”
42005005	Nae Simooni yamukobolamo ati, “Omwaami, hunyahaane esiro syoosi nae haba sihufunireho esiindu syoosi! Nae olwohuba oboolere, njia ohwiisa enjero.”
42005006	Mani nibamala ohuhola sino, badiisya eng'eni enyiingi muno; nae koti enjero chaabwe chali nichichaakire ohuhanuha,
42005007	beecha baasakula nibalaanga abasyaabwe bali mu lyaato liindi beeche babahonyereho. Mani beecha beechusa amaato kabiri ako ohwoola lukali aambi ohusihama.
42005008	Nae Simooni Peetero niyabona sino, yeecha yaakwa aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, naboola ati, “Eee Omwaami, ndehe, olwohuba ese ndi omuholi we bibi.”
42005009	Olwohuba Simooni, alala nende abo boosi abali nae besinduha hulw'obuungi bw'eng'eni chibali badiisisye;
42005010	handi nasilala batyo nilwo lu Yakobbo nende Yowaana, abasyaani ba Sebbedaayo abali nende Simooni Peetero bosi besinduha. Mani Yesu yaboolera Simooni ati, “Otatya; olwohuba ohuchaaka buti ochia ohuba owundeetera abandu.”
42005011	Mani nibakoba, baleha awo buli siindu syoosi bamuloonda.
42005012	Olwoola, Yesu niyali nasisiiri mu siko siindi, omusaacha wundi owali niyechulaho obulwae bw'amakere yamala yeecha yali; mani niyabona Yesu, yakwa yahubba aasi obweeni, mani yamwekweeda naboola ati, “Omwaami, nooba niweenya, onyala waandabya.”
42005013	Mani Yesu yeecha yaakolola omuhono kwae, yaamudiiraho naboola ati, “ Nyenya; laba.” Mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni obulwae bwa makere bumwamuhaho.
42005014	Mani Yesu yeecha yamuhuutira obutabooleraho omuundu yeesi; nae yamuboolera ati, “cha weyekese eyiri omulaamisi, mani owaane esiyaanwa esy'ohuhulabya, koti lu Musa yalagira, sibe esilolero eyiri abandu.”
42005015	Nae kata katyo, nilwo lu fuma yidiira hu Yesu yemeeda ohuhusasaana muno; mani ebidiyiha bya bandu bihoongo muno byeecha byamwebuusaho ohutekeeresa enjekesa yae alala nende ohuwonisibwa amadehere kaabwe.
42005016	Nae Yesu yeecha yewiira yacha mu siparara mani yekongooya Nasae.
42005017	Olwoola, hu ludaalo lundi, Yesu niyali nasomesaanga, waliwo Abafalisaayo nende Abeekesa b'Amalako ka Musa bali nibehaale aambi awo, nibatulire mu buli lukoongo lwe Galilaaya nende e Buyudaaya nende e Yerusaalemu; nae Yesu yali yechuuleho amaani ka Nasae kohuwonia obulwaae.
42005018	Mani bone, abasaacha bandi bali baleetera hu sitaanda omusaacha wali yadataala, beecha bakoonya engeri y'ohumwiingisa bamwaalise mu moni wa Yesu.
42005019	Nae nibatabona engeri yoosi yibanyala bamwiingisiramo, hulw'esidiyiha sya baandu siingi, beecha baniina hu sirama akulu; mani beekula eliina mu mategula bamwiisiramo aasi akati-kaati w'abandu naali hu sitaanda syae, bamuta mu moni wa Yesu.
42005020	Mani Yesu niyabona efukiirira yaabwe, yaboola ati, “Wasyaange, ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo.”
42005021	Nae Abekesa b'Amalako ka Musa nende Abafalisaayo beecha bachaaka ohweteeba nibaboola bati, “Ni wiina wuno olomaloma nafwoola Nasae? Ni wiina onyala ohuleheramo ebibi ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene?”
42005022	Nae Yesu niyamanya ohweteebanaho hwaabwe, yabakobolamo ati, “Lwasiina muli ohweteeba mu myooyo cheeng'we mutyo?
42005023	Siina syeene esihira obwangu, ohuboola endi, ‘Ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo,’ kose ohuboola endi, ‘Siingira okeende’?
42005024	Nae njia ohubeekesa mumanye muti Omwaana w'Omuundu ali nende obunyala hu syaalo obw'ohuleheramo ebibi” --mani yaboolera omusaacha wali yadataala oyo ati, “Huboolera endi, siingira, obukule esitaanda syao, mani ochie engo.”
42005025	Mani abweene awo, yasingira yeema boosi nibabona, yaakiinga siyali akonereho, mani yacha engo, naafumia Nasae.
42005026	Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno, bafumya Nasae nibechuule obuti, nibaboola bati, “Olwaleero hubweene ebiindu bihutabonaangaho.”
42005027	Bino nibyawa, Yesu yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, mani yabona omutoosa w'omusolo olaangwa Leefi, niyehaale aambi nende enyumba yitooserwangamo omusolo; mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.”
42005028	Mani Leefi yaleha buli siindu syoosi, mani yaasingira yaamuloonda.
42005029	Mani Leefi yeecha yatekehera Yesu esidyaalo sihoongo muno mu nyumba yae; handi mu bandu bayalaanga, mwalimo omukanda muhoongo muno okw'abatoosa b'emisolo basye, alala nende abandu bandi bosi beehala nende Yesu hu meesa ohulya nae.
42005030	Nae Abafalisaayo nende Abandiiki b'Amalako baabwe bekanyiirisira abeeki ba Yesu nibaboola bati, “Lwasiina eng'we mulya handi mwang'wa nende abatoosa b'omusolo nende abaholi be bibi?”
42005031	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Abandu balamu, haba sinibo abadaha omulesi, nae abalwaye nibo amudaha.
42005032	Ese sindeecha ohulaanga abalungifu, nae abaholi be bibi banyale ohweyolobya.”
42005033	Handi beecha baboolera Yesu bati, “Abeki ba Yowaana basiiba amahabi maangi muno handi bekongooya muno, kata nasilala nende abeeki b'Abafalisaayo, nae abawo nabo balya handi bang'wa busa.”
42005034	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Ewe onyala ohuhola abakeni bo hu sidyaalo sy'obugole baasiiba omugole musaacha nasisiiri nabo?
42005035	Endaalo chicha ohwoola, omugole musaacha abatusibweho, mundaalo echo nimwo mubacha ohusiibira.”
42005036	Handi Yesu yabakaadira olukaado lundi naboola ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi otandulaanga esiraka hu ngubo njiaha, mani yacha yaasinaba hu ngubo ngofu; naahola atyo, aba achia ohutandula engubo njiaha, handi esiraka situla hu njiaha, sisiba sichia ohuchiira hu ngubo hale.
42005037	Handi abulao omuundu yeesi otechaanga efwiini njiaha mu bikiingiro by'efwiini by'eseero bihale; nae naahola atyo, efwiini njiaha eyo yiba yicha ohwata amaseero ako, mani yidiihe aasi, handi amaseero ako kosi kaba kacha ohunyaasiha.
42005038	Nae efwiini njiaha yihoyerwa ohuchuhibwa mu bikiingiro by'efwiini by'amaseero biyaaha.
42005039	Ni handi abulao omuundu omalire ohung'wa efwiini hale owekoomba enjaaha; olwohuba aboola ati, ‘Ehale ndayi.’ ”
42006001	Hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu niyali nakeenda naabitira mu ndalo y'engaano, abeeki bae beecha bachaaka ohwaakula emitwe ch'engaano, nibachiwuulira mu mahono kaabwe, nibalya.
42006002	Nae Abafalisaayo bandi baboola bati, “Lwasiina muli ohuhola esitafukiirirwa ohuholwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
42006003	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Musisiiri ohusomaho si Daudi yahola enjala niyali ni yimuluma, alala nende abo bayali nabo:
42006004	koti lu yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, yabukula, handi yamala yaalya, omugaati kwawanirwa Nasae, ku muundu yeesi atafukirirwaanga ohulya ohutusaho omulaamisi yeng'ene, handi koti lwosi luyakukabaho abo abali nae.?”
42006005	Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu niye omwaami wa Sabbaato.”
42006006	Handi hu Sabbaato yindi, Yesu niyengira mu Sinagoogi mani yekesa, omusaacha yalimo yi muhono kwae muluungi kwali kwaafwa.
42006007	Handi Abandiiki b'Amalako ka Musa nende Abafalisaayo, beecha bewunja Yesu babone oba achia ohuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, banyale ohunyoola esifune sibanyala ohumutaaho.
42006008	Nae Yesu yali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe mani yeecha yaboolera omusaacha wali nende omuhono kwaafwa ati, “Yicha weeme ano.” Mani omusaacha oyo yasingira yacha yeema.
42006009	Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese hambateebeho, sifukiirirwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, ohuhola esilai, kose ohuhola esibi, ohuwonia obulamu kose ohubusihirisa?”
42006010	Mani Yesu yeecha yabatingaala yabebodohania boosi, mani yaboolera omusaacha oyo ati, “Kolola omuhono kwao.” Mani yesi yahola atyo, mani omuhono kwae kwakaluha abweene.
42006011	Mani etima liingi lyeecha lyabadiira bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene, esiindu sibanyala ohuhola Yesu.
42006012	Mu ndaalo chino, Yesu yatula yacha hu lugulu ohwekongooya; mani yekongooya Nasae esiro syoosi.
42006013	Nae nibwahya, yeecha yalaanga abeeki bae, mani yalobolamo ehumi-na-babiri, bayalaanga Abatume;
42006014	Simooni, yiyeecha yalaanga ati Peetero, nende Andereya mwaanang'ina, nende Yakobbo nende Yowaana, nende Filipo, nende Batulumaayo,
42006015	nende Matayo, nende Tomasi, nende Yakobbo omusyaani wa Alufaayo, nende Simooni owalaangwanga Omulwaanirisi w'esyaalo syae,
42006016	nende Yuda omusyaani wa Yakobbo, nende Yuda Yiskarioti, owehola omuhobi.
42006017	Yesu yeecha yeha nabo natula hu lugulu, yeema musifwo sikwalaafu, alala nende esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abeeki bae Esidiyiha sihoongo muno esy'abandu bandi ohutula mu Buyudaaya nende mu Yerusaalemu alala nende hu lwaasi lw'enyaanja ye Tiro nende Sidoni syosi syaliwo, abali beechere ohumutekeeresa alala nende ohuwonisibwa endwaae chaabwe.
42006018	Handi abo bosi abali nibasandisibwa nende emisambwa bosi baonisibwa.
42006019	Mani esidiyiha syoosi syeecha syakiyaanga ohumudiiraho, olwohuba amaani kamutulangaho mani nabaonia boosi.
42006020	Mani Yesu yasingisa emoni chae yewunja abeeki bae mani yaboola ati: “Muli nende ehabi eng'we abamanani, olwohuba Obwaami bwa Nasae bweeng'we.
42006021	“Muli nende ehabi eng'we abalumwa enjala bulaanu, olwohuba mwahekute. “Muli nende ehabi eng'we abali ohulira bulaanu, olwohuba mwahachehe.
42006022	“Muli nende ehabi eng'we abandu nibabasyuula, handi nibabebwaaba mani baabanyeka handi baababoola bati muliho emisaambwa, hulw'Omwaana w'Omuundu!
42006023	Musangaale hu ludaalo olwo, handi mutuumakale olw'omwehoyo, olwohuba bone, omukabo kweeng'we Mukulu muhoongo; olwohuba kata basaabwe bosi baholaanga batyo abanabbi.
42006024	“Nae chibakaanire eng'we abanyali, olwohuba mwamala ohulemesebwa emyooyo.
42006025	“Chibakaanire eng'we abekuute bulaanu, olwohuba mucha ohulumwa enjala. “Chibakaanire eng'we abacheha bulaanu, olwohuba mucha ohulira nende ohuchereenjesa.
42006026	“Chibakaanire eng'we, abandu nibabalomalomaho bulai, olwohuba nilwo lu basaabwe baholeraanga abanabbi bobubacha.
42006027	“Nae ese mbaboolera eng'we abali ohuwulira endi, Mudaheenge abasuku beeng'we, muholereenge ebilai abo ababasyula,
42006028	mubereseenge ehabi abo abababwaaba, handi musabireenge abo ababanyeka.
42006029	Oyo ohupaama hu tama, mubereseenge etama liindi lyosi; nae oyo ohumalaho ekooti, otamwimaanga kata esaati lyao.
42006030	Beresaanga buli muundu yeesi ohusaba esiindu syoosi; nae oyo ohumalaho ebiindu byao, otamusabaanga ahukalusire handi.
42006031	Handi koti lu wahadahire abaasyo bahuholere, nilwo wesi lwooba obaholere.
42006032	“Nimudaha busa abo ababadaha, muba musuubira hasiimo siina? Olwohuba kata abaholi be bibi bosi badaha busa abo ababadaha.
42006033	Handi nimuholera ebilai abo ababaholera ebilai bong'ene, muba musuubira hasiimo siina? Olwohuba kata abaholi be bibi bosi bahola nasilala batyo.
42006034	Handi nimweyosa abo bamusuubira ohubafunaho, hasiimo siina hamuba musuubira ohufuna? Kata abaholi be bibi bosi beyosa abaholi be bibi basyaabwe, hu lunyuma banyale bosi ohubafunaho ebyaaka bityo.
42006035	Nae mudaheenge abasuku beeng'we, handi mubaholereenge ebilai, handi mubeyoseenge nimutasuubira ohubafunaho esiindu syoosi; mani omukabo kweeng'we kucha ohuba omuhongo, handi mucha ohuba abana boyo Owa Akulu Muno; olwohuba omweene oyo wesisa eyiri abo abatasiima nende abemani.
42006036	Mubecheenge abesisa, koti lu Seeng'we ali owesisa.
42006037	“Mutahengeraanga abaasyeng'we emisango, hu mwesi muhaye ohuheengerwa; mutaayasaanga abaasyeng'e, hu mwesi muhaye ohuyaaswa; muleheraangamo abaasyeng'e, hu mwesi munyale ohuleherwamo;
42006038	mukabenge abasyengwe, hu mwesi munyale ohubeereswa; mu sikero silayi, esisinyiirwe muno, syadengaanisibwa, syediha aasi, sichia ohubabereswa mu mahono. Olwohuba esikero simubereseramo abaasyeng'e, nisyo mwesi simuba mucha ohukalusirwamo.”
42006039	Yesu handi yemeeda yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati: “Mani omuundu muwofu anyala ohwimiriramo omuwofu waasye? Mani bombi sibaba bacha ohukwa mu buko?
42006040	Omweeki haba saanyala ohuhira omweekesa wae, nae buli muundu yeesi naaba naamalire ohwekeswa bulai bweene, aba achia ohuba koti omweekesa wae.
42006041	Lwasiina ewe obona esikoha siri mu moni yo waasyo, nae sonyala humanya esichihi siri mu moni yao yene?
42006042	Kose, ewe onyala otye ohuboolera owaasyo oti, ‘Wasyaange, leha hutusemo esikoha siri mu moni yao,’ nae ewe mweene haba sonyala ohubonaho esichihi siri mu moni yao yene? Omwebachirisi ewe, mberi tusa esichihi siri mu moni yao, hwonyale ohubona bulai bweene mani hu wiche otuse esikoha siri mu moni y'owaasyo.
42006043	“Olwohuba abulao omusaala mulai okwamaanga ebyaamo bibi, kata handi omusaala mubi okwamaanga ebyaamo bilai;
42006044	olwohuba omusaala kwoosi kumanyihaniraanga hu byaamo byaakwo. Olwohuba enduli haba sichinokwaanga hu musaala kw'amawa, kata emisabbiibbu haba sichinokwaanga hu misaala chomubichaha.
42006045	Omuundu mulai, niyeemere hu biindu bilai biyabiiha mu mwooyo kwae, ahola ebiindu bilai, nae omuundu mubi, niyeemere hu biindu bibi biyabiiha mu mwooyo kwae, ahola busa ebibi; olwohuba, omunwa kwae kulomaloma ebiindu byechula mu mwooyo.
42006046	“Lwasiina mu naanga-naanga muti, ‘Omwaami, Omwaami,’ nae haba simuhola bimbaboolera?
42006047	Buli muundu yeesi owiicha yindi, mani yawulira emboosi change, mani yaachiholeraho, njia ohubeekesa koti lwali:
42006048	ali koti omuundu owali niyombaha enyumba, owayaba aasi muno, yaata omuse hu lwaanda; mani amaachi k'ofwomboole nikeecha, ehulukusi yahubba hu nyumba eyo, mani yahaya ohuyidengaania, olwohuba yiba yali yombahwa hu lwaanda.
42006049	Nae oyo owulira emboosi change mani yahaya ohuchiholeraho, ali koti omuundu wombaha enyumba hu loba busa eyibulaho omuse; yi hulukusi yahubbaho, mani abweene awo enyumba eyo yakwa, mani yanyaasiha bubi muno.”
42007001	Yesu niyafundihira enomanoma yae yino abandu nibatekereese, yatula awo yacha yengira mu Kaperanaumu.
42007002	Nae bulaanu omuhongo w'abasirikaari emia ndala yali nende omuhalaabani wae mukoosi muno owali omulwae muno, handi naali aambi ohufwa.
42007003	Mani omusirikaari oyo niyawulira efuma ya Yesu, yamutumira abahuluundu b'Abayudaaya, nibamusaba ohwiicha ohuwonia omuhalaabani wae oyo.
42007004	Mani niboola eyiri Yesu, bamwekweeda nende esinani nibaboola bati, “Ahoyeere ohuholererwa atyo,
42007005	olwohuba yaheera muno esyaalo syeefwe sino, handi yatwombahira Sinagoogi yeefwe.”
42007006	Mani Yesu yeecha yacha nabo. Nae niyali aambi ohwoola mu daala, omuhongo w'abasirikaari oyo, yamutumira abeecha bae naboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, otenyahania daawe, olwohuba ese haba sihoyera ewe ohwingira mu nyumba yange;
42007007	sakira ese mweene sindeleetere yooli. Nae lomaloma busa emboosi, mani omuhalaabani wange achia ohuwona.
42007008	Olwohuba ese syesi ndi omuundu w'obunyala, handi ndi nende abasirikaari bali aasi wange; mani nimboolera mulala endi, ‘Cha,’ naachia busa; handi owundi endi, ‘Yicha,’ niyeecha busa; handi omuhalaabani wange endi, ‘Hola sino,’ nasihola busa.”
42007009	Nae Yesu niyawulira bino, yesinduha muno, mani yakaluhaana yaboolera esidiyiha syali nisimulondaho ati, “Mbaboolera endi, sisiiri ohwakaanaho efukiirira koti yino mu Yisirayiri mwoosi.”
42007010	Mani abo abali batumibwe eyiri Yesu, nibakobola mu nyumba, baakana omuhalaabani oyo naali omulamu.
42007011	Abweene awo ebyo nibiweere, Yesu yacha mu siko sihuluundu silaangwa siti, Naini, mani abeeki bae alala nende esidiyiha sihoongo bosi bacha nae.
42007012	Nae niyali naali aambi ohwoola mu siruwa sy'esiko sihuluundu esyo, bone, omusaacha wali nafwiire yali akingirwe natusibwa erwaanyi w'esiko ohuchia ohusiihwa, owali omwaana mudeerwa wa ng'ina, handi ng'ina oyo, yali omuhasi mufwiire. Mani esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abandu bomu siko esyo bali bakeendera alala nende omuhasi oyo.
42007013	Mani Omwaami niyabona omuhasi oyo, yamukwiira esisa mani yaamuboola ati, “Otalira daawe.”
42007014	Abweene awo, Yesu yeecha yadiira hu butalihe bw'omufu, mani abakiingi beecha beema. Mani Yesu yaboola ati, “Omuraaga ewe, huboolera endi, siingira.”
42007015	Mani omuundu wali afwire oyo yeecha yasingira yehala, mani yachaaka ohulomaloma. Yesu yeecha yaamudiisa ng'ina.
42007016	Obuti bweecha bwadiira abandu bali awo boosi; mani bachaaka ohukinia Nasae nibaboola bati, “Omunabbi w'amaani atwichiremo!” Haandi bati, “Nasae akeniye abandu bae!”
42007017	Mani efuma yidiira hu Yesu yino yeecha yasasaana mu Buyudaaya mwoosi, alala nende ebyaalo byoosi ebisyebodohaanie.
42007018	Abeki ba Yowaana beecha bamuboolera ebiindu bino byoosi.
42007019	Mani Yowaana yeecha yalaanga babiri hu beeki bae yabatuma eyiri Omwaami naboola ati, “Ewe niiwe oyo owohwiicha, oba hukoonye owundi?”
42007020	Mani abasaacha abo nibamala ohwoola eyiri Yesu, baboola bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi atutumire yooli naboola ati, ‘Ewe niiwe owohwiicha oba hukoonye owundi?’ ”
42007021	Esiha syeene esyo, Yesu yeecha yawonia abalwaye bangi muno nende ab'endwaae chitaali nasilala alala nende ab'emisaambwa, handi yakera abawofu bangi babona bulai.
42007022	Mani Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Muche mani muboolere Yowaana ebyo bimubweene nende bimuwuliire: abawofu, babona; abalema, bakeenda; abamakere, baamulwaho; abadiimbe, bawulira; abafu, balamusibwa; abamanani bayaalirwa Emboosi Ndai.
42007023	Mani ali nende ehabi oyo otaambonera bubi.”
42007024	Mani ba wamwaanda ba Yowaana nibamala ohuwao, Yesu yachaaka ohulomaloma eyiri ebidiyiha ebyo ebidiira hu Yowaana ati: “Siina syeene simwachia musiparara ohubona? Ekada li muyaka kuwucha nilidengaana?
42007025	Mani siina syeene simwachia ohubona? Omuundu ofwaalire engubo chifwooha? Bone, abo abafwaala eching'enang'ena handi bamenya mu bulamu bw'ohwedaha baba mu mbiri ch'abatuki.
42007026	Mani siina syeene simwachia ohubona? Omunabbi? Eee, mbaboolera endi, nae oyo niye ohiraho omunabbi.
42007027	Wuno niye oyo yibaandikaho bati, ‘Bone, mbawo nduma wamwaanda wange mu moni wao, ochia ohuhuteresera engira mu moni wao.’
42007028	Mbaboolera endi, mu bandu beebulwa boosi, abulao ohira Yowaana; kata katyo, oyo ohiramo obudiidi mu bwaami bwa Nasae amuhira oluyaali.”
42007029	(Mani abandu boosi alala nende abatoosa b'omusolo nibawulira batyo, basiima ehola ndayi ya Nasae, olwohuba bali babatiiswa nende embatiisa ya Yowaana;
42007030	nae Abafalisaayo alala nende Abamalako bebwaaba esichiririrwa sya Nasae yibali, koti lubali nibatabatiisibwa nende Yowaana.)
42007031	“Siina syeene sindaakeraanieho abandu b'olwiibulo luno, oba bafwaanana nende siina?
42007032	Bafwaana koti abaana behaale mu siito, mani nibalanganaanga abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Hwabobbera elere li sangaasa, nae mwahaya ohuhina; handi hwabacherenjesera, nae mwahaya ohulira.’
42007033	Olwohuba Yowaana Mubatiisi yeecha natalia omugaati kwoosi, handi natang'wa efwiini yoosi; nae mwaboola muti, ‘Wuno aliho omusaambwa.’
42007034	Nae Omwaana w'Omuundu yeecha naalya handi nang'wa; nae mwaboola muti, ‘Bone, ow'okuliira handi omumeesi wuno, omwiicha w'abatoosa b'omusolo nende abaholi be bibi!’
42007035	Nae amakesi ka Nasae obwadyeeri bwaako, bubonehera mu bandu bakafukiirira.”
42007036	Olwoola, Omufalisaayo wundi yalaanga Yesu ache alye nae, mani Yesu yeecha yacha mu nyumba y'Omufalisaayo oyo, mani yehala hu meesa, ohulya nae.
42007037	Mani bone, omuhasi wundi ow'omusiko sihuluundu esyo, owali omuholi w'ebibi, yeecha yawulira ati Yesu ali ohulya mu nyumba y'Omufalisaayo oyo, yeecha yaleeta echupa y'amafuta k'esiing'aari siingi muno,
42007038	mani yeema emukoongo wa Yesu enamakulu wae naalira, mani yachaaka ohudoonya amasika kae hu makulu ka Yesu, handi nakasimuula nende efwiiri ly'ohumutwe kwae, mani yahoomba amakulu ka Yesu, mani yamala yaakabaha nende amafuta k'esiing'aari ako.
42007039	Nae bulaanu, Omufalisaayo wali nalaangire Yesu niyabona atyo, yaboola mu mwooyo kwae ati, “Nikali mbwe omusaacha wuno munabbi mweene, aba amanyire muhasi w'engeri siina wuno oli ohumudiiraangaho, olwohuba muholi w'ebibi.”
42007040	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo naboola ati, “Simooni, ndi nende esiindu siindaha ohuhuboolera.” Nae Simooni yakobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, siindu siina syeene?”
42007041	Yesu yamukanira ati, “Olwoola, omuundu wundi yali nende abandu babiri babaanja; mulala yali nende ekobi lya edinaari emia chitaanu, nae owundi edinaari amahumi kataanu.
42007042	Nibyoola byabahaya ohutunga, yeecha yabaleheramo bombi. Bulaanu, ni naanu mweene hu bombi abo ochia ohumuheera muno?”
42007043	Simooni yakobolamo ati, “Mbaasa endi oyo, yiyaleheramo ebiingi.” Mani Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ewe hane mbao oheengere omusango bulai.”
42007044	Mani Yesu yakaluhaana yatingaala omuhasi oyo, mani yaboolera Simooni ati, “Obona omuhasi wuno? Ese nyiingire mu nyumba yao muno, nae haba siwumbereese amaachi k'ohwoosa amakulu kange, nae wuno adosere amakulu kange nende amasika kae, handi yakasimuula nende efwiiri lyae.
42007045	Haba siwungwiireho mu sirifu, nae ohutula nyiingira muno, omuhasi wuno haba saaleheereho ohuhoomba amakulu.
42007046	Ewe haba soobahireho omutwe kwaange amafuta koosi, nae omuhasi wuno abahire amakulu kange nende amafuta k'esiing'aari siingi muno.
42007047	Mani sakira huhuboolera endi, ebibi byae, biingi muno bityo, bimuleheerwemo, olwohuba yekeese ohudaha hungi muno; nae oyo oleherwamo ebidiidi, niye oweekesa ohudaha hudiidi.”
42007048	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Ebibi byao bihuleheerwemo.”
42007049	Nae abo boosi abali nibali nae hu meesa, bachaaka ohuboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Wuno niye wiina, onyala ohuleheramo kata ebibi?”
42007050	Nae Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuhasi oyo ati, “Efukiirira yao yihuwonisye; cha nende emireembe.”
42008001	Ebyo nibyawa busa biti, Yesu yakenda naabitira mu biko bihuluundu nende engoongo nayaala handi naleetera abandu Emboosi Ndai ch'Obwaami bwa Nasae. Yali ali nende abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri,
42008002	alala nende abahasi bandi abali baonisibwa emisaambwa nende amadehere kataali nasilala. Abahasi bano nibo: Maria, olaangwa Magadaleena, yi Yesu yali atusiremo emisaambwa chitaanu-na-chibiri,
42008003	nende Jowana, omuhasi wa Chuusa, omubiihi muhuluundu wa Herode, nende Susaana, nende abahasi bangi bandi, abahonyaanga Yesu nende abeeki bae nibatusa hu biindu bi beene bahalaabanaanga ohufuna.
42008004	Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo nisyamala ohwebuusa alala, handi abandu bandi abatula mu biko bikabuhaane bosi nibeecha yali, Yesu yalomaloma nabo mu lukaado ati,
42008005	“Olwoola, omulimi yacha ohuwaanya emwo yae. Mani niyali awaanya, emwo yindi yakwa hu ngira, mani yaasenakirwa mu makulu, mani handi amayoni keecha kayiboocha yoosi.
42008006	Nae emwo yindi yakwa hu bikina-kina; mani niyachaaka ohuhula yiti, yeecha yooma, olwohuba haba siyali nende omunyiti.
42008007	Nae emwo yindi yakwa mu mawa; mani amawa kahulira alala nayo, mani kayifwinyirira.
42008008	Nae emwo yindi yakwa mu loba layi mani yaahula, mani yaama ebyaamo amahabi emia ndala.” Niyamala ohuboola busa atyo, yeecha yahuumula naboola ati, “Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
42008009	Mani abeeki bae nibamuteeba amahulundu k'olukaado luno,
42008010	Yesu yaboola ati, “Eng'we ning'we ababeresebwa ehabi y'ohumanya ebyaama by'Obwaami bwa Nasae; nae eyiri abandu bandi, bino biri mu ngaado busa, mani batingaale bahaye ohubona, handi batekeerese bahaye ohuwulira.
42008011	“Bulaanu, amahulundu k'olukaado lw'omuwaanyi niko kano: Emwo niyo Emboosi ya Nasae.
42008012	Emwo yakwa hu ngira, nibo abo abawulira; nae Sitaani yeecha yabatusaho emboosi chali mu myooyo chaabwe, mani bahaye ohufukiirira bataonisibwa.
42008013	Nae emwo yiri hu bikina-kina nibo abo, nibawulira emboosi, bayakaanira nende esangaalo; nae koti lubataali nende emisi, bafukiiriraho hulw'esiha sidiidi, nae ebiha by'ohuhemebwa nibyoola, nibabyekaana.
42008014	Nae emwo yakwa mu mawa, nibo abo abawulira emboosi, nae ohwelalihirira nende ohubaasa hu buyiinda bw'esyaalo nende esangaalo ly'obulamu bifwinyirira emboosi eyo, mani ebyaamo byaabwe sibihula byaangala.
42008015	Nae emwo yakwa mu loba layi, nibo abo abawulira emboosi, bayidiira bulai muno nende obwadyeeri alala nende omwooyo mulai, mani baama ebyaamo muhwesimiirisa hwaabwe.
42008016	“Abulao omuundu oba naamalire ohuwaambia etaara, olifuniha mu simweero, oba yaalita mu lwalo w'esitaanda, nae alita hu siteeni syalyo, hulihosere abengira mu nyumba.
42008017	Olwohuba abulao esiindu syoosi esyakiswa, esitahakisulwe, handi, abulao esiindu sy'omusyaama esitalimanyihana syatuswa alafu.
42008018	Mani mweliinde engeri yimuwuliriramo; olwohuba oyo oli nabyo, niye ochia ohumeedwaho ebiindi, nae oyo otaliho nende esiindu syoosi, kata nende syabaasa ati ali nasyo, bacha ohumumalaho.”
42008019	Olwoola, ng'ina Yesu nende ba mwaanang'ina beecha yali, nae haba sibanyala ohumwolaho olwa esidiyiha sihoongo.
42008020	Mani beecha baboolera Yesu bati, “Maao nende ba mwaanamaao beemere erwaanyi, badaha ohuhubona.”
42008021	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Maama nende ba mwaanama nibo abo abawulira emboosi ya Nasae mani bayiholeraho.”
42008022	Ludaalo lundi, Yesu yeecha yengira mu lyaato nende abeeki bae mani yababoolera ati, “Mulehe husyaabale huchie engereha w'enyaanja.” Mani beecha bachaaka olukeendo,
42008023	nae nibali nibasyaabala, Yesu yeecha yaakona endoolo. Mani omuyaka kw'amaani kweecha kwasiingisa amafwinda kehubba hu bwaato, bwechula amaachi bwaaba aambi ohusihama.
42008024	Mani abeeki bacha bamusimusa nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, Omwaami, huli ohufwa!” Mani Yesu yeecha yaasimuha, mani yahabuhira omuyaka alala nende amafwinda; mani byeecha byayenjeera byanyita chi.
42008025	Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Efukiirira yeng'we yiri yena?” Mani obuti bwabadiira, mani bawuka muno nibaboolanira bati, “Nae wuno niye wiina, onyala ohulagira kata omuyaka nende amaachi, mani byamuwulira?”
42008026	Mani beecha boola mu syaalo sye Geraseneesi, esitingalaane nende e Galilaaya.
42008027	Nae Yesu niyali atula busa mu lyaato ati, abweene awo omusaacha wundi, otula mu siko sihuluundu esyo oliho emisambwa yamwoolaho; omusaacha oyo yali yamala embaka hoongo muno natefwalaangaho esiindu syoosi, handi siyamenyaanga mu nyumba yoosi ohutusaho, yamenyanga mu biriindwa mwong'ene.
42008028	Omusaacha oyo niyabona busa Yesu ati, yobba wuwi mani yeecha yaakwa mu moni wae, mani yahuumula mu kono ly'akulu naboola ati, “Yesu, mwaana wa Nasae oli Akulu Muno, onaahole otye? Hwekweeda endi, otasaandia daawe.”
42008029	Olwohuba Yesu yali amalire ohulagira omusaambwa mubi okwo ohumutulamo. (Olwohuba omusaambwa okwo kwali kwanala ohumuniinaanga amahabi maangi; yali yalindwa bulindwa nende abasirikaari, niyaboyebwa nende eminyororo alala nende epiingo, mani nahalakaanga busa eminyororo echo alala nende epiingo cheene, mani omusaambwa okwo kwamwiirusaanga nikumuyira mu siparara.)
42008030	Mani Yesu yeecha yaamuteeba ati, “Eliita lyao nilyo naanu?” Nae yaboola ati, “Esidiyiha”; olwohuba emisaambwa miingi muno chali nichimulimo.
42008031	Mani emisambwa echo cheecha chekweeda Yesu atachilagira chacha emakoombe ekotero.
42008032	Nae bulaanu, eyicho ly'embiichi hongo lyali niriri ohwayaanga aambi awo hu ndulo w'esigulu; mani emisambwa echo cheecha chamwekweda achilehe chiche chiingire mu mbiichi echo. Mani Yesu yeecha yachileha chacha.
42008033	Mani emisaambwa echo cheecha chatula mu musaacha oyo, chacha cheengira mu mbiichi echo, mani eyicho ly'embiichi echo lyoosi lyeecha lyabbabuluha embiro lyehirira egenya, lyaweera mu nyaanja mani embiichi choosi chasihama chafwa.
42008034	Nae abaayi b'embiichi nibabona ebyo, beeruha, bacha baasalaania emboosi echo mu siko sihuluundu syoosi alala nende mu ngoongo.
42008035	Mani abandu beecha basiingira bacha ohubona esyali nisiholehane, mani beecha boola hu Yesu, mani babukaana omusaacha yi misaambwa chali chituliremo oyo, niyehaale mu makulu ka Yesu, niyefwaalire engubo, naali mwaaywe; mani beecha batya muno.
42008036	Nae abo abali basibweene, beecha baabakaniaya engeri yi musaacha waliho emisaambwa oyo, yawonisirwamo.
42008037	Mani abandu boosi abali mu syaalo syebodohaanie Geraseneesi beecha bamusaba abatuleho; olwohuba bali batiire muno; mani Yesu yeecha yengira mu lyaato mani yaakobolerayo.
42008038	Nae omusaacha yi misaambwa chatulamo oyo, yeecha yekweda Yesu ati, amufukiirire adoong'e nae; nae Yesu yamuseebula naboola ati,
42008039	“Kaluha engo, mani obaboolere alafu, obulayi bu Nasae ahuholeere yibwaaka.” Mani yeecha yawaawo, nayaala mu siko sihuluundu esyo syoosi ebilai bi Yesu amuholeere koti lu byaaka.
42008040	Mani bulaanu, Yesu niyakobola, esidiyiha sy'abandu syamwakaanira, olwohuba boosi bali nibamuliindiriire busa.
42008041	Abweene awo, omusaacha olaangwa ati Yayiro yesi yeecha yoola. Yayiro yali omuhulundu wa Sinagoogi; mani niyoola eyiri Yesu, yamukwa mu makulu yamwekweeda yeeche mu nyumba yae,
42008042	olwohuba yali ali nende omuhaana wae mulala yeng'ene, owali aambi w'emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri ech'ohubuluundu, naali aambi ohufwa. Nae Yesu niyali hwakeenda naachia, abandu bali bamweyindikanieho muno.
42008043	Nae, omuhasi wali naamalire emyaaka ehumi nende chibiri nalwaala obulwaae bw'ohudaachirira handi omuundu yeesi natanyalaangaho ohumuwonia,
42008044	yatulira enyuma, yoola hu Yesu, mani yamala yadiira hu kemo ly'engubo yae; mani abweene awo, ni ohudaachirira hwae ohwo nihwaakama.
42008045	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Naanu oyo owundiirireho?” Nae abandu boosi nibekaana, Peetero yaboola ati, “Omwaami, mbawo esidiyiha sy'abandu sihwebodohaanie handi siri ohuhudiiya!”
42008046	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Aliwo omuundu wundirireho; olwohuba mbulira aliwo amaani kahandulaho.”
42008047	Mani omuhasi oyo niyeecha yabona ati amanyihane, yeecha natengereha, mani yaakwa mu moni wa Yesu naboola mu moni w'abandu boosi esikerere namudiiraho, handi koti lwaonere abwene-na-bweme naamalire ohumudiiraho.
42008048	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Muhana-ng'ene, efukiirira yao yihuwoniisye; cha nende emireembe.”
42008049	Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, omusaacha wundi ohutula mu daala ly'omutuki wula ni yoola amuboolera ati, “Omuhaana wao amalire ohufwa; mani handi otanyaahania Omweekesa.”
42008050	Nae Yesu niyawulira sino, yamukobolamo ati, “Otatya; fukiirira busa, mani omuhaana wao achia ohuba omulamu abweene.”
42008051	Mani Yesu niyeecha yoola mu daala, siyafukiirira omuundu yeesi ohwingira nae mu nyumba, ohutusaho Peetero nende Yowaana nende Yakobbo, nende simwaana nende ng'ina mwaana oyo.
42008052	Nae abandu boosi bandoong'a nibalira handi nibacherenjesa hulw'omuhaana oyo; nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mutalira; olwohuba haba saafwiire, nae ali ohukona.”
42008053	Nae abandu bamucheha busa, olwohuba bali bamanyire bulai bweene bati, omuhaana oyo afwiire.
42008054	Mani Yesu yamudiira omuhono, yaamulaanga naboola ati, “Mwaana ewe, siingira.”
42008055	Mani naakalusa omwooyo, mani nasiingiraniramo; mani Yesu yeecha yabakerakira ati bamubeereseho esiindu sy'ohulya.
42008056	Mani abebusi bae beecha besinduha muno; nae Yesu yabahuutira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi esyali nisiholehaane.
42009001	Yesu yalaanga ehumi-na-babiri abo bebuusa alala, mani yababeeresa amaani nende obunyala ohwirusa emisaambwa choosi nende ohuwonia endwaae,
42009002	mani yabatuma bache bayaale ebidiira hu Bwaami bwa Nasae alala nende ohuwonia abalwaye.
42009003	Mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “mutakiingaho esiindu syoosi hu lukeendo lweng'we kata, endabuhi, kata omufuuko, kata omugaati, kata eseende; handi mutakiinga kata engubo chibiri.
42009004	Mani, enyumba yoosi yimwingiramo, mubecheenge omwo, ohwoola lu mwahatulemo nimuwaao.
42009005	Nae eyo yoosi yibatababukaanira, nimuba nimutula mu siko esyo, muteng'uleenge olufu luli hu makulu keeng'we, sibe esilolero esibakabuhania nabo.”
42009006	Mani basiingira bawaao, bacha babita mu ngoongo, nibayaala Emboosi Ndai nende ohuwonia abandu buli abundu woosi yibacha.
42009007	Nae bulaanu, Herode omutuki we Galilaaya, niyawulira ebyo byoosi ebyali biholehaane, yeecha yawunga, olwohuba abandu bandi bali baboola bati, Yowaana niye osyuhire mu bafu,
42009008	nae abandi bati, Elija niye owali abonehane, nae abandi bati, mulala hu banabbi bahale niye asyuhire.
42009009	Nae Herode yeecha yaboola ati, “Nise owatema hu Yowaana omutwe; nae wuno niye naanu yimbulira nibalomalomaho ebiindu bino?” Mani yaakesaho muno ati amuboneho.
42009010	Mani Abatume nibakobola, bacha baboolera Yesu bibali nibaholere. Nae Yesu yababukula, yabayira endulo bong'ene mu siko sihuluundu silaangwa siti, Bbetisaida.
42009011	Nae esidiyiha sy'abandu nisyamanya sityo, syeecha syamulondaho; mani Yesu yeecha, yabakaanira, mani yeecha yababoolera abidiira hu Bwaami bwa Nasae, handi yeecha yawonia abo boosi abali nibadaha ohuwonisibwa.
42009012	Nae obwiire nibwali nibuchaaka ohwiira; ehumi-na-babiri beecha eyiri Yesu bamuboolera bati, “Seebula esidiyiha sy'abandu sino siweeo, sichie mu ngoongo, nende mu syaalo sya aambi, bache bakoonye owohukona, nende ewohunyoola ebiindu by'ohwehoonyera biindi; olwohuba huli mu syaalo sibulamo abandu.”
42009013	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Eng'we beene mubaberese esiindu sy'ohulya.” Nabo baboola bati, “Huli nende emigaati chitabita mu chitaanu, nende eng'eeni chibiri, ohutusaho nihucha hwakulira abandu bano boosi ebyohulya.”
42009014	Olwohuba bali aambi abasaacha elifu chitaanu. Nae Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mubehase aasi mubakabule mu buli mukaanda mubeemo abandu aambi wa amahumi kataanu-kataanu.”
42009015	Mani beecha bahola batyo, beehasa abandu boosi aasi.
42009016	Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula emigaati chitaanu echo, nende eng'eeni chibiri, mani yaatingaala akulu Mukulu, yamala yabibeeresa ehabi, mani yabidonyadonya, yamala yabibeeresa abeeki abo babikabule esidiyiha sy'abandu esyo.
42009017	Mani boosi balya, mani beekuta. Mani beecha babuusa ebidonye-donye bidong'ereho, boosa ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri.
42009018	Olwoola, Yesu niyali yekongooya Nasae yeng'ene naali nende abeeki bae; yeecha yabateeba ati, “Abandu baboola bati, ese nise wiina?”
42009019	Nabo bakobolamo bati, “Yowaana Omubatiisi; nae abandi baboola bati, Elija; handi abandi nabo bati mulala hu banabbi bahale niye osyuhire.”
42009020	Nae yababoolera ati, “Nae eng'we muboola muti ese nise wiina?” Nae Peetero yakobolamo ati, “Niiwe Kristo wa Nasae.”
42009021	Mani Yesu yeecha yabahuutira handi yabalagira batabooleraho omuundu yeesi,
42009022	naboola ati, “Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyeere ohusaanda mu biindu biingi muno, handi abahuluundu b'enjia nende abalaamisi bahuluundu, nende abandiiki b'amalako boole ohumwebwaaba, handi bamwiite, mani hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu asyuhiswe.”
42009023	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abandu boosi ati, “Omuundu yeesi nadaha ohunoonda, leha mberi yefwirise omweene, mani akinge omusalabba kwae buli ludaalo, mani yanoonde.
42009024	Olwohuba omuundu yeesi odaha ohuwonia obulamu bwae omweene, achia ohubufwiirwa; nae oyo yeesi ofwiirwa obulamu bwae hulwaange, achia ohubuwonia.
42009025	Olwohuba ngaanga siina yi muundu anyoola, naalya esyaalo syoosi, nae afwiirwa oba yekosya omweene?
42009026	Olwohuba oyo yeesi owumaambirwa esoni alala nende emboosi change, oyo yesi niye yi Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuwambirwa esoni niyeecha mu luyaali lwae nende mu luyaali lwa Simwaana nende olwa bamalaika boolerefu.
42009027	Nae mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, aliwo abandi abemere ano bulaanu abatacha ohubonaho ohufwa nibatabona Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
42009028	Nae bulaanu, lunyuma lw'endaalo chitanu-na-chidatu, Yesu naamalire ohulomaloma ebiindu bino, yeecha yabukula Peetero, nende Yowaana nende Yakobbo, mani yaniina nabo hu lugulu ohwekongooya.
42009029	Mani niyali niyekongooya, efwaani yae yakaluhanisibwa, mani ebyefwalo byae byalafuya byamilamilana.
42009030	Nae boneho, abasaacha babiri, Musa nende Elija, beecha balomaloma nae.
42009031	Bano babonehera mu luyaali handi balomaloma hu huwaao hwae, huyali achia ohumaliirisira e Yerusaalemu.
42009032	Bulaanu Peetero nende abaasye bayali abali nabo, endoolo nyiingi chali chibayirire, mani nibasimuha, beecha babona oluyaali lwae alala nende abasaacha babiri abo nibeemere nae.
42009033	Mani abasaacha abo nibali hu balehana nae bati, Peetero yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, silayi muno efwe ohuba ano; leha hwombahe ebikaali bidatu, silala esyao, esiindi esya Musa, nae esiindi esy'Elija” (Yali saamanyire biyali alomaloma.)
42009034	Nae niyali hwasilomalomaanga atyo, esireesi syeecha, syababwiiha; mani nibali nibengira mu sireesi, beecha baatya muno.
42009035	Nae ekono lyatula mu sireesi niliboola liti, “Wuno niye mwaana wange, Omulobole wange; mu muwulireenge!”
42009036	Nae ekono elyo nilyamala ohulomaloma, Yesu yaboneha nadong'ere yeng'ene. Mani abeeki badoong'a nibawuleerere, mani bahaya ohubooleraho omuundu yeesi mu ndaalo echo, esiindu syoosi sibali nibabweene.
42009037	Nae nibwahya, hu ludaalo luloondaho, nibamalire ohwiha ohutula hu lugulu, esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo syeecha syabukaanana nae.
42009038	Mani boneho, omusaacha wundi ohutula mu sidiyiiha yachaaka ohulira naboola ati, “Omweekesa, hwekweeda bonaho omusyaani wange wuno, olwohuba niye omwaana wange yeng'ene;
42009039	mani boneho, omusaambwa kumukwichaangaho, mani yesinduha naalira lukali; kumukikaanga ohwoola lwabira efiro muhanwa, mani kumukuchumbula muno, mani kuhaya ohumutulaho bwaangu.
42009040	Nae ndekweedere abeeki bao ohukwiirusa, nae sibanyalire.”
42009041	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Poo, oluse lubi luwuma efukiirira, ndahabe nang'we ohwoola liina, handi ndahabesimiriise ohwoola liina? Leeta ano omusyaani wao.”
42009042	Nae niyali ali ohwiicha, omusaambwa okwo kwamususucha, mani kwamumika. Nae Yesu yeecha yahabuhira omusambwa mubi okwo, mani yawonia omusyaani oyo, mani yamukalusira simwaana.
42009043	Mani abandu boosi bawuka muno amaani ka Nasae. Nae abandu boosi nibali basiwukaangaho ebyo byoosi bi Yesu yali naaholere, yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati,
42009044	“Mulehe emboosi chino chiingire elalira mu matwi keeng'we; olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohudiiswa mu mahono k'abandu.”
42009045	Nae nabo haba sibamanya amahulundu k'enomanoma yino, handi yali yibakisiibweho, bahaye ohuyimanya; handi bali batiire ohumuteeba ebidiira hu nomaloma yino.
42009046	Mani abeene-na-beene bachaaka ohuyingana nibateebana bati, ni wiina ohiramo oluyaali?
42009047	Nae Yesu niyeecha yaamanya embaasa yiri mu myooyo chaabwe, yabukula omwaana muyere yaamusudya mu lubafu lwae,
42009048	mani yababoolera ati, “Oyo yeesi owakaanira omwaana wuno mu liita lyaange aba yanjakaanira, handi oyo yeesi owunjakaanira aba yakaaniire oyo owanduma; olwohuba oyo ohiramo ohuba aasi mweng'we, niye ohiramo oluyaali.”
42009049	Nae Yowaana yakobolamo ati, “Omwaami, hubweene omusaacha niyerusaanga emisambwa mu liita lyao mani hwamukayira, olwohuba haba saali mulala hweefwe.”
42009050	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mutamukayira; olwohuba oyo yeesi otabayingania aba ali alala nang'we.”
42009051	Nae endaalo chae ch'ohukobolayo Mukulu nichasuda aambi, Yesu yahengawo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
42009052	Mani yaatuma ba wamwaanda bae bache mu moni wae, mani bacha beengira mu lukoongo lw'Abasamaria, ohumutekehera;
42009053	nae abandu bamwo bahaya ohumwakaanira, olwohuba yali ahengerwo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
42009054	Nae abeeki bae, Yakobbo nende Yowaana nibabona sino, baboola bati, “Omwaami, odaha hulaange omuliro kwiihe ohutula Mukulu, kubasihirise?”
42009055	Nae Yesu yakaluhaana mani yabahabuhira.
42009056	Mani beecha bemeeda, bacha mu lukoongo lundi.
42009057	Nae nibali nibakeenda hu ngira, omuundu wundi yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Ese njia ohuhulondaanga buli y'ochiira.”
42009058	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Amabbwe kali nende ameena, handi amayoni kabburuha nako kali nende ebiswi; nae Omwaana w'Omuundu abulaho kata abundu yaanyala ohugeeng'a omutwe kwae.”
42009059	Nae Yesu yaboolera omuundu owundi ati, “Noonde.” Nae omuundu oyo yaboola ati, “Omwaami, leha mberi njie siihe lata yange.”
42009060	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Leha abafu basiihe abafu baabwe; nae ewe, cha mani oyaale Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
42009061	Nae owundi yaboola ati, “Omwaami, ese njia ohuhuloonda; nae leha mberi njie seebule ab'omudaala lyaange.”
42009062	Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi, odiira embako y'eng'ombe ohulima, mani yobba amahemo, ohoyera Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
42010001	Oluunyuma lwa bino, Yesu yeecha yadoola abeeki amahumi kataanu-na-kabiri na babiri bandi, mani yabatuma bamutangiriremo ohuchia, babiri-babiri, mu buli siko nende esifwo, yiyali owohucha omweene.
42010002	Mani yababoolera ati, “Ekesa nalyo liingi muno, nae abahalaabani nibo abadiidi; mani mwekongooye Omwaami we kesa atume abahalaabani mu kesa lyae.
42010003	Bulaanu, mani muche; nae bone, mbawo mbatuma, koti abana b'amakoondi mu manani.
42010004	Mutakiinga esawo ch'eseende, kata omufuuko kw'ohusumiramo, kata ebiraato; handi, mutaheesa omuundu yeesi hungira.
42010005	Nabuli nyumba yoosi yimwingiramo, mutaangireenge ohuboola muti, ‘Emireembe kibe hu nyumba yino!’
42010006	Mani, omuundu yeesi ow'emireembe naaba mu nyumba eyo, emireembe cheeng'we chicha ohumubaaho; nae nibitaali bityo, emireembe kichia ohubakaluhira.
42010007	Mani mudong'enge mu nyumba yene eyo, nimulya haandi nimung'wa buli siindu syoosi sibabakabula, olwohuba buli muhalaabani ahoyera omuheemba kwae; nae mutalukalukanaanga nimutula mu nyumba eyo nimuchia mu yindi.
42010008	Nimwiingiraanga mu siko syoosi, mani baababukaanira, mulicheenge esyo syoosi sibaba babakabule;
42010009	muwonie abalwaye baba nibalimo, mani mubaboolere muti, ‘Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiichire aambi nang'we.’
42010010	Nae buli lumwingira mu siko syoosi, mani bahaya ohubabukaanira, muchicheenge mu makira kaamwo, mani muboola muti,
42010011	‘Kata olufu lw'esiko syeng'we, olwediirire hu makulu keefwe, huli ohubateng'ulira lubaloonde; nae kata katyo, mumanye sino, muti Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiichire aambi.’
42010012	Mbaboolera endi, hu ludaalo olwo, Sodomu syahakwiirwe esisa ohuhiraho esiko esyo.
42010013	“Chihwakaanire ewe, Korasiini! chihwakaanire ewe, Bbeetasaida! olwohuba ebyaamayia byaholwa mweng'we biba byaholwa mu Tiro nende Sidoni, abandu bamwo baba beefunaka hale, nibefwaala ebigunia, handi nibehala mu kohe.
42010014	Nae hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho omusango Tiro nende Sidoni byahakwiirwe esisa, ohuhiraho eng'we.
42010015	Nae ewe Kaperanaumu, odaha ohweniinia ohwoola Mukulu? Mani bacha ohuhwiisa aasi busa ohwoola emakoombe.
42010016	“Oyo obawulira, aba awulire ese, handi oyo obahaya, aba ahayire ese, handi oyo owuhaya aba ahayire oyo owanduma.”
42010017	Amahumi kataanu-na-kabiri nababiri abo bakobola nibasangaalire muno, nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, kata emisambwa chosi chituwulireenge, nihwehoonyera eliita lyao!”
42010018	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbweene Sitaani niyaakuha natula Mukulu naakwa aasi koti olumesu.
42010019	Nae bone, mbabeerese obunyala bw'ohuseenakira endemo nende eby'obusiba byoosi, handi nende obunyala bumalawo amaani k'omusuku koosi; mani abulao esiindu sichia ohubawumisa.
42010020	Nae kata katyo, mutasangaala olwohuba emisaambwa chibawulira; nae musangaale olwohuba ameeta keeng'we kandiikwa Mukulu.”
42010021	Mani esiha syeene esyo, Yesu yeecha yehoyera mu Mwooyo Mwolerefu mani yaboola ati, “Hwebasa muno Bbaabba, Omwaami w'Ekulu nende esyaalo, olwohuba wakisa ebiindu bino abakesi nende abasoma muno, nae wabibwihulira abana badoto; Eee, Bbaabba, olwohuba huno hwali ohudaha wao hw'esisa.
42010022	Bbaabba yamala ohumberesa ebiindu byoosi; mani abulao omuundu yeesi omanyire Omwaana ohutusaho Simwaana, handi omanyire Simwaana, ohutusaho Omwaana nende oyo yeesi yi Mwaana ahengawo ohubwihulira.”
42010023	Nae Yesu yakaluhanira abeeki bae nibali bong'ene mani yababoolera ati, “Chiri nende ehabi emoni chaabo echibona bimuli ohubona!
42010024	Olwohuba mbaboolera endi, banabbi bangi nende abatuki bangi bekoomba ohubona simubona, nae bahaya ohusibona, handi nende ohuwulira simuwulira, nae bahaya ohusiwulira.”
42010025	Nae bone, omweekesa wa malako wundi, yaasingira yeema nadaha ohuhema Yesu naboola ati, “Omweekesa, siina syeene siimba hole, hu nyale ohunyoola obulamu butaakama?”
42010026	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ni siina syeene esyandiikwa mu malako? Okasoma otye?”
42010027	Nae yakobolamo ati, “Dahaanga Nasae Omwaami wao nende omwooyo kwao kwoosi, nende obulamu bwao bwoosi, nende amaani kao koosi, nende amakesi kao koosi; handi dahaanga owaasyo, koti lu wedaha omweene.”
42010028	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Okoboolemo bulai; mani hola otyo, mani ochia ohubaao omulamu.”
42010029	Nae omweekesa wa malako oyo, koti luyali akiiya ohweekesa ati mulai, yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Nae owasyaange niye naanu?”
42010030	Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yali nakeenda niyehirira ohutula Yerusaalemu, naachia Yeriko, mani yaakwa mu banyaka, bamumalaho engubo, mani bamuhuya bubi muno, mani bawaao, bamuleha nadong'isye ahateetera hong'ene.
42010031	Nae bulaanu olw'ehabi, waliwo omulaamisi wundi yali nabitira hu ngira yene eyo; nae niyamubona, yahededya yabitira endulo yeweerawo.
42010032	Handi nasilala, Omuleefi wundi yesi niyeecha yoola mu sifwo esyo yamubona, mani yahededya yabitira endulo.
42010033	Nae Omusamaria wundi, niyali naali hu lukeendo, yeecha yoola musifwo si musaacha oyo yalimo; nae niyamubona, yamukwiira esisa,
42010034	mani yacha yali, yamuboya ebinyubu, yabichuhaho, amafuta nende efiini; mani yaamubukula yamuta hu esuhiri yae yene, mani yaamuyira mu nyumba y'abakeni, yamala yaamulinda bulai bweene.
42010035	Handi nibwahya muchuli, yeecha yabukula edinaari chibiri mani yachibeeresa omuliindi w'enyumba y'abakeni eyo, naboola ati, ‘Liinda omuundu wuno bulai; handi nisibaao esiindu syoosi syomeedaho ohumuhoonya, ningaluha njia ohuhutuunga.’
