42010036	Naanu mweene hu bandu badatu bano, y'obaasa oti, yekesa eyiri omusaacha wakwa mu banyaka ati niye owaasye?”
42010037	Nae yaboola ati, “Oyo owamukwiira esisa.” Mani Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Cha mani wesi ohole otyo.”
42010038	Nae Yesu nende abeeki bae, nibali bachiririra nende olukeendo lwaabwe olwo, Yesu yoola mu lukoongo lundi; mani omuhasi wundi olaangwa Marita yeecha yamwakaanira, yengira mu nyumba yae.
42010039	Nae yali nende mwaanang'ina olaangwa Maria, oweecha yehala mu makulu k'Omwaami, mani yaatekeeresa enjekesa yae.
42010040	Nae Marita owali asidoyeerwe muno nende emirimo ch'ohukabula; yeecha yacha eyiri Yesu mani yaboola ati, “Omwaami, sodeebaho oti, mwaanaama yandehere ohukabula syeng'ene? Mani muboolere yeeche yahoonyeho.”
42010041	Nae Omwaami yamukobolamo ati, “Marita, ewe Marita, welalihira handi wachuunirwa ebiindu biingi muno;
42010042	nae esiindu silala syong'ene nisyo esihoyerwa. Maria adoolere omukabo mulai, okutacha ohumutusibwaho.”
42011001	Ludaalo lundi, Yesu yali abundu wandi niyekongooya, mani niyamala ohwekongooya, mulala hu beeki bae yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, tweekese ohwekongooya, koti lu Yowaana yekesa abeeki bae.”
42011002	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nimuba nimwekongooya, muboleenge muti: “Seefwe, eliita lyao likinisibwe. Obwaami bwao bwiiche.
42011003	Tuberese buli ludaalo, eby'ohulya byeefwe bya buli buhya;
42011004	mani otuleheremo ebibi byeefwe, olwohuba efwe beene huleheraangamo oyo yeesi otuholera bubi; mani otatuyira mu huhemebwa.”
42011005	Mani yababoolera ati, “Ni naanu hw'eng'we, oli nende omwiicha, onyala ohuchia yali musiro akati, mani yamuboolera ati, ‘Mwiicha wange, ndeeyoleho emigaati chidatu;
42011006	olwohuba aliwo omwiicha wange owahoola natula hu lukeendo, nae mbulaho esiindu syoosi esyohumukabula’;
42011007	mani nae yakobolamo naali mukati ati, ‘Leha ohunyaasa; olwiiki lumalire ohwikalwao, handi ese nende abaana bange huli mu buliri; Haba sinyala ohusiingira ndahuba esiindu syoosi’?
42011008	Mbaboolera endi, kata nende natahasingiire yamuba esiindu syoosi, olwohuba mwiicha wae, nae hulw'enduyirisi eyo, aba achia ohusiingira amubeerese buli syaba nadaha syoosi.
42011009	Handi mbaboolera endi, Saba, mani sichia ohuhubeereswa; koonya, mani ochia ohunyoola; hong'oonda, mani ochia ohwikulirwao.
42011010	Olwohuba osaba yeesi afuna, handi buli okoonya yeesi anyoola, handi buli ohong'oonda yeesi yahekulirwewo.
42011011	Simwaana muundu siina mweng'we, yi mwaana wae asaba amube eng'eeni, onyala ohumuba endemo musifwo sy'eng'eeni;
42011012	oba namusaba ebuyu, onyala ohumuba engoberanyaanja?
42011013	Nikali mbwe, eng'we abandu babi, mumanyire ohuberesa abana beeng'we ebiindu bilai, nae Seeng'we oli Mukulu siyahahirireho awo ohuberesa Mwooyo Mwolerefu abo ababa nibamusabire!”
42011014	Olwoola, Yesu niyali yerusa omusambwa kwali kutalomaloma; nae omusaambwa okwo nikwali kumalire ohuwaao, omusaacha wali natalomalomaanga yeecha yachaaka ohulomaloma, mani abandu bawuka muno.
42011015	Nae abandu bandi bachaaka ohuboola bati, “Wuno yerusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli, omuhongo wemisaambwa”;
42011016	nae abandi, nibeenya ohuhema Yesu, bamusaba ahalolero ohutula Mukulu.
42011017	Nae Yesu, koti luyali namanyire ebibaaso byaabwe, yababoolera ati, “Obwaami bwoosi obwekabulanamo obweene-no-bweene buba bucha ohukwa, handi edaala lyoosi erikabuhanamo likwa bukwa.
42011018	Mani bulaanu Sitaani yesi nikali mbwe yekabuhanie yakabuhanamo omweene-no-mweene, obwaami bwae buba bucha ohuyiindira butye? Olwohuba muli ohuboola muti, njirusa emisambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli.
42011019	Mani nikali mbwe njirusa emisaambwa nende obunyala bwa Bbelisebbuli, nae abana beeng'we baachiirusa nende obunyala bwa nanu? Sakira abeene abo nibo abacha ohubaheengera omusango.
42011020	Nae nindehoonyera omuhono kwa Nasae ohwirusa emisaambwa, mbawo mani Obwaami bwa Nasae bumalire ohuboolaho.
42011021	Nae omusaacha wamaani, oli nende ebilwaaniro bimala, mani yaalinda edooho lyae, ebiindu byae byoosi biba byeliindire bulai;
42011022	nae omuundu wundi omuhiraho amaani, namuseeta mani yamuyingira, amumalaho ebilwaaniro byae biyali niyesikire, akabaniamo abandu bandi ebiindu biyaba amuyayireho.
42011023	Oyo yeesi otaali hu luwaande lwaange, aba ali ohunyiingania, handi oyo otaali ohuhoonya ohubuusa alala, aba ali ohusakuula busa.
42011024	“Omusambwa mubi nikutula mu muundu, kukeenda nikwaambuhana esa enyiingi, nikukoonya abundu w'ohuwuluuhira; nae nikutabukaana obuwuluuhiro bwoosi, kwiicha kweboolera okweene kuti, ‘Njicha ohukaluha mu nyumba yange yindatulamo eyo.’
42011025	Mani nikukobola, kuyakaana niyeeyerwe handi niyitekeheebwe bulai.
42011026	Mani kucha kwaleeta emisaambwa chaasye chiindi chitaanu-na-chibiri echikuhiraho obubi, mani cheengira chamenya mu nyumba omwo; mani obulamu bw'omusaacha oyo bwiicha bwabiiya muno bwahiraho koti lubwali hale.”
42011027	Yesu niyaboola sino, omuhasi wundi musidiiyiha esyo, yahuumula mani yaboolera Yesu ati, “Yiri nende ehabi, enda yahukiinga, alala nende embeere chiwanuuna!”
42011028	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Bali nende ehabi abo bosi abawulira emboosi ya Nasae mani bayiholeraho!”
42011029	Nae ebidiiyiha by'abandu nibyali nibisyemeeda ohwiicha, Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Oluse luno, luse luholi lw'ebibi; lukonyeresa ahalolero, nae abulao ahalolero hacha ohubabeereswa ohutusaho ahalolero ha Yona.
42011030	Olwohuba koti lu Yona yeecha yaba ahalolero eyiri abandu bo mu Ninefe, nilwo busa koti lu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuba eyiri oluse luno.
42011031	Omutuki muhasi ohutula Emwaalo we syaalo achia ohusiingira hu ludaalo lwohuheengeraho omusango, yeme nende abandu b'oluse luno mani abahengere omusango ohubahira; olwohuba yatula Emwaalo yi syaalo syaakama, yacha ohuwulira amakesi ka Solomooni, nae bone, ano aliwo esiindu esihirira elalira Solomooni.
42011032	Abasacha ba Ninefe bacha ohusiingira hu ludaalo lw'ohuheengeraho omusango, mani beeme nende abandu b'oluse luno mani babahengere omusango ohubahira; olwohuba, beyolobya nibawulira ohuyaala hwa Yona, nae bone, ano aliwo esiindu sihirira elalira Yona.
42011033	“Abulao omuundu yeesi owaambia etaara, mani yeecha yaalita mu liina, oba yaalifunihaho esimweero, nae alita hu siteeni syalyo, hubula abandu baba nibengira mu nyumba, banyale ohubona obulafu bwalyo.
42011034	Emoni yao niyo etaara ly'omubiri kwao; nae emoni yao eyo niyiri enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba kwichuule obulafu; nae emoni yao niyitaali enamu, omubiri kwao kwoosi kuba kwichuule esiirima.
42011035	Mani sakira mweliinde, obulafu bubalimo, buteehola esiirima.
42011036	Mani omubiri kwao kwoosi nikuba nikwichuule obulafu, nikutaaliho esituundu siri mu siirima, kwoosi kuba kucha ohuba omulafu, koti etaara lihuhosera nende obulafu bwalyo.”
42011037	Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga atyo, Omufalisaayo wundi yeecha yaamusaba ache alye nae; mani Yesu yeecha yacha nae, yehala alye.
42011038	Nae Omufalisaayo oyo yesinduha muno ohubona ati Yesu haba siyesaaba mberi hu yeme alye.
42011039	Nae Omwaami yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Bulaanu, eng'we Abafalisaayo mwoosa busa humu Kulu w'esikoombe nende w'olusaani, nae mu myooyo cheeng'we bweene mwechula omuluulu nende ebibaaso bibi.
42011040	Abasiru eng'we! Mukaala muti, owahola humukulu oyo, siniye owahola mukati mwosi?
42011041	Nae muyaanire abaati ebiindu biri mukati w'esikoombe nende w'olusaani, mani abweene awo buli siindu sy'eng'we sichia ohuba esilafu syeene.
42011042	“Nae chibanyoolere eng'we Abafalisaayo! Olwohuba muyaana silala sy'ehumi sy'ebiindu koti ebisaari nende tangawusi, nende ebihwi biwunya esiing'aari, nae mweecha obwadyeeri nende ohudaha Nasae; ebiindu koti bino nibyo bimuba muhola nimutalekeresaho kata silala syosi.
42011043	Chibakaanire eng'we Abafalisaayo! olwohuba mudaha muno obwihalo buhiramo obulayi mu Sinagoogi cheeng'we nende ohuheeswa nende oluyaali lungi mu biito.
42011044	Chibakaanire eng'we! olwohuba muli koti ebiriindwa byakwalaala bitabonehana, mani abandu beecha baabiseenaho babibitaho nibataamanyire.”
42011045	Nae mulala hu beekesa ba malako yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, mu nolomaloma otyo, mbawo fwesi oba otunyeka.”
42011046	Nae Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Chibakaanire eng'we mwesi abekesa ba malako! olwohuba mudwiha abandu emikuku misito chitekiinga, nae eng'we abeene simunyala kata ohudiira hu mikuku echo n'olwala lw'eng'we lulala.
42011047	Chibakaanire eng'we! olwohuba muloonga ebiriindwa by'abanabbi ba seeng'we babeeta.
42011048	Mbao muli abajulisi, handi mufukiirisania nende ebiindu bi seeng'we abo bahola; olwohuba nibo ababeta, nae eng'we ning'we abaloonga ebiriindwa byaabwe.
42011049	Mani sakira Amakesi ka Nasae kosi kaboola kati, ‘Njia ohubatumira banabbi nende abatume, abandi hw'abo bacha ohwiitwa handi abandi bacha ohusaandisibwa,’
42011050	hu bulaanu amabaanga k'abanabbi boosi, akediswa ohutulira elalira hu huloongwa hw'esyaalo, kabaanjwe oluse luno,
42011051	ohutulira elalira hu mabaanga ka Abbeli ohwoola hu mabaanga ka Sakariya, oyo owasihira akati-kaati w'alutaari nende esifwo syolerefu muno esy'omunyumba ya Nasae. Eee, mbaboolera endi, amabaanga ako kacha ohubaanjwa oluse luno.
42011052	Chibakaanire eng'we abekesa ba malako! olwohuba mwabukula olufunguyo lw'olwiiki lw'amakesi; nae eng'we beene haba simwengira, handi mwekalira abo boosi abali nibengira.”
42011053	Nae Yesu niyali nasiingira nawawo, abandiiki ba malako nende Abafalisaayo beecha bachaaka ohumwikalirisania muno nende ebiteebo, nibamuhema yemeede ohulomaloma hu biindu biingi,
42011054	awo nibamwelindiriire, nisinyalihana bamudiirire hu siindu syanaboole syoosi.
42012001	Mu biha byeene ebyo, ebidiyiha by'abandu bangi muno byali bimalire ohwebuusa alala, abandu nibachaakire ohwesenanaho, Yesu yeecha yataangira ohuboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mweliinde amamera k'Abafalisaayo ak'obwebachirisi.
42012002	Abulao esiindu syoosi esyabwihwaho esitacha hubwihulwa, oba esyakiswa esitacha humanyihana.
42012003	Mani sakira esyo syoosi simwalomaloma mu siirima, sichia ohuwuliirihanira mu bulafu, handi esyo syoosi simwemoonyera mu nyumba, sichia ohulangirirwa hu birama by'enyumba.
42012004	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri eng'we abeecha bange endi, mutatichaanga abo abeeta omubiri, nae nibamala batyo, sibulao esiindu syoosi sibanyala ohuhola.
42012005	Nae njia ohubalabula oyo yimuhoyeera ohutya: muticheenge oyo, omala ohwiita, oli nende obunyala bwohusukuna mu muliro kutasima; eee, mbaboolera endi, mutye oyo!
42012006	Obubbiichu butaanu, haba sibukulwaanga obuhela bubiri bwong'ene? Nae abulao kata hala hw'otwo ahebirirwanga mu moni wa Nasae.
42012007	Lwasiina, kata efwiiri ly'ohumutwe kwao lyoosi, lyamala ohubalwa. Mutatya daawe; eng'we mulimo obuhala obuungi muno ohuhira obubbiichu bungi.
42012008	“Handi mbaboolera endi, buli muundu yeesi owufukiirira mu moni w'abandu, Omwaana w'Omuundu yesi aba achia ohumufukiirira mu moni wa bamalaika ba Nasae;
42012009	nae oyo owundekaana mu moni w'abandu, achia ohwekaanibwa mu moni wa bamalaika ba Nasae.
42012010	Handi muundu yeesi, olomaloma emboosi bubi hu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuleherwamo; nae oyo yeesi ofwoola Mwooyo Mwolerefu, haba saachia huleherwamo daawe.
42012011	Nae nibabaletaanga mu moni wa buli Sinagoogi nende mu nomi w'abeemirisi, kata nende mu moni wa b'obunyala bakabuhaane, mutelalihiriraanga eby'ohukobolamo nende engeri y'ohukobolamo, oba ebyohulomaloma;
42012012	olwohuba Mwooyo Mwolerefu aba achia ohubeekesa esiha syeene esyo eby'ohulomaloma.”
42012013	Olwoola, mulala hu bandu bali musidiiyiha yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omweekesa, boolera mwaanama akabane naange ebiindu bi hwalaamirwa.”
42012014	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Wasyaange, wiina owataao ohuba omukayi weng'we oba omukabi w'ebiindu byeeng'we?”
42012015	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mweliinde, handi mwekae obwekoombi bwoosi; olwohuba obulamu bw'omuundu sibweema hu bungi bw'obuyiinda bwae.”
42012016	Mani Yesu yabakaadira olukaado naboola ati, “Olwoola, endaalo y'omusaacha wundi munyali, yeecha yaama bulai muno;
42012017	mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yabaasa mu mwooyo kwae ati, ‘Ndaahole endye, olwohuba mbula abundu w'ohuteera ebirime byaange?’
42012018	Mani yaboola ati, ‘Bulaanu sino nisyo siinjia ohuhola: Njia ohukwiisa ebyaaki byaange byoosi, mani male nyombahe ebihoongo bihira hoo; mani omwo nimwo munja ohuteera emere yange alala nende obuyiinda bwaange bwoosi.
42012019	Mani niimala endyo njia ohuboolera omwooyo kwaange endi, Bulamu ewe, mbawo oli nende ebiindu biyera ebihubihiirwe ohumala emyaaka emiingi muno; mani otelalihira, lya, ng'wa, mani osangaale.’
42012020	Nae Nasae yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Omusiru wuno! Esiro syeene sino obulamu bwao, bucha ohuhutusibwaho; mani ebiindu biwabiiha bino byoosi, bicha ohuba ebya wiina?’
42012021	Mani nilwo lwali oyo yeesi, owebuungira omweene obunyali bwae, nae saali omunyali mu moni wa Nasae.”
42012022	Bulaanu, Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Sakira mbaboolera endi, mutelalihiriraanga eby'obulamu bw'eng'we, bimunaalye, oba ebidiira hu mibiri cheeng'we, nende eby'ohwefwaala.
42012023	Olwohuba obulamu buhira ebyohulya, nae omubiri kwosi kuhira eby'ohwefwaala.
42012024	Mubonereho hu mahoofwa: haba sikawaanya kata sikakesa, sikali nende ewohubiihamo ebiindu, kata ebyaaki, nae bone Nasae akaliisa. Nae obuhala bw'eng'we sibuhira muno amayoni ako!
42012025	Nae wiina hweeng'we hulw'ohwelalihira hwae, onyala ohumeeda hu bulamu bwae bwaaba obuleeyi hooho?
42012026	Nikali mbwe eng'we simunyala ohuhola esiindu sidiidi sityo, lwasiina mwelalihira hulw'ebiindi bidong'ereyo?
42012027	Mubonereho hu bimuli by'omusiino, koti lubihula; haba sibihola mirimo oba engubo ch'ohwefwaala; nae mbahoolera endi, kata Solomooni, mu luyaali lwae lwoosi, haba siyanyala ohwefwaala yetiha ohwaakana nende silala hu bimuli bino.
42012028	Nae nikali mbwe Nasae anyala ohufwaasa busa obunyaasi bwo mu siino obubao olwaleero, nae muchuli busukunwa mu muliro ohusambwa, nae aba yahaake ena ohubafwaasa, Aaa eng'we ab'efukiirira ndiidi!
42012029	Mani sakira mutekonyereseraanga eby'ohulya nende eby'ohung'wa kata ohubechaanga nende ebibaaso byohwelalihira.
42012030	Olwohuba ebyaalo byohusyaalo huno byoosi, bikonyeresa busa ebiindu bino; nae Seeng'we amanyire ati mwesi mubidaha.
42012031	Mani musifwo sy'ebyo, eng'we mukoonyerese Obwaami bwae, mani ebiindu bino byosi biba bicha ohuba ebyeng'we.
42012032	“Mutatya daawe, eng'we baana bange, olwohuba Seeng'we musangaafu ohubabeeresa Obwaami.
42012033	Mukuse obunyali bweeng'we, mukabire abamanani; mwefunire emifuuko chitakofula, nende obunyali buli Mukulu obutanyaasiha, yi mwiibi yeesi atanyala ohwoola, handi bu mbungi chitanyala ohunyaasa.
42012034	Olwohuba yi mwaandu kwao kuba, awo niwo yi mwooyo kwao kwosi kuba.
42012035	“Mwefwaalire elalira, handi mulehe amataara keeng'we nikaaduha,
42012036	mani mube koti abahalaabani beetekefu baliindire omwaami waabwe ohukobola ango natula hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, banyale ohumwikulirao olwiiki bwaangu niyoola busa ati yahong'oonda.
42012037	Bali nende ehabi abahalaabani abo ba mwaami waabwe yeecha yakaana nibali abetekefu; mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, aba achia ohweboya bulai, mani ababoole behale hu meesa ohulya, mani omweene yeeche abakabule.
42012038	Nikali mbwe yeecha mu saa y'ohubiri, oba mu y'ohudatu, mani yabakaana nibali batyo, abahalaabani abo baba bali nende ehabi!
42012039	Nae muhoyeere ohumanya sino muti, omweene nyumba aba niyamanya ebiha byeene bi mwiibi yecheramo, aba yahaya ohuleha enyumba yae yahalakwa yengirwamo.
42012040	Mani eng'we mwesi, muhoyeere ohuba abetekefu; olwohuba Omwaana w'omuundu achia ohwiicha mu siha syatabasirisirwamo.”
42012041	Peetero yeecha yaboola ati, “Omwaami, olukaado luno, oli ohulukaadira efwe, kose abandu boosi?”
42012042	Nae Omwaami yaboola ati, “Muliindi siina omwesikwa handi omukesi, yi mwaami wae yahadiisa edaala lyae, nende ohukabulira abandu bamwo omukabo kwaabwe mu biha bihoyeere?
42012043	Ali nende ehabi omuhalaabani oyo, yi mwaami wae yeecha yamwakaana naahola esyo syahoyeere ohuhola.
42012044	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, aba achia ohumudiisa ebiindu byae boosi.
42012045	Nae omuhalaabani oyo niyeecha yeboolera omweene ati, ‘Mbao ngandi omwaami wange achia ohuhiinda ohwiicha,’ mani yachaaka ohuhuya abahalaabani basye basaacha nende abahasi, mani yachaaka ohulya nende ohung'wa mani yaameera,
42012046	omwaami w'omuhalaabani oyo achia ohwiicha hu ludaalo lu muhalaabani oyo atamubasirisiramo handi hu siha syatamanyire, mani aba achia ohumusaandia, mani amale amute alala nende abataali abesikwa.
42012047	Nae omuhalaabani oyo owamanya si mwaami wae adaha, nae yahaya ohwetekeha, kata ohuhola koti lu mwaami wae adaha, achia ohutoochwa muno.
42012048	Nae omuhalaabani oyo owali nataamanyire si mwaami wae adaha, mani yahola esyo esyahakera yahuywa, aba achia ohuhuywa budiidi. Buli muundu yeesi, obereswa ebiindu biingi, achia ohudahibwaho ebiingi; nae oyo yibabihisa ebiindu biingi, bacha ohumubaanja ebiingi.
42012049	“Ese ndeecha ohuwaambya omuliro hu syaalo; handi kuba kwamala ohuwaamba!
42012050	Ndi nende embatiisa yihoyeere ohubatisibwamo; handi sinjuuna muno ohwoola lu syaholereere!
42012051	Mubaasa muti ese ndeecha ohuleeta emireembe hu syaalo? Haba bbe, mbaboolera endi, ndeecha ohuleeta ohukabuhana;
42012052	mani ohutula bulaanu nende ohwemdeeda mu moni, mu nyumba ndala y'abandu bataanu, mucha ohubaamo ohukabuhana, badatu bacha ohukabuha hu babiri, handi babiri bakabuhe hu badatu;
42012053	abandu bacha ohukabuhanamo, simwaana akabuhane nende omusyaani wae, omusyaani akabuhane nende simwaana, ng'ina akabuhane nende omuhaana wae, handi omuhaana akabuhaane nende ng'ina, masaala akabuhaane nende muhomusyani wae, muhomusyani akabuhaane nende masaalang'ene.”
42012054	Yesu handi yeecha yaboolera esidiiyiha sy'abandu esyo ati, “Eng'we nimubona esireesi nisisingiriire emumbo, mubolaanga bwaangu-bwaangu muti, ‘Efula mbawo yicha’; mani nibiba bityo.
42012055	Nae nimubona omuyaka kutulira emwaalo nikuwucha, mubolaanga muti, ‘Omubasu kw'amaani kucha ohufwa’; mani nibiba bityo busa.
42012056	Abebachirisi eng'we! Mumanyire bulai muno ohutotola emboneha y'esyaalo, nende ey'ekulu; nae lwasiina haba simumanyire ohutotola ebiha bya bulaanu bino?
42012057	“Nae lwasiina abeene simunyala ohweheengerao esiba nisihoyera ohuholwa?
42012058	Nooba nooli ohuchia nende ohuyingania eyiri omukayi, teemaho koti lwonyala, owuliirisaanie nae nimusiiri hu ngira, ataali awo, achia ohuhuhwehweesa ahwose eyiri omukayi, mani omukayi oyo amale ahudiise omusirikaari muhoongo, nae omusikaari oyo amale ahusukune mu mboye.
42012059	Mbaboolera endi, haba sochia ohutulamo nosisiiri ohutungira elalira ehela yihenerehayo.”
42013001	Esiha syeene esyo, waliwo abandu bandi ababoolera Yesu ebidiira hu Bagalilaaya ba Pilaato yasasaania amabaanga kaabwe nende ebiyaanwa byaabwe bibali bayirira Nasae.
42013002	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mubaasa muti Abagalilaaya bano bali abaholi be bibi ohuhiraho Abagalilaaya bandi hu beemeo basaandisibwe batyo?
42013003	Mbaboolera endi, haba daawe; nae ohutusaho nimuteyolobya mwesi mucha ohusihirira mutyo.
42013004	Oba, abandu ehumi-na-bataanu-na-badatu ba omunara kwe Siloamu kwakwaho mani kweta, mubaasa muti bali abaholi be bibi muno ohuhiraho abandu bandi boosi abali bamenya mu Yerusaalemu?
42013005	Mbaboolera endi, Haba daawe; nae nimuteeyolobya, mwesi mucha ohusihirira mutyo.”
42013006	Mani Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado luno ati, “Waliwo omusaacha wundi owataaka omusaala kw'enduli mu ndalo yae; olwoola omusaacha oyo yeecha nakoonyaho ebyaamo, nae yahaya ohwakaanaho esyaamo syoosi.
42013007	Mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yalaanga omulimi w'endaalo eyo, yamuboolera ati, ‘Aaa, ndaheecha ano emyaaka chidatu chino choosi ningonyaanga hu mutuli kuno esyaamo, nae haba sinyolaangaho esiindu syoosi. Mani bulaanu kuteme kukwe aasi; olwohuba simbona esikera nikuchiiririra ohunyaasa eloba lino?’
42013008	Nae omulimi oyo yeecha yamukobolamo namuboolera ati, ‘Omuhulundu, kulehe kubeo omwaaka kuno kwosi, ngwaakeho mu sisina kwebodoohanie, male kuteeho embolera.
42013009	Mani nikwichuhana kwaamaho omwaaka kwiicha, siba sinaba esilai; nae nikuhaya ohwaamaho, bulaanu onyala ohukutema kukwa aasi.’ ”
42013010	Olwoola, Yesu yali niyeekesa mu Sinagoogi yindi hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
42013011	Mani mubweene omwo, mwalimo omuhasi wundi wali aliho omusaambwa kwamulemya hulwa embaka ye myaka ehumi-na-chitaanu-na-chidatu emilaamba; yali niyefuumbamo omukoongo, natanyala kata ohweema nakololoohe.
42013012	Mani Yesu niyamubona ati, yamulaanga mani yamuboolera ati, “Muhasi-ng'ene, omalire ohuwonisibwa obulema bwao.”
42013013	Mani Yesu yeecha yamwiisaho amahono kae, mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni omuhasi oyo akololoha, mani yachaaka ohufumia Nasae.
42013014	Nae omwimirisi wa Sinagoogi eyo, yeecha yechula etima liingi olwohuba Yesu yali awonisye hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, mani yeecha yaboolera abandu ati, “Aliwo endaalo chisaasaba echihoyeere ohuholerwaho emirimo; mani mwiicheenge hu ndaalo echo muwonisibwa, nae mutechaanga hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.”
42013015	Nae Omwaami yeecha yamukobolamo ati, “Abebachirisi eng'we! Mweng'we mweesi, naanu otaboololaanga eng'oombe yae kata esuhiri yae hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato ayitusa mu sidwooli, mani ayiyira ohung'wa?
42013016	Nae omuhasi wuno, omuhaana wa Yibbulaimu, yi Sitaani yaboya hu lwa embaka ye myaka ehumi-na-chitaanu-na-chidatu emilaamba, haba sahoyera ohuboololwa obuboye buno, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
42013017	Mani Yesu niyalomaloma sino, abasuku bae boosi esoni chabadiira muno; nae abandu baliwo boosi bachaaka ohwehoya hu lw'ebiindu by'oluyaali byoosi bi Yesu yali naaholere.
42013018	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae bufwaanana nende siina? Handi ndaabukeraanisye hu siina syeene?
42013019	Bufwaanana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba lu muundu wundi yabukula yacha yataaka mu ndalo yae; mani lweechula lwahula, lwehola omusaala muhoongo, mani amayoni kabburuha keecha koombaha ebiswi mu masaga kakwo.”
42013020	Yesu yeecha handi yahuboola ati, “Siina syeene sindaakeraanieho Obwaami bwa Nasae?
42013021	Bufwaanana nende amamera ka omuhasi wundi yabukula mani yaacha yasaasa mu bikero by'obusye bidatu, ohwoola lu bwoosi bweecha bwebbaaha bwafwiimba bulai.”
42013022	Yesu yeecha yakenda naabitira mu biko nende mu ngoongo, niyeekesaanga, handi naali hulukendo naachia e Yerusaalemu.
42013023	Mani omuundu wundi yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, abandu bacha ohuwonisibwa bahabe busa abayeranu?” Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati,
42013024	“Muteemeho muno ohwingirira mu mulyaango mudiiyu; olwohuba mbaboolera endi, abandu bangi bacha oteemaho ohwingira nae haba sibachia hunyala.
42013025	Mani omwenengo niyahasiingire, mani yekalawo olwiiki, mucha ohweema erwaanyi muchaake ohuhong'oonda hu lwiiki nimuboola muti, ‘Omwaami, twiikulireo.’ Nae achia ohubakobolamo ati, ‘Ese haba siimanyire yimutula daawe.’
42013026	Nae mwahachaake ohuboola muti, ‘Efwe hwalichaanga handi hwang'wechaanga mu moni wao, handi weekesaanga mu makira keefwe.’
42013027	Nae achia ohuboola ati, ‘Mbaboolera endi, ese haba siimanyire yimutula daawe; mumbweere-eyi, eng'we mweesi abaholi be bibi!’
42013028	Eyo niyo yimucha ohulirira nimweesia ameeno, nimubona Yibbulaimu nende Yisaka nende Yakobbo nende banabbi boosi mu Bwaami bwa Nasae nae eng'we abeene nimusukuunwe erwaanyi.
42013029	Mani bandu bahatule ebukwe nende emumbo, handi nende emu Kulu nende emwaalo, mani beehala hu meesa mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
42013030	Mani bone, aliwo abandu baheneerehayo bulaanu abacha ohutangiramo, handi aliwo abatangiramo bulaanu, abacha ohuba ohuheneerehayo.”
42013031	Esiha syeene esyo, Abafalisaayo bandi beecha, mani baboolera Yesu bati, “Tula ano oweeo, olwohuba Herode adaha ohuhwiita.”
42013032	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Muchie muboolere ebbwe eryo muti, ‘Bona, ese njirusa emisaambwa handi monia abandu olwaleero nende muchuli, nae oludaalo lw'ohudatu maliiririsa omulimo kwaange.
42013033	Nae kata katyo ndi nende ohuchiiririra nende biindi ohuhola, olwaleero nende muchuli, nende oludaalo luloondaho; olwohuba sisinyalihana ohuba mbwe, omunabbi afwiira erwaanyi w'esiko sye Yerusaalemu.’
42013034	Eee eng'we abe Yerusaalemu, ohwiitaanga banabbi nende ohuhuyaanga amakina abo ababa nibabatumiirwe! Ndahaake ena ohubuusa alala abana beeng'we koti lu ngoho yibuusanga obumwiinyu bwayo mu mbaya chayo, nae haba simunyaliha daawe!
42013035	Bone, enyumba yeng'we yebwabirwe. Handi mbaboolera endi simuchia ohumbonaho, ohwoola lu mwahaboolere muti, ‘Ali nende ehabi oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami!’ ”
42014001	Olwoola, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato lundi, Yesu yeecha yacha mu nyumba ya mulala hu bemirisi Bafalisaayo, nae niyali naalya, abandu bandi beecha bachaaka ohumwewunja.
42014002	Mani bone, omusaacha wundi owali niyafwiimba amakulu nende amahono yeecha yi Yesu ali.
42014003	Mani Yesu yeecha yaalomaloma nende abekesa ba malako nende Abafalisaayo naboola ati, “Mani sifukiirirwa ohuwonia hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, kose haba?”
42014004	Nabo bawuleera busa. Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula omusaacha oyo, mani yamuwonia, mani yaamuleha yawaawo.
42014005	Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Wiina mweene hweeng'we, oli nende omwaana wae, oba esurusi yae, eyiba niyikwiire mu buko, otatulaniramo yacha yamuhwesa yamutusamo hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?”
42014006	Nabo sibanyala ohumukobolamo mu sino.
42014007	Bulaanu, Yesu niyabona engeri yi bakeni balaange bali bedooleremo obwihalo bw'oluyaali luhoongo, yeecha yabakaadira olukaado nababoolera ati,
42014008	“Nooba nolaangirwe hu sidyaalo sy'obweeya, otachichaanga wihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali luhoongo muno, olwohuba oyo ohulaangire anyala ohuba nalaangire omuundu wundi ohuhirira elalira oluyaali;
42014009	mani oyo obalaangire mwembi anyala ohwiicha yahuboolera ati, ‘Ewe yikulira wuno esifwo esyo,’ mani bulaanu ochia ohudiirwa esoni nosiingira nochia ohwihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali lwa aasi muno.
42014010	Nae nooba nolangirwe, chichaanga wihala mu sifwo sy'oluyaali lwa aasi muno, hu bulaanu obalaangire niyeecha, anyale ohuhuboolera ati, ‘Mwiicha wange, siingira ochie wihale akulu’; mani oba ochia ohufuna oluyaali mu moni w'abandu boosi ababa nibehaale naawe hu meesa.
42014011	Olwohuba buli muundu weniinia omweene achia ohuloongoyaswa, nae oyo oweloongoyasa omweene, achia ohuniinisibwa.”
42014012	Yesu yeecha yaboolera omuundu wali amulaangire yesi ati, “Nooba nokabula abandu ohulya oba hu sidyaalo, otalangaanga abeecha bao, kose bamwaanaamao, kose abanaluya bao, kose abasibirana naawe banyali, olwohuba bano bosi banyala ohuhulaanga oludaalo lundi, mani bahutunga.
42014013	Nae nooba nokabula esidyaalo, langaanga abamanani, nende abadiimbe, nende abalema, nende abawofu,
42014014	mani awo niwo yocha ohufunira ehabi, olwohuba abo haba sibanyala huhutunga. Ochia ohutungwa hu ludaalo lu boolerefu bacha ohusyuuhiraho.”
42014015	Nae bulaanu mulala hu bandu bali nibehaale nende Yesu hu meesa, niyawulira sino yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ali nende ehabi oyo owahalye omugaati mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!”
42014016	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yeecha yakabula esidyaalo sihoongo muno, mani yalaanga abandu bangi muno ohwiicha.
42014017	Mani esiha sy'esidyaalo nisyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wae ache aboolere abandu bali balaangirwe ati, ‘Mwiiche; olwohuba buli siindu sidahibwa simalire ohutekehwa.’
42014018	Nae boosi beecha bachaaka buli mulala ohwelira-bwelira. Owataangira yamuboolera ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hu ngulire omukunda, mani hoyeere njie kuboneho; hwekongooyere muno wundeheremo obuteecha.’
42014019	Handi owundi yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hundaakulire busa eng'ombe chirima emikoondo chitaanu, mani hoyeere njie mbone koti lu chirima; mani hwekongooyere muno wundeheremo obuteecha.’
42014020	Handi owundi yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ese bulaanu hundadehiisye omuhasi, mani haba sinyala ohwiicha.’
42014021	Mani omuhalaabani oyo yeecha yaakobola mani yaboolera omwaami wae atyo. Mani etima lyeecha lyadiira omwenengo oyo mani yaboolera omuhalaabani wae oyo ati, ‘Cha bwaangu hu makira nende hu myanda chiri mu siko sihoongo, mani oleete abamanani, nende abadiimbe, nende abaofu, nende abalema.’
42014022	Mani omuhalaabani oyo yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Omuhulundu, ebyo byoosi biwumboleere ohuhola, mbyosereese endyo, nae handi obweyaango bundi busidong'ereo.’
42014023	Nae omwaami oyo yeecha yaboolera omuhalaabani oyo ati, ‘Tula mani ochie hu ngira hoongo choosi, nende otukira tudiidi twoosi, mani oleete abandu beengire bechule enyumba yange.
42014024	Olwohuba ewe huboolera endi, abulao omuundu yeesi hu bandu bali balaangirwe ochia ohuhoombaho hu sidyaalo syaange.’ ”
42014025	Bulaanu, ebidiyiha bihoongo biindi byeecha byachaana nende Yesu; mani yeecha yakaluhaana yababoolera ati,
42014026	“Omuundu yeesi owiicha yindi, saanyala ohuba omweeki wange ohutusaho nga atangire mberi ohusyuula simwaana mweene nende ng'ina nende omuhasi wae, nende abaana bae, nende ba mwaanang'ina, nende ba mboochong'ene, eee, nende kata obulamu bwae bweene.
42014027	Oyo yeesi otanyala ohukinga omusalabba kwae kweene, mani yanoonda, haba saanyala ohuba omweeki wange.
42014028	Olwohuba, wiina mweene hweeng'we, oba nadaha ohwombaha omunara, otataangira mberi yehala aasi, mani yabaliirira obuungi bw'ebiindu bidahibwa, yabona oba ali nende ebiindu bimala ohwombaha omunara kwawa?
42014029	Ataali awo, naamala ohwombaha omuse, mani byeecha byamuhaya ohumaliirisa, abo boosi abakubona, baba bacha ohumucheha,
42014030	nibaboola bati, ‘Omuundu wuno yachaaka ohwombaha nae siyanyala ohumaliirisa.’
42014031	Oba mutuki siina, oba naachia ohulwaana nende omutuki wundi, atatangira mberi yehala aasi, yabaliira bulai naali nende abalwaani emitwaalo ehumi nanyala ohuyingira oyo omuseeta nende abalwaani emitwaalo amahumi kabiri?
42014032	Mani naabona ati sibinyaliha, atuma bawamwaanda basabe ohuwuliirisania babe nende emireembe, omutuki waasye oyo nasisiiri eyale muno.
42014033	Mani sakira, oyo yeesi mweng'we otebwaaba byoosi byali nabyo, saanyala ohuba omweeki wange.
42014034	“Omuunyu mulai nikwo; nae omuunyu nikuwaamo echamu lyaakwo, kunyala ohukaluswamo kutye echamu elyo?
42014035	Kubula obuhoonyi bwoosi hu loba, oba hu mbolera yosi; kusukunwa busa eyale. Oyo oli nende amatwi kawulira, leha awulire.”
42015001	Olwoola, abatoosa b'emisolo nende abaholi be bibi boosi bachaaka ohwiicha eyiri Yesu ohuwulira bi yekesa.
42015002	Nae Abafalisaayo nende abandiiki bamalako beecha bachaaka ohweng'ulung'uunya nibaboola bati, “Omusaacha wuno yakaanira abaholi be bibi handi yaalya nabo.”
42015003	Mani Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado luno ati,
42015004	“Muundu siina hw'eng'we, oba nende amakoondi kae emia ndala, mani lala hwaako lyeecha lyakota, otahalehao amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende kataanu-na-kane kala mu saa, mani yacha yakoonya lala lira eliba nilikotere, ohwoola lwalyakaana?
42015005	Mani naamala ohulyakaana, alikinga yaalita hu mabeka kae, niyehoya.
42015006	Nae niyoola engo, alaanga abeecha bae alala nende abaasye, nababoolera ati, ‘Mwiiche hwehoyere alala, olwohuba malire ohwakaana ekoondi lyaange libeere likotere.’
42015007	Mbaboolera endi, mu ngeri nasilala yityo, nilwo lu mwehoyo mungi kucha ohuba Mukulu hu lw'omuholi we bibi mulala oweyolobya ohuhira abandu balungifu amahumi kataanu-na-kane nende bataanu-na-bane abatadaha ohweyolobya.
42015008	“Oba muhasi siina, oba nende eseende mwaamwa ch'efeesa ehumi, mani yaakosa emwaamwa ndala, otawaambya etaara, yeya bulai bweene enyumba yoosi nakoonya, ohwoola lwayakaana?
42015009	Mani naamala ohuyakaana, alaanga abecha bae alala nende abaasye, naboola ati, ‘Mwiiche hwehoyere alala, olwohuba njakaanire eseende y'emwaamwa yange eyali niyikotere.’
42015010	Mbaboolera endi, mu ngeri nasilala yityo, niyo lu bamalaika ba Nasae lubehoyera omuholi we bibi mulala oweyolobya.”
42015011	Yesu handi yaboola ati, “Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha wundi owali nende abasyaani bae babiri;
42015012	mani omusyaani muyere yeecha yaboolera simwaana ati, ‘Bbaabba, mberese esiha sino omukabo kwaange kw'obuyiinda kuwahambereese nofwiire.’ Mani saabwe yeecha yabakabaniamo obuyiinda bwae.
42015013	Nae endaalo endiidi muno nichabitao, omusyaani muyere oyo yabuusa alala ebiindu biyali nabyo byoosi, mani yadiira olukeendo yacha mu syaalo sy'eyale muno, mani yachakia-chakira eyo obuyiinda bwae bwoosi mu bulamu bw'ohuchakala.
42015014	Mani niyamala ohuhosesa buli siindu siyali nasyo, enjala nyiingi muno yeecha yaakwawo mu syaalo esyo, ohwoola luyadoong'a naabulaho esiindu syoosi.
42015015	Mani yeecha yacha yaamenya nende mulala hu bandu bo musyaalo esyo, owamutuma ache mu mikuunda chae amulisire embiichi.
42015016	Yoola ohwekoomba ohulya ebyoola bi mbiichi chalichaanga; nae abulao omuundu yeesi owamuberesa esiindu syoosi.
42015017	Nae niyekaluhaho, yabaasa omweene naboola ati, ‘Nae baanga hu bahalaabani ba Bbaabba yapangisa abali nende emigaati chibalya handi chadoong'aho, nae ese ndi ohufwiira ano enjala!
42015018	Ese njia ohusiingira mani njie eyiri Bbaabba, mani njia ohumuboolera endi, Bbaabba, ndakosa mu moni w'Ekulu nende mu moni wao;
42015019	Sisihoyera ohulaangwa, omwaana wao; nae mbukule busa koti mulala hu bahalaabani bao bapangise.’ ”
42015020	Mani yasingira mani yeecha eyiri simwaana. Nae niyali nasisiiri eyale, simwaana yamubona mani yaamukwiira esisa, mani yeruha yacha yamubukaanira yaamukwa mu sirifu.
42015021	Nae omusyaani oyo yamuboolera ati, “Bbaabba, ndakosa mu moni w'Ekulu nende mu moni wao; Sisihoyera ohulaangwa omwaana wao.”
42015022	Nae simwaana yaboolera abahalaabani bae ati, “Muleete bwaangu engubo yihiramo obulayi, mani mumufwase; handi mumuteeho engila hu muhono, handi mumufwase ebiraato mu makulu;
42015023	mani muche muleete eng'ombe nginu muyiite, mani lehe hulye hwesangaase;
42015024	olwohuba omwaana wange wuno yali yafwa, nae bulaanu mulamu; yali yakota, nae bulaanu abonehane.” Mani bachaaka ohwesangaasa.
42015025	“Nae bulaanu, omusyaani wae muhuluundu yali naali mumukuunda; mani niyali naakobola, yoola aambi nende edaala, yeecha yawulira abandu nibeemba handi nibahina.
42015026	Mani yeecha yalaanga mulala hu bahalaabani yamuteeba ati, ‘Siina syeene esikwiireo?’
42015027	Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘mwaanamaao yeechere, mani lataao amwitiire eng'ombe nginu, olwohuba amwakaanire naali omulamu abweene.’
42015028	Nae yeecha yaanyoolera muno, mani yahaya ohwingira mudaala. Nae simwaana yeecha yaatula erwaanyi yacha yamwekweeda yengire,
42015029	nae yakobola mu simwaana ati, ‘Bonaho, huhalaabaniire busa emyaaka chino choosi, handi kata sindatenguyiraho amalako kao; nae osisiiri kata ohumbaaho busa ahameeme hong'ene, nyale ohwesangaasaho nende abeecha bange.
42015030	Nae omusyaani wao wuno, owanyaasa omwaandu kwao nende abacheke niyeechere, ewe omwiitire eng'ombe nginu!’
42015031	Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘mwaana wange, buli siha oli naange ano, mani ebiindu byaange byoosi byao nibyo.
42015032	Mani sibeere esilai muno hwesangaase handi hwehoye, olwohuba mwaanamaao wuno yali yafwa, nae bulaanu mulamu; yali yakota, nae bulaanu abonehane.’ ”
42016001	Yesu handi yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha munyali wundi owali nende omuliindi wae, mani abandu bandi beecha bamwekanyiisira muno ebidiira hu musaacha wuno, nibaboola bati, yali anyaasa-nyaasa emyaandu chae.
42016002	Mani omusaacha munyali yeecha yalaanga omuliindi oyo, mani yamuboolera ati, ‘Siina syeene sino siindi ohuhuwuliraho? Mberese embaliirira y'obuliindi bwao, olwohuba sochia huba handi omuliindi w'ebiindu byaange.’
42016003	Mani omuliindi oyo yeecha yaboola omweene mu mwooyo kwae ati, ‘Ndaahole siina syeene, olwohuba omwaami wange mbano achia ohumalaho omulimo kw'obuliindi? Ese mbula amaani k'ohulima, handi ohwesabirisa hunyaambya esoni.
42016004	Heengereo esy'ohuhola, hu bandu bandi banyale ohumbukaanira mu madaala kaabwe, nibanjiruuse hu mulimo kw'obuliindi kuno.’
42016005	Mani yeecha yalangaanga buli muundu yeesi owali nende ekobi ly'omwaami wae syamulala-mulala, mani yeecha yaboolera owataangira ati, ‘Omwaami wange ahubaanja siina?’
42016006	Nae naboola ati, ‘Ebikero emia ndala eby'amafuta.’ Nae omuliindi oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani bukula obwandiike bw'efukiirisania yao, mani wihale aasi bwaangu, wandiike ebikero amahumi kataanu.’
42016007	Handi yeecha yamuboolera owundi ati, ‘Nae ewe obaanjwa siina?’ Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘Ebikero emia ndala by'eng'aano.’ Omuliindi oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani bukula obwandiike bw'efukiirisania yao, omale wandiike amahumi kataanu-na-kadatu.’
42016008	Omwaami oyo yeecha yaasiima muno omuliindi otaali nende obwesikwa wuno hulw'obukesi-kesi bwae obwo; olwohuba abana b'esyaalo sino bakesi-kesi muno mu ngeri yibadiiraniramo nende oluse lwaabwe ohuhira abana b'obulafu.
42016009	Mani sakira mbaboolera endi, mwehoonyere mammona chitaali enungifu, ohwewaambira abeecha mani ebiha nibyoola chabawaaho, banyala baabakaanira mwaba mu bumenyo butaakama.
42016010	“Oyo yeesi oba omwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi muno aba anaba omwesikwa mu biingi byosi; nae oyo otaali omwesikwa mu biindu bidiidi muno, haba saaba achia ohuba omwesikwa mu biindu biingi byosi.
42016011	Mani nikali mbwe haba soobeere omwesikwa mu mammona chitaali enungifu, wiina mweene ochia ohuhubiihisa obunyali bwadyeeri?
42016012	Handi nikali mbwe soobeere omwesikwa mu biindu by'owundi, wiina ochia ohuhubeeresa ebiindu byao byeene?
42016013	Abulao omuhalaabani onyala ohuhalaabanira abaami babiri; olwohuba achia ohusyuula mulala nae aheere owundi, oba aba achia ohwiisa oluyaali mu mulala nae alekerese owundi. Mani sonyala ohuhalaabanira Nasae nende mammona.”
42016014	Abafalisaayo abali baheera muno eseende, nibawulira bino byoosi, beecha bechusuula muno Yesu.
42016015	Nae Yesu yeecha ababoolera ati, “Eng'we ning'we abelyooya abeene mu moni w'abandu, nae Nasae amanyire emyooyo cheeng'we koti luchiri; olwohuba esyo si bandu bakinia, siwumamo obuhoonyi mu moni wa Nasae.
42016016	“Amalako ka Musa nende obwandiike bw'abanabbi byali nibyo ebiri nende obunyala ohwoola hu Yowaana; nae ohutula awo, Emboosi Ndai y'Obwaami bwa Nasae yiri ohuyaalwa, mani buli muundu ali ohubwiingiraangamo nende esirifu.
42016017	Nae syaangu muno Ekulu nende esyaalo ohuwao, ohuhira kata ahatonyese halala hong'ene ah'amalako ka Musa ohunyaasibwa.
42016018	“Omuundu yeesi owirusa omuhasi wae, mani yadeehya owundi, aba aholere obucheke, handi oyo yeesi odeehya omuhasi waloba omusaacha, yesi aba ahola obucheke.
42016019	“Olwoola, waliwo omusaacha munyali wundi, owali yefwalaanga engubo ch'oluyaali muno nende ech'elaasi ndayi muno, handi owalichaanga bulai buli ludaalo.
42016020	Nae omusaacha mumanani, olaangwa Lasaaro, owali yechula amakoonjo hu mubiri, yeyalisanga hu siruwa sy'omusaacha munyali oyo.
42016021	Lasaaro wuno, yekombanga ohulyaaho ebyohulya byali nibilakahaanga aasi ohutula hu meesa y'omusaacha munyali oyo; handi embwa chechaanga mani nichihomberera amakoonjo kae ako.
42016022	Omusaacha mumanani oyo yeecha yafwa, mani yaakiingwa nende bamalaika bamuyira yehala mu makulu ka Yibbulaimu. Omusaacha munyali oyo yesi yeecha yafwa, mani yaasiihwa;
42016023	mani niyali nasaandisibwa muno emakoombe, yeecha yaasingisa emoni chae, mani yabona Yibbulaimu naali eyale muno, handi Lasaaro niyehaale mu makulu kae.
42016024	Mani yeecha yahuumula nalaanga ati, ‘Lata Yibbulaimu, ngwiire esisa, mani otume Lasaaro, yeenihe mu maachi olwala lwae mani yeeche anyiseho olulimi lwaange; olwohuba ndi mubuchuuni bungi muno mu muliro kuno.’
42016025	Nae Yibbulaimu yaboola ati, ‘Musyaani ng'ene, yichulisa oti, mu bulamu bwao hu syaalo, wanyoola ebiindu bilai byao; Lasaaro nae yanyoola ebiindu bibi; nae bulaanu ali mu bulamu buyenjeefu ano, naawe oli mu buchuuni bungi muno.
42016026	Nae notusireho bino byoosi, akati-kaati w'efwe naawe, bataawo ehoondo ndakalafu muno, ohukayira abo boosi abahabitire ohutula eno nibeecha yimuli, handi abulewo oyo yeesi onyala ohuhalakania ohutula eyo ohwiicha yihuli.’
42016027	Nae yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Mani Lata hwekweeda, otume Lasaaro ache engo weefwe,
42016028	olwohuba ndi nende ba mwaanama bataanu, ache abalabule, bosi bateecha mu sifwo sy'ohusaandisibwa sino.’
42016029	Nae Yibbulaimu yamuboolera ati, ‘Abo bali nende Musa alala nende abanabbi; leha babawulire.’
42016030	Nae yaboola ati, ‘Haba daawe, Lata Yibbulaimu; olwohuba niwichuhira omuundu yacha yibali natula mu bafu, bacha ohweyolobya.’
42016031	Nae Yibbulaimu yamuboolera ati, ‘Nibatawulira Musa nende abanabbi, mani haba sibachia ohuwulira omuundu yeesi kata asyuhe ohutula mu bafu.’ ”
42017001	Handi Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Ebihemo bikera omuundu yahola ebibi bicha ohubaao; nae chimwakaanire oyo obileeta!
42017002	Syahamubereere esilai ohuboyebwa mu kosi wae ekina hoongo libasyeraangaho, mani yamala yaasukunwa mu nyaanja, ohuhira lwakera mulala hu baana bayere bano, ohuhola esibi.
42017003	Mani mweliinde abeene; mwaanamao naahola esibi, mwekese esibi syaba naaholere, nae niyeyolobya, muleheremo;
42017004	nae nahuholera ebibi amahabi kataanu-na-kabiri mu ludaalo lulala, handi yakobola yooli amahabi kataanu-na-kabiri, naboola ati, ‘Ndeyolobya,’ ohoyeere ohumuleheramo.”
42017005	Abatume beecha baboolera Omwaami bati, “Twongesemo efukiirira!”
42017006	Nae Omwaami yaboola ati, “Muba muli nende efukiirira yaakana nende olumwo lw'omutuumba, mwahaboolere omusaala muhuyu kuno muti, ‘Weyiye, mani ochie wetaake mu nyaanja,’ mani kwahabawuliire.
42017007	“Ali hoo hweeng'we, oli nende omuhalaabani olima oba owaaya amakoondi, onyala yamuboolera niyahenuha ati, ‘Yicha bwaangu wihale hu meesa olye’?
42017008	Oba natamuboolere ati, ‘Taangira mberi wundekehere esy'engoloobe, omale weterese bulai mani wiche wuninde, male ohulya nende ohung'wa; hu lunyuma wesi hwoche olye handi hwong'we’?
42017009	Mani omwenengo oyo, anyala yebasa omuhalaabani oyo olwohuba aholere syaatumirwe ohuhola?
42017010	Mani mwesi, nimuba nimuholere ebyo byoosi bimutumirwe ohuhola, muboleenge muti, ‘Efwe huli busa abahalaabani abatahoyeera; huholere busa ebiindu bihuhoyeere ohuhola.’ ”
42017011	Yesu niyali hu lukeendo ohuchia e Yerusaalemu, yabitira hu lwaaho lukabuhania esyaalo sya Samaria nende esya Galilaaya.
42017012	Mani niyali hu huyaheengira mu lukoongo lundi, yabukanana nende abasaacha bagenge ehumi, abemaho eyale nae
42017013	mani behuuma nibaboola bati, “Omwaami Yesu, tukwiire esisa.”
42017014	Nae Yesu niyababona, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we muche mweyekese eyiri abalaamisi.” Mani nibali hu bacha, beecha baonisibwa.
42017015	Nae mulala hw'abo, niyabona ati amalire ohuwona, yakaluhaana yacha eyiri Yesu naakinia Nasae mu kono ly'akulu;
42017016	mani yaakwa, yafumama aasi mu makulu ka Yesu, namwebasa muno. Bulaanu, omusaacha wuno yali Omusamaria.
42017017	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Abandu baonisibwe, haba sibabeere ehumi? Nae bataanu-na-bane bali yena?
42017018	Abulao wahakoboole ohukinia Nasae ohutusaho omuteende wuno?”
42017019	Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Siingira mani ochie yocha; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.”
42017020	Abafalisaayo nibateeba Yesu lu Bwaami bwa Nasae bucha ohwiichira, Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Obwaami bwa Nasae haba sibuchia ohwiicha nende obulolero buboneha;
42017021	oba, sibahaboole bati, ‘Eee, mbano buli ano!’ oba bati, ‘Mbula buli era!’ olwohuba bone, Obwaami bwa Nasae buli akati-kaati w'eng'we.”
42017022	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Endaalo mbawo chiicha, lu mwahekombere ohubonaho hu ludaalo lulala lw'Omwaana w'Omuundu, nae simuchia hulubona.
42017023	Mani bahababoolere bati, ‘Eee, mbawo buli era!’ oba, ‘Eee, mbano buli ano!’ Nae mutacha, mutabaloondaho.
42017024	Olwohuba, koti lu lumesu lumyesuhaanga mani luhosa ekulu ohutula hu luwaande lulala ohwoola hu luwaande lundi, nilwo lu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohuba hu ludaalo lwae.
42017025	Nae ahoyeere ohusaandisibwa mberi mu biindu biingi muno, handi yebwabwe nende olwiibulo luno.
42017026	Koti lu byali mu ndaalo cha Nowa, nilwo lu bicha ohuba mu ndaalo ch'Omwaana w'Omuundu
42017027	Abandu bali nibalichaanga, nibang'wechaanga, nibadehyaanga, handi nibadehaanga, ohwolera elalira hu ludaalo lu Nowa yengirira mu lyaato, mani amaachi k'ofwomboole keecha kabasihirisa boosi.
42017028	Handi nasilala koti lubyali mu ndaalo cha Luti, -- abandu balichaanga, bang'wechaanga, bakulanga, bakusaanga, bataakaanga, bombahaanga,
42017029	nae hu ludaalo lu Luti yatulira mu Sodomu, omuliro nende enjeserye byakwa ohutula Mukulu mani byabasihirisa boosi.
42017030	Handi nilwo lusicha ohuba hu ludaalo lu Mwaana w'Omuundu yahabonehere.
42017031	Hu ludaalo olwo, leha oyo oli hu sirama sy'enyumba, yi biindu byae biri mu nyumba, ahaye ohwiiha aasi ohubibukula; handi nasilala, leha oyo oli mu ndalo ahaye ohukobola engo.
42017032	Mwichulise omuhasi wa Luti.
42017033	Oyo yeesi okoonya ohuliinda obulamu bwae, achia ohubufwiirwa, nae oyo ofwiirwa obulamu bwae, achia obuliinda.
42017034	Mbaboolera endi, mu siro esyo, abaliba babiri hu sitaanda silala; mulala yahayirwe, nae owundi alehwe.
42017035	Abahasi babiri abaliba alala nibali ohusya; mulala aliyirwa nae owundi alehwe.”
42017036	
42017037	Nae abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera Yesu bati, “Omwaami, yena bweene?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Yi mubiri kuba, niyo yi eswi chahebuusire alala.”
42018001	Handi Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi, olweekesa luti bahoyeere ohwekongoyaanga Nasae buli siha, batawaamo omwooyo.
42018002	Yaboola ati, “Mu siko sihuluundu siindi, yaliwo omukayi w'emisango wundi, otaali niyatya Nasae handi otabaasaho hu muundu wundi yeesi;
42018003	nae yosi yaliyo omuhasi mu fwiire wundi mu siko sihuluundu esyo, owali yedinya ohumwichaangaho naboola ati, ‘Ngwiire mani wuheengere omusango hire abasuku baange.’
42018004	Nae yeecha yahayaho hulw'esiha sidiidi; nae lunyuma yeecha yeboolera omweene ati, ‘Ndahaba mbwe ese sitya Nasae kata nende ohufwa hu muundu,
42018005	nae olwohuba omuhasi mu fwiire wuno ali ohunyaasa-nyaasa, njia ohumukwiira, ataali awo aba achia ohunjoong'ya nende ohunonderesa hwae.’ ”
42018006	Mani Omwaami yeecha yaboola ati, “Wulireho bi mukai w'emisaango otaali omulungifu byaboola.
42018007	Nae Nasae salikwiira abadoole bae, abamulirira esiro nende esideete? Mani aba achia ohuhiinda muno ohubahoonya?
42018008	Mbaboolera endi achia ohubakwiira bwaangu muno. Kata katyo, Omwaana w'Omuundu niyaheeche, mani achia ohwakaana efukiirira hu syaalo?”
42018009	Yesu handi yeecha yakaadira olukaado luno abandu bandi abali nibemanyire abeene bati bali abolerefu mani nibalekeresaanga abasyaabwe, ati:
42018010	“Olwoola, abasaacha babiri bacha mu nyumba ya Nasae ohwekongooya. Mulala yali Omufalisaayo nae owundi yali omutoosa w'emisolo.
42018011	Omufalisaayo yema mani yesabira omweene naboola ati, ‘Nasae, hwebasa muno olwohuba siindi koti abandu bandi, abang'uusi, ababacha, abacheke, kata siindi koti omutoosa w'emisolo wuno.
42018012	Siiba habiri hu juma, ngaba silala sy'ehumi syabuli siindu sifuna.’
42018013	Nae omutoosa w'emisolo yeecha eyale muno, natanyala kata ohusiingisa emoni chae yaatingaala Mukulu, mani yachaaka ohwehubba esirifu naboola ati, ‘Nasae, ngwiire esisa, ese omuholi w'ebibi!’
42018014	Mbaboolera endi, omusaacha wuno yakobola engo wae naali omwolerefu mu moni wa Nasae ohuhira Omufalisaayo wula; olwohuba buli muundu yeesi oweniinia achia ohwiiswa aasi, nae oyo yeesi oweyisa aasi, achia ohuniiniswa.”
42018015	Bulaanu, abandu bachaaka ohuleeta abana bayere eyiri Yesu abadiireho nende amahono kae; nae abeeki bae nibabona sino, beecha baabakayira.
42018016	Nae Yesu yabalaanga beeche yali naboola ati, “Mulehe abana beeche yindi, handi mutabakayira; olwohuba, abali bati, nibo abeene Bwaami bwa Nasae.
42018017	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi otakaanira Obwaami bwa Nasae koti omwaana muyere haba saachia hubwingiramo.”
42018018	Mani omutuki wundi yeecha yateeba Yesu ati, “Ewe Omweekesa mulai, siina syeene sihoyera ohuhola hu nyoole obulamu butaakama?”
42018019	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Lwasiina wunaanga oti omulai? Abulao omuundu mulai ohutusaho Nasae yeng'ene.
42018020	Omanyire amalako kano: ‘Otaholaanga obucheke, Otetaanga, Otebaanga, Otatusaanga obuloli bw'obubacha, Yisaanga mu latao nende mao oluyaali.’ ”
42018021	Nae yeecha yaboola ati, “Bino byoosi, ndabiloonda ohutula mu buyere bwaange.”
42018022	Mani Yesu niyawulira atyo, yamuboolera ati, “Osiibulwaho esiindu silala. Kusa ebiindu byao byoosi, mani okabire abamanani, mani ochia ohunyoola obuyiinda Mukulu; mani wiiche, wunonde.”
42018023	Nae oyo niyawulira atyo, yeecha yaanyoolera muno, olwohuba yali omuyiinda muno.
42018024	Nae Yesu yamutingaala mani yaboola ati, “Nga sidinyu muno abayiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae!
42018025	Syaangu muno engamia ohubita mu moni y'esindaani, ohuhira omuyiinda ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.”
42018026	Nae abawulira sino beecha baboola bati, “Mani wiina mweene onyala ohuwonisibwa?”
42018027	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Esitanyalihana eyiri abandu, sinyalihana eyiri Nasae.”
42018028	Nae Peetero yeecha yaboola ati, “Eee, efwe hwaleha amadaala keefwe mani hwahuloonda.”
42018029	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, abulao omuundu yeesi, owaleha enyumba, oba omuhasi, oba bamwaanang'ina, oba abebusi, oba abana, hulw'Obwaami bwa Nasae,
42018030	otachia hunyoola amahabi maangi ak'ebyeene ebyo, mu biha bino, handi nende obulamu butaakama mu ndaalo chiicha.”
42018031	Yesu yeecha yabukula ehumi-na-babiri abo yabayira endulo, mani yababoolera ati, “Bone, mbano huli ohuchia e Yerusaalemu, mani buli siindu syoosi si banabbi bandiika hu Mwaana w'Omuundu sichia ohwosereswa.
42018032	Olwohuba achia ohudiiswa Abateende, mani bamudyabuhire, handi bamuyire bubi, handi bamufucheho;
42018033	bacha ohumunaala ehoba, mani bamwiite, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, achia ohusyuuha.”
42018034	Nae abeeki bae haba sibanyala ohumanya biyali naalomalomaho; olwohuba enomanoma yino yali yabakiswaho, mani bahaya ohudiira ebyali nibilomaloomwe.
42018035	Yesu niyoola aambi nende Yeriko, omusaacha muwofu wundi yali yehaale hu ndulo w'engira nasabirisaanga.
42018036	Nae niyawulira esidiyiha sy'abandu nisibita, yeecha yateeba esyali nisikwiireo.
42018037	Bamuboolera bati, “Yesu we Nasareti niye oli ohubita.”
42018038	Mani yachaaka ohulira naboola ati, “Yesu, omwichukulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
42018039	Nae abo abali nibali mu moni wae bachaaka ohumuhabuhira nibamuboolera bati awuleere; nae yemeeda ohulirira mu kono ly'akulu naboola ati, “omwichuhulu wa Daudi, ngwiire esisa!”
42018040	Mani Yesu yeecha yeema, yaalagira ati bamuleete yali; mani niyoola aambi, Yesu yamuteeba ati,
42018041	“Siina syodaha huholere?” Nae yaboola ati, “Omwaami, leha handi nyale ohubona.”
42018042	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Chaaka handi ohubona; efukiirira yao yihuwonisye.”
42018043	Mani abweene-na-bweene awo nachaaka ohubona, mani yaloonda Yesu naberesa Nasae oluyaali; mani abandu abo boosi nibabona sino, beecha bakinia Nasae.
42019001	Yesu yacha yengira mu Yeriko mani yali nasibitamo.
42019002	Nae waliwo omusaacha wundi olaangwa Sakayo; owali omutoosa w'omusolo, handi omuyiinda muno.
42019003	Mani yali nadaha muno ohubona Yesu koti lwafwaana, nae haba siyanyala ohumubona ohweema hu bungi bw'abandu, handi yali omuundu mwimbikiti muno.
42019004	Mani yeecha yeruha yacha mu moni w'esidiyiha, mani yaniina hu musaala muhuyu hw'anyale ohubona Yesu, owali achia ohubitira ebweene eyo.
42019005	Nae Yesu niyoola mu sifwo esyo, yatingaala akulu mani yamuboolera ati, “Sakayo, yanguyaho bwaangu wiihe aasi; olwohuba lwaleero luno hoyeere ohuba mu nyumba yao.”
42019006	Mani Sakayo yanguyaho, mani yeeha aasi bwaangu, yakaanira Yesu nende esangaalo liingi muno.
42019007	Nae abandu nibabona batyo, boosi-boosi bachaaka ohweng'ulung'uunya nibaboola bati, “Bone, yahacha ohukeniya omusaacha muholi w'ebibi.”
42019008	Nae Sakayo yasingira yeema, mani yaboolera Omwaami ati, “Omwaami bona, njia ohubeeresa abamanani esituundu sy'ebiindu byaange byoosi; handi nimba nindeebaho omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi, njia ohumukoboserayo ebiindu ebyo, amahabi kane amalaamba.”
42019009	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Olwaleero, obuwonia bwiichire mu nyumba yino, olwohuba wuno yesi mwichuhulu wa Yibbulaimu.
42019010	Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu yeecha ohukoonya nende ohuwonia abakota.”
42019011	Abandu nibawulira ebiindu bino, Yesu yeecha yemeeda ohubakaadira olukaado, olwohuba yali aambi ohwoola e Yerusaalemu, handi olwohuba abandu bali babaasirisa bati, Obwaami bwa Nasae bucha ohwoola ebiha byeene ebyo.
42019012	Mani sakira Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Olwoola, omusaacha w'oluyaali wundi, yatula yaacha mu syaalo sy'eyale muno bamubeerese obwaami, mani amale akobole.
42019013	Yecha yalaanga abahalaabani bae ehumi, mani yamala yababeeresa epawundi ehumi, mani yababoolera ati, ‘Muchurusire eseende chino ohwoola lundirikobola.’
42019014	Nae abandu bomu bwaami bwae bali bamusyula, mani beecha batuma bawamwaanda ohumulondaho nibaboola bati, ‘Sihudaha omusaacha wuno atutuke.’
42019015	Mani niyakobola, naamalire ohunyoola obwaami, yeecha yaalagira bamulaangire abahalaabani bayali yabeeresa eseende, anyale ohumanya obuhala bubanyoola mu buchurusi bwaabwe obwo.
42019016	Owataangira mweene, yeecha mu moni wae, naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao, yebula epawundi chiindi ehumi.’
42019017	Mani yeecha yamuboolera ati, ‘Oholere bulai muno, oli omuhalaabani mulai mweene! Olwohuba obeere omwesikwa mu siindu sidiidi, mani ochia ohutuka ebiko bihuluundu ehumi.’
42019018	Handi owohubiri yeecha naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao, yebula epawundi chiindi chitaanu.’
42019019	Nae yamuboolera ati, ‘Mani ewe ochia ohutuka ebiko bihuluundu bitaanu.’
42019020	Handi owundi yeecha naboola ati, ‘Omwaami, epawundi yao ngino, ndayibiiha bulai adiiyu mu sitambaara;
42019021	ndahutya muno, olwohuba oli omusaacha omudinyu mweene; obukula byotabiiha, handi wakesa byotataaka.’
42019022	Yamuboolera ati, ‘Ewe omuhalaabani mubi muno, njia ohuhuheengera omusango ohweema hu byolomaloome omweene nende omunwa kwao! Ewe hane wamanya oti ndi omusaacha mudinyu, obukula bitabiiha, handi okesa bitataaka?
42019023	Mani lwasiina siwachia waata eseende change mu biihiro ly'eseende, mani nindahakoboole, sindahachitusireyo nichiriho obuhala?’
42019024	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abo abali nibeemere aambi awo ati, ‘Mumubukuleho epawundi eyo, mani muyibeerese oyo oli nende epawundi ehumi.’
42019025	Nae beecha bamuboolera bati, ‘Omwaami, oyo ali nende epawundi ehumi!’
42019026	‘Mbaboolera endi, buli muundu yeesi oli nabyo, achia ohumeedwa ebiindi; nae oyo yeesi otaliho nende esiindu, kata nende ebyo biyaba ali nabyo bicha ohumutusibwaho.
42019027	Nae abasuku bange bano, abatadaha ese mbatuke, mubaleete ano mani mubeetere mu moni wange.’ ”
42019028	Mani Yesu niyamala ohuboola atyo, yeecha yemeeda mu moni ohuchia e Yerusaalemu.
42019029	Mani niyali aambi ohwoola e Bbetifaage nende e Bbetani, hu sigulu silaangwa siti Olibeti, yeecha yaatuma abeeki bae babiri
42019030	naboola ati, “Muche mu lukoongo lubali mu moni olwo, mani nimunaba humwingiramo muti, mucha ohunyoola omwaana kw'esuhiri nikuboyerwe, ku muundu yeesi atehalaho hooho; mukuboolole mani mukuleete ano.
42019031	Nae omuundu yeesi nabateeba ati, ‘Lwasiina muli ohukuboolola?’ mumuboolera sino muti, ‘Omwaami niye okudaha.’ ”
42019032	Mani abatumwa abo, nibatula bacha bakaana busa koti lu Yesu yali ababooleere.
42019033	Mani nibali hubaboololanga omwaana kw'epunda okwo, abeenekwo beecha bababoolera bati, “Lwasiina muli ohuboolola omwaana kw'esuhiri okwo?”
42019034	Nabo baboola bati, “Omwaami niye okudaha.”
42019035	Mani beecha bakuleetera Yesu, mani nibamala ohusukuna engubo chaabwe hu mwaana kw'esuhiri okwo, beecha behasaho Yesu.
42019036	Mani omwaana kw'esuhiri nikwali kukiingire Yesu naacha, abandu beecha bachaaka ohwaala engubo chaabwe hu ngira.
42019037	Nae bulaanu niyali aambi ohwoola e Yerusaalemu, naali husiihiriro sy'Olugulu lwa Olibeti, esidiyiha sihoongo sy'abeeki, syachaaka ohwehoya handi nisifumia Nasae mu kono hoongo muno, hulw'emirimo mikali chibali nibabweene,
42019038	nibaboola bati, “Ali nende ehabi Omutuki oyo owiicha mu liita ly'Omwaami! Emireembe chibe Mukulu, handi oluyaali lube akulu Mukulu!”
42019039	Nae Abafalisaayo bandi abali mu sidiyiiha beecha bamuboolera bati, “Omweekesa, kaania abeeki bao.”
42019040	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera endi, kata bano boosi nibawuleera, amakina keene kacha ohuyokera.”
42019041	Yesu niyasuda aambi mani yabona esiko sihuluundu esyo, yasirira muno,
42019042	naboola ati, “Biba mbwe olwaleero luno wamanya ebiindu bileeta emireembe! Nae bulaanu ebyo byahwekisaho.
42019043	Olwohuba endaalo chicha ohwoola, abasuku bao bacha ohuyaba olukoba, mani bahwebodoohane, mani bahwikalire embeka choosi,
42019044	mani bamale bahubbe aasi, ewe alala nende abaana bamenya mu lukoba lwao, mani sibachia huhulehamo ekina hu liindi; olwohuba siwamanya esiha sy'obuwonia bwao nisyoolere.”
42019045	Mani Yesu yeecha yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae mani yachaaka ohwirusamo abo abali nibachurusiramo,
42019046	naboola ati, “Syandiikwa siti, ‘Enyuumba yange yicha ohuba enyumba y'ohwekongooyeramo’; nae eng'we mwayihola obweyikamo bw'abanyaka.”
42019047	Mani Yesu yachaaka ohwekesaanga buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae. Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandiiki b'amalako alala nende abandu b'oluyaali luhoongo beecha bachaaka ohukiiya engira y'ohumusihirisa;
42019048	nae sibanyoola esiindu syoosi sibanyala ohuhola, olwohuba abandu boosi bali bahayiire hu mboosi chae.
42020001	Ludaalo lundi, Yesu niyali ali ohwekeseraanga abandu mu nyumba ya Nasae handi naali ohuyalaanga Emboosi Ndai, abahuluundu babalaamisi nende abaandiiki b'amalako alala nende abahuluundu beenjia beecha
42020002	mani bamuboolera bati, “Tuboolereho bunyala siina bwoholera ebiindu bino, oba wiina mweene owahuba obunyala buno.”
42020003	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ese syesi njia ohubateebaho esiteebo silala; bulaanu mu mboolereho,
42020004	Ohubatiisa hwa Yowaana hwali hutula Mukulu kose mu bandu?”
42020005	Mani beecha basiteesaho abeene-na-beene nibaboola bati, “Nihuboola huti, ‘Hwatula Mukulu,’ aba achia ohuboola ati, ‘Lwasiina simwamufukiirira?’
42020006	Nae nihuboola huti, ‘Hwatula mu bandu,’ abandu bano boosi baba bacha ohutuhubba amakina; olwohuba bamanyire bati Yowaana yali omunabbi.”
42020007	Mani beecha bakobolamo bati haba sibamanyire yiyatula.
42020008	Mani Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Syesi siinjia hubaboolera bunyala buholera ebiindu bino.”
42020009	Mani Yesu yachaaka ohukaadira abandu olukaado luno ati: “Olwoola, omusaacha wundi yalima endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani yamala yayirehera abahosi, mani yamala yacha mu syaalo siindi embaka ndeeyi.
42020010	Nae ebiha byohunoka ebyaamo nibyoola, yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani mulala eyiri abahosi abo, bamubeereseho hu byaamo by'omuundalo eyo; nae abahosi abo beecha bamuhuya, mani bamwiirusa mahono mereere.
42020011	Handi yeecha yaatuma omuhalaabani wundi; oyo yesi beecha bamuhuya bamala bamuswaasa muno, mani bamwiirusa mahono mereere.
42020012	Handi yeecha yaatuma owohudatu; nae wuno beecha banyaala, bamala bamusukuna erwaanyi.
42020013	Abweene awo, omweene ndalo oyo yeecha yaboola ati, ‘Ndaahole siina? Njia ohutuma omwaana wange muheerwa muno; awundi banyala ohumwisamo oluyaali.’
42020014	Nae abahosi abo nibamubona, beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, ‘Wuno niye omusiha mweene; lehe humwiite, obusiha bube obweefwe.’
42020015	Mani beecha bamusukuna erwaanyi w'endaalo y'emisabbiibu, mani bamwiita. Omweene ndalo y'emisabbiibu aba achia ohuholera siina abandu abo?
42020016	Achia ohwiicha mani asihiriise abahosi abo, mani aberese abandu bandi endaalo y'emisabbiibu eyo.” Mani nibawulira sino, baboola bati, “Sitabaaho sityo kata nabudiidi!”
42020017	Nae Yesu yabatingaala mani yaboola ati, “Mani esyandiikwa sino syekesa siina siti: ‘Ekina lyeene li bombahi balekeeresa, nilyo elyeholere ely'amaani mu soonda’?
42020018	Buli muundu yeesi owegumula hu kina elyo, achia ohusasakuha; nae nilikwa hu muundu yeesi, licha ohumunyonyobola.”
42020019	Abandiiki ba malako ka Musa nende abalaamisi bahuluundu bakesaho ohumukwaaho esiha syeene esyo, nae baatya abandu; olwohuba basiyira bati nibo bakaadire mu lukaado luno.
42020020	Mani beecha bamwewunja bilai, mani bamala batuma abahemeresi, abebachirisa bafwaane koti abandu b'obwadyeeri, banyale ohumudiira mu mboosi chae, hu banyale ohumudiisa abobunyala nende obutuki bwa Gafana we Roomu.
42020021	Beecha bateeba Yesu bati, “Omweekesa, humanyire huti byolomaloma nende biweekesa byadyeeri, handi haba siwehubbira, nae mu bwadyeeri bweene weekesa bi Nasae adaha abandu bahole.
42020022	Mani sifukiirirwa efwe ohuberesa Kaisaali omusolo, kose haba?”
42020023	Nae Yesu yeecha yafumbula obukodyo bwaabwe, mani yababoolera ati,
42020024	“Munjekeseho ebbeesa. Esifwaanani nende obwandiike biriho bya naanu?” Baboola bati, “Bya Kaisaali.”
42020025	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mani mubeerese Kaisaali ebya Kaisaali, nae beerese Nasae ebya Nasae.”
42020026	Mani haba sibanyala ohudiisa Yesu omusango kwoosi mu lwichuule lw'abandu ohweema hubiyalomaloma; nae bawuka muno engaluhamo yae, mani banyita chi.
42020027	Abweene awo Abasadukaayo bandi, ababoola bati abulao ohusyuuha hw'abafwa, beecha eyiri Yesu,
42020028	mani bamuteeba esiteebo nibaboola bati, “Omweekesa, Musa yatwandiikira ati, mwaanang'ina muundu naafwa yaleha omuhasi natebuuleho nae omwaana, omusaacha oyo ahoyere ohubukula omuhasi oyo, mani yebulira mwaanang'ina wafwa abana.
42020029	Bulaanu, waliwo abasyaani b'enda ndala bataanu-na-babiri; omuhulundu waabwe yeecha yadeehya omuhasi, mani yafwa nataalehereho abana;
42020030	handi owohubiri yesi yaamudeehya yaba atyo
42020031	handi owohudatu yeecha yaamubukula mani byaaba bityo. Mani nasilala batyo boosi bataanu-na-babiri baafwa nibatelehereho abana.
42020032	Lunyuma, omuhasi oyo yesi yeecha yafwa.
42020033	Mani sakira mu husyuuha hw'abafu, omuhasi oyo achia ohuba owa wiina mweene? Olwohuba yadeheraho abasyaani bataanu-na-babiri abo boosi.”
42020034	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Abandu bo husyaalo huno nibo abadeehya handi badeeha;
42020035	nae abo abahoyera ohuba mu bulamu bwiicha, nende mu husyuuha hw'abafwa, haba sibadeehya, handi kata sibadeeha,
42020036	olwohuba sibanyala hufwa handi, olwohuba bali koti bamalaika, handi baana ba Nasae, olwohuba bali abana b'ohusyuuha mu bafwa.
42020037	Nae ohweekesa mbwe abafu basyuuha, kata Musa yesi yekesa atyo, mu situundu sy'ebyandiiko byolerefu esidiira hu sichaha, syalangiramo Omwaami ati, Nasae wa Yibbulaimu, handi Nasae wa Yisaka, handi Nasae wa Yakobbo.
42020038	Bulaanu haba saali Nasae wa bafu, nae ali Nasae wa balamu; olwohuba abandu boosi balamu yali.”
42020039	Mani Abaandiiki ba malako bandi beecha bakobolamo bati, “Omweekesa, olomaloome bulai bweene.”
42020040	Olwohuba ohutula hwolwo, abulao omuundu yeesi owateemaho ohuteebaho Yesu esiindu syoosi.
42020041	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Bahaboola batye bati, Kristo mwichuhulu wa Daudi?
42020042	Olwohuba Daudi mweene aboola mu sitabo sy'Esabbuli ati, ‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi,
42020043	ohwoola lu ndahahole abasuku bao babe esiteeni syowuluusiraho amakulu kao.’
42020044	Mbao, Daudi amulaanga ati Omwaami; mani handi yahaba atye omwichuhulu wae?”
42020045	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae abandu boosi nibawulira ati,
42020046	“Mweliinde abaandiiki ba malako, abaheera ohung'alaala nibefwaalire emiganjuula chereera, handi abadaha muno ohuheeswa nende oluyaali mu biito, handi abadaha muno ohwihalira mu bifwo by'oluyaali mu Sinagoogi nende mu bidyaalo,
42020047	abayaaya amadaala k'abahasi bafwiire, handi abekongooya esaala ndeeyi nibekaadya. Abo bacha ohunyoola ohusaandisibwa huhiramo obubi.”
42021001	Yesu yeecha yaasingisa emoni akulu, mani yabona abanyali nibali ohuta ebiyaanwa byaabwe mu sibiihiro;
42021002	mani yeecha yabona omuhasi mufwiire mumanani nataamo obuhela bubiri.
42021003	Mani yaboola ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omuhasi mufwiire mumanani wuno ateeremo ohuhira abo boosi;
42021004	olwohuba abo batusireho busa hu biingi bibali nabyo, nae wuno ohutula mu bumanani bwae ateeremo byoosi byaabeere nabyo mu bulamu bwae.”
42021005	Mani abandu bandi nibali nibalomaloma hu nyumba ya Nasae, koti luyali niyimila-milana hulw'amakina k'obuhala bungi, nende ebiyaanwa byaamwo, Yesu yeecha yaboola ati,
42021006	“Ebiindu bimubona bino byoosi, endaalo chahoole, abulewo ano ekina lyahaleheebwe hu liindi, nikahasukunwe koosi kaweere aasi.”
42021007	Mani beecha bamuteeba bati, “Omweekesa, sino syahabeeo liina, handi silolero siina esyahabeo esyeekesa siti sino siri aambi ohukwao?”
42021008	Nae Yesu yaboola ati, “Mweliinde muhaye ohukoswa; olwohuba abandu bangi bacha ohwiicha mu liita lyaange, nibaboola bati, ‘Nise oyo!’ handi bati, ‘Ebiha mbino!’ Mutabaloondakiriraanga.
42021009	Nae nimuwuliraanga amaye nende embuungu, mutatengatengaanga; olwohuba sino sihoyeere ohubao mberi, nae enjakamo nayo siyichia hukwao busa ehabi lala.”
42021010	Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “esyaalo sichia ohusiingira siseete esiindi, handi obwaami bwosi buseete obuundi;
42021011	esyaalo syahateengerehe muno, handi enjala nende amalwaaye maangi mabi kahakwe mu byaalo bitaali nasilala; handi ebiindu bitiisa muno nende obulolero bw'amaani ohutula akulu bicha ohubaao.
42021012	Nae bino byoosi nibisisiiri ohukwao, abandu bacha ohubadiira mani babasaandye muno, nibabayira mu Sinagoogi chitaali nasilala nende mu mboyero, handi mucha ohuleetwa eyiri abatuki nende Bagafana hulw'eliita lyaange.
42021013	Awo niwo yi eng'we mwahatusire obujulisi.
42021014	Mani sakira mumanyire elalira mu myooyo ch'eng'we, mutachaaka ohukana-kana hale nibitoola koti lumuba mucha ohukobolamo ebiteebo;
42021015	olwohuba, njia ohubaba eby'ohulomaloma nende amakesi kadahibwa, ka kata mulala hu basuku beeng'we aba cha ohunyala ohuhira kata ohudondobania.
42021016	Mucha ohusiindihwayo kata nende abebusi beeng'we, kata abanaluya beeng'we, kata abeecha beeng'we handi abandi hw'eng'we mucha ohwiitwa bwiitwa;
42021017	abandu boosi bacha ohubasyuula hulw'eliita lyaange.
42021018	Nae haba kata olwooya lw'efwiiri lulala olwohumitwe cheeng'we siluchia husihirira daawe.
42021019	Nae ni mu hwesimiirisa hw'eng'we mumucha ohufunira obulamu.
42021020	“Nae nimubonaanga Yerusaalemu nisyebodoohanisiibwe nende amaye, mani mumanyeenge busa muti, olubwa lwasyo luba lumalire ohwoola.
42021021	Mani muleheenge abo ababa nibali mu Buyudaaya beruheenge bacha hu ngulu, handi leheenge abo ababa nibali mu siko sihuluundu bweene bawuya, handi mutalehanga abo ababa nibali erwaanyi mu ngoongo beecha baasiingiramo;
42021022	olwohuba chino nicho endaalo ch'ohwetungiramo, ohwoseresa byoosi ebyandiikwa.
42021023	Chakaanire abo abaliba nende abana nende abo abaliba nibanuunia abana mu biha ebyo! Olwohuba amasira amaangi kacha ohuba hu syaalo nende egiili ohuweera hu bandu bano;
42021024	bancha ohwiitwa nende obusoonjo bw'engaanga handi bayirwe mu mboye mu byaalo biindi byoosi; mani Yerusaalemu sichia ohuseenakirwa mu makulu nende Abateende, ohwoola lu ndaalo ch'Abateende chiriweera.
42021025	“Handi yicha ohubao obulolero hu lyuuba nende hu mwoosi nende hu ning'ining'i chosi, nae hu syaalo, ebyaalo bicha ohuba nende engisa nyiingi muno nibitiire ohuwoola hw'enyaanja huluundu nende ohukingana hw'amafwinda kaahwo,
42021026	abandu boosi bacha ohufwichaanga obuti nibelalihiriire ebicha ohukwaao hu syaalo; olwohuba obunyala bw'omu Kulu bwosi bucha ohudengaanisibwa.
42021027	Mani awo niwo yibacha ohubonera Omwana w'Omuundu niyeechera mu sireesi naali nende amaani mani nende oluyaali lubitiirifu.
42021028	Nae bulaanu, ebiindu bino byoosi nibiba nibichaaka ohuholehana, eng'we musingisaanga emitwe cheeng'we, mani mutingaala akulu, olwohuba obuwonia bw'eng'we buba busuda aambi bweene.”
42021029	Handi Yesu yeecha yabakaadira olukaado lundi ati, “Mubonere hu mutuli, nende kata hu misaala chiindi choosi;
42021030	huchahasebuhira busa chiti amasaafu, mweboneraanga busa abeene mani mumanya muti esiminyu simalire ohwoola.
42021031	Mani nasilala nilwo lubiri, nimubonaanga ebiindu bino nibikwao, manyeenge busa muti, Obwaami bwa Nasae buli aambi.
42021032	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oluse luno haba silwahaweeo bino byoosi nibitaakwao.
42021033	Ekulu nende esyaalo bicha ohuwao, nae emboosi change haba sichicha ohuwao.
42021034	“Nae mweliinde abeene, emyooyo cheeng'we chitakatayaswa nende emilyo nende obumeesi nende ohwelalihirira hw'ebihoyera obulamu buno, bikere oludaalo olwo lwabakwaaho busa nimutetekeehe koti omuteego;
42021035	olwohuba oludaalo olwo lucha ohwichira abandu bali hu syaalo huno boosi.
42021036	Nae eng'we mube ameeso esiha syoosi, nimwekongooya Nasae muti muduhane amaani, ak'ohweyonia ebiindu bino byoosi ebicha ohukwaao, nende ohweema mu moni w'Omwaana w'Omuundu.”
42021037	Mani Yesu yemeeda ohwekesanga buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae, nae nibweraanga yatulanga erwaanyi achia akona hu sigulu silaangwa Olibeti.
42021038	Nae nibwahyechaanga echuli, abandu bawunaanga ohwiicha yali mu nyumba ya Nasae ohumutekeeresa.
42022001	Ebiha bino, esidyaalo sy'Omugaati kw'obusye Butabbahirwe esilaangwa siti Paasaka, syali siri aambi ohwoola.
42022002	Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abaandiiki b'amalako bali nibakonyeresa engeri yibanyala ohumwitiramo; olwohuba bali nibatya abandu bandi ohubabona.
42022003	Bulaanu Sitaani yeecha yaniina Yuda olaangwa Yisikarioti, owali mulala hu beeki ehumi-na-babiri;
42022004	yeecha yaatula ao yaachia ohuchwichwiisania nende abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abahuluundu bandi engeri yaanyala yaamutumbuliramo yibali.
42022005	Mani beecha basangaala muno, mani bomiisa ohumubaaho eseende.
42022006	Mani sakira yesi yeecha yafukiirira, mani yakonyeresa ehabi yinyala yaamukwiira yaanyala ohumutuumbuliramo yibali abundu ataali omuhunu kw'abandu.
42022007	Oludaalo lw'ohuliiramo esidyaalo sy'Omugaati kw'obusye butaali obubbaahe, lubeteraangaho ekoondi yeere lwemao lwoola.
42022008	Mani sakira Yesu yatuma Peetero nende Yowaana naboola ati, “Muche mututekehere Paasaka, fwesi huyirye.”
42022009	Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Ni yena bweene yonadahe huchie huyitekehere?”
42022010	Nae yababoolera ati, “Boneho, nimunaba nimumalire ohwingira mu siko sihuluundu, omusaacha onaba nakiingire esyoongo y'amaachi achia ohubakaanira; mani mumulondaanga mwingira nae mu nyumba yaba achia ohwingiramo,
42022011	mani muboolere omuliindi w'enyumba eyo muti, ‘Omweekesa ali ohuhuboolera ati, Enyuumba y'abakeni yiri ena, yinja ohuliiramo Paasaka alala nende abeeki bange?’
42022012	Mani aba achia ohubeekesa esiseenge sitaabafu esiri akulu esimalire ohuteebwamo ebiindu bidahibwa; ni eyo niyo nimuba mucha ohutekeha.”
42022013	Mani beemao bacha basibukaana koti busa luyali ababoolere; mani bamala batekeha Paasaka.
42022014	Mani esaa niyoola, Yesu yeecha yehala hu meesa, alala nende abatume abo.
42022015	Mani yeecha baboolera ati, “Ndekoombere elalira ohulya Paasaka yino nang'we nitoola ohusaandisibwa;
42022016	olwohuba mbaboolera endi haba siinjia huyirya ohwoola luyilyosereswa abweene mu bwaami bwa Nasae.”
42022017	Mani yeecha yabukula esikoombe, mani niyamala ohwebasa yeecha yaboola ati, “Mubukule sino, mani musikabanemo abeene-na-beene;
42022018	olwohuba mbaboolera endi, ohutula bulaanu buti, ohuchia mu moni, siinjia hung'waaho hu syaamo sy'omusabbibbu ohwoola lu bwaami bwa Nasae bulichiira.”
42022019	Handi yeecha yabukula omugaati, mani yamala ohwebasa yeecha yaakudonya-donyamo mani yamala yakubabeeresa naboola ati, “Kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange okwakabulwa hu lw'eng'we. Muholeenge muti nimunjichulisa.”
42022020	Handi nasilala yahola atyo esikoombe lunyuma lw'ohumala ohulya esy'engoloobe naboola ati, “Esikoombe sino busa sibeeresebwa hu lw'eng'we, nisyo elakano yaaha eya abamabanga kange.
42022021	Nae muboneho, omuhono kw'oyo owundyaamo olukwe kuli ohulya naange.
42022022	Olwohuba Omwaana w'Omuundu wuno achia ohuwaao busa koti lusyahengwawo; nae chakaanire omuundu oyo ochia ohuhoseswa mu humulyaamo olukwe!”
42022023	Mani beecha bachaaka ohuteebana abene-na-beene ni wiina hu beene abo oli oyo ananyale ohuhola sino.
42022024	Amayingani kosi keecha kabatuumbuhamo, akaboola mbwe ni wiina mweene hu beene abo ochia ohuyiribwa koti omuhunuufu obahiramo boosi.
42022025	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Abatuki baabandu Abateende babekeserangaho obwaami; handi abo ababa nibaliho akulu mu bunyala nibo abalaangwa bati, ‘abaliindi b'abandu’.
42022026	Nae haba sibiri bityo mwesi yimuli; nae mukanye oyo omuhunuufu oli mweng'we yehole abe koti omuyere mweene, handi omwimirisi nae abe koti oyo ohalaabanira abaasye.
42022027	Olwohuba ni wiina mweene omuhunuufu ohiramo, oyo owihaale ohulya, kose oyo omuhalaabanira? Sisiri mbwe niye oyo owihaale hu meesa ohulya? Nae ese ndi mw'eng'we koti oyo oli ohubahalaabanira.
42022028	“Eng'we ning'we abachiririire ohuba naange niindi mu mateemo kange;
42022029	mani ndi ohubaba omulimo ohuhola koti Bbaabba yamberesa Obwaami,
42022030	endi mucha ohuliira nende ohung'wera hu meesa yange mu Bwaami bwaange, handi mucha ohwihala hu bisaala by'obutuki nimukayaanga enjia ehumi-na-chibiri echa Yisirayiri.
42022031	“Simooni, ewe Simooni! Bonaho, Sitaani yekombere ohubabukula hu yemewo anyale ohubatondoola koti engaano,
42022032	nae ese malire ohubekongooyera endi efukiirira yeng'we yitahaywa; mani nimuba nimumalire ohwomiira handi, muhoyeere ohugumia abaasyeng'we.”
42022033	Nae Simooni yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, ese ndi omwetekefu ohuchia naawe mu jiela kata nende mu hufwa.”
42022034	Yesu nae Yaboola ati, “Ese huboolera ewe Peetero endi, edaaywa haba siyichia ohuholyooha olwaleero, ohwoola lw'ewe ochia ohuba nomalire ohwekaana oti haba siwumanyireho.”
42022035	Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mani ludaalo lundabatumira muche nimutaaliho nende omufuuko, kata esanduku, kata ebiraato, mwacha mwahaya ohubaaho nende esiindu syoosi?” Baboola bati, “Poo!”
42022036	Yecha yababoolera ati, “Nae bulaanu buti, leha oyo oli nende omufuuko akubukule, handi katyo busa nende esanduku lyosi. Handi leha oyo otaali nende olugaanga akuse engubo yae alukule.
42022037	Olwohuba ndi ohubaboolera endi, esyandiiko syolerefu sino sichia ohunjosereswaho, siti ‘Yabalirwa mu badondobanu’; olwohuba esyo syoosi esyanyandiikwaho siri nende ohwosereswa hwaasyo.”
42022038	Handi beecha baboola bati, “Omwaami, lolaho, ngandi engaanga chibiri njino chiri ano.” Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ebyo bimala.”
42022039	Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, mani koti luyali esaambo yae, yeecha yacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti; handi abeeki beecha bamuloondaho ebweene eyo.
42022040	Nae niyeecha yoola mu sifwo esyo, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mwekongooye muhaye ohukwa mu huhemwa.”
42022041	Handi yeecha yabatulaho yaasudaho eyale yiwahasukuna ekina lyoola, mani yaasigama aasi mani yekongooya ati,
42022042	“Bbaabba, nikali mbwe ni ohweenya hwao, nduseho esikoombe sino; kata katyo, bitaba mbwe ni muhudaha hwange busa, nae ohwao nihwo ohuba huholerweho.”
42022043	
42022044	
42022045	Mani niyasiingira yaatula mu hwekongooya, yeecha eyiri abeeki mani yabanyoola nibali ohukona hulw'obwelalihirifu,
42022046	mani yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina mukona? Musiingire mwekongooye munyala ohukwa mu huhemwa.”
42022047	Yesu niyali nasilomalomaanga, esidiyiha sy'abandu syeecha syoola, mani omusaacha olaangwa Yuda, owali mulala hu ehumi-na-babiri, niye owali abemiriire. Yecha yaasuda muno eyiri Yesu ati amukwe mu sirifu;
42022048	nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe Yuda, onyala otye ohuchia ohulya olukwe mu Mwaana w'Omuundu mu humukwa mu sirifu?”
42022049	Mani abo boosi abali nibali aambi nende Yesu nibabona esyali sichia ohulondaho, beecha baboola bati, “Omwaami, hwehonyere olugaanga kose?”
42022050	Mani mulala hu beene abo yeecha yatemaho omuhalabani w'omulaamisi muhuluundu mani yaamumalaho ohutwi hw'omuhono muluungi.
42022051	Nae Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Bino biweere awo!” Mani yeecha yadiira ohutwi ohwo, mani yamuwonia.
42022052	Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaboolera abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abandu bahunuufu b'enyumba ya Nasae nende abahuluundu, abali nibamwichiire ati, “Mwiichire koti abechera omunyaka, nimuli nende engaanga nende ebiruga?
42022053	Nindabereenge busa nang'we buli ludaalo mu nyumba ya Nasae, nimutanyalaanga ohungwaho busa. Nae olwohuba yino niyo esaa yeng'we, nende obunyala bw'esiirima.”
42022054	Mani beecha bamukwaaho, mani bamala bamutusa awo, nibamuleeta mu nyumba y'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene. Peetero nae yalondangaho busa naali eyale hooho;
42022055	mani nibali nibahaadusa omuliro akati-kaati w'olwaanyi nibahehala alala, Peetero yesi yeecha yabehalamo.
42022056	Mani nae omuhaana muhalabani niyamubona niyehaale mu bulafu yamuhang'aasa emoni mani yaboola ati, “Omusaacha wuno yesi abeere nende omuundu oyo.”
42022057	Nae yeecha yaasikaana muno naboola ati, “Muhasiiwe, ese haba simumanyire daawe.”
42022058	Handi ebiha bidiidi nibyabitao, omuundu wundi yeecha yamubona mani yaboola ati, “Ewe wesi oli mulala hu beene abo.” Nae Peetero yaboola ati, “Omuhongo, ese siindiho nabo daawe.”
42022059	Mani handi oluunyuma lw'esiha syoola esaa ndala, handi omuundu wundi yeecha yomiisa naboola ati, “Ataali ohukana-kana, omusaacha wuno yesi abeere nae; olwohuba yesi Mugalilaaya niye.”
42022060	Nae Peetero yaboola ati, “Omuhongo, ese haba siimanyire ebyo byooli ohulomalomaanga.” Ni abweene awo, niyali mbwe hwasilomalomaanga, edaaywa yeecha yaholyooha.
42022061	Mani ni Omwaami akaluhana atingaala Peetero. Mani Peetero yeecha yechulisa emboosi y'Omwaami yira, koti luyali namuboolere ati, “Edaaywa niyitaholyooha olwaleero, onandekaana amahabi kadatu.”
42022062	Mani Peetero yeecha yaatula erwaanyi mani yaalira muno.
42022063	Nae bulaanu abasaacha bali nibadiirire Yesu beecha bachaaka ohumuhoomolera alala nende ohumuhuya;
42022064	handi beecha bachaaka ohumufuunihaanga emoni, ni bamuteeba bati, “Tuumbulaho! Ni wiina mweene ohuhuyire?”
42022065	Handi ni bachiririra ohulomalomaho emboosi nyiingi cheene nibamunyeka.
42022066	Nibwahya, oluhung'aano lw'abandu bahuluundu b'abandu beecha bebuusa alala, nende abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abandiiki b'amalako boosi; mani beecha bamutusa awo bamuyira ena luhiiho lwaabwe, bamala baboola bati,
42022067	“Nikali mbwe niiwe Kristo, tuboolere busa.” Nae yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese nimbaboolera busa, haba simuchia ohufukiirira;
42022068	handi naange nimbateeba, haba simuchia hunyala ohungobolamo.
42022069	Nae kali mbwe ohutula esiha sino nende ohwemeeda mu moni, Omwaana w'Omuundu wuno achia ohuba niyehaale hu muhono muluungi okw'obunyala bwa Nasae.”
42022070	Mani boosi beecha baboola bati, “Mani niiwe Omwaana wa Nasae?” Nae yababoolera ati, “Muli ohuboola muti nise oyo.”
42022071	Mani nabo beecha baboola bati, “Mani aliwo obuloli bundi buhusiidaha? Humalire ohwewuliirira abeene ohutula mu munwa kwae kweene.”
42023001	Mani ni omukanda okwo kwoosi kweemao kusiingira, kumuleeta mu moni wa Pilaato.
42023002	Mani ni bachaaka ohumuwabira nibaboola bati, “Hubukaanire omusaacha wuno naali ohudondobanianga esyaalo syeefwe, handi naali ohutukaana ohutusiraanga obuhoonyi bwefwe Kaisaali, handi naboola ati omweene niye Kristo handi niye Omutuki.”
42023003	Nae Pilaato yeecha yamuteeba ati, “Niiwe omutuki w'Abayudaaya?” Nae yamukobolamo ati, “Niiwe oboolere otyo.”
42023004	Mani Pilaato yeecha yaboolera abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende emikaanda ch'abandu ati, “Ese haba simbonaho omusango kwoosi hu musaacha wuno.”
42023005	Nabo baangalala busa nibaboola bati, “Asangulusa busa abandu, naabitira niyeekesa mu Buyudaaya mwoosi, ohutulira e Galilaaya ohwolera elalira kato ano wosi.”
42023006	Nae Pilaato niyawulira atyo, yeecha yateeba ohubona omusaacha wuno yali Omugalilaaya.
42023007	Mani Pilaato niyeecha yaamanya ati, hane atula mu butuki bwa Herode, yeecha yayira Yesu eyiri Herode, owali yesi naali mu Yerusaalemu esiha syeene esyo.
42023008	Nae Herode niyabona Yesu, yasangaala muno, olwohuba yali yekomba luleeyi ohumubona, olwohuba yali namuwuliraangaho busa, mani yali nasuubiraanga ohubonaho obulolero bwahola.
42023009	Mani yeecha yaamuteeba ebiindu biingi muno, nae Yesu yahaya ohumukobolamo kata silala.
42023010	Abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abandiiki b'amalako nabo bandonga busa nibeemere awo nibedinyiisie ohuwabira butoli-toli.
