42023011	Nae Herode alala nende abalwaani bae beecha bachaaka ohumusaandia nibamuhoomolera; mani nibeecha nibamufwaasa engubo chobuyaayi nibamala nibamukalusa eyiri Pilaato.
42023012	Mani ohuchaakira abweene awo, ni Herode nende Pilaato bachaakirawo ohuba abeecha handi, olwohuba enyuma eyo bali nibasyuulana busa.
42023013	Bulaanu, Pilaato yeecha yabuusa alala abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abatuki nende abandu bandi,
42023014	mani yababoolera ati, “Mundeteere omusaacha wuno koti oyo owali nadondobania abandu. Nae nimalire ohumuwosesa mu moni w'eng'we, boneho, ese haba siinyalire ohumunyoolaho omusango kwoosi hw'ebyo byoosi bimubeere mu muwabiire.
42023015	Kata nende Herode yesi atyo, sakira amutukalusiire handi. Boneho, abulao esiindu syoosi esihoyera ohufwa syaholereho daawe;
42023016	Mani ese njia ohumunaalaho ehoba budiidi, mani male mulehuule yeweerewo.”
42023017	
42023018	Nae boosi beecha bahuumira alala nibaboola bati, “Musihirise omuundu wuno, mani mutuboololere Bbarabba” --
42023019	omusaacha yali yasukunibwa mu mboye hulw'ahasasakamalo hali hakwiireo mu siko sihuluundu handi nende hulw'obwiiti,
42023020	Pilaato handi yeecha yabalomalomera ehabi liindi, nadaha abolole Yesu;
42023021	nae handi beecha bahuumira mu kono ly'akulu nibaboola bati, “Mumuhomerere busa, mumuhomerere!”
42023022	Handi ehabi ly'ohudatu, Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Hu lwasiina, sibi siina syeene syaholere? Haba simubweeneho omusango kwoosi okuhoyera ohufwa; Mani sakira, njia busa ohumunaalaho ehoba busa mani nyemeo mulehuule.”
42023023	Nae bali nende amayiingi maangi muno nibamusaba nibehuuma bati ahoyeere ohuhomererwa. Mani amakono kaabwe keecha kayingira.
42023024	Mani Pilaato yeecha yahenga omusango ati ohudaha hw'abandu nihwo ohuba huholerweho.
42023025	Pilaato yeecha yalehuula omusaacha oyo owali yasukunwa mu mboye hulw'ohusasakamala hwali hukwiireo mu siko sihuluundu nende hulw'obwiiti, yibali nibasabire; nae yeecha yahola Yesu koti lubali badahire.
42023026	Mani koti nibali hu bamutusa awo, beecha baakwa hu Simooni wundi Omusireeni, owali naakobola busa mu siko natula mu ngoongo mani beecha bamudwiiha omusalabba yakukiinga naloonda hu Yesu.
42023027	Mani enyuma wae esidiyiha sihoongo esy'abandu syeecha syamulondaho nende omuhunu kw'abahasi abali nibacherenjesa nibamulira.
42023028	Nae Yesu niyakaluhaana yabatingaala, yaboola ati, “Bahaana ba Yerusaalemu, mutandirira haba, nae mwelirire abeene, handi mulirire abana beeng'we.
42023029	Olwohuba bone, endaalo mbawo chiicha, chibahabooleremo bati, ‘Bali nende ehabi abakumba, nende enda chitebulaho omwaana yeesi, handi nende embeere chitanuuniaho haba!’
42023030	Mani bahachaake ohuboolera engulu bati, ‘Mutukweeho’; handi ohuboolera ebigulu bati, ‘Mutufuniihe.’
42023031	Olwohuba nibahola bati omusaala nikusisiiri omubisi, byahabe bitye nikwahabe kwoomere?”
42023032	Beecha bayira abasaacha babiri bandi bali beebi babeetere alala nende Yesu.
42023033	Nae niboola musifwo silaangwa siti, Esiyaanga, awo niwo yibahomerera Yesu hu musalabba alala nende abeebi babiri abo, mulala hu muhono muluungi, nae owundi humuhono kwae mukaada.
42023034	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Bbaabba, baleheremo; olwohuba bakoterwe bibahola.” Mani beecha bahubba eha ohukabania engubo chae.
42023035	Mani abandu bali nibeemere awo nibabatingaalire; nae abatuki bamucheha nibamudyabuhira nibaboola bati, “Yawonia abandi; mani leha yewonie omweene, naaba naali Kristo wa Nasae, Omudoole wae Mweene!”
42023036	Abamaye bosi beecha bamuhomolera, nibeecha yaali nibamuba efiini yihaliihe,
42023037	mani nibaboola bati, “Nooba nooli Omutuki w'Abayudaaya, wewonie omweene!”
42023038	Beecha baata obwandiike bwosi akulu wae buti, “Wuno niye Omutuki w'Abayudaaya.”
42023039	Mulala hu beebi bali bosi bahomereerwe yahabuhira Yesu naboola ati, “Ewe haba siniiwe Kristo? Wewonie omweene nende efwe fwesi!”
42023040	Nae owundi yeecha yaanyeka owaasye oyo naboola ati, “Ewe haba sotyaaho Nasae, nga wesi oheengerwe omusango nasilala nae?
42023041	Nae efwe fwembi huhoyera busa; olwohuba efwe huli busa ohunyoola omukabo kuhoyera ebiholwa byeefwe; nae omusaacha wuno nae haba saholereho esiindu syoosi esitahoyera.”
42023042	Mani yeecha yaboola ati, “Yesu, wunjichulisanga niwingira mukati wa Bwaami bwao.”
42023043	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mu bwadyeeri bweene, ndi ohuhuboolera endi, olwaleero luno ochia ohuba naange mu Paradaisi.”
42023044	Ebiha bino byali nibiri aambi w'esaa chisaasaba mani esiirima syeecha syadiira syaalo syoosi ohwoola esaa chitaanu-na-chine,
42023045	omubasu nikuhaire ohufwa; mani engubo yadembaanga mu nyumba ya Nasae yeecha yeecha yaatandulwamo habiri.
42023046	Mani bulaanu Yesu yeecha yaalira mu kono hoongo mani yaboola ati, “Bbaabba, ngeeng'a omwooyo kwaange mu mahono kao!” Mani Yesu niyamala ohuboola atyo, yayeera omuuya kwae kuheneerehayo.
42023047	Nae bulaanu, omumaye muhuluundu niyamala ohubona ebyo byoosi ebyaholehana, yeecha yafumya Nasae, mani yamala yaboola ati, “Ataali ohukana-kana, omusaacha wuno abeere omulaboota mweene!”
42023048	Mani abweene awo, ebidiiyiha byoosi ebyali nibyebuusire awo ohubonaho ebyo, nibabona ebyaholehana ebyo byoosi, bakobola mu madaala kaabwe nibehuya mu birifu.
42023049	Mani abandu bali bamumanyiirira boosi, alala nende abahasi bali bamuloondereho ohutula e Galilaaya beecha beema eyale mani babona bulai muno ebiindu bino.
42023050	Bulaanu waliwo omusaacha olaangwa ati, Yosefu otula mu siko sy'Abayudaaya silaangwa siti Arimaseya. Yali mulala hu b'oluhiiho, handi yali omusaacha mulai handi omulungifu muno,
42023051	yali natafukiirisaanie nende ebichiiririrwa nende ebiholwa bibi by'abaasye, handi yali naliindiriire Obwaami bwa Nasae bwiiche.
42023052	Omusaacha wuno yacha eyiri Pilaato, mani yaamusaba omubiri kwa Yesu.
42023053	Mani yeecha yaakwanula mani yaakuboya mu suuka ly'elaasi lya rachaari, mani yamwalisa mu ng'ani yabaachwa mu lwaanda yibali basisiiri ohusiiha hoomo omuundu yeesi.
42023054	Oludaalo olwo lwali oludaalo lw'Ohwetekeheramo, handi Sabbaato yali aambi ohuchaaka.
42023055	Abahasi bali beechere nae ohutula e Galilaaya, baloondaho, mani babona eng'ani, nende engeri yibali basihiremo omubiri kwae.
42023056	Mani bakobolayo, batekeha ebiindu biwunya esiing'aari nende amafuta k'ohumubaha. Hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, bawuluuha ohweema koti amalako lu kaboola.
42024001	Nae hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, mu mabweeri-bweeri, abahasi abo beecha baabukula ebiindu biwunya esiing'aari bibali nibatekeehe, bacha hu siriindwa.
42024002	Mani beecha babukaana ekina nirisiingiiswe niritusirwe hu mulyaango kw'esiriindwa,
42024003	nae nibengiramo, haba sibanyoola omubiri.
42024004	Nibali basyeemere awo, nibawuka esyali siholehane, bone, abasaacha babiri abefwalire engubo chimesa-mesana be beema aambi nabo;
42024005	nae koti lubali batiire, handi beenamye obweeni bwaabwe hu loba, abasaacha abo beecha bababoolera bati, “Lwasiina mukoonya omulamu mu bafu?
42024006	Mwichulise koti lu yababoolera, nasisiiri mu Galilaaya,
42024007	ati, Omwaana w'Omuundu ahoyeere ohuteebwa mu mahono k'abaholi be bibi, handi ahomererwe hu musalabba, nae hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu asyuhe.”
42024008	Mani beecha beechulisa emboosi chae echo,
42024009	mani beecha batula hu ng'ani bacha baboolera ehumi nende mulala alala nende abadong'ereyo boosi ebiindu bino byoosi.
42024010	Bulaanu abahasi bano bali, Maria Magadaleena, nende Jowana nende Maria ng'ina Yakobbo alala nende abahasi bandi babali nabo ababoolera Abatume ebiindu bino.
42024011	Nae Abatume bayira emboosi chino koti olukano busa, mani bahaya ohufukiirira eby'abahasi ebyo.
42024012	Nae Peetero yasingira mani yeruha naachia hu siriindwa; nae nyenama mani yatingaalamo, yabona engubo ch'elaasi nichiri chong'ene; mani yaakobola engo nawuka busa esyali nisyeholeehe.
42024013	Hu ludaalo lweene olwo, babiri hu beeki ba Yesu, bali bacha mu lukoongo lulaangwa luti Emausi, aambi we mairo kataanu-na-kabiri ohutula e Yerusaalemu,
42024014	bali nibalomalomaanga abeene-na-beene hu biindu byoosi ebyali nibiholehaane.
42024015	Nibaba nibasilomalomaanga handi nibeteebanaho abeene-na-beene, Yesu mweene yaasuda aambi mani yakenda nabo.
42024016	Bamubona nae bahaya ohumumanyirisa.
42024017	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaha siina yino yimuli ohukaniayaanga abeene-na-beene nimukeenda?” Mani beecha beema nibelalihiriire muno.
42024018	Mani mulala hw'abo, olaangwa ati Kulyopa, yamukobolamo ati, “Niiwe omukeni weng'ene mu Yerusaalemu otaamanyireho ebiindu byeholeheyo mu ndaalo chino?”
42024019	Nae Yesu yababoola ati, “Bindu siina?” Nae bamuboola bati, “Ebidiira hu Yesu we Nasareti, owali omunabbi w'amaani muno mu biholwa nende mu mboosi mu moni wa Nasae nende mu moni w'abandu boosi,
42024020	handi koti, abalaamisi bahuluundu beefwe nende abatuki bamuyira ahengerwe omusango kw'ohufwa mani bamuhomerera hu musalabba.
42024021	Nae hwali hubaasa huti niye ochia ohuwonia Yisirayiri. Eee, handi ohumeeda hu bino byoosi, bulaanu chibitirewo endaalo chidatu, ohutula bino biholehana.
42024022	Handi, abahasi bandi ohutula mu mukaanda kweefwe batusinduuse muno. Bachiire hu siriindwa echuli muno,
42024023	mani bahaya ohubukaanayo omubiri kwae; mani bakobola nibaboola bati, baboneheerwe bamalaika, abababoolere bati, mulamu.
42024024	Abasyeefwe bandi bosi bachiire hu siriindwa, mani babukaana nisiri busa koti lu bahasi babeere nibaboolere; nae omweene haba sibamubweneho.”
42024025	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “bae eng'we, nga muli abasiru, handi emyooyo ch'eng'we nga chihiinda ohufukiirira ebyo byoosi bi banabbi baboola!
42024026	Mubaasa muti sisyali nisihoyerwa Kristo ohusaanda atyo mberi hu yemewo yengire mu luyaali lwae?”
42024027	Mani Yesu yachaaka ohutotolera ebiindu byoosi ebimudiiraho ebiri mu byandiiko byolerefu, ohutulira elalira hu Musa alala nende banabbi boosi.
42024028	Mani bali aambi ohwoola mu lukoongo lubali bachamo. Yesu yaboneha koti oli ohuchiiririra mu moni,
42024029	mani bamwekweeda nibaboola bati, “Sikala naafwe, olwohuba mbano bwiira handi oludaalo mbano luweere.” Mani yeecha yadoong'a nabo.
42024030	Nae niyali hu meesa nabo, yabukula omugaati, mani yakubeeresa ehabi, mani yaakumekula, mani yakubabeeresa.
42024031	Mani emoni chaabwe chaamuha, mani bamumanyiirisa; mani abweene awo yabahamyuhaho.
42024032	Mani nibaboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Mani emyooyo cheefwe sichityemuheenge mw'efwe busa naalomaloma naafwe hu ngira, koti lwatutotoleere ebyandiiko byolerefu?”
42024033	Mani baasiingiraniramo ebiha byeene ebyo, mani bakobola e Yerusaalemu; mani banyoola ehumi-na-mulala nibebuusire alala nende abo babali nabo,
42024034	ababoola bati, “Bwadyeeri, Omwaami asyuhire, handi aboneheere Simooni!”
42024035	Mani bosi bababoolera ebyaholehana hu ngira, handi koti lu bamumanyira mu hu mekula omugaati.
42024036	Nae nibali basilomalomaanga bino, Yesu mweene yeecha yeema akati-kaati waabwe.
42024037	Nabo beecha besinduha mani batya muno nibabaasa bati babweene esihyeeno.
42024038	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Lwasiina mwesinduha handi nimukana-kana mu myooyo cheeng'we?
42024039	Bone amahono kange nende amakulu kange, mumanye muti nise omweene; mundiireho mani mubone; olwohuba esihyeeno haba sisiri nende enyama nende amakumba koti lumubona niindi nabyo.”
42024040	
42024041	Nae nibali nibasisiiri ohufukiirira hulw'esangaalo, nende ohuwuka-wukana, yababoolera ati, “Muliho nende esiindu syoosi-syoosi esyohulya?”
42024042	Bamubeeresa omunyonyo kw'eng'eni ndeehe,
42024043	mani yaakubukula yaakulya nibabona.
42024044	Mani yababoolera ati, “Chino nicho emboosi chindababooleraanga nindali nisisiiri nang'we, endi buli siindu syoosi syanyandiikwaho mu malako ka Musa nende mubyandiiko by'abanabbi, alala nende mu Sabbuli ebyali ebyohwolerera abweene.”
42024045	Mani Yesu yekula ebibaaso byaabwe, bamanye ebyandiiko byolerefu,
42024046	mani yababoolera ati, “Sino nisyo esyandiikwa siti, Kristo ahoyeere ohusaanda mani hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, asyuhe mu bafu,
42024047	handi siti, ohweyolobya nende ohuleherwamo hw'ebibi, huhoyeerwe ohuyaalwaanga mu liita lyae mu byaalo byoosi, ohuchaakira mu Yerusaalemu.
42024048	Niing'we abajulisi be biindu bino.
42024049	Handi bone, njia ohubatumira si Bbaabba yalaka; nae mudong'e mu siko ohwoola lu maani katula akulu kalibehaho.”
42024050	Mani Yesu yeecha yabatusa erwaanyi w'esiko mani yabemirira ohwoola e Bbetani, mani yaasingisa akulu amahono kae mani yababeeresa ehabi.
42024051	Nae niyali nababeeresa ehabi, yabatulaho, mani yaakiingwa yayirwa Mukulu.
42024052	Mani bakobola e Yerusaalemu nende esangaalo liingi muno,
42024053	mani bachiririra ohuba mu nyumba ya Nasae nibafumia Nasae.
43001001	Mu huchaaka hweene, Emboosi yaliwo, handi Emboosi eyo yali nende Nasae, handi Emboosi eyo yali Nasae.
43001002	Yali mu huchaaka naali alala nende Nasae;
43001003	ebiindu byoosi byaholebwa nibimubitiramo, handi ataali ohubaao hwae, abulao esiindu syoosi esyaholebwa esiba syaholwa daawe.
43001004	Mu mweene oyo nimwo omwali obulamu, handi obulamu bweene obwo, nibwo obwali obulafu bw'abandu.
43001005	Obulafu obwo bwaaduhira mu siirima, nae handi esiirima esyo sisisiiri ohubuyiingira bwabumalawo.
43001006	Yaliwo omusaacha owatumwa ohutula eyiri Nasae, omweene liita lilaangwa liti Yowaana.
43001007	Yecha hulw'obuloli, ohweekesa obuloli bw'obulafu, hu bandu boosi banyale ohufuna efukiirira ohubitira mu mweene oyo.
43001008	Nae omweene oyo haba siyali obulafu obwo daawe, nae yeecha ohweekesa obuloli budiira hu bulafu obwo.
43001009	Obulafu bw'obwadyeeri bweene obuhosera buli muundu nibwo obwali nibwiicha mu syaalo.
43001010	Yali ali mu syaalo, handi esyaalo syali syaholebwa ohubitira mu mweene oyo, nae kata katyo, esyaalo haba sisyali syamumanya daawe.
43001011	Yecha mu daala lyae lyeene, nae abandu bae beene haba sibamwakaanira daawe.
43001012	Nae abo boosi abamwakaanira, abo abafukiiririra mu liita lyae, yababeeresa obunyala obwohwehola abaana ba Nasae;
43001013	abo abateebulwa nende amabaanga, kata busa nende obunyala bw'omubiri, kata nende ohudaha hw'omuundu busa, nae hu lw'obunyala bwa Nasae yeng'ene.
43001014	Mani Emboosi eyo yeecha yehola omuundu, mani yaamenya mw'efwe, niyechula esisa alala nende obwadyeeri; efwe hwamala ohubonaho oluyaali lwae luhoongo muno, koti olwahaba olw'Omwaana mudeerwa wa Simwaana.
43001015	(Yowaana yatusa obuloli bu mudiiraho, mani yaalira naboola ati, “Wuno niye oyo yindalomalomaho nimboola endi, ‘Oyo ochia ohwiicha enyuma wange, yaahira oluyaali muno, olwohuba oyo yaliwo ese nitabao.’ ”)
43001016	Handi ohutula mu bwiichufu bwae obwo nibwo fwesi bu hwabeeresebwaho ehabi nende ehabi mbitiirifu.
43001017	Olwohuba amalako kaberesebwa ohubitira mu Musa; nae esisa alala nende obwadyeeri byabeeresebwa ohubitira mu Yesu Kristo.
43001018	Abulao omuundu yeesi owabonaho Nasae; ohutusaho Omwaana mudeerwa, oyo oli mu bwihaliro bwa Simwaana, niye owakera yamanyihana.
43001019	Mani buno nibwo obuloli bu Yowaana yatusa, Abayudaaya nibamutumira abalaamisi nende Abaleefi ohutula e Yerusaalemu ohumuteeba bati, “Ewe niiwe naanu?”
43001020	Omweene yeyama, haba siyekaana, nae yeyama naboola ati, “Haba si nise Kristo.”
43001021	Nae bamuteeba bati, “Niiwe naanu mani? Niiwe Elija?” Nae yaboola ati, “Haba siindi oyo.” “Nae oli omunabbi?” Nae yakobolamo ati, “Haba.”
43001022	Mani nabo beecha bamuteeba bati, “Niiwe wiina? Tuboolere sihuchia ohukobola mu bandu batutumire. Ni siina syeene si welomalomaho?”
43001023	Yaboola ati, “Ese ndi ekono ely'oyo oli ohuhuumulira mu siparara liti, ‘Kololose engira y'Omwaami,’ koti lu nabbi Yisaaya yaboola.”
43001024	Bulaanu, abandu abo bali batumwa nende Abafalisaayo.
43001025	Beecha bamuteeba bati, “Mani lwasiina oli ohubatiisaanga, notaali kata Kristo, oba Elija, oba omunabbi?”
43001026	Yowaana yabakobolamo ati, “Ese ndi ohubatiisanga nende amaachi; nae aliwo oli mweng'we oyo yimutamanyire,
43001027	handi oyo oli ohunondaho enyuma wange, yi lusibiro lw'ebiraato byae ese haba sihoyera ohuboolola.”
43001028	Sino syaholehanira mu Bbetani, engereha wa Yorudaani, yi Yowaana yali nabatiisiraanga.
43001029	Hu ludaalo luloondaho, Yowaana yeecha yabona Yesu niyeecha nachoomere yali, mani yaboola ati, “Mbao, Ekoondi yere lya Nasae, oyo omalao esibi sy'esyaalo!
43001030	Wuno niye oyo yindaboolere endi, ‘Enyuma wange yiriyo omuundu oli ohwiicha owuuhira oluyaali, olwohuba oyo yaliwo ese nitabao.’
43001031	Ese mweene sindali nindamumanya; hu lwa sino sakira ese ndeecha nimbatisaanga nende amaachi, hu yoole ohubonehera eyiri Yisirayiri.”
43001032	Mani Yowaana yeecha yatusa obujulisi naboola ati, “Ese ndabona Mwooyo niyeeha koti eguugu ohutula Mukulu, mani lyamudong'aho.
43001033	Ese mweene haba sindamumanya; nae oyo owanduma ohubatisaanga nende amaachi yamboolera ati, ‘Oyo yolibona Mwooyo namwihaho mani namudoong'aho, wuno niye obatiisa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.’
43001034	Mani mbweene, mani ndafuna obujulisi endi wuno niye Omwaana wa Nasae.”
43001035	Handi hu ludaalo lu londaho, Yowaana niyali niyeemere alala nende abeeki bae babiri;
43001036	yeecha yabona Yesu naali ohukeenda, mani yaboola ati, “Mbao, Ekoondi yere lya Nasae!”
43001037	Abeki bae abo bawulira bi yali naboola atyo mani baloonda Yesu.
43001038	Yesu yeecha yakaluhaana, mani yababona nibali ohumuloonda, mani yababoolera ati, “Siina syeene simuli ohukonyaanga?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Rabbi” (amahulundu kaasyo mbwe, Omweekesa) “ni yena bweene yiwamenya?”
43001039	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mwiiche mani mubone.” Beecha beecha mani babona yiyali niyamenya; mani baaba nae oludaalo olwo lwoosi, olwohuba chali nichiri esaa ehumi.
43001040	Mulala hu beene abo owaulira Yowaana niyali naalomaloma, mani yaamuloonda, yali Andereya, mwaanang'ina Simooni Peetero.
43001041	Yecha yataangira ohubona Simooni, mani yamuboolera ati, “Efwe humalire ohubona Mesaaya” (amahulundu kaasyo mbwe Kristo).
43001042	Yecha yaamuleeta eyiri Yesu. Nae Yesu niyamutingaala mani yaboola ati, “Hane niiwe Simooni omusyaani wa Yowaana? Mani ochia ohulaangibwa Keefa.”
43001043	Nibwahya mu chuli, Yesu yahengawo ohuchia e Galilaaya. Mani yeecha yanyoola Filipo mani yamuboolera ati, “Noonde.”
43001044	Nae bulaanu, Filipo yali niyamenya mu Bbeetasaida, esiko sihuluundu sya Andereya nende Peetero.
43001045	Filipo yeecha yabukanana nende Nasanayiri, mani yamuboolera ati, “Hwakaanire oyo yi Musa yandiikaho mu Malako handi nende yi banabbi bandiikaho, Yesu Omunasareeti, omusyaani wa Yosefu.”
43001046	Nae Nasanayiri yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mani aliwo esiindu silayi syoosi esinyala ohutula mu Nasareti?” Nae Filipo yamuboolera ati, “Ewe yicha obone.”
43001047	Yesu yeecha yabona Nasanayiri niyeecha yali, mani yamuboolera ati, “Bonaho, Omuyisirayiri mweene nguno, otaliho esidinyu syoosi!”
43001048	Nae Nasanayiri yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Ewe wumanyire otye?” Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Ese hubweene kata Filipo nasisiiri ohuhulaanga nobeere nooli mu siiniha sy'omusaala mutuli.”
43001049	Nasanayiri yamukobolamo ati, “Omweekesa, hane oli Omwaana wa Nasae! Niiwe Omutuki wa Yisirayiri ayakiriire!”
43001050	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mbwe olwohuba nihuboolere endi, hubweene nooli mu siiniha sy'omusaala kw'enduli, sakira ofukiirira? Ochia ohubona ebiindu bihira bino obulayi.”
43001051	Handi Yesu yeecha yemeeda ohumuboolera ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, ochia ohubona Ekulu nilikuulwe, mani ba malaika ba Nasae nibaniina handi nibeeha hu Mwaana w'Omuundu.”
43002001	Hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu, waliwo obweeya bwali e Kaana mu Galilaaya, yi ng'ina Yesu yali.
43002002	Yesu alala nende abeeki bae bosi bali balaangirwe mu bweeya obwo.
43002003	Mani efwiini niyahawa, ng'ina Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Efwiini yibawereho.”
43002004	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Maama, onaahole otye? Esiha syaange sitoola.”
43002005	Ng'ina Yesu yeecha yaboolera abahalaabani abo ati, “Muhole buli syababoolera syoosi.”
43002006	Nae bulaanu, yaliwo esyoongo ch'amaachi chibabaacha mu makina chisaasaba nichemere awo hulwohweyosa hw'Abayudaaya ohwomusiro, buli yitula nga yinyala ohukiinga amaachi koola egalani amahumi kabiri oba amahumi kadatu.
43002007	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Yichuse esyoongo chino nende amaachi.” Mani beecha baachichuusa baachidumbeesera elalira.
43002008	Yecha yababoolera ati, “Bulaanu dayeho akandi, mani mukayirire omuhulundu w'esidyaalo.” Mani beecha bakayira yali.
43002009	Nae omuhulundu w'esidyaalo niyaonjaho amaachi ako akali bulaanu kakaluhaane kali efwiini, yeecha yahayaho ohumanya yiyitusiirwe (ohutusaho abahalaabani bali bachiire amaachi ako bali bamanyire), omuhulundu w'esidyaalo yeecha yalaanga omugole musaacha
43002010	mani yamuboolera ati, “Buli muundu atangiraanga ohukabula efwiini ndayi; mani abandu nibaba nibamalire ohung'wa yibuli muundu adaha omweene, hu bulaanu baleeta efwiini enjalaafu; nae ewe obiihireenge busa efwiini ndayi ohwoola bulaanu buti.”
43002011	Sino nisyo esyali esilolero syae sichaaka siyaholera e Kaana mu Galilaaya, mani syolesa oluyaali lwae luhoongo; mani abeeki bae beecha bamufukiiriramo muno.
43002012	Lunyuma lwa bino ohuwa, Yesu yeecha yehirira yaacha e Kaperanaumu, alala nende ng'ina, nende ba mwaanang'ina nende abeeki bae; mani beehala eyo bamala hooyo endaalo enjeraanu.
43002013	Esidyaalo sya Paasaka ya Abayudaaya syali siri aambi ohwoola, mani Yesu yeecha yaniina yacha e Yerusaalemu.
43002014	Niyengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, yanyoolamo abandu bali nibakusa eng'oombe ndawu, nende amakoondi, nende amaburuku, nende abafunjisi b'eseende nibali hu mulimo kwaabwe okwo.
43002015	Mani niyamala ohuluha olubbariki lw'endereechi, yaberusa boosi, alala nende amakoondi nende eng'oombe ndawu chosi, batula mu nyumba ya Nasae; handi yeecha yabbwomoola erwaanyi eseende ch'amatongolo ech'abafunjisi b'eseende, handi yamala yafumamya nende emeesa chaabwe.
43002016	Mani yeecha yaboolera abakusaanga amaburuku ati, “Mutuse muno ebiindu bino; mutahola enyumba ya Bbaabba ohuba enyumba y'obuhala.”
43002017	Abeki bae beecha beechulisa bati syali syandiikwa mu byandiiko byolerefu siti, “Ohudaha muno enyumba yao hwahanjitise.”
43002018	Abayudaaya bulaanu beecha bamuboolera bati, “Oli nende ahalolero siina honyala ohutwekesa ahakera wahola bino.?”
43002019	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mukwiise enyumba ya Nasae yino, mani mu ndaalo chidatu njia ohuyisiingisa yeeme.”
43002020	Abayudaaya beecha baboola bati, “Byayira emyaaka amahumi kane nende chisaasaba ohwombaha enyumba ya Nasae yino, nae ewe mani onanyala ohusiingisa mu ndaalo chidatu?”
43002021	Nae Yesu yali alomaloma hu nyumba ya Nasae eyali niyo omubiri kwae.
43002022	Mani koti lu yeecha yaasyuhiswa ohutula mu bafu, abeeki bae beecha beechulisa bati yali yamala ohusilomalomaho; mani beecha bafukiirira muno mu byandiikibwa byolerefu nende mu mboosi yi Yesu yali yalomaloma.
43002023	Nae bulaanu niyali naali mu Yerusaalemu hulw'esidyaalo sya Paasaka, abandu bangi muno beecha bamufukiirira muno mu liita lyae, nibamala ohubona obulolero buyali naahola;
43002024	nae Yesu haba siyabeesika muno,
43002025	olwohuba yali namanyire muno buli muundu koti lwafwaana mani siyadaha omuundu wundi ohukerakira akadiira hu muundu yeesi; olwohuba omweene yali yamanya bulai bweene esiri mukati w'omuundu.
43003001	Bulaanu waliwo omusaacha Mufalisaayo olaangwa Nikodema, owali omwimirisi w'Abayudaaya.
43003002	Omusaacha wuno yeecha yeecha eyiri Yesu mu siro, mani yamuboolera ati, “Rabbi, humanyire huti ewe oli omweekesa otula eyiri Nasae; olwohuba abulao oyo yeesi onyala ohuhola obulolero buno bwohola, ohutusaho Nasae naali nae.”
43003003	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, huboolera endi, ohutusaho oyo yeesi niyeebulwa buyaaha, oyo saanyala hubona Obwaami bwa Nasae.”
43003004	Nae Nikodema yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omuundu anyala atye ohwibulwa naali omuhulundu? Anyala handi yengira ehabi ly'ohubiri munda yang'ina handi hu yebulwe?”
43003005	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Huboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, omuundu yeesi nateebulwa nende amaachi handi nende Mwooyo, haba saanyala ohwingira mu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
43003006	Esiindu syoosi esiibulwa nende omubiri siba omubiri, nae esyo esiibulwa nende Mwooyo siba mwooyo.
43003007	Otesiinduha muno oti huboolere endi, ‘Ohoyeere ohwibulwa buyaaha.’
43003008	Omuyaka kuwucha nikuchiira yikudaha, handi owulira busa ohuwuuma hwaakwo, nae haba somanyire yi kutulira, oba yikuchiira; mani nilwo lu biri nende oyo owibulwa nende Mwooyo.”
43003009	Nae Nikodema yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Sino sinyala sitye ohubaao?”
43003010	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Ewe oli omweekesa wa Yisirayiri, nae haba somanyire sino?
43003011	Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, efwe hulomaloma bihumanyire, handi hutusa obujulisi obudiira hw'ebyo bihwamala ohubona; nae eng'we haba simufukiirira obujulisi bw'efwe.
43003012	Mani nikali mbwe ese huboolere ebiindu by'ohusyaalo huno, nae haba sofukiirira, oba onanyala otye ohufukiirira nihuboolera ebiindu by'omu Kulu?
43003013	Abulao oyo yeesi owamala ohuniina yoola Mukulu, ohutusaho oyo oweeha natula Mukulu, Omwaana w'Omuundu.
43003014	Handi koti lu Musa yasingisa yeemesa endemo mu siparara, nilwo lu Omwaana w'Omuundu achia ohusiingiswa yemesebwe,
43003015	hu mbwe oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo anyale ohufuna obulamu butaakama.”
43003016	Olwohuba Nasae yadaha esyaalo muno mani yawaayo Omwaana wae mudeerwa, hu bulaanu oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo ahaye ohukotao, nae afune obulamu butaakama.
43003017	Olwohuba Nasae yatuma Omwaana mu syaalo, nataheengera esyaalo omusango, nae mbwe esyaalo sinyale ohuwonisibwa ohumubitiramo.
43003018	Oyo yeesi omufukiiriramo haba saheengerwa omusango ohumuhira; nae oyo otamufukiirira yamala ohuheengerwa omusango ohumuhira hale, olwohuba oyo haba siyafukiirira mu Mwaana mudeerwa wa Nasae.
43003019	Mani yino niyo eheenga y'omusango, yiti mbwe obulafu bwamala ohwiicha mu syaalo, nae abandu beecha baadaha esiirima ohuhira obulafu, olwohuba ebiholwa byaabwe byali ebibi.
43003020	Olwohuba buli muholi we bibi, asyula obulafu, mani saadaha hwiicha eyiri obulafu, olwohuba naahola atyo, ebibi byae biba bicha ohweyerula bibonehane.
43003021	Nae oyo omuholi w'ebihoyera yeecha eyiri obulafu, hubulaanu sichie sibonehane bulai bweene biti ebiholwa byae ebyo biholeerwe mu Nasae.
43003022	Lunyuma lwa sino, Yesu nende abeeki bae beecha bacha mu syaalo sye Buyudaaya; yibecha bamenya nabatisaanga.
43003023	Yowaana yesi yali nabatisaanga naali abundu alaangwa ati, Ayenoni esyali aambi nende Salimu, olwohuba amaachi kaliyo amaangi muno; mani bandu bechaanga nibabatiiswa.
43003024	Olwohuba Yowaana yali atateebwa mu mboye.
43003025	Nae bulaanu, ohuyingana hwecha hwabaao akati w'abeeki ba Yowaana nende Omuyudaaya wundi nihudiira hu musiro kw'ohweyosa.
43003026	Mani beemao beecha eyiri Yowaana mani bamuboolera bati, “Rabbi, oyo owali naawe nooli engereha wa Yorudaani, yiwatusiraho obujulisi, nguno ali ano, ali ohubatisaanga, mani abandu boosi bali ohuchia yali.”
43003027	Nae Yowaana yakobolamo ati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohunyoola esiindu syoosi ohutusaho nasibereeswe ohutula Mukulu.
43003028	Eng'we beene mwesi munyala mwaandusira obujulisi muti, ndaboola endi, ese siindi Kristo, nae ndatumwa ohumutaangirira ohwiicha.
43003029	Oyo oba naali nende omugole muhasi, niye oba mweene mugole oyo; Omwiicha w'omugole oyo, oweema mani yaatekeeresa byaboola, asangaala muno nawulira ekono lyae; mani sakira esangaalo lyaange lino limalire ohuba eliichufu.
43003030	Mani omweene oyo ahoyeere ohuniina nae ese ohwiha.”
43003031	Oyo owiicha natula akulu ali akulu wa boosi; oyo owa husyaalo achiira hu syaalo, mani eby'esyaalo nibyo byaalomaloma; oyo owiicha natula Mukulu aba ali akulu wa boosi.
43003032	Oyo atusa obujulisi obwa ebyo biyaba yabona handi biyawulira omweene, nae kata katyo, abulao omuundu yeesi ofukiirira obujulisi bwae obwo;
43003033	nae oyo ofukiirira obujulisi bwae obwo, abwisaho omuhono kwae ati, Nasae ni ow'obwadyeeri.
43003034	Olwohuba oyo yi Nasae yatuma atumbula busa emboosi cha Nasae, olwohuba siyehonyeraanga esikero naakaba Mwooyo.
43003035	Simwaana adaha Omwaana, mani yamudiisa mu mahono kae ebiindu byoosi.
43003036	Mani oyo ofukiirira mwaana, ali nende obulamu butaakama; nae oyo oteesa oluyaali mu Mwaana haba saachia hubonaho obulamu, ohutusaho mbwe egiili ya Nasae yamala ohumwihalaho.
43004001	Nae bulaanu, Omwaami niyeecha yaamanya ati Abafalisaayo bali bamalire ohuwulira bati Yesu yali ali ohuholaanga, handi nabatiisa abeeki bandi ohuhiraho Yowaana
43004002	(byahaba mbwe Yesu mweene haba siyabatiisaanga, ohutusaho abeeki bae bong'ene),
43004003	yeecha yaatula mu Buyudaaya mani yawaawo yacha e Galilaaya.
43004004	Nae byali bimubaanja ohuba ohuhalakania mu Samaria.
43004005	Mani sakira yeecha mu siko sihuluundu sya Samaria, esilaangwa siti Sikari, aambi nende omukunda ku Yakobbo yabeeresa omusyaani wae olaangwa Yosefu.
43004006	Esulo ya Yakobbo yosi yali abweene awo, mani sakira, koti lu Yesu yali najong'ere muno, koti luyali nakeenda olukeendo lwae olwo, yeecha yehala endulo w'esulo eyo. Chali chiri aambi we saa chisaasaba ch'esideete.
43004007	Omuhasi wundi Musamaria yatula eyo yeecha hu sulo ohwo ohudaya amaachi. Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mbeeho amaachi k'ohung'wa.”
43004008	Olwohuba abeeki bae bali baweereo nibachiire mu siko sihuluundu ohukula ebyohulya.
43004009	Omuhasi Musamaria oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Sibeere sitye mbwe, Omuyudaaya, yaasaba amaachi k'ohung'wa, ese omuhasi Omusamaria?” Olwohuba Abayudaaya sibali nende sibaholera alala nende Abasamaria.
43004010	Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Oba obeere nomanyire esiyaanwa sya Nasae sino, nende oyo ali ohuhubooleraanga ati, ‘Mberese esy'ohung'wa,’ niiwe oba omusabire, mani aba ahuberese amaachi k'obulamu.”
43004011	Omuhasi oyo yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, ewe owuma esiindu sy'ohudayira, handi esulo yino ndeeyi muno; otusa yena amaachi k'obulamu ako?
43004012	Ewe ohiraho Yakobbo seefwe, owatuberesa esulo yino, handi omweene yaying'waamo, nende abasyaani bae alala nende ebyaayo byae?”
43004013	Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Buli muundu yeesi ong'wa hu maachi kano, achia ohulumwa obuluwo handi,
43004014	nae buli muundu ong'wa hu maachi kanja ohumuberesa, haba siyahalumwe obuluwo daawe; olwohuba amaachi kanja ohumuberesa, kacha ohumweholamo omwaalo kuhulukusa okumuba amaachi k'obulamu butaakama.”
43004015	Nae omuhasi oyo yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, mberese amaachi kano, mani haye ohulumwa obuluwo oba haye ohwichanga ano ohudaya.”
43004016	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Cha, olaange wamwo, mani mwiche ano.”
43004017	Nae omuhasi oyo yamukobolamo ati, “Haba siindi nende wamwange.” Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Oli owadyeeri noboola oti, ‘Haba siindi nende wamwange’;
43004018	olwohuba obeere nende abasaacha bataanu, handi kata nende oyo yooli nae bulaanu, haba siwamwo; sino oboolere obwadyeeri.”
43004019	Nae omuhasi oyo yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, mbona endi oli omunabbi.
43004020	Baseefwe benamiraanga Nasae hu lugulu luno; nae oboola oti Yerusaalemu nisyo esifwo sibaandu bohoyeere ohwiinamiramo Nasae.”
43004021	Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Muhasiiwe, fukiirira bimboola, esiha siicha, si bandu batahenamirengemo Nasae Saabwe hu lugulu luno, oba mu Yerusaalemu.
43004022	Eng'we mwiinamira bi mutaamanyire; nae efwe, hwiinamira bi humanyire, olwohuba obuwonia butula mu Bayudaaya.
43004023	Nae esiha siri ohwiicha, handi mbawo syolere, si balaami badyeri bacha ohwiinamira Nasae Saabwe mu mwooyo nende mu bwadyeeri, olwohuba abafwana batyo, nibo ba Nasae Laata adaha bamwiinamire.
43004024	Nasae Mwooyo niye, handi abo abamwiinamira bahoyeere bamwiinamire mu mwooyo nende mu bwadyeeri.”
43004025	Nae omuhasi oyo yamuboolera ati, “Manyire endi, Mesaaya ali ohwiicha (oyo owalaangwa mbwe Kristo); nae niyaheeche, achia ohutwekesa ebiindu byoosi.”
43004026	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ese olomaloma naawe, nise oyo.”
43004027	Mu biha byeene ebyo, abeeki bae nibemao beecha. Bawuka muno ohubona Yesu naali ohulomaloma nende omuhasi, nae abulao owamuteebaho kata ati, “Odaha siina kose lwasiina oli ohulomalomaanga nende omuhasi oyo?”
43004028	Mani omuhasi oyo yeecha yaleha awo esyoongo yae, mani yacha mu siko sihuluundu, mani yaboolera abandu bamwo ati,
43004029	“Mwiicha mubone omuundu owumboleere ebyo byoosi bindaholaho. Wuno anyala ohuba naali niye Kristo?”
43004030	Mani abandu beecha beeyiha nibatula mu siko sihuluundu esyo nibeecha eyiri Yesu.
43004031	Mu biha ebyo, abeeki bae bamusaba nibaboola bati, “Rabbi (Omweekesa), lyaho mberi.”
43004032	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Ndi nende ebyohulya bi eng'we mutaamanyireho.”
43004033	Nae abeeki bae bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene bati, “Aliwo omuundu wundi omuleteereho ebyohulya?”
43004034	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ebyohulya byaange nibyo ohuhola ebyoyo owanduma byadaha, handi nende ohumaliirisa omulimo kwae.
43004035	Simubolaanga muti, ‘Chidong'ere emyoosi chine chong'ene ni ekesa lyoola’? Mbaboolera endi mutingaaleho mubone koti lu mikuunda cheengere nichoolere ohukesa.
43004036	Oyo yeesi okesa aduhana omuheemba, mani yabuusa ebyaamo by'obulamu butaakama, mani omuundu owaanya nende okesa, banyale ohusangaalira alala.
43004037	Olwohuba olukaado luboola mu bwadyeeri bweene luti, ‘Omuundu wundi ataaka nae owundi niye okesa.’
43004038	Ese ndabatuma ohukesa ebyo bimutahalaabanira; abandu bandi nibo abahalaabani, mani eng'we mwingire mu mirimo chaabwe.”
43004039	Mani Abasamaria bandi ohutula mu siko sihuluundu esyo, beecha bamufukiiriramo ohweema hu buloli bw'omuhasi oyo mbwe, “Yambooleere buli siindu syoosi sindaholaho.”
43004040	Mani Abasamaria abo nibeecha yi Yesu yali, bamusaba bati adoong'e nabo; mani Yesu yadoong'a nabo endaalo chibiri.
43004041	Mani Abasamaria bangi muno beecha bamufukiirira ohweema hu mboosi yae.
43004042	Abandu abo beecha baboolera omuhasi oyo bati, “Sisiri mbwe ni hulwa emboosi chao nicho echikera nihufukiirira, olwohuba abeene humalire ohwewuliirira, mani humanyire huti, mu bwadyeeri bweene, wuno niye Omuwonia w'esyaalo.”
43004043	Endaalo echo chibiri nichawa, Yesu yeecha yaatula awo yacha e Galilaaya.
43004044	Olwohuba Yesu mweene yali amalire ohuboola ati, omunabbi siyeswaangamo oluyaali mu syaalo syae.
43004045	Mani niyeecha e Galilaaya, Abagalilaaya beecha bamwakaanira bulai, koti lubali bamalire ebiindu byoosi bi yali aholere mu Yerusaalemu hu sidyaalo, olwohuba bosi bali nibacha hu sidyaalo.
43004046	Mani Yesu yeecha yakobola handi mu Kaana esye Galilaaya, yiyali yaholera amaachi kaaba efwiini. Nae e Kaperanaumu yaliyo omuhunuufu yi musyaani wae yali omulwae.
43004047	Mani niyawulira ati Yesu yali atulire mu Buyudaaya yeechere mu Galilaaya, yeecha yaacha yamwekweeda yeeche ewaye awonie omusyaani wae oyo, olwohuba yali ali aambi ohufwa.
43004048	Yesu yesi yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Notabona obulolero nende eby'amaya haba sochia hufukiirira daawe.”
43004049	Nae omuhunuufu oyo yakobola mu Yesu ati, “Omwaami, ewe yicha engo omwaana wange nasisiiri ohufwa.”
43004050	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Wao; omusyaani wao achia ohuba omulamu.” Omusaacha oyo yeecha yafukiirira mu mboosi yi Yesu yamuboolera, mani yekobolerayo engo wae.
43004051	Nae niyali hwawao, abahalaabani bae beecha babukaanana nae mani bamuboolera bati, omusyaani wae oyo yali amalire ohulamuha.
43004052	Mani yeecha yabateeba esiha syeene si yachaakiramo ohukobolamo obulamu, nabo bamuboolera bati, “Ekulo busa, hu saa ya chitaanu-na-chibiri niwo yi muyaka kwamutuliraho elalira.”
43004053	Nae simwaana yamanya busa ati, eyo niyo eyali esaa yi Yesu yamubooleraho ati, “Omusyaani wao achia ohuba omulamu”. Mani omweene yesi yafukiirira, nende edaala lyae lyoosi.
43004054	Sino syali esilolero syohubiri si Yesu yahola niyali naamalire ohutula e Buyudaaya niyeechere e Galilaaya.
43005001	Lunyuma lwabino, yeecha yabaawo esidyaalo sy'Abayudaaya, mani Yesu yeecha yacha e Yerusaalemu.
43005002	Bulaanu, aliwo mu Yerusaalemu endulo w'esiruwa silaangwa mbwe, Esiruwa sy'Amakoondi, esidiba silaangwa mu Luyibbulaniya mbwe “Beth-zatha,” esiri nende ebigoro bitaanu.
43005003	Abandu balwaaye babuli mbya koti, abawofu, abalema, abadataala, bakonaanga mu bigoro bino.
43005004	
43005005	Omusaacha wundi yesi yali awo, owali yahalwala hulwa embaka y'emyaaka amahumi kadatu nende chitaanu-na-chine emilaamba.
43005006	Mani Yesu niyamubona mani yeecha yaamanya ati, omusaacha oyo yali yahakonaanga awo hulwa embaka ndeeyi muno, yamuboolera ati, “Odaha ohuwonisibwa?”
43005007	Omusaacha mulwaye oyo yeecha yaakobola mu Yesu ati, “Omwaami, ese mbulaho omuundu yeesi owahangiinga yanyingisa mu sidiba sino amaachi nikamala ohusanguluswa, mani niimba mbwe hunjiamo, omuundu wundi yeecha yandangirira ohwiingiramo.”
43005008	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Siingira, obukule obutalihe bwao, mani okeende.”
43005009	Mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni omusaacha oyo owonisibwa, mani yadoola obutalihe bwae mani yakenda.
43005010	Nae Abayudaaya beecha baboolera omusaacha wali awonisibwe oyo bati, “Sabbaato niyo, haba sofukiirirwa ohukinga obutalihe bwao.”
43005011	Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Omusaacha wumonisye yambooleere ati, ‘Doola obutalihe bwao mani okeende.’ ”
43005012	Nabo bamuteeba bati, “Musaacha siina oyo ohuboleere ati, ‘Doola obutalihe bwao, mani okeende’?”
43005013	Nae bulaanu, omusaacha wali awonisibwe oyo, siyali amumanyire daawe, olwohuba Yesu yali amalire ohwewerawo, koti lu sidiyiiha syali mu sifwo esyo, syali esihongo muno.
43005014	Lunyuma, Yesu yeecha yamwakaana naali mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yamuboolera ati, “Obona, oli bulaanu omulamu! Handi otaholaangaho ebibi, wakera esihiramo obubi ohuhukwaaho.”
43005015	Omusaacha oyo yeecha yawaawo, mani yacha yaboolera Abayudaaya hane yali Yesu owamuwonia.
43005016	Mani sino nisyo esyeecha syakera Abayudaaya basaandia muno Yesu, olwohuba mbwe yali yahola sino hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
43005017	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Laata yange asiihola emirimo, mani syesi ndi ohuhola emirimo.”
43005018	Sino nisyo esyakera Abayudaaya bamukiiya muno ohumwiita, olwohuba mbwe siyali nahalaake elako lidiira hu Sabbaato lyong'ene, nae handi yalaanga Nasae ati Simwaana, niyehola ohwaakana nende Nasae.
43005019	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, Omwaana haba saanyala ohuhola esiindu syoosi-syoosi hu lwae omweene, nae esyo syong'ene syabona Simwaana naahola; olwohuba buli syahola, nisyo si Mwaana yesi ahola.
43005020	Olwohuba Simwaana adaha Omwaana, mani amwekesa byoosi biyaba naahola; handi aliwo emirimo mihuluundu muno chacha ohumweekesa, hu mweemeo muwuke buwuka busa.
43005021	Olwohuba, koti busa lu Simwaana asyuusa abafu mani yababeeresa obulamu, nilwo lwosi lu Mwaana abeeresa atyo obulamu oyo yeesi yaba nadahisa.
43005022	Simwaana haba saheengera omusango ohuhira omuundu yeesi, nae yabeeresa Omwaana obuheengi bw'emisaango bwoosi,
43005023	hu bandu boosi babeerese Omwaana oluyaali, koti busa lu babeeresa Simwaana oluyaali. Oyo yeesi oteesa oluyaali mu Mwaana, haba siyeesa oluyaali mu Simwaana wamutuma.
43005024	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, oyo owulira emboosi yange mani yafukiirira mw'oyo owanduma, ali nende obulamu butaakama; haba saacha hwoola huhuheengerwa omusango ohumuhira, nae aba amalire ohubita mu hufwa, yolere hu bulamu.
43005025	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, esiha sichia ohwoola, handi bona nisyo sino, abafu nibahawulire ekono ly'Omwaana wa Nasae, mani abo abaliwulira bacha obubao abalamu.
43005026	Olwohuba koti busa lu Simwaana alimo obulamu, mani yabeeresa Omwaana obunyala bw'ohubaamo obulamu mu mweene,
43005027	handi yamubeeresa obunyala bw'ohuheenga emisango, olwohuba ali Omwaana w'Omuundu.
43005028	Mutesiinduha sino; olwohuba esiha sichia ohwiicha, mani abo boosi abali mu biriindwa bacha ohuwulira ekono lyae
43005029	mani batulamo, mani abo abali nibahola ebilai, bacha ohusyuuhirira obulamu, nae abo abahola ebibi, bacha ohusyuuhirira ohuheengerwa emisango ohubahira.
43005030	“Ese sinyala ohuhola esiindu syoosi-syoosi hulw'obunyala bwaange syeng'ene daawe; koti busa lumbulira, nilwo busa lu heenga emisango; nae eheenga ye misaango yange y'obwadyeeri, olwohuba ese haba singoonya ohuhola busa bi ndaha, nae ohuhola ebyo by'oyo owanduma byadaha.
43005031	Nikali mbwe ese omweene neese owetusira obujulisi, obuloli bwaange buba si bwadyeeri daawe;
43005032	nae aliwo owundi otusa obujulisi bundiiraho, mani manyire endi, obuloli bwatusa obundiiraho, bwadyeeri nibwo.
43005033	Mwatuma bawamwaanda eyiri Yowaana, mani yatusa obujulisi budiira hu bwadyeeri bweene.
43005034	Sikali mbwe obuloli bundiiraho butula hu bandu busa; nae ese mbaboolera sino hu mweemeo muwonisibwe.
43005035	Yowaana yali etaara lyaaduha handi elihosa, mani mwanyala ohwehoyeraho budiidi mu bulafu bwae.
43005036	Nae obuloli bundi nabwo omweene, buhuluundu buhiraho obwa Yowaana; olwohuba emirimo chi Laata yaanyalira ohuhola ohumala, emirimo chiindi ohuhola echeene chino, chindusiraho obujulisi bweene chiti, Laata niye owanduma.
43005037	Mani Laata wanduma oyo, niye omweene owandusira obujulisi bundiiraho. Simuwuliraangaho kono lyae, oba mwabonaho efwaani yae.
43005038	Handi simwomiisaangaho emboosi yae mu myooyo cheeng'we olwohuba haba simufukiirira mw'oyo yiyatuma.
43005039	Mukoonyeresa mu byandiikwa byolerefu, olwohuba mubaasa muti, omwo nimwo omuli obulamu butaakama; nihaandi ni ebyo byeene ebindusira obujulisi bundiiraho;
43005040	nae muhaya ohunjichaho munyale ohunyoola obulamu.
43005041	Ese haba sinyoola efuma ohutula eyiri abandu daawe.
43005042	Nae ese manyire endi eng'we haba simuli nende ohudaha Nasae mu myooyo cheeng'we.
43005043	Ese ndeecha mu liita lya Laata, nae haba simumbukaanira daawe; nae owundi niyeecha mu liita lyae omweene, oyo niye yimucha ohubukaanira.
43005044	Munyala mutye ohufukiirira mw'oyo onyoola oluyaali ohutula busa hu waasye, nae haba simukoonya oluyaali lutula eyiri Nasae yeng'ene?
43005045	Mutabaasa muti neese ochia ohubawabira eyiri Laata; Ni Musa niye oli ohubawabira, oyo yimwaboyaho esuubi ly'eng'we.
43005046	Nikali mbwe mwafukiirira mu Musa, muba munyala ohufukiirira mw'ese, olwohuba yandiika ebilomaloma hw'ese.
43005047	Nae nimutafukiirira mu byandiiko byae byolerefu, muba mucha mutye ohufukiirira mu mboosi change?”
43006001	Ebyo nibiweere, Yesu yeecha yasyaabala yacha engereha w'enyaanja ye Galilaaya, oba eyilaangwa yiti enyaanja ya Tibberiasi.
43006002	Mani esidiyiha sy'abandu esihoongo syeecha syamulondaho, olwohuba bali babweeneho obulolero bu yali aholere hu bandu balwaaye.
43006003	Yesu yeecha yaniina hu lugulu, mani yehala eyo nende abeeki bae.
43006004	Nae bulaanu, esidyaalo sihuluundu sy'Abayudaaya sya Paasaka syali syolere.
43006005	Yesu niyasiingisa emoni chae ati, mani niyabona esidiyiha sy'abandu sihoongo nisiicha yali, yaboolera Filipo ati, “Hunaakule hutye emigaati, hu bandu bano boosi banyale ohulya?”
43006006	Nae yaboola sino ohumuhema busa, olwohuba omweene yali namanyire syanaahole.
43006007	Filipo yamukobolamo ati, “Edinaari emia chibiri haba sichinyala ohukula emigaati chiyera buli muundu ohunyoolaho ahadiidi busa.”
43006008	Mulala hu beeki bae, olaangwa ati Andereya, mwaanang'ina Simooni Peetero, yeecha yamuboolera ati,
43006009	“Omusyaani wundi ali ano oli nende emigaati chitaanu nende eng'eni chibiri; nae ebyo nibyo siina hu bandu bano boosi?”
43006010	Yesu yaboola ati, “Muboolere abandu behale aasi.” Nae bulaanu abundu awo waliwo obunyaasi bungi muno; mani abasaacha beehala aasi bali aambi w'elifu chitaanu.
43006011	Mani Yesu yabukula emigaati echo, mani niyamala ohwebasa, yachikabula abo abali nibehaale aasi; eng'eni chosi yachihola atyo, mani buli muundu yeesi yanyoola biyali nadaha.
43006012	Mani nibali baliire nibekuute, Yesu yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mubuuse ebidonye-donye bidong'ereho, abulewo esiindu syoosi esinyaasiha.”
43006013	Mani babuusa ebidonye-donye ebyo, mani beechusa ebimweero ehumi-na-bibiri eby'ebidonye-donye ebyatula mu migaati chitaanu, bi bandu balya baleha.
43006014	Mani abandu nibabona esilolero esyo siyali naaholere, beecha baboola bati, “Wuno niye omunabbi mweene owohwiicha mu syaalo muno!”
43006015	Nae Yesu niyabona ati bali aambi ohwiicha mani bamubukule nende amaani bamuhole omutuki, yeecha yaatulawo handi yacha hulugulu yeng'ene.
43006016	Obwiire nibweera, abeeki ba Yesu beecha beeha bacha hu nyaanja,
43006017	mani beengira mu lyaato, mani bachaaka ohusyaabala nibacha e Kaperanaumu. Bulaanu, esiirima syali sidiire emoni, nae Yesu yaba nasisiiri ohwiicha yibali.
43006018	Mani enyaanja yeecha yeya, olwohuba omuyaka mungi kwali nikuwucha.
43006019	Abeki nibali bafukire elyaato aambi wa mayiro kadatu oba kane, beecha babona Yesu nakeenda hu nyaanja nasuda aambi nende elyaato. Beecha batya muno,
43006020	nae yababoolera ati, “Niye ese; mutatya daawe.”
43006021	Mani abeeki beecha basangaala muno ohumwiingisa mu lyaato, nae abweene-na-bweene awo, elyaato elyo lyeecha lyoola husikobero sibali nibachaaho.
43006022	Hu ludaalo luloondaho, abandu bali nibadong'ere engereha w'enyaanja, babona bati, elyaato lala lyong'ene nilyo elyali nilidoong'ereyo, handi bati Yesu haba siyali niyengiire mu lyaato nende abeeki bae, nae abeeki bae bali baweereo bong'ene.
43006023	Nae kata katyo, amaato kandi, ohutula Tibberia keecha aambi nende esifwo sibaandu baliiramo emigaati Omwaami naamalire ohwebasa Nasae.
43006024	Mani abandu nibabona bati Yesu saasisiiriwo, kata abeeki bae, abandu beene abo, beecha beengira mu maato ako mani bacha e Kaperanaumu nibakoonya Yesu.
43006025	Abeki ba Yesu nibamwakaana engereha w'enyaanja, beecha bamuboolera bati, “Rabbi, wolere ano liina?”
43006026	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, simuli ohungoonya olwohuba mwabona ebilolero, nae olwohuba mwalya emigaati mwekutira elalira.
43006027	Mutahalabaniraanga ebyohulya ebibiiya busa, nae muhalabanire ebyohulya biyindira ohwoola mu bulamu butaakama, bu Mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohubabeeresa; olwohuba oyo niye yi Nasae Seefwe mweene yataaho ahalolero haye.”
43006028	Mani beecha bamuboolera bati, “Huhoyeerwe ohuhola siina syeene, huhube nihuhola emirimo cha Nasae?”
43006029	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Omulimo ku Nasae adaha muhole nikwo kuno, ohufukiirira mw'oyo yi yatuma.”
43006030	Mani beecha bamuboolera bati, “Mani silolero siina syonaahole hwabona mani hwahufukiirira? Mulimo siina kweene kwohola?
43006031	Ba seefwe balya maanu mu siparara; koti lu syandiikwa siti, ‘Yababeresa emigaati ohutula Mukulu ohulya.’ ”
43006032	Nae Yesu yamala yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, Musa haba siniye owababeeresa emigaati ohutula Mukulu; Laata niye obabeeresa omugaati kw'adyeeri ohutula Mukulu.
43006033	Olwohuba omugaati kwa Nasae, nikwo okwo okwiiha aasi ohutula Mukulu, mani kwabeeresa esyaalo obulamu.”
43006034	Nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Omwaami, tubereseenge omugaati kuno buli siha.”
43006035	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Nise omugaati kw'obulamu; oyo owiicha yindi haba saachia hulumwa enjala, handi oyo owufukiiriramo siyahalumwe obuluwo.
43006036	Nae mbaboleere endi, eng'we mumbweene, nae musisiiri ohufukiirira.
43006037	Abo boosi ba Laata yamberesa bacha ohwiicha yindi; nae oyo yeesi owiicha yindi, haba siinjia humusukuna erwaanyi.
43006038	Olwohuba ese sindeeha aasi ohutula Mukulu ohuhola bi ese mweene bindaha, nae ohuhola bi oyo owanduma byadaha.
43006039	Mani sino nisyo si oyo owanduma syadaha ati, takosaho esiindu syoosi hu biindu yamberesa byoosi, nae nyale ohusibeeresa obulamu handi hu ludaalo lwakamayo.
43006040	Olwohuba huno nihwo ohudaha hwa Laata, mbwe buli oyo yeesi obona Omwaana mani yamufukiiriramo, ahoyeere ohufuna obulamu butaakama; handi njia ohumubeeresa obulamu hu ludaalo lwakamayo.”
43006041	Abayudaaya nabo beecha bamwekanyiisaho, olwohuba yaboola ati, “Nise omugaati kweha aasi ohutula Mukulu.”
43006042	Beecha baboola bati, “Wuno si niye Yesu, omusyaani wa Yosefu, yi simwaana nende ng'ina bahumanyire busa? Nae yahaboola atye ati, ‘Ndeeha aasi ohutula Mukulu?’ ”
43006043	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mulehe ohweng'ulung'uunya abeene-na-beene.
43006044	Abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohwiicha yindi, ohutusaho nga Laata wanduma amuseenda yaamuleeta yindi; handi njia ohumubeeresa obulamu hu ludaalo lwakamayo.
43006045	Syandiikwa nende abanabbi siti, ‘Mani boosi-boosi bacha ohwekeswa nende Nasae mweene.’ Oyo yeesi owulira emboosi ya Laata, mani handi yekeswa nende Laata, oyo niye owiicha yindi.
43006046	Sikali mbwe buli muundu yeesi yabonaho Laata, ohutusaho oyo otula eyiri Nasae; oyo yabonaho Laata.
43006047	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi ofukiirira ali nende obulamu butaakama.
43006048	Nise omugaati kw'obulamu.
43006049	Baseeng'we balya maanu nibali mu siparara, mani beecha baafwa.
43006050	Kuno nikwo omugaati kweha aasi ohutula Mukulu, omuundu anyale ohukulyaho mani ahaye ohufwa.
43006051	Nise omugaati mulamu okweeha aasi ohutula Mukulu; omuundu yeesi olya hu mugaati kuno, achia obubao endaalo choosi; handi omugaati ku njia ohubabeeresa nikwo omubiri kwaange hulw'obulamu bw'esyaalo.”
43006052	Bulaanu Abayudaaya beecha bachaaka ohuyingana abeene-na-beene nibaboola bati, “Omusaacha wuno anyala atye ohutubeeresa omubiri kwae ohulya?”
43006053	Mani Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, ohutusaho nimulya omubiri kw'Omwaana w'Omuundu, handi mwang'wa amabaanga kae, haba simuchia hubaamo obulamu;
43006054	Oyo olya omubiri kwaange, handi yang'wa amabaanga kange, ali nende obulamu butaakama, handi njia ohumubeeresa obulamu handi hu ludaalo lwakamayo.
43006055	Olwohuba, omubiri kwaange, syohulya syeene, handi amabaanga kange, syohung'wa syeene.
43006056	Oyo olya omubiri kwaange handi yang'wa amabaanga kange amenya mwese, handi syesi ndamumenyamo.
43006057	Koti lu Laata mulamu yanduma, handi nduwo hulwa Laata, mani oyo owundya, achia obubao hulwaange.
43006058	Kuno nikwo omugaati kweha aasi ohutula Mukulu, sikuli koti ku ba seefwe balya mani bafwa; nae oyo olya omugaati kuno yahabewo endaalo choosi.”
43006059	Yesu yalomalomera sino mu Sinagoogi, niyali niyeekesa e Kaperanaumu.
43006060	Abeki bae bangi nibawulira sino, baboola bati, “Enomanoma yino ndinyu muno; wiina onyala ohuyitekeeresa?”
43006061	Nae olwohuba Yesu yali namanyire mu mwooyo kwae ati abeeki bae bali ohusyemulugunyaho, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Sino sibamalamo amaani?
43006062	Nae nimwahabweene Omwaana w'Omuundu naniina naakobola yiyabechaanga hale?
43006063	Omwooyo nikwo okubeeresa obulamu, omubiri nakwo kubulaho sikuhola; emboosi chimbalomalomeere chino, nicho omwooyo handi nicho obulamu.
43006064	Nae aliwo abandi hw'eng'we abatafukiirira.” Olwohuba Yesu yali namanyire muhuchaaka hweene abo abali nibatafukiirira, handi nende oyo owali achia ohumulyaamo olukwe.
43006065	Mani yeecha yaboola ati, “Sino nisyo esikerere nimbaboolera endi abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohwiicha yiindi ohutusaho nga Laata mweene amufukiirire.”
43006066	Ohutula hw'olwo, abangi hu beeki bae beseenda enyuma mani baakama ohukendaanga nae.
43006067	Nae Yesu yeecha yateeba abeeki bae ehumi-na-babiri ati, “Mwesi mudaha ohundeha?”
43006068	Simooni Peetero nae yakobolamo ati, “Omwaami, hunaache eyiri wiina? Niiwe oli nende emboosi ch'obulamu butaakama;
43006069	hwamala ohufukiirira handi humalire ohumanya huti, niiwe Omwolerefu Mweene wa Nasae.”
43006070	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Si nise owabadoola eng'we ehumi-na-babiri? Nae mulala hw'eng'we Sitaani niye!”
43006071	Yesu yali naalomaloma hu Yuda omusyaani wa Simooni Yisikarioti, olwohuba niye mulala hu ehumi-na-babiri owali achia ohumuhoba.
43007001	Ebyo nibyawa, Yesu yeecha yakenda naabitira mu Galilaaya; siyanyala ohubita mu Buyudaaya, olwohuba Abayudaaya bali bakiiya ohumwiita.
43007002	Bulaanu, esidyaalo sy'Abayudaaya silaangwa siti, esy'Ebikaali, syali aambi ohwoola.
43007003	Mani, bamwaanang'ina beecha bamuboolera bati, “Tula ano mani ochie mu Buyudaaya, hu beeki bao banyale ohubona emirimo chooli ohuhola.
43007004	Olwohuba abulao omuundu odaha amanyihane alafu, ohola emirimo chae mungiso. Noohola ebiindu bino, weyekese eyiri abandu boosi bamanye.”
43007005	Olwohuba kata bamwaanang'ina bosi haba sibamufukiiriramo.
43007006	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Esiha syaange sisisiiri ohwoola, nae esiha syeng'we siriwo buli ludaalo.
43007007	Abandu sibanyala ohubahaya, nae bamala ohuuhaya olwohuba mbabooleraanga endi ebiholwa byaabwe bibi.
43007008	Eng'we abeene muche mu sidyaalo; ese haba siinjicha huchia hu sidyaalo sino, olwohuba esiha syaange sisisiiri ohwolera elalira.”
43007009	Olwaboola atyo, mani Yesu yeecha yadoong'a mu Galilaaya.
43007010	Bamwaanang'ina nibamala ohuchia hu sidyaalo esyo, Yesu yesi yeecha yaacha mungiso abandu nibatamubona.
43007011	Abayudaaya bali nibamukiiya hu sidyaalo nibaboola bati, “Omweene ali yena?”
43007012	Mani waliwo ohwemoonya hungi muno mu bandu. Nae abandu bandi nibaboola bati, “Omuundu wuno mulai niye,” abandi nabo beecha baboola bati, “Bbe, wuno muundu ali ohukosa abandu.”
43007013	Nae olwohutya Abayundaaya, abulao omuundu yeesi wamulomalomaho alafu.
43007014	Esidyaalo nisyali aambi ohwoola akati-kaati, Yesu yacha yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yachaaka ohweekesa.
43007015	Enjekesa yae yeecha yaasindusa Abayudaaya, mani baboola bati, “Omusaacha wuno yamanya atye ebiindu bino, nae haba siyachaaho mu lyeekero?”
43007016	Mani Yesu yeecha yabakobolamo ati, “Biinjekesa haba sibitula mwese mweene, nae bitula eyiri oyo owanduma;
43007017	omuundu yeesi nadaha ohuhola bi Nasae adaha, aba achia ohumanya enjekesa yino niyitula eyiri Nasae oba ndi ohulomaloma hulw'obunyala bwaange omweene.
43007018	Omuundu yeesi omweene olomaloma hulw'obunyala bwae, aba akoonya ohufuna oluyaali lwae omweene; nae oyo okoonya oluyaali lw'omuundu wamutuma aba ali owadyeeri, handi saalimo bubacha.
43007019	Musa haba siyababeeresa amalako daawe? Nae abulao kata mulala hw'eng'we owoseresaanga amalako ako. Lwasiina mukiiya ohunjita?”
43007020	Nae abandu abo bakobolamo bati, “Ewe oliho omusaambwa! Wiina mweene okiiya ohwiita?”
43007021	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ndaholaho esiholwa silala busa, nae eng'we mweesi mweecha mwasyesinduha.
43007022	Musa yabeeresa ohuhebwa (sino haba sisitula eyiri Musa, nae situla hu baseefwe), mani muhebaanga abaana basyani hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
43007023	Omuundu nibamuheba hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, baahaya ohulaka elako lya Musa, bulaanu eng'we muunyolereere olwohuba ndaonia omuundu, hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato?
43007024	Mutahengaanga omusango ohweema hu biindu biboneha busa, nae muhengeenge omusango ohweema hu bwadyeeri bumuba mumanyire.”
43007025	Sakira abandu bandi ohutula Yerusaalemu baboola bati, “Omusaacha wuno haba siniye yibali ohukiiya ohwiita?
43007026	Nae nguno ali ano, alomaloma busa alafu, nae abulao omuundu omuboolaho esiindu syoosi! Sinyala ohuba siti abobunyala bamalire ohumanya obwadyeeri bweene bati wuno niye Kristo?
43007027	Nae efwe humanyire bulai yi musaacha wuno atula; nae Kristo niyaheeche, abulao omuundu yeesi olimanya yaatula.”
43007028	Mani Yesu yayaala niyeekesa mu nyumba ya Nasae ati, “Mubaasa muti mumanyire handi mwamanya bulai bweene yindula? Nae ese sindeecha hulwohudaha hwange omweene; oyo owanduma niye obwadyeeri, nae omweene oyo haba simumumanyire.
43007029	Ese mumanyire, olwohuba ndula yaali, handi niye owanduma.”
43007030	Mani beecha bamukiiya ohumudiira; nae abulao omuundu yeesi owamugeeng'aho omuhono kae, olwohuba esiha sya syae syali sisisiiri ohwoola.
43007031	Kata katyo, abandu bangi bamufukiiriramo; nibaboola bati, “Kristo niyaheeche, mani yahahole obulolero bungi obuhira bu musaacha wuno aholere?”
43007032	Abafalisaayo beecha bawulira esidiyiha esyo nisiri ohumwemoonyaho, mani beecha baholera alala nende abalaamisi bahuluundu batuma Abasirikari ohuchia ohumudiira.
43007033	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Ese njia ohubaaho nang'we budiidi hooho, mani niimala njia eyiri oyo owanduma;
43007034	mucha ohungoonya, nae haba simuchia ohunjakaana; olwohuba yindi, simunyala ohwichayo.”
43007035	Abayudaaya beecha bachaaka ohuboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Omusaacha wuno adaha ohuchia yena bweene huhuhaye ohumunyoola? Anyala ohuba nadaha ohuchia mu syaalo sy'Abayonaani yi basyeefwe basalaanira mani asomese Abayonaani?
43007036	Siina syeene siyekesa naboola ati, ‘Mucha ohungoonya, nae haba simuchia ohunjakaana,’ handi ati, ‘Yindi, simunyala ohwichayo’?”
43007037	Hu ludaalo lw'esidyaalo lumalirihayo, oludaalo luhuluundu olwo, Yesu yeecha yeema, mani yayaala naboola ati, “Omuundu yeesi olumwa obuluwo, leha yeeche yindi mani ang'we.
43007038	Oyo yeesi owufukiiriramo, koti ebyandiiko byolerefu lubiboola biti, ‘Emyaalo ch'amaachi k'obulamu chicha ohuhulukusa nichitula mu mwooyo kwae.’ ”
43007039	Nae bulaanu Yesu yalomaloma sino, niyeekesa Mwooyo, yi abo boosi abamufukiiriramo bahanyoole; olwohuba ohwoola esiha esyo, Mwooyo yali asisiiri ohwiicha, olwohuba Yesu yali asisiiri ohubereswa oluyaali.
43007040	Nae nibawulira emboosi chino, abandu bandi beecha baboola bati, “Mubwadyeeri bweene, wuno niye omunabbi.”
43007041	Nae abandi baboola bati, “Wuno niye Kristo.” Nae abandi nabo baboola bati, “Kristo anyala ohutula mu Galilaaya?
43007042	Ebyandiiko byolerefu sibyaboola biti Kristo achia ohutula mu lwiibulo lwa Daudi, mani atule e Bbetileheemu, olukoongo lu Daudi yali yamenyamo?”
43007043	Mani ohukabuhanamo hwecha hwaaba mu bandu hu bidiira hu Yesu.
43007044	Abandu bandi badaha ohudiira Yesu, nae abulao omuundu yeesi owamugeeng'aho omuhono.
43007045	Mani Abasirikari beecha bakobolayo bacha eyiri abalaamisi bahuluundu nende Abafalisaayo, abecha bababoolera bati, “Lwasiina simumuleetere?”
43007046	Abasirikari nabo babakobolamo bati, “Abulao omuundu yeesi owalomalomaho bulai koti omusaacha wuno!”
43007047	Abafalisaayo nabo baabakobolamo bati, “Eng'we mwesi hane mumalire ohukoswa?
43007048	Aliwo omuundu yeesi hu bahuluundu beefwe oba hu Bafalisaayo omufukiiriremo?
43007049	Ohutusaho esidiyiha sy'abandu bano, abatamanyire amalako ka Musa, abaholimirwa.”
43007050	Nae Nikodema, owali yachaaho eyiri Yesu hale, handi owali mulala hu Bafalisaayo, yeecha yababoolera ati.
43007051	“Mani amalako keefwe kafukiirira ohuheengera omuundu omusango, nasisiiri mberi ohutekeereswa, hu mwamanya ebiindu byaaba naahola?”
43007052	Nabo bakobolamo bati, “Hane ewe wesi otula e Galilaaya? Konyeresa mu byadiiko byolerefu, mani ochia ohubona oti, abulao omunabbi yeesi olitula mu Galilaaya.”
43007053	Mani buli muundu yeecha yaakobola engo wae.
43008001	Nae Yesu yeecha yaniina yacha hu lugulu lwa Olibeti.
43008002	Echuli mu mabweeri-bweeri Yesu yeecha yeecha mu nyumba ya Nasae; mani abandu boosi basuda yali, mani yehala aasi yachaaka ohubeekesa.
43008003	Mani abandiiki ba malako ka Musa alala nende Abafalisaayo beecha baleeta omuhasi wali adiirirwe naali ohuyirana, mani bamuta akati waabwe
43008004	mani bamuboolera bati, “Rabbi, omuhasi wuno adiiribwe naali muhuyirana hweene.
43008005	Nae bulaanu, mu malako, Musa yatulagira ohuhubbaanga amakina omuhasi ofwaana ati. Naawe siina syeene syomuboolaho?”
43008006	Baboola batyo, ohuhema busa Yesu, hubeemeo banyoole esifune sibanyala ohumutaaho. Nae Yesu yenama aasi, mani yandiika hu loba nende olwala lwae.
43008007	Mani koti lubali nibasichiiririra ohumuteebaanga, Yesu yeecha yaasingira yeema mani yababoolera ati, “Mulehe oyo yeesi otaliho nende esibi syoosi mweng'we abe otangira ohusukuna ekina hu muhasi wuno.”
43008008	Handi ehabi liindi, Yesu yeecha yenama aasi, mani yandiika hu loba nende olwala lwae.
43008009	Nae nibawulira batyo, bachaaka ohuwao, syamulala-mulala, ohuchaakira hu muhuluundu mweene. Mani Yesu yeecha yaalehebwa yadoong'a yeng'ene nende omuhasi oyo niyeemere mu moni wae.
43008010	Yesu yeecha yatingaala akulu mani yamuboolera ati, “Muhasiiwe, bachiire yena? Abulao omuundu yeesi ohuwabiire omusango kwoosi?”
43008011	Nae omuhasi oyo yeecha yaboola ati, “Omwaami, abulao kata mulala.” Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Mani kata syesi haba saaliwo omusango kwoosi ku huwabira; wewerewo, mani otaholaangaho esibi handi.”
43008012	Handi Yesu yeecha yabalomalomera naboola ati, “Nise obulafu bw'esyaalo; oyo yeesi owunoonda, haba saachia hukeendera mu siirima, nae achia ohunyoola obulafu bw'obulamu.”
43008013	Abafalisaayo nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Mbao oli ohwetusira obujulisi omweene; mani obujulisi bwao haba sibwadyeeri.”
43008014	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Andahaba niindi ohwetusira obujulisi omweene, obujulisi bwaange bwadyeeri, olwohuba ese omweene manyire yindatula handi yindi ohuchia, nae eng'we mukoterwe yi ese ndula handi nende yinja.
43008015	Eng'we muheenga emisango ohweema hubyomubiri, naange ese haba siheengera omuundu yeesi omusango.
43008016	Nae abyahaba mbwe ese syesi heenga emisango, eheenga yange y'obwadyeeri, olwohuba si nise syeng'ene oheenga emisango, nae nise omweene, alala nende oyo owanduma.
43008017	Mu malako keeng'we, syandiikwa siti, obujulisi bw'abandu babiri buba obwadyeeri.
43008018	Ese ndetusira omweene obujulisi, nae Laata wanduma yesi yandusira obujulisi.”
43008019	Mani sakira beecha bamuboolera bati, “Nae Latao ali yena?” Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Eng'we simumanyire kata nende Laata yesi simumumanyire; nimuba nimwamanya, muba mwamanya nende Laata yesi.”
43008020	Emboosi chino nicho chiyalomalomera mu nyumba ya Nasae naali mu siseenge sibabihangamo esende. Nae abulao omuundu wamudiira, olwohuba esiha syae syali sitoola.
43008021	Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese mbwao, mani mucha ohungoonya, mani mufwiire busa mu sibi syeng'we; eyo yinja, eng'we simunyala ohwichayo.”
43008022	Abayudaaya nabo beecha baboola bati, “Achia ohweyita omweene, koti lwali ohuboolaanga ati, ‘Eyo yinja eng'we haba simunyala ohwichayo’?”
43008023	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mutula aasi, nae ese ndula akulu; eng'we muli abohusyaalo sino, nae ese haba siindi owohusyaalo sino.
43008024	Ese mbaboleere endi eng'we mucha ohufwiira busa mu bibi by'eng'we, olwohuba mucha ohufwiira mu bibi by'eng'we nimutafukiirira muti, ese niise oyo mweene.”
43008025	Nabo bamuboolera busa bati, “Ewe niiwe naanu?” Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Kata busa nende bindenaanaanga ohubaboolera ohutula huhuchaaka simubiwulira.
43008026	Ndi nende emboosi nyiingi muno echohubalomalomaho, nende ebiindu ebiingi muno eby'ohukolola; nae oyo owanduma niye obwadyeeri, mani njaalira esyaalo esyo siimba nimbuliire ohumutulaho.”
43008027	Nabo haba sibamanya bati, yali nabalomalomeere ebidiira hu Laata.
43008028	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Nimwahabe nimumalire ohusiingisa akulu Omwaana w'Omuundu, nilwo lumwahamanyire muti ese niise oyo, handi muti, ese haba sihola esiindu syoosi hu lw'obunyala bwaange omweene, nae nomaloma ebyo bi Laata yanjekesa.
43008029	Handi oyo owanduma ali naange; haba siyandeha syeng'ene daawe, olwohuba buli siha hola ebimusangaasa.”
43008030	Mani koti luyalomaloma atyo, abandu bangi beecha bamufukiiriramo.
43008031	Bulaanu, Yesu yeecha yaboolera Abayudaaya abo abali bamufukiiriremo ati, “Nimudiira emboosi change, muba muli abeeki bange b'adyeeri,
43008032	mani muba mucha ohumanya obwadyeeri, mani obwadyeeri buba bucha ohubaboolola.”
43008033	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Efwe huli abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu, mani haba sihubechaangaho mu buboye bw'omuundu yeesi. Siba sitye ewe ohuboola oti, ‘Mucha ohuboololwa’?”
43008034	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, buli muundu yeesi ohola esibi, aba ali omuboye we sibi.
43008035	Nae omuboye haba saadong'aanga mu nyumba ebiha byoosi daawe; nae Omwaana adoong'a atyo ebiha byoosi.
43008036	Mani Omwaana nahuboolola, oba ochia ohuba omuboolole mweene.
43008037	Ese manyire endi muli abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu; nae muli ohukiiya ohunjita, olwohuba emboosi change haba sichinyala ohwakaana obwihalo mu myooyo cheeng'we.
43008038	Ese nomaloma hw'ebyo bindabonaho nende Laata, nae eng'we muhola bi mwawulira ohutula hu seeng'we.”
43008039	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Yibbulaimu niye seefwe.” Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Nikali mbwe muli abaana ba Yibbulaimu dyeeri, muba muhola bi Yibbulaimu yahola.
43008040	Nae bulaanu eng'we muli ohukiiya ohunjita, ese omuundu obaboleere obwadyeeri bu ndawulira ohutula hu Laata mweene; sino haba sinisyo si Yibbulaimu yahola.
43008041	Eng'we muli ohuhola ebyo bi seeng'we yahola.” Nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Efwe haba sihwebulirwa mu bucheke; huli busa nende Seefwe mulala yeng'ene, Nasae.”
43008042	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Nasae aba naali seeng'we, mwahandahire, olwohuba njaakira handi ndula eyiri Nasae. Haba sindeecha hu lw'ohudaha hwaange omweene, nae niye owanduma.
43008043	Lwasiina haba simudiisa esyo siindi ohuboola? Siri mbwe, eng'we haba simunyala hwesimiirisa ohuwulira emboosi change.
43008044	Eng'we muli aba Sitaani seeng'we, mani esichiiririrwa syeng'we nisyo ohuhola bi seeng'we adaha. Omweene oyo yali busa omwiiti hu huchaaka hweene, mani abulao syahola syoosi esichiana nende obwadyeeri, olwohuba abulamu obwadyeeri bwoosi. Mani nabacha, aba alomaloma ohweema hu bulamu bwae, olwohuba ali omubacha handi simwaana bubacha bweene.
43008045	Nae olwohuba ese mbaboolera obwadyeeri, eng'we haba simufukiirira ebyaange daawe.
43008046	Wiina mweene hw'eng'we onyala ohumbonamo esibi syoosi? Mani ese nimboola obwadyeeri, lwasiina eng'we haba simufukiirira bi mboola?
43008047	Oyo yeesi owa Nasae, awulira emboosi cha Nasae; esifune sikera nimutanyala ohuchiwulira, siri mbwe, eng'we haba simuli aba Nasae.”
43008048	Abayudaaya beecha bakobola mu Yesu bati, “Mani omuundu saaba ali owabweene naboola ati, hane ewe oli Omusamaria handi oliho omusaambwa?”
43008049	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ese haba siindiho omusaambwa daawe; nae ese njisa oluyaali mu Laata busa, nae eng'we munjaalaasa busa.
43008050	Ni handi ese haba sindekonyera busa omweene oluyaali; aliwo oyo olukoonya, handi niye ochia ohuba omukayi.
43008051	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, omuundu yeesi nadiira emboosi change, haba saachia hufwa daawe.”
43008052	Nae Abayudaaya beecha bamuboolera bati, “Bulaanu hwahamanyira elalira huti hane, oliho omusaambwa. Yibbulaimu yafwa, koti busa lu banabbi bosi bahola; nae ewe oboola oti, ‘Omuundu yeesi nadiira emboosi change, mbwe oyo haba saachia hufwa.’
43008053	Ewe ohira Yibbulaimu seefwe owafwa? Neende abanabbi bosi bafwa! Ewe naawe welaanga ohuba naanu mweene?”
43008054	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Nikali mbwe ese ndeberesa oluyaali omweene, oluyaali lwaange luba luli olwebihaya. Nae Laata niye owumba oluyaali, oyo yimuboolaanga muti niye Nasae weng'we.
43008055	Nae musisiiri ohumumanya daawe; nae ese mumanyire. Nimba nimboolere endi, haba simumanyire, mba ndi omubacha koti eng'we muli; nae ese mumanyire, handi ndeesa oluyaali mu mboosi chae.
43008056	Yibbulaimu seeng'we yasangaalira ohubonaho oludaalo lwaange; yalubona mani yasangaala muno.”
43008057	Abayudaaya nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Ewe otoosaho kata emyaaka amahumi kataanu ech'obuhuluundu, mani wabonaho Yibbulaimu?”
43008058	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, kata nende Yibbulaimu niyali nateebulwa, Ese ndiwo.”
43008059	Mani beecha baabukula amakina bachaaka ohumuhuya; nae Yesu yeecha yabekisaho, mani yeecha yaatula erwaanyi w'enyumba ya Nasae.
43009001	Yesu niyali nakeenda nawawo, yeecha yabona omusaacha webulwa naali omuwofu.
43009002	Mani abeeki bae beecha bamuteeba bati, “Rabbi, naanu mweene owahola esibi hu musaacha wuno yebulwe naali omuwofu, niye omusaacha wuno, kose abebusi bae?”
43009003	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Haba sisyali mbwe ni omusaacha wuno niye owahola esibi, kata haba si beebusi bwae daawe, nae hu mirimo cha Nasae chinyale ohumuboneheramo.
43009004	Huhoyeere ohuhola emirimo ch'oyo owanduma, nisisisiiri esideete; olwohuba esiro siba sichia ohwiicha, mani abulewo omuundu yeesi onyala ohuholaho omulimo.
43009005	Nimba nisisiiri mu syaalo muno, ndi obulafu bw'esyaalo.”
43009006	Mani niyaboola atyo, yeecha yafuucha aasi mani yaniasa eloba nende amate kae, mani yaabaha edosi elyo hu moni ch'omusaacha oyo,
43009007	namuboolera ati, “Cha, weyose mu diba lya Siloamu” (esyeekesa mbwe Ndatumwa). Mani yeecha yacha mani yeyosa, mani yaakobola naabona.
43009008	Abandu bali bamenya nae, alala nende abo abali bamubona hale nasisiiri omusabirisi, beecha baboola bati, “Wuno siniye omusaacha wali niyehalaanga mani nasabirisa?”
43009009	Abandi nabo baboola bati, “Ngandi niye omweene-no-mweene”. Abandi nabo baboolaanga bati, “Haba bbe, afwanana busa nae.” Nae omweene yaboola ati, “Ese nise omusaacha mweene oyo.”
43009010	Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Mani nae emoni chao chilimbuuswe chitye?”
43009011	Nae yakobolamo ati, “Omusaacha olaangwa Yesu niye oniasire eloba, mani yaalibaha hu moni change mani yamala yaamboolera ati, ‘Cha hu Siloamu mani weyose’; mani syesi njiire mani ndeyosa mani ndafuna ohubona hwange huno.”
43009012	Nabo bamuboolera bati, “Ali yena?” Nae yaboola ati, “Ese haba siimanyire yaali.”
43009013	Beecha baleeta eyiri Abafalisaayo omusaacha wali hale omuwofu.
43009014	Nae bulaanu lwali oludaalo lwa Sabbaato, Yesu lu yaniasiraho eloba, mani yaamulimbusiraho emoni chae.
43009015	Handi Abafalisaayo beecha baamuteeba engeri yiyafuniramo ohubona hwae. Nae yababoolera ati, “Omusaacha oyo yabukula edosi, mani yaalibaha hu moni change, mani naachia ndeyosa, mani bulaanu mbano mbona.”
43009016	Abafalisaayo bandi nabo beecha baboolaanga bati, “Omusaacha wuno haba saanyala ohuba natula eyiri Nasae, olwohuba haba saatya oludaalo lwa Sabbaato.” Nae abandi nabo baboolaanga bati, “Sinyaliha sitye, omuundu omuholi we bibi ohunyala ohuhola obulolero bwakiire ano buti?” Mani beecha bahaya ohuwuliirisania.
43009017	Mani handi beecha baboolera omusaacha muwofu oyo bati, “Siina syeene syonyala ohulomaloma hu musaacha oyo, koti lwalimbuuse emoni chao?” Nae yeecha yaboola ati, “Munabbi niye.”
43009018	Abayudaaya nabo haba sibanyala ohufukiirira bati omusaacha oyo yaliho omuwofu, mani bati yanyoola-bunyoola lunyuma ohubona hwae, ohwoola lu beecha balaanga abebusi b'omusaacha wali nanyoolere ohubona hwae,
43009019	mani baabateeba bati, “Omusyaani wuno yimuboola muti yebulwa niyaofula, mwaana weng'we mweene? Nae siba sitye mbwe bulaanu anyala ohubona?”
43009020	Nae abebusi bae beecha bakobolamo bati, “Efwe humanyire huti wuno mwaana weefwe mweene, handi huti, yebulwa naali omuwofu;
43009021	nae ohumanya esikera nanyala ohubona bulaanu, efwe haba sihumanyire daawe, kata handi sihumanyireho nende oyo olimbuuse emoni chae. Mumuteebe omweene; olwohuba omweene muhuluundu niye, mani achia ohwelomalomera omweene.”
43009022	Abebusi bae baboola batyo, olwohuba bali batiire Abayudaaya, olwohuba Abayudaaya abo bali bamalire ohufukiirisania hale bati, omuundu yeesi naachia ohumutuumbula ati, niye Kristo, aba achia ohwiruswa busa mu Sinagoogi.
43009023	Ohweema hweesyo, abebusi bae beecha baboola bati, “Omweene muhuluundu, mumuteebe.”
43009024	Handi mani hulwa ehabi lyohubiri, beecha balaanga omusaacha wali hale omuwofu, mani bamuboolera bati, “Fumiaho Nasae; efwe humanyire huti, omusaacha wuno muholi we bibi.”
43009025	Nae yakobolamo ati, “Kata naaba naali omuholi we bibi, ese haba siimanyire; nae esiindu silala syong'ene siimanyire siri siti, mbeere hale niindi omuwofu, bulaanu mbona.”
43009026	Nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Siina syeene syahuholere? Alimbuuse atye emoni chao?”
43009027	Nae yabakobolamo ati, “Ese malire ohubabooleraho hale, nae haba simunyalire hutekeeresa. Lwasiina mudaha ohusiwulira ehabi liindi? Mwesi muli ohudaha ohwehola abeeki bae?”
43009028	Nabo bulaanu beecha bamunyoholesa, nibaboola bati, “Ewe niiwe omweeki wae, nae efwe huli abeeki ba Musa.
43009029	Efwe humanyire huti, Nasae yalomaloma tiiri nende Musa, nae ebidiira hu musasacha wuno, efwe haba sihumanyire kata nende yaatula.”
43009030	Mani omusaacha oyo yeecha yakobolamo ati, “Hu siina syeene, luno lubwa! Eng'we haba simumanyireho nende yaatula, nae alimbuuse emoni chiange.
43009031	Efwe humanyire huti, Nasae haba sawuliranga abaholi be bibi, nae huti, omuundu yeesi naali owiinamira Nasae mweene, mani yaaba ohola byadaha, niye yi Nasae awulira.
43009032	Haba sisiwulirwaangaho kata na budiidi ohutula esyaalo nisibaao siti, omuundu yeesi anyalire ohulimbusa emoni ch'omuundu webulwa naali omuwofu.
43009033	Nikali mbwe omusaacha wuno haba saatula eyiri Nasae, haba saaliwo esiindu syoosi syaba anyala ohuhola.”
43009034	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Ewe naawe owebulirwa busa mu bibi, wesi oli nende syonyala ohutwekesa?” Mani beecha bamusukuna erwaanyi we Sinagoogi.
43009035	Yesu yeecha yawulira lunyuma ati bamalire ohusukuna omusaacha oyo erwaanyi wa Sinagoogi, mani niyeecha yabukanana nae yaboola ati, “Ewe mani ofukiirira mu Mwaana w'Omuundu?”
43009036	Nae yakobolamo ati, “Ow'oluyaali, nae oyo niye naanu, mufukiiriremo?”
43009037	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ewe wamala ohumubona, handi niye oyo oli ohulomalomaanga naawe.”
43009038	Nae yeecha yaboola ati, “Omwaami, ese fukiirira”. Mani yamala yaamwiinamira.
43009039	Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Ese ndeecha mu syaalo muno ohuheenga emisango, hu bulaanu abo abatabona, banyale ohubona, handi hwaabo ababona baofule.”
43009040	Abafalisaayo bandi bali nibali aambi nae beecha bawulira sino, mani bamuboolera bati, “Oti efwe fwesi huli abawofu, kose?”
43009041	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Muba nimuli abawofu, haba simuba muli nende esibi syoosi; nae olwohuba bulaanu muli ohuboola muti ‘Efwe hubona,’ esibi sy'eng'we, sidoong'aawo busa.
43010001	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, oyo yeesi oteengira mu sidwooli nabitira mu mulyaango, nae yaniina yengirira abundu wandi, omuundu oyo aba ali omwiibi handi omunyaka.
43010002	Nae oyo owingirira mu mulyaango, niye oba omwaayi mweene w'amakoondi.
43010003	Oyo niye yi muliindi w'esiruwa yiyekulira; mani amakoondi kamanya ekono lyae, mani yalaanga buli koondi lyae nende eliita lyaalyo, mani yaakemirira nikatula erwaanyi.
43010004	Mani naaba naamalire ohutusa erwaanyi amakoondi kae, akatangirira mu moni, mani amakoondi kamuloondaho, olwohuba kaba kamanya ekono lyae.
43010005	Nae haba sikanyala ohuloonda omuteende yeesi, nae kaba kacha ohumwiiruha busa, olwohuba haba sikamanyire ekono ly'Abateende.”
43010006	Yesu yabahosesera esifwaanani sino, nae nabo haba sibamanya esihuluundu siyali ababooleraanga.
43010007	Sakira Yesu handi yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, niise omulyaango kw'amakoondi.
43010008	Abo boosi abacha ohwiicha enyuma wange, beebi handi banyaka busa; nae amakoondi nako, haba sikabatekeeresa.
43010009	Nise omulyaango; mani omuundu yeesi niyanyiingiriramo, achia ohuwonisibwa, handi achia ohwingiraanga handi natula mani nanyolaanga olwaayiro.
43010010	Omwiibi yechaanga busa ohwiiba nende ohwiita nende ohunyaasa. Ese ndeecha hu bandu banyale ohunyoola obulamu, mani babe nabwo mubwichufu.
43010011	Niise omwaayi mulai. Omwaayi mulai, awaayo obulamu bwae hulw'amakoondi.
43010012	Oyo oba naali busa omupakase, handi otaali omwaayi, otaali omweene makoondi, naabonaho busa esinamiindi nisiicha aleha busa amakoondi mani yeyiruhira; mani esinamiindi siicha syaakakwaaho, mani syakasalaania.
43010013	Yeyiruhira olwohuba aba ali busa omuhalaabani mani saliindaho amakoondi kata nabudiidi.
43010014	Nise omwaayi mulai. Ese manyire amakoondi kange, handi amakoondi kange kosi kaamanyire,
43010015	koti busa lu Laata yaamanyire, handi syeesi ndaamanya Laata; handi mbwayo obulamu bwaange hulw'amakoondi.
43010016	Handi ndi nende amakoondi kandi, akataali ak'omusidwooli sino. Mani hoyeere ohukaleeta kosi, mani kosi kamanye ekono lyaange. Mani sakira achia ohubaao esidwooli silala nende omwaayi mulala.
43010017	Mani hulw'esifune sino, sakira Laata yandaha, olwohuba ese ndetusaho obulamu bwaange, hu lunyuma handi nyale ohubwekobosera.
43010018	Abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohubuundusaho, nae ese omweene, mbwetusaho, handi ndi nende obunyala bw'ohububukula handi; ndanyoola esilagiro sino ohutula hu Laata.”
43010019	Handi ohukabuhanamo hwecha hwabao mu Bayudaaya hulw'emboosi chino.
43010020	Abangi hw'abo baboolaanga bati, “Aliho omusaambwa, mani mulalu niye; lwasiina humutekeeresa?”
43010021	Nae abandi baboolaanga bati, “Chino haba sin'emboosi ech'omuundu oliho omusaambwa. Omusaambwa kunyala kwalimbusa emoni ch'omuwofu?”
43010022	Esiha esyo syali esy'esidyaalo sy'ohulabya Enyuumba ya Nasae e Yerusaalemu;
43010023	yali etoocho, mani Yesu yali nakendaanga mu nyumba ya Nasae, mu siseenge sya Solomooni.
43010024	Mani sakira Abayudaaya beecha bebuusa bamwebodoohania mani bamuboolera bati, “Ng'ochia ohutuhiindya notulehere mubutamanya? Nikali mbwe ewe niiwe Kristo, tuboolere busa alafu.”
43010025	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ndamala ohubaboolera, nae haba simufukiiriraanga. Emirimo chino chiindi ohuholaanga mu liita lya Laata, chindusira obujulisi echeene;
43010026	nae eng'we haba simufukiiriraanga daawe, olwohuba eng'we haba simuli hu makoondi kaange.
43010027	Amakoondi kange kamanya ekono lyaange, handi syesi ngamanyire, mani kanoonda busa;
43010028	mani naange ngabeeresa obulamu butaakama, mani haba sikachia humalwao, handi abulao oyo yeesi ochia ohukakwaaho akatuse mu mahono kange.
43010029	Laata oyo owakamberesa, ahira ebiindu byoosi, handi abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohubang'uula yabatusa mu muhono kwa Laata.
43010030	Ese nende Laata huli mulala.”
43010031	Handi Abayudaaya beecha badoola amakina nibadaha ohumuhuyira.
43010032	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Ese mbekeese emirimo miingi milai muno ohutula eyiri Laata; bulaanu ni mulimo siina kweene kumudaha ohuhubbiraho amakina?”
43010033	Nae Abayudaaya bamukobolamo bati, “Sihudaha ohuhuhubba amakina hulw'omulimo mulai daawe, nae ni hulw'ohufwoola Nasae; olwohuba ewe oli omuundu busa, nae oli ohwehola ohuba Nasae.”
43010034	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Haba sisyandiikwa mu malako k'eng'we siti, ‘Nasae yaboola ati, eng'we muli banasaye’?
43010035	Mani Nasae niyabalaanga ati bali banasaye, abo ba mboosi ya Nasae yechera (handi ebyandiiko byolerefu haba sibinyala ohuhalakwa),
43010036	bulaanu lwasiina muba muboola, hu oyo yi Laata yalabya yaaba omwolerefu mani yamala yaamutuma ohwiicha mu syaalo muti, ‘Ewe oli ohufwoola Nasae,’ olwohuba busa mbwe ese mboolere endi, ‘Ndi Omwaana wa Nasae’?
43010037	Nikali mbwe ese haba siindi ohuholaanga emirimo cha Laata, mani mutafukiiriramo;
43010038	nae nikali mbwe ndi ohuchiholaanga, kata nende nimutafukiirira, muhoyeere mani mufukiirire emirimo echo busa, hu munyale ohumanya handi nende ohwomiisa muti, Laata yandimo, handi muti, ese ndi mu Laata.”
43010039	Handi abo bateemaho ohumudiira, nae omweene yaanyala ohwechimula yaatula mu mahono kaabwe yawaawo.
43010040	Yesu yeecha handi yaatula awo yawaawo yaambuha Yorudaani yacha mu sifwo si Yowaana yachaakiramo ohubatisaanga, mani yadoong'a ebweene eyo.
43010041	Handi abandu bandi beecha bamuloondaho beecha yaali; mani baboola bati, “Yowaana haba siyaholaho esilolero syoosi daawe, nae buli siindu si Yowaana yaboolaanga hu muundu wuno syali esyadyeeri syeene.”
43010042	Mani abandu beeyo bangi beecha bamufukiiriramo.
43011001	Bulaanu, omusaacha olaangwa ati Lasaaro, owali yamenya e Bbetani, olukoongo lu Maria nende Marita mwaanang'ina bali bamenyamo yeecha yalwaala.
43011002	Maria wuno, niye owabaha Yesu amafuta ak'esing'aari siingi, handi yabalakasa amakulu kae nende efwiiri lyae, handi niye yi mboochong'ene Lasaaro wuno owali omulwaae.
43011003	Mani bambochong'ene bano bombi, nibo abecha baalakiirisa Yesu nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, oyo yiwaheera alwaala.”
43011004	Nae Yesu niyawulira atyo, yeecha yaboola ati, “Obulwaae buno haba sibuchia hutuliramo ohufwa; bw'oluyaali lwa Nasae, hu Mwaana wa Nasae anyale ohukinisibwa nahwo.”
43011005	Nae bulaanu, Yesu yali yaheera muno ba Marita nende Maria mwaanang'ina alala nende Lasaaro.
43011006	Mani Yesu niyawulira ati Lasaaro mulwaye, yeecha yadoong'a mu sifwo siyalimo esyo hulwa embaka ya endaalo chiindi chibiri.
43011007	Mani lunyuma lw'esyo, yeecha yaboolera abeeki bae ati, “Mulehe hukobole handi mu Buyudaaya.”
43011008	Abeki bae nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Rabbi, Abayudaaya bali nibakiiya ohuhubba amakina, nae ewe ochaayo?”
43011009	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Esideete sisirimo esaa ehumi nende chibiri da? Omuundu yeesi nakeenda esideete, haba siyegumula, olwohuba aba abona obulafu bw'esyaalo sino.
43011010	Nae omuundu yeesi nakeenda mu siro, yegumula olwohuba obulafu haba sibuba nibumulimo.”
43011011	Yesu yalomaloma atyo, mani yamala yababoolera ati, “Lasaaro omwiicha weefwe, akonere endoolo, nae njia ohumusimusa atule mu ndoolo.”
43011012	Nae abeeki bae beecha bamuboolera bati, “Omwaami, mani naaba naakonere endoolo, aba achia ohusiingira.”
