43011013	Nae bulaanu, Yesu yali naalomaloome hu hufwa hwa Lasaaro, nae abo babaasa bati, yali niyeekesa ati, Lasaaro yali nawuluuhaho busa mu ndoolo.
43011014	Mani bulaanu Yesu yeecha yababoolera alafu ati, “Lasaaro afwiire;
43011015	mani hulw'obulayi bw'eng'we, bideekere biyaba mbwe simbeereyo, hu munyale ohufukiirira. Nae mulehe huchie yaali.”
43011016	Nae Tomasi, owali nalaangwa ati Ehwaana, yeecha yaboolera abeeki basye ati, “Mulehe fwesi huchie, mani hufwiire alala nae.”
43011017	Nae bulaanu, Yesu niyeecha eyiri Lasaaro, yakaana ati Lasaaro yali naamalire endaalo chine mu ng'ani.
43011018	Bbetani syali siri aambi nende Yerusaalemu, nisiri aambi wa mayiro kabiri ohukabuhanamo,
43011019	mani Abayudaaya bangi bali bakeniiye Marita nende Maria ohubagumia emyooyo, ohweema hu hufwa hwa mboocho yaabwe oyo.
43011020	Nae Marita niyawulira ati Yesu ali hu ngira yeecha, yaasingira yacha yamubukaanira, nae Maria yaba niyehaale bwihala mu nyumba.
43011021	Marita yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, nooba niwabeereo, mboocho yange haba saaba niyahafwiire.
43011022	Nae kata bulaanu, ese manyire endi, esyo syoosi syochia ohusaba ohutula eyiri Nasae, Nasae aba achia ohuhubeeresa busa.”
43011023	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Mboochoo achia ohusyuuha handi.”
43011024	Nae Marita yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ese manyire mbwe achia ohusiingira handi mumasyuuha hu ludaalo lw'enjakamo.”
43011025	Nae Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Ese niise ohusyuuha nende obulamu; oyo yeesi owufukiiriramo, kata nende naafwa, aba handi achia obubao omulamu,
43011026	handi oyo yeesi oliwo omulamu, handi niyafukiiriramo, haba saaba achia ohufwa. Mani sino osifukiirira?”
43011027	Nae yamuboolera ati, “Eee, Omwaami; fukiirira endi niiwe Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae, oyo ochia ohwiicha mu syaalo.”
43011028	Marita niyamala ohuboola atyo, yacha mani yalaanga Maria mwaanang'ina namumonyesera ati, “Omweekesa nguno ali ano ahulangaanga.”
43011029	Mani Maria niyawulira atyo, yaluuluha yasingira bwaangu, mani yacha eyiri Yesu.
43011030	Nae bulaanu, Yesu yali atoola mu lukoongo olwo, nae yali nasisiiri mu sifwo si Marita yali namubukaaniremo.
43011031	Nae Abayudaaya bali mu nyumba nibali ohugumianga Maria, nibamubona nasiingira bwaangu mani natula erwaanyi, bosi bamuloondaho, nibabaasa bati, yali achia enasiriindwa alirireyo.
43011032	Mani Maria niyeecha yoola mu sifwo si Yesu yalimo mani yamubona, yacha yaakwa mu makulu kae, namuboolera ati, “Omwaami, nooba nobeere noliwo, mboocho yange haba siyahafwiire.”
43011033	Mani Yesu niyamubona naali ohulira muno, handi nende Abayudaaya bali nibeechere nae bosi nibali ohulira, yeecha yawulira obuchuuni bungi muno mu mwooyo, mani yaanyoolera muno;
43011034	mani yeecha yaboola ati, “Yena bweene yimumwaliise?” Bamuboolera bati, “Omwaami, yicha obone.”
43011035	Yesu mani naalira.
43011036	Mani Abayudaaya beecha baboola bati, “Boneho koti luyali niyamuheera!”
43011037	Nae abandi nabo baboolaanga bati, “Mani oyo owaliimbusa emoni ch'omusaacha wali omuwofu, byahamuhayire bitye ohukayirira omusaacha wuno ohufwa?”
43011038	Mani Yesu nasisiiri nende esibeera, yakenda yoola hu siriindwa; syali esiriindwa koti eng'uungu, mani syekalirwaho ekina.
43011039	Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Mutuseyo ekina elyo.” Marita, owali mboochong'ene omusaacha mufu, yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, esiha sino esifundu sichia ohubaao esiingi muno, olwohuba amalire endaalo chine nafwiire.”
43011040	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Haba sihuboolereho endi, nikali mbwe ochia ohufukiirira, ochia ohubona oluyaali lwa Nasae?”
43011041	Mani beecha batusayo ekina. Mani Yesu yeecha yasingisa akulu emoni chae mani yaboola ati, “Laata, hwebasa muno, olwohuba ewe wambulira ohutula hale.
43011042	Ese manyire endi ewe wumbuliranga buli siha, nae mboolere endyo hulw'abandu beemere ano, hu banyale ohufukiirira bati niiwe owanduma.”
43011043	Mani niyali naamalire ohuboola atyo, yeecha yahuumulira mu kono ly'akulu naboola ati, “Lasaaro, tula erwaanyi!”
43011044	Omusaacha mufu oyo yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, amahono kae alala nende amakulu kae nibiboyeebwe nende esibiro, nae obweeni bwae nibufuuniihwe nende engubo. Yesu yeecha yaboolera abandu bali awo ati, “Mumuboolole, mani mumulehe aweo.”
43011045	Mani Abayudaaya bangi, abali nibeechere nende Maria mani abali nibabweene bi Yesu yahola, beecha bamufukiiriramo.
43011046	Nae abandi nabo beecha bacha eyiri Abafalisaayo mani baababoolera bi Yesu yali aholere.
43011047	Mani abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abafalisaayo beecha balaanga babuusa beehasa esiina, mani baboola bati, “Siina syeene sihuba huhole? Olwohuba omusaacha wuno ali ohuhola obulolero obusaabi.
43011048	Nihumuleha yachiiririra busa atyo, buli muundu aba achia ohumufukiiriramo, mani Abaroomu baba bacha ohwiicha batuseete batumaleo alala nende ebifwo by'ebiyembeho byeefwe nende esyaalo sy'efwe syoosi.”
43011049	Nae mulala hu beene abo, olaangwa Kayaafa, owali naahola koti omulaamisi muhuluundu omwaaka okwo, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Abulao esiindu syoosi simumanyireho;
43011050	haba simumanyireho muti silayi yimuli, omuundu mulala ohufwiira abandu, handi muti esyaalo syoosi haba sisihoyeere ohusihirisibwa.”
43011051	Haba siyaboola atyo hulwae busa omweene, nae koti luyali omulaamisi muhuluundu omwaaka, yali yatumbula ati Yesu ahoyeere ohufwiirira esyaalo,
43011052	nae handi haba si hulw'esyaalo syong'ene, nae ohubuusa mu mukaanda mulala abaana ba Nasae abasalaanira ebuteende.
43011053	Mani sakira ohutula hu ludaalo olwo ohwemeeda mu moni Abayudaaya bahola etekeha y'ohwiitiramo Yesu.
43011054	Ohweema hw'esyo, Yesu haba siyanyala ohukeenda mu Bayudaaya alafu, nae yatula awo, mani yaacha mu siko silaangwa mbwe Efuraimu, mu syaalo siri aambi nende esiparara; yiyamenya alala nende abeeki bae.
43011055	Nae bulaanu, esidyaalo sya Paasaka ya Abayudaaya syali siri nduunya, mani abandu bangi bali bachiire e Yerusaalemu ohutula mu byaalo, ohwelabya.
43011056	Bali bakoonyaanga Yesu nibaboolanira abeene-na-beene ni bemeere mu nyumba ya Nasae bati, “Mubaasa mutye? Muti awundi haba siyaheechaho hu sidyaalo huno?”
43011057	Nae bulaanu abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abafalisaayo, bali nibamalire ohutusa omunwa bati omuundu yeesi niyahamanyaho yi Yesu ali, ahoyeere abeekese bamanyeho, banyale ohumudiira.
43012001	Endaalo nichali nichidong'ere chisaasaba ohwoola hu sidyaalo sya Paasaka, Yesu yeecha e Bbetani, yi Lasaaro yi Yesu yasyuusa yaatusa mu bafu, yali yamenya.
43012002	Niyali ebweene eyo, beecha bamudeehera esy'engoloobe; Marita niye owali nahalabaana, nae Lasaaro yali naali mulala hw'abo abali nibehaale hu meesa nende Yesu.
43012003	Maria yeecha yabukula elatiri ndala ey'amafuta k'ebbeyi hoongo muno, ak'enaasi, mani yaakabahira amakulu ka Yesu, handi yamala yaakabalakasa nende efwiiri lyae; mani enyumba yoosi yeecha yechula esiing'aari sy'amafuta ako.
43012004	Nae Yuda Yiskarioti, mulala hu beeki ba Yesu, (oyo owali achia ohumuhoba), yeecha yaboola ati,
43012005	“Lwasiina amafuta kano haba mani sikakusirwemo edinaari emia chidatu mani chakabirwa abamanani?”
43012006	Yaboola sino, ataali mbwe yali achuunirwa muno abamanani, nae olwohuba yali omwiibi busa, mani koti luyali niye omubiihi w'esanduku ly'eseende, yali niyanaliirira ohubukulaanga nayira buli syabiihwaanga mu bweene omwo.
43012007	Nae Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Mulehe abee, mulehe akalindise oludaalo lw'ohusiihwa hwange.
43012008	Abamanani muli nabo endaalo choosi, nae haba simuli naange endaalo choosi daawe.”
43012009	Mani esidiiyiha sihoongo sy'Abayudaaya nisyeecha syamanya siti Yesu yali eyo, beecha beecha yaali, nibateecha hu lwa Yesu yeng'ene, nae bati baboneho busa Lasaaro, yiyali niyasyuusa ohutula mu bafu.
43012010	Mani hulw'esyo, abalaamisi bahuluundu beecha batekeha ohwiita Lasaaro yesi,
43012011	olwohuba hulwohusyuhisibwa yesi, Abayudaaya bangi muno bali bacha ohwekabula mani nibafukiirira mu Yesu.
43012012	Nibwahya muchuli, esidiiyiha sihoongo muno, esyali nisiichire hu sidyaalo esyo, syeecha syawulira siti Yesu yali niyeecha mu Yerusaalemu.
43012013	Mani hulw'esyo, beecha baabukula amasaga k'emisaala ch'eminaasi, mani nibatula nibacha ohumubukaanira, nibehuuma bati, “Hosaana! Ali nende omukisa oyo owiichira mu liita ly'Omwaami, handi Omutuki wa Yisirayiri!”
43012014	Mani Yesu yeecha yanyoola esuhiri njere mani niyeecha nayihalaho; koti lusyandiikwa siti,
43012015	“Otatya daawe, muhaana wa Siyooni; bonaho, omutuki wao mbawo yeecha, niyehaale hu suhuri njere!”
43012016	Abeki bae nabo haba sibamanya bamanya amahulundu k'esiholwa sino mberi; nae Yesu niyeecha yaberesebwa oluyaali, awo niwo yibechera beechulisa hane sino syosi syali syamwandiikwaho, handi syali syamuholerwa.
43012017	Esidiyiha syali nae lu yalangira Lasaaro ohutula mu siriindwa mani yaamusyuhisa ohutula mu bafu, beecha bachaaka ohutusa obujulisi bwebyali nibyaholehana.
43012018	Esifune syakera esidiyiha nisyali nisichiire ohumubukaanira, syali mbwe, bali nibawuliire bati niye owali aholere esyamayia sino.
43012019	Abafalisaayo nabo bulaanu beecha baboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Simuli hubona koti luhutanyala ohuhola esiindu syoosi; boneho, esyaalo syoosi-syoosi simalire ohumulondaho.”
43012020	Nae bulaanu, mu bandu bali nibachiire ohwiinamira Nasae hu sidyaalo esyo, mwalimo Abayonaani bandi bosi.
43012021	Mani sakira nibo abeecha eyiri Filipo, owali natula e Bbetisayida mu Galilaaya, mani bamuboolera bati, “Omuhulundu, fwesi hwekoomba ohubonaho Yesu.”
43012022	Filipo yesi yeecha yaacha yabooleraho Andereya; Mani Andereya yeecha yaacha nende Filipo mani baboolera Yesu batyo.
43012023	Nae Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Esiha simalire ohwoola, Omwaana w'Omuundu aberesebwe oluyaali lwae.
43012024	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri endi, ohutusaho olumwo lw'engaano lukwa lweengira muloba, mani lwamala lwaafwa, ludoong'a busa niluli lwong'ene; nae nilwiicha lwaafwa, lwiicha lwebula ebyaamo biingi muno.
43012025	Oyo yeesi owedahisa obulamu bwae muno, yeecha yabuhaywa, nae oyo yeesi osyuula obulamu bwae ohuba mu syaalo muno, achia ohubwebiihira abufune mu siha sy'obulamu butaakama.
43012026	Omuundu yeesi niyahalaabanira, ahoyeere ohunoonda; mani eyo yoosi yimba niindi, niyo eyicha ohuba nende omuhalaabani wange yesi; omuundu yeesi niyahalaabanira, Laata achia ohumuba oluyaali.
43012027	“Bulaanu buti, omwooyo kwaange kwelalihiriire muno. Mani ndaboole siina syeene? Laata, monie esiha sino? Haba daawe, nae ni hulw'esifune syeene sino sakira njolere hu siha syeene sino.
43012028	Laata, beeresa mani eliita lyaange oluyaali.” Mani ekono lyeecha lyatula Mukulu liti, “Ese malire ohulibeeresa oluyaali, handi njia ohulimeeda oluyaali.”
43012029	Esidiyiha syali nisyeemere aambi awo syeecha syaliwulira mani syaboola siti, lyaduuluha-bwaduuluha busa. Abandi nabo baboola bati, “Malaika niye alomalome nae.”
43012030	Nae Yabakobolamo ati, “Ekono lino liichire hulw'eng'we, nae haba si hulwaange ese.
43012031	Esiha sino sy'ohuheengera omusango esyaalo sino, bulaanu omwimirisi w'esyaalo sino achia ohusukunwa erwaanyi;
43012032	mani ese, ninjia ohukiingwa akulu ohutusibwa hu syaalo huno, njia ohwebuusiraho abandu boosi.”
43012033	Yesu yaboola atyo, ohweekesa efwa yi yali achia ohufwa.
43012034	Nae esidiyiha syeecha syamukobolamo siti, “Efwe hwawulirira hu malako ka Musa huti, Kristo oyo abaawo olubeerera. Naawe onyala otye ohuboola oti, Omwaana w'Omuundu ohoyeere ohukiingwa akulu? Omwaana w'Omuundu wuno niye naanu mweene?”
43012035	Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Omulafu busisiiriho nang'we hulw'esiha sidiidi. Mukeende nimusisiiriho nende obulafu, esiirima sihaye ohubakaanira; oyo yeesi okeendera mu siirima haba saamanya yaaba nachiira.
43012036	Nimusisiiri nende obulafu, mufukiirire mu bulafu, hu mweemeo munyale ohwehola abaana b'obulafu.?” Mani Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma atyo, yawao mani yacha yabekisaho.
43012037	Kata nende niyali naaholere obulolero obuungi muno mu moni chaabwe, nae haba sibamufukiiriramo daawe;
43012038	syali mbwe ohwoola lu mboosi chalomalomwa nende nabbi Yisaaya choolerere abweene chiti: “Omwaami, wiine mweene owanyala ohufukiirira bi hwatuumbula, handi ni wiina oyo yi bunyala bw'Omwaami bwabwihulirwa?”
43012039	Mani sakira sibanyala ohufukiirira daawe. Olwohuba Yisaaya handi yaboola ati,
43012040	“Yawofusa emoni chaabwe, handi yahadaanga emyooyo chaabwe, hu bahaye ohubona nende emoni waabwe handi ohufuumbulira emyooyo chaabwe, mani banyale ohungaluuhanira beeche mbaonie.”
43012041	Yisaaya yaboola atyo, olwohuba yali niyabona oluyaali lwae mani yaanyala ohumulomalomaho atyo.
43012042	Kata katyo, abandu b'obunyala bangi muno, beecha bamufukiiriramo, nae hulw'ohutya Abafalisaayo, haba sibatuumbulaanga batyo, bahaye ohusukunwa erwaanyi wa Sinagoogi:
43012043	olwohuba abo bali badaha muno ohukinisibwa hw'abandu ohuhira ohukinisibwa hwa Nasae.
43012044	Mani Yesu yeecha yahumulira akulu mani yaboola ati, “Oyo yeesi owufukiiriramo, haba saaba afukiirira mu ese syeng'ene, nae aba afukiirira mu oyo owanduma.
43012045	Handi oyo owumbona, aba abona oyo owanduma.
43012046	Ese ndeecha mu syaalo ohuba obulafu, hu bulaanu oyo yeesi owufukiiriramo, atadoong'a naali mu siirima daawe.
43012047	Mani omuundu yeesi nawulira enomanoma yange mani yaahaya ohuyiholeraho, ese haba simuheengera omusango daawe; olwohuba ese haba sindeecha ohuheengera esyaalo omusango daawe, nae ndeecha ohuwonia esyaalo.
43012048	Oyo yeesi owundekaana mani yahaya ohubukaanira enomanoma yange aba yamala ohufuna omuheengi w'emisaango; emboosi cho chiimba nindalomaloma, chiba chicha ohuba omuheengi w'emisaango wae, hu ludaalo lw'enjakamo.
43012049	Olwohuba ese haba sindalomalomaanga hu lw'obunyala bwaange ese omweene daawe; Laata oyo owanduma omweene yamala ohumbeeresa esilagiro sinomanoma, nende emboosi ch'ohulomaloma.
43012050	Handi ese manyire endi, esilagiro syae, nisyo obulamu butaakama. Mani esyo siimba ninomanoma, nomaloma koti lu Laata aba yanyimiriire.”
43013001	Nae bulaanu, esiha sy'esidyaalo nisyali nisisiiri ohuchaaka, Yesu niyeecha yaamanya ati, esiha syae esy'ohuwaao atule mu syaalo sino syolere, koti luyali niyadahana muno nende abandu bae abali nibali mu syaalo muno, yachiiririra ohubadaha atyo, ohwolera elalira hu njakamo.
43013002	Mani nibali bali ohulya esy'engoloobe, Sitaani niyali amalire ohuta mu mwooyo kwa Yuda Yiskarioti, omusyaani wa Simooni, esibaaso sy'ohulya olukwe mu Yesu,
43013003	nae Yesu niyali naamalire ohwomiisa ati, Laatang'ene yali niyamala ohuta mu mahono kae ebiindu byoosi, handi ati yali niyatula eyiri Nasae, haandi yali naachia eyiri Nasae,
43013004	yeecha yaasingira yaatula hu sideru syesy'engoloobe esyo, mani yefwaalulamo engubo chae chohumukulu, mani yamala yeboya etawulo.
43013005	Mani yamala yaachuha amaachi mu lukaraayi, mani yamala yachaaka ohwoosa amakulu k'abeeki, handi nende ohukabalakasira etawulo yiyali niyeboyere.
43013006	Yecha yoola hu Simooni Peetero; nae Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Mache Omwaami, ochia ohwoosa amakulu kange?”
43013007	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Esiindu siindi ohuhola, ewe haba sosimanyire bulaanu, nae lunyuma ochia ohusimanya.”
43013008	Nae Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Ewe haba sochia hunyalaho kata nabudiidi ohwoosa amakulu kange.” Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Mani ese nitahwoosa, oba haba sooli nende obweyaango naange daawe.”
43013009	Nae Simooni Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, mani otoosa amakulu kange kong'ene, nae njose nende amahono kange kosi, alala nende omutwe kwaange kwosi!”
43013010	Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Oyo yeesi owamala ohweyoka, haba sahoyera ohweyoka daawe, ohutusaho aba ahoyera ohweyosa amakulu kong'ene, nae aba ali omunyirifubuli abundu; nae eng'we muli abayoonjo, nae haba si mweesi alala daawe.”
43013011	Olwohuba Yesu yali amanyire oyo owali naachia ohumuhoba; esyo nisyo esyakera yeecha yaboola ati, “Eng'we mweesi, haba simuli abayoonjo.”
43013012	Mani Yesu niyali yahamala ohwoosa amakulu kaabwe, handi niyahamala ohwefwaala engubo chae, nende ohukobola mu sifwo syae, yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mani eng'we mumanyireho esiindu sindahabahola?
43013013	Munanangaanga muti Omweekesa, handi muti Omwaami; muli abweene, olwohuba nilwo lundi ndyo.
43013014	Mani nikali mbwe ese, Omwaami handi Omweekesa weng'we, njosere amakulu k'eng'we, mani eng'we mwesi muhoyeere ohwosanaanga amakulu.
43013015	Olwohuba ese mbabeerese esyohuboneraho, hu eng'we mwesi munyale ohuholaanga koti lumbaholere.
43013016	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, omuhalaabani, haba siyahahira omuhongo wae; kata wamwaanda yesi, haba siyahahira omutuma daawe.
43013017	Mani nimuba nimumanyire bino biti, muli nende ehabi nimwahabihola.
43013018	Nae haba siindi hubaboola endyo mweesi-mweesi; Ese omweene manyire abo bandalobola; siri mbwe ebyandiiko byolerefu bihoyeere ohwosereswa abweene biti, ‘Oyo owalichaanga omugaati kwaange busa, niye handi owufudatiire.’
43013019	Mbaboolera endyo esiha sino, nibitoola ohubaao, hu mbwe nibiicha byabaao, muba munamanyira awo muti niise Oyo.
43013020	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, oyo yeesi obukaanira oyo yeesi yimba nindumire, aba abukaniire ese mweene; handi oyo owumbukaanira, aba abukaanira oyo owanduma.”
43013021	Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma atyo, yeecha yachuunwa mu mwooyo muno, mani yeecha yatumbula ati, “Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, mulala hw'eng'we niye achia ohuhoba.”
43013022	Abeki beecha batingaalanaho abeene-na-beene, nibakanakana oyo mweene yi Yesu yali naboolereho.
43013023	Nae mulala hu beeki bae, oyo yi Yesu yali yaheera muno, yali nayeehere mumbafu wae;
43013024	mani sakira Simooni Peetero yamusakula mani yaboola ati, “Ewe tuboolereho oyo yali ohulomalomaho.”
43013025	Mani niyali nasiyeehere atyo, mu mbafu wa Yesu, yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami mbwe niye naanu?”
43013026	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ni oyo yinja ohusidoonga mubeerese.” Mani sakira niyali naamalire ohudoonga esitole esyo, yeecha yasibeeresa Yuda, omusyaani wa Simooni Yiskarioti.
43013027	Mani lunyuma lw'ohulya esitole esyo, Sitaani yeecha yaamuniina, mani Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Esyo syooli ohuchia ohuhola, sihole bwaangu.”
43013028	Nae bulaanu, awumawo kata mulala hw'abo abali hu meesa, owali amanyireho esyakera Yesu yamuboolera sino.
43013029	Abandi babaasa bati, mbwe olwohuba Yuda koti lu yali nende esanduku ly'eseende, Yesu yali namubooleraanga ati, “Cha okule bihudaha hu lw'esidyaalo”; oba bati, ahoyeere ohuchia ohubeeresaho abamanani esiindu sidiidi.
43013030	Mani sakira, lunyuma lw'ohulya esitole esyo, yasingiraniramo bwaangu ohutula ohuchia erwaanyi; nae syali nisi esiro.
43013031	Niyali naamalire ohutula erwaanyi, Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Esiha sino nisyo si mwaana w'Omuundu achia ohukisibwa muno, handi ni mu mweene oyo nimwo mu Nasae achia ohukinisibwa;
43013032	mani nikali mbwe Nasae achia ohukunisibwa mu mweene oyo, mani Nasae yesi aba achia ohumukinia nabitira mu mweene, handi amukinie bwaangu muno.
43013033	Baana bange, kata katyo, njia ohubaaho nang'we esiha esidiidi muno. Mucha ohungoonya; mani koti lundaboolera Abayudaaya, nilwo lwosi lunja ohubaboolera endi, ‘Eyo yinja ohuchia, haba simunyala ohwichayo.’
43013034	Elako yaaha njia ohubabeeresa, endi mudahaneenge abeene-na-beene; koti busa syesi lumbadahireenge, endi mwesi mudahaneenge mutyo.
43013035	Ohweema hu syeene sino, abandu boosi baba bacha ohumanyira elalira bati hane muli abeeki bange, nimuba nimuli nende ohudahana abeene-na-beene.”
43013036	Nae Simooni Peetero yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, ochia ohuchia yena bweene?” Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Eyo yinja ohuchia, ewe haba sonyala ohunondaho bulaanu buti. Nae ochia ohunondaho lunyuma.”
43013037	Nae Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, lwasiina ese haba siinyala ohuhuloondaho bulaanu buti? Ese njia ohuhufwiira bu fwiira haluuhiri.”
43013038	Yesu yeecha yaboola ati, “Ewe mani ochia ohunyala ohufwiira ese? Huboolera obwadyeeri endi, edaaywa yinaba niyitaholyooha naawe onaba omalire ohundekaana amahabi kadatu amalaamba.
43014001	“Mutaleha emyooyo cheeng'we chanyaasibwa daawe; fukiirire mu Nasae, mufukiirire mw'ese syesi.
43014002	Mu nyumba ya Laata mulimo ebiseenge biingi; nibitahabeere bityo, mani mba ndahababoleere endi njia ohubatekehera esifwo?
43014003	Mani ese ninjia, mani ndabatekehera esifwo, handi mba njia ohwiicha mani mbabukule mbaleete yindi, hubulaanu yimba niindi, mwesi munyale ohubaayo.
43014004	Nae handi mumanyire busa engira yicha eyo yindi ohuchia.”
43014005	Nae Tomasi yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, efwe haba sihumanyire yooli ohuchia; mani hunyala hutye ohumanya engira eyo?”
43014006	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ese niise engira, handi obwadyeeri, handi obulamu; abulao omuundu yeesi onyala ohwiicha eyiri Nasae, natabitiire hweese.
43014007	Muba mwamanya ese, muba mwamanya Laata yesi; esiha syeene sino mumumanyire, handi mumalire ohumubonaho.”
43014008	Nae Filipo yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, tweekeseho Laata, huba hunekuta.”
43014009	Nae Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe Filipo, ese mbereenge busa naawe hulw'embaka ndeeyi yityo, nae kata haba siwuumanyire daawe? Oyo owamala ohumbona, aba yamala ohubona Laata; nae wahanyala ohuboola otye oti, ‘Tweekese busa Laata’?
43014010	Ewe hane haba sofukiirira oti ese ndi mu Laata, handi Laata ali mw'ese? Emboosi chino chimbabooleranga, haba sichiboolanga hu lw'obunyala bwaange ese omweene; nae hulw'obunyala bwa Laata, oyo owamenya mw'ese oba naali ohuholaanga emirimo chae busa.
43014011	Fukiirira echaange oti, ese ndi mu Laata, handi Laata ali mw'ese; ataali awo, mani fukiirira mw'ese hulw'emirimo chino cheene busa.
43014012	“Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, oyo yeesi owufukiiriramo, aba yesi achia ohunyala ohuhola emirimo chino chiindi ohuholaanga; handi kata aba achia ohuholaanga emirimo chihiraho nende echo, olwohuba ese ndi ohuchia eyiri Laata.
43014013	Esiindu syoosi simuba nimuchia ohusaba hulw'eliita lyaange, mba njia ohusihola, hu bulaanu Laata akinisibirwe mu Mwaana;
43014014	nikali mbwe musaba esiindu syoosi mu liita lyaange, njia ohusihola.
43014015	“Nikali mbwe eng'we mundaha, muba mucha ohudiira amalako kange.
43014016	Mani mba njia ohwekweeda Laata, mani aba achia ohubabeeresa Omukeraki wundi, oba achia ohubechaanga nang'we olubeerera,
43014017	oyo oli Omwooyo kw'obwadyeeri, oyo yi syaalo sitanyala ohubukaanira, olwohuba haba sisinyala humubona, kata nende ohumumanya daawe; eng'we mumumanyire, olwohuba yamenya naang'we, handi achia ohuba mw'eng'we.
43014018	“Ese haba siinjia ohubaleha awo endyo busa; nae njia ohwiicha yimuli.
43014019	Nae kata katyo, hulw'esiha sidiidi muno, handi esyaalo sisichia humbonaho daawe, nae eng'we mucha ohumbona; mani olwohuba ese nduwo omulamu, mwesi mucha ohubaao abalamu.
43014020	Hu ludaalo olwo, nihwo humucha ohumanyira elalira muti hane ese ndi mu Laata, handi eng'we muli mw'ese, handi ese syesi ndi mw'eng'we.
43014021	Oyo yeesi odiira amalako kange, mani yakaholeraho, oyo niye oba niyandaha; handi oyo owundaha, aba achia ohudahwa nende Laata, handi syesi mba njia ohumudaha nende ohumubonehera.”
43014022	Nae Yuda (otaali Yiskarioti) yeecha yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, siba sitye siti, ewe ochia ohutubonehera, nae haba sobonehera esyaalo?”
43014023	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Omuundu yeesi nikali mbwe yandaha, aba achia ohuloonda emboosi change, mani Laata aba achia ohumudaha, mani huba hucha ohwiicha yali, mani humenye nae.
43014024	Oyo yeesi otaandaha, haba saadiira emboosi change daawe; handi engeraka yange yowulira yino, haba siyaange daawe, nae ya Laata, oyo owanduma.
43014025	“Mbalomalomeere emboosi chino nisisiiri nang'we.
43014026	Nae Omukeraki oyo, Omwooyo Mwolerefu, yi Laata achia ohutuma yeecha mu liita lyaange, achia ohubeekesa ebiindu byoosi, nende ohubechulisa ebiindu byoosi bindababooleraanga.
43014027	Mbaleha mu mireembe; mbabeeresa emireembe change; simbabeeresa emireembe koti lu syaalo siberesaanga daawe. Mutaleha emyooyo cheeng'we chachuunisibwa daawe, kata mutachireha chaatya daawe.
43014028	Mumbuliire nimbaboolera endi, ‘Ese mbwao, handi njia ohukobola njiche yimuli.’ Nimundahireenge, mani muba musangaalire, olwohuba njia eyiri Laata; olwohuba Laata yaahira muno.
43014029	Mani mbawo mbaboleere nibitaholehana, mani nibiicha byaholehana, munyale ohufukiirira.
43014030	Ese haba sisiicha ohulomalomaanga nang'we ebiindu biingi muno, olwohuba omutuki w'esyaalo sino mbawo yeecha. Nae oyo abula nende obunyala hw'ese daawe;
43014031	nae ese hola koti lu Laata aba yandagiire, hu syaalo syeemeo simanye siti, ese ndaha Laata. Musiingire, mulehe huweeo bwaangu.
43015001	“Ese ndi omutuli kweene, nae Laata niye omulimi.
43015002	Nabuli saga lyaange litaamaho esyaamo, alitusaho, handi nabuli saga lyaamaho ebyaamo, alihaliirira, hulinyale ohwaamaho ebyaamo biingi.
43015003	Eng'we mwamala ohulabisibwa nende emboosi chindabalomalomeraanga.
43015004	Mundoong'emo, syesi njia ohubadoong'amo. Koti busa lu saga litahanyala ohwaama esyaamo syoosi lyong'ene, ohwoola luliba nilidoong'ere hu mutuli kweene, kata mwesi simunyala ohuhola mutyo, nimutandoong'eremo.
43015005	Ese nise omutuli kweene, eng'we muli busa amasaga kange. Oyo yeesi owundoong'amo, mani syesi ndamudoong'amo, oyo niye onyala ohwaamaho ebyaamo biingi muno, olwohuba ataali ese mweene, eng'we haba sisiriwo esiindu syoosi simunyala ohuhola.
43015006	Omuundu yeesi natandoong'amo, aba achia ohulakaha-bulakaha koti esaga ly'omusaala mani amala yaalala busa; handi amasaga keecha kabuuswa alala, kasukunwa mu muliro, mani kamala kasaambwa.
43015007	Nimundoong'amo busa, mani emboosi change chosi cheecha chabahayiramo, musabeenge esiindu syoosi simuba nimwekoomba, mani siba sichia ohubaholerwa sityo.
43015008	Sino nisyo esikinia Laata, nimwaama ebyaamo biingi muno, handi mutyo nilwo lumuba mucha ohweekesa muti muli abeeki bange.
43015009	Koti busa lu Laata yali niyandaha, lutyo nilwo syesi lumbadahireenge; mundoong'enge hu hudahana hwaange ohwo.
43015010	Nimudiira amalako kange, muba mucha ohwebaanda mu hudahana hwange, koti busa lu syesi ndomiisa amalako ka Laata, mani ndadoong'a mu hudahana hwae.
43015011	Mbalomalomeere ebiindu bino endyo, hu esangaalo lyaange linyale ohubabaamo, handi hu sangaalo ly'eng'we linyale ohuba eliichufu.
43015012	“Elako lyaange lyeene nilyo lino mbwe, mudahaneenge abeene-na-beene, koti lu syesi mbadahireenge.
43015013	Abulao omuundu yeesi oli nende ohudahana huhira huno mbwe, omuundu anyala ohufwiira abeecha bae busa.
43015014	Eng'we muba abeecha bange nimuhola bimba nimbalagiire.
43015015	Ese haba sisibalaanga busa abahalaabani, olwohuba omuhalaabani haba saamanya bi mweneengo wae byaaba naahola; nae ese mbalaangire abeecha, olwohuba ebyo byoosi bindawulira ohutula hu Laata, ndabeekesa mwabimanya.
43015016	Eng'we haba sining'we abandoola daawe, nae ese niise owabadoola handi ndabalobola endi muche mwaame ebyaamo, handi endi ebyaamo by'eng'we bihoyeere ohuba ebyomiifu; hu bulaanu, esiindu syoosi simuba nimuchia ohusaba Laata mu liita lyaange, anyale ohusibabeeresa.
43015017	Mbalagira ohudahanaanga abeene-na-beene.
43015018	“Esyaalo nisibasyuula, manyeenge busa muti, esyo syamala ohusyuula ese hale nisitoola ohubasyuula.
43015019	Muba muli abohusyaalo huno, esyaalo sino siba syahabeere sidaha abaasyo; nae olwohuba mbwe eng'we haba simuli abohusyaalo sino, handi ese ndabadoola ohubatusa hu syaalo sino, mani sakira esyaalo syabasyuula.
43015020	Mwichuliseho emboosi yindababooleraho endi, ‘Omuhalaabani haba saahira omuliindi wae.’ Nibaboneresa ese, mani mwesi bacha ohubaboneresa; nibadiira emboosi change, baba bacha ohudiira echeeng'we chosi.
43015021	Nae bacha ohubahola bino byoosi hu lwaange, olwohuba abo haba sibamanyire oyo owanduma daawe.
43015022	Nimba niteecha ndabalomalomera, baba nibataali nende esibi; nae bulaanu haba sibali nende esy'huwosa hulw'ebibi byaabwe.
43015023	Oyo yeesi owusyuula, aba asyuula nende Laata yesi.
43015024	Nimba nitabaholeramo emirimo chi muundu yeesi yabaholera hoomo, haba sibahabeere nende esibi; nae bulaanu bamala ohubibona, handi baatusyuula fwembi, ese nende Laata.
43015025	Sino syali esyohwoseresa abweene emboosi chandiikwa mu malako kaabwe chiti, ‘Baasyuula abula esifune.’
43015026	Nae Omukeraki niyaheeche, oyo yinja ohubatumira ohutula eyiri Laata, oyo handi oli Omwooyo w'obwadyeeri, otulira mu Laata, achia ohutusa obujulisi bwaange;
43015027	handi eng'we mwesi muli abajulisi bange, olwohuba mubeere naange ohutula hu njaako.
43016001	“Mboolere bino byoosi endi mbakayire ohukobola enyuma.
43016002	Bacha ohubasukuna ohutula mu Sinagoogi enyiingi; sy'adyeeri, esiha sichia ohwoola, si oyo yeesi obeeta achia ohubaasaanga ati ali ohuhalaabanira Nasae.
43016003	Handi bacha ohuholaanga sino olwohuba kata bataamanya Laata, kata nende ese mweene.
43016004	Nae ese mbaboleere ebiindu bino, endi mani esiha syaabwe nisyoola, munyale ohwichulisa muti ndamala ohubalomalomaho yi muli. “Ese sindababooleraho ebiindu bino mumengisania, olwohuba ndali sisiiri naang'we alala.
43016005	Nae ese bulaanu ndi ohuchia eyiri oyo owanduma; nae kata abulao mulala hw'eng'we owundeebaho ati, ‘Ni yena bweene yooli ohuchia?’
43016006	Nae olwohuba ese mbaboleere ebiindu bino, emyooyo cheeng'we chimalire ohwiichula ohwelalihirira.
43016007	Kata katyo ese mbaboolera busa obwadyeeri buno: ni hulw'obulayi bw'eng'we nimbwaao, olwohuba ese nitawaao, Omukeraki oyo haba saaba achia ohwiicha yimuli daawe.
43016008	Mani naachia ohwiicha, achia ohuhahasa esyaalo, hu bidiira hu sibi nende obuluungifu alala nende eheenga ye misaango:
43016009	ohweema hu sibi, olwohuba abo haba sibafukiirira mw'ese;
43016010	ohweema hu bulungifu, olwohuba ese mbano njia eyiri Laata, mani haba simuchia humbonaho handi;
43016011	ohweema hu heenga y'emisaango, olwohuba omutuki w'esyaalo sino, yamala ohuheengerwa omusango.
43016012	“Ese sisiiri busa nende ebiindu biingi muno ebyohubaboolera, nae eng'we haba simunyala ohubyesimiirisira bulaanu buti daawe.
43016013	Mani Omwooyo w'obwadyeeri naachia ohwiicha, achia ohukera mumanye obwadyeeri bwoosi koti lu bwaaka; olwohuba oyo haba saachia ohulomalomaanga hu lw'obunyala bwae omweene, nae buli syaacha ohuwuliraanga nisyo syaacha ohulomalomaanga, nabo achia ohubatuumbuliraanga ebiindu biba nibicha ohubaao.
43016014	Oyo achia ohunginia, olwohuba achia ohubukulaanga ebyaange naamala abitumbulira eng'we.
43016015	Ebyo byoosi bi Laata ali nabyo, byaange; mani sakira ese mboolere endi, oyo achia ohubukulaanga ebyaange mani amala abitumbulira eng'we.
43016016	“Esiha sidiidi muno, nihaba simuchia ohumbonaho; handi esiha sidiidi muno, nihaandi mucha ohumbona.”
43016017	Abeki bae bandi bachaaka ohuboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Siina syeene sino syali ohutubooleraanga efwe ati, ‘Esiha sidiidi muno, nihaba simuchia ohumbonaho, handi ati, esiha sidiidi, nihaandi mucha ohumbona’; handi ati, ‘olwohuba ese njia eyiri Laata’?”
43016018	Beecha handi baboola bati, “Yekesa siina syeene naboola mbwe ati, ‘esiha sidiidi muno’? Efwe haba sihumanyireho syaaba niyeekesa daawe.”
43016019	Yesu yamanya busa ati bali nibadaha ohumuteeba omweene; mani yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mbwe sino nisyo simuli ohuteebanaanga abeene-na-beene, simbeere ninjekesa nimboolere endi, ‘Esiha sidiidi muno, nihaandi simuchia ohumbonaho, nihaandi endi esiha sidiidi muno, nimuchia ohumbona’?
43016020	Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, eng'we mucha ohuchereenjesa handi ohwelira, nae esyaalo sichia ohusangaala; eng'we mucha ohwewnamira, nae ohwewunamira hw'eng'we hucha ohwehola esangaalo.
43016021	Omuhasi naaba naali ohulumwa aba nende ohwewunamira, olwohuba esiha syae siba simalire ohwoola; nae naaba naamalire ohwetusaho omwaana, haba saaba nasichulisa obululuma obwo, hulwa esangaalo mbwe omwaana aba yebuulwe mu syaalo muno.
43016022	Mani sakira muli abelalihirifu esiha sino, nae ese njia ohubabonaho handi mani emyooyo cheeng'we chisangaale, mani abulao omuundu yeesi ochia ohunyala ohubatusaho esangaalo ly'eng'we elyo.
43016023	Hu ludaalo olwo, simuchia ohusabaho esiindu syoosi. Mbaboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, nimuba nimunasabanga Laata esiindu syoosi, aba achia ohubabeeresaanga mu liita lyaange.
43016024	Abweene ano, eng'we haba simusabaangaho esiindu syoosi mu liita lyaange; sabeenge, mani muba mucha ohunyoola, hu sangaalo ly'eng'we lyemeo libe eliichufu.
43016025	“Ese mbawo mbalomalomeere bino mu ngaado busa; nae esiha siicha ohwoola, ese handi nitachia ohubalomalomeraanga mu ngaado, nae mbalomalomere tiiri busa ebidiira hu Laata.
43016026	Hu ludaalo olwo, eng'we mucha ohusabaanga mu liita lyaange; handi ese haba siindi hubabooleraanga endi njia ohubasabiraanga Laata daawe;
43016027	olwohuba Laata mweene abadaha muno, olwohuba eng'we mwesi mwaandahireenge, handi mwamala ohufukiirira muti ese ndeecha nindula eyiri Laata.
43016028	Ese ndeecha nindula eyiri Laata, mani ndamala ohwiicha mu syaalo muno; nae handi ese mbano ndi ohuleha esyaalo handi ndi ohuchia eyiri Laata.”
43016029	Abeki bae beecha baboola bati, “A-ha, mbawo bulaanu oli ohulomaloma tiiri, abulao olukaado lwoosi daawe!
43016030	Bulaanu mbawo hwahamanya huti hane omanyire ebiindu byoosi, handi huti abulao omuundu yeesi ohoyeere ohuhuteebaho esiindu syoosi daawe; hulwa sino syeene, efwe bulaanu hufukiirira huti hane weecha notula eyiri Nasae mweene.”
43016031	Yesu yabakobolamo ati, “Muti mani bulaanu mufukiirira?
43016032	Esiha siri aambi ohwoola, nihane mbawo simalire ohwoola, nimuchia ohusalaana, buli muundu naachia enaango wae, mani mundehe syeng'ene busa; nae haba ese siindi syeng'ene daawe, olwohuba Laata ali naange esiha syoosi.
43016033	Ese mbaboleere sino, endi mw'ese omweene mulimo emireembe. Mu syaalo mulimo obunyaahani; nae eng'we mugumeenge, olwohuba ese ndamala ohuyiingira esyaalo.”
43017001	Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma emboosi chino, yasingisa obweeni bwae akulu Mukulu mani yaboola ati, “Laata, esiha mbano syahoola; mani fumia Omwaana wao wuno, hu mwaana wao yesi yemewo akinie ewe,
43017002	ohweema koti ewe wamala ohumubeeresa amaani kahira ak'abandu boosi, ohunyala ohukaba abo boosi bawamubeeresa obulamu butaakama.
43017003	Nihaandi buno nibwo obulamu butaakama, mbwe bahumanye ewe Nasae w'adyeeri weng'ene, nende Yesu Kristo yi ewe mweene watuma.
43017004	Ese ndamala ohuhukinia hu syaalo huno, koti lundanyala ohumaliirisa bulai bweene omulimo ku wambeeresa ohukuhola;
43017005	mani bulaanu buti, Laata, fumia ese muno mu moni wao nende ohukinia hundali nahwo niindi alala naawe esyaalo nisitaloongwa.
43017006	“Ese ndamala ohutuumbula eliita lyao eyiri abandu bawambeeresa ohutusa mu syaalo; abali bao beene, mani naawe wamala wabamberesa, mani bamala badiira emboosi chao muno.
43017007	Bulaanu bamalire ohumanya bati buli siindi syoosi siwambeeresa syali situla yooli;
43017008	olwohuba ese ndamala ohubabeeresa emboosi choosi chiwambeeresa, mani bamala baachakaanira mani bulaanu bamanyire mu bwadyeeri bweene bati, ndeecha nindula yooli; handi bamalire ohufukiirira bati, niiwe owanduma.
43017009	Ese mbasabira; Haba siindi husabira esyaalo, nae ndi ohusabira abo ba wambeeresa, olwohuba bange nibo;
43017010	abange boosi nabao, handi abao nabaange, mani ese nginisirwa mu beene abo.
43017011	Nae bulaanu ese haba sisisiiri mu syaalo daawe, nabo bali mu syaalo muno, nae ese ndi ohwiicha yooli. Laata Mwolerefu, baliindire mu liita lyao, liwambeeresa omweene, beemeo banyale ohuba silala, koti busa lw'efwe huli silala.
43017012	Nindali nisisiiri ninabo, ndali ndabaliindira alala mu liita lyao, liwali wambeeresa omweene; ndababudaa-buda, mani abulao kata mulala owakota daawe, ohutusaho omwaana w'ohukota oyo yeng'ene, hu byandiiko byolerefu byolerere abweene.
43017013	Nae bulaanu ese ndi ohwiicha yooli; nae ebiindu bino mbano mbilomalomera mu syaalo muno, endi hu sangaalo lyaange lyemeo liboolereremo mu bwiichufu.
43017014	Ese malire ohubabeeresa emboosi chao cheene; mani esyaalo syamala ohubasyuula olwohuba haba sibasisiiri abohusyaalo huno daawe, koti busa lu ese mweene taali owohusyaalo huno.
43017015	Ese haba siindi husaba endi ewe wiiche obatuse mu syaalo muno, nae endi ewe mweene obakayirire ohubatusa mu mahono k'omubi oyo.
43017016	Abandu bano haba sibali abohusyaalo huno daawe, koti busa syesi lu taali owohusyaalo huno.
43017017	Balabisirye mu bwadyeeri bweene; olwohuba emboosi chao nicho obwadyeeri bweene.
43017018	Koti busa ewe weecha wanduma ohwiicha mu syaalo muno, mani syesi mbawo mbatumire bache mu syaalo.
43017019	Mani hulwaabwe, ese mbawo ndeyosa, hu bosi beemeo beeyose mu bwadyeeri bweene.
43017020	“Ese haba siindi ohusabira busa bano bong'ene daawe, nae sabira nende abo abafukiiririra mw'ese ohweema hu mboosi chabano,
43017021	endi abo boosi bahoyeere babe silala; koti busa lu ewe Laata, oli mw'ese, handi ese ndaaba mw'ewe, endi abo bosi banyale ohuba mw'efwe, hu bulaanu esyaalo syeemeo sifukiirire siti ewe niiwe owanduma.
43017022	Ohukinia hu wabeeresa ese, syesi ndamala ndaababeeresa, hu beemeo banyale ohuba silala koti busa lw'efwe beene huli silala,
43017023	ese nimbalimo, nae ewe nooli mw'ese, hu beemeo banyale ohwehola esiindu silala simaliirifu, hu bulaanu esyaalo syeemeo simanye siti hane ni ewe mweene owanduma handi wachiiririra ohubadaha koti busa lwobeere niwundaha.
43017024	Laata, ese ndekoomba endi abo bawambeeresa bosi, banyale ohuba alala naange eyo ninjia ohuba, banyale ohunyoola ohukinisibwa hwange hu wamala ohumbeeresa muhundaha hwao ohwo ohwaliwo hu njaako ye syaalo.
43017025	Eee, Laata mulungifu, esyaalo sino haba sisyahumanyaho daawe, nae ese ndahumanya hale; handi ewe mweene omanyire busa oti ni neewe omweene owatuma ese.
43017026	Ese ndakera eliita lyao lyabamanyihanamo, handi njia busa ohukera nilimanyihana lityo, hu hudahana huno huwandahiramo, hunyale ohubabaamo bosi, handi syesi mbabeemo.”
43018001	Yesu niyamala ohulomaloma emboosi chino, yasingira yawaawo nende abeeki bae baacha bahalakania ehoondo lilaangwa liti Kidurooni eyali omukunda ku mweene alala nende abeeki bae beecha baacha bengiramo.
43018002	Nae bulaanu Yuda, oyo owamuhoba, yesi hane yali niyamanya esifwo esyo; olwohuba Yesu yali yanala buli siha ohubukaananiraanga ebweene eyo buli siha.
43018003	Mani sakira Yuda, niyeecha yafuna omukanda kw'abamaye alala nende abahuluundu bandi ohutula mu balaamisi bahuluundu alala nende Abafalisaayo, beecha baabalondaho ebweene eyo nibakiingire amataara alala nende ebikeenga byaaduha nende ebilwaaniro.
43018004	Nae Yesu koti luyali namanyire ebiindu byoosi ebyali bicha ohumukwaaho, yeecha yaasingira yaacha mu moni yi bali bali, mani yababoolera ati, “Ni wiina mweene yimuli ohukoonya?”
43018005	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Yesu Omunasareeti.” Nae Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Nise oyo.” Nae Yuda wamuhoba, yali niyeemere alala nabo.
43018006	Nae Yesu niyababoolera ati, “Nise oyo,” beseenda enyuma mani bamala baakwa aasi.
43018007	Handi Yesu yeecha yabateeba ati, “Ni wiina mweene yimuli ohukoonya?” Nabo baboola bati, “Yesu Omunasareeti.”
43018008	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ese mbaboleere endi nise oyo; mani nimuli ohukoonya ese, mulehe abasaacha bano baweeo.”
43018009	Yesu yaboola atyo, ohwoseresa abweene emboosi chiyali naalomaloomeho naboola ati, “Hwaabo bawambeeresa, haba sindakosaho kata mulala daawe.”
43018010	Mani sakira Simooni Peetero, koti luyali ali nende olugaanga, yeecha yaalusobolayo, mani yaatema omuwaambe w'omulaamisi muhunuufu, mani yaamumalaho ohutwi hw'omuhono muluungi. Eliita ly'omuyiike oyo lyali mbwe Malukusi.
43018011	Nae Yesu yeecha yaboolera Peetero ati, “Kalusa olugaanga lwao mu silaalo syalwo; oti ese haba siinjia ohung'wa esikoombe si Laata yambereese?”
43018012	Mani sakira omukanda kw'abamaye alala nende bakabuteeni baabwe alala nende abahongo b'Abayudaaya beecha baakwa hu Yesu, mani bamala bamuboya.
43018013	Bataangira ohumuyira eyiri Anasi; olwohuba Anasi oyo yali muhweng'ene Kayaafa, owali naahola koti omulaamisi muhunuufu omwaaka okwo.
43018014	Yali Kayaafa owali niyakerakira Abayudaaya ati, syali esilai muno omuundu mulala ohufwiira abandu boosi.
43018015	Nae Simooni Peetero yeecha yaloonda hu Yesu, handi nende omweeki wundi yesi atyo. Koti lu mweeki wuno yali yamanyihana nende omulaamisi muhunuufu, yeecha yengira mu lwanyi lw'omulaamisi muhunuufu oyo alala nende Yesu,
43018016	nae Peetero yadong'era erwaanyi hu siruwa busa. Mani omweeki wundi wula, owali yamanyihana nende omulaamisi muhunuufu, yeecha yaatula yaacha erwaanyi mani yaalomalomaho nende omuhalaabani muhaana wali naliindire esiruwa, mani yaanyala ohwiingisa Peetero yesi mukati.
43018017	Omuhalaabani muhaana wali naliindire esiruwa yeecha yaboolera Peetero ati, “Ewe wesi haba sooli mulala hu beeki b'omusaacha wuno?” Nae yaboola ati, “Haba daawe.”
43018018	Nae bulaanu, abahalaabani alala nende abahongo bali nibabwaanire omuliro kw'amaanda, koti lu mboo yaliho, mani nibeemere nibali ohwebalakasaanga; Peetero yesi yali ali nabo, niyeemere naali ohwebalakasanga.
43018019	Omulaamisi muhunuufu yeecha yachaaka ohuteeba Yesu ebidiira hu beeki bae alala nende enjekesa yae.
43018020	Yesu yeecha yamukobolamo ati, “Ese nomalomereenge esyaalo tiiri; Ndamenya ninjekesaanga mu Sinagoogi chikabuhaane, alala nende mu nyumba ya Nasae, yi Bayudaaya boosi bebusiraanga alala; abulao esiindu syoosi sinomanomaanga bweekisi.
43018021	Nae lwasiina ewe oli ohudeeba otyo? Teeba abo abanyala ohumbuliraanga, bimba nindababooleraanga; bamanyire muno bi ndaboolanga.”
43018022	Yesu niyamala ohuboola atyo, mulala hu bahoongo owali niyeemere aambi nae yapaama Yesu oluyi naboola ati, “Eyo niyo engeri yokoboleramo mu mulaamisi muhunuufu?”
43018023	Nae Yesu yamukobolamo ati, “Nikali mbwe ese nomaloome bubi, tusa obujulisi bw'obubi obwo; nae nikali mbwe nomaloome bulai, lwasiina wumbaama otyo?”
43018024	Bulaanu Anasi yeecha yayira Yesu eyiri Kayaafa owali omulaamisi muhunuufu.
43018025	Nae bulaanu, Simooni Peetero yali niyeemere busa naali ohwebalakasaanga, beecha bamuboolera bati, “Mani ewe wesi haba sooli mulala hu beeki bae?” Nae yeecha yekaana muno mani yamala yaboola ati, “Haba daawe.”
43018026	Nae mulala nu bahalaabani b'omulaamisi muhunuufu, owali omunaluya w'omusaacha yi Peetero yatemaho ohutwi yeecha yateeba ati, “Mani ese haba sihubweeneho mu mukuunda kula nooli nae?”
43018027	Peetero handi yeecha yaasikaana muno; mani abweene-na-bweene awo, ni edaaywa yiholyooha.
43018028	Bulaanu beecha bayerekesa Yesu ohumutusa mu daala lya Kayaafa ohumuyira mu sipaapi sy'emibayo silaangwa siti “Praetorium”. Bwali echuli mu mabweeri-bweeri. Mani Abayudaaya beene haba sibengiramo, nibatadaha ohuhalaka omusiiro kw'ohwelabya, hu banyale ohulya esidyaalo sya Paasaka.
43018029	Mani Pilaato yeecha yaatula yacha yibali mani yaboola ati, “Sifune siina syeene simuwabira omusaacha wuno?”
43018030	Nabo bamukobolamo bati, “Nikali mbwe omusaacha wuno haba simuholi webibi, haba sihuba humuleetere eno.”
43018031	Nae Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Eng'we mumubukulu mumuyire mani mumuwosesere mu malako k'eng'we abeene.” Nae Abayudaaya beecha bamuboolera bati, “Haba sisifukiirirwa efwe ohwiita omuundu yeesi.”
43018032	Sino syali syoseresa abweene emboosi chi Yesu yali nalomaloome ohweekesa efwa yiyali achia ohufwa.
43018033	Bulaanu, Pilaato yeecha handi mani yengira mu “Praetorium” mani yalaanga Yesu, mani yamuboolera ati, “Mani ewe oli omutuki w'Abayudaaya?”
43018034	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ewe oli ohuboola otyo hulwao busa, kose abandu bandi nibo abahuboleere busa ebindiiraho?”
43018035	Nae Pilaato yakobolamo ati, “Mani ese ndi Omuyudaaya? Esyaalo syao syeene alala nende abalaamisi bahuluundu nibo abahundeteere ano; mani oholere siina syeene?”
43018036	Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Obutuki bwaange haba sibw'ohusyaalo huno daawe; obutuki bwaange buba nibuli obw'ohusyaalo huno, abahalaabani bange baba balwaanire, bati haye ohuyirwa mu mahono k'Abayudaaya; nae obutuki bwaange haba sibwohusyaalo huno daawe.”
43018037	Nae Pilaato yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Oti mani oli omutuki?” Nae Yesu yakobolamo ati, “Ewe oli ohuboola oti ese ndi omutuki. Sino nisyo sindeebulirwa, mani ni hulw'esyeene sino nilwo lundeechera hu syaalo, ohutusa obujulisi budiira hubwadyeeri. Buli muundu yeesi okwiira obwadyeeri, awulira ekono lyaange.”
43018038	Nae Pilaato yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Obwadyeeri nisyo siina syeene?” Pilaato niyamala ohulomaloma atyo, yeecha yaatula yaacha erwaanyi eyiri Abayudaaya, mani yababoolera ati, “Ese haba siindi humunyoolamo esifune syoosi.
43018039	Nae eng'we muli nende emiduunga cheeng'we echiboola chiti ese hoyeere ohubalehuuliraanga omusaacha mulala hu sidyaalo sya Paasaka; mani mwahaanganya ndabalehuulira omutuki w'Abayudaaya wuno, kose?”
43018040	Nabo beecha bayokerera akulu handi bati, “Wuno musaacha haba, nae fwaana Bbarabba!” Nae bulaanu Bbarabba yali omunyaka.
43019001	Bulaanu, Pilaato yeecha yabukula Yesu yamala yaamuyira bamunaale ehoba.
43019002	Handi abamaye beecha baaluha engata ya amawa, mani bamala bafwaasa hu mutwe, handi bamala bamufwasa mu ngubo ch'obutuki;
43019003	bachaaka ohwichanga yaali nibaboola bati, “Awo, omutuki w'Abayudaaya, yogaho!” handi nibamala nibamupaama.
43019004	Handi Pilaato yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, mani yababoolera ati, “Mani mubone, mbawo ndi ohumutusa mbadiise, hu mumanye muti ese haba siinyalire ohumubonaho omusango kwoosi.”
43019005	Mani Yesu yeecha yaatula erwaanyi, niyefwaalire hu mutwe engata ya amawa alala nende engubo chobutuki. Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Omusaacha nguyo, mumuboneho!”
43019006	Mani nae abalaamisi bahuluundu alala nende abahongo nibamubonaho, baayuhira akulu nibaboola bati, “Mumuhomerere, mumuhomere!” Nae Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mumubukule abeene mani muche mumuhomerere, olwohuba ese haba simubonaho omusango kwoosi daawe.”
43019007	Nae Abayudaaya beecha bamukobolamo bati, “Efwe huli nende amalako keefwe, nae mu malako keefwe ako omusaacha oyo ahoyeere ohufwa, olwohuba omweene yehola ohuba Omwaana wa Nasae.”
43019008	Mani Pilaato niyawulira emboosi chino, yemeeda ohutya muno;
43019009	handi yaacha yengira mu sipaapi esyo, mani yaboolera Yesu ati, “Ewe otula yena bweene?” Nae Yesu haba siyamukobolamo daawe.
43019010	Mani Pilaato yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe hane haba sochia hulomaloma naange? Ewe haba somanyire oti ese ndi nende obunyala bw'ohuhulehuula, handi nende obunyala bw'ohuhuhomerera?”
43019011	Bulaanu Yesu yeecha yamukobolamo ati, “Ewe haba siwahabeere nende obunyala hw'ese nikali mbwe sibwahubeereswa ohutula akulu; mani sakira oyo ohundeteere ali nende esibi sihiramo.”
43019012	Ohweema hu sino, Pilaato yeecha yakoonya engira yaanyala yalehuuliramo Yesu, nae Abayudaaya bemeeda ohwayuhira akulu nibaboola bati, “Ewe niwichuhana walehuula omusaacha wuno, haba sochia hunyala ohuba omwiicha wa Kaisaali; olwohuba oyo yeesi owelaanga ohuba omutuki aba yeteere muhuyingania Kaisaali.”
43019013	Handi mani Pilaato niyeecha yawulira emboosi chino, yeecha yatusa Yesu erwaanyi, mani yamala yehala hu sisaala siheengi sy'emisaango, mu sifwo silaangwa siti, Olukirangira, nae mu Luyibbulaniya bati, Gabbata.
43019014	Nae bulaanu oludaalo olwo lwali Olwohwetekeheraho Paasaka; chali aambi esaa chisaasaba chesideete. Pilaato yeecha yaboolera Abayudaaya ati, “Mbao muboneho omutuki weng'we nguyo!”
43019015	Nabo bemeeda busa ohwayuhira akulu nibaboola bati, “Mumumaleo, mumumaleo, mumuhomerere busa!” Nae Pilaato yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese njie homerere omutuki weng'we endye?” Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu beecha bakobolamo bati, “Efwe hubula omutuki wundi ohutusaho Kaisaali.”
43019016	Mani Pilaato yeecha yabukula Yesu mani yamala yaamudiisa Abayudaaya bache bamuhomerere.
43019017	Mani beecha baabukula Yesu, mani yamala yaatula erwaanyi omweene nakiingire omusalabba kwae, naacha mu sifwo silaangwa mbwe esifwo sy'esiyaanga, esilaangwa mu Luyibbulaniya siti, Gologoosa.
43019018	Ebweene eyo niyo yibeecha bamuhomerera, handi alala nae beecha bahomerera abandi babiri, mulala naali hu buli luwaande, nae Yesu naali akati.
43019019	Pilaato handi yandiika esipaande sy'emboosi mani yaasita emutwe w'omusalabba; chali chisoma chiti, “Yesu Omunasareeti, omutuki w'Abayudaaya.”
43019020	Abayudaaya bangi banyala ohusomaho esipaande sino, olwohuba esifwo si Yesu yahomererwamo syali aambi nende esiko sihuluundu; handi syali syandiikwa mu Luyibbulaniya, mu Lulatini, nende mu Luyonaani.
43019021	Nae abalaamisi bahuluundu b'Abayudaaya bulaanu beecha baboolera Pilaato bati, “Otaandiika oti, ‘Omutuki w'Abayudaaya daawe,’ nae oti, ‘Omusaacha wabolaanga ati, ese ndi omutuki w'Abayudaaya.’ ”
43019022	Nae Pilaato yakobolamo ati, “Esyo siimba ninyandiikire sidoong'a busa sityo.”
43019023	Mani abamaye nibali nibamalire ohuhomerera Yesu, beecha baabukula ebyefwalo byae alala mani babikabulamo ebituundu bine, buli silala syaaba esy'owamae mulala; alala nende ekaanju lye lyosi. Nae ekaanju lyae lyali libulaho obufumbe bwoosi, nae lyanabwa busa lulala ohutulira elalira akulu ohwolera elalira aasi;
43019024	Bulaanu beecha bachaaka ohuboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Hulehe ohulitandula, nae hulyubbire busa eha, hubone yiriba licha ohuba elyae.” Sino syali sichia ohwoseresa abweene ebyandiiko byolerefu ebyaboola biti, “Bakabanamo ebyefwalo byaange, nae engubo change bachuubbira eha.”
43019025	Mani abamaye beecha baahola batyo. Nae abali nibeemere aambi nende omusalabba kwa Yesu bali ng'ina, nende mwaanang'ina ng'ina, Maria muha Kulopa, nende Maria Magadaleena.
43019026	Nae Yesu niyewunja yaabona ng'ina, nende omweeki yiyali adaha muno nibeemere aambi awo, yeecha yaboolera ng'ina ati, “Maama, bona omwaana wao nguyo!”
43019027	Handi yeecha yaboolera omweeki oyo ati, “Bonaho, maao nguyo!” Mani ohutula esiha syeene esyo, omweeki oyo yeecha yaamubukula mani yaamuyira ohumenya engo wae.
43019028	Lunyuma lwa bino byoosi ohuwa, Yesu naamalire ohumanya ati ebyae byoosi byali nibimalire ohuwa, yeecha yaboola (ohwoseresa abweene ebyandiiko byolerefu) ati, “Obuluwo buunuma.”
43019029	Nae bulaanu, ebbakuli y'efwiini yali niyihaliihe awo: mani beecha baabukula esyaangu baasiniha omwo syechula efwiini eyo, bamala basiboya hu lusaga lwa nyalwete-kwaachi, mani bamala bamuta humunwa.
43019030	Nae Yesu niyamala ohuhoombaho hu fwiini eyo, yeecha yaboola ati, “Ngumalire”; mani yeecha yaguunamia omutwe kwae mani yamala yaakwiisa omwooyo.
43019031	Mani koti lu lwali oludaalo lwa Ohwetekehera, nibadaha ohukayira emilaambo ohudoong'a nichiri humusalabba hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato, (olwohuba oludaalo lwa Sabbaato lwali oluhuluundu muno), Abayudaaya beecha baacha baasaba Pilaato afukiirire amakulu kaabwe kahalakwe, hu beemeo banyale ohubamalaho.
43019032	Mani abamaye beecha mani bachaaka ohuhalakaanga amakulu nibachaakira hu wundi otangira, handi nibaloondyaho owundi yali ahomereerwe nae;
43019033	nae nibali mbwe hu beecha hu Yesu, beecha baabona bati, yali amalire ohufwa, mani haba sibeecha baafunaka amakulu kae daawe.
43019034	Nae mulala hu baamaye abo yeecha yaafumita mu mbafu wa Yesu nende efumo, mani abweene awo, amabaanga alala nende amaachi byeecha byedihao.
43019035	Oyo owasibona niye owatusa obujulisi--obujulisi wae bwadyeeri, handi omweene amanyire ati aboolanga busa obwadyeeri, hu mwesi munyale ohufukiirira.
43019036	Olwohuba ebiindi bino byoosi byaholehana bityo, hu byandiiko byolerefu byeemeo byoolerere abweene biti, “Abulao kata ekuumba lyae elicha ohuhalakwa daawe.”
43019037	Handi esyandiiko syolerefu siindi simboola siti, “Abo bacha ohudangaalira hw'oyo owafumitwa.”
43019038	Lunyuma lwa sino, Yosefu otula mu siko silaangwa siti Arimaseya, owali yesi omweeki wa Yesu bweekisi, olwohutya Abayudaaya, yeecha yaasaba Pilaato amufukiirire abukule ayire omubiri kwa Yesu, mani Pilaato yamufukiirira.
43019039	Nikodema wali niyeechaho eyiri Yesu esiro hale, yesi yeecha yaleeta amafuta masaase k'ebiindu biwunya esiing'aari siingi ak'obusito buyera elatiri emia enaamba.
43019040	Beecha baabukula omubiri kwa Yesu, mani bamala baakuboya bulai bweene mu ngubo ch'elaasi alala nende amafuta k'esiing'aari ako, koti lu miduunga ch'Abayudaaya ch'ohusiiha luchiri.
43019041	Nae bulaanu, musifwo si Yesu yahomererwamo, waliwo omukuunda kundi, mani mu mukuunda okwo, mwalimo eng'ani njiaha, yi muundu yeesi yali atasihibwa hoomo.
43019042	Mani sakira, ohweema hu buhuluundu bw'oludaalo lw'Ohwetekehera, handi koti eng'ani eyo yali aambi muno awo, beecha basiiha Yesu abweene awo.
43020001	Nae bulaanu, hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, Maria Magadaleena yeecha yawuuna hu ng'ani, nibwali nibusisiiri mu siirima, mani yeecha yabona ati, ekina lyaahwo lyali nilitusiibwe hu ng'ani.
43020002	Mani yeecha yeruha embiro, mani yaacha eyiri Simooni Peetero alala nende omweeki wundi, oyo yi Yesu yadahaanga muno, mani yababoolera ati, “Batusire Omwaami mu ng'ani, mani efwe hukoterwe yibamuteere.”
43020003	Mani Peetero yeecha yaasingira yaatula nende omweeki wundi wula, mani beemao bachaaka ohuwiiruha nibachiira ena ng'ani.
43020004	Bombi beecha bachaaka ohwiiruha embiro, nae omweeki wundi wula yeecha yaahira Peetero embiro, mani yeecha yamutangirira ohwoola hu ng'ani;
43020005	mani niyaguunama ohutingaala mukati, yeecha yaabona engubo ch'elaasi chira nichikwiira awo busa, nae haba siyengira mukati daawe.
43020006	Mani Simooni Peetero niyeecha, yamuloonda, mani yaacha yengira mu ng'ani; yesi yeecha yaabona engubo ch'elaasi chira nichikwiire awo busa,
43020007	nae esitaambaya syali siteerwe hu mutwe kwae, sikwali nikuli alala nende engubo ch'elaasi chira daawe, nae syali nisyefumbire nisyekabuule syong'ene mu sifwo syaasyo.
43020008	Mani bulaanu omweeki wundi wula, owali natangiire ohwoola hu ng'ani, yesi yeecha yengiramo, mani yesi yaabona atyo, mani yeecha yafukiirira;
43020009	olwohuba bali bataamanya ebyandiiko byolerefu daawe, ebiboola biti, yali achia ohusyuuha ohutula mu bafu.
43020010	Mani bulaanu, abeeki beecha bekobolerayo mu mako kaabwe.
43020011	Nae Maria yadoong'a busa niyeemere naliriraanga erwaanyi w'eng'ani, mani koti luyali nasichiirira nende ohulira, yeecha yaguunama ohutingaala mukati w'eng'ani;
43020012	mani yeecha yabona bamalaika babiri nibafwaalire echa rachaari, nibehaale musifwo si mubiri kwa Yesu kwali kwaliiswe. Mulala naali enamutwe, nae owundi naali enamakulu.
43020013	Bamalayika abo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Muhasiiwe, lwasiina oli ohuliraanga?” Nae yeecha yababoolera ati, “Olwohuba beechere baatusa muno Omwaami wange, mani ese haba siimanyire yibamwaliise daawe.”
43020014	Niyalomaloma busa atyo, yeecha mani yakaluuhana enyuma mani yaabona Yesu niyeemere, nae haba siyamanya ati yali naali Yesu daawe.
43020015	Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Muhasiiwe, lwasiina oli ohuliraanga? Ni naanu yooli ohukoonya?” Nae niyali namubaasirisa ohuba omulimi busa, yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omuhulundu, nikali mbwe niiwe omutusire muno, mboolere busa yomuteere, mani njie mutuseyo.”
43020016	Nae Yesu yamuboolera busa ati, “Ewe Maria.” Bulaanu yeecha yakaluuhana, mani yamuboolera mu Luyibbulaniya ati, “Rab-boni” (esyeekesa siti Omweekesa).
43020017	Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Otandiiraho, sisiiri ohuniina eyiri Laata; nae cha busa eyiri ba mwaanaama mani obaboolera oti, ese ndi ohuniina ohuchia eyiri Laata handi Seeng'we, eyiri Nasae wange, handi Nasae w'eng'we.”
43020018	Maria Magadaleena yeecha yaasingira yaacha mani yaboolera abeeki ati, “Ese mbweeneho Omwaami”; handi yeecha yababoolera ati, niye amuboleere ebiindu bino.
43020019	Mani engoloobe y'oludaalo olwo, oludaalo lutaangira mu juma, enjiki nichikaalweo yi beeki bali, nibatiire Abayudaaya, Yesu yeecha mani yeema akati waabwe, mani yamala yaboola ati, “Emireembe chibe nang'we.”
43020020	Niyamala ohuboola atyo, yeecha yabeekesa amahono kae alala nende mu mbafu wae. Bulaanu abeeki bae beecha basangaala muno ohubona Omwaami.
43020021	Handi Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Emireembe chibe nang'we. Koti busa lu Laata yanduma, nasilala endyo syesi mbatuma.”
43020022	Niyamala ohuboola atyo, yeecha yabayeereraho, mani yababoolera ati, “Nyoole Omwooyo Mwolerefu.
43020023	Nimunaleheraangamo ebibi by'omuundu yeesi, baba bacha ohuleherwaangamo; nimunahayaanga ohuleheramo ebibi by'omuundu yeesi, haba sibaba bacha ohuleherwaangamo.”
43020024	Nae bulaanu Tomasi, mulala hu ehumi-na-babiri, owali alaangwa Ehwaana, haba siyali ali nabo Yesu niyeecha atyo.
43020025	Mani abeeki beecha bamuboolera busa bati, “Efwe hubweene Omwaami.” Nae yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese nitabonaho busa amahono kae, ndaabonaho ebinyubu by'emisumaari, mani ndamala ndaata olwaala lwaange luno mu mbala ch'emisumaari omwo, handi ndaamala ndaata omuhono kwaange mu mbafu wae omwo, haba siinjia ohufukiirira daawe.”
43020026	Lunyuma lw'endaalo chitaanu-na-chine, handi abeeki bae bali mu nyumba, mani Tomasi yesi yali ali nabo alala. Enjiki handi chali nichikaalwe, nae Yesu handi yeecha mani yeema akati waabwe, mani yaboola ati, “Emireembe chibe nang'we.”
43020027	Niyamala atyo, yeecha bulaanu yaboolera Tomasi ati, “Bukula ote olwaala lwao ano, mani oboneho amahono kange kano; handi omale okolole omuhono kwao, mani omale okugeeng'e mu mbafu wange muno; otabechaanga omuundu obulamo efukiirira daawe, nae bechaanga ofukiirira.”
43020028	Tomasi yeecha yakobolamo ati, “Ee, Omwaami wange, handi Nasae wange mweene!”
43020029	Mani Yesu yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ewe ofukiirira busa olwohuba mbwe wumbweneho? Bali nende ehabi abo abasisiiri ohubonaho, nae bafukiirira busa?”
43020030	Bulaanu, Yesu yahola obulolero bundi bungi muno mu moni w'abeeki, obutaandiikwa mu sitabo sino;
43020031	nae bino byandiikwa hu munyale ohufukiirira muti Yesu niye Kristo, Omwaana wa Nasae, handi nimufukiirira, mucha ohunyoola obulamu mu liita lyae.
43021001	Lunyuma lwa bino, Yesu handi yeecha yabonehera abeeki bae hu lwaasi lw'Enyaanja ya Tibberiasi; mani yababonehera mu ngeri yino.
43021002	Simooni Peetero, Tomasi olaangwa muhwaana, Nasanayiri otula e Kaana esye Galilaaya, abasyaani ba Sebbedaayo, nende abeeki bae bandi babiri, bali nibebuusire alala.
43021003	Simooni Peetero yeecha yababoolera ati, “Ese ndi ohuchia ohunaaba.” Nabo beecha bamuboolera bati, “Fwesi hucha ohuchia naawe.” Mani batula bacha beengira mu lyaato; nae esiro esyo, haba sibadiisaho esiindu syoosi.
43021004	Obwiire nibwali buhya busa buti, Yesu yeecha yema hu lwaasi; nae abeeki haba sibamanya bati yali niye Yesu.
43021005	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Baana eng'we, mudiisireho eng'eeni yoosi?” Nabo bamukobolamo bati “Haba.”
43021006	Nae Yesu yababoolera ati, “Musukune olweero olwo hu muhono muluungi kw'elyaato, mucha ohudiisa.” Mani beecha basukuna olweero olwo, mani bulaanu byabahaya ohuluhweesa balwingisa mu lyaato, hu lw'obuungi bw'eng'eeni chibadiisa.
43021007	Omweeki yi Yesu yali nadaha muno, yeecha yaboolera Peetero ati, “Niye Omwaami!” Nae Simooni Peetero niyawulira ati yali niye Omwaami, yeecha yefwaala engubo chae, olwohuba yali niyefwaluule hulw'emirimo, yaduuma yaakwa mu maachi.
43021008	Nae abeeki bandi bala beechera mu lyaato, nibahweesa olweero lwichuule eng'eeni, olwohuba haba sibali bali eyale nende olwaasi, nae byali koti emiita emia ndala ohutula hu lwaasi.
43021009	Niboola hu lwaasi, babona esyoosyo sy'omuliro nisiriho eng'eeni nende omugaati.
43021010	Mani Yesu yeecha yaboolera ati, “Muleeteho hu ng'eeni chimwahanaaba.”
43021011	Mani Simooni yeecha yengira mu lyaato mani yahweesa olweero olwo yaaluta hu lwaasi, nilwichuule eng'eeni hoongo, emia ndala nende amahumi kataanu-na-chidatu choosi alala; nae kata nichali enyiingi chityo, olweero haba silwataanduha daawe.
43021012	Yesu yeecha yababoolera ati, “Mwiicha mani hulye esy'echuli.” Nae bulaanu awuma omweeki yeesi owanyala ohumuteeba ati, “Niiwe naanu?” Bamanya busa bati yali niye Omwaami.
43021013	Mani Yesu yeecha yabukula omugaati okwo, mani yaakubeeresa abeeki, handi yahola atyo nende eng'eeni.
43021014	Bulaanu lino lyali ehabi ly'ohudatu Yesu naabonehera abeeki bae lunyuma lw'ohusyuuha mu bafu.
43021015	Nibali nibamalire ohulya esy'echuli, Yesu yeecha yateeba Simooni Peetero ati, “Simooni, omwaana wa Yowaana, wundaha ohuhira bano?” Nae yamukobolamo ati, “Eee, Omwaami; omanyire oti hudaha.” Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Liisa abaana b'amakoondi kange.”
43021016	Ehabi ly'ohubiri, Yesu handi yateeba Peetero ati, “Simooni, omwaana wa Yowaana, wundaha?” Nae yamukobolamo ati, “Eee, Omwaami; omanyire oti hudaha.” Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Yaya amakoondi kange.”
43021017	Yesu yeecha yaamuteeba ehabi ly'ohudatu ati, “Simooni, omwaana wa Yowaana; wundaha?” Peetero yawuka muno olwohuba yali amuteebere ehabi ly'ohudatu ati, “Wundaha?” Mani Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Omwaami, omanyire buli siindu; omanyire oti hudaha.” Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Liisa amakoondi kange.
43021018	Huboolera obwadyeeri bweene endi, niwali omuyere, omweene wefwalaanga mani wakendaanga nochia yodaha; nae nokofula, wahakolole amahono kao, mani omuundu wundi ahufwaale mani ahukiinge ahuyire yotahadahire ohuchia.”
43021019	(Yesu yaboola sino ohweekesa engeri yi Peetero achia ohufwiiramo ohuberesa Nasae oluyaali.) Mani lunyuma lwa sino, Yesu yaboolera Peetero ati, “Noonde.”
43021020	Peetero niyobba amahemo enyuma, mani yabona omweeki yi Yesu yali yadaha muno nabaloonda, oyo owali nayeehere mu lubafu wa Yesu nibalya esy'engoloobe, handi owali aboolere ati, “Omwaami, wiina mweene ochia ohuhuhoba?”
43021021	Nae Peetero niyamubona, yaboolera Yesu ati, “Omwaami, omusaacha wuno nae?”
43021022	Yesu yamuboolera ati, “Nihuli ohudaha hwange mbwe adoong'e ohwoola lundaheeche, ebyo bihudiiraho bitye? Ewe noonde!”
43021023	Mani enomanoma eyo, yeecha yasalaana buli abundu yiti omweeki wuno haba saachia hufwa, nae Yesu siyamuboolera ati haba saachia hufwa, nae, “Nihuli ohudaha hwange mbwe adoong'e ohwoola lundaheeche, ebyo bihudiiraho bitye?”
43021024	Wuno niye omweeki oli nende obujulisi hu biindu bino, handi niye owandiikire ebiindu bino; handi humanyire huti, obujulisi bwae bwadyeeri.
43021025	Nae aliwo yosi ebiindu biindi biingi bi Yesu yahola; buli siindu syoosi hw'ebyo siba nisyaandiikwa, mbaasa endi esyaalo sino syoosi sisyahanyalire ohuyeramo ebitabo biba bicha ohwandiikwa.
44001001	Omukoosi Siofiila: Mu sitabo sitaangira, ndandiika ebidiira hu biindu byoosi bi Yesu yataangira ohuhola nende ohweekesa,
44001002	ohwoola hu ludaalo luyayirirwa Mukulu. Nasisiiri ohuyirwa Mukulu, yataangira yahuutira abatume bayali yadoola niyehoonyera Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
44001003	Yesu yeyekesa eyiri abatume mu ngeri nyiingi koti lwali omulamu, naamalire ohusaandisibwa nende ohufwa handi mu mbaka y'endaalo amahumi kane, yaba ababonehera handi naalomaloma hu Bwaami bwa Nasae.
44001004	Mani niyali nasisiiri nabo, yeecha yabahuutira obutatula mu Yerusaalemu, nae baliinde si Lata yasuubisa simwawulira nimbaboolera endi,
44001005	“Yowaana yabatiisa nende amaachi, nae mu ndaalo chitaali enyiingi, mucha ohubatiisibwa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.”
44001006	Mani abatume nibali nibebuusire alala, beecha bamuteeba Yesu bati, “Omwaami, mani bulaanu ochia ohukobosera Yisirayiri obwaami?”
44001007	Nae yababoolera ati, “Haba simulimo kweeng'we ohumanya endaalo oba obwiire bu Lata mweene yatekeha nende obunyala bwae.
44001008	Nae mucha ohunyoola amaani Mwooyo Mwolerefu naamalire ohubeehaho; mani mucha ohuba abajulisi bange mu Yerusaalemu nende mu Buyudaaya mwoosi, nende Samaria, nende ohwoola yi syaalo syaakamira.”
44001009	Mani niyali niyahamala ohuboola atyo, yayiribwa akulu nibabona, mani esireesi syeecha syamubwiiha beecha baahaya ohumubona.
44001010	Mani koti lubali nibasitingaalire akulu Yesu nawaao, bone, abasaacha babiri abefwalire engubo cha rachaari, beecha baboneha nibeemere aambi nabo,
44001011	mani baboola bati, “Basaacha Bagalilaaya eng'we, lwasiina mweemere nimutingaalire akulu? Yesu wuno, obatusirweho yayiribwa Mukulu, achia ohukobola mu ngeri nasilala eyo yimumubweneremo naachia Mukulu.”
44001012	Bulaanu Abatume beecha bakobola e Yerusaalemu nibatula hu lugulu lulaangwa Olibeti, oluli aambi nende Yerusaalemu, olwoola olukeendo lufukiirirwa ohukeendwa hu ludaalo lwa Sabbaato.
44001013	Mani nibamala ohwingira mu Yerusaalemu, baacha baniina mu siseenge sy'akulu sibali bamenyamo: Peetero nende Yowaana nende Yakobbo nende Andereya, Filipo nende Tomasi, Batulumaayo nende Matayo, Yakobbo omusyaani wa Alufaayo nende Simooni Omulwaanirisi w'esyaalo syae, Yuda omusyaani wa Yakobbo.
44001014	Bano boosi, alala nende abahasi bandi nende Maria ng'ina Yesu, alala nende bamwaanang'ina, beecha bekongooyaanga Nasae nende omwooyo mulala.
44001015	Mu ndaalo echo, Peetero yeecha yaasingira yeema mu baasye (omukanda kw'abandu boola aambi emia ndala nende amahumi kabiri), mani yaalomaloma naboola ati,
44001016	“Basyaange, ebyandiiko byolerefu byali eby'ohwosereswa abweene, bi Mwooyo Mwolerefu yalomaloma hale nabitira mu munwa kwa Daudi, ebidiira hu Yuda owali omwemeresi w'abandu badiira Yesu.
44001017	Olwohuba yali mulala hw'efwe, mani yaberesebwa omukabo kwae mu mulimo kuno.
44001018	(Bulaanu, omusaacha wuno yakula omukunda nende esiyaanwa syesiholwa syae sibi mani yaakwiira omutwe yaadihanamo amala keediha erwaanyi.
44001019	Mani sino syeecha syamanyiha eyiri abandu boosi abamenya mu Yerusaalemu, mani omukunda okwo kwalaangwa mu lulimi lwaabwe kuti Akeludaama, esyeekesa siti, Omukuunda kw'Amabaanga.)
44001020	Olwohuba syandiikwa mu sitabo sy'Esabbuli siti, ‘Lehe edaala lyae lyehole ekuunda, handi lehe omuundu yeesi ahaye ohulimenyamo’; handi ‘Lehe omuundu wundi abukule omulimo kwae.’
44001021	Mani sakira, mulala hu bandu bakeendaanga naafwe endaalo choosi chi Mwaami Yesu yaba mweefwe,
44001022	ohutulira elalira hu hubatiisa hwa Yowaana, ohwolera elalira hu ludaalo lu yatubukulirwaho yayiribwa akulu, mulala hu bandu bano niye ohoyeere ohwehola naafwe omujulisi w'ohusyuuha hwa Yesu.”
44001023	Mani beecha badoolamo bataawo abandu babiri: Yosefu olaangwa mbwe Barisabba, owakulihwa Yusito, nende Matiya.
44001024	Mani bekongooya nibaboola bati, “Omwaami, niiwe omanyire emyooyo ch'abandu boosi, tweekese wiina hu babiri bano, oyo yi ewe omweene odoolere
44001025	ohubukula esifwo mu mulimo kuno, nende mu butume bu Yuda yetusaho, mani yechiira yi yadaha omweene.”
44001026	Mani beecha baaboobbera eha, mani eha yeecha yaakwa hu Matiya mani yeecha yabalirwa mu batume ehumi-na-mulala.
44002001	Oludaalo lwa Petekoote nilwoola, abatume bali nibebuusire alala mu sifwo silala.
44002002	Mani abweene awo, ekono lyawuliiriha nilitula Mukulu niliwoola koti omuyaka kw'amaani, mani lyeechula mu nyumba mwoosi yi batume bali nibehaale.
44002003	Mani babona enimi chifwaana koti omuliro nichisalaanire mani cheecha cheema hu buli muundu.
44002004	Mani boosi beecha beechusibwa Mwooyo Mwolerefu, mani bachaaka ohulomaloma mu nimi chitaali nasilala, koti lu Mwooyo oyo yabanyalira ohulomaloma.
44002005	Nae mu Yerusaalemu mwalimo Abayudaaya, abasaacha badaha Nasae muno ohutula mu buli mbeka yoosi eyo hu syaalo huno.
44002006	Mani olwawulira ekono lino, beecha bebuusa alala, mani bawuka muno, olwohuba buli muundu yali awulira abatume nibalomalomera mu lulimi lwae lweene.
44002007	Mani beecha besinduha handi bawuka muno nibaboola bati, “Mani abandu bali ohulomalomaanga bano boosi haba si Bagalilaaya?
44002008	Nae siba sitye mbwe efwe huwulira, buli muundu mu lulimi lwae lweene?
44002009	Abapasia nende Abameede nende Abalamayiti nende abamenya mu Mesopotamia, Buyudaaya nende Kapadosia, Potasi nende Asiiya,
44002010	Firigia nende Pamufilia, Misiri nende ebituundu bya Libbia ebiri aambi nende Sireeni, nende abakeni ohutula e Roomu, Abayudaaya alala nende Abateende basoma ediini y'Abayudaaya,
44002011	Abakureete nende Abaraabbu, huli ohubawulira nibaboola mu nimi cheefwe ebiindu by'amaani bi Nasae yahola.”
44002012	Mani boosi beecha bawuka mani bamala bateng'eng'ala nibaboolanira abeene-na-beene bati, “Sino syekesa siina?”
44002013	Nae abandi badyabuha nibaboola bati, “Abo bameerere efwiini njiaha.”
44002014	Nae Peetero, yeecha yeema alala nende ehumi-na-mulala, mani yaasingisa ekono mani yachaaka ohulomaloma nababoolera ati, “Eng'we abasaacha Bayudaaya basyaange, alala nende eng'we mweesi abamenyere mu Yerusaalemu, mutekeerese muwulire bimbaboolera.
44002015	Abasacha bano haba sibameere koti lu mubaasa, olwohuba luchiri busa esaa chidatu ch'echuli;
44002016	nae sino nisyo si munabbi Yoweeri yalomaloma naboola ati:
44002017	‘Nasae aboola ati, bino nibyo ebicha ohubaao mu ndaalo chimaliiriha, njia ohuchuha Mwooyo wange hu bandu boosi, mani abasyaani b'eng'we nende abahaana b'eng'we bacha ohutuumbula ebicha ohubaao, handi abasyaani baraaga b'eng'we bacha ohuboneherwa, handi abasaacha bahuluundu b'eng'we bacha ohuloota ebilooto;
44002018	eee, handi hu bahalaabani bange basaacha nende abahalaabani bange bahasi mu ndaalo echo, njia ohubachuhaho Mwooyo wange; mani bacha ohutuumbula ebicha ohubaao.
44002019	Handi njia ohuhola ebiwukisa akulu Mukulu nende obulolero aasi hu syaalo, achia ohubaao amabaanga, nende omuliro, nende okwoosi kudiraane;
44002020	elyuuba licha ohukaluhana libe esiirima nae omwoosi nakwo kukaluuhane kube koti amabaanga, oludaalo lw'Omwaami nilutoola, oludaalo luhuluundu handi olw'oluyaali muno.
44002021	Mani buli bundu yeesi olilangaanga eliita ly'Omwaami yahawonisibwe.’
44002022	“Eng'we Abayisiriyari, muwulire emboosi chino: Yesu Omunasareeti, niye omusaacha womisibwa mu moni weng'we nende ebiholwa by'amaani nende ebiwukisa nende obulolero bi Nasae yamuholerangamo koti lu eng'we abeene mumanyire busa.
44002023	Muhutekeha hwa Nasae nende muhumanya hwa Nasae, Yesu wuno, yadiiswayo mani mwamuhomerera handi yeetwa nende abandu bataloondakana nende amalako.
44002024	Nae Nasae yamusyuhisa ohutula mu bafu, yamuboolala mu buchuuni bw'ohufwa, olwohuba haba sisyali nisinyalihana ohudoong'a mu maani k'ohufwa.
44002025	Olwohuba Daudi alomaloma ebimudiiraho naboola ati, ‘Ndabona Omwaami naali naange ebiha byoosi, tateenga olwohuba ali hu muhono kwaange muluungi;
44002026	sakira omwooyo kwaange kwasangaala, handi olulimi lwaange lwehoya; handi omubiri kwaange kwosi kucha ohuba nende esuubi liingi.
44002027	Olwohuba haba sochia huleha omwooyo kwaange emakoombe, oba ohuleha Omwolerefu wao ohubola.
44002028	Omalire ohunjekesa engira y'obulamu; handi ohuba aambi naawe, hucha ohunjichusa esangaalo.’
44002029	“Basyaange, hambaboolere ataali ohutya hwoosi ebidiira hu Daudi kuuka yeefwe endi, yafwa mani bamusiiha, handi esiriindwa syae sisisiiri naafwe ohwoola buti.
44002030	Olwohuba koti luyali omunabbi, handi namanyire ati Nasae yechuba namwelayirira ati, yahehase hu sisaala syae sy'obutuki mulala hu beechuhulu bae.
44002031	Daudi yali amanyire hale ebicha obubao, mani yaalomaloma hu husyuha hwa Kristo naboola ati, haba siyahalehe omubiri kwae emakoombe oba yaleha omubiri kwae ohubola.
44002032	Yesu wuno Nasae yamusyuhisa handi efwe fweesi huli abajulisi bahwo.
44002033	Naamalire ohuniinisibwa yaaba hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae, handi naamalire ohubukaana Mwooyo Mwololerefu yi Simwaana yalaka, achuhire sino simuli ohubona, handi ohuwulira.
44002034	Olwohuba Daudi haba siyaniinaho Mukulu; nae omweene aboola ati, ‘Omwaami yaboolera Omwaami wange ati, yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi,
44002035	ohwoola lundihola abasuku bao ohuba esiteni syowuluusiraho amakulu kao.’
44002036	Leha enyumba ya Yisirayiri yoosi yimanyire elalira nende obwomiifu yiti, Nasae amalire ohuhola Yesu yimwahomerera wuno, ohuba Omwaami handi Kristo.”
44002037	Nae bulaanu nibawulira sino, syabachuunira elalira ohwoola hu ndasi, mani baboolera Peetero alala nende Abatume basye boosi bati, “Baana beefwe, siina syeene sihuba huhole?”
44002038	Nae Peetero yababoolera ati, “Mweyolobye, mani buli muundu abatiisibwe mu liita lya Yesu Kristo ohuleherwamo ebibi byeeng'we; handi mucha ohubukaana esiyaanwa sya Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
44002039	Olwohuba esisuubise sino syeng'we, alala nende abana beeng'we, alala nende abo boosi abali eyale muno; oyo yeesi yi Nasae Omwaami weefwe aba nalaangire ohwiicha yaali.”
44002040	Mani Peetero yeecha yaalomaloma niyehoonyera emboosi nyiingi muno mani yabekongooya naboola ati, “Mwewonie abeene ohutula hu luse ludondobanu luno.”
44002041	Mani abo boosi abafukiiririra emboosi chae, beecha baabatiisibwa. Mani hu ludaalo olwo, abemeeda hu mukaanda kw'abafukiiriri bali abandu aambi elifu chidatu (3000).
44002042	Mani beecha bomiirira hu njekesa y'Abatume nende ohuholera alala, nende ohuliiraanga omugaati alala nende ohwekongoyeraanga alala.
44002043	Mani obuti bweecha bwadiira buli muundu; mani Abatume beecha bahola ebiindu biwukisa alala nende obulolero bungi muno.
44002044	Mani abafukiiririra beecha baholera alala mani buli siindu syabechaanga esyaabwe boosi;
44002045	mani beecha bakusaanga emikaangi chaabwe nende ebiindu byaabwe, mani bamala baakabiraanga buli muundu koti luyalichiingi nadaha.
44002046	Mani buli ludaalo bekongoyeraanga alala mu nyumba ya Nasae, handi baliiraanga omugaati mu madaala kaabwe, handi balichaanga ebyohulya nende emyooyo misangaafu alala nende emyooyo mikabi.
44002047	Bakinianga Nasae, handi abandu boosi babadahaanga. Mani buli ludaalo Omwaami yeecha yameedaanga hu bungi bwaabwe abo abalichingi nibaonisibwa.
44003001	Olwoola, Peetero nende Yowaana bali bacha mu nyumba ya Nasae, esaa chitanu-na-chine esiha sy'ohwekongooya.
44003002	Mani niboola hu siruwa sy'enyumba ya Nasae esilaangwa siti Esiruwa siroonyo, babukaanawo omusaacha walema ohutula mu budoto bwae nasabirisaanga.
44003003	Niyabona busa ati, Peetero nende Yowaana nibengira busa bati mu nyumba ya Nasae, yabasaba obuhoonyi.
44003004	Nae Peetero nende Yowaana beecha bamutingaala tiiri mu moni, mani Peetero yamuboolera ati, “Tutingaale.”
44003005	Mani yeecha yabahayisiraho emoni, nabaasa ati bacha ohumubaaho esiindu.
44003006	Nae Peetero yeecha yamuboolera ati, “Ese mbulaho kata efeesa oba esaabbu, nae njia ohuhubeeresa esiindu siindi nasyo; mu liita lya Yesu Kristo Omunasareeti, siingira okeende.”
44003007	Mani yeecha yaamudiira omuhono muluungi mani yamusingisa; mani abweene-na-bweene awo, amakulu kae alala nende ebiseenero byae byeecha byomiira.
44003008	Mani yeecha yaduuma yema mani yachaaka ohukeenda mani yengira mu nyumba ya Nasae alala nende Peetero nende Yowaana, mani yakeenda natuumakala naakinia Nasae.
44003009	Mani abandu boosi bamubona nakeenda handi naafumia Nasae,
44003010	mani beecha baamanya bati niye owehalaanga nasabirisa hu Siruwa Siroonyo sy'enyumba ya Nasae; mani beecha bawuka handi besinduha muno hulwebiindu byali bimweholehaneho
44003011	Omusaacha oyo niiyali nasyomeere hu Peetero nende Yowaana, abandu boosi bawuka beeruha beecha yibali mu siseenge silaangwa esya Solomooni.
44003012	Nae Peetero niyabona atyo, yeecha yaboolera abandu ati, “Eng'we Bayisirayiri basyaange, lwasiina sino sibawukisa, oba lwasiina mutudangaaliireho, muti fwaana niifwe abakerere omusaacha wuno yakeenda hulw'amaani keefwe abeene oba hulw'obwolerefu bwefwe abeene?
44003013	Nasae wa Yibbulaimu nende Yisaka nende Yakobbo, Nasae wa bakuuka yeefwe, niye owaberesa Yesu omuhalaabani wae oluyaali. Oyo yimwawayo handi mwamwekaana mu moni wa Pilaato, owali naheengereo ohumulehuula.
44003014	Nae eng'we mwekaana Oyo Omwolerefu handi Omulungifu mweene, mani mwasaba babalehuulire omwiiti.
44003015	Nae eng'we ning'we abeeta Omweene bulamu, yi Nasae yasyuhisa ohutula mu bafu. Niifwe abajulisi ba sino.
44003016	Olwohuba eliita lyae, nende ohufukiirira mu liita lyae, nibyo ebikerere omusaacha wuno yimubona handi yimumanyire yanyoola amaani; handi efukiirira mu Yesu niyo eyikerere omusaacha wuno yaaba omulamu mweene koti lu mweesi mubona.
44003017	“Mani bulaanu basyaange, manyire endi mwasihola mubutamanya, koti lu batuki beeng'we bosi bahola.
44003018	Nae, esyo si Nasae yalomalomera hale mu banabbi boosi, ati Kristo wae ahoyeere ohusaanda, yasyoseresa abweene atyo.
44003019	Sakira mweyolobye ebibi byeeng'we, mukaluhe eyiri Nasae, hu bibi byeeng'we binyale ohusangulwao, mani hu biha byohwekobosa buyaaha bibecheere nibitula eyiri Omwaami,
44003020	mani abatumire Kristo yiyabadoolera, oli Yesu.
44003021	Yesu oyo niye ohoyeere ohuba Mukulu yi ohwolera elalira hu biha byeebyo byoosi bi Nasae yalomalomera mu banabbi bae boolerefu boosi ohutula hale byaholerere.
44003022	Olwohuba Musa yaboola ati, ‘Omwaami Nasae weng'we achia ohubatumira omunabbi otula mu bandu beeng'we koti luyanduma. Muhoyeere mumuwulire mu buli siindu syababoolera.
44003023	Mani omuundu yeesi otahawuliire emboosi ch'omunabbi oyo, achia ohutusibwa mu bandu mani asihirisibwe.’
44003024	Mani abanabbi boosi abalomaloma hale, ohutulira elalira hu Samueli nende abamulondaho, bosi balomaloma ebidiira hu ndaalo chino.
44003025	Eng'we ning'we abana ba banabbi handi abelakano li Nasae yabeeresa bakuuka yeeng'we naboolera Yibbulaimu ati, ‘Njia ohuberesa ehabi abandu b'ohusyaalo syoosi nimbitira mu lwiibulo lwao.’
44003026	Mani Nasae niyamala ohudoola omuhalaabani wae, yataangira ohumutuma eyiri eng'we, ohubabeeresa ehabi naakaluhaania buli muundu hweeng'we ohutula mu ngira cheeng'we mbi.”
44004001	Nae Peetero nende Yowaana nibali nibasilomalomaanga nende abandu, abalaamisi nende omuhulundu w'enyumba ya Nasae, alala nende Abasadukaayo baboolaho,
44004002	nibanyoleere olwohuba Peetero nende Yowaana bali nibekesaanga abandu handi nibayalaanga bati Yesu yasyuuha mu bafu.
44004003	Mani beecha babadiira, nae olwohuba obwire bwali bwiirire, baabata mu mboyero ohwoola lubwahya.
44004004	Nae abandu bangi abawulira emboosi chaabwe bafukiirira; mani obuungi bw'abasaacha bafukiirira bwoola aambi elifu chitaanu (5000).
44004005	Nibwahya, abatuki baabwe nende abahuluundu beenjia alala nende abekesa ba malako ka Musa beecha bebuusira mu Yerusaalemu.
44004006	Anasi omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene, nende Kayaafa nende Yowaana nende Alekisaanda, alala nende abo boosi abali abenyumba y'omulaamisi muhuluundu mweene bosi beecha bebuusira mu Yerusaalemu.
44004007	Mani nibamala ohweemesa Peetero nende Yowaana akati-kaati waabwe, beecha baabateeba bati, “Bunyala siina, kose mu liita siina limuholeeremo sino?”
44004008	Nae Peetero, niyali yechusiibwe Mwooyo Mwolerefu, yakobolamo nababoolera ati, “Eng'we abatuki alala nende abahuluundu babandu,
44004009	nimuli ohututeeba olwaleero ebidiira hu siholwa silayi siholeerwe omulema wuno, handi nende obunyala buwoniisye omusaacha wuno,
44004010	mweesi-mwesi muhoyeere ohusimanya, alala nende abandu ba Yisirayiri boosi muti, omusaacha anyalire ohweema bulai mu moni weng'we hulw'eliita lya Yesu Kristo Omunasareeti, oyo yimwahomerera, yi Nasae yasyuhisa ohutula mu bafu.
44004011	Lino nilyo ekina li eng'we mwahaya, nae nilyo elyeholere ehuluundu mu muse.
44004012	Handi obuwonia sibuli mu muundu wundi yeesi, olwohuba abulao eliita liindi hu syaalo syoosi elyabeereswa abandu lihuhoyeere ohuwonisibwamo.”
44004013	Bulaanu, abesiina nibabona obwomiifu bwa Peetero nende Yowaana, handi nibabona bati bali abandu babuli ludaalo busa, abali batasomaho, beecha bawuka muno. Mani beecha bamanya bati, abandu bano balichiingi nende Yesu.
44004014	Nae nibabona omusaacha owali awonisibwe niyeemere aambi nende Peetero nende Yowaana, bahaywa esiindi syoosi esyohuboola nibabayingania.
44004015	Nae nibali nibamalire ohuboolera Peetero nende Yowaana ohutula erwaanyi w'esiina, bachaaka ohuteebana abeene-na-beene,
44004016	nibaboola bati, “Abasacha bano hunabahole hutye? Olwohuba buli muundu yeesi mu Yerusaalemu asimanyire ati, abasaacha bano baholere esyamayia sihoongo muno handi sihunyala ohusiyingania.
44004017	Nae ohubona huti esiindu sino sitemeeda ohumanyihana mu baandu, leha hubahuutire obutalomalomaho handi eyiri omuundu yeesi mu liita lino.”
44004018	Mani beecha balaanga Peetero nende Yowaana ohwingira mu siina, mani baabahuutira obutalomalomaho oba obuteekesaho kata handi mu liita lya Yesu.
44004019	Nae Peetero nende Yowaana babakobolamo nibaboola bati, “Eng'we abeene muheengeo esihoyera ohuhola mu moni wa Nasae, ohuwulira eby'abandu oba ohuwulira ebya Nasae.
44004020	Olwohuba efwe huli nende ohulomaloma bihwabona nende bihwawulira.”
44004021	Mani ab'esiina nibamala ohwemeeda ohubatihirisa muno, olwohutya abandu, beecha baabaleha bawaao, olwohuba sibafuna engeri yoosi eyohubasaandiamo. Olwohuba abandu boosi bali bakinia Nasae hulw'ebiindu byali nibiholehaane.
44004022	Olwohuba omusaacha wali nawonisiibwe yali abita emyaaka amahumi kane ech'obuhuluundu.
44004023	Nibamala ohubalehuula bati, Peetero nende Yowaana bakobola eyiri basyaabwe mani bababoolera ebiindu byoosi bi Abalaamisi bahuluundu nende abahuluundu beenjia bababoolera.
