46003017	Mani omuundu yeesi nasihirisa enyumba ya Nasae, Nasae mweene aaba achia ohumusihirisa yesi. Olwohuba enyumba ya Nasae yiba niyiri enjolerefu, nihaandi enyumba ya Nasae eyo niyo ewe mweene.
46003018	Mulehe omuundu yeesi alehe ohwebacha omweene. Omuundu yeesi mweng'we abaasa ati ali omukesi muno mu luse luno, mulehe yehole omusiru hu yeemewo anyale ohuba omukesi.
46003019	Olwohuba amakesi k'esyaalo sino n'obusiru bweene eyiri Nasae. Olwohuba syandiikwa siti, “Nasae adiyisiryanga abakesikesi mu bukodyo bwaabwe abeene,”
46003020	handi siti, “Omwaami amanyire ati ebibaaso by'omuundu mukesi-kesi busiru bwereere.”
46003021	Mani sakira mutaleha omuundu yeesi yachaaka ohweninisirya hulw'abandu busa. Olwohuba ebiindu byoosi nebyeeng'we,
46003022	ayahaba naali Paulo oba Apolo oba Keefa oba esyaalo sino oba obulamu oba ohufwa oba esiha sino oba esiha siicha, byoosi neby'eng'we busa;
46003023	nae handi eng'we mweesi muli abandu ba Kristo; nae Kristo mweene wa Nasae.
46004001	Yino niyo engeri yi muundu yeesi ahoyere ohubaasiramo: Huli abahalaabani ba Kristo, handi ababiihi be byaama bya Nasae.
46004002	Nae handi kali mbwe syeenyeha siti, buli mubiihi yeesi ahoyeere ohunyoolehana naali owesikiha.
46004003	Nae ese hulwaange, n'esiindu esidiidi muno ohubona mbwe ese ndi ohusereechwa nang'we, oba nende esiina sy'abandu busa. Kata omweene haba sinyala hwesereecha omweene.
46004004	Ese haba siimanyire esiindu syoosi esinjooma haba daawe, nae kata katyo sisyekesa mbwe ohweema hweesyo, haba sinyala ohuba omulehuule daawe. Nasae mweene niye oli nende obunyala bw'ohusereecha.
46004005	Mani sakira mutateemaho ohwetuliirisa ohuheengera omusango esiha nisisisiiri ohwoola, Omwaami natoola ohwiicha, oyo ochia ohuleeta mu bulafu ebiindu byakisibwa mu siirima, handi ochia ohutuumbula ebifune by'omwooyo byoosi. Awo niwo aabuli muundu yeesi achia ohunyala ohunyoolera syahoyera ohunyoola ohutula eyiri Nasae.
46004006	Ese mbawo ndingaasire ebiindu bino byoosi eyiri ese omweene nende yiri Apolo hulw'obulayi bweeng'we, baana beefwe, hu mweemeo munyale ohweeka nimutuboneraho efwe mutanyala ohuchalaaliha mwabita ebyo ebyandiikibwa byong'ene, hu bulaanu abulewo mweng'we omuundu yeesi onyala ohufwiimbikitana niyechuule ohukwiira mulala yeng'ene ohuhiraho owundi.
46004007	Olwohuba ni naanu mweene oli nende obunyala obwohubona esiindu syoosi esikeni mweng'we? Siina syeene simuli nasyo simutabeeresebwa busa? Nikali mani mbwe mwabeeresebwa busa, lwasiina muli ohweniinia koti lusitaali busa esiyaanwa sy'ebihaya yimuli?
46004008	Mbao hane mwamala ohwikuta! Mbao hane mwamala ohwehola abagaga! Kata efwe nihusisiiri, nae eng'we mbawo mwamala ohwehola abatuki! Mani muhoya mwaaba nimuli nende ohutuka, hu fwesi hwanyala ohukabanira alala nang'we obutuki obwo!
46004009	Olwohuba ese ndi ohubaasa endi, Nasae yamala ohutuhola efwe abatume hwafwaana koti abasembayo mu bandu boosi, handi koti abandu bamala ohuheengerwa omusango kw'ohufwa; olwohuba hwamala ohwehola esyohwelolera eyiri esyaalo, eyiri bamalaika nende eyiri abandu.
46004010	Efwe huli koti abasiru hu lwa Kristo, nae eng'we mwehola abakesi mu Yesu. Efwe huli koti abakata, nae eng'we muli abamaani. Eng'we muli mu bifwo byoluyaali, nae efwe huli mubilekeresebwa.
46004011	Ohwolera elalira hu saa yino yene, efwe huwoonga enjala handi hulumwa obuluwo, hwefwaala ebiseke nihutoochwa, handi hwahaywa ohuba nende amadaala,
46004012	handi hudidiihana nende emirimo, nihwehoonyera amahono keefwe keene kano. Nihuholimirwa, efwe husabira emikisa; nihusaandisibwa, efwe hwesimiirisa busa;
46004013	nihunyekebwa, efwe hweyisa aasi hwadaha husasane; humalire ohwehola, nihaandi mbawo bulaanu huli, koti ebikoha hu syaalo, ebiindu bihira ohusyuulibwa.
46004014	Ese haba siindi ohwandiika bino endyo mbwe hu nyale ohubaswaasa, nae ohubeekesa koti ndaheekesa abaana baange baheerwa muno.
46004015	Olwohuba amwahaba mbwe muli nende abakeraki abatabaliha mu Kristo, haba simuli nende baseeng'we abangi daawe. Olwohuba ese ndeehola hale seeng'we mu Kristo Yesu ohubitira mu mboosi ndayi.
46004016	Mani ese ndi ohubekweeda endi mubonere hweese.
46004017	Mani sakira ese ndatuma Timoteo, omuheerwa wange muno handi omwaana wange mwesikwa muno mu Mwaami, ohubechulisa koti obulamu bwaange bufwaana mu Kristo, koti mbasomesaanga buli yi njiira mu buli mukaanda kw'Abakurisito.
46004018	Abandu bandi hweeng'we babeere nibali abesihanyaali, oti fwaana ese haba simbeere ninjia ohunyala ohwiicha yimuli daawe.
46004019	Nae mbawo njicha ohwiicha eyo bwaangu, Omwaami nadaha, mani hu haye ohubonera elalira ebilai by'enomanoma y'abandu besihanyaali bano yong'ene, nae nende amaani kaabwe kosi akaaka.
46004020	Olwohuba obwaami bwa Nasae haba sibubonehera busa mu hulomaloma busa nae mu maani.
46004021	Siina syeene simudaha? Mudaha njiche yimuli nende olubbariki, oba nende ohudaha mu mwooyo kw'obuloonga busa?
46005001	Mubwadyeeri bweene syaboolehana mbwe aliwo esifwaabi mweng'we, handi esyengeri kata eyitanyala hunyoolehana kata nende mu bakafwiiri; mbwe omusaacha amenya busa nende omuhasi wa simwaana.
46005002	Ni handi muli nende esihanyaali! Eng'we haba simunyala ohubaaho kata nimwahabeere mbwe mulira bulira? Mulehe oyo owahola sino yerusibwe ohutula mweng'we.
46005003	Olwohuba andahaba mbwe siindi alala nang'we mu mubiri, nae ndi alala nang'we mu mwooyo, handi busa koti lundahaholere nindiwo, malire ohutuumbula eheengao yange
46005004	mu liita ly'Omwaami Yesu eyiri omusaacha oyo owahola esiindu sifwaana siti. Mani nimuba nimunaba nimuhung'aanire alala, mani omwooyo kwaange kwosi nikuli alala nang'we, nikuli nende amaani k'Omwaami weefwe Yesu,
46005005	muhoyeere mwebwaabe omusaacha oyo ache eyiri Sitaani anyale ohusihirisibwa omubiri kwae hu mwooyo kwae kunyale ohuwonisibwa hu ludaalo lw'Omwaami Yesu.
46005006	Ohweniinia hweeng'we ohwo, haba sinohulayi daawe. Eng'we haba simumanyire muti, ahamera hadiidi busa niho ahanyalanga ohubbaaha esiniho siingi?
46005007	Mweyosemo emera hale, hu mweemeo munyale ohuba esiniho siyaaha, koti lumuli abataali ababbaahe. Olwohuba Kristo, ekoondi lyeefwe lya Paasaka, lyamala ohwiitibwa.
46005008	Mani mulehe efwe hweliire esidyaalo, nihutaali nende emera hale, emera ly'ehiinda nende obubi, nae nende omugaati kutabbaahirwe okw'obuluungifu nende obwadyeeri.
46005009	Ese ndabaandiikira hale mu bbarwa yange endi mutaholeraanga alala nende abandu b'esifwaabi daawe;
46005010	ataali abesifuto ab'omusyaalo muno, oba abokuliira nende abanyaka, oba ab'emisaambwa, koti nibiba bityo biba binabadahisa ohutulira elalira mu syaalo muno.
46005011	Nae kata katyo, ese ndabandiikira hale endyo obutaholeganaanga nende oyo yeesi oliho nende eliita ly'omwefwe, nikali mbwe anyoolehaane ohuba nende omufuto oba okuliira, oba naaba naali ow'emisaambwa, oba omuchalaasi, omumeesi, oba omunyaka--kata obutalichaanga nende omuundu ofwaanaho atyo daawe.
46005012	Olwohuba naange bindiiraho bitye ohwoola ohuheengera omusango abo abali erwaanyi? Mani simubaasa muti ni abo ababa nibali mu bakristo booba ohoyeere ohuheengera omusango?
46005013	Nasae niye ohengeraanga abo abali erwaanyi omusango. “Mwirusire elalira omudamaanu oyo abatulemo.”
46006001	Omuundu mulala hweeng'we naaba naali nende ohwekanyiisa hwoosi hu waasye, yenyiira atye hu yoola yaacha enamalako mu moni w'abandu bataali abalungifu, musifwo sy'ohuchia eyiri abalungifu eng'we?
46006002	Eng'we haba simumanyire muti abalungifu nibo abacha ohuheengera esyaalo omusango? Mani nikali mbwe esyaalo sichia ohuheengerwa omusango nang'we, mani mwahaba nimutanyala ohuwosesa obusaango budiidi-diidi butyo?
46006003	Eng'we simumanyire muti, niifwe abacha ohuheengera kata nende bamalaika omusango? Mani hwaaka yena ohuhola hutyo, ebiindu bidiira busa hu bulamu buno!
46006004	Nikali mani mbwe muba nende emisango chifwaana chityo, lwasiina mucha nimuchita mu moni waabo abalekeresebwa batyo nende omukanda kw'Abakurisito?
46006005	Ese ndi ohubaboolera endyo hu munyale ohuswaala. Awundi sinyala ohuba mbwe mweng'we mubulamo omuundu oli nende amakesi kanyala ohukabula abahungu b'olwaanyi luno,
46006006	hu bulaanu omuundu yeteeho ohuchia enamalako ohuwabira owaasye, mani busa mu moni w'abakafwiiri?
46006007	Mberi, ohwoola ohuba nende emisango ch'ohulaka amalako syekesa ohuhirwa hweeng'we. Lwasiina mani simunyala mwesimiirisira ohuholwa bubi? Lwasiina haba simunyala ohubachirwa?
46006008	Nae koti eng'we mwesi abeene mukosa handi mubachira, handi mani muhola mutyo Abakurisito basyeeng'we.
46006009	Eng'we haba simumanyireho muti abo abataali abalungifu haba sibachia husihira obwaami bwa Nasae? Mutebachaangaho; kata owesifwaabi, oba ow'emisaambwa, oba omuyirani, oba oyirana mu ngeri yitaali eyifukiirirwa,
46006010	kata abeebi, kata ab'okuliira, kata abameesi, kata abachalaasi, kata abanyaka haba sibachia ohusihira obwaami bwa Nasae daawe.
46006011	Mani handi mbwe abandu bandi bafwaana batyo abali nibali mweng'we. Nae kali mbwe eng'we mwamala ohwoosebwa, mwamala ohulabisibwa, mwoola ohuholwa abahoyera mu liita ly'Omwaami Yesu Kristo handi nende mu Mwooyo owa Nasae weefwe.
46006012	“Ese hoyera ohuhola ebiindu byoosi,” nae abindu byoosi haba sibiri nende obuhoonyi daawe. “Ese hoyera ebiindu byoosi,” nae haba sinyala hufukibwa nende esiindu syoosi.
46006013	“Ebyohulya byateebwao hu lweenda handi enda hulw'ebyohulya” -- handi Nasae achia ohusihirisa byombi syasilala-silala. Omubiri haba sikwaholerwa esifwaabi, nae hulw'Omwaami, handi Omwaami hulw'omubiri.
46006014	Handi Nasae niye owasyuusa Omwaami, handi lwosi achia ohutusyuusa nende amaani kae.
46006015	Eng'we haba simumanyire muti, emibiri cheeng'we chiri ebituundu bya Kristo? Mani bulaanu mbwe sakira ndaabukule ebituundu bya Kristo mani ndamala ndabihola handi byaaba ebituundu by'omudaamba? Haba bbe!
46006016	Eng'we haba simumanyire muti oyo yeesi oweyambaania omweene hu muhasi mudaamba yehola omubiri mulala nae? Olwohuba, koti busa lusyandiikibwa siti, “Bombi abo bacha ohwehola omubiri mulala.”
46006017	Nae oyo owaambanisibwa hu Mwaami, yehola omwooyo mulala nae.
46006018	Mwebwaabe esifwaabi. Buli sibi siindi syoosi, si muundu ahola si busa erwaanyi w'omubiri; nae omusaacha wesifwabi yonoona eyiri omubiri kwae omweene.
46006019	Ewe haba somanyire oti omubiri kwao okwo kuli enyumba ya Mwooyo Mwolerefu ohulimo, yiwanyoola ohutula eyiri Nasae? Ewe haba sooli weng'ene hubwao;
46006020	wamala ohukulibwa nende obukusi buhoongo. Mani sakira ohoyeere ohubeeresa Nasae oluyaali nende omubiri kwao.
46007001	Bulaanu ebidiira hu biindu bimwanyandiikira. Silayi musaacha obutadeehya.
46007002	Nae ohweema hu sihemo syobuyirani, buli musaacha ahoyeere ohuba nende omuhasi wae handi buli muhasi yesi ohoyeere ohuba nende omusaacha wae.
46007003	Omusaacha ahoyeere ohwoseresa omulimo kwae koti omusaacha eyiri omuhasi wae handi nilwo nasilala nilwo lu muhasi ahoyeere ohwoseresa omulimo kwae koti omuhasi eyiri omusaacha wae.
46007004	Olwohuba omuhasi haba siniye ofuka omubiri kwae omweene, nae omusaacha niye okufuka; handi nilwo nasilala, lu musaacha, atafuka omubiri kwae omweene, nae omuhasi niye okufuka.
46007005	Abadehisania, mutahayanaanga abeene-na-beene daawe, ohutusaho awundi abeene nimufukiirisaanie hulw'esiha esidiidi, hu munyale abeene ohunyoola esiha sy'ohwekongooya; nae nimumalire, mukobolaneengeho alala handi, ataali awo, Sitaani anyala ohubahema olwohutaba nende amaani k'ohwefuka abeene.
46007006	Mboola endyo nga ndaha ohubeekesa busa, ataali ohubabeeresa elako.
46007007	Ndahekombere ohubona endi abandu boosi bali koti lundi. Nae buli muundu ali nende esiyaanwa syae esyenjawulo ohutula eyiri Nasae, owundi aba nende esy'engeri ndala, nae owundi yaaba nende esyengeri yindi.
46007008	Eyiri abasisiiri ohudeehisania, nende abahasi bafwiire, mboola endi, nesilai badong'e bong'ene koti busa lundi.
46007009	Nate nibatanyala ohwefuka abeene, bahoyeere ohudeeha. Olwohuba silayi muno ohudeeha ohuhira ohunyaahana nende obwekoombi.
46007010	Eyiri abadehisania, haba sineese obabeeresa elako, nae niye Omwaami mweene obabeeresa, mbwe omuhasi haba sahoyeere ohuloba omusaacha wae,
46007011	(nae niwichuhira yaaloba, lehe adoong'e yeng'ene ataali awo, lehe akobole eyiri omusaacha wae) handi omusaacha aterusaanga omuhasi wae.
46007012	Eyiri abadong'ereyo, ese ataali Omwaami mboola endi, nabaao owasyeefwe yeesi oli nende omuhasi, otaali omufukiiriri, mani omuhasi yafukiirira ohumenya nae, owasyeefwe oyo ateerusanga omuhasi otaali omufukiiri oyo.
46007013	Omuhasi yeesi oli nende omusaacha otaali omufukiiriri, nae omusaacha oyo yafukiirira ohumenya nae, omuhasi oyo atalobaanga omusaacha otaali omufukiiriri oyo.
46007014	Olwohuba omusaacha otaali omufukiiriri alabiswa ohubitira mu muhasi wae, handi omuhasi otaali omufukiiriri alabiswa ohubitira mu musaacha wae. Ataali awo, abaana beeng'we sibachia huba aboolerefu, nae koti lusiri abaana abo aboolerefu nibo.
46007015	Nae omuundu otaali omufukiiri niyekoomba ohukabuhana, lehe sibe koti lwadaha; mu ngeri yino, owasyeefwe mufukiiriri aba ali omulehuule. Olwohuba Nasae ohutulaanga yadaha hube emireembe.
46007016	Muhasiiwe, omanyire otye nooli niiwe owahaonie omusaacha wao? Musaacha-ewe, omanyire otye nooli niiwe owahaonie omuhasi wao?
46007017	Mani siri mbwe, muleheenge buli muundu anyala ohuba mu bulamu bu Mwaami aaba niyamutekehera, handi bu Nasae aaba yamulaangiramo. Lino nilyo elako lyaange liindaha libe mu mikaanda ch'Abakurisito boosi.
46007018	Mani aliwo muundu yeesi hweeng'we esiha siyalaangirwamo owali niyamala ohuhebwa? Mulehe omuundu koti oyo atahaaba ohwemalaho embala ch'ohuhebwa daawe. Mani aliwo omuundu yeesi hweeng'we esiha siyalaangirwamo owali nasisiiri ohuhebwa? Mulehe omuundu koti oyo atahaaba ohuhebwa daawe.
46007019	Olwohuba kata ohuhebwa haba sihuli nende omugaso kwoosi, oba ohutahebwa hwosi, nae esiri nende omugaso muno ni ohwoseresaanga amalako ka Nasae.
46007020	Buli muundu yeesi ahoyeere adoong'enge mu bulamu bwaaba yalaangibwa nalimo.
46007021	Wali nooli omuwaambe esiha siwali nolaangirwamo? Otafwayo daawe. Nae nooba nonyala, lwaana obe omulehuule, wefunire omweene ehabi eyo.
46007022	Olwohuba oyo yeesi oba niyalaangwa mu Mwaami naali omuwaambe, bulaanu ali omuundu mulehuule ow'Omwaami. Nasilala bityo, oyo yeesi owali omulehuule niyali nalaangwa, bulaanu ali omuwaambe wa Kristo.
46007023	Eng'we mwamala ohukulibwa hu bbeyi; mani muteecha handi mwaakanya ohwehola abawambwa busa nende abandu.
46007024	Mani sakira, eng'we basyaange, abyahaba mbwe ni mu bulamu siina buli muundu hweeng'we mwaba yali niyalaangwa, adoong'e busa mu bweene obwo naali nende Nasae.
46007025	Bulaanu ohudiira hu bandu batadeehisania, ese haba siindi nende esilagiro esitula eyiri Omwaami daawe, nae ese nyala ohutusa esibaaso syaange omweene, niindi koti oyo owanyalirwa nende esisa sy'Omwaami ohuba omuundu owesikiha.
46007026	Ese ndi ohubaasa endi ohweema hu bidinyu biriwo endaalo chino, silayi nisyo hulw'omuundu ohudoong'a koti lwali busa.
46007027	Oli nende omuhasi yiwadeehya yeesi? Mani otahaaba ohunyala ohumwetusaho daawe. Ewe haba soliho nende omuhasi yeesi yiwadeehya? Mani otahaabaho ohunyoola yonyala ohudeehya daawe.
46007028	Nae niwoola wanyala ohudeehya, awo haba sooba nooholere esibi, nae omuhaana yeesi niyoola yadeeha, yesi haba saaba naaholere esibi daawe. Kata katyo abo boosi abadehisania, paka bacha ohunyoolaanga ebidinyu by'ohusyaalo huno, nae ndahadahire ohubaonia mweesi ebidinyu ebyo.
46007029	Ese esiindu siindi ohweekesa nisyo sino basyaange, esiha syateebwao simalire ohuduuduya muno; ohutula olwaleero ohuchia mu moni, mulehe abo boosi abali nende abahasi babadeehya bachaake ohumenyaanga koti abo abati nibadeehya hooho,
46007030	nae abo abali ohuliraanga, bamenye koti abo abataali ohuliraanga daawe, nae abo abali ohusangalaanga, bamenye koti abo abatasangaalaho, nae abo abali ohukulanga, bamenye koti abo ababulaho kata nende esiindu syoosi,
46007031	nae abo abali ohuholeganaanga nende esyaalo, bamenye koti abo abataaliho nende ohuholegana nende esyaalo daawe. Olwohuba emera y'esyaalo sino eyiriwo yino, yicha niyiwaao.
46007032	Ese ndaha eng'we mu menye nimutaali nende ebibelalihirsa byoosi. Omusaacha oba natadeehya, yelalihirira ebiindu bidiira hu Mwaami byong'ene, koti nga lwanyala ohusangaasa Omwaami;
46007033	nae omusaacha oba niyadeehya yelalihirira busa ebiindu by'ohusyaalo huno, koti nga lwaananyale ohusangaasa omuhasi yaaba niyadeehya,
46007034	mani ebichiiririrwa byae biba nibyakabuhanamo. Nae omuhasi oba omuhaana oba natadeeha, abaawo niyelalihirira ebiindu bidiira hu Mwaami byong'ene, koti nga lwanyala yaaba naali omwolerefu mu mubiri nende mu mwooyo; nae omuhasi oba niyadeeha, abaawo niyelalihirira ebiindu bidiira hu syaalo huno byong'ene, koti nga lwanaanyale ohusangaasa omusaacha wae wamudeehya.
46007035	Ese ndi ohuboolaanga bino byoosi hulw'obulayi bweeng'we, nitadahaho kata nabudiidi ohubadwiihaho ebidinyu byoosi daawe, nae ohunyala ohuniinia ehola ndayi handi nende ohunyala ohuwonia obuheeri bweeng'we bw'Omwaami buhaye ohunyala ohukabuhanisibwamo.
46007036	Mani omuundu yeesi naaba namanyire ati haba saali hweyiraanga bulai mu moni w'omuhasi yaaba nafukiirisaanie ohudeehya, obwekoombi bwae nibuba nibuli obuungi muno, koti busa lusihoyeere ohuba, mu mulehe omweene ahole busa koti lwaaba nadaha: mu balehe badehisanie, haba sisiba nisi esibi daawe.
46007037	Nae oyo oba naamaliirire busa mu mwooyo kwae, nataaliho ohuyiikwa hwoosi daawe, ohutusaho busa koti lu mweene aba nanyalire ohufuka obwekoombi bwae, handi omweene amaliriire ohuba atyo mu mwooyo kwae, ohumuliinda busa naali atyo koti oyo yafukiirisaanie nae ohudeehya, aba aholere bulai busa.
46007038	Mani sakira oyo yeesi owoola ohudeehya yaaba niyanjulana nae, aba anabechaanga naaholere esiindu silayi muno; nae oyo onyala ohweliinda yaahaya ohudeehyaho aba anabechaanga nanyalire ohuhola esihiramo obulayi.
46007039	Omuhasi yeesi owadeeha, aaba aasi w'obunyala bw'omusaacha oba niyamudeehya ohwoola lu musaacha oyo afwiira. Omusaacha oba niyamudeehya oyo niyoola yaafwa, omuhasi oyo aaba yoolere ohuba omulehuule onyala ohudeehisibwa nende omusaacha wundi yaaba nadahire, nae nibadehisanisirya mu Mwaami byong'ene.
46007040	Nae ohweema hu hubaasa hwange, omuhasi koti oyo atyo, aba achia ohuba omusangaafu ohirao nikali mbwe omweene ahengawo ohudoong'a koti lwaba naali. Nihaandi ese mbaasa endi ndi nende Mwooyo wa Nasae.
46008001	Bulaanu ebidiira hu byohulya biba nibibeereseebwe emisaambwa: efwe humanyire huti, “efwe fweesi huli nende obumanyirifu.” “Obubanyirifu” buhudumbasa, nae ohudaha hwombaha.
46008002	Omuundu yeesi nachaaka ohubaasirisa busa ati mbwe amanyire esiindu syoosi, haba saaba naamalire ohumanya koti lwaba nahoyeere ohumanya.
46008003	Nae omuundu yeesi naaba nadaha Nasae, omuundu oyo aaba amanyihane nae.
46008004	Mani sakira, koti byahadiira hu hulichaanga ebyohulya biba bibeeresebwe emisaambwa, efwe humanyire huti, “omusaambwa haba sikuli nende ohubaao hw'elalira daawe,” handi huti, “Nasae ali mulala yeng'ene.”
46008005	Olwohuba kata niyiba niyinyala ohuba naliwo abo abanyala ohuba nibalaangwa mbwe banasaye Mukulu oba hu syaalo huno, koti mubwadyeri bweene baliwo “banasaye” bangi handi nende “abaami” bangi
46008006	kata katyo, eyiri efwe, Nasae ali mulala yeng'ene, oli Seefwe, owahola ebiindu byoosi, handi oyo yihubeerawo abalamu, handi Omwaami mulala yeng'ene, Yesu Kristo, yi biindu byoosi byabitiramo hu byaloongwa, yihubitiramo hu hwaaba abalamu.
46008007	Kata katyo, abandu boosi haba sibali nende obumanyirifu buno daawe. Nae abandi, ohubitira muhunaliirira ohuba nende emisaambwa, balichaanga ebyohulya koti ebiba nibimalire ohubeeresebwa omusaambwa; mani ebibaaso byaabwe, koti lubiri ebikata, binyaasibwa.
46008008	Ebyohulya haba sinibyo ebirituyira eyiri Nasae daawe. Efwe haba sihuba nihuli bubi muno mu moni wa Nasae nikali mbwe haba sihulya esiindu syoosi, handi kata sihunyala ohuhirao obulayi nihulya.
46008009	Ohutusaho mbwe muhoyeere ohwehaliirisa, hu bulehuule bweeng'we buno buhaye ohunyala ohwehola esiindu syegumulwaho nende ababa nibali abakata.
46008010	Olwohuba mani omuundu yeesi niyeecha yaahubona ewe omuundu oliho nende obumanyirifu, nooli ohuliira mu nyumba y'emisaambwa, mani haba saaba achia ohudaha ohwemeeda, ebibaaso byae nibiba nibiri ebikata, ohulichaanga ebyohulya biba nibibereseebwe emisaambwa?
46008011	Mani sakira ohutulana nende obumanyirifu bwao buno, omuundu mukata wuno aaba achia ohusihirisibwa, omwaana wasyeeng'we oyo yi Kristo aaba niyanyala ohufwiira.
46008012	Esyeekesa mbwe, ohuholeraanga abaasyeng'we ebibi, handi nende ohuchunianga ebibaaso byaabwe nibiri ebikata bityo, muba muli ohuholaanga ebibi mu moni wa Kristo.
46008013	Mani sakira, nikali mbwe ebyohulya nibyo ebiba nibikera owasyaange ohukwa, ese siimba ninjia ohulya enyama, takera owasyaange yaakwa.
46009001	Ese haba siindi owedeembe? Haba siindi omutume? Sindabonaho Yesu Omwaami weefwe? Eng'we haba simuli ebyaamo byomulimo kuholera Omwaami?
46009002	Nitaali omutume eyiri abandu bandi, nae eyiri eng'we ndi omutume; olwohuba neng'we esilolero syomiisa obutume bwaange mu Mwaami.
46009003	Huno nihwo ohwewosaho hwange eyiri abo abahadahire ohunyiingania.
46009004	Haba sihuli nende obunyala bwohubeereswa ebyohulya nende ebyohung'wa byeefwe?
46009005	Haba sihuli nende obunyala bwohukendaanga nende omuhasi, koti lu batume bandi nende bamwaanang'ina Mwaami nende Keefa lubaholaanga?
46009006	Oba Bbarunabba nende ese fweeng'ene niifwe abahoyeere ohuholaanga emirimo hu hunyale ohunyoola esyohulya?
46009007	Muundu siina ohalaabana koti omusikaari handi mani yetunga omweene? Muundu siina otaaka endalo y'emisabbiibu mani yaahaya ohulyaaho ebyaamo byaamwo? Wiina mweene owaaya ebyaayo mani yaahaya ohung'waaho amabeere kaabyo?
46009008	Mubaasa muti ndi ohuboolaanga bino nindehoonyera obunyala bwaange koti omuundu busa? Amalako ka Musa kosi haba sikaboola katyo?
46009009	Olwohuba syandiikwa mu malako ka Musa siti, “Otaboyaanga omunwa kw'elaawu niyiri ohuhunyeenya engaano.” Mubaasa muti, Nasae adeeba hu laawu chong'ene?
46009010	Haba saalomaloma elalira hweefwe?
46009011	Nikali mbwe efwe hwabataakamo ebyomwooyo bilai, mani sihuhoyeerwe ohubakesamo ebituhoonya mu bulamu bw'omubiri?
46009012	Abandu bandi nibali nende obunyala bwohunyoola omukabo mweng'we, efwe naafwe sihuba nihuhira hooo? Kata katyo, efwe haba sihwehoonyera obunyala buno, nae hwagumira buli siindu syoosi hu huhaye ohwikalira engira y'Emboosi Ndai ya Kristo.
46009013	Eng'we haba simumanyire muti abo abaandiikwa ohuhalaabana mu nyumba ya Nasae bahoyeere ohunyoola ebyohulya byaabwe ohutula mu nyumba ya Nasae eyo, handi abo abahalaabanira hu alutaari bosi bakabana hu biyaanwa bitusirwe?
46009014	Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, Omwaami yalagira ati, abo abayaala Emboosi Ndai, bahoyeere ohunyoola obuhoonyi ohweema hu mulimo kwaabwe okwo.
46009015	Ese haba sindehonyeraanga kata obunyala buno, handi haba siindi hwandiikaanga bino hu nyemeo nyoole obuhoonyi buli butyo. Ese maya ndaafwa ohuhira omuundu yeesi ohundusaho esyo sindesungiramo.
46009016	Olwohuba, kata ninjaala Emboosi Ndai, esyo syong'ene haba sisimbeeresa ohwesuunga. Olwohuba hoyerwa-buhoyerwa ohuyaala. Mani chinjakaanire nitayaala Emboosi Ndai!
46009017	Olwohuba nimba niihola omulimo kuno hulw'ohudaha hwange omweene, mba hoyera omukabo; nae lutaali ohukuhola hulw'ohudaha hwange omweene, nguhola olwohuba Nasae yambeeresa ohukuhola.
46009018	Mani omukabo kwaange nikwo okuli yena? Nikwo kuno busa: Ohuyaalira abandu Emboosi Ndai ebihaya, nitehonyera obunyala bwaange bw'ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai.
46009019	Kata niindi omulehuule eyiri abandu boosi, omweene ndeehola omuboye w'abandu boosi, ndeete abandu bangi eyiri Kristo.
46009020	Eyiri Abayudaaya, ndeeyira koti Omuyudaaya, hunyale ohuleeta Abayudaaya. Eyiri abatukibwa nende amalako ka Musa, ndeeyira koti otukibwa nende amalako ka Musa--kata omweene nitaali ohutukibwa nende amalako ka Musa--hunyale ohuleeta abatukibwa nende amalako ka Musa.
46009021	Nae eyiri abali erwaanyi w'amalako ka Musa, ndeeyira koti oli erwaanyi w'amalako ka Musa, sino syekesa siti ndali mbula amalako ka Nasae, nae ndali ndukibwa nende amalako ka Kristo.
46009022	Eyiri abakata, ndeeyira koti omukata, hu nyale ohuleeta abakata. Ndeehola buli siindu eyiri abandu boosi, hu nyale mu ngeri yoosi ohuwoniaho abandi.
46009023	Bino byoosi mbihola hulw'Emboosi Ndai, hu nyale ohukabana hu habi chayo.
46009024	Simumanyire muti mu mbiro abeeruhi boosi bakerana, nae mulala yeng'ene niye onyoola esisiimo? Mani yiruha nochiiririra ohunyoola esisiimo.
46009025	Buli mwiruhi w'embiro yefwiirisa mu biindu biingi. Bahola batyo, hu banyale ohunyoola esitweetwe sinyaasiha, nae efwe hulwanirira esitweetwe sitaakama.
46009026	Mani ese haba sinjiruha awuma esichiiririrwa, siindi koti omulwaani olwaania emboo;
46009027	nae njuunia omubiri kwaange handi ndakutuka, ataali awo niimala ohuyaalira abandu bandi Emboosi Ndai, nyala omweene ohweyakaana nitahoyera omukabo kwayo.
46010001	Basyaange ndaha mumanye muti, bakuuka yeefwe boosi bali aasi w'esireesi, handi boosi baambuha enyaanja.
46010002	Boosi babatiisibwa mu sireesi nende mu nyaanja baaba abaloondi ba Musa.
46010003	Mani boosi balya hu syohulya silala esyo esitula Mukulu
46010004	handi baang'wa hu syohung'wa silala esyo esitula Mukulu. Olwohuba baang'wa hu maachi katulaanga mu lwaanda lwo Mukulu lwabalondaanga, mani olwaanda olwo lwali Kristo.
46010005	Kata katyo, boosi haba sibasangaasa Nasae; olwohuba abangi beecha bafwiira musiparara.
46010006	Bulaanu ebiindu bino byeholeha ohutulabula, hu huhaye ohwekoomba esibi koti lubahola.
46010007	Mutaba abalaama emisaambwa koti abandi hwaabo lubali; koti lusyandiikwa siti, “Abandu beehala aasi ohulya, nende ohung'wa, mani bamala basiingira ohuhina.”
46010008	Huteyingisaanga mubyobucheke koti abandi hwaabo lubahola, mani abandu elifu amahumi kabiri nende chidatu (23000) baafwa hu ludaalo lulala.
46010009	Hutahemaanga Omwaami koti abandi hwaabo lubahola, mani endemo chabeeta.
46010010	Mutemulugunyaanga, koti lu bandi hwaabo lubahola mani basihiriswa nende Omusuku.
46010011	Bulaanu, ebiindu bino byoosi byabeholehaho koti esy'ohulabula, handi byandiikibwa ohutusomesa, efwe abaliwo hu njakamo y'esyaalo.
46010012	Mani sakira mulehe oyo yeesi obaasa ati mulungifu, yelinde ahaye ohukwa.
46010013	Abulao esihemo syaboolaho esitoolaanga hu buli muundu. Nasae n'omwesikwa, mani haba saachia huleha ebihemo bibahira amaani bibooleho. Nae buli sihemo sinechaanga, achia ohubabeeresaanga engeri y'ohusyeonia, hu munyale ohusyesimiirisa.
46010014	Mani sakira, basyaange baheerwa, mutenamiraanga emisaambwa.
46010015	Nomaloma koti oboolera abandu bali nende amakesi; abeene mwehengereo simboola sino.
46010016	Esikoombe sihwehoonyera nihwebasa Nasae hulw'ehabi chihunyoola, nisyo obulala bweefwe mu makulu ka Kristo. Omugaati kuhudonyadonya, nikwo obulala bweefwe mu mubiri kwa Kristo.
46010017	Olwohuba omugaati kuli mulala, kata hwahaba abangi hutye, hukabana fwesi hu mugaati mulala.
46010018	Mubonereho hu bandu Bayisirayiri; abo abalya hu siyaanwa haba sibaba nibakabana hu alutaari?
46010019	Bulaanu siina syeene simboola? Mboola endi aliwo ebyohulya biyaanirwa emisaambwa, oba endi emisaambwa chiriwo?
46010020	Haba daawe. Mboola endi, ebyohulya bi bakafwiiri bawaana, babibeeresa emisaambwa, nae haba sibabibeeresa Nasae. Haba siindaha mube silala nende emisaambwa.
46010021	Simunyala ohung'wa hu sikoombe sy'Omwaami handi mwang'wa hu sikoombe sy'emisaambwa. Simunyala ohuba silala nende emeesa y'Omwaami, handi mwaaba silala nende emeesa y'emisaambwa.
46010022	Hunyala ohunyoolesa Omwaami? Hunyala ohumuhira amaani?
46010023	“Ebiindu byoosi bifukiirirwa.” Nae kata katyo, ebiindu byoosi haba sibyombaha.
46010024	Lehe omuundu yeesi atekonyera obulayi bwae yeng'ene, nae akoonye obulayi bw'abaasye.
46010025	Mulye buli siindu sikusibwa mu siito nimutateeberesa emyooyo cheeng'we chihaye ohwelalihirira.
46010026	Olwohuba, “esyaalo syoosi sy'Omwaami nisyo, nende buli siindu sisirimo.”
46010027	Niwichuhira mulala hu bakafwiiri yabalaanga ohulya nabo mani mwafukiirira ohuchia, mulicheenge buli sibababeeresa nimutateeberesa mu myooyo cheeng'we, emyooyo cheeng'we chihaye ohwelalihirira.
46010028	(Nae omuundu yeesi nababoolera ati, “Enyama yino yayanirwa emisaambwa, ” mani ohweema hu mbaasa y'omuundu obaboolere nende olwobulai bw'omwooyo
46010029	njekesa obulayi bw'omwooyo kwae, ataali okweeng'we, mutalichaanga enyama eyo.) Olwohuba, lwasiina omuundu wundi niye oba niyaheengerao mu humanya hwange?
46010030	Nimba nindebasa Nasae hulw'esyo siimba niindya, lwasiina heengerwa omusango olwesindu siindya nindebasa?
46010031	Kale, kata nooba noolya oba noong'wa, oba noohola esiindu syoosi, hola buli siindu nochiiririra oluyaali lwa Nasae.
46010032	Otanyolesaanga Abayudaaya oba Abayonaani oba abafukiiriri ba Nasae,
46010033	koti busa lungesaho ohusangaasa buli muundu mu buli siindu sihola, nitachiirririra obulayi bwaange bwong'ene, nae obulayi bw'abaangi, hu banyale ohuwonisibwa.
46011001	Mumbonereho, koti lweese mbonera hu Kristo.
46011002	Mbasiima muno olwohuba munjichulisaanga mubuli siindu, handi mwadiira mwomiisa enjekesa yoosi koti lundabadiisa.
46011003	Nae ndaha mumanye muti Kristo niye omutwe kwabuli musaacha, nae omusaacha niye omutwe kw'omuhasi wae, handi Nasae niye omutwe kwa Kristo.
46011004	Mani omusaacha yeesi oba niyekongooya Nasae oba nayaala emboosi ya Nasae nabwiihire omutwe kwae aaba aswaasa Kristo.
46011005	Nae omuhasi yeesi niyekongooya Nasae oba nayaala emboosi ya Nasae natabwiihire omutwe kwae, aaba aswaasa omusaacha wae--siri nasilala naaba nabekere omutwe kwae.
46011006	Olwohuba omuhasi natebwiiha omutwe, mani ahoyere ohubekaho efwiiri lyae; nae nisiba nisiswaasa omuhasi ohuhendeesaho oba ohubekaho efwiiri, lehe yebwiihe omutwe.
46011007	Olwohuba omusaacha sahoyeere ohubwiiha omutwe kwae, olwohuba niye esifwaanani handi oluyaali lwa Nasae; nae omuhasi niye oluyaali lw'omusaacha.
46011008	(Olwohuba omusaacha siyaholwa ohutula mu muhasi, nae omuhasi niye owatula mu musaacha.
46011009	Handi kata omusaacha haba siyaloongerwa omuhasi, nae omuhasi niye owalongerwa omusaacha.)
46011010	Esyo nisyo esikera omuhasi yahoyeera ohuba nende esitaambaya hu mutwe kwae, hulwa bamalaika.
46011011	(Kata biri bityo, nae mu Mwaami, omuhasi sabaao ataali omusaacha, oba omusaacha yabaawo ataali omuhasi;
46011012	olwohuba koti lu muhasi yaholwa ohutula mu musaacha, nilwo lusiri bulaanu, omusaacha yebulwa nende omuhasi. Nae ebiindu byoosi bitula ewa Nasae.)
46011013	Mweheengereo abeene; mani sihoyerwa omuhasi ohwekongooya Nasae natabwiihire omutwe?
46011014	Obulamu bwabuli ludaalo, haba sibubeekesa buti omusaacha ohuba nende efwiiri leeyi bimuswaasa?
46011015	Nae omuhasi naaba nende efwiiri leeyi, sisibeekesa siti eyo niyo esuunga yae? Olwohuba efwiiri lyae lyamubeereswa libe elyohwebwiiha.
46011016	Nae omuundu yeesi naaba nasiyingana, amanye ati efwe hubula oba abafukiiriri ba Nasae boosi hubula engeri yindi yoosi.
46011017	Nae mu njekesa yilondaho yino, haba simbasiima, olwohuba buli lu mwebuusa alala, bimuhola haba sibilayi ohutusaho bibi byereere.
46011018	Esitangirira elalira, buli lumwebuusa alala koti abafukiiriri, mbulira endi aliwo ohwekabulamo abeene-na-beene; handi syesi haba sisifukiiririra elalira,
46011019	olwohuba ohukabuhana-kabuhanamo huhoyeere ohubaao, hubadyeeri mweng'we banyale ohumanyihana.
46011020	Nimwebusaanga alala koti abafukiiriri, Esyengoloobe sy'Omwaami haba sinisyo simulichaanga.
46011021	Olwohuba mu hulya huno, omuundu mulala yemeeda ohulya busa ebyohulya byae, nae owundi alumwa enjala handi owundi nae ameera.
46011022	Esyo siina syeene! Haba simuli nende enyumba cheeng'we chimunyala ohuliiramo handi nende ohung'weramo? Oba muli ohulekeresaanga abafukiiriri ba Nasae, handi mwaswaasa abo abataali nabyo? Mbalomalomeho endye? Mbasiime mu siholwa sino syosi? Bbe, haba siinjia ohubasiima.
46011023	Olwohuba Omwaami niye owambeeresa esyo sindabadiisa, mbwe Omwaami Yesu mu siro siyaliirwamo olukwe, yabukula omugaati,
46011024	mani niyali naamalire ohwebasa Nasae, yaakudonyadonya, mani yaboola ati, “Kuno nikwo omubiri kwaange okuli hu lweng'we. Muholeenge sino ohunjichulisa.”
46011025	Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, nibamalire esyengoloobe, yabukula esikoombe syosi naboola ati, “Esikoombe sino nisyo elakano yaaha mu mabaanga kange. Buli lumunasing'wechaanga, musing'wecheenge, ohunjichulisa.”
46011026	Olwohuba buli lumunalicheenge hu omugaati kuno, handi buli lumunang'wecheenge hu sikoombe sino, munalangiriraanga ohufwa hw'Omwaami ohwoola lwaalikobolera.
46011027	Mani sakira, oyo yeesi, onalicheenge omugaati kuno, oba onang'wecheenge esikoombe sy'Omwaami sino mu ngeri yitahoyeere, omusango kunamuhireenge olwohunyaasa omubiri nende amabaanga k'Omwaami.
46011028	Lehe omuundu yeheberenge omweene, mani hwaamale alye hu omugaati kuno handi ang'wa hu sikoombe sino.
46011029	Olwohuba omuundu yeesi olya handi yaang'wa nataamanyire omubiri kw'Omwaami, aaba yehengeere omweene omusango.
46011030	Esyo nisyo esikera abangi hweeng'we bali abakata handi mwalwaala, handi abandi bafwa.
46011031	Nae nihweheengera abeene omusango mubwadyeri, haba sihwahahengeerwe omusango.
46011032	Nae Omwaami natuheengera omusango, aaba atusandia natukolola huhuhaye ohuheengerwa omusango kutuhire alala nende esyaalo.
46011033	Mani sakira basyaange, nimwiicha ohwebuusa alala ohulya, mulindaneenge.
46011034	Omuundu yeesi naalumwa enjala, leheenge alya engo, ataali awo, munebuusaanga alala ohuheengerwa omusango. Ebidiira hu biindu bidong'ereyo, njia ohubakerakira niinjichire.
46012001	Bulaanu ebidiira hu biyaanwa by'omwooyo, basyaange, haba siindaha mube abataboolerwa.
46012002	Mumanyire muti nimwali nimusisiiri abakafwiiri, mwahyamisibwa mwacha eyiri emisaambwa chawumumala, kata nimuba nimwakoswa busa.
46012003	Mani sakira ndaha mumanye muti, abulao omuundu yeesi oba naalomaloma nahoonyerwa nende Mwooyo wa Nasae onyala ohuboola ati, “Yesu aholimirwe!” handi abulao onyala ohuboola ati, “Yesu niye Omwaami” ohutusaho nahoonyerwe nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
46012004	Bulaanu aliwo engeri enyiingi ech'ebiyaanwa, nae Mwooyo ali mulala obikaba;
46012005	handi aliwo engeri enyiingi ech'obuhalaabani, nae Mwooyo ali mulala obukaba;
46012006	handi aliwo engeri enyiingi echobunyala buhola emirimo, nae ni Nasae mulala oyo ota buli butula mu buli muundu.
46012007	Buli muundu abeereswanga obunyala bwa Mwooyo ohumuholeramo hulw'obulayi bw'abandu boosi.
46012008	Owundi aberesebwa nende Mwooyo obunyala bw'ohukeraka eby'amakesi, nae owundi obunyala bw'ohukeraka ebimanyibwa koti Mwooyo mweene oyo aaba nadaha,
46012009	owundi nae efukiirira nende Mwooyo mweene oyo, owundi nae aberesebwa ebiyaanwa by'ohuwonianga nende Mwooyo mweene oyo,
46012010	owundi nae obunyala bw'ohuholaanga eby'amayia, nae owundi obuyaali bw'emboosi ya Nasae, nae owundi obunyala bw'ohwawuhania emyooyo chikabuhane, nae owundi obunyala bw'ohulomalomaanga enimi chitaali nasilala, nae owundi obunyala bw'ohutuumbulaanga amahulundu k'enimi.
46012011	Bino byoosi binyalirwaanga nende Mwooyo mulala mweene oyo, okabira buli muundu omweene koti lwaba nadaha.
46012012	Koti busa lu mubiri kuli mulala nae kuli nende ebituundu biingi, nae koti ebituundu by'omubiri okwo, kata koti lubiri ebiingi, biri omubiri mulala, nilwo koti lubiri kata nende Kristo.
46012013	Olwohuba ohweema hu Mwooyo mulala, efwe fweesi hwabatiisibwa mu mubiri mulala--Abayudaaya, oba Abayonaani, abaambe nende abalehuule--handi boosi banyalirwa ohung'wa hu Mwooyo mulala oyo.
46012014	Olwohuba omubiri haba sikuli nende esituundu silala syong'ene, nae kuli nende ebituundu biingi.
46012015	Nikali mbwe ohukulu hunyala hwaboola huti, “Olwohuba ese haba siindi muhono, mani haba siindi hu mubiri,” esyo haba sisinyala hukuhola obutabaaho kata esituundu sy'omubiri okwo.
46012016	Nae nikali mbwe ohutwi hwahanyalire ohuboola huti, “Olwohuba ese haba siindi emoni, mani haba siindi hu mubiri,” esyo haba sisinyala ohuhuhola obutabaaho kata esituundu sy'ohumubiri okwo.
46012017	Nikali mbwe omubiri kwoosi kwahabeere nikuli emoni ndala, ohuwulira nahwo hwabeere huli yena? Nikali mbwe omubiri kwoosi kwahabeere nikuli ohutwi hulala, obunyala bw'ohuwunyiirisa bwahabeere nibuli yena?
46012018	Nae koti lu siri, Nasae yata ebituundu hu mubiri, buli situla, koti omweene yadoola.
46012019	Nikali mbwe ebyo byoosi byali nibiri esituundu silala, omubiri nakwo mani kwahabeere nikuli yena?
46012020	Koti lu siri, aliwo ebituundu ebiingi, nae kuli omubiri mulala.
46012021	Emoni haba siyinyala ohuboolera omuhono yiti, “Sibulao siwahahoonya,” oba handi omutwe ohuboolera ebiikala by'amakulu kuti, “Sibulao siwahahoonya.”
46012022	Nae olundi siri mbwe, ebituundu by'omubiri ebibonehana koti ebitaali nende obuhoonyi, nibyo ebitahebwaabwa,
46012023	handi ebituundu by'omubiri ebyo bihubaasa huti biri nende oluyaali ludiidi, nibyo bihutaamo luyaali luhuluundu luhiramo, nae ebituundu by'efwe ebitahoyera nibyo bihudiira nende obutiiririrwa buhoongo muno,
46012024	bu bituundu by'efwe bitahoyera muno bitadaha. Nae nasaye yayiiya bulai bweene omubiri, naberesaanga oluyaali luhiramo, ebituundu bihira ohulekeresebwa,
46012025	hubulaanu atabaawo obutawuliirisania mu mubiri, nae mbwe buli situundu sinyale ohuba nende ohuchuunirwa hwaakanirira eyiri esyaasye.
46012026	Nikali mbwe esituundu silala sichunisibwa, byoosi bichunisibirwa alala; nikali mbwe esituundu silala sibeeresebwa oluyaali, ebyaasye byoosi bisangaalira alala nasyo.
46012027	Bulaanu muli omubiri kwa Kristo, buli muundu yeng'ene ali esituundu syaakwo.
46012028	Mani Nasae yamala ohudoola mu bafukiiriri ba Kristo, natangira nende abatume, naloondyaho abayaali b'emboosi ya Nasae, naloondyaho abekesa, abawonia, abatuki, abalomalomi b'enimi ch'engeri chikabuhaane.
46012029	Boosi ni abatume? Boosi ni abayaali? Boosi ni abekesa? Mani boosi baholaanga amayia?
46012030	Mani boosi bali nende ebiyaanwa by'ohuwonianga? Mani boosi balomalomaanga mu nimi? Mani boosi batumbulaanga amahulundu?
46012031	Nae mubwadyeri bweene, mwekombeenge ohuba nende ebiyaanwa by'akulu. Handi njia ohubeekesa handi engira yihiramo obulayi.
46013001	Nimba ninomanomaanga mu nimi ch'abandu kata nende echa bamalaika, nae haba siindi nende ohudaha, ese mba ndi eside sy'oluyoka oba endeke yichaangalya.
46013002	Nae nimba niindi nende amaani k'ohuyalaanga, handi nende ak'ohufumbulaanga ebyaama byoosi handi nende obumanyirifu bwoosi, handi nimba niindi nende efukiirira yoosi, eyinyala yaakera ndanyalaanga ohwiyaanga engulu, nae nimba nitaali nende ohudaha, mba ndi ebihaya.
46013003	Ningaba ebiindu byoosi bimba nabyo, handi kata nindaayo omubiri kwaange kusaambwe, nae haba siindi nende ohudaha, abulao sinyoola.
46013004	Ohudaha hwesimiirisa handi sisa; ohudaha haba sihali-hali oba ohwewulira;
46013005	haba sihudyaabuha handi siitima. Ohudaha haba sihwoomera hu ngira yaahwo; haba sihuchuunia oba ohusinyiha;
46013006	haba sihusangaalira esitahoyera, nae husangaalira mu sihoyera.
46013007	Ohudaha hukiinga ebiindu byoosi, hufukiirira ebiindu byoosi, husuubira ebiindu byoosi, huyiingira ebiindu byoosi.
46013008	Ohudaha haba sihwaakama; amayaalo, kacha ohuwa; enimi, chicha ohwaakama; obumanyirifu, bucha ohuwa.
46013009	Olwohuba obumanyirifu bweefwe haba sibulungifu bweene, handi amayaalo keefwe koosi haba simaluungifu keene;
46013010	nae ebilungifu byeene nibicha ohwiicha, ebitaali ebilungifu bicha ohuwaao.
46013011	Nindali nisisiiri omuyere, ndalomalomaanga koti omuyere, ndabasaanga koti omuyere, ndakerakaanga koti omuyere; nae nideecha ndeehola omusaacha, ndeecha ndaaleha engira ch'oluyere.
46013012	Olwohuba bulaanu, huli ohubonera musyebonerwamo amabuulyeesi, nae esiha esyo hucha ohubonana emoni-hu-moni. Bulaanu manyireho ebituundu; esiha esyo njia ohumanya mubwichufu, kata nende koti lundamala ohumanyihana mubwichufu.
46013013	Sakira efukiirira, esuubi, ohudaha ebiriwo bino bidatu; nae esihiramo obuhunuufu mu byoosi bino ni ohudaha.
46014001	Hola ohudaha hube esichiiririrwa syao, handi wekoombe bulai ebiyaanwa by'omwooyo, ohuhirira elalira mbwe onyale ohuyalaanga.
46014002	Olwohuba oyo olomaloma mu nimi, haba saalomalomera abandu nae Nasae; olwohuba awumawo omuundu oba namuwulira, nae aba atumbula busa ebyaama mu Mwooyo.
46014003	Nae hu muhono kundi, oyo oyaala emboosi ya Nasae, aaba alomalomera abandu hu banyale ohuhula handi bombahibwe handi balemesebwe omyooyo.
46014004	Oyo olomaloma mu lulimi lundi aaba yeyikusa omweene, nae oyo oyaala yekusa abafukiiriri.
46014005	Bulaanu ese ndaha eng'we mulomalome mu nimi, nae ndahadahire ohuhirao muyaaleenge. Oyo oyaala muhunuufu muno ohuhira oyo olomaloma mu nimi, ohutusaho omuundu wundi naaba naliwo onyala ohutuumbula amahulundu, hu bafukiiriri banyale ohwikuswa.
46014006	Bulaanu, basyaange, niinjicha yimuli ninomanoma mu nimi, mba njia ohubahoonya endye, ohutusaho nimba nimbaleetera ohubwiihulirwa oba obumanyirifu oba amayaalo, oba ameeko?
46014007	Kata ebihubba bitaalimo obulamu, koti elere oba endoongo, nibitatusa amakono kawuliirihana, omuundu yahamanya atye esiba nisiri ohuubbwa?
46014008	Nae ehoombi niyitusa ekono litawuliirihana bulai, ni naanu oba achia ohwetekeha ebiita?
46014009	Sakira kata mwesi; nimuba nimulomaloma enimi echitaamanyihaane, omuundu aaba achia ohumanya atye esiba nisiboolerwe? Olwohuba muba mucha ohuba nimulomalomera busa emboo.
46014010	Ataali ohukana-kana aliwo enimi enyiingi mu syaalo, nae abulao olutaalimo amahulundu;
46014011	nae nimba nitaamanyire amahulundu ak'olulimi lwoosi, mba njia ohuba omukeni eyiri omulomalomi, handi omulomalomi oyo aaba achia ohuba omukeni yiindi.
46014012	Sakira kata mwesi; koti lumuli nende amawofu ohubona ebiholwa bya Mwooyo, mulwaanirire ohwemeeda mu hwombaha abafukiiriri.
46014013	Mani sakira, oyo olomaloma mu lulimi lundi, ahoyeere ohwekongooya Nasae yaamuba amaani ak'ohutuumbula amahulundu.
46014014	Olwohuba nindekongooya mu lulimi lundi, omwooyo kwaange nikwo okuba nikwekongooya, nae ebibaaso byaange biba haba sibiri nende obuhoonyi bwoosi.
46014015	Siina syeene siimba hole? Njia ohwekongooya nende omwooyo, handi njia ohwekongooya nende ebibaaso byosi; njia ohweemba nende omwooyo, handi njia ohweemba nende ebibaaso byosi.
46014016	Ataali awo, nooba niwebasa Nasae nende omwooyo, omuundu oba naali mu sifwo sy'omuundu werwanyi, aaba achia ohuboola ati, “Amiina” hu hwebasa hwao naaba nataamanyire byooba nobolaanga?
46014017	Olwohuba onyala ohuba niwebasire Nasae bulai muno, nae omuundu wundi oyo haba saaba nihoonyiibwe.
46014018	Ese ndeebasa Nasae endi nomalomaanga mu nimi ohuhira eng'we mweesi;
46014019	kata katyo, mu bafukiiriri, sihirira ohulomaloma kata emboosi chitaanu chong'ene mu bibaaso, hu nyale ohukolola abandi, ohuhira emboosi elifu ehumi mu lulimi lutamanyihaane.
46014020	Basyaange, mutaba abayere mu hubaasa hweeng'we; mube abadoto mu bibi, nae mu hubaasa, mube abawangafu.
46014021	Syandiikwa mu malako ka Musa siti, “Omwaami aboola ati, nindehoonyera abandu b'enimi ngeni, handi nindehoonyera eminwa ech'abakeni, njia ohulomalomera abandu bano, nae handi kata katyo, sibachia hundekeeresa.”
46014022	Hulweesyo, enimi nicho ahalolero eyitaali abafukiirira nae eyiri abatafukiirira, nae ohuyaala emboosi ya Nasae sihuli hutyo eyiri abatafukiirira, nae eyiri abafukiirira.
46014023	Mani, nikali mbwe abafukiiriri boosi nibebuusa mani boosi balomalomaanga mu nimi, nae abandu b'erwaanyi oba abataali abafukiiriri beengira, haba sibaba bacha ohuboola bati muli abalalu?
46014024	Nae boosi nibaba nibayaala, nae omuundu otaali omufukiiriri oba omuundu w'erwaanyi yengira, aba achia ohwekeswa omusango kwae nende abandu abo boosi, aba achia ohuhubbirisibwa nende abandu abo boosi,
46014025	ebyaama by'omumwooyo kwae biba bicha ohukisulwa; mani bikere, akwiire aasi obweeni bwae, niyekongooya Nasae handi naboola ati hane Nasae abalimo.
46014026	Mani siina syeene siindi ohuboolaanga, basyaange? Nimuba nimwebuusire, omuundu wundi abechenge nende olweembo, owundi nende esomo, owundi ohwikulirwao, owundi olulimi, oba ohweekesa amahulundu. Muleheenge buli siindu siholwa hulw'ohwikusa abandu.
46014027	Nikali mbwe owundi alomaloma mu lulimi lundi, muleheenge abaawo abandu babiri, oba abataduuma mu badatu, handi buli muundu amaleenge huyekulira owaasye; handi muleheenge mani abaawo omuundu wundi otumbula amahulundu.
46014028	Nae naaba nabulao omuundu oba nanyala ohutuumbula amahulundu, muleheenge boosi bawuleera busa nibali mu bafukiiriri, mani belomalomeraanga buli otula omweene, nende Nasae wae.
46014029	Leheenge abayaali babiri kata badatu balomalomaanga, mani abandi badong'a nibakeraania buli siba nisibooleebwe.
46014030	Nikali mbwe ohubwiihulirwa hwoola hu muundu wundi oba niyehaale aambi awo, muleheenge oba natangiire awuleera mberi.
46014031	Olwohuba mweesi munyala ohuyalaanga syamulala-mulala, hu bandu boosi banyale ohweeka mani boosi bagumisibwa;
46014032	mani emyooyo ch'abayaali chihoyeere ohufukwaanga nende abayaali beene.
46014033	Olwohuba Nasae haba si Nasae ow'ohutabuhana, nae ni Nasae w'omuleembe. Koti lusiri mumihung'aano choosi ech'aboolerefu,
46014034	abahasi bahoyeere ohuwuleeraanga nibali mu mihung'aano ch'abafukiiriri. Olwohuba haba sibafukiirirwa ohulomalomaanga, nae bahoyeere ohuba abawulisi, koti busa lu malako ka Musa kaboola.
46014035	Nikali mbwe aliwo esiindu syoosi sibadaha ohumanya, muleheenge bacha bateebera engo bawamwaabwe. Olwohuba sy'esoni omuhasi ohulomalomaanga mu muhung'aano kw'abafukiiriri.
46014036	Siina syeene? Mani emboosi ya Nasae yachaakira mweng'we, oba ning'we mweng'ene bayoolaho?
46014037	Nikali mbwe omuundu yeesi abaasa ati ali omuyaali, oba yechula mwooyo, ahoyeere ohwomiisa ati, siindi ohubandiikira sino n'esilagiro sy'Omwaami.
46014038	Nikali mbwe omuundu yeesi haba saamanyire sino, mani haba yesi saamanyihaane daawe.
46014039	Mani, basyaange, mwahekombere bulai bweene ohuyaala, nihaandi mutakayiraanga ohulomalomaanga mu nimi chiindi;
46014040	nae buli siindu sihoyeere ohuholebwaanga nende esiroonyo handi muhutekeha hulai.
46015001	Bulaanu njia ohubeechulisa basyaange, engeri siina yimbayaalirangamo emboosi ndayi, yimwanyoola, yimwemeremo,
46015002	eyibawonia, nikali mbwe muyidiira mwayomiisa--ohutusaho nikali mbwe ohufukiirira hweeng'we hubulamo esifune.
46015003	Olwohuba ndabaleetera koti esihuluundu sihiramo byoosi, esyo si syesi ndanyoola, esiri mbwe, Kristo yafwiira ebibi byeefwe ohweema koti ebyandiiko byolerefu lubiboola,
46015004	biti yasiihibwa, biti yasyuhisibwa hu ludaalo lw'ohudatu ohweema koti ebyandiiko byolerefu lubiboola,
46015005	handi biti yabonehera Keefa, handi nende ehumi-na-babiri bala.
46015006	Handi yeecha yabonehera abafukiiriri babita emia chitaanu ehabi lala, abahira obuungi hubo basisiiri abalamu, kata nende abandi bamala ohukona endoolo.
46015007	Handi yeecha yabonehera Yakobbo, handi nende abatume boosi.
46015008	Olumaliiriha lweene, koti eyiri oyo oteebulwa koti abandi bebulwaanga, syesi yambonehera.
46015009	Olwohuba ese nise ohiramo obudiidi oluyaali, otahoyera kata ohulaangwa omutume, olwohuba ndaboniabonia abafukiiriri ba Nasae.
46015010	Nae hulw'esisa sya Nasae, mbano ndi koti lundi, handi esisa syae esyo eyiri ese haba syali esyebihaya. Hulubeka lundi, ndahalaabana muno ohuhira abo boosi, kata nende nitaali ni nise, nae esisa sya Nasae esiri naange.
46015011	Kata nende mani nindali ese oba abeene abo, hu yaala hutyo, handi mwesi mufukiirira mutyo.
46015012	Bulaanu nikali mbwe Kristo ayaalwa koti oyo owasyuuhisibwa ohutula mu bafu, omuundu wundi nae anyala atye ohuboola ati, abulao ohusyuuhira hw'abafu?
46015013	Nae nikali mbwe abulao ohusyuuhira hw'abafu, mani kali mbwe Kristo haba siyasyuuhisibwa;
46015014	nae nikali mbwe Kristo haba siyasyuhisibwa, mani kali mbwe ohuyaala hweefwe hw'ebihaya, handi efukiirira yeng'we yosi y'ebihaya.
46015015	Huba hunyoolehana ohuba nihutahihirira Nasae bulai, olwohuba hwekesaanga huti Nasae niye owasyuusa Kristo, yatasyuusa nikali mbwe siri esyadyeeri mbwe abafu haba sibasyuuhisibwa.
46015016	Olwohuba abafu nikali mbwe haba sibasyuuhisibwa, mani kali mbwe Kristo haba siyasyuhisibwa.
46015017	Nikali mbwe Kristo haba siyasyuhisibwa, efukiirira yeng'we yiba niyiri eyiibula obuhoonyi, mani musisiiri mu bibi byeeng'we.
46015018	Mani abo bosi abamala ohukona nibali mu Kristo baba basihirira busa.
46015019	Nikali mbwe nihulw'obulamu buno bwong'ene luhwasuubiriraho Kristo, mani mu bandu boosi niifwe abo abahoyeere nihusaasirwa muno.
46015020	Nae mu bwadyeeri bweene, Kristo yasyuhisibwa ohutula mu bafu, ohuba ebyaamo bitaangira eby'abo abamala ohukona endoolo.
46015021	Olwohuba koti lu hubitira mu muundu ohufwa hwecha, handi ohubitira mu muundu ohusyuuhira ohw'abafu, hwosi hwamala ohwiicha.
46015022	Olwohuba koti mu Adamu abandu boosi bafwa, mani lwosi mu Kristo, abandu boosi balamusibwa.
46015023	Nae buli muundu ohweema hu hutekeherwa hwae: Kristo ebyaamo bitaangira, mani hulw'ohwichira hwae, baloondeho aba Kristo.
46015024	Mani enjakamo huyaheeche, niyahabe nadiisa obwaami eyiri Nasae Omuloongi naamalire ohusihirisa buli butuki handi nende buli bunyala nende amaani.
46015025	Olwohuba ahoyeere ohutuka ohwoola lwaalimala ohuta abasuku bae boosi mu makulu kae.
46015026	Omusuku olisembayo ohusihirisibwa niye ohufwa.
46015027	“Olwohuba Nasae yamala ohuta ebiindu byoosi aasi w'obunyala bwae mu makulu kae.” Nae nikaboola kati, “Ebiindu byoosi bicha ohuteebwa aasi w'obunyala bwae aasi wae,” siba siboneha alafu mbwe omweene aba naleheebwe oyo ochia ohuta ebiindu byoosi aasi wae.
46015028	Ebiindu byoosi nibimalire ohuteebwa aasi w'obunyala bwae, awo niwo yi mwaana mweene yesi achia ohuteebwa aasi w'obunyala bwae oyo oba niyata ebiindu byoosi aasi wae, hu bulaanu Nasae anyale ohuba buli siindi eyiri buli muundu.
46015029	Ataali awo, abandu baba nibekesaanga siinna nibabatiisibwaanga hulw'abafwa? Nikali mbwe abafwa haba sibasyuuhisibwaho kata, lwasiina abandu babatiisibwaanga hulw'abwe?
46015030	Lwasiina ese mweene ndi mu lumbe buli siha?
46015031	Ese nyiingana, basyaange, nende esuunga yange mweng'we, yindi nayo mu Kristo Yesu Omwaami weefwe, fwa busa buli ludaalo!
46015032	Siina syeene siimba ninyoola, muhulomaloma hwa buli ludaalo, ndalwaana nende amanani mu Buwefeeso? Nikali mbwe abafu haba sibasyuuhisibwa, “Mulehe hweliire, handi hweeng'weere, olwohuba muchuli hucha ohufwa.”
46015033	Mutabachibwaanga: “Emikaanda mibi chinyaasa ebiima bilai.”
46015034	Mukobolemo amakesi, mani muhaye ohwonoona handi. Olwohuba abandi mweng'we haba sibamanyireho Nasae. Mboola sino ohubaswaasaho.
46015035	Nae omuundu wundi anyala ohuteeba ati, “Abafu basyuhisibwa batye? Beecha nende omubiri kw'engeri siina?”
46015036	Omuundu n'omuusiru! Esiindu syotaaka, haba sisimera ohwoola lusifwa.
46015037	Handi esiindu syotaaka haba sinikwo omubiri okucha ohumera, nae ni olumwo lwereere, awundi olwengaano oba olw'emere yindi.
46015038	Nae Nasae yeecha yaaluba omubiri koti omweene lwaaba nadoolere, handi hu buli ngeri y'olumwo, omubiri kwaalwo kweene.
46015039	Olwohuba enyama choosi haba sichifwaanana, nae yiriwo ndala ey'abandu, eyiindi eyebisolo, eyiindi y'amayoni, nae eyiindi y'eng'eeni.
46015040	Aliwo emibiri cho Mukulu, handi aliwo emibiri chohusyaalo; nae oluyaali lw'omu Kulu luli hubwaalwo, handi oluyaali lw'ohusyaalo, lwosi lundi.
46015041	Aliwo oluyaali lw'elyuuba, handi nende oluyaali lundi olw'omwoosi, handi oluyaali lundi olw'ening'ining'i; olwohuba buli ning'ining'i yikabuhaane nende eyaasye mu luyaali.
46015042	Mani syosi siri sityo nende ohusyuuha hw'abafu. Esitaakibwa sisihirira, nae esyo esisyuhisibwa haba sisisihirira.
46015043	Sitaakibwa nisilekeresebwa, sisyuuhisibwa mu luyaali. Sitaakibwa mukata, sisyuuhisibwa mu maani.
46015044	Sitaakibwa nisiri omubiri kuboneha, sisyuuhisibwa nisiri omubiri kw'omwooyo. Nikali mbwe kuliwo omubiri kubonehana, mani handi kuliwo omubiri kw'omwooyo.
46015045	Mani sakira syandiikibwa siti, “Adamu omuundu wataangira yeecha yehola esiindu silamu”; Adamu wasembayo, yeecha yehola mwooyo okaba obulamu.
46015046	Nae haba esy'omwooyo sinisyo esitaangira, nae esibonehana nisyo esitaangira, mani hu sy'omwooyo syalondaho.
46015047	Omuundu wataangira yatula mu loba, omuundu otula mu lufu; omuundu w'ohubiri nae atula Mukulu.
46015048	Koti lu muundu w'olufu yali, nilwo lubali abo abatula mu lufu; handi koti lwali omuundu owomu Kulu, nilwo lubali abo abomu Kulu.
46015049	Koti busa luhwanyoola esifwaanani esy'omuundu ow'olufu, hucha handi ohunyoola esifwaanani esy'omuundu wo Mukulu.
46015050	Mbaboolera sino, basyaange: enyama nende amabaanga haba sibinyala hunyoola obwaami bwa Nasae, kata ebiindu bisihirira byosi sibinyala hunyoola ebitasihirira.
46015051	Eee! Njia ohubaboolera esyaama. Fweesi haba sihuchia ohuba sihwamala ohukona endoolo, nae fweesi hucha ohuchuusibwa,
46015052	mu siha sidiidi muno, koti mu hukwiisa emoni, hu huubbwa hw'eturumbeta huseembayo. Olwohuba eturumbeta yicha ohuubba, mani abafu bacha ohusyuuhisibwa nibatahanyala ohusihirira, mani fweesi hucha ohuchuusibwa.
46015053	Olwohuba obulamu bweefwe busihirira buno, buhoyeere ohwefwaala obutasihirira, handi obulamu bweefwe bwaakama buno, buhoyeere ohwefwaala obutaakama.
46015054	Ohusihirira nihumala hwafwaala ohutasihirira, handi mani ohuwaao hwamala hwefwaala ohutawaao, awo niwo aliba ohwolerera ohw'enomanoma yandiikibwa yiti: “Ohufwa humirirwe mu huyiingira.”
46015055	“Aaa ohufwa, ohuyingira hwao huli yena? Aaa ohufwa, obuluungu bwao buli yena?”
46015056	Obuluungu bw'ohufwa buli mu sibi, handi amaani k'esibi kali mu malako ka Musa.
46015057	Nae Nasae yebale, oyo otubeeresa obuyiingiri ohubitira mu Mwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo.
46015058	Mani sakira, basyaange baheerwa, mube abomiifu, abatadenganisibwa, buli siha nimuhayiire mu mulimo kw'Omwaami, nimumanyire muti mu Mwaami oyo, obuhalaabani bweeng'we haba sibuchia huba obwebihaya.
46016001	Bulaanu ebidiira hubisoloserwa aboolerefu: koti lundaboolera abafukiiriri bali mu Galatia, nilwo lu mwesi muhoyeere ohuhola.
46016002	Hu ludaalo lutaangira mu juma, buli mulala hweeng'we ahoyeere ohukabulaanga esiindu endulo, mani asibiiha, koti omweene lwaba nanyaliirwe, hubulaanu yihaye ohubaao ohusolosa nimba nimalire ohwiicha eyo.
46016003	Mani nindahoole, ndahatume abo bamusiima nende ebbarwa ohukinga ebiyaanwa byeeng'we babiyire e Yerusaalemu.
46016004	Nisiicha syabonehana ohuba esy'amakesi endi syesi njiireho, baba bacha ohuchia naange.
46016005	Njia ohubakeniya nimalire ohuhalakania Makedonia, olwohuba suubira ohuhalakania mu Makedonia,
46016006	mani awundi njihaleho nang'we oba awundi maleho etoocho yoosi, hu munyale ohuhoonya nyanguyeho mu lukeendo lwaange, yoosi yimba njia ohuchichaanga.
46016007	Olwohuba siindi hudaha ohubabonaho busa mabita; Suubira ohubaaho nang'we hulw'esiha sileeyi hooho, Omwaami naakanya.
46016008	Nae njia ohwihala mu Efeeso ohwoola hu Petekoote,
46016009	olwohuba omulyaango mutabaafu kumalire ohunjikulirwao ohuhola omulimo kw'amaani, handi yiriyo abanyingania abaangi.
46016010	Timoteo niyeecha, mubonaanga muti mu muliinda bulai, olwohuba ali ohuhola omulimo kw'Omwaami koti lundi.
46016011	Mani mulehe omuundu yeesi atamulekeresa daawe. Mumwanguyangaho mu lukeendo lwae mu muleembe, hwaanyale ohukobola eno yindi; olwohuba ndi ohumuliinda yeecha nende abafukiiriri basye.
46016012	Nae hulw'omusyaani weefwe Apolo, mwekweedere muno endi abakeniyeho nende basyeefwe bandi, nae haba omweene haba saabeere nadahaho ohwiicha eyo bulaanu kata budiidi. Achia ohwiicha naanaba nanyoolere esiha.
46016013	Mube ameeso, mweeme mwomiire mu fukiirira yeng'we, mube abalulu, mube ab'amaani.
46016014	Mulehe ebyo byoosi bimuba nimuhola biholebweenge mu hudaha.
46016015	Bulaanu, basyaange, mumanyire muti edaala lya Sitefaano nilyo elyali elyataangira ohuchuuha mu Akaia, mani lyewaayo muno ohuhalaabanira aboolerefu;
46016016	Mbekweeda mwiise oluyaali mu bandu bafwaana batyo, handi buli muhalaabani nende omuhosi wasyeng'we.
46016017	Sangaliire ohwiicha hwa Sitefaano nende Foritunaata nende Akayiaka, olwohuba bacha ohwichusa ohutabaao hweeng'we.
46016018	olwohuba bajong'olosa omwooyo kwa handi nende okweeng'we. Mwichulisaanga abandu bafwaana batyo.
46016019	Abafukiiriri bali mu Asiiya baabatumira amaheeso. Akwiila nende Purisiila, alala nende abafukiiriri bali mu madaala kaabwe, baabatumira amaheeso k'ohumwooyo bweene mu Mwaami.
46016020	Basyeefwe boosi baabatumira amaheeso. Heesanie nende ohukwiichana mu birifu hwolerefu.
46016021	Ese, Paulo, nyandiika ohuheesa huno nende omuhono kwaange kweene.
46016022	Nikali mbwe omuundu yeesi haba saali nende ohudaha Omwaami, ahoyere oholimirwe. Omwaami weefwe yicha!
46016023	Esisa sy'Omwaami Yesu sibe nang'we.
46016024	Ohudaha hwange hube nang'we mweesi mu Kristo Yesu. Amiina.
47001001	Ohutula eyiri Paulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu ohweema hu hudaha hwa Nasae, handi ohutula eyiri Timoteo omusyaani weefwe. Ohuchiira abafukiiriri ba Nasae abali mu Koliiti, handi ohuchiira abandu ba Nasae boosi abali mu Akaia mwoosi:
47001002	Esisa sibe yimuli nende omuleembe kutula eyiri Nasae Seefwe, nende Omwaami Yesu Kristo.
47001003	Abeeresebwe oluyaali Nasae handi laatang'ene Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo, Nasae w'esisa siingi handi Nasae omulemisi w'emyooyo choosi,
47001004	oyo otulemyaanga emyooyo mu husaanda hweefwe hwoosi, hu fwesi hunyale ohulemya emyooyo abo ababa nibali mu husaanda hwoosi, nende ohulemya omwooyo fwesi ohutulemyaanga emyooyo nende Nasae.
47001005	Olwohuba koti lu fwesi hukabanira elalira mu bwiichufu mu husaanda hungi hwa Kristo, nilwo fwesi muhubitira mu Kristo oyo hukabanira elalira mu bwiichufu mu hulemya omwooyo ohwo.
47001006	Nihuba nihuchuunisibwa, ni hulw'ohulemesebwa emyooyo hweeng'we nende ohuwonisibwa; nae nihuba nihulemesebwa emyooyo, ni hulw'ohulemesebwa emyooyo hweeng'we, humunyoola nimuba nimunyala ohwesimiirisa nimugumire ohusaanda hu fwesi husaanda ohwo.
47001007	Esuubi lyeefwe mweng'we lyomiifu; olwohuba humanyire huti koti lu mwesi muli ohukabana mu husaanda hweefwe hungi, mucha mwesi ohukabana mu hulemesebwa omwooyo hweefwe.
47001008	Olwohuba efwe haba sihudaha mube nimutaamanyire, basyeefwe, ohuchunisibwa hu hwanyoola nihuli mu Asiiya; olwohuba hwanyooberwa elalira hubitiirira esikero ohwoola lu hwebwaabira elalira obulamu.
47001009	Hu lwasiina, nae hwali nihumalire ohumanya huti hwali nihumalire ohuheengerwa omusango kw'ohufwa; nae esyo syali esituhola hwahaya ohwesikana abeene-na-beene, nae ohwesika Nasae oyo osyusaanga abafu;
47001010	yatununula ohututusa mu buchuuni bwiita busa obwo, mani achia ohutununula handi; hu mweene oyo, nihwo hu huteere esuubi lyeefwe huti achia ohutununula ehabi liindi.
47001011	Eng'we mwesi muhoyeere ohutuhoonyera nende amasaayo, hu bandi bangi banyale ohwoola ohutwebasira hulw'esisa sihuba nihwabeeresebwa ohweema hu masaayo maangi.
47001012	Olwohuba ohwefumia hweefwe, nihwo huno mbwe, ohubaasa hweefwe huhwebisiiremo mu syaalo muno, nende ohumeedaho eng'we mwesi, alala nende obwolerefu nende obwadyeeri bw'ediini, nihuteehoonyera amakesi k'esyaalo, nae ohweema hu sisa sya Nasae.
47001013	Olwohuba efwe sihubandiikira siindu siindi ohutusa ebyo bimunyala ohusoma handi mwamanya; mbaasa endi mucha ohumanyira elalira mu bwiichufu,
47001014	koti lumwali mwamanyaho bidiidi, hu munyale ohutwesiimiramo koti luhunyala fwesi ohubesiimiramo, hu ludaalo lw'Omwaami Yesu.
47001015	Olwohuba ndali nisuubira sino, ndadaha ohutangira ohwiicha yimuli, hu munyale ohunyoola esangaalo ly'amahabi kabiri;
47001016	Ndadaha ohubakeniya niindi hu lukeendo lwaange lucha e Makedonia, handi ohubakobolera nindula e Makedonia hu nyale ohukera muhoonye ninjia hu lukeendo lwaange lwohucha mu Buyudaaya.
47001017	Mani ndali nindondobaane nindali nindahire ohuhola endyo? Mani ese holaanga endekeha change koti omuundu w'ohusyaalo busa, nindetekeehe ohuboola endi Eee handi endi bbe esiha silala esyo?
47001018	Mubwomiifu bweene koti lu Nasae ali omwesikwa, emboosi yeefwe yihubaboleere haba siyibeere niyiri Eee handi bbe.
47001019	Olwohuba Omwaana wa Nasae, Yesu Kristo, yihwa bayalaangamo, Silifwaano, Timoteo nende ese, haba siyali “Eee” handi “bbe”; nae mu mweene oyo buli siha ni “Eee”.
47001020	Olwohuba ebisuubise bya Nasae binyolaanga “Eee” yaabyo mu mweene oyo. Mani sakira huboolaanga huti Amiina nihubitira mu mweene oyo, hulw'oluyaali lwa Nasae.
47001021	Nae ni Nasae niye otechaanga efwe nang'we mu Kristo, handi yamala omweene ohututuma;
47001022	yamala ohututaaho esilolero syae nende ohutubeeresa Mwooyo wae mu myooyo cheefwe ohuba esyomiisa.
47001023	Nae ndi ohulaanga Nasae yeeche abe omujulisi wange--mbwe ndali nindaha ohubaleha busa nisyo esyakera ndahaya ohwiicha eyo mu Koliiti.
47001024	Ataali mbwe hwadaha ohubadwiiha busa ohuhema efukiirira yeng'we; olwohuba huholeraanga alala nang'we hulw'esangaalo lyeng'we, olwohuba mwomiira mu fukiirira yeng'we.
47002001	Olwohuba ese ndaheengao ohutabatekehera olukeendo lundi olunyala ohubachuunia.
47002002	Olwohuba nimba nimbachuunia, ni naanu mweene oliyo onyala yasangaasa, ohutusaho oyo yimba ninjuniisye?
47002003	Mani ndandiika koti lundandiika endyo, hu bulaanu nimba niinjicha eyo, tanyala ohuchunisibwa nende abo abahahoyeere ohusangaasa, olwohuba ndali nimbeesika mweesi, endi esangaalo lyaange lyahahoyeere lyaaba esangaalo lyeng'we mweesi.
47002004	Olwohuba ndabandiikira ninyemere hu huchunisibwa nende ohwekanyiisa hw'omwooyo handi nende amasika amaangi, nitachiiririra ohubachuunia nae ohukera mumanye ohudaha hwaange hubitiirifu humbadahiramo.
47002005	Nae omuundu yeesi naaba nachuniisye owaasye, haba saaba niyaholeere ese syeng'ene, nae mu sikero siindi--ataali ohusihola ohuba esibi muno--aaba aholeere eng'we mweesi.
47002006	Olwohuba omuundu ofwaana atyo, esibonereso sy'abandu bahira obuungi siba simala busa;
47002007	sakira eng'we muhoyeere mwakaluuhana mwamuleheramo, handi mwamulemya omwooyo, awundi aaba achia ohuyingirwa nende ohwelalihirira hubitiirifu.
47002008	Sakira mbekweda mumwichuliseenge ohumudaha hweeng'we.
47002009	Olwohuba sino nisyo esyakera ninyandiika, hu nyale ohubahema mani nyemeo nyale ohumanya nimuli abawulisi mu buli siindu syoosi.
47002010	Omuundu yeesi yo leheramo, syesi mba ndamuleheramo. Esyo siimba nimalire ohuleheramo, nimba nindeheeremo omuundu yeesi esiindu syoosi, siba syeemere hweeng'we mu moni wa Kristo,
47002011	ohunyala ohukayira Sitaani ohunyoola obweyaango ohutufubulira; olwohuba efwe haba sihuli abakoterwe engeri chae.
47002012	Nindeecha mu Turaosi ohuyaala emboosi ndayi ya Kristo, omulyaango kwanjikuhira busa mu Mwaami;
47002013	nae ebibaaso byaange haba sibyakwalaala olwohuba haba sindakaana Tiito mwaanaama naaliyo. Sakira ndeecha ndaabatulaho mani ndaamala ndaachia e Makedonia.
47002014	Nae Nasae yebasibwe muno, oyo obitiraanga mu Kristo atwimiriraanga muhuyiingira, handi ohubitiraanga mw'efwe, asasaanianga esiing'aari sy'ohumumanya buli abuundu.
47002015	Olwohuba efwe niifwe esiing'aari sya Kristo eyiri Nasae mw'abo abali ohuwonisibwaanga, handi mwabo abali ohusihiriranga,
47002016	eyiri owundi ni esiing'aari sy'ohutula mu hufwa ohuchia mu hufwa, nae eyiri owundi ni esiing'aari situla mu bulamu ohuchia mu bulamu. Ni naanu mweene oyera bino byoosi?
47002017	Olwohuba efwe haba sihuyera, koti busa abandu bangi bali, abawoonianga emboosi ya Nasae; nae koti abandu bobwadyeeri, koti abatumwa nende Nasae, mu moni wa Nasae hulomalomera mu Kristo.
47003001	Mani huchaakire ohwefumia abeene handi? Oba mani hweenya, koti lu bandi bahola, ebbarwa chitusiima yimuli, oba ohutula yimuli?
47003002	Ngandi eng'we abeene muli ebbarwa cheefwe chitusiima, echandiikwa mu myooyo cheeng'we, huchimanyihane, handi chisomebwe nende abandu boosi;
47003003	nihaandi mweekesa muti muli ebbarwa yitula eyiri Kristo eyaleetebwa naafwe, niyitandiikibwa nende obuwiino, nae nende Mwooyo wa Nasae mulamu, ataali hu makina ak'amakina nae hu makina ak'emyooyo ch'abandu.
47003004	Obwo nibwo obwomiifu buhuli nabwo mu Nasae ohubitira mu Kristo.
47003005	Ataali mbwe efwe abeene huli abanyala hulweefwe ohuboola huti hunyala ohuhola esiindu syoosi; obunyala bweefwe butula eyiri Nasae,
47003006	owatuhola hwaaba abanyala ohuba abahalaabani ab'Embuliirisania njiaha, eyitaali mu bwandiike nae eyiri Mwooyo; olwohuba obwandiike bwiita, nae Mwooyo akaba obulamu.
47003007	Bulaanu nikali mbwe esileeta ohufwa, syasaatwa mu nukuta hu kina, syeecha nende oluyaali olwakera Abayisirayiri sibanyalaanga hutingaala hu bweeni bwa Musa, hulw'ohumesa-mesana, koti lusyafwiiriraanga,
47003008	esileeta Mwooyo haba sisichia huba nende oluyaali luhiraho olwo?
47003009	Olwohuba nikali mbwe aliwo oluyaali mu sileeta ohuheengerwa omusango ohubahira, esileeta obuluungifu siba sihoyeere ohuba esihira muno esyo oluyaali.
47003010	Mubwadyeeri bweene, mu ngeri yino, esyo esyaliho nende oluyaali luhoongo lwakiire awo, lwiichire lwahaya ohubaaho nende oluyaali kata budiidi, hulw'oluyaali luba niluluhira eyale.
47003011	Olwohuba nikali mbwe esyo esyabbuuruha syeecha nende oluyaali lwakiire awo, mani esyo esitaliwao siba sihoyeere ohuba nende oluyaali luhirira elalira olwo.
47003012	Mani koti luhuli nende esuubi lifwaana lityo, sakira huli abasimbiifu muno,
47003013	ataali koti Musa, oyo owatechaanga esitaambaya hu bweene bwae hu Bayisirayiri bahaye ohubona enjakamo y'oluyaali lufwiiririra.
47003014	Nae ebibaaso byaabwe byahandaangwa; olwohuba kata ohwoolera elalira bulaanu buti, nibasoma Embuliirisania Hale, esitaambaya syeene sira sidoong'a busa nisitafunuulwe, olwohuba ni ohubitira mu Kristo yeng'ene yisinyala ohutusibwayo.
47003015	Eee, naleero luno Musa nasomebwa, esitaambaya sikona busa hu bibaaso byaabwe;
47003016	nae omuundu yeesi naakaluhaana eyiri Omwaami, esitaambaya esyo situsibwaangaho.
47003017	Bulaanu Omwaami oyo niye Mwooyo, mani eyo yoosi yi Mwooyo w'Omwaami aaba, yibaayo obulehuule.
47003018	Mani efwe fweesi nihuli nende obweeni butaabwiihirwe, hubona oluyaali lw'Omwaami, mani hwakaluuhanisibwa mu hufwaana hwae ohutula hu diguri ndala ey'oluyaali ohuchia hu yindi; olwohuba sino siicha nisitula eyiri Omwaami oyo oli Mwooyo.
47004001	Mani sakira nihuba nihuli nende obuhalaabani buno ohweema hu sisa sya Nasae, haba sihuwaamo omwooyo daawe.
47004002	Hwamala ohwebwaaba ebiindu by'esoni byoosi, nende engira ch'ebyaama choosi; hukaana ohuhola eby'obubacha byoosi oba ohuteemaho ohuchuusa emboosi ya Nasae, nae ohubitira mu nomaloma njahaahu y'obwadyeeri, hucha ohwesiimira mu bibaaso byabuli muundu mu moni wa Nasae.
47004003	Handi kata nende emboosi ndayi yeefwe niyiba niyebwiihaho esitaambaya, yiba yebwiihaho eyiri abo bong'ene abacha ohusihirira.
47004004	Mu mbaasa yaabwe nasaye w'esyaalo sino yamala ohuwofusa ebibaaso by'abatafukiirira, hwaabakayiire ohunyala ohubona obulafu bw'emboosi ndayi ey'oluyaali lwa Kristo, oli efwaani ya Nasae.
47004005	Olwohuba esyo sihuyaala haba sinisyo efwe abeene, nae ni Yesu Kristo koti Omwaami, nende efwe beene koti abahalaabani beeng'we hulwa Yesu.
47004006	Olwohuba ni Nasae mweene niye owaboola ati, “Lehe obulafu bwaaduhe mu siirima,” oyo owaaduha mu myooyo cheefwe ohubeeresa obulafu bw'ohumanya oluyaali lwa Nasae mu bweeni bwa Kristo.
47004007	Nae efwe huli nende obunyali buno mu bibiihiro by'eloba, ohweekesa mbwe amaani k'akulu ka Nasae nae haba sikeefwe daawe.
47004008	Efwe huchunisibwa mu buli ngeri yoosi, nae haba sihunyoobolwanga daawe; hudondobanisibwa, nae haba sihukatayala;
47004009	husaandisibwa, nae haba sihulehebwa; hubbwa aasi, nae haba sihusihirisibwa elalira;
47004010	buli siha nihukiingire mu mibiri cheefwe ohufwa hwa Yesu, hu bulamu bwa Yesu bunyale ohubonehanira mu mibiri cheefwe.
47004011	Olwohuba kata nende nihuba nihuli abalamu, buli siha huteebwa mu hufwa hulwa Yesu, hu bulaanu obulamu bwa Yesu bunyale ohubonehera mu mibiri cheefwe chifwa chino.
47004012	Sakira ohufwa huli humulimo mweefwe, nae obulamu buli mweng'we.
47004013	Koti luhuli nende mwooyo w'efukiirira, koti y'oyo owandiika ati, “Ndafukiirira, mani nilwo lu ndalomaloma,” fwesi hutyo hufukiirira, mani nilwo lu hulomaloma,
47004014	nihumanyire huti oyo owasyuusa Omwaami Yesu, achia ohutusyuusa fwesi alala nende Yesu mani atuleete alala nang'we mu moni wae.
47004015	Olwohuba bino byoosi biri bityo hulweeng'we, hu bulaanu koti lu sisi sisuda nisyoola hu bandu bangi, sihoyeere ohumeeda ohwebasaanga, hulw'oluyaali lwa Nasae.
47004016	Mani sakira efwe haba sihuwaamo omwooyo daawe. Kata nende obulamu bweefwe bw'ohumukulu aabwahaba nibuli ohuweerera, obulamu bweefwe bw'omukati, buli ohukaluhanisibwaanga obuyaaha buli ludaalo.
47004017	Olwohuba obuchuuni budiidi obw'esiha sidiidi sino, buli ohututekehera obusito bungi obw'oluyaali lutaakama oluhira ohukeraanisibwaho esiindu syoosi,
47004018	olwohuba efwe haba sihwewunjire bibonehana, nae hwewunjire ebiindu bitabonehana; olwohuba ebiindi bibonehana biwaao, nae ebiindu bitabonehana haba sibiwaao.
47005001	Olwohuba efwe humanyire huti, nikali mbwe esikaali sy'ohusyaalo sihumenyeremo nisyahasihiirisiibwe, huli nende enyumba yene eyitula eyiri Nasae, enyumba eyitaholebwa nende amahono, nae eyiri akulu Mukulu.
47005002	Abweene ano hubiinduha busa, nihwekoomba ohwefwaala obumenyo bweefwe bw'omu Kulu,
47005003	hu nihuba nihubwefwaalire, hu huhaye ohunyoolehana nihuli syekenye.
47005004	Olwohuba nihuba nihusisiiri mu sikaali sino, hwayuuya nihuli nende sihudaha huhole; ataali mbwe hunyala hwafwaalulwa, nae mbwe hwahahoyeere ohufwaalwa ebihiraho awo, hu bulaanu esyo esiba nisiri esiwaao, sinyale ohumiribwa nende obulamu.
47005005	Oyo owatutekehera esiindu syeene sino niye Nasae, oyo owatuberesa Mwooyo oyo ohuba esyomiisa.
47005006	Mani sakira efwe hwamenya nihuli ohwomiira hulai; humanyire huti kata nihuba nihuli ango mu mubiri, huli eyale ohutula eyiri Omwaami,
47005007	olwohuba efwe hukeenda nende efukiirira haya haba sihukeenda nende ebibonehana.
47005008	Huli nende ohwomiira hulai, mani handi syahabeere esilai nihwahabeere nihuli eyale ohutula hu mubiri nae hwaaba ango nende Omwaami.
47005009	Mani sakira kata nihuba nihuli ango oba eyale, esichiiririrwa syeefwe siba ohumusangaasa.
47005010	Olwohuba fweesi huhoyeere ohuchia mu moni w'esisaala sy'ohuheengeraho emisango esya Kristo, hu bulaanu buli muundu anyale ohunyoola ebilai oba ebibi, ohweema hw'esyo syaaba niyahola naali mu mubiri.
47005011	Mani sakira, nihuba nihumanyire ohutya Omwaami, hu serera abandu; nae esyo abeene sihuli simanyihaane nende Nasae, handi suubira endi syosi syamanyihana mu bibaaso byeeng'we.
47005012	Haba sihuli ohwesiimira hweeng'we handi, nae huli ohubabechaanga esifune esyohweninisirya hweefwe, hu mweemeo munyale ohukobola mwabo abali ohwewuliraanga abeene ohweema hu sifwo sy'omuundu nae haba sihweema hu mwooyo kwae.
47005013	Olwohuba nikali mbwe huli abalalu, mani ni hulwa Nasae; nae nikali mbwe huli mu bibaaso byeefwe bilai, ni hu lweng'we.
47005014	Olwohuba ohudaha hwa Kristo nihwo ohutufuka, olwohuba efwe hwamala ohumanya huti, omuundu mulala yafwiira abandu boosi; mani abandu boosi hane bafwa hale.
47005015	Mani yafwiira abandu boosi, hu bulaanu abo boosi ababa nibali abalamu bahoyeere obutabaao handi hulwaabwe abeene, nae hulwae oyo ohweema hulwobulai bwaabwe, yafwa mani yaasyuhiswa.
47005016	Mani ohutula olwaleero ohuchia mu moni, abulao omuundu yeesi yihwewunja koti abandu; kata nende hale hwewunjaanga Kristo koti omuundu, haba sihusiimwewunja hutyo handi.
47005017	Mani sakira omuundu yeesi naaba naali mu Kristo, aaba ali esiloonge siyaaha; esihale siba syamala ohuwaao, boneho, esiyaaha simalire ohwiicha.
47005018	Bino byoosi bitula eyiri Nasae, ohubitira mu Kristo owatusaasania nae omweene mani yatubeeresa obuhalaabani bw'ohusasania;
47005019	esyo nisyo mbwe, mu Kristo Nasae yali naali ohusasanianga esyaalo nende omweene, natababaliraho ebibi byaabwe, handi natudiisa emboosi eyohusaasania.
47005020	Mani sakira efwe huli bawamwaanda ba Kristo, Nasae niyoobba omulaanga nabirisira mweefwe. Hubekweeda hulwa Kristo, musasanie nende Nasae.
47005021	Olwohuba hulweefwe, yamuhola yaaba esibi otaholaho esibi syoosi, hubulaanu ohubitira mu mweene oyo, hu nyale ohwehola obuluungifu bwa Nasae.
47006001	Mani nihuli ohuholera alala nae, huli ohubekweeda obutanyoola busa esisa sya Nasae bwereere.
47006002	Olwohuba omweene aboola ati, “Esiha syali nisihoyera nisyoola, ndabatekeeresaanga, handi nende ohubahoonya hu ludaalo lw'obuwonia.” Boneho, bulaanu nisyo esiha sihoyera; boneho, lwaleero nilwo oludaalo lw'obuwonia.
47006003	Haba sihuli ohuta esiindu sikayira mu ngira y'omuundu yoosi, hu bulaanu abulao esisobyo sinyala ohunyoolehana mu buhalaabani bweefwe,
47006004	nae koti abahalaabani ba Nasae, hwesiima mu buli ngira: ohubitira mu hwesimiirisa hwamaani, mu huchuunisibwa, mu bidinyu biingi, mu masira,
47006005	ohuhuyibwa, ohuboyebwaanga, esisi, emirimo midinyu, ohuliindirira, enjala;
47006006	ohubitira mu siroonyo, obumanyirifu, ohweliinda, esisa, Mwooyo Mwolerefu, ohudaha hweene,
47006007	enomanoma y'adyeeri, handi nende amaani ka Nasae; nende bilwaaniso by'obuluungifu bw'omuhono muluungi nende omuhono mukooda;
47006008	mu hutiisibwa nende mu hubachibwa, mu liita bi nende mu liita layi. Hudiiribwa koti abohwetaaho, nihaandi nilwo luhuli;
47006009	koti abatamanyihaane, nihaandi hwamanyihana muno; koti abafwa, nae boneho, huliwo abalamu; koti ababoneresebwa, nihaandi haba sihwiitwa;
47006010	koti abelalihirifu, nae abasangaafu esiha syoosi; koti abamanani, nae nihuhola abangi ohugagayala; koti abataali nende esiindu syoosi, nihaandi hu nende buli siindu syoosi.
47006011	Omunwa kweefwe kwasamiriire yimuli, eng'we Abakoliiti; omwooyo kweefwe kwahaaha.
47006012	Haba simukayirwa naafwe daawe, nae mukayirwa nende obwekoombi bweeng'we abeene.
47006013	Mu hukobolamo, ninomanoma koti olomaloma nende abaana baange, mboola endi yikule emyooyo cheeng'we mwesi.
47006014	Mutahung'anaanga nende abakafwiiri. Olwohuba bulala siina obuliwo akati w'obuluungifu nende omufuto? Oba busangirani siina obuliwo akati w'obulafu nende esiirima?
47006015	Huwuliirisania siina ohuliwo akati wa Kristo nende Sitaani? Oba siindu siina esifwaana esiriwo akati w'omufukiiriri nende otafukiirira?
47006016	Huwuliirisania siina ohuliwo akati w'enyumba ya Nasae nende enyumba y'emisaambwa? Olwohuba efwe huli enyumba ya Nasae mulamu; lu Nasae yaboola ati, “Njia ohubamenyamo handi ohubakeendamo, mani njia ohuba Nasae waabwe, nabo bacha ohuba abandu bange.
47006017	Mani sakira mubatulemo, mani mukabuhane nabo, Omwaami aboolere, handi mudadiiraangaho esiindu sitafukiirirwa nende ediini; mani awo niwo anjiira ohubukaanira.
47006018	Mani njia ohuba laata yeng'we, nae eng'we mucha ohuba abahaana bange nende abasyaani bange Omwaami w'Obunyala bwosi aboolere.”
47007001	Koti luhuli nende ebisuubise bino, baheerwa, mulehe hweyoseho buli sibi sy'omubiri nende esy'omwooyo, mani huhole obwolerefu bwoolerere mu hutya Nasae.
47007002	Mutwikulire emyooyo cheeng'we; haba sihwakoseraho omuundu yeesi, haba sihwanyaasaho omuundu yeesi, haba sihwahosesaho buhaya omuundu yeesi.
47007003	Haba siindi huboola bino ohubanenya, olwohuba ese malire ohuboola hale endi eng'we muli mu myooyo cheefwe, oba hufwiira alala, oba humenya alala.
47007004	Ndi nende obwomiifu bubitiirifu mweng'we; mbesuungiramo muno; ndalemesebwa omwooyo muno. Alala nende ohuchuunisibwa hweefwe ohwo, ndi nende esangaalo ebitiirifu.
47007005	Olwohuba kata nende nihweecha mu Makedonia, emibiri cheefwe haba sichawuluuhaho daawe, nae chachuunisibwaanga buli luwaande--ohulwaanakana erwaanyi, nae obuti mukati.
47007006	Nae Nasae, oyo olemya emyooyo ch'abandu belalihiriire, yatulemya emyooyo nende ohwiicha hwa Tiito,
47007007	nae handi haba sihwiicha hwae hwong'ene, nae nende ohulemesebwa omwooyo humwali nimumulemeesye, koti luyatuboolera hu hwekoomba hweeng'we, ohulira hweeng'we, ohufwiira humufwiira, ohwoola lu ndemeeda ohusangaala handi ohubitiiririra.
47007008	Mani kata nimba nindabelalihirisa nende ebbarwa yange, haba siindi hwesiinduha haba daawe, (kata nende nindesiinduha) olwohuba ndi ohubona endi ebbarwa eyo yabanyoolesa muno, kata nende niyahola yityo hulw'esiha esidiidi muno.
47007009	Nae koti lu siri, ese naange sangaala busa, ataali mbwe mwanyoolera, nae olwohuba mwanyoolesebwa ohwoola muhweyolobya; olwohuba mwawulira ohunyoolera hw'omwooyo, mani haba sisiriwo simwafwiirwa ohutula hweefwe daawe.
47007010	Olwohuba ohunyoolera hw'omwooyo hwibulaanga ohweyolobya hwoosa omuundu hu buwonia, mani haba sihuleeta ohwesiinduha hwoosi daawe, nae ohunyoolera hw'esyaalo hwibulaanga ohufwa.
47007011	Olwohuba muboneho obwadyeeri bweene bu hunyoolera hw'omwooyo hwibuule mweng'we, maofu siina akadaha mwetereese abene, hwesisinia siina, luwungu siina, maofu siina, hufwiira siina, ohuboneresebwa siina! Hu buli mboosi yoosi, mwanyala ohwewosaho nende ohwekesera elalira koti lumutaaliho abakosefu mu siindu syoosi.
47007012	Mani kata nende nindabandiikira, haba sibyali nibyeemere hw'oyo owali niiholere esibi, kata haba sihweema hw'oyo owanyaaliha ohutula hu sibi esyo, nae byali huhutufwiira hweeng'we hweemeo hubonehane yimuli mu moni wa Nasae.
47007013	Mani sakira efwe hulemesebwe emyooyo. Nae handi notulire hu hulemesebwa emyooyo hweefwe, hwasangaala handi muno hu sangaalo lya Tiito, olwohuba ebibaaso byae byamalire ohunyalirwa ohuwuluuha nang'we mweesi.
47007014	Olwohuba kata nende nindamweekesa ohubewuliirimo hwange, haba sibyaswaasa daawe; nae koti busa buli siindu sihwalomaloma hweeng'we syali esyadyeeri, nilwo luhwesiima hweefwe mu moni wa Tiito hwosi hwamanyisibwa ohuba nihwali ohwadyeeri.
47007015	Handi omwooyo kwae kusiimutulamo nikwiicha yimuli handi muno, niyechulisa obuwulisi bweeng'we mweesi, handi nende ohutya nende ohutengereha humwamubukaanira nahwo.
47007016	Ese sangaala busa olwohuba ndi nende obwomiifu bweene mweng'we.
47008001	Hudaha mumanye, basyeefwe, ebidiira hu sisa sya Nasae syekeswa mu mikaanda ch'abafukiiriri echiri mu Makedonia,
47008002	olwohuba nibali nibali mu huhemebwa hululu muno, esangaalo lyaabwe bitiirifu nende obumanani bwaabwe bubitiirifu byabonehera mu hukaba hwaabwe.
47008003	Olwohuba bakaba ohweema hu funi yaabwe koti yalichingi, koti lweese nyala ohuboola, handi ohubita efuni yaabwe koti yalichingi, ohweema hu hudaha hwaabwe abeene,
47008004	nibatwekweedera elalira ohufukiirirwa ohubaaho nende sibahola esidiira hu buhoonyi buchiira abolerefu
47008005	mani sino, ohuhira koti luhwali nihubaasa, nae muhutaangira bewaayo abeene eyiri Omwaami mani hubewaayo eyiri efwe, mu hudaha hwa Nasae.
47008006	Abweene awo hwecha hwekweeda Tiito huti koti luyali naamalire ohuchaaka ohuhola, ahoyeere lwosi ohumaliirisa omulimo mulai kuno.
47008007	Bulaanu koti lumuli ohuholaanga nimubitiirisa esikero, -- mu fukiirira, mu hulomaloma, mu bumanyirifu, mu bwesikwa bwoosi, handi nende mu hutudaha hweeng'we--mubone muti muhola mwabitiirisa nende mu mulimo mulai kuno kwosi.
47008008	Mboola sino ataali koti esilagiro, nae ohwomiisa obuluungifu bw'abandu bandi endi ohudaha hweeng'we hwosi n'ohwobwadyeeri.
47008009	Olwohuba mumanyire esisa sy'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo, mbwe kata niyali omunyali, kata katyo hulweng'we yehola yaaba omumanani, hu hubitira mu bumanani bwae munyale ohwehola abanyali.
47008010	Mani mu siindu sino, ndi ohukeraka endi: silayi muno hulweng'we ohumaliirisa esyo simwachaaka ohuhola nende ohubaasa ohuhola omwaaka omulaamba kubitire,
47008011	hu bulaanu obwetekefu bweeng'we muhudaha ohusihola, hwahanyala hwachiana nende ohusimaliirisa nende ebyo bimuba nimuli ninabyo.
47008012	Olwohuba obwetekefu ohuhola nibuba nibuliwo, hufukiirirwa ohweema hu biindu bi buli muundu aaba ali nabyo, ataali ohweema hubyataali nabyo.
47008013	Haba siindi huboola endi hulweesyo mani abandu bandi banguyisirwe nae abandi basidoyerwa busa,
47008014	nae endi, muhwakaniakania, obuungi bw'ebiindu bimuli nabyo esiha sino, bihoyeere ohuba nibinyala ohubahoonya bibaba nibadaha, hu bulaanu obuungi bw'ebiindu byaabwe byosi binyale ohuhoonya obudahano bweeng'we lunyuma, hwabeeo ohwakanirisa hulai.
47008015	Koti lusyandiikwa siti, “Oyo owakesa ebiingi haba siyaliho nende ebiindi biyadoong'ia, handi oyo owakesa ebidiidi haba siyali nende siyekoomba.”
47008016	Nae Nasae yebasibwe oyo otechaanga obuliindi bwenyehana mu myooyo cheeng'we hu lwa Tiito.
