51001021	Handi eng'we, abali hale nimwakabuhana handi nimwasyuulana mu bibaaso, nimuholaanga ebiholwa bibi,
51001022	bulaanu anyale ohuba naamalire ohubasasanisiria mu mubiri kwae kw'enyama ohubitira mu hufwa hwae, hwaanyale ohubayira mu moni wa Nasae nimuli aboolerefu, handi abataaliho nende esibi syoosi, handi abatanyala ohulekeresebwa,
51001023	nikali mbwe mucha ohuchiiririra nimuli nende efukiirira, ohuba ab'amaani handi abomiifu, nimutachuuha mwatula hu suubi ly'Emboosi Ndai yimwawulira, eyamala ohuyaalirwa buli siloonge syoosi aasi w'Ekulu, handi eyeene eyo y'ese Paulo mweene ndeehola ohuba omuhalaabani wayo.
51001024	Bulaanu ndi ohusangaalira mu husaandisibwa hwange hu lweng'we, nae mu mubiri kwaange, ndi ohumaliirisaanga ebyo ebitoolerera mu huchunisibwa hwa Kristo hulw'omubiri kwae, okulaangwa mbwe Abakurisito,
51001025	okweene okwo ku syesi ndeecha ndeehola ohuba omuhalaabani waakwo ohweema humulaanga kutula Mukulu okwamberesebwa hulweng'we, ohukera Emboosi ya Nasae yimanyihane mubwichufu,
51001026	esyaama syakisibwa humbaka ndeeyi, handi hu njibulo nyiingi muno, nae bulaanu esyabwihuliirwe aboolerefu bae.
51001027	Eyiri abeene abo Nasae yahengawo ohukera bamanye obuhunuufu aabwaaka obuli mu Abateende engaanga y'oluyaali lw'esyaama sino, esiri nisyo Kristo oli mweng'we, esuubi ly'oluyaali luhoongo muno.
51001028	Oyo niye y'efwe huyaala, nihulabula buli muundu handi nihweekesa buli muundu nende amakesi koosi, huhunyale ohuyira buli muundu naali omuwangafu mu Kristo.
51001029	Mani ni hulwesifune syeene sino, sakira ndidiihana, ningesaho ohuhola nende amaani kosi, esiindu syoosi syanyala ohuba niyandeeremo ohuhola.
51002001	Olwohuba ese ndaha eng'we mumanye obukali bw'ohulwaanira hwange, nende abo abali mu Laodesia, handi nende abo boosi abasisiiri ohubonaho obweeni bwaange,
51002002	hu bulaanu emyooyo chaabwe chinyale ohwomiisibwa koti lubediira alala muhudaha, ohunyala ohunyoola engaanga yoosi eyohumanya hweene nende ohumanya esyaama sya Nasae esya Kristo,
51002003	owakisibwamo obugaga bwoosi obw'amakesi nende ohumanya.
51002004	Mboola sino omweene hu bulaanu abulewo omuundu yeesi onyala ohwiicha yababachirisa nende enomanoma ch'obukodyo.
51002005	Olwohuba kata nende nimba nitaali awo mu bundu, nae ndi naang'we mu mwooyo, nisangaala ohubona endekeha ndayi yeeng'we, nende obwomiifu bw'efukiirira yeng'we mu Kristo.
51002006	Koti mani lumwamala ohunyoola Omwaami Kristo Yesu, mani mumumenyemo,
51002007	nimumwingiisemo emisi cheeng'we, handi nimumuhuliiremo, handi nimweyombaahe mu fukiirira, koti busa lumweekeswa, nimwichuule ohwebasaanga.
51002008	Muboneenge muti, omuundu yeesi siyeecha yaabalia niyehoonyera amayiingi nende obubacha bwereere, ebitula mu miduunga ch'abandu, ohweema hu myooyo chafwa ech'ohusyaalo huno, ataali ohweema hu Kristo.
51002009	Olwohuba ni mumweene oyo nimwo mu bwanasaye bwiichufu bwadyeeri bwamenya,
51002010	handi mwanyala ohuwangaalira mu mweene oyo, handi oli omutwe kw'obutuki bwoosi nende obunyala bwoosi.
51002011	Mu mweene oyo, mwamala ohuhebwa nende ohuhebebwa hutaholebwa nende amahono, nimwefwaalula omubiri kw'enyama mu huhebwa hwa Kristo;
51002012	handi mwasiihibwa alala nae mu hubatiisibwa, mu mwesi handi mweecha mwasyuhisibwa nae mu fukiirira muhudaha hwa Nasae, owamusyuusa ohutula mu bafu.
51002013	Mani eng'we abali mwafwiira muhuhola ebibi nende obutahebebwa enyama yeng'we, Nasae yabalamusira alala nae, naamalire ohutuleheramo ebibi byeefwe,
51002014	handi naamalire ohubwiiha hu sigiingi syali syatuhiinga nende amalako bikadaha; yeecha yaasudya ebyeene bino endulo, nabihoma hu musalabba.
51002015	Yang'uula emiduunga nende amaani mabi ebilwaaniro, mani yamala yabyaniha alafu yeekesa esihoyera ohubihola byoosi, nabisenakirira mu mweene oyo.
51002016	Mani sakira lehe omuundu yeesi alehe ohubaheengera omusango hulw'ebidiira hu byohulya nende ebyohung'wa oba nende ohweema hu sidyaalo syoosi, oba hu mwoosi mudoto oba Sabbaato.
51002017	Bino byoosi ni esiiniha busa sy'ebiindu bicha ohwiicha; nae amahulundu keene ka Kristo.
51002018	Lehe omuundu yeesi alehe ohubakwiisa, niyeemere hu hudaha ohwesangaasa omweene, nende ohwiinamira bamalaika, naheengereo ohuchiira huhuboneherwaanga, nende ohweniinia abula esifune, ohweema hu bibaaso bitaalimo ohwesimiirisa,
51002019	ataali ohwediira yeyomiisa hu Mutwe, okuliisa handi okuwambaania alala omubiri kwoosi, nikwehoonyera enyiingo chaakwo, nende efwonero chaakwo, kuhula nende ehula yidahibwa nende Nasae.
51002020	Mu Kristo mwafwa eyiri emyooyo chafwa chiri musyaalo muno, lwasiina handi osimenyere koti omuundu ow'esyaalo sino? Lwasiina oloonda amalako kaboola mbwe,
51002021	“Otadiiraanga husino,” “Otahombaangaho hu sino,” “Otegeng'aangaho hu sino”?
51002022	(Nolomaloma hubiindu biwa-buwa nibyehoonyerwa), ohweema hu mbaasa nende enjekesa ch'abandu busa?
51002023	Mu bwadyeeri bweene, ebiindu koti bino, bifwaana koti eby'amakesi, muhumeeda omwooyo kwohudaha Nasae, nende ohwefumia omweene, handi nende ohunyaala omubiri, nae bibulamo obuhoonyi, muhufuka obwekoombi bw'omubiri.
51003001	Mani nimwasyuuhisibwa alala nende Kristo, daheenge mani ebiindu ebiri akulu, yi Kristo yaali, niyehaale hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae.
51003002	Mute ebibaaso byeeng'we hu biindu biri akulu, ataali hu biindu biri hu syaalo.
51003003	Olwohuba mwamala ohufwa, mani obulamu bweeng'we bwamala ohukisibwa alala nende Kristo mu Nasae.
51003004	Mani Kristo obulamu bwefwe naliicha, awo niwo yi mwesi mwaheechere alala nae mu luyaali.
51003005	Mani sakira mwiitire alala esiindu syoosi esibalimo esy'esyaalo sino koti: obucheke, omufuto, obwekoombi, ohwekoomba ohuhola ebibi, nende obucheke bw'ediini, obuli koti ohwiinamiraanga emisaambwa.
51003006	olwohuba ohweema hu biindu bino byoosi, obwaalaba bwa Nasae bucha ohwiicha.
51003007	Hale wesi wakenderaanga mu biindu byeene bino, koti wali niwabimenyamo.
51003008	Nae bulaanu mubyemaleho byoosi: etima, obwaalaba, ehali-hali, obumoonyi, nende enomanoma yiyemula ohutula mu munwa kwao.
51003009	Mutabachananga abeene-na-beene, lumubona muti mwamala ohwefwaalula obulamu buhale alala nende ebiholwa byaabwo
51003010	handi mwamala ohwefwaala obulamu buyaaha, obuli ohweyobululaanga mu humanya ebichiana nende efwaani y'omuloongi wabwo.
51003011	Mani ano haba saanyala hubaao Omuyonaani nende Omuyudaaya, omuhebe nende otaali omuhebe, omutaanu, omwiiti w'abandu, omuwaambe, omuundu mulehuule, nae Kristo niye ebiindu byoosi, handi oli mu biindu byoosi.
51003012	Mani mwefwaale, koti abadoole ba Nasae, aboolerefu, handi abaheerwa, esasaakisi, esisa, ohweyisa aasi, obuloonga, nende ohwesimiirisa,
51003013	muhonyeenge abaasyeeng'we, omuundu wundi naali nende esiindu siyekanyiisa owaasye, nimulehaniraangamo; koti lu Mwaami yamala ohubaleheramo, mani eng'we mwesi muhoyeere ohuleheramo.
51003014	Mani ohumeeda hu bino byoosi, mwefwaleenge ohudaha, nihwo ohuboya alala buli siindu nende esiroonyo sihoyeere.
51003015	Mani muleheenge emireembe cha Kristo chifuka emyooyo cheeng'we, esihuluundu syeene simwalaangirwa ohuba mumubiri mulala. Mani muholaanga mwebasa.
51003016	Leheenge Emboosi ya Kristo yimenyeenge olubeerera mweng'we mu bungi, yekesenge handi nimunenyana abeene-na-beene nende amakesi koosi, handi mwembeenge esabbuli nende enyembo nende enyembo ch'emyooyo alala nende ohwebasaanga muno Nasae, mu myooyo cheeng'we.
51003017	Nabuli siindu simuholaanga, mu mboosi oba mu biholwa, holeenge buli siindu mu liita ly'Omwaami Yesu, nimumwebasiraangamo Nasae Seefwe.
51003018	Abahasi, muticheenge abasaacha beeng'we, koti lusiri nisyo esihoyera abali mu Mwaami.
51003019	Abasacha, mudaheenge abahasi beeng'we, handi mutabadiraanga nende obwaalaba.
51003020	Abayere, muticheenge abebusi beeng'we mu buli siindu syoosi, olwohuba sino nisyo esisangaasa Omwaami.
51003021	Abeebusi, mutasambisaanga abana beeng'we, bateengulwa omwooyo.
51003022	Abaambe, wulirenge mu buli siindu syoosi, abaami beeng'we b'ohusyaalo huno, ataali nibababona busa, koti abasangaasa busa abandu, nae nende omwooyo mulala, nimutya Omwaami.
51003023	Mutecheenge omwooyo hu buli siindu simunabechaanga nimuhola, koti abaholera abahalaabanira Omwaami ataali omuundu busa,
51003024	nimumanyire muti Omwaami niye ochia ohubakabula omukabo kweeng'we koti omuheemba; Olwohuba muli ohuhalaabanira Omwaami Kristo.
51003025	Olwohuba omuholi w'ebibi yeesi achia ohutuungwa hulw'ebibi byaaba niyaholaanga, mani yibulawo ohukwiira hwoosi.
51004001	Abaami, direenge abaambe beeng'we koti lusidahibwa handi bulai, nimumanyire muti, eng'we mwesi muli nende Omwaami oli Mukulu.
51004002	Muchiririre nende obwomiifu muhwekongooya, nimwetekeheramo nende ohwebasaanga;
51004003	handi mutwekongooyerenge fwesi, hunyale ohuyalaanga ebyaama bya Kristo, esifune syakera ese ndaaba niindi mu mboyero,
51004004	muti nyale ohulomaloma bulai koti luhoyeere.
51004005	Mweyireenge mu ngira y'amakesi eyiri abataali mu mukaanda kweefwe, nimuhola ebihoyera ohuholebwa esiha syoosi.
51004006	Leheenge enomanoma cheeng'we buli siha chibe echesiroonyo, echilungirwemo omuunyu, hu munyale ohumanya koti lumuhoyeere ohukobolaanga mu buli muundu.
51004007	Tikiku, achia ohubaboolera ebidiira hu mirimo change; musyaani weefwe mukoosi muno handi omuhalaabani mwesikwa handi omuhalaabani wasyaange mu Mwaami.
51004008	Mutumire yeecha yimuli hulwesifune syeene sino, endi munyale ohumanya koti luhuli handi endi hunyale ohubakobosamo omwooyo,
51004009	handi mbawo Onesimu yesi ali ohwiicha nae, omusaacha omwesikwa handi omuheerwa handi atula hu mukaanda kweeng'we okwo. Bombi bacha ohubakaniayira bulai bweene ako koosi akeholehenge eno.
51004010	Alisitaluuko, omuboye wasyaange abaheesa, handi nende Mariko mwaanang'ina Bbarunabba ow'oluyia (yimunyoolere amakerako kamudiiraho, niyoola yimuli, mumubukaanire bulai),
51004011	nende Yoswa olaangwa Yusito yesi abaheesa. Bano nibo abasaacha bahebwa bong'ene mu bahalaabani basyaange abahalaabanira Obwaami bwa Nasae, handi babeere nibaangumia muno omwooyo.
51004012	Epafura, mulala hweeng'we abahalaabani ba Kristo Yesu, yesi abaheesa, koti lu yamenya ebiha byoosi nabechulisira elalira mu hwekongooya Nasae hwae, ati munyale ohweyira koti abahuluundu handi nimuli nende esuubi liichufu mu biindu bi Nasae adaha.
51004013	Olwohuba syesi museemba endi yahabalamo nende esinani siingi, nende abo abamenya mu Laodesia nende mu Hyerapoli.
51004014	Luka omusirihi muheerwa alala nende Deema bosi babaheesa.
51004015	Beresa amaheeso kange abaasyefwe bali mu Laodesia, alala nende Nimufa, alala nende Abakurisito abomunyumba yae.
51004016	Mani noomala ohusoma ebbarwa yino, teemaho muno nga lwonyala ebbarwa eyeene yino yinyale handi ohusomebwa mu nyumba ya amalaamo eyiri mu Laodesia yosi. Haandi nasilala otyo, muhoyeere musome nende ebbarwa eyo yosi yi bafukiirira mu Kristo abali mu Laodesia bweene omwo, baba nibachia ohuhutumira.
51004017	Handi muboolere Arikipo “Ewe ohoyere obone oti omaliirisa ohuhola omulimo okwo kuwatumibwa mu obuhalaabani buno obwo Omwaami weefwe.”
51004018	Neende omuhono okwaange ese omweene, mbano nyandiika endi: Amaheeso ohutula eyiri Paulo. Nae muteebiriraanga eminyororo ekiaange kino! Omukisa okwa Nasae kuhoya kwaaba ninaang'we.
52001001	Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Paulo, Silifwaano, nende Timoteo, eyichiira Abafukiiririri Batesolonia, ba Nasae Seefwe handi nende Omwaami Yesu Kristo babadoola. Esisa nende emireembe bibe naang'we.
52001002	Hwebasaanga Nasae ebiha byoosi, hu lweng'we, handi buli ludaalo hubatumbulanga mu hwekongooya hweefwe.
52001003	Hwichulisaanga mu moni wa Nasae weefwe nende Seefwe koti muta efukiirira y'eng'we mu biholwa, handi koti ohudaha hweeng'we hukera nimuhalaaabana nende amaani, handi koti esuubi ly'eng'we mu Mwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo liri e elyomiifu.
52001004	Basyaange, humanyire huti, Nasae abadaha handi yabadoola mube abandu bae beene.
52001005	Olwohuba Emboosi Ndai yi hwabaleetera, siyali ohulomaloma emboosi busa, nae yeechera mu maani nende mu Mwooyo Mwolerefu, nende ohwomiisira elalira obwadyeeri bwayo. Mumanyire koti obulamu bweefwe bwali nihwali eyo naang'we, handi hweyira hutyo hulw'obulayi bweeng'we bweene.
52001006	Mwabonera hweefwe nende hu Mwaami; mani kata nimwasaanda muno, mwakaanira emboosi eyo nende esangaalo litula eyiri Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
52001007	Mani sakira mwehola esyohuboneraho eyiri abafukiiriri boosi abali mu Makedonia nende mu Akaia.
52001008	Olwohuba emboosi chidiira hu Mwaami echachaakira mweng'we haba sichoola mu Makedonia nende Akaia mwong'ene nae emboosi chidiira hu fukiirira yeeng'we mu Nasae chasalaana buli abundu woosi. Mani sakira hubula esy'ohulomaloma siindi.
52001009	Olwohuba abandu be eyo boosi balomaloma koti lu mwatwakaanira nihwabakeniya, handi koti lu mwalehana nende ohwiinamira emisaambwa, mani mwakobola eyiri Nasae, ohuhalaabanira Nasae w'adyeeri, handi omulamu.
52001010	Handi koti lu muli ohuliinda Omwaana wae akobole natula Mukulu, oyo niye Yesu, yi Nasae yasyuhisa ohutula mu bafu, handi niye ochia ohutuwonia etima lya Nasae liri ohwiicha.
52002001	Basyaange, abeene mumanyire koti ohubakeniya hweefwe haba sihwali ohw'ebihaya.
52002002	Mumanyire koti lu hwasaandisibwa handi hwanyekwa nihwali mu Filipi nihusisiiri ohwiicha mu Tesaloniika. Kata katyo, Nasae weefwe yatubeeresa esinani sy'ohubayaalira Emboosi Ndai yitula yaali, kata ohuyinganisibwa nihwali ohubitiirifu.
52002003	Omulaanga kweefwe yimuli haba sikweema hu bukodyo, oba esichiiririrwa sibi, handi kata sihwakesaho ohubachirisa omuundu yeesi.
52002004	Ohutusaho, buli siha hwalomalomaanga koti lu Nasae adaha huhole, olwohuba yatwekesa handi yaatudiisa Emboosi Ndai. Haba sihwakesaangaho ohusangaasa abandu, nae hwaholaanga ebisangaasa Nasae yeng'ene, omanyire ebichiiririrwa by'emyooyo cheefwe.
52002005	Olwohuba mumanyire bulai muti haba sihweecha yimuli nende emboosi chibwiiha hu kuliira, nae Nasae mweene niye omujulisi weefwe hu binomanoma bino.
52002006	Haba sihwakesaho ohudaha omuundu yeesi atufumie, kata eng'we oba abandu bandi,
52002007	kata nende nihwali nihuhoyera ohunyoolaho bi hwali nihuhoyera koti abatume ba Kristo. Nae hwaaba abaloonga nihuli nang'we koti omuhasi oliinda abaana bae bulai muno.
52002008	Ohweema hu hudaha huhubadahiramo, sakira hwaaba nende esangaalo ly'ohubeechulisa, ataali nende Emboosi Ndai yitula eyiri Nasae yong'ene, nae kata obulamu bweefwe bweene, olwohuba muli abandu b'engaanga ya akulu muno yihuli.
52002009	Basyeefwe, mubwadyeri bweene mwichulisa koti lu hwahalaabana handi hwadidihaana! Hwahalaabanaanga esiro nende esideete hu huhaye ohuba omukuku yimuli nihwali nihubayaalira Emboosi Ndai yitula eyiri Nasae.
52002010	Eng'we ning'we abajulisi beefwe koti lu Nasae yesi ali omujulisi weefwe, esaambo cheefwe yimuli eng'we abafukiiririra Kristo chali endayi, engololofu chitaaliho obuhyamu bwoosi.
52002011	Mumanyire muti hwayiraanga buli muundu yeesi hweeng'we koti lu mwibusi yahayira abaana bae.
52002012	Hubasaba nihubataamo esinani, hubagumia emyooyo handi hubekweeda huti, obulamu bweeng'we bube obusangaasa Nasae wabalaanga ohwingira mu Bwaami bwae nende mu luyaali lwae.
52002013	Handi huli nende esifune siindi esikera nihwebasa Nasae buli siha. Nihwabaleetera emboosi ya Nasae, mwayiwulira handi mwayakaanira, ataali koti emboosi y'omuundu busa, nae koti emboosi ya Nasae, koti lu yiri mubwadyeri. Olwohuba Nasae ali ohuholera mweng'we abafukiirira.
52002014	Olwohuba basyaange, ebiindu byakwa hu bafukiiriri bo Mubuyudaaya, nibyo nasilala nende ebyabakwaaho mwesi, abandu bafukiirira mu Kristo Yesu. Olwohuba mwesi mwasaandisibwa nende abandu beeng'we beene koti lu Bayudaaya basaandisibwa nende abandu baabwe beene.
52002015	Abayudaaya bano nibo abeeta Omwaami Yesu nende abanabbi baabwe beene, handi baatusandya. Haba sibasangaasa Nasae daawe! Basuku ba buli muundu!
52002016	Kata bakesaho ohutukaira hutayaalira Abateende emboosi yileeta Obuwonia. Nae bulaanu etima lya Nasae libeheereho!
52002017	Nae basyaange, nihwakabuhanaho nang'we budiidi, ataali mu bibaaso byeefwe, nae mu mubiri, hwabafwiirwa muno mani hwaaba nende obwekoombi bungi muno obw'ohubabona handi!
52002018	Handi hwali nihwekoomba muno ohukobola yimuli. Mubwadyeeri bweene, ese Paulo ndakesaho amahabi maangi ohukobola yimuli nae Sitaani yatwikalira engira.
52002019	Nae ning'we esuubi lyeefwe, esangaalo lyeefwe, nende esifune syeefwe sy'ohwesuungiramo obuyiingiri bweefwe mu moni w'Omwaami weefwe Yesu naakobola.
52002020	Mubwadyeeri bweene, ning'we ohwesuunga hweefwe nende esangaalo lyeefwe!
52003001	Mani mu humaliirisa, sihwanyala ohwemeeda ohwesimiirisa, sakira hwaheengao ohwemeeda ohumenya fweeng'ene mu Ateeni.
52003002	Nae hwabatumira Timoteo, owasyeefwe yihuhalaabanira Nasae alala nae ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai yidiira hu Kristo. Humutuma yimuli ohubomiisa alala nende ohubahoonya mu fukiirira yeng'we,
52003003	hu mani omuundu yeesi hweeng'we ahaye ohukobola enyuma hulwohusaandisibwa huno. Eng'we mumanyire muti ohusaanda huno niyo engeri ndala yi Nasae yatutekehera ohubitamo.
52003004	Olwohuba nihwali nihusisiiri nang'we, hwababoolera ebiha nibisisiiri huti hucha ohusaanda; handi lu mumanyire bulai bweene muti sino nisyo esiholehaane busa.
52003005	Mani sakira siinyalire ohwesimiirisa handi, sakira ndumire Timoteo ohwiicha ohumanya ebidiira hu fukiirira yeng'we. Ndali nitiire endi awundi Sitaani omuhemi yamala ohubahema, mani omulimo kweefwe okwo bulaanu nikwafwa ebihaya.
52003006	Nae Timoteo yamala ohukobola natula yimuli niyeecha yihuli, handi yatuleetera emboosi ndayi yidiira hu fukiirira yeng'we nende ohudaha hweeng'we. Yatuboolera koti mutwichulisaanga buli ludaalo handi koti lumwekoomba muno ohutubona koti lu fwesi hwekoomba ohubabona.
52003007	Mani sakira basyaange, mu bidinyu byeefwe byoosi nende muhusaandisibwa, hwanyoola amaani nihwawulira ebidiira hu fukiirira yeng'we.
52003008	Olwohuba bulaanu hunaba abalamu nimudoong'a nimwomiirire mu Mwaami.
52003009	Bulaanu hunyala ohwebasa Nasae weefwe hulweng'we. Humwebasa hulw'esangaalo lihuli nalyo mu moni wae hulweng'we.
52003010	Esideete nende esiro, humwekongooya nende emyooyo cheefwe choosi huti, atufukiirire abeene mani hubabeerese ebidahibwa mu fukiirira yeng'we.
52003011	Bulaanu lehe Nasae weefwe, handi Seefwe mweene, nende Omwaami weefwe Yesu batutekehere engira y'ohwiicha yimuli!
52003012	Lehe Omwaami ahole ohudahana hweeng'we abeene, alala nende ohudaha abandu boosi, hwemeede ohuhula mani hwehole ohuhoongo muno koti ohudaha huhubadahiramo fwesi.
52003013	Mu ngira yino nilwo lwacha ohubameedamo amaani, mani mube ababulaho esibi syoosi, handi aboolerefu mu moni wa Nasae weefwe handi Seefwe, hu ludaalo lu Mwaami weefwe Yesu yahakobolereho alala nende aboolerefu bae boosi.
52004001	Muhumaliirisa, basyeefwe, mwamala ohutuboneraho engeri yi bulamu bu huhoyeere ohuba nabwo huhusangaase Nasae. Buno nibwo obulamu bu mulimo. Mani bulaanu hubasaba handi hubekweeda mu liita ly'Omwaami Yesu huti, mwemeede busa ohuhola mutyo.
52004002	Olwohuba mumanyire enjekesa yihwababeeresa ohubitira mu maani k'Omwaami Yesu.
52004003	Nasae abadahisa mube aboolerefu, handi mubulireho elalira esibi syoosi esy'obucheke.
52004004	Buli musaacha yeesi hweeng'we ahoyeere ohumanya engeri y'ohumenya nende omuhasi wae mu bwolerefu nende mu luyaali,
52004005	ataali obwekoombi bwohuhola ebyesoni, koti abandu bataali nende efukiirira, abatamanyire Nasae.
52004006	Mani hu sifune sino abulewo omuundu yeesi ohola owaasye esibi, oba ohwehoonyera ehabi yae ohuhola esibi. Olwohuba hwamala ohubaboolera hutyo hale nihubeekesa koti lumuhoyeere ohweliinda, huti Nasae achia ohusaandya abandu bahola ebibi bifwaana bityo.
52004007	Olwohuba Nasae siyatulaanga ohumenya mu bulamu bw'obucheke, nae ohumenya mu bulamu bwolerefu.
52004008	Mani sakira omuundu ohaya enjekesa yino haba saaba nahayire emboosi ch'omuundu nae aaba ahayire emboosi cha Nasae mweene owababeeresa Mwooyo Mwolerefu wae.
52004009	Sisihoyera mbandiikire ebidiira hu hudahana nende abafukiiriri basyeeng'we humuhoyeere ohuba nahwo. Olwohuba eng'we abeene Nasae yamala ohubeekesa koti lumuhoyeere ohudahana.
52004010	Handi mubwadyeri bweene, eng'we mweekesa koti lu mudaha abafukiiriri bali mu Makedonia boosi. Nae basyeefwe, hubekweeda huti mwemeede busa ohuholaanga mutyo.
52004011	Mube nende esichiiririrwa esy'ohumenya obulamu bulai, nimufwa hu mirimo cheeng'we chong'ene koti luhwabeekesa ohutula hale.
52004012	Awo nilwo lu mucha ohuba nende obulamu buhoyera mani mwisibwemo oluyaali nende abo abasisiiri erwaanyi w'efukiirira humunyale ohutaba nende esiindu syoosi simwekoomba.
52004013	Basyeefwe, hudaha mumanye obwadyeeri budiira hu bafu, mani muhaye ohwewunamira koti abandu babula esuubi.
52004014	Olwohuba koti luhufukiirira huti Yesu yafwa handi yaasyuuha, nilwo busa luhufukiirira huti, Nasae achia ohukobosera alala Yesu nende abo abafwa nibamufukiiriramo.
52004015	Huli ohubeekesa enjekesa ya Nasae yeene huti: efwe abacha ohuba nihusisiiri abalamu ohwoola hu ludaalo lu Mwaami achia ohukoboleraho, haba sihwahataangiriremo abo abamala ohufwa.
52004016	Achia obubao ekono lyubba omulaanga, ekono lya malaika muhuluundu, ekono ly'olwiika lwa Nasae, mani Omwaami mweene achia ohwiiha aasi natula Mukulu. Mani abafwa nibafukiirira mu Kristo nibo abacha ohutangira ohusyuuha;
52004017	Mani efwe abahabe nihusisiiri abalamu esiha esyo, bacha ohutubuusira alala nabo mu maleesi, ohuchia ohubukaanira Omwaami mu bbaanga. Mani hucha ohuba nende Omwaami endaalo choosi.
52004018	Mani mulemesanienge emyooyo nende emboosi chino.
52005001	Basyeefwe, sisihoyeere ohubaandiikira ebidiira hu biha oba obwiire bu biindu bino bicha ohukwiirao.
52005002	Olwohuba abeene mumanyire bulai muti Oludaalo lw'Omwaami lucha ohwiicha koti omwiibi mu siro.
52005003	Abandu nibaboola bati, “emireembe chiriwo, handi bati buli siindu syoosi siyenjeefu, ” mani abweene awo niwo yibacha ohusihirisibwa! Lucha ohwiicha bwaangu koti ohulumwa hw'omuhasi odaha ohwiibula hwiicha, mani abulao omuundu yeesi ochia ohwebalula daawe.
52005004	Nae eng'we basyaange, haba simusisiiri mu siirima, mani Oludaalo siluhoyeere ohubakwaaho busa koti omwiibi.
52005005	Eng'we mweesi muli abaana b'obulafu, handi abaana b'esideete. Sihuli ab'esiirima oba ab'esiro daawe.
52005006	Mani sakira sihuhoyeere ohukona koti abandu bandi; huhoyeere ohuba ameeso, handi abaaywe.
52005007	Olwohuba abandu bakona, bakona esiro, handi abameesi, bameera esiro.
52005008	Nae efwe huli ab'esideete, mani huhoyeere ohuba abaaywe. Huhoyeere ohwefwaala efukiirira nende ohudaha hu koti ebbaati libwiiha esirifu, nende esuubi ly'efwe ly'obuwonia koti ekofya nyaangalafu muno y'ohumutwe.
52005009	Nasae siyatutekehera etima daawe, nae yatutekehera ohunyoola obuwonia ohubitira mu Mwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo,
52005010	owatufwiira hu bulaanu humenye alala nae, kata nihuba abalamu oba abafu hu ludaalo luyeecheraho.
52005011	Mani sakira, mulemyeenge abaasyeng'we emyooyo handi muhonyaneenge koti lu muli ohuholaanga busa bulaanu.
52005012	Basyaange mbekweeda hubeereseenge oluyaali luhoyera eyiri abo ababahalaabanamo, ababakolola handi baabekesa ebidiira hu bulamu bw'efukiirira mu Kristo.
52005013	Mubeseengemo oluyaali lw'amaani, handi mubadaheenge hulw'omulimo kubahola. Mumenye nimuli mu mireembe abeene-na-beene.
52005014	Basyeefwe, hubekweeda mukerakire abandu batadaha ohuhola emirimo, mugumie abati, muhoonye abakata, mwesimiirisire buli muundu.
52005015	Abulewo omuundu yeesi mweng'we otunga esibi nende esibi, nae ebiha byoosi mubone muti, esichiiririrwa syeng'we nisyo ohuholeraniraanga ebilai, nende ohuholeraanga abandu boosi ebilai.
52005016	Sangaaleenge ebiha byoosi,
52005017	mwekongoyeenge ebiha byoosi,
52005018	mwebaseenge Nasae mu bulamu bwoosi; sino nisyo si Nasae abadahaho mu bulamu bweeng'we buli mu bulala nende Kristo Yesu.
52005019	Mutekaliraanga Mwooyo Mwolerefu;
52005020	mutalekeresaanga emboosi cha Nasae.
52005021	Keseenge buli siindu: lindeenge esilai
52005022	handi mwebwabeenge esibi syabuli ngeri yoosi.
52005023	Lehe Nasae otubeeresa emireembe abahole mube aboolerefu mu ngeri yoosi handi aliinde obulamu bweeng'we bwoosi, omwooyo, nende omubiri-nibitaaliho esibi syoosi, hu ludaalo lw'ohwiichiraho hw'Omwaami weefwe, Yesu Kristo.
52005024	Oyo obalaanga achia ohusihola, olwohuba mwesikwa niye.
52005025	Basyeefwe, fwesi mutwekongoyereho.
52005026	Heese abafukiiriri boosi nende ohukwiichana mu birifu hwolerefu.
52005027	Mbekweeda nende obunyala bw'Omwaami endi, musome ebbarwa yino eyiri abafukiiriri boosi.
52005028	Esisa sy'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo sibe nang'we.
53001001	Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Paulo, Silifwaano nende Timoteo, niyichiira abafukiiriri bali mu Tesalonia, abandu ba Nasae weefwe, nende Omwaami Yesu Kristo:
53001002	Lehe Nasae Seefwe nende Omwaami Yesu Kristo bababeerese ehabi nende emireembe.
53001003	Basyeefwe, huhoyeere ohwebasa Nasae hulweng'we buli siha. Silayi efwe ohwebasa hutyo olwohuba efukiirira yeng'we yemeeda niyihula muno, handi ohudaha hu buli muundu ali ninahwo eyiri owaasye hwosi hwemeedere.
53001004	Sakira efwe fwesi huli ohubehoyeramo eyiri emikaanda ch'abafukiiriri ba Nasae chiindi. Hwemeeda ohubehoyeramo mu ngeri yimwemeedamo ohugumira mu fukiirira kata nende mwahaba nimusaandisibwa nende mu huchunisibwa hu mulimo.
53001005	Sino nisyo esyeekesa siti, ohuheenga hw'emisaango hwa Nasae hwadyeeri, handi situliramo eng'we ohubalibwa mu bahoyera Obwaami bwa Nasae, bu muli ohusaandira.
53001006	Olwohuba Nasae asibona ati sihoyera ohusaandia abo ababasaandia,
53001007	handi ohutubeeresa alala nang'we obuwuluuhiro abali ohusaandisibwa, Omwaami Yesu niyahabonehane natula Mukulu alala nende malaika bae b'amaani mu muliro kwaaduha.
53001008	Sino sichia ohuba esyohwetuunga eyiri abo abatamanyire Nasae, nende abo abatawulira Emboosi Ndai y'Omwaami Yesu.
53001009	Bacha ohunyoola ohusaandisibwa hw'ohumalirwao elalira nibatusibwa mu moni w'Omwaami nende mu luyaali lwae lw'amaani,
53001010	naakobola hu ludaalo olwo abereswe oluyaali mu boolerefu bae, handi yesibwemo oluyaali mwabo boosi abafukiirira olwohuba obujulisi bweng'we bwafukiirirwamo.
53001011	Sakira hubasabira buli siha, huti Nasae weefwe ahoyeere anyale ohubahola mube abahoyera obulamu bumwalaangibwamo. Handi nende amaani kae omweene yoserese abweene buli sichiiririrwa silayi siri mu myooyo cheeng'we nende buli mulimo kumuhola ohweema hu fukiirira.
53001012	Mu ngira yino, nimwo mu liita ly'Omwaami weefwe Yesu licha ohubeeresebwa oluyaali mweng'we, handi eng'we mwesi mucha ohunyoola oluyaali mu Mwaami Yesu, ohweema hu sisa sya Nasae weefwe nende Omwaami Yesu Kristo.
53002001	Bulaanu basyaange, ebidiira hu hukobola hw'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo nende ohwebuusa alala hw'efwe ohumubukaanira, hubekweeda,
53002002	mutaanguyaanga ohuba nende ohukana-kana mu bibaaso byeeng'we, oba ohuba nende ohwesiinduha hulw'emboosi, oba ebibaaso, oba ebbarwa biboola biti bitula eyiri efwe, nibyomiisa biti Oludaalo lw'Omwaami lwoolere.
53002003	Lehe omuundu yeesi atababacha mu ngeri yoosi. Olwohuba oludaalo olwo haba silwahoole ohwoola lu huyiingana huseembayo hwahabeeo mani omuundu otatya Nasae yibatekehera omuliro kutasima yahabonehane.
53002004	Omuundu wuno achia ohuyingania handi yeniinie ohuhiraho buli syoosi esilaangwa nasaye oba esiinamirwa. Handi achia ohweniinia akulu mani yeyihase mu nyumba ya Nasae, mani yelaangirire ati niye Nasae.
53002005	Simwichulisa muti ndababoolera bino byoosi nindali nisisiiri nang'we?
53002006	Handi bulaanu mumanyire esiindu siri ohumukayira ohwiicha hwaanyale ohubonehana esiha syae syeene nisyoolere.
53002007	Olwohuba amaani k'esyaama akakera abandu baahaya ohutya Nasae kamala ohuchaaka omulimo; nae omuundu okakayira ohumwolaho achia ohuhola atyo ohwoola luyahatusibwe hu ngira.
53002008	Mani awo niwo lu muundu otatya Nasae achia ohubonehanira, yi Mwaami Yesu achia ohwiita nende omuuya kw'omuhanwa wae mani amusihirise nende ohubonehana hw'oluyaali lwae naakobola.
53002009	Omuundu otatya Nasae oyo, achia ohwiicha nende amaani ka Sitaani, mani ahole obulolero nende ebiwukisa by'obubacha,
53002010	nende ebibi biingi ebibachirisa ab'ohusihirira, olwohuba bahaya ohudaha obwadyeeri bwahabawoniisye.
53002011	Mani hulw'emboosi yino, Nasae achia ohubatumira obubacha bungi, mani hubafukiirire ebitahoyera,
53002012	mani yemewo abahengere omusango kuhire abo abatafukiirira obwadyeeri nae baasangaalira ebibi byong'ene.
53002013	Abaheerwa b'Omwaami, huhoyera ohwebasa Nasae hulweng'we buli siha, olwohuba Nasae yabadoola muhuchaaka ati munyoole ohuwonisibwa nende amaani ka Mwooyo Mwolerefu akabalabya hulw'efukiirira yaadyeri yeng'we yimuli nayo.
53002014	Nasae yabalaanga mu fukiirira yino nabitira mu Mboosi Ndai yihwabeekesa, ati munyoole hu luyaali lw'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo.
53002015	Sakira basyaange, mweeme bulai handi mwomiirire hu bwadyeeri buhwabeekesa, mu nomaloma nende mu bbarwa yeefwe.
53002016	Lehe Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo omweene-no-mweene, alala nende Nasae Seefwe, owatuheera handi mu sisa syae yatubeeresa obwomiifu butaakama nende esuubi layi,
53002017	alemye emyooyo cheeng'we mani ababeerese amaani k'ohuhola nende ohulomaloma buli siindu silayi syoosi.
53003001	Esimaliirihayo, basyeefwe, mutusabire muti Emboosi ya Nasae yinyale ohusalaana bwaangu handi yinyoole oluyaali koti luyali mweng'we.
53003002	Handi mutusabire muti Nasae atuwonie abasuku nende abaholi b'ebibi, olwohuba sisiri siti buli muundu yeesi ali nende efukiirira.
53003003	Nae Omwaami mwesikwa; achia ohubabeeresa amaani, handi abakaye ohutula hu musuku.
53003004	Handi huli abesikwa mweng'we mu Mwaami huti muli ohuhola buli siindu sihubalagira handi mucha ohwemeeda ohuhola mutyo.
53003005	Lehe Omwaami yemerere emyooyo cheeng'we mube nende ohudaha hwa Nasae handi nende obwesimiirisi bwa Kristo.
53003006	Basyeefwe, mu liita ly'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo, hubalagira huti, mweyaabe omufukiiriri mukata yeesi otalondakana nende enjekesa yihwababeeresa.
53003007	Olwohuba eng'we abeene mumanyire bulai muti muhoyeere ohutuboneraho engeri yihwabeekesa. Sihwali bakata nihuli mweng'we
53003008	handi sihwalyaaho esyohulya sy'omuundu yeesi nihutatuungire. Nae hwahalaabana handi hwaholaanga nende amaani esiro nende esideete, huhaye ohusidoyera omuundu yeesi mweng'we.
53003009	Hwahola sino nihutachiiririra huti haba sihudaha obuhoonyi bweeng'we; nae nihuchiiririra huti hube esyohuboneraho yimuli.
53003010	Olwohuba nihwali nihuli nang'we hwababeeresa elako huti: omuundu yeesi otahola omulimo haba sahoyeere hulya.
53003011	Huboola sino olwohuba huwulira mbwe aliwo abandi mweng'we abakata abatadaha ohuhola omulimo kwosi ohumalaho ohweyingirira busa emirimo ch'abandi.
53003012	Muliita ly'Omwaami Yesu Kristo hubalagira handi husaba abandu b'engeri eyo batereese esaambo chaabwe, handi bachaake ohuhola emirimo hubanyale ohunyoola ebiindu bihoonya obulamu bwaabwe bweene.
53003013	Nae eyiri eng'we basyeefwe, mutajoonga ohuholaanga ebilai.
53003014	Omuundu yeesi oli eyo otawulira bihubaandiikira mu bbarwa yino mumwehaliirise bulai, handi, mutaholera alala nae, hu soni chimudiire.
53003015	Nae mutamubukula koti omusuku, ohumalaho mumwekese koti omwaana weng'we.
53003016	Lehe Omwaami mweene, okaba emireembe ababeerese emireembe endaalo choosi handi mu ngira yoosi. Omwaami abe nende buli muundu yeesi mweng'we.
53003017	Ese Paulo nyandiika amaheeso kano nende omuhono kwaange kweene, handi aho niho ahalolero handechaanga mu bbarwa change choosi. Yino niyo engeri yinyandikiramo.
53003018	Lehe esisa sy'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo sibe nang'we mweesi.
54001001	Ebbarwa ohutula eyiri Paulo omutume wa Kristo Yesu ohweema hu hulagira hwa Nasae Omuwonia weefwe, nende Kristo Yesu esuubi lyeefwe.
54001002	Ohuchiira Timoteo, omwaana wange w'elalira mu fukiirira. Lehe ehabi nende esisa, alala nende emireembe chitula eyiri Nasae Seefwe nende Kristo Yesu Omwaami weefwe bibe naang'we.
54001003	Ndaha odoong'e mu Efeeso koti lundahwekweeda nindali ninjia mu Makedonia, onyale ohukayira abandu bandi bateekesa enjekesa yindi.
54001004	Baboolere balehere awo ohweboya hu ngano chitamanyihaane nende ohubala enjibulo chitaakama echileeta busa ohuyingana nae sichirimo ameeko ka Nasae akali mu fukiirira.
54001005	Esichiiririrwa sy'ohweekesa hweefwe nisyo ohudaha ohutulira elalira mu mwooyo mulai, nende embaasa ndayi, nende efukiirira y'obwadyeeri.
54001006	Abandu bandi bamala ohwawuha ohutula hu njekesa yadyeeri, mani bacha badondobana beyingisa mu huyiingana hubulamo obuhoonyi.
54001007	Behola ohuba abekesa b'amalako ka Musa, nae haba sibamanyire kata bibaboola, handi nibataamanyire ebiindu bi balomalomaho nende obwomiifu batyo.
54001008	Humanyire huti amalako ka Musa malai omuundu yeesi nakehoonyera koti lukahoyeere.
54001009	Handi humanyire huti amalako haba sikateebwao hulw'abandu balungifu nae kateebwao hulw'abahalaki b'amalako nende abajeemu, abatatya Nasae nende abaholi b'ebibi, abataali aboolerefu nende abatadeeba hu Nasae, abeeti ba basyaabwe nende abeeti ba bang'inaabwe, abeeti b'abandu.
54001010	Kateebwao hulw'abandu bacheke, abayirana nende abasaacha oba abahasi baasyabwe, abakosawo abandu, ababacha, abajulira obubacha, nende abahola esiindu syoosi esikabuhaane nende enjekesa yadyeeri.
54001011	Enjekesa yadyeeri niyo eyo eyichiana nende Emboosi Ndai y'oluyaali yindaberesebwa eya Nasae ofumisibwa.
54001012	Ndeebasa Kristo Yesu Omwaami weefwe owambeeresa amaani k'ohuhola omulimo kuno, olwohuba yambukula koti omuundu mwesikwa mani yandoola ohumuhalaabanira,
54001013	kata nindamufwoola hale handi nindamusaandia, handi nimunyeka. Nae Nasae yeecha yangwiira esisa olwohuba ndahola endyo nitaali nende efukiirira handi nitaamanyire esy'ohuhola.
54001014	Mani Omwaami weefwe yanjuhira esisa siingi muno mani yamberesa efukiirira nende ohudaha syambwomoohera alala nende efukiirira nende ohudaha ebiri mu Kristo Yesu.
54001015	Enomanoma yino yadyeeri handi yihoyera ohwakaanirwa nende ohufukiirira hwoosi yiti, Kristo Yesu yeecha mu syaalo muno ohuwonia abaholi b'ebibi. Naange nise ohiriramo elalira mu baholi b'ebibi;
54001016	nae hulwesifune sino, Nasae yangwiira esisa hu Yesu Kristo anyale ohweekesa ohwesimiirisa hwae hwiichufu ohuba esyohweekeraho eyiri abo abacha ohumufukiiriramo banyoole obulamu butaakama.
54001017	Eyiri Omutuki w'endaalo choosi, otafwa, otabonehana, Nasae mulala yeng'ene, afumisibwe handi aberesebwe oluyaali endaalo choosi. Amiina.
54001018	Timoteo, mwaana wange, hubeeresa esilagiro sino, esichiana nende obunabbi bwahulomwalomwaho hale, mani bihuhoonye onyale ohulwaana nende obumaliirifu bwoosi.
54001019	Mani yomiirira hu fukiirira yao, handi obe nende ebibaaso bilai. Abandu bandi baleha ebibaaso bilai mani beetera elalira efukiirira yaabwe.
54001020	Mwaabo nimwo omuli Hamenesi nende Alekisaanda, bandamala ohudiisa Sitaani hubanyale ohweeka obutafwolaanga Nasae.
54002001	Sakira esitaangira, mbekweeda endi, musabireenge, mwekongoyereenge, handi mwebasireenge abandu boosi eyiri Nasae.
54002002	Mwekongoyereenge abatuki nende abo boosi abali mu bifwo by'obutuki, hu hunyale ohumenya mu bulamu buyenjeefu handi obw'emireembe, nihutya Nasae, handi nihwebisa bilai mu ngeri choosi.
54002003	Sino silayi, handi sifukiirirwa mu moni wa Nasae Omuwonia weefwe,
54002004	odaha abandu boosi baonisibwe handi boole hu humanya obwadyeeri.
54002005	Olwohuba aliwo Nasae mulala handi aliwo omuundu mulala osasania Nasae nende abandu. Wuno niye Kristo Yesu, oli omuundu mweene,
54002006	owewaayo ohuwonia abandu boosi. Sino nisyo esilolero syeecha mu biha bihoyeere.
54002007	Sino nisyo esyakera ndadoolebwa ohuba omuyaali handi omutume (Ndi ohuboola obwadyeeri, haba simbacha), omweekesa w'Abateende mu fukiirira nende mu bwadyeeri.
54002008	Sakira ndekoomba endi mu buli sifwo abasaacha bahoyeere ohwekongooya, nibasingiise akulu amahono kaabwe moolerefu ataali etima oba obusoolo.
54002009	Handi ndekoomba abahasi bosi befwaleenge engubo chihoyerwa handi babe abaloonga. Batesukaanga efwiiri, oba ohwesyaaya esaabbu oba amakina k'ebbeyi oba engubo ch'obukusi bw'akulu muno.
54002010	Nae babe nende ebiholwa bilai bihoyera abahasi batya Nasae.
54002011	Lehe omuhasi atekereseenge enjekesa nawuleerere nalongoyaale.
54002012	Sifukiirira omuhasi yeesi ohweekesa oba ohuba nende obunyala bwoosi hu musaacha. Ahoyere ohuwuleera.
54002013	Olwohuba Adamu niye owataangira ohuloongwa, hubaloondiaho Efa.
54002014	Handi Adamu siniye owabachiriswa, nae omuhasi niye owabachiriswa, mani yehola omuhalaki w'amalako.
54002015	Kata katyo, omuhasi achia ohuwonisibwa ohubitira muhwibula abana, niyomiirira mu fukiirira, nende mu hudaha, nende mu bwolerefu alala nende ohweliinda bulai.
54003001	Enomanoma yino yadyeeri: Omuundu yeesi nadaha ohuba omwemeresi w'abafukiiriri, aaba adaha omulimo kw'oluyaali.
54003002	Omwemeresi ahoyeere ohuba omuundu otaaliho esibi syoosi; ahoyeere ohuba omusaacha w'omuhasi mulala, otaali ow'etima, omwegenderesa, owoluyaali, osangaalira abakeni, handi ahoyeere ohuba omweekesa mulai.
54003003	Ahoyera ohuba otaali omumeesi, handi otaali omwaalaba, nae ahoyeere ohuba omuloonga, otaali omusoolani, handi otaali omwekoombi w'eseende.
54003004	Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu onyala ohuliinda edaala lyae bulai, oweekesa abana bae ohuba abaloonga handi ababeeresa abandu oluyaali mu ngira choosi.
54003005	Olwohuba omuundu otaamanyire ohuliinda edaala lyae, anyala atye ohuliinda abafukiiriri ba Nasae?
54003006	Omwemeresi sahoyeere ohuba omuundu wahachaaka busa ohuba omufukiiri, olwohuba anyala ohwehudumbasa niyefumia mani yahengerwa omusango nasilala koti okwahengerwa Sitaani.
54003007	Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu yi bandu bataali abafukiiriri bosi beesamo oluyaali, ataali awo anyala ohubaaho sibamufunaania mani yaakwa mu muteego kwa Sitaani.
54003008	Abahalaabani b'abafukiiriri bosi bahoyeere ohuba abandu b'esaambo ndayi handi abalomaloma obwadyeeri, abataali abang'wi muno, handi abataali nende omuluulu kw'efuni.
54003009	Bahoyeere ohwomiirira hu fukiirira yadyeeri yibekeswa nibali nende ebibaaso bilai.
54003010	Handi bahoyeere ohukesebwaho mberi; mani nibamalire ohweyekesa bati babulaho esifune syoosi, lehe bafukiirirwe ohuba abahalaabani b'abafukiiriri.
54003011	Abahasi baabwe bosi bahoyeere ohuba abandu b'esaambo ndayi, abataali abamoonyi, nae abaloonga handi ab'esikwa mu biindu byoosi.
54003012	Omuhalaabani w'abafukiiriri ahoyeere ohuba omusaacha w'omuhasi mulala yeng'ene handi nga anyala ohuliinda bulai abana bae nende ohuliinda bulai edaala lyae lyoosi.
54003013	Olwohuba oyo onyala ohuhola bulai omulimo kw'ohuhalaabanira abafukiiriri yeefunira eliita layi mu bandu handi aba nende obwomiifu bungi mu fukiirira eyiri mu Kristo Yesu.
54003014	Ese omweene suubira ohwiicha eyo bwaangu, nae niwichuhana ndahiinda,
54003015	mbandiikira ebbarwa yino nimbeekesa engeri yimuhoyeere ohwebisamo nimuli mu nyumba ya Nasae, abo nibo abafukiiriri ba Nasae mulamu, omusiiro handi yi bwadyeeri bwoosi bweemaho.
54003016	Ataali ohukana-kana hwoosi, esyaama sy'ediini yeefwe sihuluundu muno esiboola siti: Nasae yeyekesa koti omuundu mweene, yomiisibwa nende Mwooyo Mwolerefu, handi malaika bamubona, yayaalibwa mu byaalo, yafukiirirwamo mu syaalo, yayiribwa Mukulu nende oluyaali.
54004001	Bulaanu, Mwooyo aboola bulai bweene ati, mu ndaalo chiicha, abandu bandi balitula hu fukiirira nibaloonda emyooyo mibachirisi nende enjekesa ch'emisaambwa.
54004002	Balihola batyo nibabitira mu hwekaadirisa hw'ababacha ba bibaaso byaabwe byalala.
54004003	Bakayira ohudeehisania mani beyambaania hu huhaya ebyohulya bi Nasae yaloonga ati biliibweenge nende ohwebasa Nasae nende abo abafukiirira handi abamanyire obwadyeeri.
54004004	Olwohuba buli siindu syaloongwa nende Nasae silayi, mani abulao esiindu syoosi esihoyeere ohukaanibwa nisiriibwa nende ohwebasa Nasae;
54004005	olwohuba awo siba silabisibwe nende Emboosi ya Nasae nende amalaamo.
54004006	Nooba nota enjekesa chino mu moni w'abafukiiriri, oba ochia ohuba omuhalaabani mulai wa Kristo Yesu, owahusibwa nende emboosi ch'efukiirira handi ech'enjekesa ndayi yiwaloonda.
54004007	Otediisaho hu ngano echibulamo amakesi handi echitaalimo ohutya Nasae. Wenase ohumenya mu hutya Nasae;
54004008	olwohuba kata nende ohunasa omubiri nihuli nende engaanga, ohutya Nasae huli nende engaanga mu ngeri choosi, koti luhulimo esisuubise sidiira hu bulamu buliwo bulaanu nende hu bulamu bucha ohubaao mu moni.
54004009	Enomanoma yino neyadyeeri handi yihoyera ohufukiirirwa hwoosi yiti:
54004010	eno huhalaabana handi hunyaahana, olwohuba huli nende esuubi lyeefwe hu Nasae mulamu, Omuwonia w'abandu boosi, ohuhirira elalira abo abafukiirira.
54004011	Lagira weekese ebiindu bino.
54004012	Leha omuundu yeesi atalekeresa oburaaga bwao, nae beeresa abafukiiriri esyohuboneraho mu nomaloma nende mu biholwa, mu hudaha, mu hufukiirira nende mu bulungifu.
54004013	Mani ohwoolera elalira lu ese mweene ndahanyale ohwiicha eyo, ewe ohoyeere naawe omalire ebiha ebyao alala nende amaani kamo koosi hu husomaanga awandiikibwa amoolerefu alafu mulwiichuule, alala nende hu huyalaanga alala nende ohusomesaanga.
54004014	Nae kata katyo, ewe otabisiraanga busa ohuhosesa esiyaanwa syayo esyo esya ebyomwooyo esyo esihulimo, handi esyo si ewe mweene wakabwa bukabwa nga lu banabbi bali nibali ohulomalomaanga busa batyo, handi nende nga lu abahuluundu bosi lubahwiisaho amahono akaabwe batyo.
54004015	Kesaanga hoomo ebiindu bino byoosi, mani handi weweerengeyo busa ewe omweene elalira hu byeene ebyo bityo, hu wesi omweene weemeo onyaleenge ohukeraanga ehulaahulana eyo ohubonehanaanga nende abaandi boosi.
54004016	Welindeenge ewe omweene, handi oliindeenge bulai enjekesa eyao eyo. Weedinye busa ohuhulaanga akeene kano ohubeera nonyaala ohuholaanga otyo, oba ochia ohunyala ohweonia ewe omweene alala nende abo boosi abachia ohunyalaanga ohuhutekeeresa
54005001	Otanyekaanga omusaacha mukofu, nae mulomalomereenge koti luwahalomalomera lataao ohwibula. Bukulaanga abasyaani baraaga koti ba mwaanamaao.
54005002	Bukulaanga abahasi bakofu koti ba maao, handi abahaana basimbuha koti ba mbochowo, nende omwooyo mulala kwong'ene.
54005003	Yisaanga oluyaali mu bahasi bafwiire abadoong'a bong'ene.
54005004	Nae omuhasi mufwiirwe naaba naali nende abaana kata abeechuhulu, bahoyeere bataangireenge mberi ohwekaanga ohwoseresa ebidahibwa by'ediini eyiri amadaala kaabwe hu muhuhola batyo banyaleenge ohutungaanga abeebusi baabwe nende bakuuka yaabwe. Olwohuba sino nisyo esihoyera mu moni wa Nasae.
54005005	Omuhasi mufwiirwe owadoong'a yeng'ene, nataaliho nende omuundu yeesi onyala ohumuliinda, aba ali koti owamala ohuta esuubi lyae lyoosi mu Nasae mani ahoyeere ohuchiiririra ohusabaanga nende ohwekwedaanga Nasae esiro nende esideete.
54005006	Nae omuhasi mufwiirwe owesukuna busa mu buli simusangaasa, ali koti owamala ohufwa hale, kata nende naaba naliwo omulamu.
54005007	Lagira otyo hu bandu bahaye ohuba nende sibatanyala ohwoseresa hu biindu bino byoosi.
54005008	Omuundu yeesi nataliinda abeeho bae, handi ohuhirira elalira ab'edaala lyae lyeene, aba amalire ohwebwaaba efukiirira yino handi aaba ali omubi ohuhiraho nende omuundu otaali omufukiiriri.
54005009	Otandikaanga omuhasi yeesi omufwiirwe otoosa emyaaka ch'obuhuluundu amahumi kasasaba (60), handi niyali niyadeehera omusaacha mulala yeng'ene.
54005010	Handi omuhasi oyo ahoyeere ohuba nasiimibwa ohuba nende ebiholwa bilai, handi koti owaliindaho abaana, omuliindi w'abandu, owosaho amakulu k'aboolerefu ba Nasae, owajanjabaho abandu, handi owetusayo ohuholaanga ebilai mu buli ngira.
54005011	Hayira elalira ohwandiika abahasi bafwiirwe bayere boosi. Olwohuba obwekoombi bwaabwe nibukera boola ohudaha ohudeeha, baba bacha ohwebwaaba Kristo,
54005012	mani bakwe mu musaango kw'ohuhaya ohwoseresa esisuubise syaabwe syataangira.
54005013	Handi baba bacha ohweeka ohudyaala, nibayikaana mu buli mulyaango, handi nibameeda ohwo obumoonyi nende obumemekalu bukera nibakaniaya bibatahoyeere ohukaniaya.
54005014	Mani naange ndahadahire abahasi bafwiirwe abo abasisiiri abayere bahahoyereenge banyala ohudeeha handi, boole ohwibulaanga handi abaana, hubanyaleenge handi ohuliindaanga amadaala akaabwe keene bulai hubeemeo banyaleenge ohwiimira elalira abasuku abeefwe abo ehabi kata nabudiidi eyohuchaaka ohutulomalomaangaho emboosi echia esifuto haba daawe.
54005015	Olwohuba abahasi bafwiirwe bandi bamalire ohutula hu Nasae mani bachaaka ohuloonda Sitaani.
54005016	Mani naliwo omuhasi mufukiiriri yeesi, oli nende abeeho bahasi bafwiirwe, ahoyere abe niye obahoonya. Lehe omukanda kw'abafukiiriri kuhaye ohusidoyerwa nende omukuku okwo, hukunyale ohuhoonya abahasi bafwiirwe bataaliho nende omuundu obahoonya.
54005017	Lehe abahuluundu bemirira abandu bulai, babeeresebweenge oluyaali amahabi kabiri, ohuhirira elalira abo abahalaabana mu mulimo kw'ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai, nende ohweekesa amakesi.
54005018	Olwohuba ebyandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, “Otaboyaanga omunwa kw'endaawu niyiri ohuhunyeenya engaano,” handi biti, “Omuhalaabani ahoyeere ohubeereswaanga omuheemba kwae.”
54005019	Otafukiiriraanga ohuwosesa omusango kudiira hu muundu muhuluundu yeesi okutaaliho abajulisi babiri oba badatu.
54005020	Nae abandu basihayiire mu huholaanga ebibi, boolobyeenge mu lwichuule lw'abandu, hu bandu badong'ereyo banyale ohutya.
54005021	Mu moni wa Nasae, nende muwa Kristo Yesu, nende muwa bamalaika badoole hwekweeda oloonde amalako kano ataali ohutya oba ohukwiira omuundu yeesi mu buli siindu syoosi sy'ohola.
54005022	Otabbibbirihanaanga ohwiisa amahono hu bandu, oba ohweduba mu bibi by'omuundu wundi. Welindeenge nooli omunywerefu.
54005023	Otang'wechaanga handi amaachi kong'ene, nae wehonyereengeho efwiini ndiidi yosi, ohuhoonya enda yao ohunyuhuula bilai eby'ohulya, nende hulw'amachuuni kao kabutoli-toli.
54005024	Ebibi by'abandu bandi bibonehanira abweene, bichoomesera elalira hu huheengerwa emisango, nae ebibi by'abandu bandi bibonehana lunyuma.
54005025	Ebiholwa bilai byosi bibonehanira abweene; nae kata nibitanyala ohuba bityo, haba sibinyala ohudoong'a nibyakiswa busa olubeerera daawe.
54006001	Lehe abo boosi abali mu bunyide, babukule abaami baabwe koti abahoyeere ohwiiswamo oluyaali lwoosi, hu liita lya Nasae nende enjekesa yeefwe yino bihaye ohuchalaasibwa.
54006002	Abo abali nende abaami baabwe bafukiiriri, batahaya ohuba abalekeresi nibeema hu huba abafukiiriri bosi. Mu sifwo sy'ohuba batyo, nibo abahoyeere ohuba nibo abahalaabana bulai ohuhira boosi. Olwohuba abandu bafuna engaanga mu buhalaabani bwaabwe nibo abandu bafukiiriri handi nibo abaheerwa. Ohoyeere ohwekesa handi nende ohwomiisa ebihoyerwa ohuholebwa bino.
54006003	Omuundu yeesi niyeekesa ebiindu bikabuhaane nende bino, handi yaahaya ohufukiirisania nende emboosi huluundu ch'Omwaami Yesu Kristo, nende enjekesa yichaana nende ediini yeefwe yino,
54006004	aaba ali owabiiruuha nende esuunga handi abulao syamanyireho daawe. Naali nende obwekoombi bubi bw'ohuyingana nende ohusoolanira ebidiira busa hu mboosi, ebileeta ehali-hali, ohuhayaana, amanyeko, ehiinda mbi,
54006005	nende amayingani k'olutata akatula mu bandu b'ebibaaso byafwa ebitadoong'amo obw'adyeeri bwoosi daawe. Babaasa busa bati, obunadiini niyo engira y'ohunyoola efuni.
54006006	Kata katyo, aliwo efuni embitiirifu eyiri mu bunadiini, nae eyiri oyo onyala ohwikuta ebyo byaaba naali nabyo.
54006007	Olwohuba efwe haba sihwaleeta esiindu syoosi mu syaalo muno, handi sihunyala ohutusa esiindu syoosi mu syaalo muno.
54006008	Mani nihuba nihuli nende eby'ohulya nende ebyefwaalo, huhoyeere ohwikuswa nende ebyeene bino.
54006009	Nae abo abekoomba ohuba abagaga, bakwichaanga busa mu huhemebwa, mu muteego, mu biindu biingi muno ebitaalimo amakesi nende obwekoombi bunyala obudimbula abandu mu hunyaasiha nende mu husihirira.
54006010	Olwohuba ohudaha eseende nihwo omusi kw'ebibi byoosi. Olwohuba ohubitira mu obwekoombi bubi buno, nimwo mu bandi boolera ohudaalima baatula hu fukiirira yino, mani baafumita emyooyo chaabwe nende amafumo amaangi ak'ohwelalihirira.
54006011	Nae ewe omweene, ewe omuundu wa Nasae, lehana nende ebiindu bino byoosi. Welungihe obuluungifu, obunadiini, efukiirira, ohudaha, obwesimiirirfu, obuloonga.
54006012	Lwaana ohulwaana hulai ohw'efukiirira. Wediire hu bulamu butaakama buwalangirwa niwamala ohutuumbula efukiirira yao ndayi mu lwichuule lw'abajulisi bangi.
54006013	Mu moni wa Nasae oberesaanga ebiindu byoosi obulamu, nende muwa Kristo Yesu, owatuumbula efukiirira yae ndai mu moni wa Pootio Pilaato.
54006014	Hwekweeda ohuliinda esilagira sino sitakwaaho obubi bwoosi, handi obutalekeresebwa daawe, ohwoolera elalira hu hwiicha hw'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo.
54006015	Ohwiicha hwae huno hucha ohwosereswa mu siha sihoyeere, nende ow'oluyaali handi Owaakulu bweene, Omutuki w'abatuki boosi handi Omwaami ow'abaami boosi.
54006016	Oyo yeng'ene oli nende obutaakama handi owamenya mu bulafu butanyala ohusudibwaho, oyo yi muundu yi ese tanyala ohubonaho oba yaatanyala ohubona daawe. Oluyaali lwoosi lube nae, nende obutuki butaakama. Amiina.
54006017	Nae eyiri abagaga abali mu syaalo muno, bekweede batesuunga, kata busa batata esuubi lyaabwe hu bugaga butaali obwomiifu obwo, nae balite hu Nasae otubbiibiraanga mu bungi buli siindu sihwesangaasiramo.
54006018	Bahoyeere ohuholaanga ebilai busa, babecheenge abagaga mu biholwa bilai, babecheenge abakabi, handi abetekefu ohuhoonya abandu bandi.
54006019	Nibahola batyo, nilwo lubaba bacha ohuba nibali ohweyombahiraanga omusiingi mulai okw'obulamu bwiicha. Hu baba bacha ohunyala ohunyoola obulamu buli obulamu bw'alalira.
54006020	Timoteo ewe, liinda esyo siwabiihiswa. Lehana nende embaha chitaali ech'obunadiini, nende amayingani k'obusiru ka bandu bandi babacha bati niko amakesi ka mwahakotwa mwalaanga mbwe “Amakesi.”
54006021	Olwohuba ohubitira mu huboola mbwe bali nende amakesi ako, abandu bandi bamala ohusuba efukiirira yeene ndai. Omukisa kwa Nasae kube nang'we mweesi.
55001001	Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Paulo, omutume wa Kristo Yesu ohweema hu hudaha hwa Nasae, owatumwa ohuyaala obulamu bwasuubiswa buhuli nabwo alala nende Kristo Yesu.
55001002	Eyiri Timoteo, omwaana wange muheerwa: Lehe Nasae Seefwe, nende Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo bahubeerese ehabi, esisa nende emireembe.
55001003	Ndeebasa Nasae yihalaabaniranga nende omwooyo mulala, koti lu bakuuka yange bahola. Mwebasaanga buli lu hwichulisa mu hwekongooya hwange esiro nende esideete.
55001004	Ninjichulisa amasika kao, ndekombaanga muno ohuhubonaho handi, hu mwooyo kwaange kunyale ohwiichula esangaalo.
55001005	Njichulisa efukiirira yao nyomiifu, efukiirira yiri koti yi Loisi nguhwaao nende Yunisi maao bali nayo. Handi nyomiisa endi wesi oli nayo.
55001006	Mani hulw'esifune sino, sakira hwichulisa onyale ohuta muhola esiyaanwa si Nasae yahubeeresa nindahwiisaho amahono.
55001007	Olwohuba Nasae haba siyatubeeresa mwooyo w'obutiiririrwa, nae yatubeeresa mwooyo w'amaani, ow'ohudaha, nende ow'ohwefuka.
55001008	Sakira otadirwaanga esoni ohujuliraanga Omwaami weefwe, handi kata ohujulira ese omuhalaabani wae, omuboye hulwa Kristo. Ohutusaho, ba silala naange mu husaandira Emboosi Ndai, koti lu Nasae ahubereesa amaani kahunyalisa.
55001009	Nasae niye owatuwonia handi niye otulaanga hube abandu bae, ataali ohweema hu siindu syoosi sihwahola, nae hulw'etekeha yae, nende esisa syae syeene. Yatukwiira esisa sino ohubitira mu Kristo Yesu, esyaalo nisisisiiri ohuloongwa.
55001010	Nae bulaanu situbwihuliirwe ohubitira muhwiicha hw'Omuwonia weefwe, Kristo Yesu. Kristo Yesu yamalao amaani k'ohufwa, mani yaleeta obulamu handi ohubitira mu Mboosi Ndai, yatuleetera obulamu butaakama.
55001011	Nasae yanduma ohuyaala Emboosi Ndai yino koti Omutume handi Omweekesa.
55001012	Sino nisyo esifune sikera ndasaanda endi. Nae kata katyo, siinjia hutya, olwohuba manyire omuundu yi fukiiriramo handi nyomiisa endi, achia ohuniinda bulai ohwoola lu Ludaalo olwo luchia ohwolera.
55001013	Yomiirira hu mboosi chadyeeri chindahweekesa, koti esyohuboneraho syohoyeere ohuloonda, handi doong'a mu fukiirira nende mu hudaha bihunyoola mu bulala nende Kristo Yesu.
55001014	Liinda ebiindu bilai bibahudiisa, niwehoonyera Mwooyo Mwolerefu oli mweefwe.
55001015	Omanyire oti buli muundu yeesi oli mu situundu sya Asiiya kata Figeelo nende Hamogene bangabuhanaho.
55001016	Lehe Omwaami akwiire esisa enyumba ya Onesiforo, olwohuba yasangaasa amahabi maangi muno handi esoni sichamudiira kata nindali mu mboye.
55001017	Handi niyoola busa ati mu Roomu, yangoonya ohwoola luyanjakaana.
55001018	Lehe Omwaami amubeerese ehabi y'ohukwiirwa esisa sy'Omwaami hu Ludaalo olwo! Olwohuba omanyire bulai esiindu siyaholera niindi mu Efeeso.
55002001	Nae ewe, mwaana wange, ba nende amaani kahwanyoola ohubitira mu sisa sya Kristo Yesu.
55002002	Bukula emboosi chiwawulira ninjekesa mu lwichuule lw'abandu, mani ochidiise abandu beesikwa, abacha ohunyala ohweekesa abandu bandi bosi.
55002003	Nyoola omukabo kwao mu husaanda koti omulwaani wa Kristo Yesu mwesikwa.
55002004	Abulao omulwaani weyingisa mu biholwa by'abandu babuli ludaalo olwohuba adaha ohusangaasa omuhongo wae omubeeresa amalako kamufuka.
55002005	Mu ngeri nasilala eyo omwiiruhi akerana embiro saanyala hunyoola esirabo yesi nataloonda amalako k'ohwiiruha.
55002006	Omulimi oholere omulimo kw'amaani ahoyera ohunyoola omukabo kutaangira okw'ekesa.
55002007	Baasa hu biindu biindi ohuboolaanga, olwohuba Omwaami achia ohuhuhoonya omanye amahulundu kaabyo byoosi.
55002008	Yichulisa Yesu Kristo yi Nasae yasyuhisa ohutula mu bafu, owali omwichuhulu wa Daudi. Yino niyo Emboosi Ndai yi njaala.
55002009	Olwohuba njaala Emboosi Ndai sakira bulaanu saanda handi nimboywa mu minyororo koti omuundu muholi w'ebibi muhoongo. Nae Emboosi ya Nasae haba siyaboyebwa mu minyororo.
55002010	Mani sakira ngumira ebiindu byoosi hulw'obulayi bw'abadoole ba Nasae hu bosi banyale ohunyoola obuwonia buli Kristo Yesu alala nende oluyaali lutaakama.
55002011	Yino nomaloma yadyeeri eyiboola yiti: Nihwafwa alala nae, fwesi hucha ohuba abalamu alala nae.
55002012	Nihuchiiririra ohuguma ohusaanda fwesi hucha ohutuka alala nae. Nihumwekaana, yesi achia ohutwekaana.
55002013	Nihutaba abesikwa, adoong'a naali omwesikwa busa olwohuba saanyala ohwekaana omweene
55002014	Yichulisanga abandu bao esiindu sino, handi balabulire elalira mu moni wa Nasae, oti sibahoyeere ohuyingana ebidiira hu mboosi busa. Olwohuba abulao obuhoonyi bwoosi bubanyoola ohutusaho binyaasa busa ababiwulira.
55002015	Kesaho koti lwonyala ohusangaasa Nasae, koti omuhosi yi soni chitadiira hulw'omulimo kwae, handi koti omweekesa weekesa bulai Emboosi ya Nasae yadyeeri.
55002016	Lehana nende embaha ch'obusiru chitahoonya, olwohuba chiirusira elalira abandu ohutula hu Nasae.
55002017	Enjekesa yifwana yityo yiri koti ehwaaku eyichiririra ohulya enyama. Hamenesi nende Fileeto nibo abasaacha bali ohweekesa enjekesa yino.
55002018	Bano bamala ohuleha engira y'obwadyeeri, nae bulaanu bali ohudondobania efukiirira y'abafukiiriri bandi nibaboola bati, ohusyuuha hw'abandu hwamala obubao.
55002019	Nae omusiingi kw'amaani ku Nasae yataawo haba sikunyala hudenganisibwa; handi chino nicho emboosi chibakwandiikaho: “Omwaami amanyire abandu bae” handi “Abandu boosi abelanga ohuba ab'Omwaami bahoyeere ohwakamira elalira ohuhola ebibi.”
55002020	Mu nyumba hoongo ebiindi byehonyerwa hu miholo mihoongo, nae ebiindi nabyo byehonyerwa buli ludaalo.
55002021	Omuundu yeesi niyenyirisa yetusaho ebiindu bibi ebyo, achia ohwehoonyerwa bilai, olwohuba aaba yawulibwa mani ali nende obuhoonyi eyiri Omwaami wae, naali omwetekefu ohwehoonyerwa hu mulimo mulai kwong'ene.
55002022	Lehana nede obwekoombi bw'esiraaga, mani olwaanirire obuluungifu, efukiirira, ohudaha, nende emireembe, alala nende abo abekongooya Omwaami nende omwooyo mulai.
55002023	Nae lehana nende ohuyingana hw'obusiru embaasa yitaalimo obuhoonyi; olwohuba omanyire oti ebiindu ebyo bileeta busa obusoolo.
55002024	Omuhalaabani w'Omwaami haba sahoyeere ohuba omuundu musoolani. Nae ahoyeere ohuba owesisa eyiri abandu boosi, Handi ahoyeere ohuba omuundu onyala ohweekesa bulai naali nende ohwesimiirisa,
55002025	handi okolola abamuyingania nende obuloonga. Olwohuba sinyala ohuba siti Nasae achia ohubaba ehabi y'ohwefunaka mani bamale bafukiirire obwadyeeri.
55002026	Mani awo niwo abacha ohukoboleramo ebibaaso, mani baone omuteego kwa Sitaani okuba nikwabadiira, handi okuba kwakera nibahola bi Sitaani adaha.
55003001	Manya sino oti, ebidinyu bicha ohubaao mu ndaalo chimaliiriha.
55003002	Abandu bacha ohuba abemani, abokuliira, abesunga, handi abewulira; abanyekani, abatawulira abebusi baabwe, abaalaba, abatasiima siindu, handi abataali nende ediini;
55003003	bacha ohubula esisa, abataleheramo, abamoonyi, abaalaba, handi abalulu; bacha ohuhaya esiindu silayi;
55003004	bacha ohuba abekaani, abatafwayohu esiindu, abechula esuunga; bacha ohuba abaheera esangaalo ly'ohusyalo ohuhira Nasae;
55003005	bacha ohweboya hu biindu by'ohumukulu by'efukiirira mu Nasae, nibahaya ohumanya amaani kalimo keene. Weliinde abandu bali batyo.
55003006	Abandi hu beene abo, bacha nibengira mu mayumba k'abandu mani nibafumaalira abahasi bakata, abasidoyerwa nende ebibi handi abafukwa nende obwekoombi bw'engeri chikabuhaane.
55003007	Abo nibo abahasi bakesaho ohweeka, nae haba sibanyala humanya obwadyeeri.
55003008	Koti lu Janesi nende Jambure bayingania Musa, nilwo nasilala lu bano bosi bayingania obwadyeerimabandu ba bibaaso byaabwe bitahola handi ba fukiirira yahaya.
55003009	Nae sibachia hucha eyale, olwohuba buli muundu achia ohumanya obusiru bwaabwe, koti lubabona obusiru bwa Janesi nende Jambure.
55003010	Nae ewe wamala ohumanya enjekesa yange, esaambo change, nende esichiiririrwa syaange mu bulamu. Wamala ohwehaliirisa efukiirira yange, ohwesimiirisa hwange, ohudaha hwange nende ohuguma hwange,
55003011	ohusaandisibwa hwange, nende ohusaanda hwange. Omanyire ebyo byoosi ebyandeholehanaho niindi mu Atyoko, Yikoniamu, nende Lisitura, ohusaandisibwa hw'amaani hundagumira! Nae Omwaami yaamonia mw'ebyo byoosi.
55003012	Mubwadyeeri bweene, buli muundu yeesi odaha ohuba nende obulamu bwolerefu alala nende Kristo Yesu, bacha ohumusaandia;
55003013	handi abandu babi nende abahubbahubbania bacha ohwemeeda mu huhola ebibiyire elalira, nibabacha abandi handi nibebacha abeene.
55003014	Nae ewe, wemeede ohwomiirira hubwadyeeri bu bahwekesa, handi bw'ofukiiriramo. Olwohuba omanyire abandu bahwekesa obwadyeeri obwo,
55003015	handi wichulisa oti ohutula mu buyere bwao, wali niwamanya Ebyandiiko Byolerefu, ebinyala ohuhubeeresa amakesi kanyala ohuhwoosa hubuwonia ohubitira muhufukiirira Kristo Yesu.
55003016	Olwohuba Ebyandiiko Byoolerefu byoosi, Nasae yabibeeresa amaani, mani bihoonya muno mu hwekesa obwadyeeri, ohwoolobya ebidondobanu, ohukolola ebitaali ebyadyeeri, nende ohweekesa ohumenya obulamu buhoyera,
55003017	hu bulaanu, omuundu ohalaabanira Nasae anyale ohuba omumaliirifu, oli nende buli siindu sihoyera ohuhola buli mulimo mulai okwabuli ngeri.
55004001	Mu moni wa Nasae nende mu moni wa Kristo Yesu, ochia ohuheengera omusango abalamu nende abafu, handi olwohuba achia ohwiicha koti Omutuki, hwekweeda nende esinani siingi endi:
55004002	yalaanga Emboosi ya Nasae, yomiira ohuyiyaala (kata nende esiha nisihoyera oba nisitahoyera), yekesa bamanye, banenye, bagumye emyooyo, handi yekesa nende ohwesimiirisa.
55004003	Olwohuba esiha sichia ohwoola, abandu bahaye ohuwulira enjekesa yadyeeri, nae bacha ohuloonda obwekoombi bwaabwe abeene, handi bacha ohwebuusiraho abeekesa ba beene badaha, abacha ohubaboolera ebiindu bi matwi kaabwe kadaha ohuwulira.
55004004	Bacha ohutula hu hutekeeresaanga obwadyeeri, mani bamalire ebibaaso byaabwe hu ngano chibulamu obuhoonyi.
55004005	Nae ewe, ebiha byoosi ohoyeere ohwefuka omweene; gumira ohusaanda, hola omulimo kw'omuyaali w'Emboosi Ndai, handi yoseresa obufunibwa bwao koti omuhalaabani wa Nasae.
55004006	Nae hulwaange, esiha mbano syahanjolera esyohwewaayo; esiha sinjoleere esy'ohutula mu obulamu buno.
55004007	Nwaanire ohulwaana hulai, malire ohwiruha hwange, handi niindire efukiirira.
55004008	Mani bulaanu esirabo sy'obuluungifu siniindire, si Mwaami, omuheengi w'emisaango w'obwadyeeri, achia ohundiisa hu Ludaalo olwo. Andi haba si ese syeng'ene, nae achia ohudiisa abo boosi abamulindiriire nende ohudaha ohwiicha hwae.
55004009	Kesaho koti lwonyala ohwiicha yindi bwaangu.
55004010	Olwohuba Deema, amalire ohuwambana obwiicha nende esyaalo, kata amalire ohundeha achiire Tesaloniika. Kureseni achiire Galatia. Nae Tiito yacha Dalamatiya.
55004011	Luka yeng'ene niye odoong'ere naange. Bukula Mariko mani wiiche nae; olwohuba anyala ohuhoonya ohuhalaabana.
55004012	Ndatuma Tikiku ohuchia mu Efeeso.
55004013	Niwiicha, ndeetere ekooti lyaange lindalehera Karupo mu Turaosi; leeta nende ebitabo byosi, ohuhirira elalira eby'amaseero.
55004014	Alekisaanda omwitaanyi w'emigasa, yaahola obubi muno; Omwaami mweene niye ochia ohumukaba omukabo kuchaana nende ebiholwa biyaahola.
55004015	Wesi mweliinde, olwohuba ayingania muno emboosi yeefwe.
55004016	Abulao omuundu yeesi owahoonya lundataangira ohwewosaho. Boosi-boosi banjiruha bandeha. Ndekongooya Nasae ahaye ohubabaliraho esibi esyo!
55004017	Nae Omwaami yaba naange, mani yambeeresa amaani sakira ndanyala ohutuumbula emboosi choosi Abateende baawulira. Handi yamonia yandusa mu meeno k'edalang'i.
55004018	Mani Omwaami achia ohuhoonya mu bidinyu byoosi, mani yaamonie hu nyoole Obwaami bwo Mukulu. Oluyaali lube nae emireembe nende emireembe. Amiina.
55004019	Heesa Purisiila nende Akwiila, nende edaala lya Onesiforo.
55004020	Erasito yadoong'a Koliiti. Nae Ndaleha Turofiimu Mileeto olwohuba yali nalwaala.
55004021	Kesaho koti lwonyala ohwiicha endaalo ch'emboo nichisiiri ohwoola. Yubbulu, Pudeni, Lino nende Kilaudiya babaheesa, handi abafukiiriri boosi-bosi babaheesa.
55004022	Omwaami abe nende omwooyo kwao. Esisa sya Nasae sibe nang'we mweesi.
56001001	Ebbarwa yitula eyiri Paulo, omuhalaabani wa Nasae handi omutume wa Yesu Kristo. Ndadoolebwa handi ndatumibwa ohuhoonya efukiirira y'abandu ba Nasae yadoola, handi nende ohumeerera banyale ohumanya obwadyeeri bweekesebwa mu diini yeefwe,
56001002	eyeemere hu suubi ly'obulamu butaakama. Nasae otabacha yatusuubisa hale esyaalo nisitaaloongwa obulamu butaakama buno.
56001003	Nae endaalo chihoyera nichoola, yatwekesa emboosi yino. Yandiisa emboosi yino, handi njaala koti lu Nasae Omuwonia weefwe yaatuma.
56001004	Nyandiikira Tiito omwaana wange wumbulira mu fukiirira yituwambaaniya. Lehe Nasae Seefwe, nende Omuwonia weefwe Yesu Kristo ahube ehabi nende emireembe.
56001005	Ndahuleha mu Kureete endi onyale ohukolola ebiindu byali nibisiidaha ohukololwa, handi oteeo abemeresi b'abafukiiriri mu buli siko.
56001006	Yichulisa oti, omwemeresi yodoola, ahoyeere ohuba otaaliho esiindu syoosi sibamwekanyiisaho, handi ahoyeere ohuba naali omusaacha w'omuhasi mulala. Handi abana bae bosi hahoyeere ohuba abafukiiriri, handi sibahoyeere ohuba abaalaba, oba abatawulira amalako.
56001007	Koti lwali omuhalaabani wa Nasae, omwemeresi w'abafukiiriri ahoyeere ohuba nataaliho esiindu simwekanyiisaho. Haba sahoyeere ohuba omuundu w'esuunga, oba onyoolera bwaangu, oba omumeesi, omwaalaba, oba ow'omutoolyo.
56001008	Ahoyeere ohuba owakaanira abakeni bulai, handi odaha ohuhola ebiindu bilai. Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu wefuka omweene, omulungifu, omwolerefu, handi ow'esaambo ndayi.
56001009	Ahoyeere ohuba omuundu womiirira hu mboosi yadyeeri koti luyeekeswa, hwaanyale ohweekesa abandu bandi enjekesa y'adyeeri alala nende ohwakamiya abo abakesaho ohuyingania enjekesa eyo.
56001010	Olwohuba aliwo abayingani bangi, ohuhirira elalira Abayudaaya beehola abafukiiriri mu Kristo, abajeemu handi ababachirirsa abandu nende emboosi chibulamo obuhoonyi.
56001011	Enjekesa yaabwe yihoyeerwe ohwakamisibwa, olwohuba babita mu madaala k'abandu nibeekesa ebitahoyera ohwekesebwa nibachiiririra ohwegagayasa abeene.
56001012	Mulala hu Bakureete beene, omunabbi waabwe yaboola ati, “Abaandu Bakureete babacha muno, manani mabi, b'omululu handi bakata beene.”
56001013	Mani omuundu wuno yaboola obw'adyeeri bweene. Mani sakira mubaakamisire elalira n'amaani, hu banyale ohuba nende efukiirira y'adyeeri.
56001014	Mani handi bahaye ohuhayira hu ngano hale ch'Abayudaaya, nende amalako k'abandu balekeeresebwa.
56001015	Eyiri abandu balungifu, buli siindu syoosi siluungifu, nae eyiri abandu b'omufuto, handi abataali nende efukiirira, abulao esiindu siluungifu; ebibaaso byaabwe nende ohumanya hwaabwe byamala ohunyaasiha.
56001016	Beyira koti abamanyire Nasae, nae mu biholwa byaabwe, byeekesa biti haba sibamudaha. Basyulana, handi sibadaha ohuwulira amalako.
56002001	Nae ewe, ohoyeere ohweekesa ebifukiirisania nende enjekesa yadyeeri.
56002002	Yekesa abasaacha bahuluundu bahaye ohuba abameesi, babe ab'amakesi, babe ab'efukiirira ndayi, abohudaha hulai, handi abesimiirisa.
56002003	Mu ngeri nasilala eyo, yekesa abahasi bahuluundu bebise koti abahasi bali nende obulamu bwolerefu bahoyera. Bahae ohuba abamoonyi oba abameesi. Bahoyeere ohwekesanga ebiholwa bilai,
56002004	hu banyale ohweekesa abahasi baraaga ohudahaanga abasaacha baabwe nende abaana baabwe,
56002005	ohuba abeliinda, abataaliho esibi, handi ohuba abahasi b'omudaala abalai bawulira abasaacha baabwe, hwabuleo omuundu yeesi ochia ohulomaloma bubi hu Mboosi yitula eyiri Nasae.
56002006	Mu ngeri nasilala hubbirisa abasaacha baraaga beefuke abeene.
56002007	Nae mu byoosi ewe omweene ohoyeere ohuba esyohuboneraho esy'esaambo ndayi. Bechaanga owadyeeri handi omumaliirifu mu njekesa yao.
56002008	Wehoonyere emboosi ndayi echatayinganisibwa, hu basuku bao banyale ohudiiribwa esoni nibahaywa ohuba nende esiindu sibi syoosi sibatulomalomaho.
56002009	Abaambe bahoyeere ohuwulira abaami baabwe, handi ohubasangaasa mu buli siindu. Sibahoyeerwe ohukalusania nende abaami baabwe,
56002010	oba ohubeeba. Nae bahoyeere ohwekesaanga bati balai handi beesikwa mu buli siindu, mani mu buli siindu sibahola, abandu banyale ohusiima enjekesa yidiira hu Nasae Omuwonia weefwe.
56002011	Olwohuba Nasae yamala ohweekesa abandu boosi esisa syae esy'ohubaonia.
56002012	Esisa esyo sitwekesa ohwebwaaba obulamu butatya Nasae, nende obwekoombi bw'obulamu bw'omusyaalo, mani hu hunyale ohwefuka abeene, ohuba abalungifu, handi abatya Nasae mu syaalo muno,
56002013	nihulindiriire Oludaalo lwolerefu lu husuubira, lu luyaali luhoongo lwa Nasae weefwe nende Omuwonia Yesu Kristo lwahabonehere.
56002014	Kristo yewaayo hu lweefwe mani yatununula mu bibi byoosi, handi nende ohutulabia hube abandu bae beene aboolerefu, handi abadaha huhola ebiindu bilai.
56002015	Beekese ebiindu bino byoosi, handi wehoonyere obunyala bwao bwoosi nobagumia emyooyo. Nenya abo handi nonenya abahutekeeresa. Leha omuundu yeesi atahulekeresa.
56003001	Yichulisa abandu bao oti bahoyeere ohubeeresa abemirisi nende ab'obunyala oluyaali, babe abawulisi, abetekefu ohuhola bulai omulimo kwoosi nende obwesikwa.
56003002	Bakerakire batalomaloma bubi hu muundu yeesi, bahaye ohusoolana, nae babe abaloonga, handi beyekese eyiri abandu boosi bati b'esaambo ndayi.
56003003	Olwohuba efwe fwesi abeene hale hwali abasiru, abajeemu, abakota. Hwali nihwahayira mu bulamu bw'obwekoombi bwefwe bubi, nende ohwesangaasa hwa buli ngeri. Hwali abetima handi abehiinda. Abandu bali nibatuhaya, handi fwesi nihwahayana abeene-na-beene.
56003004	Nae obulayi nende esisa sy'ohudaha hwa Nasae Omuwonia weefwe nibyabonehana,
56003005	yeecha yaatuwonia. Haba siyatuwonia olwohuba hwali nihuholere esiindu silayi mu bulungifu bweefwe, nae yatuwonia ohweema hu sisa syae syeene. Yatuwonia yatwooka mani hwebulwa ehabi ly'ohubiri, mani hwehola abayaaha mu Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
56003006	Nasae yatuchuhaho Mwooyo Mwolerefu wae mu bungi ohubitira mu Yesu Kristo Omuwonia weefwe.
56003007	Sino syaholehana hu hunyale ohulabisibwa hulw'esisa syae, hu hunyale ohuba abasiha b'obulamu butaakama buhusuubiramo.
56003008	Emboosi chino chadyeeri. Ndaha womiise ebiindu bino, hu abo abafukiirira mu Nasae banyale ohumaliirira ohuhola ebiholwa bilai. Ebiholwa bino bilai muno handi bihoonya buli muundu.
56003009	Nae leha ohweyingisa mu mayiingani k'obusiru, ohuhwesana hu bungi bw'enjibulo nyiingi, ohukabuhanamo, nende obusoolo budiira hu huhalaka amalako. Olwohuba ebiindu bino byoosi bibulamo obuhoonyi handi byabuhaya busa.
56003010	Kesaho ohukerakira omuundu oleetera abandu ohukabuhanamo ehabi lala oba amahabi kabiri, nomala otyo, lehana nae elalira.
56003011	Manya oti omuundu oyo yamala ohulema handi ebiholwa byae bibi byeekesa biti yamala ohweheengera omusango ohumuhira.
56003012	Nihutumira Ariteema oba Tikiku, wanguyaangaho ohwiicha yindi mu Nikopooli, olwohuba heengereo ohuba eyo mu ndaalo ch'emboo.
56003013	Kesaho koti lwonyala ohuhoonya Seena omunamalako nende Apolo betekehe ohuchaaka olukeendo lwaabwe. Handi bona oti bali nende buli siindu sihoyera hu lukeendo.
56003014	Handi hubbirisa abandu beefwe oti bahoyeere ohweeka ohuholaanga ebiindu bilai, hu banyale ohuba abetekefu ohuhoonyaanga mu bidinyu bikwao bwaangu, bahayeenge ohubechaanga awo busa abula obuhoonyi bwoosi.
56003015	Abandu bandi nabo boosi bahuheesere. Wesi heesa abandu batudaha, abo ab'efukiirira ndala naafwe. Nasae abakwiire esisa mweesi.
57001001	Ese Paulo owaboywa hulwa Kristo Yesu handi nende Timoteo omwaana weefwe. Hwandiikira ewe Filemooni omuhalaabani wasyeefwe muheerwa
57001002	nende Afiiya mboocho yeefwe, nende Arikipo omusikaari waasyeefwe, alala nende abafukiiriri ba Kristo abebusiranga mu nyumba yao.
57001003	Nasae Seefwe, nende Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo babakwiire esisa handi bababeerese emireembe.
57001004	Wasyaange Filemooni, buli ludaalo niihwichulisa mu hwekongooya hwange, ndeebasa Nasae wange,
57001005	olwohuba mbulira ebidiira hu hudaha hwao eyiri abandu ba Nasae boosi nende efukiirira yooli nayo mu Mwaami Yesu.
57001006	Ndekongooya Nasae endi ohuholera alala hwao nende abafukiiriri bandi, huhuhoonye ohwemeeda ohumanya ebilai byoosi bihunyoola mu bulala nende Kristo.
57001007	Mwaanaama w'omwooyo, ohudaha hwao hundeetera esangaalo liingi muno, handi hungumia muno omwooyo! Olwohuba wasangaasa emyooyo ch'abandu ba Nasae boosi.
57001008	Hulw'esifune sino, hoyeere ohuba omumaliirifu koti mwaanamaao mu Kristo, ohuhulagira ohole esiindu syohoyeere ohuhola.
57001009	Nae olwohuba hudaha, hwekongooya bwe kongooya. Ese Paulo, wamwaanda wa Kristo Yesu, nae bulaanu oli omuboye wae
57001010	hwekweeda hulw'omwaana wange Onesimu, yindeehola laatang'ene mu Kristo niindi mu mboye.
57001011	(Hale haba siyaba nende obuhoonyi yooli, nae bulaanu, wobuhoonyi bw'amaani yooli nende yiindi.)
57001012	Bulaanu ndi ohumutuma akobole yooli, handi yeecha nende omwooyo kwaange.
57001013	Ndahadahire adoong'e naange ano, anyale ohuhoonya mu sifwo syao, niindi mu buboye hulw'Emboosi Ndai.
57001014	Nae haba sindahire ohuhola endyo ewe notafukiriire; ohutusaho ndahire ewe omweene ohole otyo ohutula mu hudaha hwao omweene, ataali ohuyiikwa.
57001015	Awundi sino nisyo esyakera Onesimu yaahukabuhanaho hulw'esiha sidiidi, hwaanyale ohuhukoboserwa elalira.
57001016	Olwohuba haba saali ohukobola koti omuwaambe busa, nae ohirira eyale omuwaambe; ali mwaanamaao w'omwooyo mu Kristo. Ali nende obuhoonyi bungi muno yiindi! Handi achia ohuba nende obuhoonyi bungi ohuhirao koti bulaanu ali omuwaambe handi mwaanamaao mu Mwaami.
57001017	Sakira niwumbaasaho oti ndi omuhalaabani waasyo, mubukaanire koti lu wahanjakaaniire.
57001018	Nabaao esiindu syoosi siyahukosera, oba nomubaanjaho esiindu syoosi, sibalire hu ese.
57001019	Ese Paulo, nyandiika ebiindu bino nende omuhono kwaange kweene. Ese Paulo njia ohuhutuunga. Kata ndahaba nimanyire endi obulamu bwao bwosi buliwo hulwaange.
57001020	Sakira wasyaange, hulw'Omwaami ngwiire esisa. Koti mwaanama mu Kristo sangaaseho!
57001021	Ndi omumaliirifu endi ochia ohuhola bi husaba, handi ochia ohuhola ebihiraho bihusaba.
57001022	Ohumeeda hwebyo, tekehereho owohweyalisa, olwohuba suubira endi, Nasae achia ohukobolamo ohwekongooya hweeng'we eng'we mweesi mani yangaluse yi muli.
57001023	Epafura omuboye wasyaange mu Kristo Yesu, ahuheesa.
57001024	Handi Mariko nende Aristaako, nende Deema, alala nende Luka abahalaabani basyaange, bosi bahuheesa.
57001025	Lehe ehabi ch'Omwaami weefwe Yesu Kristo chibe nang'we.
58001001	Hale, Nasae yalomalomanga nende ba kuuka yeefwe amahabi maangi handi mu ngeri chikabuhaane nabitira mu banabbi.
58001002	Nae mu ndaalo chimaliirihayo chino, Nasae alomaloome naafwe nabitira mu Mwaana wae. Omwaana wae oyo niye yi Nasae yadoola ohuba omusiha w'ebiindu byoosi, handi Nasae yabitira mu Mwaana wae oyo ohuloonga ebiindu byoosi.
58001003	Omwaana oyo, niye obulafu bweekesa oluyaali lwa Nasae, handi niye efwaani ya Nasae yeene, handi niye oliinda ebiloonge byoosi nende emboosi yae y'amaani. Naamalire ohunyalira ebibi by'abandu boosi ohuleherwamo, yeehala Mukulu hu muhono muluungi kwa Nasae, Omweene bunyala bwoosi.
58001004	Omwaana wa Nasae yabeereswa oluyaali luhira olwa bamalaika, koti busa eliita li Nasae yamubeeresa lihira akaabwe oluyaali.
58001005	Olwohuba, abulao malaika yeesi yi Nasae yabooleraho ati, “Niiwe Omwaana wange, olwaleero hwibuule” Oba handi ati, “Njia ohuba Laatang'ene, handi yesi abe Omwaana wange”
58001006	Nae ohumeeda hw'ebyo, Nasae niyali aambi ohutuma Omwaana wae mwikulaanda mu syaalo, yaboola ati, “Lehe bamalaika ba Nasae boosi bamwiinamire.”
58001007	Nae bino nibyo bi Nasae yaboola ebidiira hu bamalaika ati, “Nasae yahola bamalaika bae baaba emboo, handi yaahola abahalaabani bae enjeserye ch'omuliro.”
58001008	Nae ebidiira hu Mwaana, Nasae yaboola ati, “Obwaami bwao, Ewe Nasae, bw'endaalo choosi, otuka abandu nende obwadyeeri.
58001009	Waheera obuluungifu nae wasyuula obuhyamu. Mani sakira Nasae, Nasae wao ahwawulewo handi ahubeere esangaalo ly'oluyaali lungi muno ohuhira luyabeeresa abaasyo.”
58001010	Nasae handi yaboola ati, “Ewe, Omwaami, mu huchaaka niiwe owaloonga esyaalo, handi wahola ekulu nende amahono kao keene.
58001011	Ebiindu ebyo byoosi bicha ohusihirira, nae ewe ochia ohudoong'ao; byoosi bicha ohukofula koti engubo.
58001012	ochia ohubifuumba koti omukeeka, handi bichuuhe koti engubo. Nae ewe ochia ohudoong'a busa koti lwooli, handi emyaaka chao haba sichicha hwaakama.”
58001013	Nae malaika siina yi Nasae yabooleraho ati, “Yihala hu muhono kwaange muluungi ohwoola lundihola abasuku bao babe esiteeni sy'ohutaaho amakulu kao.”
58001014	Bamalaika abo, haba sinibo emyooyo chihalaabanira Nasae, chi Nasae yatuma ohuhoonya abo abacha ohunyoola obuwonia?
58002001	Mani sakira huhoyeere ohwomiirira muno mu bwadyeeri buhwamala ohuwulira, hu abulewo esiindu syoosi esinyala ohutukosa.
58002002	Nikali mbwe emboosi yi bakuuka yeefwe banyoola ohutula hu bamalaika yali ey'adyeeri, handi abo abatayilonda oba bayifukiirira, banyoola ohusaandisibwa hu bahoyera.
58002003	Bulaanu huba hucha ohwewonia hutye, nihulekeresa obuwonia buhuluundu buno? Omwaami mweene niye owataangira ohulaangirira obuwonia buno, handi abo abamuwulira batwomiisira bati bwadyeeri nibwo.
58002004	Handi Nasae yesi yeecha yameeda ohwomiisa emboosi eyo naahola obulolero nende ebiwukisa alala nende eby'amaya bitaali nasilala, handi naakaba ebiyaanwa koti lwadaha ebiyaanwa bya Mwooyo Mwolerefu.
58002005	Nasae haba siyataao bamalaika ohuba abatuki b'esyaalo sichia ohwiichaesyaalo sihuli ohulomalomaho.
58002006	Ohutusaho koti lu syaboolwa abundu wandi mu byandiiko byolerefu siti, “Omuundu niye siina esikera ewe Nasae wamubaasaho muno? Omuundu-buundu busa niye naanu yodeebaho muno?
58002007	Wamuhola ohuba aasi wa bamalaika ebiha ebidiidi muno; wamufwaasa ekofya y'oluyaali nende efuma,
58002008	handi wamuhola atuke ebiindu byoosi.” Siboola siti, Nasae yamuhola “ohutuka ebiindu byoosi”; sino syekesera elalira siti yamubeeresa ebiindu byoosi.
58002009	Nae hubona Yesu, owaholwa yabaaho aasi wa bamalaika hulw'esiha sidiidi, hwaanyale ohufwiira buli muundu hulw'esisa sya Nasae. Bulaanu humubona nafwaasirwe ekofya y'oluyaali nende efuma hulw'ohufwa hwae.
58002010	Syali sihoyera Nasae, owaloonga handi oliinda buli siindu, ohubeeresa Yesu obunyala bw'ohuyira abandu mu buwonia ohubitira mu husaanda hwae, hwaanyale ohukera abaana bangi bakabaneho hu luyaali lwae.
58002011	Alabya abandu ohutula mu bibi byaabwe, mani oyo olabya nende abo abalabisibwa, boosi bali nende Laata yaabwe mulala. Sakira Yesu saali nende esoni ohubalaanga abebulana bae.
58002012	Aboolera Nasae ati, “Njia ohuboolera abandu bange ebiindu biwahola; njia ohuhufumia yi bebusiire alala.”
58002013	Handi aboola ati, “Njia ohuta esuubi lyaange mu Nasae.” Handi aboola ehabi liindi ati, “Mbano ndi ano nende abaana ba Nasae yambeeresa.”
58002014	Koti abo ba Yesu alaanga abaana, bali bandu ab'omubiri nende ab'amabaanga, Yesu yesi yeehola yafwaana nabo mani yaakabana hu bw'omuundu bwaabwe. Yahola atyo hwaanyale ohusihirisa Sitaani, oli nende obunyala hu hufwa.
58002015	Yahola atyo, hwaanyale ohuboolola abo abali ababoye mu bulamu bwaabwe bwoosi olwohuba bali batya ohufwa.
58002016	Sibonehera elalira siti, haba sahoonya ba malaika. Ohutusaho ahoonya abechuhulu ba Yibbulaimu.
58002017	Mani sakira yahoyera ohwehola afwaanane nende abandu bae mu ngeri choosi, hwaanyale afwaane nende ba mwaanang'ina mu buli ngeri, hwaanyale ohuba Omulaamisi Muhuluundu waabwe mwesikwa, handi ow'esisa mu huhalaabana hwae eyiri Nasae, hu bibi by'abandu binyale ohuleherwamo.
58002018	Mani bulaanu anyala ohuhoonya abo abahemebwa, olwohuba yesi omweene yahemebwa handi yasaanda.
58003001	Bakristo basyaange, mweesi mwalaangwa nende Nasae! Mubaaseho hu Yesu, yi Nasae yatuma ohuba Omulaamisi Muhuluundu w'efukiirira yi hutuumbula.
58003002	Yali omwesikwa eyiri Nasae, owamudoola ohuhola omulimo kuno, koti lu Musa yesi yali omwesikwa mu mulimo kwae mu nyumba ya Nasae.
58003003	Koti omwombahi w'enyumba anyoola oluyaali ohuhira enyumba yeene, mu ngeri nasilala, Yesu ali nende oluyaali lungi muno ohuhira Musa.
58003004	Buli nyumba yoombahwa nende omuundunae Nasae niye omwombahi wa buli siindu.
58003005	Nae Musa yali omwesikwa mu nyumba ya Nasae yoosi koti omuhalaabani, mani yalomaloma hu biindu bi Nasae yali achia ohuhola mu moni.
58003006	Nae Kristo mwesikwa koti Omwaana wa Nasae oliinda enyumba ya Nasae. Huli enyumba yae nihudoong'a buli ludaalo nihuli abagumu, handi nihuli abomiifu mu siindu si husuubiramo.
58003007	Mani sakira, koti lu Mwooyo Mwolerefu aboola ati, “Olwaleero, nimuwulira ekono lya Nasae,
58003008	mutoomia emyooyo cheeng'we koti lu bakuuka yeeng'we bahola, koti lubajeemera Nasae, koti lu bali hu ludaalo olwo mu siparara, koti lu bamuhema.
58003009	Eyo niyo yi bakuuka yeeng'we yi bahemera, kata nibaba nibamalire ohubona ebiindu bindahola mu mbaka y'emyaaka amahumi kane.
58003010	Mani sakira ndeecha ndanyoolera nabo mani ndaboola endi, 'Buli siha bahyamu mu myooyo chaabwe handi bahaya ohuwulira amalako kange.'
58003011	Sakira etima lyandiira mani ndechuba nimboola endi: ‘Haba sibachia hwiingira mu buwuluhiro bwaange.’ ”
58003012	Mani basyaange mweliinde abulewo omuundu yeesi mw'eng'we oba nende omwooyo mubi okutafukiirira, ahaye ohutula hu Nasae mulamu.
58003013	Ohutusaho, muhoyeere ohugumia abaasyeng'we emyooyo buli ludaalo, hasita emboosi “Olwaleero” mu byandiiko byolerefu yitudiiraho, hwabuleo omuundu yeesi hw'eng'we onyala ohubachiriswa nende esibi, mani yooma omutwe.
58003014	Olwohuba fweesi hukabanira alala nende Kristo nihwomiisa obwesikwa bweefwe buhwachaaka nabo hwoola hu njakamo.
58003015	Sino nisyo si byandiiko byolerefu biboola biti, “Olwaleero, nimuwulira ekono lya Nasae, mutoomia emyooyo cheeng'we koti lu bakuuka yeeng'we bahola, koti lu bajeemera Nasae.”
58003016	Nae bandu siina abawulira ekono lya Nasae mani baamala baamujeemera? Abo nibo abandu boosi ba Musa yeemerera nabatusa mu Misiri.
58003017	Nae bandu siina ba Nasae yanyoolerera hulw'embaka y'emyaaka amahumi kane? Nibo abandu bahola ebibi, mani baakwa baamala bafwiira mu siparara.
58003018	Nae Nasae niyechuba naboola ati, “Haba sibahengire mu buwuluhiro bwaange,” yali alomaloma hu bandu siina beene? Yali alomaloma hu abo abali nibamujeemera.
58003019	Bulaanu hubona huti, haba sibanyala ohwingira mu buwuluhiro bwae, olwohuba haba sibali nende efukiirira.
58004001	Bulaanu, Nasae yatubeeresa esisuubise hu hunyale ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro buyalomalomaho. Mani lehe hweliinde abulewo omuundu yeesi mw'eng'we otahoyera ohunyoola obuwuluuhiro bu yatusuubisa obwo.
